TEXT: Unexpected developments lead to a whole new set of possibilities as today's Capricorn New Moon activates your 10th House of Status. You're eager to take on a big challenge this year, partly because you could underestimate the amount of work that will be required to complete a project. However, if you can keep your fantasies from distorting the facts, you have an excellent chance to make your dreams come true. Reach outside the box, but don't leave your common sense behind.

Your need for adventure might become obsessive now as the Capricorn New Moon joins relentless Pluto in your 9th House of Big Ideas. No matter how much you try to relax, your current sense of urgency won't likely disappear. Instead of trying to deny your wanderlust, consider ways to satisfy your needs without turning your life upside down. For example, instead of distracting yourself with unobtainable visions of exotic travel, think about enrolling in a course of study to expand your mind.

You are quite serious today and may have a perfect opportunity to demonstrate your sound logic and emotional depth. But stay away from discussions about risky financial investments while the practical Capricorn New Moon triggers your 8th House of Shared Resources. Schemes that promise you a fast fortune should be avoided at all costs. Taking a carefully calculated risk can bring rewards beyond your wildest expectations, but you still need to work hard to receive the payoff.

A relationship that usually seems safe may test your limits today as you struggle to redefine your boundaries. The Capricorn New Moon joins passionate Pluto in your 7th House of Relationships, possibly attracting an intense person into your life. However, this individual could reflect a portion of yourself that you don't want to acknowledge. Even if you prefer to hold onto the status quo, dynamic changes are already afoot. Relinquish control and be ready to flow with the currents, wherever they may take you next.

You are enthusiastic about setting new goals and you might think that nothing can distract you from your path. You may even try to start a diet today while the rest of the world is indulging in holiday feasts. You're strongly driven to clean up your act now that the Capricorn New Moon emphasizes your 6th House of Health. It's not that you want to have any less fun; it's just that you are highly motivated to improve your well-being. Your goals are admirable, but give yourself permission to enjoy the celebrations of the season, too.

You have a lot you want to do today and you're eager to get the ball rolling. The hardworking Capricorn New Moon highlights your 5th House of Self-Expression, encouraging you to show others how your creativity can add inspiration to an important project. Don't be surprised if someone likes your work so much that he or she becomes your greatest supporter. Try not to make assumptions about the roles that your allies can play. If another person wants to help, graciously accept the offer with a smile.

You may be so engaged with your family today that you forget about the work-related pressures you temporarily left behind. The dutiful Capricorn New Moon falls in your 4th House of Security, requiring you to concentrate on important domestic concerns. Sidestepping an interpersonal issue isn't a viable choice because your frustration could precipitate an emotional meltdown. Thankfully, bringing secrets out into the open just might be the preventative measure you need at this time.

Your attempts to minimize the intensity of a conversation today may be too little, too late. The Capricorn New Moon connects with shadowy Pluto in your 3rd House of Communication, obscuring the truth and complicating the issue. A recurring argument could feel like a runaway train, but you might not notice how far off the rails it's gone until you try to stop the ride. Although panic feeds doubt, deep breathing can bring you back to your center. Every word you speak resonates with more intention than you realize, so consciously replace fear with love wherever you go.

You might become quite upset today if someone assumes that your personal possessions are meant to be shared. The industrious Capricorn New Moon is hooking up with suspicious Pluto in your 2nd House of Resources, prompting you to overreact. You could even become hostile if what you own feels like an extension of your identity. If you can't share nicely now, then you probably shouldn't be playing with others. A simple change of attitude makes all the difference in the world.

Your sense of power is a double-edged sword today because you could be driven by unconscious forces you don't fully understand. One way of handling this emotional intensity is to create a simple ritual that channels your intentions in a positive manner. The Capricorn New Moon joins perceptive Pluto and communicator Mercury in your sign, so write down your resolutions for the year ahead. Stating your intentions out loud helps you focus so you can begin to fulfill your dreams.

You might be inclined to take care of someone else's needs today, but it's not a smart idea if you haven't been asked to help. Acting with compassion is always admirable, but an awkward situation can develop if you assist where it's not wanted. Don't express any negative feelings now that the Capricorn New Moon lands in your 12th House of Secrets or your good intentions may backfire. If someone resists your helping hand,  kindly wish them well and walk away.

An emotional disagreement with your friends or family members may lead to discouragement today if your allies seem to be especially hard on you. Group interactions have a high level of intensity now as the Capricorn New Moon joins relentless Pluto in your 11th House of Community. But don't focus your feelings on any one person; instead, disperse your current emotional charge over as many people as possible. Channeling your excess energy into positive action will help more than you think to lift everyone's spirits.

Obtaining what you want today may be elusive if your frustration escapes its container and spills over into your world. Unfortunately, it's too late to enroll in a stress management class. If you are feeling isolated, don't blame others. Striking out only pushes them further away. Go running or hit the gym, but whatever you do, make sure to sweat it out. If you discuss your feelings with someone you trust, be sure to approach the topic gently and treat your confidant with the utmost respect.

You might want to take off the padded gloves today and express your dissatisfaction. But remember that if you lash out (even if it's only with words) you will have to deal with the consequences sooner than later. Don't create conflict unless you are sure that you want to fully engage with the rest of the process. It may be much more beneficial to wage peace in your personal life rather than war.

Although you might feel emotional tension all around you today, you can be quite productive if you simply adapt to the changing dynamics. But if your need to share what's on your mind prompts you to fight the wrong battles, you could end up exhausted and not any closer to your goals. However, engaging in physical activity or doing any type of hard work reduces the stress and increases your chances for success.

This is no time to be harboring resentments because unexpressed emotions have a way of cycling back around and catching you off guard. You may like the idea of withdrawing socially for a while, though you still might engage in an intense interaction if you feel threatened. If stress triggers a confrontation today, be sensible and do whatever you can to keep the conversation civil. You don't need to take the bait if someone is egging you on and looking for trouble. Hot tempers won't lead to a cool solution.

If you think your positive intentions are being blocked by someone today, remind yourself that the obstacles in your path aren't necessarily only on the outside. Naturally, you can't just snap your fingers and change the external circumstances. Nevertheless, you are fully capable of altering how you react to the situation. Instead of confronting anyone, take a few deep breaths and just get on with your own work. The less you push back now, the better.

Free-floating anxiety can be quite bothersome today, especially if you're trying to overcome feelings of isolation. At first, it might seem as if the solution to your dilemma is to share your thoughts with another person. But he or she may not be as accessible as you wish. Consider participating in a team sport or putting in extra hours on a group project. Either way, don't withdraw now; keeping your energy moving is the best way to lift your spirits.

A business or romantic partner may act too impulsively today, but your feelings don't diminish in intensity even if you disengage from the situation. In some ways, you're more frustrated since a lasting solution seems a long way off. There's no reason to worry about fixing what has already happened. Just don't make things worse now by losing your temper. Remember, you can still let your emotions flow without drawing others into your drama.

You might try to hold back a flood of fiery passions today, but your feelings are likely to spill out into the open anyhow. Be aware that others may be overwhelmed by your emotional heat wave if you suddenly release your stored-up tensions. It's time for you to do what Scorpios do best: transform the negative into positive energy. No matter what the question is now, the answer is love.

You have an overabundance of physical energy, but you might believe that there's no easy way to express it today. However, keeping your feelings locked up inside doesn't work, either. You may mistakenly assume that if others knew what you are really thinking that they wouldn't like you as much. Unfortunately, the truth is that by keeping secrets now, you're inadvertently building walls where you don't really need them. Be courageous; dismantle borders instead of fortifying them.

Hopefully, no one will push you too hard today since you are likely to respond in a way that is quite disruptive. Your internal sense of your own power is growing. Like a capacitor in an electrical circuit, you might hold back now until enough of a charge is built that your release has the desired impact. Just be careful not to act too soon or your recent hard work will be for naught. Patience is your best weapon of self-defense.

You are learning powerful lessons these days about what not to say. If you just express everything, the end result may be opposite of what you actually want. But withholding your feelings isn't in your best interest, either. Whatever you share now can affect others, so it's best to speak only after you reconsider your motives. Remember, it's not just about you today; act for the greatest good for all involved.

Although you may feel residual anger from a recent situation, you are entering a new phase when you experience a wider range of emotions. This means that, assuming you pay attention to what's in your heart, you can be more proactive in a positive manner rather than feeling like you are just at the mercy of the changing currents. Although you might not have control over your initial reaction to the current circumstances, you can choose how to respond. Demonstrate your good intentions by taking the high road whenever possible.

A current relationship may seem overly confining, but you won't likely do anything to rock the boat today. You're probably more interested in dreaming about your perfect partner than making real changes. Thankfully, there's no need to worry about how to increase your freedom now. Go ahead and indulge in your fantasy; when you're finished daydreaming, return to the present moment and take a deliberate step that will make a real difference.

You're ready for a major change now, but you only want it on your terms. Your current need to be in control might make others anxious today because they don't understand how you can keep it all together in the midst of so much activity. Focusing your attention helps your cause. No matter what happens, concentrate on your goal and grab any opportunity to give it your best shot. You won't ever know what is possible unless you try.

Being wildly impractical only inspires you to plan your next little adventure. You are thinking in the broadest strokes and might quickly choose a journey to the other side of the world before settling on a trip across town. While others may laugh at you because they think your ideas are too outrageous, you just might get the final laugh when you send them postcards from Timbuktu.

Usually you're the one that needs additional reassurance in a relationship and expressing your feelings is a great way to move toward a deeper level of intimacy. But lowering your guard can't just happen overnight, especially if you've recently been hurt. Thankfully, you don't need to let your past negatively influence the present. Push back against your fears today, for your heart is much stronger than you realize.

There may be a widening gulf between you and another person who decides that freedom is more important now than dependence. The Moon's visit to your 7th House of Relationships indicates a partner who is more of a spiritual collaborator than just a friend. Needless to say, this level of emotional detachment is not your regular path to intimacy. Keep in mind that you can have breathing room and still deepen the connection between you and your companion. If you love someone, set them free.

You may be feeling a bit out of sorts today, like you don't want to do your daily chores the same old way. You are seeking a radical new approach and are apt to become an eager student if it appears that someone knows something you do not. Although, education is not the only necessary ingredient, it is a critical part of the process. Paradoxically, stepping out of your comfort zone now might actually settle your nerves.

Taking a risk sounds like a good idea today, but you must find your own center and get into a productive flow before you start something new. However, you need to be convinced that it can add more pleasure to your life. This is a very creative time for you and it's crucial to enjoy yourself while expressing your inner artist. Make an extra effort to acknowledge both work and play, for now these two opposites are intricately entangled. Follow your muse and don't look back.

Even if previously hidden aspects of your personal history are quite unusual, you still might be ready to take center stage today and share your story. However, you may prefer to keep certain parts of your private life totally to yourself. The level of disclosure is your choice; think carefully about what to leave out since you can change someone's perspective of you in ways that you don't realize. Nevertheless, you could be radically honest, tell the whole truth and let the chips fall as they may.

Trying extra hard to concentrate is a sensible strategy because a variety of new possibilities are wildly intriguing now. Unfortunately, it may be impossible to shut off your curiosity once it has been aroused. Still, it's better to be interested in learning about new subjects than to be so set in your ways that you don't push beyond your limits. Obviously, you need to fulfill your commitments today, but it's imperative to feed your hunger for knowledge as well.

You may feel as if you are standing at the edge of something entirely new today, yet you probably prefer holding onto the status quo as long as you can. Unfortunately, trying to live in the past isn't a useful strategy when the future is already here. Your life is changing in profound ways; accepting your new reality is the first step to reclaiming your confidence so you can take advantage of the wonderful opportunities knocking at your door.

You might want to put a bit of distance between your thoughts and your feelings today, but the two seem to be interwoven in a complex web. The changeable Moon's current visit to your fixed sign brings powerful mood swings to your normally cool and collected world of logic. Don't bother trying to untangle the threads now. Instead, observe how these two modalities work together so seamlessly that they actually support one another. Keep both your heart and mind open for the best results.

You must suspend belief to enable your dreams to take hold today. Fortunately, the Moon's current transit of your 12th House of Imagination could jump-start a sweet fantasy. But don't waste any energy now attempting to clarify what is true and what is not. Instead, just assimilate the entire story for the creative masterpiece it is. You can always analyze it more deeply on another day.

You may sense the turbulence in front of a big wave of change that's heading your way, and your uncertainty about the future makes you anxious. Fortunately, you're not resistant to the lessons you're learning now, but you would rather move through this phase with as little disruption as possible. Nevertheless, you could waste precious energy trying to maintain your current schedule. It's smarter to flow with the shifting currents instead of fighting against them. Adaptability is your key to success.

You might seek advice from your friends today, especially if you're having a difficult time cooperating with others in a group situation. It's challenging to avoid creating adversarial relationships now, yet a combative approach isn't helpful at all. Consider what your colleagues can offer and what you are willing to surrender in the process. Adopting a more positive attitude is your first step. Successful negotiation requires compromise on both sides.

If you're receiving mixed messages from an authority figure today, don't try to force a resolution yet because there's probably more people involved than you realize. Your key planet Mercury may be stressing you out now as it aligns with deceptive Neptune. Instead of pushing your agenda onto anyone else, let the situation develop on its own. Your most sensible choice will become apparent once others get a chance to express their desires. Clarity returns when you have all the missing pieces of the puzzle in place.

The difference between your thoughts and your feelings can be confusing as the current facts pull one way while your desires pull you in another direction. Unfortunately, the incoming data isn't very reliable now. Something that you know to be true today might turn out to be false tomorrow. Even if you want to trust your rational analysis, it's smarter to follow your instincts because they can cut through the uncertainty and lead you down the right path.

You're fascinated by how powerful your feelings are now, but you secretly long for more stability in your life. Of course, you prefer pleasure to hard work, especially if you're not having much fun, so you may jump at an intriguing invitation from a friend. Don't try to talk yourself out of a good time even if you have chores to finish. Taking a break from the intensity of your responsibilities enables you to return with a fresh outlook on life.

You might feel overwhelmed by too much information today as your ruling planet Mercury moves through methodical Capricorn. However, it's challenging to concentrate on mundane reality because your dream world is so vivid now. Someone may pressure you to make a choice but try not to make any final decisions yet. So much is happening that you probably will want to change your mind in a day or two. Leave your options open as long as you can for the best possible outcome.

There may be an important event on your calendar today but something unexpected could happen that requires you to postpone it. You possibly crammed too much into your day because you felt pressured to perform. But don't waste time worrying what you'll do if your plans fall apart; you might simply have to reschedule other commitments. If you surf the changing tides with an optimistic attitude, others will recognize your position and support your efforts.

Your work ethic is being tested for a couple of days as practical concerns force you to modify your approach. You could run into a conflict with a close friend today, but don't assume that you have done anything wrong. There may be trouble if you make a decision that is solely based on your values, without considering how others might react. You'll be more effective if you're willing to change your plans for the sake of expediency. Nevertheless, you shouldn't have to compromise your beliefs to please anyone else.

You have a clear sense of the future now and know exactly what you need to do to be successful. However, circumstances grow complicated if you run into an unexpected obstacle in your path. Managing the situation may not be an easy task, yet it's crucial to give it your best shot. Don't go for the quick fix today; instead, set your intentions on finding a lasting solution that works for everyone involved. Keep your chin up and your eyes on the horizon as you push to achieve your goals.

Your instincts might take you in the opposite direction of your logic today. To make matters more complex, your new plan may be contrary to everyone else's beliefs, too. You haven't picked an easy course to take because of the intense resistance you could encounter. Nevertheless, it's still smarter to follow your intuition now and leave the more rational approach for another day. Ultimately, others will admire you for walking your talk and reaching for your dreams.

Unfortunately, you can't trust your senses today, making it difficult for you to distinguish reality from the illusion. Trickster Mercury is scrambling messages as it travels through your 12th House of Imagination. Using your fantasies to complete the picture may be the best you can do, but the results might be misleading. You could convince yourself of nearly anything now, so it's better to wait for clarity to return before making any critical decisions. In the meantime, relax and give yourself permission to indulge in a bit of creative daydreaming, instead.

A friend or associate may offer you information that contradicts what you already know. You could be so confused today that you don't know who to trust or which way to turn. Although you feel pressured to choose sides in a conflict that is unfolding around you, it's safer not to get involved in other people's dramas now. Wait a few days and see how the situation is progressing before supporting either position. Stepping back to do your own thing might just be your wisest move.

Get ready for some real excitement because the cosmic seas are stirring up some pretty huge waves today as the Sun opposes giant Jupiter. Thankfully, the incoming swells become the well-formed breakers that a surfer loves to ride. You can see them coming at a distance and you know exactly what to do. So grab your surfboard and leap into action. Don't hold back; the good news is the positive energy is probably even stronger than you realize.

Your helping hand extends further than normal today. You might even feel like royalty and others can easily sense the special gifts that you now possess. It takes very little effort to spread your cheer through generous actions now, because everything seems to be moving in the right direction. Stay humble; don't take the good life for granted. A touch of gratitude goes a long way.

You're feeling lucky these days, but it's still not an intelligent move to bet the farm on an intuitive hunch right now. It's not that you couldn't win big -- you might. But there is a built-in instability in overextending your reach. Unfortunately, you may be more interested in theory than in practice today. Don't get so lost in philosophical discussions that you miss the opportunity right in front of your nose. Taking a calculated risk makes the most sense if you want to create positive change.

You may be generous to a fault today, setting your needs aside to care for someone you love. But nothing is as simple as it seems. Your good intentions could pull you into a mystery involving complex relationships and unresolved feelings. Although you have an optimistic outlook these days, your curiosity encourages you to investigate dark places you haven't yet traveled. Trust your intuition, no matter the twists and turns you encounter along the way.

People in your life may have a difficult time with your lack of boundaries today. It's challenging for you to have a clear perspective, in part because you might be over-confident now in your own abilities. All you need to do is turn down your volume just a tiny bit. Thankfully, your day won't be any less enjoyable, and practicing a little self-restraint will help you maintain credibility with others in the long run.

It's not that you're losing touch with reality today, but you sure are intrigued by all of the creative possibilities. Your friends and associates are encouraging you to follow your dreams. In your own unique way, you're falling into bountiful Jupiter's trap of fantasizing about a brighter future. Go ahead and take a risk -- just don't do it alone if you think it's more than you can handle. There's power in numbers and safety in a crowd.

You may be caught in one of your familiar patterns, where both sides of a dilemma appear equally attractive. Even if you want your freedom at work, you're also eager to take on new responsibilities. Making a smart choice could mean that you have to temporarily give up some of that very same independence you crave now. Although you might be considering a retreat from social life today, lean toward the side of engagement instead. Keeping an open mind is a good place to start.

You're feeling more confident about your place in the world today and the potential for new adventures tomorrow. Although you have the capability to amass power and wealth, you are typically motivated by less material goals. However, the temptation now is to reap some of the fruits from the seeds that you've sown over the past years. There's nothing wrong with claiming your just rewards as long as you understand that your search for meaning need not diminish.

Bigger actually does seem better today, but the danger is that your current optimism might inflate a balloon well past the danger point of popping. Even if you believe you know when to stop, you still may realize that you've pushed it just one breath too far. Of course, once the balloon pops, you can't put any air in it at all. It's best to operate with a touch of caution sooner than to be sorry later.

Your belief in a friend or partner may be enough to motivate you now, and you'll be fine as long as you remember to keep your feet on the ground. Don't get sucked into grandiose Jupiter's inflationary spiral or you might not be able to work your way back to Earth. Even if everything looks great on the surface, keep in mind that a good business sense and a methodical approach will set the most successful course. Use your core values as your moral compass and then stick to your plan of action no matter what.

You can cleverly mislead yourself into believing that everything at work is well enough to leave as it is -- but it's not. On the other hand, things aren't that bad, either. Find a middle ground on which to stand because when opportunity knocks, you'll need to know where you want to go and how to best get there. However, being ready means that you haven't over-committed yourself to a project that is built upon the blue sky of Jupiter's expansive ideals and shifting sands. Give yourself enough room to grow.

You want all your family members and friends to understand what makes you tick. Others may be able to see the glint in your eye today, but they won't likely know what is behind your mischievous smile. Fortunately, jolly Jupiter is now moving through your 5th House of Self-Expression, enabling you to spread joy wherever you go. Happily, you should get what you want if you're willing to take the time and explain what's happening in the depths of your imagination.

You might attempt to refrain from any sort of emotional outburst this morning, but your feelings move closer to the surface once the evocative Moon is back in your sign this afternoon. Nevertheless, it still may not be wise to share what's on your mind yet. Even if you don't intend to offend anyone, your words can carry more negativity than you realize. Instead of releasing your stress verbally today, find constructive ways to express your energy that you will feel good about tomorrow.

There's no reason to hide behind carefully chosen words today because your true intentions will probably be transparent anyhow. Your secrecy might have a detrimental impact on a relationship now. Burying your feelings could also suppress the honest reactions of someone close to you. It doesn't hurt to be truthful if you simply remember to be kind in the process. Keep your heart open and you can't go wrong.

Your social calendar can be quite demanding today because you may have to be around people without much time left over for yourself. Although you often thrive on being busy, you long for a bit of solitude now. Nevertheless, it's nearly impossible to avoid interacting with others. Even if you can't escape the steady barrage of noisy distractions, you're able to make your life more manageable by consciously saying less and actively listening more.

You're ready to get down to work today, especially if you enjoy the company of your associates. Still, you might wish you could stick close to home, but balancing your personal activities with professional responsibilities sounds simpler than it actually is. Fortunately, the stress level isn't disruptive enough to make you miserable. Just remember to stay fully present with all aspects of your life and keep your sense of humor close at hand.

You might be the life of the party today, especially if you can't rein in your own intensity. There's no easy way to just shut off the flow of your feelings, so don't even waste energy trying. Observing your reactions to the rapidly changing circumstances may teach you something important about yourself that you didn't previously know. But you must remain open to exploring your response as the energy shifts. Investigating a whole spectrum of emotions ultimately leads to the most personal growth.

The alluring quality of your feelings can be quite intoxicating today, whether you are in a new relationship or just fantasizing about one. You could even fall in love anew with someone familiar or discover an exciting attraction to a total stranger. Either way, your enthusiasm is contagious as long as you don't allow fear to stand between you and love.

You may be argumentative today, yet it seems to you as if someone else is the one who is acting out aggressively. A playful interaction grows more heated as your key planet Venus heads for a hook-up with mischievous Mercury tomorrow. Unfortunately, the love planet is retrograde, indicating that your needs won't be satisfied just yet. Don't push for results now; practicing patience pays off in ways that are well worth the wait.

A professional acquaintance may have it in for you, yet you can't figure out what you have done wrong. Actually, your behavior has likely been exemplary and others could be resentful of your accomplishments. Although you're tempted to escalate an uncomfortable situation now, it makes a lot more sense to smile, bite your tongue and simply allow a potential conflict to pass. You can always pick up your cause after the tension has dissipated and the coast is clear.

Although you might put your foot in your mouth today, your good intentions should cover for any social clumsiness. However, your patience may grow so thin that it's almost impossible to take extra time to listen to others. Even if you're paying attention, you could be onto your next thought so quickly that it doesn't really matter. Your day will run much smoother if you do yourself a favor now and slow down.

Personal drama is in the spotlight for a while today, yet it could make you rather unhappy if you allow it to take over your day. Thankfully, your I-can-do-it attitude may improve the situation right away. Ultimately, you feel more empowered if you look at an emotional confrontation as your chance to move closer to someone special. Or, perhaps, it's time to invite healing to a conflict that's been part of a difficult relationship. Everything is ready to change for the better if you let it.

A bit of intellectual banter can add to the fun now, even if there is a disagreement over the basic facts. Although you take a discussion quite seriously today, you're still light enough on your feet to avoid growing overly attached to the outcome of any debate. Instead of just stirring up conflict because it's a fascinating distraction from your regular routine, make sure you learn something new in the process.

A problem with your finances suddenly comes to your attention today, but it could be something as simple as forgetting to get cash from the bank or leaving your wallet at home. However, it's more complicated if you haven't been paying close attention to your cash flow. Avoid further difficulties by carefully reconsidering any expenditures prior to making an impulsive purchase. If you're unsure of your best move, ask a trusted friend for advice; another point of view might be enough to help you make up your mind.

You might tell someone you trust that you want to take things to the next level, but it's not easy to reveal what's in your heart. It grows more challenging to remain open as circumstances shift. The Moon's visit to courageous Aries pumps up your enthusiasm, but you must push past your own resistance if you want to make real change. Don't pretend that everything is fine if you're fearful of emotional conflict. Admit your vulnerability and step into the unknown because that's where the magic is hiding.

There is no sensible reason to avoid a passionate person who plays an important role in your day. Even if your first impulse is to retreat, running away from an apparently unsolvable difference of opinions won't fix anything today. Although you typically enjoy simple pleasures, you now have an opportunity to deepen a relationship that can broaden your perspective and teach you something you need to know. Your unrelenting persistence helps to turn a tricky situation into a positive experience.

Your current restlessness is not about being bored; it's about wanting to escape from an uncomfortable emotional drama that appears to have hijacked your day. However, denying the truth only increases your anxiety now as you realize that your feelings don't disappear just because you choose to sidestep the issue. Although resolution won't likely be immediate, today's stress passes faster if you share what's on your mind.

Your need to express your creativity runs up against the judgment of others today. Nevertheless, it's wiser to take a risk now and do what feels right instead of trying not to rock the boat. Although a bit of caution could grease your path with good intentions, don't sell yourself short. If you give in to fear, you might not get to do what matters most. Claim your power and act with confidence.

Your coworkers may think they know you, but your no-nonsense attitude might be hiding the depth of your feelings today. It's not that you're trying to mislead anyone; it's just that you don't think it's wise to reveal anything that increases your vulnerability now. Remember, you are not obliged to say more than is comfortable; it's yours to decide how much of your inner process you wish to share.

A loved one may come forward today to demonstrate his or her appreciation for your loyalty, but you won't gain any points by strategizing on how to achieve a desired outcome. Your shortest path to increased intimacy is trusting someone enough now that you can act spontaneously and let your feelings flow. Instead of analyzing every option and considering all the possible reactions, simply follow your heart.

Other people are filled with surprises today and someone's unexpected actions could stimulate a shift in your thinking. A change of perspective enables you to see the current events in a whole new light, inspiring you to come up with original ideas. However, it may not be such a wise move to express every opinion you have now. Be smart and think twice before saying something that you wish you could take back. Your natural mental flexibility serves you well.

It's tempting to become so obsessed with wanting change that you forget about the good things present in your life. The pioneering Aries Moon moves through your 6th House of Work today, encouraging you to add something new to your daily routine. However, instead of suddenly turning your life upside down to free yourself from a rut, consider putting your current drive toward improving what you already have on your plate.

Although you may be overloaded with responsibilities today, you are more than willing to set them aside in the name of fun or creativity. However, your reputation could suffer if you don't follow through on your promises. Fortunately, meeting your obligations doesn't mean shutting off your colorful inner world. If you're clever, you can keep up outward appearances while still fantasizing about your next big adventure.

You can amaze others with your uncanny ability to stay on task today, even if your job isn't living up to your own ambitious expectations. However, your determination doesn't come from your attitude about current activities; it's more likely based on your long-term goals. As long as you hold onto your dreams, you'll be able to put up with nearly anything now; visualizing your current course will ultimately lead to success.

It's easy to give the impression that all is well today because you are so busy that others only catch fleeting glimpses of you flitting from one event to another. However, if you stand still long enough your mask of satisfaction could quickly turn transparent, revealing a deeper malaise. Your inner peace isn't dependent on the happy face that you wear for everyone's benefit. You'll feel better in the long run when you stop hiding your true feelings from those you love. Let them show you they love you back.

Your self-confidence might run into a wall today if someone openly questions your actions or misinterprets your motives. Thankfully, the Moon's return to your 2nd House of Resources increases your belief that you have something special to offer and ultimately boosts your self-esteem. Instead of allowing yourself to get discouraged by self-doubt, put valid criticism to use by applying it constructively in your life. No matter what, there's always room for improvement.

Although the discomfort you were feeling with someone close to you begins to dissipate today, the underlying cause doesn't automatically disappear. You might want to take the easy way out and simply move on. However, even if the pressure subsides you will just have to deal with this problem again, unless you face your denial. However, don't blow everything out of proportion; sticking with the facts is the best antidote to whatever ails you now.

You won't likely agree with the direction that's being suggested today, yet you still could go along for the ride anyhow. Actually, you might do your best work if you step back now and let others take the lead. Remember, your retreat is not a permanent change, but just a temporary modification to ensure optimum results.

Your confidence may increase throughout the day because you assume that you're off the hook from a recent melodrama. Your elevated self-esteem enables you to face your problems head on, even if you still feel a little scared. You're not one to eagerly sink into the darker mysteries of human emotion, but now your enthusiasm helps you go there with greater ease. Fortunately, your courage to explore beyond your comfort zone pays off sooner than you expect.

Your current lack of fear in an emotional interaction might get you into complex entanglements that raise old issues. You may start out with a light and easy attitude; however, feelings could quickly escalate and draw you in over your head. Your first impulse is about self-protection, but it's better to stand your ground instead of retreating. Fortunately, you can gain a whole new perspective by stretching beyond your limitations. You've waited long enough; it's time to go after whatever you want, within reason, of course.

Your mind is brimming with new ideas and each one may sound better than the previous. Unfortunately, you might not have very clear judgment now as the Sun aligns with confusing Neptune, making everything appear enticing. Although you are eager to blast ahead with one-too-many projects, slowing down is the best strategy today. If the opportunity is as fantastic as it first seems, it will still look as good tomorrow.

Everything seems to be telling you that you can take it easy today -- but your demeanor grows more serious as the day wears on. You think that part of your job is to sort out what is most significant from the increasing amount of noise in your life. You might feel as if you can't hide from the barrage of data. Don't sever any connections now, for a gem of truth may be waiting in the piles of information coming your way.

Your colleagues probably know what's going on in your life now without you having to say a thing out loud. Although you may not volunteer any clues about your emotional process, you'll still get your message across without even opening your mouth. Fortunately, your actions speak louder than anyone's words. Don't hold back; demonstrate who you are with your authentic behavior.

A heightened state of anxiety might be exactly what you need now in order to propel you into action. But be careful not to overextend your energy because you may be in a state of accentuated alert. Everything seems equally pressing but, of course, you cannot do it all. This is an important growth phase, even if you're having difficulty maintaining a balanced perspective. Just remember, it's best to err on the side of caution today, for you can always do more tomorrow.

Lofty ideals combined with big dreams motivate you to set your goals high now that red-hot Mars is square giant Jupiter. Unfortunately, you might discover that your aspirations are out of place in your external world. Rather than giving up on your desire for fun and adventure, you may just relegate it to the realm of fantasy, where you are free to go any place you want. And although this is one way to keep your dreams alive, it's still fulfilling to share your vision with others when the time is right.

Some of the resistance you recently faced is finally beginning to subside. The stormy waves seem to be settling back down and your confidence is returning. And although your attitude may not be completely realistic, you still stand to benefit from the power of positive thought. However, it's not wise to act until after checking out your best ideas with your friends or associates. They will likely be encouraging, but they can also be the voice of reason that you now need.

Recognition is given to you now, especially if you have been working diligently. As recently as last week you might have felt slighted, but finally others applaud your unique contribution. But don't be cavalier; accept the appreciation with humility. On the other hand, there's no need to just dwell on your past efforts. This is a great time to start a new project as long as you don't spread your energy too thin.

Your balloon may not actually pop today, but it might not be able to grow any larger. The smartest way out of your dilemma is to make a plan that allows you to deflate the tension before it actually explodes. You had a role in creating the current conditions and now you must participate in the resolution. Instead of avoiding your responsibility, be the leader that you would want to follow. This is the stuff that heroes are made of.

If you are ready to move a project ahead, don't miss your chance to take advantage of the determination of today's Taurus Moon. Although you might not zip along toward your goal, this cosmic energy is great for making methodical progress toward reaching your objectives. But don't plan on crossing the finish line anytime soon. Simply fix a position on the distant horizon, carefully aim your intentions and inch closer to your destination. Slow and steady wins the race.

There isn't anything wrong with having a vivid imagination, but your fantasies may fade just enough today to allow you to see the subtle differences between fact and fancy. The Moon's visit to your sign enables you to reestablish your center of gravity, especially if you are feeling uncertain about the future. Don't run away from your dreams, even if a more pragmatic approach might be comforting. There's no need for your fear of the unknown to stand in the way of following your bliss.

You see opportunities for advancement through a very practical lens today, but you still might not be able to make much headway if you remain stuck in the past. You could be reluctant to share your concerns with anyone else because you believe that self-doubt grows if you give it voice. There's no reason to push too hard now; slow your pace so you can put your clever ingenuity to work. Stay calm and trust the creative process.

Everything feels a bit lighter today as an ongoing inner dialogue between two sides of your nature begins to subside. However, being released from one set of worries can quickly make room for a new list of concerns if you start to question your ability to carry out your plan. Don't waste your mind-power judging yourself harshly before you even begin. Your journey may take longer than you think, so stay on track even if you're not seeing the progress you expect right away.

This isn't the best time to visualize too far into the future or you could miss something critical in the present moment. The reflective Moon's visit to your 10th House of Career prompts you to wonder what business opportunities will come your way this year. Making plans is a constructive activity as long as you also pay close attention to your current reality. If you're looking too far ahead now, you might not notice a teacher or helper who is standing right next to you. What you seek may not be that far away at all.

Unchecked optimism is a significant part of your personal story these days and you are quite hopeful that things will only improve. Luckily, you can imagine a clear path that leads you to your preferred destination while the Moon moves through sensible Taurus. Take time to realign your priorities; the less energy you waste today, the better your chances of reaching your goal.

You may wonder why someone might not trust you now, but your focus shifts as the day progresses. You become less eager to play detective and increasingly interested in demonstrating your creative side. More than anything, you want to be seen in a positive light. Fortunately, you can find the happiness you seek without too much extra effort. Let go of old fears and trust your intuition. Be ready to gratefully accept the admiration heading your way.

You might have a unique approach to dealing with someone who has a very different perspective than you. However, initiating a serious conversation today could alter the way you view the current situation. What anyone else thinks about you is less important than how you feel about yourself. But don't try to avoid an intense interaction since honest dialogue is the best teacher now when it comes to acceptance and forgiveness, for yourself as well as for others.

Your life is about to get busier again, and although you might try to resist at first, this should ultimately be a positive change. Your new schedule isn't only about introducing more activities into your routine; you are also anticipating all that you can learn with so much going on. The overall intensity continues to accelerate, so conserve your energy. A steady work pace enables you to accomplish more with greater ease.

You have a strong sense of purpose now, even though you might feel a bit let down if you haven't achieved your financial goals. Your stress level could escalate if you believe that you're running out of time. You are driven to push hard today for you fear that you won't have sufficient energy later on. Luckily, your fortitude is in better shape than you realize. Forge ahead with confidence; you may be happily surprised when you see how much progress you can make.

You are naturally adept at keeping your desires and needs to yourself. Even if others don't realize your real intentions now, they're about to find out as chatty Mercury leaves your 12th House of Secrets in a couple of days and pushes into your 1st House of Personality. In the meantime, visualize your new direction to prepare for action. You won't reach your goals immediately, but you should notice a positive energetic shift within a few days.

You can label your process however you wish, but the fact remains that you're growing spiritually in ways that will continue enriching your life for years to come. However, your more pragmatic side encourages you to question the value of any impractical endeavors today. Don't panic; the answers you need will appear just in time for you to start your next magical journey.

You have been running on overdrive and may be growing tired of the hectic pace. Now that the Moon is in sensible Taurus, you can retreat from the rat race and reconsider the assumptions that led you to over-committing your resources. However, no one expects you to set overly ambitious goals or attempt to accomplish the impossible. For now, it's more about just being practical. Weed out unnecessary objectives so you don't have to spread yourself so thin. Greater efficiency can bring you a different kind of satisfaction.

You can trust your senses now that the reflective Moon is traveling through your sign. You might even receive extra assistance and affection from the Moon's harmonious aspect to your key planet Venus. However, you have to strip away the layers of thoughts that distract you from remembering what's most important. Even if you withdraw from others today, don't let discouragement prevent you from enjoying your solitude. Taking the time to listen to your heart is a wonderful way to spend the day.

A relationship drama may have recently distracted you from your real responsibilities. However, it's time now to pull back from your friends and social engagements so you can catch up with your work. You might sense an invisible wall that distances you from everyone else today. You aren't necessarily lonely, although you could be overly serious. There's no need to pretend you're having fun if you're not. It's better for all involved if you are honest about your feelings and set healthy boundaries wherever necessary.

You're feeling more grounded today, but someone may persuade you to do something you're not sure about. Others are probably well-intended, but you prefer acting from your own free will. You don't like being forced to do anything. Keep in mind that your actions are more important now than your justifications. Go ahead and fulfill your obligations without holding on to any unnecessary resentment or resistance. Being a team player is admirable as long as you don't lose yourself in the crowd.

You playful Lions are often more than ready for fun and games, and today you take your creative expression exceptionally seriously. Nevertheless, you still may need to postpone your current enjoyment to finish chores that cannot be avoided any longer. Don't stress; you will be able to kick up your heels once you have delivered on your promises. The sooner you get busy, the sooner you can let your inner child out to play.

You might have a very rewarding experience in your own quiet way, for your needs are pretty simple now. You could be content today as long as you don't reach beyond your own financial means or step out of your emotional comfort zone. But don't worry if you feel disconnected from someone you love; it's only temporary. Instead of trying to bridge the gap, use the available space to clarify your core values and reassess what you ultimately want your future life to look like.

Your even-handed approach is rewarded today as conversations with a close friend or coworker lead to a sensible solution to a tricky problem. However, you may run into a speed bump midday as restrictive Saturn enters the equation. Don't lose sight of your ultimate goal, no matter what obstacle is placed in your way. Thankfully, the Moon then harmonizes with sweet Venus, ensuring smooth sailing for the rest of the day if you are willing to keep your heart open.

The emotional intensity of the past few weeks continues to wane, but don't be misled; the roller coaster ride is not over. Unresolved issues will likely resurface for another round, but at least for now you have the luxury to choose what to do and what to let go. By judiciously eliminating unnecessary activities today, you can prepare yourself for the resurgence of passion and drama that is waiting for you around the next corner.

You may be so distracted by the wide world of possibilities that you could benefit by withdrawing from the outer noise and refocusing on what's right in front of you. It might even help to pretend that you are wearing blinders for a while. There are times when dreams inspire you and encourage your imagination, but this is not one of them. Keeping your thoughts anchored in reality is your best strategy for now.

It's not the most opportune time to open your mind to many of the possible courses you could now take. You have already picked a direction and you will do best by holding onto that course as steadily as you can. Even if you're questioning a recent decision, don't make any adjustments to your plans yet. Your self-doubt will pass within just a few days and you will gain a brighter clarity about your future.

You may feel out of sync with your world now as circumstances hold you back from getting what you want. It's not like you have anything better to do; it's just that you are more restless than usual. You're ready for something major to happen, even if you don't yet know what it is. Although you might feel lonely today, don't set out on your own to stir up trouble. Instead, stop to reconsider what you need from others and what you're willing to sacrifice to make a partnership more harmonious.

Even if there are areas of your life that need improvement, make sure to appreciate the things that are working smoothly today. This isn't a time for laziness or self-indulgence, but it shouldn't require high stress to motivate you to change your life. For now, you can modify your world by making small adjustments to your daily routine. Just don't expect a dramatic transformation overnight; it could take some consistent effort and self-discipline to achieve positive results.

Keeping your true desires secret might seem like a sensible idea today, but hiding your feelings won't make them go away. Carefully calculating what not to say could even create problems that push your goals further away. Consider the impact of your words before you speak and be gentle in your delivery. Although sharing what's in your heart may not be easy now, you can do it in a way that cultivates a positive connection.

You are most content when your behavior is consistent with your feelings because you prefer to build your actions on solid emotional ground. Unfortunately, you can experience wide moods swings today as you gather more information about a complicated issue. Don't be stubborn and cling to an unproductive position. Your perspective will continue to shift over the days ahead, so try not to make any long-lasting decisions until you must. An open mind and a flexible attitude will serve you well.

Although it's fun to fly your thoughts as if they were kites, you're unable to foresee a sudden shift in energy that can cause a great idea to come crashing down to earth. The Moon's return to your airy sign blows your emotions first one way and then another. Enjoy exploring all the possibilities but avoid tying your success to any one flight of fancy until you have had additional time to think about the consequences of your plan.

Your feelings are changing, yet you still might want to hold on to an old emotional pattern longer than necessary. Letting go of your attachment to a lingering goal or a passing desire isn't a sign of failure; rather, it's a chance to allow new energy to enter your life. You can't expand your horizons if you're stressed by your struggle to maintain an outdated point of view. A simple attitude adjustment is all that's needed to imagine the opportunities ahead and move toward your dreams.

There's no need to dwell on your discouragement if someone lets you down today. It's wiser to acknowledge your disappointment so you can fully release it. You might have to think quickly to cover for a friend's mistake because it's better for all involved if you can make it right, instead of blaming anyone else. Don't let your attention wander now since your focused intensity enables you to react to what's happening in the present moment without selling yourself short.

A wide range of facts and figures can be overwhelming today, especially if some pieces of the data are contradictory. You may feel compelled to sort through the pile of new information in your search for the truth. Just when you think you have an approach that works, something else happens to suggest you're on the wrong track. But don't give up even if you are frustrated with the process, for your current persistence makes all the difference in the world.

You might be naturally adept at balancing on a metaphorical tightrope, but the level of difficulty is about to increase. Caution is advised because the intellectual tug-of-war may have you relying on trustworthy data one minute and subjective fantasy the next. You're leaning toward trusting your intuition, but finding a safe place to land can be trickier than you think. Be patient; there could be a substantial breakthrough later tonight or tomorrow, creating a whole new landscape to explore.

Playing your part in a complex group dynamic might be challenging now if you feel like an outsider. Perhaps you imagine that others aren't receptive to your ideas; however, you could actually be acting out a significant role in their resistance. Don't be hard on yourself if you are unable to complete a task in the manner you prefer; you're better with words today than with actions. Avoid falling into a defensive mode by making clear points as soon as you can and then moving on to whatever is next.

You could get stuck on an idea that isn't worth your consideration today. But if someone with authority claims that your assumptions or conclusions aren't clear, don't just slip away to play a more adversarial role. Instead, listen to what you are being told and use the new information to change your plan and improve your game. Showing that you're willing to be part of the team now is more important than striking out on your own.

You may have to respond to an unexpected change of course today and your ability to be compassionate could make the difference between failure and success. But if you think that someone is interfering with your plans, keep in mind that it's probably not intentional. However, a trivial issue is most likely the reflection of a bigger dilemma that's still in front of you. Nevertheless, the smartest strategy is to start with the small stuff so you can see immediate progress and gain momentum from there.

You want everyone to acknowledge that you have everything under control today and that you're fully capable of handling nearly anything that comes your way. Nevertheless, too much confidence could attract a whole different set of problems. It's best to be cautiously optimistic while envisioning the future. But be ready to shift gears quickly as the driving conditions on the road continue to change.

Your inflated expectations inspire you to greater heights today, but they can also end up discouraging you if you are too ambitious while setting your goals. Being more realistic in your thinking now helps because you can't rely on others to be completely honest. Your friends and family might be so supportive that they tell you what you want to hear instead of the truth. Keep in mind that no one is purposefully trying to mislead you; however, your current lesson is about developing self-reliance and cultivating a healthy perspective.

Although you might set out to accomplish an ambitious set of goals today, you may be thwarted by your lack of sound judgment. It's not that you are necessarily missing any facts; it's just that you could automatically underestimate the amount of work that's required to complete a job. Instead of trusting your first impulse, demonstrate your wisdom by thinking about all the steps involved in a project before making promises you cannot possibly keep. It's better to be honest with yourself now than to disappoint others later on.

You might think you're extremely clever today because your mind is buzzing with the crackle of excitement and the eagerness of anticipation. Unfortunately, your enthusiasm can land you in trouble because it's easy to get your wires crossed if you jump to an incorrect conclusion. Remember, just because you're able to think quickly on your feet doesn't necessarily mean that your thoughts are correct. Write down your best ideas because they may be even better tomorrow if they stand up to further scrutiny.

Your current tendency to exaggerate prompts you to paint a rosy picture of a difficult situation today. Thankfully, you're able to back up your point of view with what appears to be impeccable logic. However, people should be warned that you can skillfully bend the truth now without actually saying anything that is overtly incorrect. Safeguard your reputation by sticking to the facts instead of embellishing your story. An equal mix of hope and sincerity is a winning combination.

You might have your heart set on doing something so special today that it revitalizes an old relationship or opens the door to a new one. You could feel performance anxiety or an adrenaline rush as electric Uranus zaps your feelings with a stroke of lightning. In either case, don't let your fixed expectations get in the way of a happy surprise ending. It's best to keep an adaptable frame of mind so you can roll with the unexpected changes as they happen.

It may appear that you have everything under control today and your positive approach enables you to accomplish a lot of work next week. But negativity might be lurking just beneath the surface and can throw your plans into turmoil. Don't complicate an interesting conversation by talking about your emotions too soon. For now, less is more.

You may be tempted to say something you don't really mean today, making your work life more stressful than it needs to be. Your planetary ruler Mercury becomes a bit too quirky for your taste as it moves through radical Aquarius over the next few weeks. Stop worrying about how you appear to others, but don't rock the boat just to rebel. Focus your tireless efforts on doing the best job possible instead.

Although you're often very accepting of others, you may be quite self-critical today. Unfortunately, you probably have enough information at your disposal now to make a solid case for your own shortcomings. Nevertheless, a tiny bit of conscious intervention on your part might be enough to realign your perspective. Reawakening your confidence is easier if you don't promise to deliver more than you can in the first place.

You could become a temporary workaholic today, especially if there are unfinished projects around the house begging for completion. Reexamine your motives because you might just want to show others that you can be a conscientious and dependable team player. However, it's tempting to take your good intentions too far by assuming such a heavy burden of responsibilities that you can't finish everything on your list. Remember, this isn't an all-or-nothing situation; moderate between the extremes by finding a healthy balance between work and play.

You might be ready to throw in the towel today because it seems as if you can't manage everything there is to do in such a short amount of time. Don't give up; your determination still has an excellent chance of paying off. Waiting for your efforts to be acknowledged at home or at work isn't much fun, but delayed gratification is surely better than none at all. Take pride in your ability to do what others thought to be impossible.

You may be torn now between following your bliss and having to come through on a promise that you can no longer take back. You could even get upset today with someone you like because it seems as if he or she says one thing and then does another. Don't bother engaging in a dialogue to point out your grievances; responding to the change of plans with a healthy dose of compassion and a dash of humor should leave you with enough time to enjoy yourself later on.

You might get the chance to diffuse a potentially challenging situation by talking with others about what they want in the days ahead. Mercury's current three-week visit to your sign inspires you to think about your plans from an entirely new perspective. But in reality you aren't the only one in the picture. It's not just about your needs, even if it's tempting to focus on your exciting goals. Establishing healthy relationships depends on honoring multiple points of view. Respect is a two-way street.

You may become less goal-oriented in your thinking now that cerebral Mercury is traveling through your 12th House of Spirituality. Although you're typically quite comfortable visiting imaginary realms, your approach is more logical these days. However, rational thought can lead you to a very specific conclusion that might narrow your horizons. Avoid clinging to a single solution today; keep your options open and continue to try different ideas until something clicks into place.

Even if you have been successfully holding it all together, your schedule might feel as if it could fall apart today. Luckily, this isn't as chaotic as it sounds, for you are invigorated by the buzz of activity all around you. Respond to whatever unfolds with a high level of enthusiasm, for you may not be able to tell what's most important until after the fact. In the meantime, keep your options open and enjoy the ride.

You might want to tie up loose ends today, but whatever isn't completed may not get finished for a few more days. Nevertheless, don't give up. Your current attitude matters more than anything, so keep your attention on your goals even if they seem to be temporarily slipping away. Maintaining your optimism is key to establishing the foundation you need. Remember, the momentum you are building now fuels the next round of hard work.

You may feel as if you cannot keep up with your own thoughts as the Moon continues to move through your sign today. Nevertheless, your willingness to talk about your ideas could prevent you from being overwhelmed. Remind yourself throughout the day to open your heart so you can hear the emotions behind what others are saying. Engaging in meaningful dialogue will help you gain a healthy perspective so you can sort out what matters the most in your life.

A secret needs to come out into the open today, so you can integrate this information into your current plan. You might have big ideas about how you want to change the dynamics of a relationship, but may have a hard time knowing how to do it until you have all the facts. Carefully asking the right questions now helps you discover what you need to know. Nevertheless, remain open to surprises and keep your sense of humor close at hand.

Be wary of carefree friends who lure you into their dreams. In other words, fulfill your obligations and attend to your own plans for the future before going off in search of good times. A little self-indulgence sounds like innocent fun, making it tough to decline the invitation to play. Just remember that you probably won't feel so proud later if you abandon your commitments for the pursuit of pleasure. Oddly enough, taking care of business brings more satisfaction in the long run.

You are feeling stressed as you attempt to balance your responsibilities at work with your own career objectives. You want to be more responsive to the needs of your coworkers, but it may not be appropriate to step over certain formal boundaries. Even if there are big things happening in your private life, keep them to yourself for a while longer as you concentrate your efforts on your professional world. Don't veer off track now when you are making so much progress.

Just when you thought you could stop and catch your breath, the pace picks up again. You might become so excited about all the possibilities today that it's hard to calm your nerves. You have too much to share and it's challenging to shut it off once you've started the conversation. As important as it is to get your feelings out in the open, don't say anything you may regret down the road. A dash of self-restraint saves the day.

Others may perceive you as more lighthearted than usual. However, they could believe that you're trying to evade a sensitive issue -- and maybe you are -- but you are doing it for a good reason. Chances are that you're not in denial; you are just waiting for the best time to broach the subject. Trust your instincts to know when the moment is right. In the meantime, you might as well spread some cheer along the way.

Your optimism might get the best of you today, for others won't take you very seriously if you gloss over an important issue. It's not that your positive thinking is problematic; it's usually quite motivational. However, you could miss a crucial piece of information now that creates trouble and exposes sloppy thinking. Don't make matters worse by pretending that you have all the answers. Be courageous and take responsibility for your actions.

Separating fact from fiction is easier now that your fantasies have retreated to the back burner. Your perceptual filters are working overtime to discern the truth today. If you have to let go of an unrealistic dream, be thankful that you finally know what's happening. An analytical approach can prevent unnecessary disappointment. More importantly, having your finger on the pulse of reality places success within reach.

Knowing exactly what you want is crucial now that circumstances in your life are shifting. You are being freed from responsibilities that previously held you back. Obligations may not vanish completely, but you could have an easier time keeping up for the next few days. Don't make any significant decisions until you have a better sense of where the changes are taking you. Sit down and reassess your priorities to add more clarity to the picture.

You can say all the right words today, but you may be disconnected from your true emotions. Uncharacteristically, your heart isn't leading the way now; your head is temporarily in charge. But don't be misled into believing you have to make a choice; it isn't about one versus the other. Your current journey is all about creating a workable balance between your personal aspirations and your career ambitions.

Your irrepressible frustration may create additional problems today. However, you could discover that the obstacles you're facing aren't about your external world. Instead, an old fear or a memory that suddenly resurfaces dampens your confidence. But don't try too hard to resolve the issue immediately; even if you're able to let go of the past, it will still take a couple of days to figure out what to do in the present.

Your thoughts might wander around your imagination as your fantasies grow out of control. Even if you attempt to communicate a simple idea, it becomes apparent that the actual process is not as straightforward as you wish. Don't worry; just ride the mental waves as if you were an eagle and then tell the stories about your journey when you return.

You are eager to explain your new plan today, but the reflective Cancer Moon offers you enough wisdom to rethink a recent idea before taking it to the next level. Don't worry if you get lost within your own mental maze now because your perceptions may be a bit fuzzy. Fortunately, your dreams are closer than they appear. Ironically, you can reach your destination faster if you slow down and take your time enjoying the scenery.

You may be considering taking a personal holiday sometime very soon but still might want to do something by yourself today. However, even if you choose to retreat socially, you won't likely become reclusive. You're too enamored with others now to fully appreciate your solitude. Even if you're unclear about how much activity to schedule into your life, be certain to leave room for the ones you love the most.

It's time to catch up on old business while you have the chance today. Whether you work on a project at home or take care of miscellaneous errands, you can get a lot accomplished if you concentrate on the tasks at hand. However, it's not necessary to make a big deal about what you're doing now; sometimes working behind the curtain is more effective than performing under the spotlight. Don't try to please others with grand gestures; just set your priorities and get busy.

You might have to forget about gaining clarity now that mischievous Mercury is playing its trickster role. Emotions place a layer of subjectivity over your logical thinking, making critical analysis out of the question. Let your intuition guide you today, even if you don't have all the facts yet. Contrary to what you might believe, there's no need to struggle in your quest for the truth.

Your message isn't as important today as you might think. It's the ideas you don't share that determine the course of the day as domestic interactions are complicated by unspoken feelings. Ultimately, it's much easier if everyone is emotionally transparent because having secrets only adds to the tension now. Keep your chin up even if you believe that there is no immediate solution to your current dilemma; your satisfaction is likely being delayed and not denied.

You could be stewing in your own emotional juices today, without any obvious way to communicate what you're feeling. Thankfully, you're not isolated from others; it's just that language doesn't seem able to convey the necessary nuances of your inner experience. Try playing a song or reading a poem to express what's in your heart, rather than attempting to explain yourself in awkward detail. Give your inner poet an opportunity to speak and clear the air of any lingering tension.

You might like to escape from the hectic pace of today's activities. Luckily, there's a bit of magic in the air that enables you to cast a spell, suspending belief just long enough to slip into a parallel universe for a quick visit. If you keep up external appearances, no one will miss you while your mind is traveling to faraway places. Don't lose your connection to the real world; luckily, you can be in two places at once.

You're not amused today if your tight grip on reality seems to loosen. Nevertheless, it may be nearly impossible to maintain control in the outer world while letting go on the mental plane. Although this process might not be fun for you now, it's valuable to learn that you can't always run the show. Fortunately, your fears begin to subside when others assume more responsibilities and you can relax.

You may feel disoriented today from your deepening emotions, but there isn't much you can do to avoid them. Rather than tumbling down the rabbit hole without a plan, harness your passions by engaging them, instead of denying them. Thankfully, you have sufficient brainpower to do almost whatever you choose. Just don't forget to listen to your heart.

Your creativity is on the upswing today, but there are a few roadblocks along the way if you want to make something tangible. Your imagination is activated by Mercury's presence in your 12th House of Fantasy, but it's still difficult to mix your artistic nature with the logical approach that's required to get your ideas across. Relying on rational thinking could be a sensible strategy for another time, but now it's healthier to forget about productivity and just give yourself permission to dream.

Although you fiery Rams aren't normally that interested in remembering about the past, today's Cancer Full Moon in your 4th House of Roots raises long forgotten memories from your childhood. You might want to cut a new path through your tangled emotional jungle so you can gain resolution on a personal dilemma. But don't move too fast; you still could have some important unfinished business to handle before you're allowed to proceed.

Your daily routine might be packed with activity now that the Cancer Full Moon is flooding your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. If possible, slip away from work for a short escape. Even if you are busy, you could still disappear for a while by relaxing or going out for a break. Keep in mind that how long you're gone is not as important as the quality of your downtime. Shut out the rest of the world so you can hear what's in your heart.

The protective Cancer Full Moon lights up your 2nd House of Net Worth, encouraging you to feel possessive about what you own. However, you must also consider others when making decisions about your resources now, especially if you are in a partnership. Don't force resolution on any money-related issues today; instead, let the discussion run its own course, even if it takes longer to find common ground than you expect.

You might be surprised by the intensity of your feelings today as the Cancer Full Moon activates your 1st House of Self. Emotions pull at every thought from their subconscious vantage points, challenging you to maintain objectivity. But don't ignore your personal desires; the wisest thing you can do is to practice balancing your own needs with the demands of others. Avoiding the temptation to retreat isn't enough; open your heart wide enough to let someone in.

You would like to continue with your regular daily routine, including eating what's best for you. But unconscious desires can lure you away from your healthier resolutions as the Cancer Full Moon emphasizes your 12th House of Dreams. There's no need to judge yourself so harshly if you slip off track today. Just continue diligently working toward your goals and you will notice progress soon enough.

The nurturing Cancer Full Moon shines in your 11th House of Social Networks, bringing helpful emotional support from your surroundings. However, you're not being offered a free lunch because someone may resist the very same changes you want to make. Although problems can originate with anyone who could be threatened by your potential success, seek ways to work with the negativity rather than denying it. An air of cooperation invites lasting resolution.

Taking care of others is your top priority now that the nurturing Cancer Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Public Responsibility.
