Your motives may be questioned if you don't deliver what's expected of you today. Luckily, you might be able to pull off an amazing turnaround at the very last minute if you truly believe you can. Keep calm and have faith in yourself; trust is your key to success.

You are intuitively capable of finding the best solution to a complex problem today while the sensitive Cancer Full Moon emphasizes your 9th House of Big Ideas. Although you might tell others that your idea isn't really that important, the truth is that you're the one who can uncover the brilliant answer -- like finding a needle that was lost in the haystack. You have a real shot at getting what you want if you continue to hold onto a clear vision of the future.

You may feel as if you can't gain total control over your own priorities as today's Cancer Full Moon highlights your 8th House of Shared Resources. Including others in your process is a real challenge now. However, your potential loss of power might just teach you an important lesson about your limitations. Accept your current situation by honoring what you cannot change. Relaxing your drive allows the previously resistant walls to give way and reveal your path ahead.

There could be an urgent conversation about your feelings that needs to happen today. Or maybe your spouse or friend feels guilty about a recent activity. Today's cautious Cancer Full Moon floods your 7th House of Partners, possibly uncovering a stressful undercurrent in a significant relationship. Your smartest tactic now is to ease your own anxiety so you can focus on what works instead of what doesn't. Communication is a two-way street, so start talking if you want to see results.

Stop pushing your projects and ideas forward; instead, retreat to build defenses that will enable you to hold your ground. Thankfully, you could receive an extra boost of confidence if someone comes to your aid. However, it's crucial not to take on too much work that the tentative Cancer Full Moon occupies your 6th House of Efficiency, reminding you to conserve your energy. For now, do only what is necessary and take some time to unwind.

Your friends may be surprisingly judgmental, misinterpreting your true intentions and  dampening your spontaneous spirit. Thankfully, the kindhearted Cancer Full Moon falls in your 5th House of Romance and Creativity, encouraging you to have fun while expressing your inner child. Don't skip over any miscommunications, no matter what anyone says. If you run into an emotional trouble, take a few minutes and clear things up before moving on to your next playful adventure.

You know exactly what you want today, but it might feel unobtainable if you're afraid that love is slipping through your fingers. Perhaps you created circumstances that set you up for failure. Or maybe you just want more than you can get. Either way, don't let your current situation hook you emotionally. Practicing a little detachment now allows the tension to resolve quickly, motivating you to get busy with a new source of inspiration.

You may first try to resolve the energetic imbalance by acting as pleasantly as you can instead of expressing annoyance with someone you love. Unfortunately, feisty Mars upsets your key planet Venus by urging you to make unreasonable demands today. But hiding your desires might make matters worse. Thankfully, discussing difficult relationship issues in a gentle and caring way can lead to better communication in the days ahead.

You might not realize how expressive you are today, but you could very well drive everyone nuts with your endless chatter. You may think that what you have to say is quite important. Even if it is, keep in mind that stating it once will probably be sufficient for others to get your message. A calm approach helps to avoid conflict and confusion right from the start.

Although relationship dynamics may feel out of balance today, a breakthrough is entirely possible. However, a sudden resolution of tension is more likely if you are less emotionally attached to what happens. But going quiet only drives the negativity deeper. Share your feelings, but don't try to steer a conversation in a specific direction. The less you have at stake now, the more you stand to gain.

Unspoken obligations prevent you from doing what you wish today, but your guilt may drive your inaction more than any real responsibilities. No matter what you do now, you might not feel completely fulfilled. Working harder isn't the answer, but neither is escape. Do what is required, but don't take on additional tasks for the wrong reasons. Ultimately, satisfaction will be yours as long as you direct your energy toward obtaining tangible results.

You may be torn between managing the most practical aspects of your life and exploring all the creative possibilities. You want to stimulate your curiosity and fill your workday with new ideas and pleasurable distractions. However, it's wiser to stay on course and honor your commitments today. Keep your focus; the best opportunity might be exactly the job you are supposed to be doing right now.

Relationships are the source of excitement now, yet they might not bring you the sweet pleasures you seek. Your key planet Venus is retrograde in practical Capricorn, inspiring you to seek safe and secure love. But you may have to fight for what you want as romantic Venus squares combative Mars. A less personal and more philosophical approach on your part can lessen the pressure and put others more at ease.

You could restrain your emotional expression today in order to avoid an unpleasant interaction as your traditional key planet Mars is squared by vulnerable Venus. Unfortunately, your words can betray you, revealing more than you intend. No matter what occurs, let the conversation flow without making a scene; however, be willing to walk away from it quickly if you feel too uncomfortable. Living life with a lighter touch now makes all the difference in the world.

Creativity and romance are dominating your imagination now, and maybe you just want to embark on an exotic adventure to stir up some adrenaline. Unfortunately, your desires may not be fulfilled today. Even if you are enjoying yourself, you might still crave more pleasure. If possible, turn your disenchantment into communication; writing down your thoughts or sharing them with a friend can transform this day into a memorable one. Acknowledging your blessings is a good place to start.

Someone close to you may be withholding his or her true feelings now. As much as you would like to confront the situation directly, you can't seem to find an easy way to get to the point. Paradoxically, letting go of your attachment to know the truth can be just the right catalyst to start the process of resolution.

As much as you may want to tell everyone what you know, today is a great day to remain quiet and just get your job done as best you can. Even if you feel somewhat lonely now, accepting your isolation could unexpectedly open the doors to greater self-awareness. Listen carefully to your own inner voice; it will give you the best possible advice at this time.

You feel like you need to keep something secret today, but events push you toward disclosure no matter how hard you resist. Still, you might choose to withhold a vital piece of information as if this will increase your power. Unfortunately, deceitful behavior only makes matters worse. It's better to get everything out into the open and then just let the events unfold however they must. The welcome sense of relief is well worth the temporary discomfort.

Although you still have a bit of work to finish, the playful Leo Moon's visit to your 5th House of Romance and Creativity has you looking forward to an exciting weekend before it even starts. Even if your desires are already pulling you toward your next adventure, don't ignore your current responsibilities. Put all your attention on what must be done now so you are free to squeeze the most pleasure out of the days ahead.

Personal obligations may follow you into the office today. Usually, compartmentalizing your family issues is not a problem, but now their presence could make you less effective on the job. Luckily, there could be a brilliant solution waiting for you to find it. Remain open to new ways of approaching your responsibilities and you just might be able to get everything done. Thinking outside of the box could bring the breakthrough you were searching for all along.

Someone may disrupt your day in a way that is completely unexpected. He or she could bring you information today that transforms your outlook on your future plans. It isn't necessarily bad news; it's just that you might have to alter your direction. Fortunately, your desire for change is your greatest strength now because the shift will play out in your favor as long as you don't resist what's ahead. Your mental agility serves you well.

Financial responsibilities might come into play today as you concentrate on the details of your personal accounts. If you deal with money on the job, it may be challenging to stay focused on your work. Although your mind is full of unconventional ways to approach the tasks at hand, it's probably wiser to stick to the tried and true methods for now. Save your experimentation for another day. A penny saved is a penny earned.

Your feelings are transparent now that the evocative Moon is back in your sign for a couple of days. However, the problem is that your moods may shift quickly today, giving others very little time to react before you're on to a completely different emotion. Don't try to withhold your thoughts; express them when given the chance. But remember that big changes are in the air, so don't make long-term plans based on your fluctuating point of view. It's not advantageous to follow every whim.

There's probably plenty of drama going on behind the scenes today, and you may be unsure about how much to share with others. However, something might slip out into the open, whether or not you are ready to deal with the consequences. Keep in mind that whatever topic is discussed now will continue to develop and change over the next couple of weeks. Maintaining a healthy sense of detachment gives everyone the necessary room to grow.

You might have to set your personal needs aside today in order to help a friend out of a difficult situation. Although shuffling of priorities stirs up issues, you don't need to dwell on them in the present moment. You are ready to offer any assistance you can. Nevertheless, don't minimize your own desires, for the more you suppress now, the more anger or resentment you might feel later on. You don't have to play the role of a martyr to be a good friend.

Being responsible comes naturally to you, but suppressing your feelings adds an emotional cost. You must find ways to release your anger through socially accepted modes of expression. Putting more effort toward your career or long-term goals may be one way of easing your frustration before it grows unmanageable. However, be careful that you don't over-react to a stressful situation today. Take the high road; what you do now will pay off over the months ahead.

You are very close to making an exciting breakthrough in your self-expression, but circumstances might hold you back just a little while longer. Don't let your anticipation run amok because specific tasks must be completed now if you are to realize your dreams. There isn't much time left -- or so it seems. Finish your work as soon as you can to make room for the future.

You might have to face a rather serious issue today that you previously set aside. Maybe you assumed that you could get through this period without having to handle all your responsibilities -- even though this isn't your normal mode of operation. Slow down and take a long hard look at the obstacles in your current path. They aren't going away until you learn the lessons they have to teach you. Be bold and accept the challenge in front of you.

A friend or associate could present a real problem today. Although you can't easily avoid the situation, there doesn't appear to be a straightforward resolution, either. Perhaps the other party is being more obstinate than you expected, and all attempts at negotiation seem to be for naught. Nevertheless, don't dig in your heels; there's always a chance for a sudden shift in the interpersonal dynamics. Although you can't control someone else's response, your unwavering optimism can save the day.

Your work duties may be a bit overwhelming, but you must perform to a higher level of standards today. There's no way to avoid being judged for what you do now, and it's critical that you show your absolute best. But don't fall into the trap of believing that you must do everything all at once. Focus on completing specific tasks one at a time, and you will impress others with both your ambition and your follow-through.

You are feeling more confident now about who you are and how you are living your life. It's as if someone switched on the lights and you're awakening from a deep sleep. But there's no need to overreact. If you work yourself up into a flurry of activity too fast, you might have to pull back later so that you don't go over the edge. Reassess your strategy and set a pace you can sustain for the long haul.

You may be in touch with an inner conflict today between two facets of your own personality, without a clear direction as to which way to move. However, the more you hold on to the status quo, the more challenging it will be to find resolution. You might waste precious energy trying to find a way out of your current dilemma, but the best answers result from being as open as possible to the changes ahead. Free your mind and the rest will follow.

You can dance circles around everyone today, since you feel like you are at the top of your game. Others may think you're particularly charming and witty now, but it's important that you don't overplay your hand. If you appear too full of yourself, your plans could all backfire pretty quickly. Enjoy the day, but don't push your luck. A touch of self-restraint goes a long way.

Open your heart to someone that you care about today, even if it makes you a bit uncomfortable at first. Although you can be oversensitive, try not to get caught up in worrying about the response to your emotional disclosure. What others think is less important now than what you feel; ultimately, you will be better off whether or not your current vulnerability is received with enthusiasm. Love is best offered without any expectations.

It's time to reevaluate your own feelings and see how you can show others what you need without being too overbearing. However, you might be treading on dangerous ground. If you approach the current situation from a strictly selfish point of view, you may not be fully present when someone responds to you -- even if they're ready to give you exactly want you want. Active listening is just as important as self-expression.

What someone doesn't say now grabs your attention, as if the unspoken words have more power because they are kept secret. However, these hidden dynamics could result in a simple misunderstanding if you make a false assumption. Listen carefully and don't try to rationalize your way out of an awkward situation. Succinctly state what's important, including how you feel about the current circumstances, and then move on.

Someone may come to your rescue now, whether you're being offered an attractive escape or a more meaningful chance to share what's on your mind. However, if there's no one knocking on your door, get on the phone and make something special happen. This could be a fun day, but it may not amount to much unless you are willing to actively co-create the magic. Let your inner child out to play and see where your heart leads.

You may try to present yourself in a more official way than usual with the Moon in your 10th House of Public Status. This air of authority is probably a good idea, for your role in the community might have to come first at this time. However, you could end up revealing more of yourself than you intend, whether in personal relationships or with your colleagues. Even though you shouldn't leave your emotions completely out of the picture, don't express every feeling. Keeping your private life separate now works in your favor.

You might be feeling excited about upcoming opportunities, but it's crucial not to bury important information just so you can enjoy yourself today. It's not that you necessarily lean toward denial; it's just that things may not be quite as clear as you wish. If you find yourself drifting off too far into fantasyland, bring yourself back to earth where any practical decisions you make are more effective in the long run.

You could be working extremely hard these days, for you believe that you need to make a significant commitment to your career now -- especially if you are to meet your long-term objectives. But this fear of failure may only be the surface of a deeper issue. Your critical judgments about yourself might actually stem from your unacknowledged discomfort with actually reaching your goals. It takes true courage to let your light fully shine.

Tensions in partnerships may take center stage, whether or not you see them coming. Even if your day is unfolding as planned, you still could encounter a difficult interaction as you feel uncertain about your role in a relationship. It's tempting to hit the escape button now. However, striving for clarity helps clear away the clouds of confusion. Asking the right questions and keeping an open mind leads to success.

You may be required to do something for another person now without receiving the recognition you deserve -- and this could bring up familiar issues. It isn't that you are unwilling to help someone who needs it, and it's not that you are trying to avoid your responsibilities. It's just that you're weary of being taken for granted. If this is an ongoing problem, it might be time to let those around you know your true feelings.

Your mind may be wandering around the cosmos today when it's supposed to be attending to more practical matters. But your mundane affairs don't have the same attraction as imagining the infinite possibilities in front of you. Nevertheless, drifting into Fantasyland is not a luxury you can afford these days. Put your feet back on the ground and save the dream surfing for some other time. A pragmatic approach to whatever you should be doing now is more productive in the long run.

Setting your responsibilities aside for one more day won't likely create any problems. In fact, declaring this to be a day of relaxation might be the smartest thing you can do, assuming that you have earned the time off through your recent hard work. Remember, you won't be able to escape prior obligations, but you could derive great benefit from recharging your batteries now when you really need it the most.

You might want to chill out at home today, but there may be too many unfinished chores that are demanding your attention. Confusion sets in if you allow yourself to become overwhelmed by the details. It's challenging to know which way to turn first, especially if you lose sight of the big picture. Step back from the noise long enough to gain a fresh perspective. Set new priorities before jumping back in for another round.

A long-standing relationship issue may be back on your plate today. Oddly, there might be no specific reason that you can discern as to why you're recycling the same old problem once again. Nevertheless, it's here and you intend to handle it once and for all. Whatever you decide to do about your feelings, be sure to come from a place of love rather than fear. You can't go wrong now if you let your heart rule your head.

You may feel a bit lost today concerning a financial decision. If you're trying to decide whether or not to make a significant purchase, it's best to reconsider your options for a few more days. Your analytical powers could be a bit out of whack now, even if you believe you're thinking clearly. The good news is there's no need to rush the process.

You may be overconfident of your ability to create a logistically sound plan, but mischievous Mercury could have the last laugh unless you remember to take your conclusions with a grain of salt. You often take pride in your analytical skills, but Jupiter, the cosmic magnifying lens, just might out-trick Mercury the trickster himself today. Ultimately, it's more important to be realistic now than it is to be optimistic. A little self-restraint can prevent a lot of disillusionment down the road.

It's easy to become so intrigued with your dreams today that you lose sight of what makes the most sense. Fortunately, you might be able to put off some of your real world responsibilities while you explore the distant edges of your imagination. Just don't confuse your fantasies with the truth. Giving yourself permission to go on a mental holiday can deepen the spiritual dimension of the day in a way that brings lasting value to your life.

Sticking to your predetermined schedule today is a good idea because impulsive decisions could distract you from your most effective course of action. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to think about all the alternatives ahead of you even while adhering to your current agenda. There's no urgency to alter your direction right away; wait and see where this path leads before changing horses midstream.

Your current dilemma stems from a conflict between the very big and the very small. On one hand, opinionated Jupiter intensifies your need to find more meaning in your life. On the other hand, logical Mercury tells you to stick with the facts. You may not know whether to expand your thinking to get a clear view of the big picture or to narrow your vision to focus on the details. In either case, something is gained and something is lost. Nevertheless, following the middle path of moderation is the key is the quickest route to success.

It's more comfortable for you to use the day to plan your next adventure rather than to actually do anything out of the ordinary. Gathering more data today is one way to satisfy your penchant for verifiable information to support your choices. However, you could reach a point where you can no longer integrate what you're learning. Sometimes it's wiser to set aside the facts and simply go with what's in your heart.

You're eager to start something new, but reality still requires you to complete your previous projects before moving on to what's next. You might believe you can say yes to someone's grand idea today while still finding time for your agenda, too. However, you're unable to judge time and resources wisely now because you assume there will be an endless supply of both when you need them. It's wiser to err on the conservative side than it is to run out of gas prior to reaching your destination.

Your emotional flexibility is being tested today as you're asked to review your life from a spiritual point of view. But it may be challenging to let go of your self-image or to relinquish control in such a vulnerable manner. Thankfully, the rewards are great if you can expand your concept of love. Be specific when you ask for what you want, but remain open to growing in ways that you can't imagine just yet.

You are growing more aware of your surroundings these days as you focus your attention on the people around you. You want to spend more time with your friends now, but you can't just walk away from your work. Be very careful about what actually makes it on to your calendar so you don't end up feeling overloaded. Oddly enough, you'll be more productive in the long run if you can fit some social activities into your day.

Although you're reaching further ahead now, your futuristic lean doesn't mean that you are any less practical. In fact, remaining true to your fundamental sensibilities is part of your strategic process. Ironically, you can have your cake and eat it, too. In other words, look forward to the exciting possibilities, but fix whatever is broken in the present moment. Your can-do attitude and unwavering determination are a winning combination.

You might not know what to do with the messages the universe is sending you now, but you sense that something significant is on your radar. You go back and forth emotionally, first feeling open and chatty, believing everyone is your friend. However, only a few moments later you may pull back, realizing that you should be more careful about what you say and who you trust. Taking a wait-and-see approach is your smartest strategy and gives you the best of both worlds.

This is an odd time of year for you because you really just want to dig yourself deep into your cave and hibernate. But a glint of awareness sparks your soul and sets your thoughts on the upcoming spring -- even if it is, in fact, still a long way off. Don't be overly concerned if you're hiding safely behind your protective shell; just use this time wisely to recharge your batteries and to work out the details of your next adventure.

You have faced some big issues recently and you should feel proud of your progress. Although the stress isn't quite over, the energy is beginning to settle down today. But you're not off the hook just yet because relationship dynamics intensify over the next few weeks. This extra spark of electricity applies to all your interactions, not just romantic encounters; just be aware that your passions are running very strong now. Think twice before turning your initial attractions into action. You will make wiser choices if you're not in such a hurry.

It's as if you have received temporary permission from the universe to be even quirkier than usual -- not that anyone necessarily knows about all your eccentricities. Your imagination is overflowing now and you may finally feel free to demonstrate what's in your heart to an appreciative audience. Even if you choose not to share your feelings, they will be obvious anyway, so there really isn't any point in hiding them. Sometimes taking a risk is the best way to get closer to someone you love.

You are entering a productive time of year as the Sun moves through unconventional Aquarius, a fellow air sign. This solar movement inspires your creativity, encourages spontaneous behavior and lightens your attitude. There's no need to rush anything. Keep in mind that it might take a few more days to fully shift into this expressive phase. In the meantime, establish a healthy balance between work and play so you can carve out more time for pleasurable pursuits.

You might begin the day feeling on edge, as if there aren't any solutions for the problems that are bothering you. However, tides do change, and by midday the earlier dilemmas have settled down enough for you to manage them effectively. Keep in mind that things are even more complicated because your inner feelings don't seem to match what you are showing to others. Nevertheless, it's also your time to grow in ways you never expected as long as you keep your heart open.

Your life might mellow out a little and, luckily, just in the nick of time. You've been riding some pretty big emotional waves lately and although most of it was pleasant, it is still exhausting. Now, however, you are entering a time of accentuated communication that shifts the energy into the mental realms. You could be networking more than usual because of your work or your role in the community. Even if you are busy, don't lose sight of your own personal goals.

It might seem as if the spotlight is no longer shining on your corner of the world, and that's just fine with you. Finally, you can get back to the real work at hand, instead of being required to play to the audience on command. Establish a productive work pace early on so you can take care of business right away. It won't take long to feel good about your accomplishments once you're back in your comfort zone.

The Sun is now making its annual trek through your sign, signaling the beginning of your astrological birthday month. Regardless of when your special day is, use these next four weeks to dream wildly about your year ahead. Light candles, visualize your future, and then blow the candles out and make a wish. You can do this simple ritual as often as you please. You may be happily surprised by the magic you manifest.

It's time to tie up the loose ends of your life -- and you may have more frayed edges now than others realize. In fact, you might secretly thrive on the uncertainty of boundaries. However, the opportunity for positive change is on its way, and you can fully embrace it if you are not held back by all the little things that you meant to do, but haven't yet completed. Don't wait for a better time; get busy and make room for your future today.

You are quite eager to go along with your friends today because you can imagine the potential for new experiences wherever you look. Luckily, it's natural to set aside your own agenda while doing what makes the most sense for everyone involved. But you must take time and figure out how to meet your needs, too. Unfortunately, trusting someone with your fate grows more difficult each hour that you hesitate. Find the magical balance between waiting for the right moment and missing your chance.

Establishing a brand new schedule for your diet and exercise routine might be tricky, especially if you're secretly comfortable with your current state of affairs. Although you may be more certain about what you want, you still could find it hard to motivate yourself to change. Gathering more data is not necessary, for you probably have already done enough research. Anything healthy you do now can lead to an improvement in your physical well-being, so the sooner you take action, the better.

You might think that everything is rolling your way today; unfortunately, the logistics become more complicated as time goes on. Even if it seems as if there's a lot of potential enjoyment just around the next corner, you can't think about playtime until you've handled your responsibilities. Fortunately, once you're finished with all your obligations, you're game for just about anything. Work extra hard so you have time to pursue something more pleasurable later on.

It's a good thing if you're feeling flexible today because you might have to change your plans more than once. Domestic tension may be heating up and you could be required to step in and mediate a family disagreement. However, the current problem isn't about someone being right and someone else being wrong. Concentrate your attention on helping everyone involved reach common ground, even if their perspectives still differ on a fundamental issue.

You're able to deftly navigate your way through a complex interaction with conflicting groups of people today. Although everyone is stubbornly holding on to a different set of interests, your intervention may be sufficient to energetically shift the entire dynamic. On another day, you might have just given up and let it all play out on its own. Fortunately, you can maintain control now while still appearing as if you don't have your hands on the steering wheel.

Instead of doubting your recent decision any longer, accept your previous judgment as being logically sound. It's already well past the time to consider whether or not to proceed. You have moved beyond the point of no return, even if you're still experiencing uncertainty. There's no need to question your choices again; consciously shift your awareness now from the subjective inner realms toward taking the next steps on your journey.

Don't waste time worrying about making a final choice today; instead use your current ambiguity to express yourself in a creative manner. Sometimes it's critical to demonstrate your leadership style by behaving with clear authority, but now you are appreciated even more when you're honest about your crisis of confidence. Be open and take whatever time is necessary to share your concerns rather than just leaving everyone in the dark.

You are often tempted to sink into the recesses of your own subconscious mind. On occasion these inner journeys might be overwhelming and could even pull you into deep emotional turmoil. However, today you can dance around the edges of the shadows with ease as the Moon travels through your 12th House of Imagination. Let your feelings go and follow your dreams.

You may unexpectedly find yourself in an intense power struggle when dealing with friends today. However, your relationships can be positively impacted by the social Libra Moon's visit to your 11th House of Groups, where it alleviates some of the pressure you are experiencing. It doesn't matter in the long run how you feel right now; just keep meeting your professional commitments with integrity and don't worry about coming out on top. You currently have a better chance of succeeding if you remember not to take things so personally.

Leading by example may be especially challenging today as long as you continue to change your mind from minute to minute. It's difficult to trust your decisions now, even if you have the intuitive data that you want to justify your choices. But don't get hung up looking for a final answer to any one particular question. Just respond in the moment to the best of your current ability and be ready to move on.

You appear quite intense now that the willful Sun is traveling along in your sign. Luckily, today the Sun is receiving support from the Moon in fellow air sign, Libra. However, you could also feel dreamier than usual, as if your wishes have a life of their own. Be bold and take action as needed; just remember that karmic Saturn will judge you harshly if you believe that escape through fantasy is a viable option.

You have a bit of magic up your sleeve, and luckily it is there today when you need it most. Even if you are required to deal with powerful people who might be investing in your success, there's no reason to be intimidated. Just stay fully present with your truth because maintaining your integrity sets the stage for successfully managing issues that will demand resolution in the near future.

You feel so tightly wound today that it's a smart idea to find ways to blow off some excess energy. You might believe that you can remain cool in a simple interaction with a friend but if previously defined roles break down, engaging in a heated discussion is inevitable now. Unfortunately, losing your temper won't make anyone happy. To avoid an unnecessary battle, consciously back down without trying to justify your position. Take the high road and give peace a chance.

You know that you have a job to do now, but you might not be able to figure out exactly what it is. Even if you lose focus on the logistics, don't worry about regaining it yet. Instead of attempting to make sense of your dreams, give them time to reveal their purpose so their meaning will become more obvious. It doesn't matter if your newly discovered aspirations are practical or not. Just let them grow and develop a life of their own.

You might allow a philosophy or a belief override your common sense now without even knowing it. This obsession can be a major source of trouble with those around you. Most often your ideas are useful, but today they tend to alienate you, reinforcing your differences and not your similarities. Thankfully, your good intentions and quick wit can save the day and lift others out of their doldrums. Hopefully, this energy positively reflects back on you, giving you an instant boost of confidence.

You may assume you can change an old habit instantly today, especially if you spend time visualizing the desired outcome in your mind's eye. Unfortunately, you might become overly possessive, attempting to hold onto your past if someone appears to be taking something away from you. Paradoxically, your resistance could create the opposite effect of what you want. Instead of struggling, give yourself permission to enjoy the present moment, no matter how the situation unfolds.

You can't understand the motives of others very clearly because you are looking at the world through rose-colored glasses today. Your eagerness to defend yourself or someone you love is admirable, but your current intensity can complicate things even more. Don't be so quick to fight for your beliefs now. Wait a few days to see if your position changes before escalating a mere difference of opinion into an open conflict. Expressing yourself creatively is a much better use of your time now, anyway.

Crossing items off your to-do-list is a piece of cake today with the Sun and Mercury both visiting your 6th House of Details. However, it's nearly impossible to know why you are traveling along your current path, even if your intentions are clear. But this isn't the time to question your choices or doubt your skills. Simple action is all that's required now to make tangible progress toward your goals. A brilliant breakthrough is closer than you think.

Connecting with the sources of inspiration in your life requires your undivided attention today. Fortunately, the Moon's current visit to your sign continues to remind you that the matrix of support flows through family and those you love. However, if you're overly idealistic about relationships now, you might experience disappointment. Remember, maintaining your integrity is ultimately more important than anything else.

You're living under a magical spell now that could date all the way back to your childhood days. Unfortunately, it's difficult to tell which memories are based upon truth and which ones are fabricated in the depths of your subconscious mind. It can be helpful to be a detective when it comes to your heart because once you get to the bottom of the situation, your feelings are a lot easier to sort out. Today's self-exploration might just lead to tomorrow's treasure.

Slowing down and establishing a sustainable pace today enables you to accomplish a lot more than you expect. In fact, it's imperative to have your thoughts in order prior to beginning a new project. Take time to think your strategy all the way through to completion before you initiate any action. You can save yourself from a future headache by doing your homework first. Creating a winning plan on paper is a great place to start.

You want additional clarity before making an important financial decision today, and thankfully your current window of opportunity will remain open for a few more days. It's challenging to respond to a professional dilemma now because a temporary loss of self-confidence can muddle your thinking. There's no need to stress; your optimism will surely return soon. In the meantime, don't make any sudden moves until you take the time to reevaluate your priorities.

You may feel a strong rebellious streak within and wonder if you'll be able to keep your emotions in check today. You don't want to lose your cool or do anything you might regret but your impulsive desires continue to intensify throughout the day. Meanwhile, the even-keeled Libra Moon enables you to pull off an amazing balancing act. Nevertheless, doing a bit of physical labor or engaging in a high-intensity workout now could be enough to calm your restless spirit.

It's easy to get in touch with the magic of your imagination now that the radiant Sun and clever Mercury are traveling through your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. Luckily, you also receive an energetic boost from go-getter Mars, operating behind the scenes from your 8th House of Intimacy. It doesn't matter that other people may not even know that something special is brewing within your mind. Go ahead and let your fantasies run wild; your creativity will break through the surface soon enough.

You might be thinking about the significance of a relationship today and trying to get a handle on how previous choices brought you to where you are now. This is a good day for deep contemplation, since you can see a variety of paths ahead, yet you may not be emotionally tied to any one of them. But executing a new plan will be tougher than making it, so don't try to accomplish too much too quickly. Give your current ideas enough time to develop before leaping into action.

You may have a long list of specific tasks you want to complete today, but your attention keeps shifting to personal matters. Relationship issues are more pressing now, although you still might try to steer clear of a drama that's intensifying around you. Instead of being irritated by emotions that don't fit into your preconceived agenda, recognize that interactions with others make your life richer and more meaningful. Opening your heart strengthens the bonds with those you love.

Although you might not be interested in establishing a deeper connection with a friend now, you have no reason to avoid closer contact either. You may feel rather neutral at first, but a complex array of attractions can draw you into unfamiliar ground if you allow circumstances to unfold on their own. As long as you know what you want from a potential partner, this is a smart time to move through old relationship fears and explore the uncharted possibilities.

You can make the best of a difficult situation today by setting aside your long-term plans and simply focusing on the present circumstances. Your clarity of perception is refreshing, but as soon as your emotions begin to run wild, everything changes and the interpersonal dynamics become trickier to manage. Observe how you unconsciously slip into thinking about the future and remember to keep bringing your thoughts back to the here and now. Cultivating a positive perspective is your best way forward.

You might feel resigned to do whatever is expected, but it can be challenging today if a family member or close friend has a very different way of looking at the situation. However, it's not just that you are agreeing to disagree about the next course of action, it's that you approach the issue from fundamentally different assumptions. Don't try to convince anyone that your position is better than the rest. Acknowledge and accept the reality of multiple points of view and get on with your day.

You could be feeling somewhat anxious today, even if everything is going along without a hitch. Your stress stems from the uncertainty you experience when you are drawn into emotional issues that pull you away from your logical view of life. However, it's not a smart time to remain cool and detached from your heart. Jump in and get your hands dirty with your messy and irrational passions without worrying about cleaning up until later on.

Get your head out of the clouds and be as practical as possible today. If you have been avoiding financial issues, take care of business now while you have the opportunity to make real progress. Don't be afraid to postpone your fun in order to tie up loose ends. Ultimately, knowing where you stand with respect to your money brings a peace of mind that's longer lasting than transient pleasures. Your fiscal stability adds to your sense of self-worth.

Even if you're making more decisions using logic instead of intuition now, the Moon's return to your sign today eases you gently back into more subjective realms. Set your analytical thinking aside for a bit and embrace a more instinctive approach that's quite familiar to you. But don't try to hold on to any one feeling for too long; allow your moods to change naturally. You can trust your inner voice once your emotions settle down.

There's no sensible reason to run around in circles trying to get things done today. If you are currently meeting resistance, listen to the message that's being given to you, instead of frustrating yourself by fighting the prevailing tides. Give yourself permission to embark on an imaginative adventure now, even if others can't come along for the ride. Remember, if the journey is to be worthwhile, it must start from within.

The energetic emphasis is shifting today, adding significance to your interactions with associates at work and friends at play. Re-prioritizing your relationships makes sense now; however, this reevaluation isn't about any one person in particular. Instead, take time to contemplate your role within your larger network. Find a place to stand that balances your personal needs with those of your social and professional groups. When it comes to your heart, choose quality over quantity for the best connections.

Circumstances at work could be running rather smoothly today, but the surface appearance might be misleading. You may be irritated that your plans are not playing out in reality as expected and you're not sure how to get things back on track. The more you think about this dilemma, the more unsolvable it seems. The deeper issues won't be fixed so easily, so let them go for now. You will be better equipped to focus on a long-term strategy in a few days. In the meantime, count your blessings and smile.

There's nothing wrong with going deep to seek new perspectives on old problems as long as you come up for air once you find what you're looking for. Sharing your inner process with someone you trust is easier now that the Moon is traveling through your 8th House of Intimacy. Just remember to move forward rather than lingering in the past. Use the previously hidden treasures you discover to spark your imagination and lead you into the future.

You may avoid the most direct path to your goals now because you enjoy the interesting diversions that others present along the way. Although it's not easy to concentrate, today you could benefit from a concerted effort to stay focused. Ultimately, exercising self-discipline is more effective than following someone else's demand that you obey the rules. Accept your responsibilities as a challenge; you can earn respect by sticking to the program and fulfilling your commitments.

A close friend might disappoint you today and you could even feel betrayed and angry at first. Nevertheless, the Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others urges you to reconsider your initial reaction. Let go of any outmoded emotional responses, for you have a chance to make important changes now that can ultimately increase your security rather than jeopardizing it. Reassessing what you want from a relationship is a good place to start.

Keep your chin up and work hard today, even if your chores aren't very satisfying. The rewards will arrive later on if you take care of the toughest jobs now. But this isn't about going against the grain or bucking the system. Even if you believe you have a smarter way to run things, you're better off to follow a traditional path and obey those with authority until you have completed your obligations. Whistle while you work and you'll be done before you know it.

Oddly enough, taking care of your responsibilities might lead to a romantic opportunity today, or, at least, an enjoyable encounter. You may feel overly cautious about overstepping social boundaries, nevertheless, don't rule out the possibility of getting more personal with an acquaintance. Just remember, pushiness won't work in your favor; a friendly gesture is enough to get your message across. Then wait to see what develops before making your next move.

You are often the most sociable one in your group, but you may do well to pass on the party invitation now that the Moon is moving through your 4th House of Emotional Security. Of course you still want to enjoy yourself, but your contemplative state of mind suggests that an evening at home alone or with your family might be more in sync with your current mood. Taking some quality time for yourself today may be enough to put you back in a more outgoing attitude by tomorrow.

Although you might offer your best ideas to someone else today, your assistance may not be too well received. It doesn't matter that your intentions are honorable; a simple comment can be taken as a serious criticism. Going out of your way to share positive words and gentle encouragement along with your suggestions gives you a better chance of being heard now. Your kindness will be appreciated more than you think.

The emphasis on your financial picture continues with the reflective Moon still traveling through your 2nd House of Personal Resources. If you are thinking about making a large purchase, consider the long-term value of your possible acquisition. If it isn't a good deal, let it go or try negotiating a price that you could more readily afford. Remember, there's a big difference between what you want and what you actually need.

It's time to focus on yourself for a while by putting sensible limits on your social activities and commitments. Exercising self-restraint makes you more effective today and could even simplify your life in ways you never imagined. You may be tempted to start something new, but it's wiser to wait a few days before forging ahead. Instead of scattering your energy now, concentrate on making practical plans to reach your personal goals.

You might need to adjust your plans today due to circumstances beyond your control. And even if you don't have to reschedule your entire day, it's still possible to lose your cool if something throws you out of rhythm. Remaining light on your feet helps you maintain your balance now, for an unexpected turn of events could be a blessing in disguise. Luckily, you may be released from an unwanted obligation and end up having more time to yourself. Stay calm and keep your sense of humor close at hand.

A group of your friends may want to include you in their fun plans, but you aren't so quick to say yes today. The secretive Scorpio Moon is approaching somber Saturn in your 11th House of Community, encouraging self-restraint when it comes to socializing in a group setting. Don't judge yourself too harshly if you're feeling reclusive. Honor your needs by graciously declining the invitation and creating an evening just for you. Indulge yourself and be gentle with your heart.

Someone's great idea might catch your attention today, but think carefully before committing your energy and lending a helping hand. It might sound like an exciting project at first, but it could turn into more of a burden than you want to take on. However, if you reject a colleague's plan, spend extra time with that person explaining your decision, so he or she doesn't feel hurt by your refusal. A bit of diplomacy can fix a problem before it even manifests.

You are on quite a philosophical roll while the Moon zips through your 9th House of Big Ideas. Step back and take a long-term picture of your life so you can get a fresh view on what's currently happening. Look for any unhealthy patterns that you missed when you were too busy to notice them. For now, the lessons you learn along the way are more important than reaching your destination.

Let your sensitivity guide your actions today because otherwise you could stir up trouble by riding roughshod over others. But you can overcome nearly anything that stands in your way now if you slow down and move along at a steady pace while being aware of resistance as it surfaces. Don't be afraid to retreat and reevaluate your strategy before trying to force your way past an insurmountable obstacle. Thankfully, there are many paths to success.

Your natural common sense tells you to think before you speak, but this inner voice might not be loud enough today. You may feel as if you are on the edge of something so big that you're tempted to blurt out your feelings. However, it's best to reconsider your message once more before saying a word. It's better to get it right the first time rather than having to start all over from scratch. Remember, it's not about being first. Do your homework to be fully prepared; accuracy is just as important as determination.

It feels as if even your best ideas can't gain traction now. Your ruling planet, cerebral Mercury, hits the wall of immovable Saturn today, possibly squelching your plans. Unfortunately, reality is trying to get an important message across to you. If you don't learn this lesson, the resistance may grow in strength until you have to deal with it at a later time. Paying careful attention to the signs enables you to gracefully handle this crisis and move on.

Your reactions could feel extreme today, yet you won't likely gain any advantage by withdrawing at the first sign of conflict. However, the real dilemma is that you may not score any points by confronting an issue directly. Don't waste your energy by engaging in a battle you cannot win. Your most sensible strategy is based upon persistence without aggression. There's no need to struggle; lead with your compassionate heart and the rest will fall into place.

You may find yourself way out in front of the pack now, and someone may attempt to slow you down to get you back into the group. It really doesn't matter how idealistic your intentions are today; gently apply your own brakes before anyone else has to do it for you. A little self-restraint and a touch of humility can preemptively save the day.

A flood of great ideas can pull you all over the map today and you may be uncertain how to turn the best of them into tangible results. Don't push so hard if you encounter resistance; deciding your specific course of action is not a viable choice now. Instead, ride the intellectual currents and wait for the energy to settle down before making long-term plans.

You may have to change your schedule against your better judgment, but a lack of flexibility on your part will only stir up even more trouble today. It's frustrating when others don't seem to understand your motives. On the other hand, your plan may not be as sound as you believe. Either way, a more objective approach could buy you the time you need in order to establish a more successful strategy.

Some of the stress you now face stems from how you reacted to recent events. If you took advantage of a smart opportunity, you might not have to deal with any problems at all now. But you could have a tougher time making progress if you made a poor decision. Thankfully, letting go of your old expectations makes life easier to manage. Take advantage of the valuable lessons to be learned and move on.

Although a complicated event demands your attention today, you could still enjoy yourself more than you expect. In fact, you might be presented with a tricky situation that you will transform into a fabulous opportunity. However, you first need to live up to your current responsibilities before you magically turn a difficult situation into a pot of gold at the end of the rainbow. Being a superhero takes hard work.

Rewards may be waiting around the next corner if you successfully manage all the details and live up to your end of the bargain. Nevertheless, the clouds could still take another day or two to dissipate before blue sky becomes visible and you can get some clarity on what's happening. Meanwhile, don't fall behind in your work. The effort you put in over the next few days makes all the difference in the world.

It's hard to keep your thoughts in line, even if you know what you should be thinking. Your lack of concentration may create problems and uncontrollable circumstances test your resolve. Although you might not have too much fun today, you'll feel a great deal of satisfaction later if you keep bringing your attention back to the work at hand and focus on the present moment the best you can. Sticking to your agenda sets you on the path to success.

If your dreams have grown out of proportion, someone unexpectedly may burst your bubble today. But, instead of quickly rejecting the feedback from others, take a chance to learn something that enables you to be more effective in reaching your goals. Of course, there is nothing wrong with a little fantasy, but now you must find an anchor to stabilize your life, and the advice you receive -- solicited or not -- can help.

You might be whistling a happy tune this morning, but stress could have you singing the blues later in the day. Stick with a rational plan now because your feelings might mislead you, tempting you to ignore the problems you must face. Don't sidestep a serious issue by taking the easy way out. The power of positive thinking is extremely useful, but only to a point. Shutting out the truth won't resolve your anxiety about the future. Follow your logic without taking things too far.

You may profess your desire for love, but you might not be ready to follow up your words with whatever's necessary to create a lasting relationship. You want to look good in your partner's eyes and you could even be successful at magically pulling a rabbit out of a hat today. But it's not wise to push your luck, or you can find yourself overextended with no direct way home. Ironically, slowing down and taking a less flashy approach is a quicker route to intimacy.

A friend could act as a catalyst in your life today as he or she reminds you that you can do almost anything that you set your mind on. However, you might be tempted to downplay a professional opportunity by rushing into something completely different to avoid disappointing someone else. Acknowledge your strengths and weaknesses and remember that there's no need to make any excuses to justify your choices. Believing in yourself is the first step to success.

You may be more adventurous today, opening doors you might otherwise walk by without even stopping. At first, your excitement is empowering and you feel radiantly alive. But don't worry if you have second thoughts about your burst of bravado. Instead of suppressing your feelings, lean boldly into the unknown. Your uncertainty could transform into a beautiful agent for change if you just give it a chance.

Easygoing play can suddenly turn serious today, but a simple mood change is not a good enough reason to pull away from someone you love. However, if you were previously too pushy, other significant issues come into view now, prompting you to shut down emotionally. Don't let your fears interfere with your plans. If you can remember to listen to your heart, there could be good news waiting at your doorstep when you return.

Your personal life has merged with your professional world, but you still may attempt to limit your energy to what's going on between you and a co-worker or friend. Your life might seem a touch out of control; everywhere you turn more information is streaming in and your senses are temporarily overwhelmed by the noise. Step back from all the commotion; reclaiming your objectivity now is a smart way to restore your vitality and reestablish harmony in your life.

You're feeling quite animated today, especially if you enjoy what you are doing. Thankfully, you don't have to fake a good time since things are actually falling into place on their own. Nevertheless, you might be asked to expend a little extra effort to kick off something new. Luckily, you should be able to deliver the goods, so don't give up if you run into a problem. Persistence is your key now and its positive impact cannot be denied.

Your window of opportunity may be closing soon, so don't waste any time today. Look into your recent past to see what you've already accomplished and make a list of everything that still needs to be done. Concentrate on finishing up as many old projects now as possible; don't wait for a better time because this might be your best shot. Take advantage of the cosmic energy while you have the planets working in your favor.

If someone asks you how you are doing today, you naturally want to tell your whole story. Although you may be the straightforward type, it's wise to remember that some things are best kept to yourself. Proceed with caution because your powers of discrimination are not very sharp now. You can't rely on your own judgment because your sense of proportion is temporarily bent out of shape. Say as little as possible until your clarity returns; it's better to be safe than sorry.

You tend to oversimplify nearly everything today, and might even underestimate the time and money necessary to finish a long-term project. Nevertheless, it's crucial to set aside your logical reasons that have prevented you from completing a job. There's no need to fuss over a deadline that will likely be missed anyway. Making up lost time is easier than it sounds. The time for procrastination is over; just roll up your sleeves and get busy.

Your horizons are widening now, allowing you to peer far into the future and giving you additional room to stretch your mind into many alternative scenarios. Nevertheless, this shift could leave you with a false sense of exhilaration. Tread carefully; it's challenging to get along without the support of your peers today. However, your own positive attitude makes the biggest difference, so remain as confident as you can while you continue to test your wings.

Your idealistic dreams about your career trajectory can be temporarily derailed today as someone directly questions your capabilities. Fortunately, you're wise enough to steer the conversation in the right direction. But you must be careful because your imagination may trick you into creating a plan so outrageous that it becomes unwieldy. Pay extra attention to the fine line that distinguishes reality from fantasy to achieve the best results.

On the surface it seems as if everything is coming up roses today, but there is more going on than is apparent. It's great that you have so much happening within the realms of your imagination now. Your dreams are motivational, as long as you continue to clearly distinguish between reality and fantasy. Others see you as competent and they believe your actions are straightforward, but you may be more uncertain than anyone realizes. Acknowledge your true feelings, but don't let them impede your progress.

Although there may be a lot to finish at work today, you are determined to deliver on your promises. Push as hard as you can early in the day, since you might grow weary earlier than you expect. Fortunately, you're capable of handling everything that's thrown at you now, even if you inadvertently get involved in more than you should. But remember to take some time off once you complete your tasks; being extra nice to yourself this evening is a just reward for a job well done.

An angel may fly to your rescue today, whether you need the assistance or not. But in any case, accepting help is wise because it can deepen the bond of friendship. Don't worry if another person's involvement slightly reduces your efficiency. Ultimately, it's not about increasing your production now; it's about improving your relationships. Learning to graciously receive is a gift in itself.

Performing your job well feels exceptionally satisfying today. You don't even need acknowledgment from others; the fruit of your labor is reward enough for you now. Nevertheless, fulfillment may be elusive if you think that you should be pursuing a different line of work. Fortunately, opportunities are lurking right in front of your nose, and if you are clever enough you could turn one of them into a new direction in your current career.

Although you could sail through the day with a smile on your face, it's more productive to channel your positive attitude into a creative endeavor. Either way, it's an uplifting time, but you might as well have something to show off when all is said and done. However, don't isolate yourself from everyone else; collaborating with others now can open doors to a colorful new world.

You can't approach your work in the same manner as you did last week because something has changed and the old methods are not as effective anymore. Thankfully, you could become inspired and invent an entirely new and original way of doing your job. Don't worry if your idea is the best one or not. For now, just trying something different may be enough to break the ice and stir the energy in a positive direction.

You might experience an exciting burst of energy today, but you have to take a risk in order to make the most of it. It's crucial to keep yourself motivated, for if you become lazy, you could miss a significant opportunity. Forget about taking the tried and true path to success now. Carpediem; if you want to accomplish anything extraordinary, you must set your comfort aside, step out of the box and do something you've never done before.

This could be a much better day than you anticipate as something especially nice comes your way. Of course, any unexpected pleasant experience would be welcome, but finding a bargain, receiving a cash windfall or making a new friend positively impacts your life. However, you must be in a receptive frame of mind now or the good news might pass you by unnoticed. Adopting a grateful attitude invites more blessings into your world.

Your life is overflowing with an array of wonderful possibilities now. However, your excitement won't automatically manifest tangible results unless you set the stage for their expression by establishing goals and working hard to achieve them. Your acts of generosity will be returned, but probably not quite as you expect. Demonstrate your strength of character by being open to change.

You woke up with a happy song in your head today, but oddly enough it's challenging to put your finger on the source of your optimism. It's as if you know something awesome is going to happen, but you don't know what it is or why you are so sure of it. Don't waste a lot of time trying to deconstruct your instincts now; instead, just act as if your hunch is correct and keep singing. Your faith may be enough to alter your future in a positive manner.

Your social calendar might light up today, since the Moon is now visiting your 11th House of Friends and Community. Although the Moon's journey doesn't actually increase your popularity, you don't have to try so hard to be included in every fun activity. You could exude more charisma than you realize now and your assertive style might even seem aggressive unless you consciously tone down your approach. Enjoy the camaraderie but be sure to share the spotlight to keep everyone happy.

Your outward behavior doesn't tell the whole story now, since your actions seem to be all about your career. Nevertheless, the winds of fate are blowing in unusual directions and they can carry you toward an unexpected destination. Fortunately, the outcome is likely to be better than you think, so don't bother to resist the shifting currents. Keep your spirits up even if you're heading into unknown territory; your thoughts are creating your tomorrow before it arrives.

Expressing your best intentions might lead you down a dead-end street today. Unfortunately, you are not free to do as you please just because you mean well. Reprioritize your responsibilities and plan your day accordingly. You can still find time to enjoy yourself, but you'll feel better about squeezing in some fun if you don't have to worry about what you should have done earlier.

Even your boss might not be able to change your mind today, no matter how much he or she tries. Unfortunately, neither cool logic nor an emotional appeal seems to work. Ultimately, the choice is yours; nevertheless, it's wiser to remain open to fresh input from someone who is an authority on the subject. Remember, you may have a great strategy in place, but there are still those who know more than you. Keep an open mind and a receptive heart.

Although you probably want to do your own thing today, you still wish you could meet other people's expectations, too. However, your natural tendency to remain uncommitted gives way to a more immediate need to be practical now. Don't waste precious energy fighting about the wrong issues. Think about the amount of effort you want to devote to a potential conflict and then do what makes the most sense in the immediate moment.

All types of relationships are emphasized today as the Moon shifts into your 7th House of Partners, reflecting the feelings of those closest to you. Instead of responding to the current situation based upon your own needs, you must also consider what others want. Unfortunately, it can be a struggle to integrate someone else's point of view into your perspective now. Nevertheless, compromise is still a smarter alternative to acting on your own.

You know exactly what must be accomplished today, even if it seems overwhelming at first. Your original plans may be quite different from what actually needs to happen, but avoiding your responsibilities isn't a smart idea. Keep in mind that you still have to meet your commitments sooner or later. You can enjoy yourself more if you get them out of the way earlier in the day. Work now, play later.

Your approach to your job isn't based only on effectiveness and efficiency today. Instead, you're also likely to consider what brings you joy. Ironically, taking yourself too seriously now can actually be counterproductive. Although you're often willing to narrow your focus and complete the tasks at hand, you might actually be more productive now if you are having fun.

Taking care of your personal needs might require a lot of your time today and could interfere with your previous commitments. Unfortunately, you may not be able to get out of fulfilling your obligations, and it isn't worth turning your current resistance into a major conflict. Instead of burying your desire to have a good time, just postpone the fun and games until you have demonstrated your willingness to be responsible.

Your hectic schedule might not leave a lot of room for idle daydreaming today. Although you prefer having unstructured time by yourself for contemplation, you're more likely to be pulled into a series of intense interactions that ultimately define your day. It may feel like you have a difficult path ahead, but there's also a lot of good that could come out of processing your emotions through constructive dialogue. The give and take of conversation sets the stage for positive transformation.

You may choose to stand up to a bully at work today because you are sure of your plan, even if it's contrary to the general consensus. Your associates might be satisfied with finding the easiest way out, but you could be quite obstinate now in your intention to value truth over convenience. Although your idealism is admirable, you can easily take it too far. There's no need to be so self-righteous that you can't see the acceptable common ground you're already standing upon.

You could get so carried away with your own ambitions now that you lose track of the most practical path and end up making a wrong turn. The Moon's current visit to your hardworking sign can turn a simple task into a major project today before you even realize what happened. Don't set goals that are so lofty they're unreachable. Maintaining a sensible approach to your job is possible if you focus on the task at hand instead of the final destination.

Sometimes your fantasies are like scenes out of a science fiction movie and seem to have little basis in reality. When others feel the pressure of circumstances building, they might collapse under the weight of responsibility. However, you Goats love to strategize how to use the current events as opportunities to improve your situation. Even if there are some minor speed bumps in the road now, this is an advantageous time to apply yourself diligently toward reaching your goals.

There is an uneven progression to your accomplishments today. You might even get yourself all worked up now, only to initiate action and then discover that you wasted precious time running off in the wrong direction. Luckily, you can be very productive if you delay your response in order to avoid making too many false starts. Take a deep breath and visualize crossing the finish line; slow and steady wins the race.

You may intuitively sense that big changes are moving slowly toward you. In the meantime, you have plenty to do to fend off more immediate opposition. The problem is that it's difficult to find the real source of the blockages you now face. Even if the resistance is a direct manifestation of your own imagination, it can still be discouraging. Don't give up until you accomplish what you set out to do. Your success depends upon your unwavering belief in yourself.

Although you wish your life was less complicated today, you might have more work to do before you can separate yourself from the noise you have created. Your path may seem clear now, but it still could take quite a bit of determination on your part to reach your destination. Be careful not to slip into denial and fall back into complacency. There are changes that need to be made, so don't give up the good fight. Your passionate persistence is your secret weapon.

No matter how much you might want to focus on your feelings, it's challenging to stop your mind from spinning around in circles today. You are thinking about so many different things and the thoughts continue to fly by, just out of your grasp. Frustration arises if you attempt to make use of your fantastic ideas, but there's no reason to be overly concerned about productivity for now. Instead, just sit back and enjoy the show.

You don't want to wait quietly on the sidelines and let something important happen without adding your two cents. In fact, you may be so sure of your convictions today that you are driven to speak your mind whether or not others want to hear your opinion. Keep in mind that you will be better off in the long run if you limit your comments to only the most critical issues. Your words will have more impact if you choose your battles wisely.

Your flexible attitude allows you to temporarily minimize an unresolved issue today. You can easily let go of emotions that were bothering you in return for a bit of spiritual refreshment and social enjoyment. However, you might not be ready to relinquish all your feelings, but at least set them aside for a while without judging anyone too harshly. Spending some quality time with your friends or family is more restorative if your heart is fully open to the experience.

You may be lost in contemplation today, as you Lions drift off into a rather complex dreamscape. However, ignoring the interpersonal dynamics at work is not a wise move since the current situation could be complicated by someone's unexpressed feelings. As much as you want to escape into your inner world now, you must meet your professional obligations before slipping away to explore your imagination.

You might have already scheduled some fun for yourself today, only to discover that nothing is going to happen quite as you thought. You can still enjoy yourself, but it won't be without a bit of confusion creeping into your life. Bring yourself back to your center and shrug off the minor inconveniences or you could inadvertently make things worse. Remember the best way to minimize stress and impress others is to keep your sense of humor intact.

You can get all wrapped up in mental gymnastics now, even though your stoicism may prevent you from talking about your worries with others. You feel like you should be more lighthearted today, but there are serious issues that just won't go away until you deal with them. Even with singular focus, resolution probably won't come quickly. In the meantime, do something creative with your irritation instead of spreading it to others.

Ironically, you are aware of life's simplicity and its many complications at the very same time. With the evocative Moon moving through sensible Taurus today, your primary drive is toward experiencing pleasure. Yet, as a Scorpio, you always enjoy delving into a good mystery. Be careful if it appears that someone else can ameliorate your need for complexity, for this is just an illusion. Like it or not, your fate is completely in your own hands.

Returning to the basics isn't what normally motivates you, but simplification just may be the most critical theme in your life now. You are at a significant intersection today, and taking the on-ramp to the busy freeway might not be your best choice. You could have a very positive influence on your environment, but you must step out of the fast lane and onto the road less traveled so you can create the type of connections you want.

Rethinking your core assumptions or reinventing your image offers the best chances for success today. Since this transformational process may continue for a while yet, it's wise to review and reevaluate last year's accomplishments while they are still fresh in your mind. Strive to put closure on as many loose ends as possible over the next few weeks to make plenty of room for your future exciting endeavors.

Inner conflict may stress you out as you begin to reconsider a logical decision you recently made. Unfortunately, your feelings might not fall in line with your rational analysis today as you expected. Thankfully, your dilemma isn't all that obvious to anyone else; nevertheless, a special person could come to your rescue now. Remain open to receiving good news from a friend or family member, for it can provide just enough hope to settle your angst and nudge you in the right direction.

Your current indecision gets in the way of finalizing your plans. Naturally, you want to do what is best, but your good intentions may go awry today, especially if your expectations are unrealistic. It's difficult to say no to anything that sounds like fun, even if it isn't very practical. Instead of needlessly complicating matters even more, rely on a second opinion from someone you trust before making any commitments now that you will later regret.

It feels as if the end of something is near, yet so is the beginning of what's next. Even if you have recently made observable progress, you can't seem to make that final push through to conclusion. Unfortunately, you won't be allowed to move on until you leave your previous project in a stable place. Do everything you can to make a smooth transition from cleaning up the past to living in the future.

Your unwillingness to change can be self-defeating today, making it smarter to compromise than to be left standing alone. You may feel as if everyone is moving in a direction that doesn't support your long-term goals. Don't be so concerned about getting it right that you do nothing at all. Adapting to the new circumstances demonstrates more strength now than holding your ground.

It's all too easy to get so caught up in your current dreams that you believe they are real. There's nothing wrong with the luxury of being lost in fantasy as long as you can snap back to your more mundane responsibilities as needed. It's only when you start acting as if your illusion is the truth that trouble comes knocking at your door.

Life grows more complicated today if your friends propose such a sensible plan that there's no way you can say no. Unfortunately, joining forces with the group presents an awkward dilemma. You want to be a part of the action now, yet you also have a responsibility to follow your own feelings, too. Find a way to be true to yourself while also sharing in the larger vision. The benefit of collaborating with others ultimately outweighs the simplicity of working on your own.

An unexpected turn of events may bring someone into your life who asks a favor of you. Although your first inclination might be to help if you can, be careful about overcommitting your resources. You will probably come through with the goods -- as you often do -- but the personal price could be greater than you want to pay.
