Remember, others will respect you more if you set boundaries before agreeing to everything under the Sun.

Trusting your own judgment is a wise practice since you can perceive problems long before they have a chance to manifest. Don't let others get away with their accusations that you are nit-picking or expecting too much. Your wary concern is not just a way to justify obsessing over the details today. Excellence in execution won't make up for an idea that is simply not a good one from the start. Remember, your pragmatic approach serves you well in the long run.

You are feeling pulled in two completely opposite directions today. You can be emotionally aloof, allowing you to be involved in a high-intensity debate without succumbing to irrational arguments. Alternatively, you could become so enamored with one perspective that you lose your clarity. It's okay to take sides, but remain open to the voice of reason and sensitive to the feelings of others.

Listening to others can be challenging today, especially when there's so much going on within your own imagination. You may see what you want quite clearly, yet the path to your desires is threatened by someone else's intentions which are very different than yours. Detaching from old expectations and focusing on your blessings in the present moment is your most reliable route to happiness.

Your long-term goals often seem more exciting to you than your pressing day-to-day affairs. However, you could benefit today by letting go of your plans for the future and dealing with your immediate situation. Instead of getting lost in the big picture, bring everything back to the here and now where even the tiniest changes can have positive consequences.

You can rally the troops today because others see you as confident and competent. Even if you are stressed out because secretly you aren't so sure of yourself, rest assured that you are on the right track. Just don't overcompensate for your insecurities by demanding more from someone else than you are ready to give yourself. Instead of telling anyone what to do now, simply lead by example for the best results.

You may be growing concerned that something isn't going according to your plans, even if it's really too soon to tell. Unfortunately, your worries can fuel uncertainty, taking the wind out of your sails. Loss of momentum could add discouragement to the mix, but if you pay attention to what's really happening, then you should be able to quickly overcome this temporary bout of self-doubt. Cultivating a positive attitude is your ticket to success.

Make your plans carefully today and then do your best to stick to them. Instead of being bounced around by everyone else's whims now, you can increase your chances of being successful by following your own agenda. Move steadily toward your goals, but don't get distracted because it will take constant vigilance to stay on course. Being the master of your own fate is possible if you practice patience and persistence.

You may want to crawl into a safe place and let the world pass you by today. However, you might have to be satisfied with setting a short amount of time aside for quiet contemplation because work-related responsibilities keep you on the run. But don't worry if progress seems elusive now, even if you can't figure out the source of the delay. The good news is you probably won't have long to wait. You should be able to start seeing some movement when the pace of events picks up later in the day.

You have recently learned an important lesson from your involvement with a group, either socially or on the job. Now your perspective is beginning to change and you might need to return to your friends or coworkers to revisit the issues you previously discussed. Fortunately, augmenting your research online works in your favor with mental Mercury retrograding in your 11th House of Technology. Stay focused on your goals so you don't scatter your energy and waste valuable resources.

You are required to use your brain at work like never before. You're particularly sensitive to Mercury retrogrades in general, and this one brings an intellectual emphasis to your 10th House of Career. However, don't rush the process today; it may be an illusion if you think you already know the answers to your questions. Be patient; the real solutions will come to you when you are ready. In the meantime, keep your options as open as possible.

You have to deal with other people's feelings today and might not be able to avoid getting more emotionally involved than you prefer. This Mercury retrograde falls in your 9th House of Big Ideas, bringing up plans that you thought were already completed. However, you could have missed something important, and fixing things may require you to rethink the strategy once more to make certain that it's still viable. You are being given an opportunity to tie up loose ends before moving ahead -- so make the most of it.

Although a bit of fantasy might play a role in your planning, your thoughts are not light and easy today. You have little patience for participating in trivial conversations as if you were chatting with people at a cocktail party. You may find yourself traveling over familiar ground, but you have more passion now to fuel your search. Indulge your interest in the mysteries so you can tap into the mother-lode of consciousness.

It's possible to have the same conversations over and over again as you realize that someone didn't even hear what you were trying to say the first time. Or, perhaps you missed the essence of what you were told and now you must listen to the entire story once more. Even if you don't find resolution today, keep communication channels open to prevent the energy from stagnating. A kind word can clear the air and break the ice.

Your mind is currently preoccupied with the details of your employment while Mercury hangs out in your 6th House of Work. However, attempts to reexamine a variety of job-related issues could backfire unless you build a bit of cushion into your production schedule. Nevertheless, the emphasis may be on more pressing concerns today. Either way, a practical approach adds efficiency to your day. Make the most of your time by focusing on the present moment.

Although you're still likely in the midst of a creative phase, writer's block can temporarily get in your way today. You have so much to say that it's challenging to fit your words into a clever package. But it's easier than it seems if you take your time instead of trying to do it all in one day. Remember that this is a gestation period and your current creations may not take full form until Mercury turns direct again in three weeks. Taking some time off for play might be just what you need to reconnect with your muse.

Be careful about getting so comfortable today that you say something that's better left unsaid. You believe you are being compassionate, but others might not perceive you the same way. They may think that you're only showing concern to protect your own interests. Try to understand the situation from multiple points of view, even if you feel vulnerable now. Seeing both sides of an issue is the first step to creating common ground.

Distractions come in many forms now and might prevent you from finalizing an important plan. The current Mercury retrograde activates your 3rd House of Communication, amplifying the noise in your immediate environment. Resist getting caught up in the chaotic pace of events and circumstances. Instead of scattering your energy and spreading yourself too thin, cut back on the caffeine and try to get some much-needed rest.

Even if you want to be in the spotlight, you might be better off working behind the scenes because other people can get on your nerves today. Part of your dilemma is your belief that someone is actually preventing you from reaching your goals now; however, it's possible that your real anxiety stems from feelings of inadequacy. Nevertheless, there's no reason to put yourself in solitary confinement; instead, graciously accept help when offered. Not only will you be more productive, but you may also make friends in the process.

You can barely keep up today with your inbox overflowing and your phone ringing off the hook. This Mercury retrograde occurs in your 1st House of Self, crowding your life with information from every corner of the universe. You could easily be swept up in captivating discussions with numerous people about a wide range of topics. If you trip over your words due to your excitement, just let the thoughts go. The important ones will return once the pace slows down.

Everything seems to be jumping today yet you're uncertain whether or not you like it. This high-frequency buzz isn't necessarily good for getting your chores done because you can be a bit scattered while juggling too many activities. At first you might have fun, but then your amusement could turn to dismay when you realize that you can't keep up with what you started. Do yourself a favor; don't try to fit so much into your day and you'll be happier with the results.

You might want to try something that's out of the ordinary today, but it's still wise to think twice before you stir up more trouble than you need. If you aren't sure if your plan is a good idea, wait until tomorrow when your desires will be more rational. Finding a healthy outlet for your restlessness could alleviate the temptation to agitate an already unstable situation. Satisfy your taste for adventure in a way that you won't regret.

You are acutely aware that you have more options now than you previously realized. Although having so many choices is an exciting prospect, the Moon's visit to your sign today also poses problems of its own, since you might not be able to decide which strategy makes the most sense. Don't waste energy spinning your wheels trying to force an answer now because it probably won't be the right one if it doesn't come naturally. Wait for your intuition to guide you in the right direction.

Your mind is abuzz with original ideas today, but you're wise to keep quiet because you might not be able to explain yourself very well. Instead of attempting to convince anyone that your plans could be successful now, just concentrate on doing the work. Once you have some positive results to show for your efforts, others will be more likely to roll up their sleeves and jump in to support you.

Your attempts to make any headway on a variety of projects may be stymied today for several different reasons. Although you might have good intentions coupled with tireless enthusiasm, you still could end up feeling frustrated unless you can prioritize and focus on only one thing at a time. However, if you just can't resist, at least give yourself a break and take it easy for a bit before adding more to your plate.

A flurry of unexpected events tests your ability to multitask today. Fortunately, you could come through with flying colors if you look at it as a game you need to win. But if you take yourself too seriously now, you're likely to sabotage your efforts because of a fear of failure. However, if you're not overly attached to the outcome, it might seem as if time slows down, allowing you to magically complete everything right on schedule.

You could be in a playful mood today, even if you have a lot of work to do. Thankfully, your easygoing attitude enables you to overcome most obstacles with finesse. Spend a bit of time making plans for an upcoming adventure or vacation. It doesn't matter if it's only a night on the town; just having something fun on your calendar will help you to settle down and focus on the mundane chores you have to do right now.

You are a walking paradox today, as you strive for depth and intensity while still maintaining a lighthearted approach with others. Although you might appear to be enjoying yourself, the uneasiness that lurks just beneath your smile is obvious to those who know you well. Nevertheless, it's still wise to think about the consequences of what you intend to say before you speak. Remember that your unedited words could open Pandora's box, which may be better off left closed until tomorrow.

Everyone seems a bit restless today, which only further contributes to your current lack of concentration. Although you may kick off the day knowing exactly what you're going to do, a series of distractions leads you on one detour after another. Don't blame your lack of direction on others; if you weren't so fidgety it would be much easier to stay on track. Instead of worrying about what isn't getting done, just do whatever you can and, if necessary, complete your work tomorrow.

You might be feeling a bit irresponsible today, even if you have pressing obligations. It's not that you plan to blow off your commitments; instead, you may grow bored with the required level of concentration. Your thoughts are moving at light speed and they just don't seem to fit into the narrow confines of your agenda. Don't beat yourself up if you cannot hold your focus now; things will quickly return to normal in the next few days.

Your ideas may not make a whole lot of sense to your friends and family today, but then again, you might not care if anyone understands you, anyhow. You're currently on an individuality kick and want to do everything in a radical manner. Although it's fine to demonstrate your independence, you can take it too far now. Moderating your brilliance with a touch of practicality will enhance your life instead of just turning it upside down.

You are suddenly quite clear about what you want, but as soon as you open your mouth to share your thoughts with your friends your solid plan starts to melt into an idle fantasy. Part of the problem now may be that you don't know when to stop talking. Remember, the fewer words you speak today, the more precise your message.

It's a well-known fact that you Rams often speak before you think about the impact of your words. This impulsive behavior can create problems today because you don't appear to be willing to control the flow of your thoughts. However, it's tricky to distinguish between a sensible idea and one that's out in left field. Take time to consider the consequences before opening your mouth; otherwise, you might wish that you remained silent. Before broadcasting your ideas, share them with a person you trust and see what happens.

It feels as if your busy weekend is quickly coming to an end before you even get a chance to have any fun. Nevertheless, it's wiser to simply grit your teeth and do whatever is expected of you now without stirring up too much trouble. If you don't waste energy resisting, you could actually accomplish more than you expect. Think about what you want to achieve in the days ahead and make a practical plan to reach your goals. Your mature behavior brings a lasting satisfaction that transient pleasures can't supply.

You feel like an eagle today, soaring higher and higher to catch the wind currents. Luckily, the right breeze can carry you as far and wide as you let it. However, this isn't a free ride because you have to pay careful attention to anything that might upset your equilibrium. Don't try to exert control over everything or you could lose your momentum. You have plenty to say, but the present circumstances require you to be discerning about how you deliver your messages.

Your friends may not appreciate how fast your inner wheels are turning today, but you're expending a lot of energy just to keep up with your own thoughts. It takes extra effort to make it look like you have things under control now. Just remember, it's crucial to remain focused on the events of the present moment, especially if you're tempted to escape into your dreamworld and drift for a while. Put your mental agility to good use by helping others and you might be pleasantly surprised with the gift you receive in return.

Your actions often communicate your messages effectively, but today it's more direct to tell someone what you feel rather than trying to demonstrate it. However, you must be careful because your confidence prompts you to overlook an essential fact. It may be tough to regain lost ground if you say something that shows your lack of understanding, so proceed with caution and cover all your bases as you go along. Listening as much as you speak leads to the best possible outcome.

You might attempt to uncover some important information today, but it's as if several radio stations are coming in simultaneously. You want to find a way to filter out some of the noise, but it's nearly impossible when you can't tell which signal is the one you need to hear. Even if you are more comfortable using analytical tools, it's smarter now to temporarily turn off the incoming data stream and just tune into your intuition instead.

It seems as if someone is barking orders at you now, but you're not ready to blindly follow. Take your own sweet time before responding today, because it doesn't make sense to react before you fully understand what's going on. Although it appears as if everything is out in the open, you might still believe there is more to learn. Don't let anyone coerce you into an agreement until you have done your research and reached your own independent conclusion.

You're capable of saying exactly what you mean today, and you can stir up trouble unless you closely monitor your words. You may be so determined to make someone see your point of view that you don't know when to stop trying. It's difficult to just walk away from a discussion until you have covered the same ground one too many times. Needless to say, this overpowering intensity might alienate a close friend in the process. Although your passion is impressive, it's best to end a conversation with the other person wanting more, not less.

You want to squeeze every drop of meaning out of your conversations today, which might leave you with a few unsatisfying encounters. Don't let people ramble on without purpose; use your persuasive charm to help them focus so they can successfully make their points. However, you must be extra careful not to finish anyone else's thoughts because you don't know what they're trying to say. Instead of interrupting, encourage your friends to express what's in their hearts and then listen in between the words for the real messages.

It's nearly impossible to stay anchored to the mundane world today while your thoughts are wandering around in the clouds of illusion. You might grow a bit anxious because you're uncomfortable with your own current lack of practicality. Unfortunately, it's challenging to maintain the concentration necessary to focus on your work. However, keeping both feet on the ground could cause you to lose the magic of a greater vision. Dream today; make it real tomorrow.

You are likely to notice unusual occurrences and synchronistic events that demonstrate the flimsiness of the boundaries between this world and other dimensions. But don't bet your future on something that's happening in a parallel universe unless you're willing to bring your thoughts back down to earth today. It's okay to watch the magic unfold as long as you don't lose track of what's important in the here and now.

It's as if you're walking on a high wire today and can make a dangerous act seem perfectly safe to others. Your apparent courage might actually be linked to denial, but focusing on positive thoughts is a smart idea, nonetheless. Still, a little caution is advised, for unfettered imagination could also breed uncertainty now. Do your best to anchor your thinking to the mundane physical world, even while performing your own special kind of magic.

Your head and your heart are in the middle of their favorite argument about which one has the best advice to give. You are torn between following your rational logic and surrendering to your irrational feelings. But even after you have analyzed the situation and determined what's best, you are still intrigued by yet another direction. Ironically, there may not be a single correct answer today, regardless of which approach you favor. Explore all the possibilities while keeping your options open as long as you can.

Try not to be overly dramatic when you tell someone what you think today, for you can quickly lose credibility if you overstate your position. Stick to the facts and you should be able to sway others  to agree with your point of view. Often your greatest obstacle is your own stubbornness. Luckily, your willingness to compromise now is a relief for everyone involved. Establishing common ground right from the start is the fastest route to success.

If you run into a wall today, your unexpressed emotions might actually prevent you from having your way. However, don't give up; there's no need to stop yet. You can still reach your goals, but you first have to process your repressed feelings that aren't yet integrated into your daily life. Acting from your heart now can increase your chances of getting what you want as long as you're honest with yourself.

Your feelings grow too big to hide as the reflective Moon returns to your sign very early this morning. You may be convinced to disclose something you haven't yet shared, even if revealing your desires makes things temporarily awkward. If you are keeping any secrets, use this time to clear the air. Think about the potential of the weeks ahead and then set the record straight while you can. There's no time like the present to be your authentic self.

Although avoiding the chores on your list today isn't a great idea, some quiet time for reflection can also be rejuvenating. You will be happier and more productive if you balance your responsibilities with a bit of relaxation. But don't attempt to escape your obligations completely or you could regret it sooner than you think when you're required to go back and finish up your work.

Balancing your desire to spend time with your friends against your need to be alone can be quite a tricky dance today. However, you could choose to sit back and be the quiet one in the group, since you really don't need to be talkative to enjoy yourself. However, no matter what you do, integrity is crucial because you are setting a long-term trajectory these days. Even if you don't want to reveal too much, speak your truth by saying what's in your heart.

Although you're usually not the one to be the mothering type, you're inclined to take care of anyone that comes into your sphere of influence today. However, you can be generous to a fault, so be careful that you don't suppress your anger just for the sake of approval. Everyone around you will feel more comfortable if you are honest in your relationships, even if there needs to be some intense discussions along the way. True intimacy is possible if you're willing to keep it real.

You may be drawn to a romantic notion of getting away from it all, yet this kind of escape might sound better than it really is. Nevertheless, a well-planned trip makes sense now. There's no need to be impulsive about it, but the sooner you get out of town for some rest and relaxation, the better. If possible, invite someone else along on your adventure, since the energy you receive from others on your upcoming excursion can fuel your enthusiasm.

A touch of tension hangs in the air this afternoon and discussing your discomfort may just add to the uneasy atmosphere. In fact, even working closely with others now could agitate your frustration. Ironically, you don't really want to be alone today, but it still might be better to withdraw for a little while. If you begin to lose patience, taking a practical approach will help you keep everything in a healthy perspective.

Although you might feel as if this is a great day to try an innovative approach to a project at work, don't lose sight of the more mundane aspects of your creative skills. It could be a real challenge to get others to support your ideas if they don't fit into the current plan. Thankfully, you have the amazing ability to transform your thoughts into actions now. If you don't waste energy doubting yourself, you can accomplish a lot more than you expect.

Your secret agent lifestyle has outlived its usefulness at work and keeping something hidden might only make you feel uncomfortable now. It's time to open up and spill the beans. There's no need to hang on to the past any longer. Push yourself out of your comfort zone by setting new ideas into motion today. Others could appreciate your honesty so much that they follow your example, giving you the perfect chance to lend a sympathetic ear.

An emotionally charged atmosphere presents problems today. You may even become so involved in a heated discussion now that you have a hard time separating your feelings from those of everyone else. Your sensitivity is valuable, but only if you are willing to see things realistically. Rely only on the facts that you can check. But don't close down your imagination for too long; it will serve you well again in just a few days.

Although you're ready to plan for a new adventure today, you might have to learn a tough lesson before you continue. Instead of turning this speed bump into a major detour by fighting against the inevitable, take the time to consider why you may be running into obstacles now. Whatever you do, don't attempt to overpower the facts with your assertive nature. Only when you accept the truth will you be allowed to move forward.

You receive a fleeting glimpse of what's ahead now, but you might not be able to proceed as quickly as you would like. There's nothing wrong with letting your desires motivate you as long as they are realistic. Unfortunately, you may be under a lot of pressure today if you underestimate the energy required to complete a job. Don't make any promises you cannot keep; it's far better to let someone down gently in the present moment than to be the source of deeper disappointment later on.

You're talking a serious game today, but you might not have a clue how to follow through with the necessary actions. But before you attempt to dance your way around an awkward situation, it's a good idea to think about the consequences of any irresponsible behavior. Thankfully, sharing your feelings, including your concerns, in a mature manner can turn an uncomfortable moment into a positive experience.

You might not be all that enthusiastic about the potential of a current romance and your avoidance of the truth only serves to complicate matters. Granted, you could always go ahead and focus on the advantages of being in a relationship, but risking your heart on an improbable future won't resolve the tension in the present. Expressing your reservations with as much kindness as possible could open the door to a much-needed conversation and even a new level of intimacy.

You may believe it's in your best interest to avoid a discussion that reveals your true feelings today. However, it's better to face the truth head on than let it gradually eat away at your confidence. You can broach nearly any subject as long as you do so with compassion. Unfortunately, your overactive imagination might add to your current confusion, making it crucial to stick as close to the facts as you can. Save the dreaming for another day when there's not so much at stake.

You have a lot on your plate today, yet unforeseen circumstances pull your attention away from your real work and may impede your progress. Unfortunately, the pressure to finish your tasks can create additional stress if you fall behind schedule. Nevertheless, your fear of how others might respond is more disruptive to your productivity now than anything else. Rest assured that doing your best will be more than good enough to satisfy everyone else.

Your creative energy is on the rise, but you might have trouble gaining enough traction to manifest something tangible today. It's as if your most productive ideas are blocked by circumstances beyond your control. But this isn't a sensible time to quit since you're probably closer to the finish line than you realize. Rather than endlessly weighing all your options, let your imagination be your guide. For now, dreaming your way into the future is more powerful than following a script.

You could be your own worst enemy today, succumbing to feelings of self-doubt -- even if they are unwarranted. The Sun's square to hardnosed Saturn in your intense sign can make someone's criticism sound worse than it actually is. Instead of imagining what might go wrong, counteract the resistance you now face by visualizing what will go right. Don't take no for an answer; your persistence speaks louder than words.

The best way to accomplish everything today is to write down all your appointments and commitments, and then juggle all of them into a schedule that maximizes your efficiency. But no matter how well you structure your day, you still need to leave room for things taking longer than you expect. Even with the best of intentions, it's also important to know when to toss in the towel. Luckily, your sense of humor can save the day if you maintain a positive attitude.

You want to be more socially involved now, especially if it feels like you're on the outside looking in. Fortunately, you have the gift of long-range vision at your disposal, enabling you to see the bigger picture. Don't let petty ego wounds get in the way of your larger success that might be just around the corner. Acknowledge the reality of the present moment and keep moving forward. If you continue to act in a positive manner, others will likely gravitate toward you before you know it.

It's so easy to worry about being wrong now that you might spend too much time defending your actions. The willful Sun in your logical sign squares authoritative Saturn today, testing your ability to live up to your commitments. Unfortunately, your good intentions aren't sufficient to overcome a poor judgment call. Nevertheless, the ends don't justify the means. Forget about taking any shortcuts; instead, listen to the feedback you receive and do what's expected of you with determination and grace.

There's very little margin for error today, so don't allow your changing moods to influence your actions. Acknowledging your feelings is one thing, but letting your emotions control your behavior is not a good idea now. Take a few deep breaths and give yourself sufficient time to rationally analyze your next move before you do anything you might regret. Follow a practical plan without letting your heart distract you from the work at hand.

You can work yourself into a state of high anxiety this morning, but luckily, your moodiness dissipates later in the day. Paradoxically, you might even feel strangely optimistic without anything actually happening to support your belief that things are improving. Nevertheless, a sudden adjustment in attitude is exactly the catalyst you need to shift your life into the next gear. Don't be afraid to plan for the future; it will be here sooner than you think.

You could spend much of your day revisiting problems that developed over the last few weeks. Thankfully, your frustration is fading, but the desired results are still beyond your grasp. Oddly enough, your confidence remains unshaken and you're sure things will turn around without a lot of extra work on your part. Taking the easy way out is tempting, but a proactive approach to change can make the difference between failure and success.

Your current plans may not be progressing as quickly as you wish. You might even be slightly annoyed with someone who has been standing in your way, but now they appear to change their behavior and help, rather than block, your efforts. Holding a grudge is ill-advised; accept the energetic shift as a positive sign that you're on the right track today, even if your goals still seem far out of reach. A grateful outlook serves you well.

Although you may feel mired in an emotional conflict, circumstances begin to change this afternoon, prompting you to realize that you have less time than you thought. Don't be lazy; if you have something to say, go ahead and speak your piece, even if your declaration might spark an uncomfortable discussion. Getting your feelings out into the open today helps to get the ball rolling and sets the stage for resolution. Now is better than never.

The waiting game is over; it's time to make your move. Perhaps you have recently tried a variety of tactics to push a pressing relationship issue along, but to no avail. Now that the Moon is returning to your dramatic sign, the winds of change are blowing up a storm. There's no reason to resist the movement, even if you aren't sure which direction you're heading. Be bold and ride this cosmic wave for all it's worth.

Even if you have something important to say to a coworker today, you may end up keeping your thoughts to yourself. Although you might imagine shouting your message from the top of a mountain, the Moon's shift into your 12th House of Privacy tells a different story. Sharing the news with grandiose declarations isn't your style, and could leave you with pangs of regret. Focusing on the details is still the most effective way to make your case. Your silence says volumes to those who bother to listen.

You can see potential in things that other folks miss today, and it's up to you to use this special vision to your advantage. Ultimately, it's your innate creativity that enables you to discover these magical possibilities. Now it's time to jump in and play an active role in manifesting results. However, don't try to do everything all at once or you might burn out too quickly. Follow your intuition and turn your dreams into tangible reality.

It's about time that you receive the credit you deserve for all the work that you do. However, the current recognition might not be about your regular duties at home or on the job. More likely, you're being acknowledged for what you bring to the world by who you are when you show up. It may be nearly impossible for others to put this special quality into words, yet you will know you are appreciated now by how people act in your presence. Don't push away the love; receive it with a gracious heart and a touch of humility.

Your future is beginning to open up and your dreams appear a bit closer than before. Nevertheless, you are still aware of how much planning there is yet to be done. Thankfully, you are feeling more energetic day by day. Additionally, it seems as if the mental fog is lifting and your thinking is growing sharper. It's a good idea now to map out your schedule for the next few weeks. Make the necessary commitment, figure out the logistics and get to work today.

Today's dilemma might stem from not knowing how much to tell others regarding your latest news. You may be really excited about a new project, plan or relationship, but aren't ready to say anything until you are more certain that everything is moving along as you wish. Nevertheless, it might be smarter to share your enthusiasm now, along with your concerns. The feedback and support you receive can help you more than you think.

Although you may start your day in a quiet frame of mind, an enthusiastic friend could coax you out of your seclusion. Perhaps you thought that you would simply go about your day, doing your work and minding your own business, only to discover a much different path in store for you now. Don't resist an enticing invitation just because you have too much work to do. You can always come back and tie up loose ends later on. Surrendering to a surprise might just be your best option today.

You're standing at the edge of a clearing, yet you can't tell which way to go. Fortunately, you will step through this window of opportunity as your direction becomes apparent over the next few days. In the meantime, make the most of where you are now by paying attention to every little detail. Observe how others respond to you, but don't forget to also tune into your own creative process. Remember, if something occurs in your imagination, there's a good chance it can also happen in your real life.

You naturally assume you're ready for nearly anything but you might have some lingering doubts today, even after you say yes to an intriguing offer. Perhaps your uncertainty stems from being acutely aware of the consequences of your actions. Or maybe you are reminded of a past event when your immediate reaction created more trouble than it was worth. A touch of self-restraint now could be enough to prevent your world from turning upside down.

You might have to shift your attention to an unfolding domestic drama now that the Moon is visiting your 4th House of Home and Family. You may be so busy at work lately that you're not spending sufficient quality time with your loved ones. Let those who are special to you know how you feel or they could end up wondering if you care anymore. A little bit of authentic affection goes a long way to make everyone happy.

Your unrealistic expectations about your schedule encourage you to think that you can take time for your own pleasure today. But it's easy to set yourself up for failure now by wanting too much. Big ideas must be pared back over the days ahead or you might hit a wall of resistance. It's better to constrain yourself voluntarily than to wait for unpleasant circumstances to suddenly stop you in your tracks. Choosing a more responsible approach improves your chances for success.

Demonstrating your love with tenderness is usually easier than making grandiose gestures. But you could do things differently today, snagging someone's attention by overplaying your part in a drama. After all is said and done, you may feel embarrassed, wishing you hadn't made a scene. Although there's no need to overstate your feelings now, you don't have to apologize if you do. There's nothing wrong with sharing your heart.

Avoid the temptation to express yourself in a melodramatic way today because you could shock others if you go too far. Although everything feels urgent now, it's wise to turn down the volume on your intensity. Thankfully, the drama will begin to subside after tomorrow's Leo Full Moon, yet you may end up wishing you kept some of your secrets to yourself. Remember, you don't have to share all of your fantasies; some things are better left to the imagination, instead.

You might experience an exciting epiphany today that empowers you to break free from an old pattern at work. Unfortunately, endless logical analysis isn't a viable substitute for direct action. Even if you know what to do now, you're still limited by how you see yourself in relationship to others. Experiment, be outrageous and imagine possibilities you haven't yet considered. Believing in magic can make amazing things happen.

Making the most of your time today is the most meaningful gift you can give to yourself and others. Be courageous; stepping into your leadership role and setting a good example are the smartest ways to give your coworkers an inkling of what they can do. If you settle for less now, then that's what you'll inadvertently pass along to everyone else, diluting the shared experience. Seize the moment and your allies will happily follow along.

Your need for peace and quiet comes and goes in waves today, but you can't justify an escape until you meet your previous obligations. Of course, you are naturally inclined to honor the promises you made to help others, instead of just taking care of your own needs. Although it may seem impossible at first, you can have it both ways now if you're willing to take a risk. A radical approach might be the key to finishing up your work early, leaving time for your well-deserved rest and relaxation.

Although you technically agree that rules are necessary to maintain order, it's still fun to dream far beyond the accepted norm. Unfortunately, you don't like to feel restrained by the same laws that govern everyone else. You are so enthused by the potential of the moment now that you may not even consider what's right and what's wrong. Luckily, cosmic energy is on your side, so taking a calculated risk is a good idea today; you can always philosophize about it after the fact.

You want to demonstrate how intuitive you are now and might go out of your way just to let others see you in action. Sharing your inner process with those closest to you can be exhilarating, but the interpersonal dynamics may grow complicated if you are insecure about your current approach. It's not time to worry about anyone's reaction to your quirky behavior. Just trust your hunches today; they won't likely steer you wrong.

You are short on patience now, especially with those who want your attention so badly today that they do a song and dance to get it. You just can't understand why anyone would need to put on such a performance since you are usually so good at recognizing people's contributions. Although you prefer to ignore someone's selfish behavior, you may be better off today indulging others for the sake of group harmony.

You have a lot on your plate today, but your coworkers might not be aware of your strong commitment to get things done. Your hard work may go unnoticed at first but don't let your need for recognition be your only motivation. Still, receiving praise is satisfying, as long as you don't quit before your tasks are completely finished. Satisfaction from a job well done can be surprisingly sweet.

You have high hopes and are willing to take a risk to fulfill your heart's wishes today. You might not want to take no for an answer because the exuberant Leo Full Moon in your 5th House of Romance encourages you to expect too much from love. Tempering your dreams with a bit of realism may be enough to prevent disillusionment in relationships. Persistence may work in your favor now as long as you remember to be sensitive to the feelings of others.

Although jumping on a plane might not be possible now, you are still tempted to escape by going somewhere far away in your mind. But this is a time to be practical, not dreamy when it comes to what really matters. The Leo Full Moon in your 4th House of Roots is a reflector that shines a bright light on family issues. Fantasies only distract you from the real love that could be found at home. Real emotional comfort is closer than you think.

You have a few tricks up your sleeve today when it comes to expressing your attraction to someone special. The playful Leo Full Moon highlights your 3rd House of Communication, inspiring you to take a chance when it comes to love. However, you could overdo it by getting carried away with your feelings. Being confident is one thing, but too much bravado on your part might spell an early end to your evening. Remember, a healthy interaction is a two-way street so be willing to receive as well as you give.

There could be an upcoming change in your income status or, perhaps, a shift in a business partnership. The bright Leo Full Moon illuminates your 2nd House of Money, so you might be more concerned with the bottom line than you are with romance now. Nevertheless, look at everything in a broader context. Practice compassion for others who may be experiencing uncertain times, too. A quick reality check today will give you a more balanced perspective; money can't buy you love.

You may need to show a bit of caution in the romance department today, even if you know exactly what you want. The melodramatic Leo Full Moon floods your 1st House of Personality, possibly stressing your relationships and temporarily turning your life inside out. You could become overly defensive if someone stands in your way, so remind yourself that it's not necessary to express everything you feel. Waiting until tomorrow before saying what's on your mind will probably be better off for everyone involved.

You might feel invisible today, especially if you think that someone special isn't taking notice of you. Don't fight the natural flow of energy as the Leo Full Moon illuminates your 12th House of Privacy, hiding your emotions from view. Nevertheless, your actions will still have the impact you want. Save the flowery speeches and love letters for some other time. Just let behavior do its magic. Even the most subtle gestures will have positive impact if your heart is in the right place.

You might decide to play it low key today and keep your personal feelings to yourself. However, you expressive Leo Moon falls in your 11th House of Social Networking, encouraging you to get involved with a group activity. Although you might resist at first, you're like to find pleasure in your participation once you overcome your initial anxiety. Let go of your personal desires and melt into the group experience for now. Surprisingly, you can derive a great deal of emotional satisfaction by being part of something larger than yourself.

People are likely to stand up and take notice of you today, but the recognition you receive may be professional rather than personal. Fortunately, the theatrical Leo Full Moon brightens your 10th House of Public Status, empowering you to reveal your feelings to someone special. You're at the top of your game now and it's rather easy for you to shift the focus from business to pleasure if you are romantically inclined. Don't be afraid to make your move as long as you pay careful attention to the reactions you receive.

You might be dreaming of a trip with your partner or special friend, but travel plans could require extra attention today as circumstances change. Even the simplest of dinner plans may have to be modified at the last minute. Ultimately, the bold Leo Full Moon in your 9th House of Adventure reminds you to focus on your personal needs and do whatever it takes to reach your destination. The details may be unstable, but don't lose sight of your goal. Following your bliss sometimes requires perseverance and hard work.

You may have to revisit a financial decision today that could alter you evening plans. Instead of making a unilateral decision, it's smarter to check in with your friend or partner. It could take courage on your part to reveal your vulnerability, especially with the proud Leo Full Moon falling in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Don't slip into the trap of pretending that everything is fine if it's not. Taking a risk and sharing your concerns could be the key to increased intimacy.

Don't focus on your shortcomings today, especially if you're worried that someone doesn't like you as much as you like him or her. Today's emotional Leo Full Moon in your 7th House of Relationships is opposite the Sun in your cerebral sign, reminding you of the sharp contrast between your subjective feelings and objective reality. Your performance might fall short of your expectations, but you may be judging yourself harsher than anyone else does. Simply doing the best you can will likely be more than enough.

Although someone you love might rain on your parade today, your positive attitude may be enough to chase the bad emotional weather away. However, you won't find your way back to the sunny side of the street unless you take a chance and give your imagination free rein to explore a new avenues of expression. The Leo Full Moon is lighting up your 6th House of Details, so paying attention to the little things can make the difference between failure and success. A bit of forethought and follow-through goes a long way.

It's frustrating when you believe you know what you want, but don't have a clue how to get it. You wish you could rely on your friends to help you out but they have their own issues to handle today, so you might be more successful to set out on your own. There's no need to wait for the advice if it's not forthcoming now; just do what feels right in your heart and figure out the rest along the way.

Don't sell your career potential short today, for your innate practicality can impress others more than you realize. But overanalyzing the logistical requirements won't help you make the best choices; just depend on your hunches to lead you in the right direction. Following the tried and true path may not be enough now to take you where you want to go. Take a chance and trust your intuition, instead.

It's wiser to stick to your previous agenda than it is to wonder if you will benefit from a spur of the moment decision. A concrete plan serves you well today, even if this isn't your typical style. Advanced preparation now increases your chances of success in the future. Paradoxically, you can obtain the freedom you seek if you apply yourself with discipline from the beginning.

Stressing over a current dilemma only further clouds your judgment today. Your effectiveness hinges more on your positive attitude now than your specific actions. If you don't get it right the first time, people will probably be more understanding than you expect, so there's no need to be so hard on yourself. Blue skies will return once you accept the fact that you are already doing the best you can.

Your current practical demeanor makes it easier to pay serious attention to your regular routines. However, even your best ideas must work within the context of everyone's plans if you are to be successful now. It may feel demeaning when you have to play by other people's rules, but the minor discomfort is worth it in the long run. If you have something useful to offer today, find enough humility to share your brilliance without having to take credit for the outcome.

A bit of tenderhearted compassion softens your emotional edges and lightens your analytical mind. Whether in love or at play, you can accomplish much more than you imagine today, but not in your typically efficient manner. Even if you know you are right, you won't gain anything by being too pushy. Adopting an easygoing approach now helps to get your messages across and move your agenda forward in a timelier manner.

Your living space might benefit from a burst of inspiration today, but this is only one way to demonstrate your natural creativity. However don't isolate yourself; spending time with old friends or close family also turns out to be a sensible investment of your time and energy now, recharging your soul and warming your heart. Ultimately, success is sweeter when you can share it with those you love.

You might not want your friends to tell you what to do today, especially because you already know the obvious. Neither do you need them to remind you of your shortcomings because you can't forget your failures and are aware of your own emotional baggage. Usually, heightened self-awareness works in your favor, but you won't gain much by being so hard on yourself now. Practice true forgiveness and remember that it starts with yourself.

Your long-term goals are on your mind now that the Moon is traveling through your 10th House of Career. However, there may be more important issues than your job that demand your attention today. Review the current relationship between chasing your professional aspirations and spending time with the people who matter the most. Keep in mind that making minor adjustments to your plans can bring about a positive shift in the overall quality of your life.

You may have to make changes to your financial plans today to allow for a discretionary purchase. Although you might not have too much cash in reserve, buying something unusual now could be a smart investment anyhow. Appeal to the desires of those who might be interested in joining you, without compromising your own ethics. Remember to act sensibly and you will likely receive approval and respect from others.

You wish you could just watch people all day long now because you are intrigued with the varieties of human experience. Ironically, you might be more concerned with global issues today than you are with your own circumstances. Nevertheless, your sharp perceptions make this a great day to step back from your responsibilities to take a clear and objective look at your own life. If you're not on the right track, channel your energies in a more promising direction.

You are committed to working tirelessly today in a sincere attempt to make your life more meaningful. However, the practical Virgo Moon is visiting your 7th House of Companions, so flying solo might not sound all that attractive now. Seek out competent and creative people to spice up your day. You have a better chance of realizing your dreams with the support of those who are on a similar path as you.

You're of two minds today and may not be satisfied with the choices you make no matter what you do. On one hand, you're committed to quietly going about your chores and doing everything as you should. On the other hand, you're tired of always playing by the rules. You're ready to fight back against any signs of boredom or restraint now. Moderating your impulses might not sound like fun, yet you will be happier in the long run if you choose your battles wisely.

It may feel as if others are trying to talk you into joining them in an activity you wish to skip. However, you could miss out on a wonderful experience now if you say no. The problem is that you have to give up control to be involved and you're not willing to let go without a good reason. Sharing your concerns just might bring the answers you seek, allowing you to happily partake in the fun without further thought.

Responsibilities at home require your immediate attention today, but this isn't necessarily your idea of how you want to spend the day. Unfortunately, you may not be able to enjoy yourself if you ignore your previous obligations because you can't stop thinking about the chores you left undone. The solution is annoyingly simple now; do your work first and then you will be free to pursue whatever activities you want with a clear conscience.

If someone leans on you for support today, you will probably feel obligated to help them. But it seems like one thing after another pulls you away from responding the way you want. Your discomfort grows from the high number of distractions you face throughout the day. Fortunately, you have enough determination to set clear boundaries if you so choose. Remember, you can be busy with other activities tomorrow, but now you must come through for someone you love.

You must pay attention to the smallest details today as you take on a very exacting project. Normally, your ability to focus is not an issue, but your energy may be a bit scattered now. Don't judge yourself too harshly if you realize that you committed to a higher level of perfection than you can deliver in such a short time frame. Just do the best job possible and then move on. Taking pride in your work brings the ultimate satisfaction.

Logic often runs your world but your restlessness might just get the best of you today. Your intentions are clear, but your follow-through may be more challenging as you attempt to turn your promises into action. Don't stress out; you are capable of extraordinary things now. Satisfying your need for excitement is just as fulfilling for your soul as finishing your chores. Fortunately, you can have your cake and eat it too.

Complicated emotional dynamics at home might have resisted resolution until now. However, it may feel as if something is finally beginning to shift today. Unfortunately, revealing your eagerness could sabotage your progress if you react too fast or push too hard. As counter-intuitive as it seems, subtlety is your most intelligent strategy. Keep cool instead of getting caught up in the drama of the moment so you can be the anchor in the middle of storm.

You feel quite picky about whom you want to socialize with today, but your overly critical attitude could actually stand in the way of your fun. Even if you are sure about your current perceptions, keep in mind that your subjectivity might be warping your perspective more than you realize. It's probably smarter to just go along with the group now and save your judgments for another day. Being kind to everyone, including yourself, is the right thing to do.

Your meticulous thinking can save the day, but you might need to set aside your personal desires for a while. Nevertheless, you are up for the task now as clever Mercury aligns with your key planet Jupiter. However, tread carefully because your incurable optimism could lead you to misjudge the situation. There's no need to get in over your head today if you remember that you aren't actually a super-hero, even if others believe you are. A little humility keeps you from making promises you can't keep.

Others might not see your visionary side now, but you are probably dreaming big these days, nonetheless. Paradoxically, you may be quite busy today fantasizing about your long-term goals in a very practical way. Reach for the stars; don't hold back once you have calculated all the risks. Even if you aren't feeling especially lucky at this time, you have an uncanny sense for playing the odds and coming out a winner.

Although you may be quite enthusiastic today, you still could find it challenging to fully participate as part of a team. You are feeling somewhat reclusive now and might benefit from working solo or relaxing alone for a while. Clarify your goals and continue moving toward them, but don't waste time trying to explain every step you take. Talk is cheap; actions almost always speak louder than words.

It's complicated to meet the expectations of your closest friends today because you may not be willing to commit as much of your time as they want. Their actions might annoy you or they could simply ask too many questions now. You don't have the patience for endless logical analysis. Instead, you're ready to jump into your day and figure things out as you go. Follow your intuition, but don't forget to fall back on your common sense if you get lost.

Although you may spend much of the day hard at work, the action picks up this afternoon as you become more socially inclined. Whether you go out on the town with friends or relax at home with family, at least try to include others in your plans. But don't get caught in a web of procrastination. If you complete whatever tasks you start as efficiently as possible, you will have more alternatives for pleasure available later on.

Acting in a kind manner is admirable, but obsessing over what makes the most sense can interfere with your overall efficiency. Your current tendency may be to analyze everything too much before making your move. Unfortunately, by the time you finally make up your mind, you might have already run out of options. Instead of worrying about whether to work or play today, just do what comes naturally without bothering with the extra analysis. No one can fault you for being yourself.

Staying home and taking it easy might be too tempting of an idea to resist today. You may be so eager to have fun that you agree to something that really isn't ultimately in your best interest. But playing hooky from work or school isn't a smart idea at all, especially if it damages your reputation. Pay close attention to what you must sacrifice in order to fulfill your desires. If the cost is too high, don't say yes.

There are simple steps you can take today to bring your life back into harmony. However, your needs are likely to be very different from those close to you now and the sooner you acknowledge what you want, the better it will be for all involved. Talking about your passions will help move the energy, as long as you don't expect one heartfelt discussion to resolve everything all at once. Remember, the real answers are likely to be found within.

Using your common sense is often a reliable way to help you make the best decisions, but today it may be smarter to take a risk with a less than practical idea. You might start out thinking that your feet are on the ground only to discover that your head is in the clouds by the time evening rolls around. Even if others try to change your mind, listen to your intuition and follow your heart.

You have a love-hate relationship today with the same things that usually keep you happily occupied. You may grow bored with your normal work routine now and might try to shake up the regularity of your life by doing things differently. As much as this act of rebellion can be liberating, don't be afraid to fall back on the tried and true methods if the new ones are not as effective as you had hoped. There's no harm in experimenting as long as you have a safety net in place.

Tie up as many loose ends as you can before the Moon slips into your sign this afternoon. But don't try to make a big deal out of everything you do. It's not for anyone else that you need to finish what you started; it's to prepare yourself for the emotional whirlwind that arrives tomorrow. You might be too distracted to fully concentrate on the future if you still have unfinished business on your plate.

You might be feeling under pressure to finally address unresolved dynamics in your home or family. However, don't get yourself so worked up now that your happiness depends upon resolution of issues that still require additional work. You are entering an intermediate zone where you can't go back to the way things were, yet you can't move forward either. Take a few deep breaths and cut yourself some slack. There's no exact timetable for the healing of the heart.

Initiating action on your big ideas may have to wait until tomorrow, because previous promises must be fulfilled before you take on even more responsibilities. Unfortunately, you could frivolously waste time this morning, especially if you are slow to get started with your tasks at work. Don't be afraid to push yourself a little harder so you can be satisfied with a job well done by the end of the day.

You want to be appreciated and admired for your competence on the job. Ironically, you may need to set aside your personal agenda today to gain the recognition you crave, whether it's solving a problem at work, hosting a party or just being there for someone special. Rather than seeking approval from your friends or coworkers, put in the extra effort now just because it makes you feel good.

Taking an extra step toward a pleasurable goal might seem like a great idea now, but you still could end up disappointed if your needs aren't fully met. Thankfully, there's enough working in your favor that it's easy to believe you'll eventually obtain what you want. Unfortunately, your progress may slow down the closer you get to satisfaction. Don't try too hard or you could become obsessed about what you don't have rather than simply being grateful for what's already yours.

A paradoxical twist may be added to the mix this week as your feelings deepen while you simultaneously grow more emotionally detached. You might feel anxious at first if you aren't able to lose yourself into your dreamworld as easily as usual. Instead of worrying about the current state of affairs, be thankful that you can now sink into a challenging dilemma without necessarily being overwhelmed by the situation. Use both your head and your heart to navigate through these tumultuous waters and emerge stronger than before.

You might feel as if a cycle is coming to a close, but you're just being called to finish up old business so you're ready for the upcoming action. Hopefully, you haven't climbed too far out on any limbs lately. However, don't be too hard on yourself if you have to spend time cleaning up after your overly impulsive behavior. Although you may prefer reminiscing about recent events today, do whatever is necessary to prepare for what's just around the corner. Don't waste this chance to make progress while you can.

A significant shift is occurring in your life, prompting you to look further off into the distance. Unfortunately, this can be a bit nerve-racking now since your ultimate goals may not synchronize with your current trajectory. You might convince yourself that drastic action is required to get back onto the path that will lead you toward your desired future. Seriously consider your options, but don't push too hard for change yet. Make your move only when you're good and ready.

A thorough reevaluation of your career objectives may be in order now that the Sun is moving through your 10th House of Professional Responsibility. Think about what steps you need to take to put your life on a faster track to success. You might not feel a major shift yet, but that doesn't make your process any less unimportant. You could regret it if you let this chance slip by without trying to accomplish something tangible. Thankfully, making a commitment to follow a certain path can bring your dreams to fruition sooner than you expect.

The current cosmic dynamics are subtle today so you might not feel incredibly full of energy. However, you certainly deserve the emotional boost that is coming your way. You're beginning to feel more comfortable with yourself and are willing to hold tight to whatever position is necessary to maintain your integrity. Your ideals are high and your vision is wide; walk your talk and see who follows.

You may appreciate the positive side of the changes in your immediate environment, even if a part of you still wants to hold onto the status quo. You might even attempt to gloss over any negative comments that you receive today. This is not a time to respond in a cavalier manner because your current reactions are probably more important than you think. Listen to what people have to say. Don't run away from the truth; accepting the feedback as constructive guidance rather than criticism now could help you reach your goals in a timely manner.

You could benefit from standing in front of a mirror today and reminding yourself of what you have accomplished since your last birthday. Set priorities and create goals for the balance of your year now as the Sun moves through your 7th House of Reflection. Once you are sure no one is watching, say whatever you need to pump up your self-esteem. Speak your truth right out loud. Then, go out and make your mark. You can do nearly anything if you put your mind to it.

You are pretty pleased with yourself because you have been riding a wave of positive energy. But even if you're still benefiting from a recent creative streak, the cosmic vibrations are already beginning to shift. You now need to find ways to take what you've started and make it last. This is about establishing new routines in your life, but not any dull ones that take the joy out of your life. Anything goes, as long as it feels good and has some consistency to it.

You may feel emotionally refreshed now that the radiant Sun is entering fellow water sign Pisces, though the improvement in your attitude might not seem apparent to others yet. This change is more about your internal psychology rather than your external presence. Vitality is returning to your imagination, replenishing your soul and soothing your emotions. Even if you have heavy responsibilities falling on your shoulders today, lighten your load by making time for creative play. Connecting with your inner child will do you a world of good.

You're running on mental overdrive now and thoroughly enjoying the buzz. Although the good times are not over, you have some deep thinking to do today that might make you wish you could escape from it all. Before you hop on a one-way flight to a tropical island, bite the bullet and deal with what's making you feel uncomfortable. Happily, you may not want to go anywhere once you uncover the source of your concerns. Sticking close to home is more enjoyable after you clear the air and make your peace.

Although you tend to be ambitious and calculating once you establish a goal, you might be feeling rather confused today. Even if you have already done all the preparation you can, there may be a few surprises waiting for you along the way. Some of these unexpected twists and turns might surface now -- as if reality wants to see how you will react if it throws you a curve ball. You don't have to be perfect in your response; you simply need to give it your best possible effort to hit it out of the park.

Over the past few weeks you have felt pressure to initiate change but you might finally get some relief now as the Sun leaves your sign and heads for the open seas of Pisces. However, it may take some time yet to see where the currents are carrying you. Don't waste energy worrying about your destination. Once you get your bearings, you can revise your plans as needed. In the meantime, sit back and enjoy the soothing ocean spray of gentle dreams that inspire your journey.

The light of awareness is shining into the dark recesses of your mind now. Your imagination is heightened and your fantasies are awakened. But you can't communicate your amazing visions to anyone else if your emotions block your self-expression. Don't fight against this resistance today. You'll only waste energy trying to climb over a wall that will soon crumble, anyhow. Instead, keep cultivating your colorful ideas without any interference; wait a few days before proudly presenting them to others.

You are in your power zone, but you might unconsciously try to impose your will onto someone else. Remember that the Moon bumps into your key planet Mars today, sending your emotions into orbit. You're running on overdrive now, yet those around you may not be as ready for action as you are. Avoid unnecessary arguments by taking the needs of others into consideration before going on the attack. Channel your energy in a positive direction.

Someone might inadvertently stir up uncomfortable emotions today, perhaps reviving old feelings of unresolved anger. You're typically a down-to-earth person with a common sense attitude toward life. But you could be mixing up memories from your childhood with current circumstances, making it more difficult now to fix the present situation. Examine your past and then use the lessons learned to positively impact your future.

Others envy the ease with which clever thoughts roll off your tongue. You often can say what you want and be done with it. However, it might be more complicated now to separate your ideas and opinions from your identity. The problem is that if you are fully invested in your perspective, you may have to be more aggressive in your own defense. Just remember that everyone else has valid input to give as well. Keeping your mind open is more important than having the last word.

It might be tempting to convey your annoyance today by not saying or doing anything at all. Unfortunately, once you choose this passive-aggressive tactic, you may retreat so far back into your shell that no one can establish communication with you. Fight against the tendency to withdraw if you are feeling hurt or resentful. Instead, nurse your wounds by gently expressing your feelings without creating a drama. Others can't make things right if they don't know what's wrong.

A new wave of restlessness sweeps through your life today, but you may not know how to put your feelings out on the table without upsetting an emotional applecart. Although you respect other people's perspectives, you might secretly believe that yours is more important. Instead of jumping up on your soapbox to fight your cause, it's healthier to find more productive ways to burn off your excess energy. Save your sermons for another day.

There are serious issues stewing in your immediate environment now and it's to your advantage to minimize the negative energy. You might grow irritated with a friend or family member -- and your harsh criticism could make matters worse. Put your ego aside today and everyone will feel better all the way around. Choose your battles wisely; you can catch more flies with honey than vinegar if you try.

Your world is rocking, yet the chaos begins to settle down later in the day. Nevertheless, you might feel one last kick of adrenaline today, so make the most of this frenetic energy. Setting your ideas into motion is essential now. You are drawing power from deep reserves but you must be willing to do the work in order to reap the rewards.

Your personal motivation is very strong now, driving you to accomplish more than expected. Unfortunately, your unspoken need to excel can pose a danger, for you may inadvertently create conflict with others in your singular quest to achieve your current objectives. Keep in mind that your success doesn't have to come at the expense of anyone else. Even if your ego is telling you otherwise, there is always room for multiple winners.

You're riding an energetic high even if today's cosmic weather clouds your ability to clearly convey your feelings. You might believe you can accomplish whatever is necessary; your optimism is waving like a flag in the breeze. Unfortunately, you can't shake a lingering suspicion that there's something you're forgetting now. Give yourself permission to keep turning over recent events, one by one, until you find what you are missing.

One of your ongoing concerns these days is how you can propel yourself toward your goals without pushing others too hard. Unfortunately, if you're overly bossy, even your allies tend to back away from you. You are riding an adrenaline rush now, but don't try to put out this internal fire. Use your moral compass to keep yourself on track while searching for a constructive outlet for your abundant energy.

Your focus is shifting as you become more practical about your long-term goals and your career path. Partnerships at work can deepen, offering you the support you need to make a crucial decision. However, tensions may be stirred if there is discord lurking beneath the surface in a developing relationship. Nevertheless, it helps to get everyone's feelings out in the open. Compromise isn't the simplest path to follow, but it is the fastest route to  peace and harmony at this time.

It may not be so easy to just let go of a bad feeling since your emotions run very deep. Don't look for the fast fix today. Sometimes the real magic in a relationship stems from those differences that make each person unique. Respecting each other's belief systems sets the stage for building common ground instead of fighting over that which cannot be resolved. When all else fails, let love guide the way.

Slowing down long enough to explore your feelings is often challenging because you're usually on to the next great thing before you're done processing the past. However, today you may not be so anxious to go anywhere at all. Simply luxuriate in the current moment, allowing time to wash away your worries and regrets. A simple change in perspective could significantly improve the quality of your life.

You might try to avoid extremely passionate people now because you believe they may overly complicate your life. However, someone who is willing to express his or her feelings could teach you a valuable lesson today. Although you're tempted to build a protective wall around you, this isolating strategy only makes you feel lonely. Even if you strive to be drama free in all your interactions, it's still wise to stay open to the powerful emotional connections that can enrich your world.

Sailing over turbulent waters without being overwhelmed by the intensity comes naturally to you. However, the power of the emotional currents may carry you into unfamiliar depths today. Struggling against the prevailing tides only wears you out, so relax and go along with the flow. There's no need to panic; just make your way back to familiar ground later on when there's less resistance. In the meantime, enjoy the ride while it lasts.

You may be concerned about surrendering to your feelings today, but a familiar sense of security surrounds you if you simply release your fears and remain present in the moment. Thankfully, there's no need to figure anything out now; the time for logical analysis has already passed. Luckily, you ocean-dwelling Crabs are equipped to breathe under water. Deep diving in the nutrient-rich waters of emotions is the most effective way to replenish your soul.

Maintaining a sense of playfulness is tricky today because your primal emotions may raise serious flags. You might even wonder about the wisdom of your recent strategy if it hasn't brought you all the fulfillment you expected. But don't overreact and make drastic changes to your plans yet, since your perspective will continue to evolve in the weeks ahead. Even if you can't see things clearly now, you're likely to realize soon enough that everything is unfolding as it should. Trusting the process is the first step to reaching your dreams.

You're ready to make the best of an intense emotional situation now, even if your partner or friend doesn't subscribe to your preferred course of action. Although you may have been annoyed recently by someone's lack of commitment or follow through, you are prepared to do whatever is required to make your life a success. Thankfully, the lessons you're learning now ultimately increase your self-confidence and help to clarify your priorities.

You're not necessarily thrilled about getting pulled into an emotional drama that you would rather avoid. However, it seems unlikely that you can outsmart fate now. Luckily, an unexpected encounter today could suddenly turn into the main event. Instead of minimizing your needs to make others feel more important, focus on yourself for a change. Hold tight to your beliefs and don't let anyone lure you away from those things you value most. Maintain your integrity and everything should turn out for the best.

Although a conversation could start out awkwardly today, there are many more topics of agreement than conflict. However, something still feels out of whack and you might not be able to stop digging until you reach the source of your concern. Fortunately, you don't have to find any answers right away. As long as you are moving in the right direction, you will have more time than you think to keep on searching.

You're gaining a whole new sense of purpose now, but it might be based on an intangible feeling rather than a pragmatic idea. Thankfully, you intuitively know what sounds right, yet you're uncertain how to manifest your dreams today. Don't push your current fantasies along too quickly; just revel in the idealistic meanderings and see where they take you. You can always circle around and create a concrete plan to reflect your colorful vision later on.

You might be wondering about the possibility of taking a little spiritual retreat today, but you can't just run out on your responsibilities. Nevertheless, it's nearly impossible to resist the many interesting temptations you encounter. You may grow frustrated if you spin your wheels without accomplishing what you promised. Do your best to stay focused on your obligations and leave your dreams of a  mini-holiday for another day. The rewards are much sweeter if you do the work first.

Your finances continue to be a dominant theme these days and, thankfully, you're more than willing to take care of business now. However, all your good intentions may not be enough to put your books in order right away. Whatever you do, don't fall for your own simplistic solutions or unrealistic hopes. Instead, build a solid plan and then set it into motion today. Just be sure to allow sufficient time for tangible results to manifest.

Your energy level is sky high today, making it imperative to do something productive before your stamina starts to wane. Additionally, setting the right tone for the coming month is crucial because you are tapped into your creative spirit now.
