Don't wait; although it might feel as if everything is taking longer to fall into place than you prefer, this is still a great time to clarify your dreams and start making them come true.

You want to charge ahead today as if you know exactly where you're going and the quickest way to get there. Unfortunately, you might not have a clue. Your enthusiasm can be quite convincing, even to yourself. But in your excitement you could easily miss a crucial piece of the puzzle that's right in front of your nose. Slow down and you will have a better chance of getting it right the first time around.

Participating in a public disagreement is not your idea of a good time and you will do nearly anything to avoid verbal confrontation. However, someone could push you too far today. It's even more difficult to sidestep conflict now because you might not see it coming. Nevertheless, if you feel backed into a corner, stand up for yourself; don't let anyone prevent you from trying to reach your goals.

You might think you have all the answers today, but putting yourself up on a pedestal won't garner the support you seek. No one likes it when you get carried away with your superiority, so don't bother showing off your intellectual finesse. It's a smarter idea to simply listen to what others are telling you now. It won't hurt to hear the truth, especially if you can apply what you learn to improve your overall game.

A relationship issue can become a burden today if a slight difference of opinion heats up into an emotionally charged encounter. One of you may respond with a detached logical argument, which in turn, makes the other person even angrier. No one emerges as a winner if the discussion turns competitive or condescending. Instead of fighting to establish who's right, take a deep breath and assume that both of you have something important to offer. Your willingness to compromise cultivates common ground.

Normally, you have no problem telling others when they have overstepped their boundaries. Although someone may be overly assertive today, it might take you so long to realize what's happening that it's too late to stop it. Understanding your role in letting something go too far is only the first step to improving the situation. Calmly addressing the matter now can put things back in a place that's acceptable to you. Be kind yet firm while reclaiming your territory.

It may feel as if the possibility of reaching a goal is slipping away and it's hard to know which way to turn next. But it's not just one particular situation that has you confused. Rather, the dissonance between your intellect and emotions seems to permeate everything these days. There's nowhere in your outer world that offers you the peaceful sanctuary you seek. For now, find solace in your dreams. Things will make more sense tomorrow.

You have a creative strategy for spending your money wisely now, but someone you love might disagree with your plans. Or, perhaps you are internally conflicted because logic tells you one thing while your intuition says something else. But it's not about choosing one modality over the other. Instead, it's about honoring both your head and your heart. Thankfully, there's no need to decide today.

You are ready to voice your opinions today and defend your beliefs. But putting your thoughts into words might be more challenging than you imagine. Ideally, you should be able to just live out your truth rather than having to talk about it. But others want you to share your experiences now, even if you prefer to keep them private. You don't have to reveal everything all at once. Start slowly and speak from your heart.

Indulging yourself might sound like a good idea today because you are eager for fun and there's no time like the present moment. However, achieving satisfaction isn't as simple as it sounds. Circumstances shift throughout the day and befuddle your desire to make your escape. You will be happier once you let go of control and temporarily give up your party plans. Fulfill your obligations before following your bliss.

You could be struggling with two opposing sides of your nature today. On one hand, your long-term goals seem more important than ever and you may get lost in pursuit of them. On the other hand, there's so much happening in your everyday world that it's hard to think of anything in the future. Nevertheless, don't minimize the significance of your dreams. Juggling the here and now with the then and there isn't always easy, but it's your most sensible strategy for now.

You have a much better chance of getting what you want now if you don't share everything that's on your mind with everyone you meet. Being too expressive of your feelings may frighten away someone special because you can come on stronger than you intend. Underplaying your hand is a wise move today. Things should go your way as long as you exhibit some self-restraint.

Discerning what's real is tricky because your fantasies are so vivid now that they seep through the filter separating night from day. In fact, you could be so entangled in your own dreams that you accidentally lead yourself down the wrong path. There's nothing wrong with sinking into the magic of the subconscious world. But remember, you'll need to make up for lost time and take care of unfinished business when you wake up next week.

Your idealism may sow the seeds of conflict as you pull away from others to do your own thing today. But even if tension is brewing, it could escape your notice because you're likely too wrapped up in thinking about the exciting possibilities ahead. There's no reason to lower the volume of your dreams as long as you also remain aware of those around you. A little sensitivity goes a long way to foster a peaceful and harmonious environment.

You might believe that everyone knows how you are feeling today; however, your actions could prove quite misleading. Take plenty of time to collect your thoughts so you can be especially clear when expressing your emotions. Unfortunately, the one minor detail that slips through the cracks could turn into a major problem. The best solution is prevention, so be aware of how your words may be interpreted before you speak. Knowing your audience sets you up for success.

You aren't quite as sharp as you want to be today, especially if others are relying on you for the facts. You're motivated more by compassion and beauty now than by logic and details. This current penchant for fantasy can make for a lovely escape, especially if you share your visions with a friend. However, something as straightforward as giving someone driving directions might be a chore unless you consciously concentrate on each step of the task at hand. Let your imagination take you on a magical mystery tour instead.

Your current optimism could leave others dissatisfied if you can't deliver on your promises. Nevertheless, don't seek guidance from anyone else now because friends and family will probably just encourage you to take on even more work. Instead of saying yes, reassess how much effort must go into every little job you consider doing. Making a more realistic decision is less stressful on everyone involved. Simplify your strategy for the best results.

You might be able to float through the day as if a dream from the previous night continues after you get out of bed. Unfortunately, you're likely to discover that your imagination can land you in a heap of trouble if you don't separate fact from fiction. Maintaining a positive attitude is usually a smart tactic, but avoiding the harsher side of reality early in the day may elicit an unpleasant wake-up call later. Acknowledge things as they are and not as you wish them to be.

You may entertain unconventional ideas about your health these days, encouraging you to examine alternative possibilities outside the mainstream. Your imagination is especially strong now, making you highly susceptible to suggestion. If you believe an unusual remedy is effective, it probably will work. Whether you are attracted to acupuncture, flower remedies or yoga, don't expect fast results. However, the power of positive thought might just pull you through when you need it most.

You may be struck with wanderlust today as you dream of going somewhere special -- but heading to the other side of town isn't enough to satisfy your appetite. You want to go the distance now, perhaps a romantic getaway to an exotic tropical island or a spiritual journey to a foreign land. Still, you're not likely to go as far as your mind can take you. In fact, it doesn't even matter if you never leave the house since you can find plenty of joy traveling within the vast realms of your imagination.

Finding new ways to express your independence can become an obsession today but, paradoxically, you might not want to stray too far from your home base. Circumstances are nowhere near normal these days, and your desire for adventure may simply be a reaction to emotional pressures or family responsibilities. Either way, taking care of personal business should come before staging any quick escapes. Nothing is gained by acting like a rebel without a cause.

Behaving in an overly emotional manner isn't your usual style, but expressing your feelings clearly today just might help you get what you want. You could be worried that an opportunity is passing too quickly and that you won't be able to make the most of it. Don't worry; a seed has been planted, even if nothing appears to be growing yet. Water your plans with your dreams and fertilize them with positive vibrations and hard work.

Postpone important financial decisions if you can today because your normally conservative thinking may be hampered by unrealistic dreams. A great moneymaking scheme that looks lucrative on the surface will probably turn out less practical than it seems now. Rather than attempting to be fiscally responsible, give yourself permission to temporarily postpone the inevitable. Be patient with yourself, for your clarity will return after the weekend.

Although you might place high expectations on yourself today, it's really an ideal time for a bit of good, old-fashioned fun. Plan a little escape, even if it's only a trip to the movies. Any sort of retreat from your daily routine is productive in the long run, since you desperately need to recharge your batteries. It's not about how much you accomplish now; it's about replenishing your soul.

If you have a musical instrument stashed away, it may be time to dig it out and give it a whirl. Or, maybe you need to pick up the camera that's been sitting on your shelf and snap a few pictures. Try anything that puts you in touch with your creative muse. However, don't bother to explain your behavior to anyone else today. This cosmic energy is about making inner connections and not about outer rationalizations.

Your goals feel very close when you believe your vision is clear. This may seem like such a pivotal moment, but there is a warning that comes along with this good news. Your ambitions could be built upon your most optimistic assessment of a situation -- and you might not be taking all the information into consideration. Don't close off communication just because you think it will bring you down. In fact, sharing your ideas can help you put your dreams into proper perspective.

Your imagination may be running wild today, especially with respect to where your long-term goals might take you. Trust your instincts and move into the great unknown, but don't let yourself fall completely into the realms of fantasy. Anchor your ambitions to the real world where seeing is believing. Finding the right mix of logic and intuition produces the best results.

The clouds have dissipated and the sky is blue, but it's hard to know if you're seeing the truth. Your first inclination is to use your enthusiasm to channel your energy into more socially responsible work. On the other hand, your current surge of hope also encourages you to connect with your inner visionary artist, musician or poet. Just remember, as your spirit soars high above the mundane world, don't lose sight of the ground. Sooner or later, you will need to land and it's wise to have your bearings when you do.

You might be inspired to embark on a metaphysical adventure now, delving into the non-physical dimensions of reality. Perhaps you may be drawn to journey into realms of science fiction or act out your fantasies in a role-playing game. Luckily, a growing interest in psychology can pull you into the mysteries of consciousness. Ultimately, you have an opportunity to find the personal meaning that has eluded you in the past. Remain open to being surprised by something you learn.

Even if you can normally count on your friends, they might seem a bit flakey today. Nevertheless, they may only be reflecting your need to express your own creativity. Don't try to pigeonhole anyone by placing too many expectations on them now. Honor the magical meanderings of others as personal spiritual gifts. Accept the intuitive messages gratefully, but don't take what someone tells you  as the ultimate truth. You must discover that for yourself.

Your current dilemma may reach its maximum tipping point today. You want to be as responsible as others see you. But your dreams are louder than normal now, and you really shouldn't shut them off when they have so much to offer. Your creative fantasies aren't easily integrated into your daily routine, but you can still grow in unexpected ways if you temporarily set logic aside while you travel in the limitless realms of your imagination.

Escaping from the commitments you already made is nearly impossible, but you will gain more from the day if you can also find time to cultivate your inner voice of creativity. Whatever modes of self-expression are normally productive for you are even more powerful today. You are riding an artistic streak now and it would be a shame to miss the opportunity to capture this inspirational energy. This cosmic wave is for you.

Your dreams may be time traveling back into the past as you dredge up childhood memories and sort through your family's history. Your feelings are quite intense, making it difficult to separate truth from fantasy today. You can paint a rosy picture from an experience that wasn't very pretty at all. Or, you can choose to delude yourself with negativity based on false illusions. Either way, be careful about confusing your anxiety with reality. Thankfully, forgiveness has the power to transform fear into love.

You could make most anything appear better than it actually is now that the emotional Moon is traveling through your 1st House of Personality. It's just that your natural way with words is augmented by your passionate feelings today. But don't worry about communicating the details; the real action is currently at the conceptual level. Just make sure that what you're saying is based on the truth so you can motivate yourself as well as others to accomplish great things.

Your life grows more confusing when you let your feelings out to play, especially if you're uncertain about how to integrate them into the rest of your life. You do know one thing for sure -- and that's the importance of your imagination, even if you don't fully trust it. However, the show must go on today. You might believe you have a vested interest in what happens, but you'll be happier if you dance like no one's watching and not worry about the outcome.

You may inadvertently steer others wrong today, but they might go along with your schemes no matter what you say. It seems as if people are encouraging your idealism -- and maybe they are. But it's more like the blind leading the blind. Fortunately, this energetic melodrama isn't nearly as bad as it sounds. Take a deep breath and accept the fact that you're being guided by a higher power now. Your judiciously placed trust will soon be rewarded. Faith moves mountains but you first must believe.

You Fish are often considered to be the champions of imagination, even though you might call it by another name. You are more attracted to the fantasy realms, possibly making your mundane existence seem dull and uninteresting now. Nevertheless, be careful about escaping into your own dream world today. Even if the colors are brighter, they won't last as long. Rely on your friends to give you a reality check to keep you from drifting too far off into another dimension.

Obstacles you encounter now probably stem from something you haven't shared yet. The most obvious solution is to come clean by being as direct as possible, although this strategy of radical honesty can lead to other problems. Not everyone wants to hear the truth. Nevertheless, handling the consequences of your current disclosures is easier than shadow boxing with an enemy you cannot see.

You might have a tough time dealing with the lessons of love you must learn now that your key planet Venus is receiving a stern message from authoritative Saturn. Luckily, you're aspiring toward a life that is based upon truth and not on fantasy because you prefer the safety of long-term stability. If something enjoyable captures your attention today, savor the excitement for a while and then choose a more conservative route. True satisfaction is worth the wait.

You are feeling quite grounded today, even if your fantasies lure you away from your work. You have an excellent sense of balance now, enabling you to meet your obligations in a responsible manner while still having a bit of fun. Of course, there are rules to follow and you need to restrain from going too far with any indulgence. Thankfully, being content with what you currently have in your life is the quickest path to personal fulfillment.

You may be so skillful at controlling your mood swings today that you're able to sidestep an unpleasant meltdown. You intuitively know what works best and you can modify your actions and words to produce the results you want. Since sweet Venus' hookup with taskmaster Saturn could trigger feelings of low self-esteem, be sure that you speak with love in your heart instead of fear. Your positive energy will be reflected back at you in ways you can't imagine.

Although you don't want to blur the distinction between what's real and what's not, you still could be a bit worried about your mental meanderings today. The overlap is subtle, but you might even try to convince yourself that your fantasies are true now. There's nothing wrong with your beliefs as long as you don't expect everyone to accept your truth as theirs. Focus on achieving your goals but keep your heart open to love.

If a friend or partner appears to be out of touch with reality today, it may be prudent to respond with support instead of judgment. Even if you don't think that others have taken the best course of action, try to understand what's motivating them or your negativity could damage the friendship. On the other hand, you can consciously choose to expand your awareness, encouraging the relationship to deepen and grow.

You are tempted to make changes in your daily exercise routine or in your diet based upon wanting a healthier lifestyle. However, you might realize that seeking a spiritual answer isn't the best way to make progress on this front. Instead, look for ways to add excitement into your life without turning it upside down. Being creative while working within the limitations of your current circumstances can bring more stability at this time than any other approach.

Living in the present moment may sound like a great idea unless you have other long-term responsibilities that just cannot be ignored today. Use your creative imagination to envision your ideal future, but keep yourself anchored to your current financial and emotional commitments. Thankfully, this current safety line can prevent you from making a disruptive choice. Explore all your options before deciding what to do next; you're not in as much of a hurry as you think.

Your anxieties may surface now, yet you can't force the process to speed up just to suit your needs. The current restraints feel rather inconvenient, especially if you would prefer to ignore them and move on. Nevertheless, an emotional conflict still could heat up and sidetrack your day. Do whatever you can to alleviate the pressure, since it will likely take several more days to resolve.

Waves of joy may wash on to the shores of your awareness today, but you might not be able to feel the unrestrained ecstasy. Your key planet Saturn is moderating the pleasure principle of Venus, helping you extend the good times so they last longer. Use your positive attitude to build a strong foundation for future experiences. There's no rush, so give your plans a while longer to mature and develop.

You have a very down-to-earth approach to managing your intense emotions now. Responsible Saturn is your traditional ruling planet and its supportive alignment with resourceful Venus brings you a sweet sense of satisfaction today. You feel good about the work you are doing so don't sit around idly, waiting for something momentous to happen. Convert your determination into action. You don't need to know all the details yet about where you are going; just start moving.

Ironically, your trustworthy allies may seem to thwart your plans now, but paradoxically they can do it in such a way that actually makes you more successful. There is no need to resist the criticism that you receive if you simply accept that there's always room for improvement. But don't waste your energy feeling discouraged by short-term setbacks; instead, focus on developing your long-term plans and making them even better than before.

Improving your chances of manifesting your dreams is simple today if you're smart enough to practice patience. But waiting for the right opportunity is not an excuse to do nothing at all. Relaxing for a while is fine, but being lazy when you have so much to do is not in your best interest. Establishing a steady pace early in the day helps you get enough of your most critical chores out of the way so you can think about the bigger picture later on.

You may be obsessing about a getaway now that the Moon is hooking up with relentless Pluto in your 9th House of Journeys. If you have been dreaming about going somewhere exotic, this is a perfect time to continue your exploration of the possibilities. Making plans for a future adventure is a great idea because you are able to deftly balance fantasy with reality now. Visualize all the alternatives and then choose the path that makes the most sense based on what you learn.

You could be so busy now that you lose touch with your own emotions. However, taking on a little less work might allow your feelings to rise into awareness. Try not to start any new projects and put all non-essential communication on hold for a couple of days. Although developing a fresh perspective may create anxiety at first, the positive outcome makes all the trouble worthwhile. Listening to your heart is the first step to lasting satisfaction.

You might have a tough time expressing your love toward someone who wants more attention from you. You could even decide to withdraw for a while, yet others don't necessarily realize that you're coming from a place of good intentions. Although you may actually be afraid of getting too close, you also don't want to bother anyone with your shortcomings or doubts. Nevertheless, rationally facing your fears gives you a chance to break through an emotional barrier and deepen existing relationships.

Your health may be compromised now as you battle a cold or deal with a minor infection. Even if you are feeling great, it's still wise to make some kind of improvement to your current exercise program. And if you've recently thought about making a change in your diet, don't wait for a better time. Establishing new routines that increase your physical strength has a powerfully positive impact on your overall well-being.

Managing your schedule with a creative flair gives you a much-needed advantage for the next few days. Of course, you still must take care of your previous obligations, but with a little foresight you can find time for play while the Moon is lighting up your 5th House of Fun and Games. Your life is not just about being the most responsible one in the room. Whatever you do for enjoyment -- whether engaging in sports, social activities or hobbies -- make sure that you leave time to replenish your soul.

You might have to pay extra attention to a family matter today. Thankfully, the problem isn't earth-shattering, but domestic responsibilities can still get in the way of other more enjoyable commitments. Don't complain about what you must do; just prioritize your tasks and get started right away. You'll be pleasantly surprised that with the right amount of determination you can finish nearly everything in less time than you thought possible. A positive attitude only helps to make the work more pleasurable along the way.

Taking care of unfinished business is a smart plan today, especially if you have been procrastinating for too long. The practical Capricorn Moon is visiting your 3rd House of Communication, so write those emails and make those phone calls needed to handle a lingering issue. Tying up loose ends requires concentration and commitment; however, you will surely feel good about your efforts once the day is over.

You may receive an unexpected benefit today from taking a risk and sharing your concerns with a friend about a personal failure or a disappointment. The supportive feedback you receive can cast your situation in a whole new light. The information you glean isn't radically different; it's just that you are more open to hearing the truth now. Paradoxically, expressing your vulnerability can ultimately improve your self-esteem and validate your trust in others.

Although you may be confident in your ability to accomplish your objectives today, you could find yourself in trouble if you take on more responsibilities than you can manage. If you're not sure how much effort a task requires, talk it over with a coworker or friend before saying yes. Being self-assured enough to push your limits is admirable, but for now be as practical as possible. Setting clear boundaries earns you even more respect.

Don't be too hard on yourself if reality feels somewhat boring today. Your current dreams are bigger than life, but they're not necessarily a distraction. In fact, your fantasies may be your best ticket to understanding the future. You can explore alternative life paths by visualizing your future self right in the middle of the picture. Trust your intuition; let your mind wander now and create your strategy later.

It doesn't necessarily feel like work if you're helping someone you love today. You may even be willing to go beyond the call of duty now. And although you might feel pleased about what you are doing for others, it's crucial that you don't go overboard. Taking your role as a superhero too seriously can leave you physically exhausted and emotionally depleted. Just remember to reserve some of your nurturing and pampering for yourself.

No matter how confident you are about your future prospects, your long-term goals may seem just beyond your grasp today. Normally, this delay might be discouraging but you're actually eager now to work around the current obstacles. Don't expect immediate solutions; however, if you already laid the foundation for deeper changes, they could begin to unfold in the days ahead. Determination and patience is an unbeatable combination.

You may be flying on the wings of optimism today, yet it's wise to bring yourself back down to earth before too long. Thankfully, you're as comfortable with your feet on the ground as anyone, so your newly established stability is quite satisfying at first. Nevertheless, you might begin to sense that something isn't quite right. Don't get carried away trying to get to the bottom of a mystery; instead of looking back, just keep moving forward. The missing pieces will fall into place when the time is right.

You're seeking excitement in your life, but first you must deal with a difficult situation. Someone may be making demands on you or, perhaps, responsibilities at work are piling up. Either way, your attitude makes the difference between failure and success. Act with confidence while going through the motions the best you can. Responding with finesse to the current pressures helps you to establish a stable center. Once you have gained your balance, you'll be ready for the next adventure.

It seems as if everyone is encouraging you to do things that push you right up against your limits today. On one hand, you're excited about the potential breakthrough. On the other hand, you may be quite satisfied with the status quo. Unfortunately, the effort you put into resistance now will likely take its toll, making you even more anxious. This is an opportune time for change; you have a much better chance of reaching your goals if you remain open to the possibilities of the moment.

You may feel bent out of shape today because obligations push you one way while your need for freedom pulls you another. Unfortunately, a quick solution might not be forthcoming. Nevertheless, the current stress won't have long-term consequences unless you stir something up that's better left alone for now. Just grin and bear it for a day or two until the tension settles down. Ironically, your negativity could dissipate once you simply choose to go with the flow.

Confusing circumstances seem to get in the way of your high hopes for meaningful dialogue today. There are so many topics you want to talk about as your emotions bump up against the reality of your current relationships. But even if the resistance appears to originate from someone else, look within to see how you have contributed to establishing the distance. Increasing your self-awareness helps soften the boundaries over the days ahead. Take the high road and open your heart.

It's not that you are required to keep anything secret now; it's just that you don't want to reveal all of your feelings at once. Your heightened sense of intensity may scare someone away today, creating an effect very different from your intentions. As you struggle with the inevitable changes that are unfolding in your relationships, you might just discover that you have more power than you thought. Lead by example and let love be your guide.

Your willingness to examine your hidden motives can ease the stress in your life as long as you are able to let go of the past. The Moon and retrograde Mercury are both in your 4th House of Roots, prompting you to dig deeply into your own personal history in search for present meaning. But self-doubt isn't useful; if your current life falls short of old expectations now, don't project your insecurities onto anyone else. Be fearless, take a risk and boldly move into your future. The journey of a lifetime begins with one single step.

You are justifiably concerned about adhering to your schedule now, even if it might make more sense to ease up on the controls and adapt to the changing circumstances. Although you're eager for an adventure into the unknown as radical Uranus squares your key planet Jupiter, there is still room for miscalculations, misunderstandings and bad judgments. Carefully define the assumptions and agreements of any relationship or contract. Don't try to hide your uncertainty by pretending you know all the answers; for the best results, just be yourself.

You might not be ready for the good news that arrives today. Although someone may offer you an exciting opportunity, it also has the potential of destabilizing your life. If you believe that you already have all the facts, you could appear overconfident when you make your decision. It's possible to become a casualty of your own ambition now if you don't temper it with a healthy dose of common sense. Slow down; it's better to arrive at success late with a smile on your face than not at all.

Your world is tense with anticipation today. The possibilities seem endless, maybe even overwhelming. And it's challenging to find the best speed at which to move ahead, because you don't want to mess things up. But sitting idly with your foot on the brake won't clear your way to success. Handle the current resistance by confronting it directly. However, don't exhaust yourself now by trying to accomplish too much too fast. The future will arrive on time, even if it takes a bit longer to manifest your dreams.

You might feel as if it's daybreak and your dreams have receded into a hidden corner of your mind. However, there's no cause for worry today since the brilliance of illumination can shine a bright new light on your life. Ingenious ideas that pop into awareness are more likely now to have lasting value. Write down any inspirations that surface right away, so you can develop them over the days ahead.

Your friends and associates show up in unexpected ways today, making life easier for you. With their assistance, you're able to solve nearly any problem, even those that have plagued you for a while. In turn, you can lend your positive spirit to helping others or organizing social activities. Host an event or jump into a group discussion where you can interact with interesting people who are sharing intriguing ideas. For now, it really might take a village to fulfill all of your needs.

There's no reason to be too concerned if you're not fully appreciated at work today. In fact, it may not be the best time to ask for the recognition you deserve. Reflect carefully on the ramifications of your actions before stating your needs. You could be overly sensitive now, so it won't take much to stir self-doubt about your career aspirations. Nevertheless, it won't help your cause if you take things too personally. Keep a positive attitude; today's optimism leads to tomorrow's success.

Your inventive mind can take you nearly anywhere today; it's up to you to decide your destination. Although others may lift your spirits with their good ideas, don't spend time with people who are overly serious now. A lighthearted engagement is more consistent with your present frame of mind, so find someone who is witty enough to keep up with the intellectual games that you love so much. Just remember you can play until your heart's content, but at some point you're going to have to get down to business.

A bit of relationship drama is likely today because your emotions may be somewhat erratic. It's challenging to get a handle on the situation because you might not feel like you're standing on solid ground. The rules are in flux now, making this a poor time to hold onto the status quo. Be courageous and open your heart to new ways of connecting with others. Take a deep breath and prepare for positive change.

Visitors may come and go unexpectedly, filling your day with surprises. There seems to be fewer limitations on how you communicate with others today, allowing for possible breakthroughs in relationships. If you believe the time is right, take a risk and say what's on your mind. Thankfully, you can create new rules for sharing your life with someone you trust; all it takes is a little imagination now and the confidence to move forward. Let your heart lead the way.

You're inspired today by an ingenious approach to a work project, a hobby or even a task at home. All you have to do is release the old and tired way of doing things to make room for new and improved ideas. Entertaining all possibilities prevents you from becoming bogged down in an unnecessary dispute. Remember, getting the job done now is more important than determining who's right.

It's playtime today, whether you do something fun with kids or get in touch with your own inner child. Silly games, creative endeavors and romantic pursuits are all appropriate now as long as you allow yourself to bask in the pleasure of being alive. If you are under too much pressure, take a break to breathe deeply. Even a short walk will do you good. Anything that creates movement and gets oxygen into your lungs also brings fresh hope into your heart.

An apparently unresolvable emotional issue may slow you down today. Surprisingly, you can see progress once you realize that you really do have more choices than you thought. You might not be thrilled with the current options, but any decision you make now is better than none at all. Ultimately, it's crucial to keep moving forward. Even if you're still unsure about your new direction, change for the sake of change will do you good.

Feed your current taste for unconventional activities now by stepping off the beaten track and exploring the territory outside your familiar haunts. Even if you're hesitant at first, once you get going you won't want to look back. Sweep away old cobwebs that have settled into your life by steering clear of worn-out patterns and people who don't have your best interests at heart. Out with the old and in with the new.

Although you usually don't mind it when other people lean on you, it may be particularly annoying today. Others trust you because they assume you're not going to follow a crazy notion on a whim. Nevertheless, it doesn't seem fair that everyone else is free to be weird and off the wall while you are expected to be the stabilizing influence who holds down the fort. However, you might just surprise someone now by acting out of character in order to restore a bit of balance to the relationship dynamics. You deserve to have some fun, but don't rebel just to prove a point.

You're probably feeling quite moody now that the emotional Moon is visiting your sign. You're itching for change and it may be difficult to restrain yourself with logic today. If you try to stay in the same old groove, something or someone is likely to come along to shake up your world. Ultimately, it's more exciting to pick your own adventure instead, so don't wait; break new ground now while you still have the chance. You can't go wrong if you follow your heart.

You may be able to see exactly what you want but it's as if you're standing outside a closed store, longing for what's on the other side of the window. There are so many enticing goodies and it's frustrating that you can't put your hands on them right away. But instead of getting hooked by the impossibility of the situation now, simply observe the images for future reference. Today you're planting seeds that will grow when you water them with positive actions later on.

You feel kinder and gentler toward those you love today as the dreamy Pisces Moon encourages you to soften your hard edges. Even if you run into resistance, your charm should be enough to win nearly anyone over. Don't dwell on recent problems; you can let go of them for now. Whatever is crucial will resurface soon enough and you can deal with it then. All you need to worry about today is following your heart.

You're easily distracted by the idea of trying something out of the ordinary, yet your uncharacteristic enthusiasm may stir up more trouble than it's worth. It's possible to miss an important detail in your rush to create an opportunity for yourself. Since your current optimism has you believing that the silver lining is the most significant part of the dark cloud, you might ignore a problem instead of dealing with it in the moment. Seeking a realistic perspective is more useful than pretending everything is okay.

You are likely more concerned with the big picture than with the details today. Thankfully, your fantasies can be quite productive now, motivating you to take a calculated risk at work. Although you're currently riding an intuitive wave of optimism, don't lose sight of your common sense. A little dreaming is healthy, but don't expect too much change overnight. Be patient; determination could be your newest secret weapon.

You're on the hunt for an adventure today as the Sun harmonizes with expansive Jupiter in your sign. It's easy to appear happy when others are encouraging you, yet you still might have a more serious undertone to your behavior. Your intuitive understanding of what's happening can make you seem lucky, but anything that falls into your lap now has probably been hard-earned. Continue to aim high and reach for the stars.

It's time to ride the waves of positive energy flowing through your life. Although you can be quite passionate about your current pet projects, remember not to overwhelm anyone who doesn't understand your excitement. Of course, you don't want to sit around waiting for the approval of others since you're eager to show the world what you have to offer. Sow your seeds today to reap great rewards in the future.

Although you might feel quite content with the status quo, you can still sense that big changes are in the air now. You have many wonderful ideas about how to add more pleasure into your day, making this an inconvenient time to let others dictate your needs. Don't hesitate; be precise about what would make your world better. If you ask clearly and have a sensible plan in mind, you might just get what you want.

This is a wonderful time to channel your inner artist now, for your creativity can express your deepest feelings. But you must take the initiative to do something special with your talent or you will waste this auspicious moment. Seek more meaning by connecting personal experiences with larger patterns in your life. What others see as your luck may really be the result of how well you visualize the big picture. Don't let fear or doubt stop you from shining your light.

If you are tired of feeling stuck in the same pattern, clarity is finally on the way as you begin to see possible solutions to your dilemma. You could have a sudden breakthrough in your creative process that guides you into new realms of consciousness. Don't waste time resisting the upcoming changes. The truths you discover now can propel you out of a familiar rut. The prevailing currents are heading your way, so prepare to let go and flow with them, wherever they carry you. It's not the destination, but the journey that counts.

The radiant Sun forms an emotionally rich trine with your ruling planet Jupiter today, bringing joy and temporary relief from the stresses and strains of modern living. Nevertheless, it's a smart idea to transform your current enthusiasm into positive action while it lasts. Your I-can-do-it attitude gives you the extra energy needed in order to accomplish all that you have promised. Don't hold back now; let your rising optimism take you as far as it possibly can. The sky is the limit.

You tend to minimize your feelings because you typically distrust the unreliability of subjective thoughts. You would rather place your faith in concrete facts. However, today you can successfully tap into the emotional wisdom that you often dismiss. Your intuition is operating very keenly now so don't be afraid to listen to your inner voice, even if you cannot rationally justify what it tells you. Whatever you decide, make a commitment to focus your attention on what's most important to your heart.

You may go through alternating mood swings today. One minute you are deep in emotional contemplation, remembering feelings from the past. The next minute you are distracting yourself from your memories by doing something practical in present time. Allowing your mind to freely move back and forth between these two extremes can ultimately help you see things with more clarity now. This is a rewarding exercise, but only if you make the effort to connect the past with what is happening in the current moment.

Your perceptions are so sharp today that others can't help but notice your acute sensitivity. But instead of shutting your senses down in order to cope with the intensity, it's more useful to fully engage them now. Don't lose precious time worrying about how people will react to your expressive behavior. Volunteer for community service, sign up for an environmental cause or just offer a helping hand to someone in need. Anything that moves you out of your head and out into the world is a sign of healthy progress.

You are embarking on a journey into the mysterious shadows of your subconscious as your imagination lures you into places you've never been. Today's Pisces New Moon falls in your 12th House of Destiny, setting you off in a new direction. Things are beginning to change, but you may not notice the consequences of your current actions for a while because your key planet Mars enters its retrograde phase now. Trusting your emotions over logic enables you to uncover your personal truth.

Being sensibly cautious is preferable now because it enables you to communicate effectively. However, the Pisces New Moon highlights your 11th House of Community, magnifying your current tendency to go overboard, especially when you're in the company of a large group of people. But don't overstate your case because others will understand your message without any extra effort on your part. The simpler you make your story, the more impact it has.

Set aside unfinished projects that aren't coming to fruition yet, unless you can quickly wrap up loose ends and get on to what's next. You have time-sensitive decisions to make about your professional life while today's Pisces New Moon stirs up feelings in your 10th House of Career. Push through any resistance that's holding you back. Voicing your intentions clearly carries a great deal of conviction now that can help you determine a new direction.

Although your feelings may be evolving now, it's a good day to determine what you want in the weeks ahead. Imagining all the possibilities allows you to consciously choose your future. Don't let an amazing opportunity pass you by; now is your chance to shine with the Pisces New Moon activating your 9th House of Adventure. Although your dreams are the source of your current inspiration, your goals are more reachable if you maintain clarity of thought and integrity in all you do.

It might be time to reassess a complex relationship that involves jointly held resources. The Pisces New Moon's presence in your 8th House of Deep Sharing means you may have to remove yourself from the situation in order to gain control of your life. But letting go of your attachments isn't easy, even with your newly discovered strength. Make the most of this moment, for the dynamics will only grow more complicated if you don't take decisive action today.

A different perspective drifts into awareness today, but it may require a special interaction with a friend or partner for you to get the complete picture. The Pisces New Moon in your 7th House of Companions inspires you to share your goals for the weeks ahead with someone you love and trust. But it's not sufficient to simply say what's on your mind now; it's necessary to follow up a conversation with long hours of hard work. Nevertheless, a productive discussion allows you to gain a sharper focus on the future, thus increasing your chances for success.

Make a commitment today to improve your health by considering changes that directly impact your lifestyle. Setting the wheels of progress into motion is a great use of this Pisces New Moon as it energizes your 6th House of Daily Routine. Although the present moment is always the best time to make positive change, Mars is turning retrograde in your sign to complicate your plans and impede your progress. Don't give up on your goals; simply readjust your expectations based upon the shifting circumstances. Where there is a will, there is a way.

There is a delicate balance between what you want to do today and what is actually manageable. You may need to temporarily sacrifice a long-term goal in order to focus on a current situation that has become very intense. Although the Pisces New Moon lands in your 5th House of Spontaneity, following your impulses won't necessarily lead you to satisfaction. Nevertheless, doing nothing is unacceptable now. Taking a carefully planned course of action is a sensible compromise and will likely bring the most beneficial results.

If you recently overstated your opinion in order to make your point, it's probably a good time to retreat for a while. The Pisces New Moon emphasizes your 4th House of Foundations, luring you back to emotional safety. But once you feel secure, you might venture out again soon, but this time with more realistic goals in mind. There is no need to exaggerate today since this only weakens your case. Speaking the truth from your heart assures that you're heard exactly as you intend.

Living your life according to your plans can be quite a challenge today because other people's demands require that you change your schedule more than you want. Although the slippery Pisces New Moon sensitizes your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, there may not be any good reason to hold onto your old routine; familiarity is not a viable justification for doing something the same old way. Demonstrating your flexibility now helps you achieve more success in the days ahead.

Even the simplest financial tasks -- like paying a few bills -- enables you to reestablish your footing on solid ground. Today's Pisces New Moon occurs in your 2nd House of Personal Resources, influencing your bottom line, but it's hard to tell in advance whether the effect will be good or bad. Put other distractions aside now and focus on practical matters for a while, even if logistics are not typically your top priority. You can pursue spiritual and metaphysical interests more freely once your mundane world is all in order.

Nearly anything you truly believe can have significant impact on your life, for today's Pisces New Moon is recharging your 1st House of Self, unleashing the waves of powerful change. Whatever you can do to expand your awareness now becomes more useful for navigating the many twists and turns in the days ahead. Activating your imagination is your best way to increase the potential of the present moment; where attention goes, energy flows.

You receive a boost of power from Mars today, making you think you're fast enough to pass everyone else on the highway. However, it turns out that your car might not have enough horsepower to win the race. Your current plans could be built on an unrealistic assessment of the situation, so don't assume that everything will automatically go your way. Ease up on the accelerator; you'll arrive at your destination sooner if you don't push so hard. This is not a competition; just find a sustainable pace to reach your goal.

You're tempted to take action today so you won't have to defend yourself later -- especially if you feel that someone is attacking your values. It's easy to get worked up over this unsettling situation, but your integrity may not really be at stake. Achieving your relationship goals could require additional time, but the delays won't be significant if you stay flexible. Alter your path but not your destination, even if a partner's resistance is an obstacle. Adjusting your schedule is a small price to pay for progress.

You may feel as if you're working harder today, but not necessarily getting anything done. Although your high adrenaline has you twitching with excitement, your smartest strategy is to let circumstances dictate the speed at which you work. Instead of allowing anger to get the best of you, take the edge off your feelings by engaging in strenuous physical activity. But don't forget to pay careful attention to your feelings; your self-awareness can save you from emotionally exhausting yourself for no reason.

Although you're craving a meaningful connection with someone special, you still might be tempted to pull back into your shell to protect your heart. Unfortunately, buried emotional pain can turn into resentment, which is even more difficult to resolve later on. But now it's time to figure out what needs to be said and find ways to say it. Your future well-being depends on your willingness to bring your feelings out into the open once and for all.

You're up for nearly anything today, especially if you can convince a group of people to join in your adventure. Unfortunately, it's not easy to get anyone to fall in line with your plans. However, your confidence flies in the face of logic now, inspiring everyone you encounter. Instead of attempting to restrain your friends and family members, encourage them to wander through their dreams in search of spiritual meaning. However, don't assume that others will reveal the ultimate truth to you. You must discover that for yourself.

Although your uncertainty makes it difficult to fulfill your commitments today, you still want to hold up your end of the deal. But your dreams can be overwhelming now and it's really not a good idea to shut them off so quickly. It won't be easy to integrate your most creative fantasies into your routine, but it's worth the try. Put your facts in order and hone your skills. You need to perform at the peak of your abilities to make the most of these auspicious times.

Developing your plans for the months ahead should be your top priority now that Mars is retrograde in your diplomatic sign. But you must take someone else's schedule into consideration while the reflective Moon is visiting your 7th House of Partnerships. Thankfully, there's no need to rush your agenda; it's more sensible to work at whatever pace feels comfortable to everyone involved. Lead by example and demonstrate your willingness to compromise.

Your dreams may conjure up memories of the past and your emotions are so intense now that it's challenging to express them without instigating a bit of drama. Fortunately, you're capable of painting a beautiful picture from a less-than-pretty experience. Alternatively, you could misguide your creativity with negativity based on low self-esteem. No matter what, be careful about confusing your fears with what's truly happening in your environment. For the sake of peace, channel your passion into your art.

Your natural persuasive abilities are augmented now by your idealistic vision of what's possible. Nevertheless, make certain that what you are saying is true or you might mislead yourself as well as everyone else. Don't let tensions build to a breaking point. A logical plan, along with a willingness to listen to the opinions of others, is your best assurance to get what you want.

You need to pick one idea and stick with it, as difficult as this sounds now. But don't take yourself too seriously since you can accomplish more if you have fun while you're doing your chores. Cut yourself a bit of slack; everything might take a bit longer to finish than you thought. You will be happier today once you accept that you're not always in control. Letting go of your expectations allows closer bonds to develop between you and those you love. Sometimes, taking a break is just what the doctor ordered.

You may feel exhausted from having to keep up appearances, but today you're drawn into situations that are lighthearted and joyful. Taking time for the kids or jumping into a creative project might be enough to stir up the energy. However this cosmic chemistry plays out, don't resist having fun while you can, even if it makes other parts of your life more complicated for a while. A bit of added complexity is a small price to pay for returning to your chores with a positive perspective and plenty of passion.

Pulling in your energy and being a little less aggressive about getting your way over the next couple of months might sound like odd advice for you sensitive Fish; however, it's just what you need to do. Paradoxically, you may accomplish more than usual during this time of retreat. Try to spend more time today listening to your own inner voice and tuning out the external noise. Even if this strategy makes you a bit stir crazy, remember that this is your chance to recharge your vitality and reconnect with your spiritual core.

You may be feeling a bit battle weary as you tire of your own games today. Your current moodiness might even encourage you to lay low rather than joining the front lines in social or professional activities. Even if you have inescapable obligations, remember that you're being offered an opportunity to begin an important healing process. Set aside some time for quiet contemplation. Don't let this chance for renewal pass without making the most of it.

Hidden emotions cause you to feel more vulnerable, but you can't easily figure out a way through a complex situation. You want to share your feelings today, but you're not sure that what you say will further your cause. Ironically, the current isolation you're experiencing may be of your own creation now. Don't force the issue; give yourself permission to be imperfect. Thankfully, there's no need to fix everything all at once.

Turn the music off and stop dancing so you can actually listen to your thoughts now, even if you're slightly afraid of what you might hear. The truth is you have a better chance of reaching your goals if you find a way to express your fears. But don't use words to tiptoe around conflict; instead, speak carefully to reveal a part of yourself that you normally keep quiet. Your courage sets the stage for a new level of intimacy. Honoring your inner voice is an essential step in your healing process.

Everything appears copasetic on the surface, but you're picking up subtle signals today suggesting otherwise. Much of your energy is expressing outwardly now, leaving little left over for your personal pursuits. This theme of generosity has been around for a while, but you currently have a chance to shine the light of awareness into your subconscious and begin to fix what feels broken. Taking a journey within is the most efficient way to change what's on the outside.

It might be annoying but you won't be able to fully enjoy yourself today until you finish all your chores. It's not that an authority figure is threatening you with punishment if you don't take care of your responsibilities. It's more about being sensible and doing the right thing. If you don't do the work now, no one else will show up either. So, make a list and start plowing through it; the sooner, the better.

Even if you don't accomplish everything that's on today's agenda, you can still feel good about what you manage to get done. There is a strange logic to your behavior now, giving you plenty of room to be spontaneous and creative, even if others think that you're acting out of character. You might find your greatest enjoyment in simple, down-to-earth activities. There's no need to seek approval for your plans; just reset your priorities and have fun.

No matter what kind of emotional wounds you might have endured, it's time to let go of the past now, especially around family issues. Of course, this is easier to say than to do, but the best way is through clear communication. Don't expect to resolve everything with one quick conversation. This healing journey is a long-term project and if you embark on it now, you might see personal progress on a day-to-day basis. Ultimately, your search creates your new reality.

If you're still harboring negative feelings because of something someone previously said, you now have a real chance to move on. It doesn't matter whether it was yesterday or years ago; it's time to revisit the initial cause of your pain. Thankfully, once you bring your awareness to the source, you're able to gain a new perspective that ultimately leads to forgiveness and peace.

You're quite serious today as you seek to understand your own limitations, both physical and circumstantial. Always being the optimist can take its toll on you, but don't worry about what others expect now. Look back over the past few months and try to understand how recently faced obstacles have improved your skills. However, you still have work to do these days, so acknowledge your weaknesses, focus on your strengths and embrace your future.

You may be particularly pensive today because something you want seems just beyond your grasp. You can't understand why it's not just yours for the taking. However, you might be wearing an emotional scar like a badge of honor, even if it's not in your best interest to glorify old wounds. Instead, shine the light of the present onto the past to help you heal. Even if this process is a familiar one, there is still room for additional growth -- and improving your well-being can help you get what you deserve.

You're quite restless today for no logical reason. You can't sit still for longer than a few minutes at a time, but it's not clear what this nervous energy is about. However, important memories are being dredged up from your subconscious that you might not be all that eager to face. There's great potential for an emotional breakthrough now if you have the courage to see things as they actually are. The truth will set you free, if you let it.

Leaning on your friends for emotional support today could bring you the confidence you need in your battle with your own ghosts and goblins. Unfortunately, you can unconsciously project your fears onto those you trust most. You may grow frustrated if you channel too much energy into solving everyone's problems. Progress might come quicker than you expect once you accept that your struggle is ultimately about you and no one else.

Cash flow problems can be avoided if you take time to stabilize your finances today. This might involve researching new investment opportunities or simply balancing your checkbook. However, there could be more going on than just organizing your accounts. Your values have a profound impact on what you accomplish at work. Set goals based on what you consider to be most important and follow through during the week. You may be surprised at how much you will finish if you start now.

You are more likely to reveal how you are feeling to others now. The problem with your current desire to share is that you might not be able to hide your secrets once you get started. However, it's not worth the struggle to keep silent because expressing your emotions is the most straightforward way to communicate your personal truth. Find someone you trust to confide in and a burden will be lifted from your shoulders.

You can see exactly what's happening now, but communicating your perceptions out loud is a different story. Just because you are well informed doesn't mean you should necessarily tell others everything you know. In fact, your maturity is currently being tested by the universe. Don't fall prey to your own guilt; an unnecessary confession won't solve anything. Reconcile with your past before talking with anyone else about the present.

Assistance arrives in the form of emotional encouragement from others today-- and none too soon. You may be struggling with your feelings, but your friends seem to intuitively understand what you are going through now. Allow your vulnerability to be soothed by those who care for you. Even if you still have to return to an unresolved issue later, at least everything seems somewhat easier to handle now with a supportive shoulder to lean on.

Your optimism may run into an obstacle today, but a bit of unexpected resistance might be just what you need to motivate you even more. Most likely, you already have too much work to do, making it tough to get your priorities right if you just shoot from the hip when a problem surfaces. Instead of waiting for trouble, create a to-do list and map out the rest of the week in advance. Even if you must deviate from your plan later on, your enthusiasm still helps you to get moving in the right direction now.

You're on a creative roll this week, and hopefully you will apply some of your current ingenuity toward your long-term goals. But there's no time for pie-in-the-sky dreaming today. Put your imagination to work while being pragmatic in your approach. If you focus your passion on your art, you can accomplish nearly anything you set your mind to now.

Something that's been weighing on your mind now sinks to a deeper level of concern. Thankfully, this doesn't mean that a situation has taken a turn for the worse. On the contrary, your willingness to delve into previously hidden root causes allows you to make progress on the surface. Don't be afraid of what you can't see. Peer into the unknown with confidence; whatever you learn today helps you figure out what moves to make next.

The simplicity of someone's reaction to your behavior today may remind you of what is important. Sometimes you might get lost in the emotional complexity of your contemplation of the meaning of life. You Scorpios are the navigational champions of the hidden realms. However, it's critical now that you tune into what's occurring right in front of your nose, for that is where you can have the greatest positive impact.

You may start the day off with high hopes of accomplishing everything on your agenda. However, you can quickly run amok if you try to take too many giant steps today. Setting the right pace is crucial because there is so much work to do. Rely on your common sense rather than any lofty philosophy and pay attention to the details. The best opportunities will arrive later if you take the time to lay a solid foundation now.

Making progress on all fronts is very likely today if you don't try to bite off more than you can chew. Although the planets are not encouraging you to over-indulge or over-extend, everything might be running smoothly enough now to make a complicated plan look easier than it is. Integrity and determination are your greatest assets; use them wisely and you'll be pleased with the results.

Even if you're preoccupied with your work today, you still might be feeling stress from other areas of your life. Practical responsibilities leave you no time to yourself now, preventing you from realizing your dreams. But your frustration has nowhere to go unless you find a healthy outlet for your anger. It's crucial to keep your emotions from getting stuck, so share your inner process with a confidant to help alleviate the pressure. Take a few deep breaths and count your blessings.

You Fish like the idea of swimming around aimlessly, following the predominant tides. You excel at going with the flow when times get rough. However, something is different today because you have a specific direction in mind. Knowing where you want to go, however, won't necessarily get you there. First you need a map you can trust and a solid plan in place. Additionally, creating firm boundaries prevents you from being distracted, enabling you to reach your destination just in time.

A thick layer of resistance starts to clear as you are released from a previous commitment. Thankfully, you can visualize some free time on your calendar, so start making plans now to be with your friends. But be careful not to put too many events on your schedule or you might just feel restrained again. Too much social activity is just as oppressive as too much work. Allow a little room just for yourself with nothing to do at all.

You may feel more passionate about your job while your key planet Venus travels through your 10th House of Career. Simultaneously, this transit could also stress your romantic life. If you're struggling now between fulfilling your personal needs and your business responsibilities, don't shy away from the difficult issues just because they are more complicated. Remember, your public life has little meaning if you don't also attend to your heart.

You are blown about by some unexpected winds of change today as whimsical Mercury connects with radical Uranus. Your attractions are growing more diverse and you are losing patience because you're not content to wait and see where you land in the next few years. This is not just idle curiosity at work; you have a genuine desire to expand your horizons now. Don't resist the shifting currents; instead, imagine your destination in your mind's eye, and then let it go.

You might feel unsettled today, as if your emotions are out of sorts. However, your concern is not likely strong enough to make you do anything drastic. Be careful that you don't become too possessive in a relationship since the presence of Venus in your 8th of Intimacy entices you with the notion of assuming more control. Unfortunately, tightening your grip could backfire quickly if you let your fears get the best of you. Open your heart and let love in.

You want more out of life now but aren't prepared to sacrifice your freedom to get it. Venus is tripping through your 7th House of Partners, turning your attention toward a variety of relationships this month. It may be easy these days to earn adoration, but being in the spotlight can make your life more complex as you strive for greater independence. Remember, compromise is tricky; there's no reason to give up too much to get something you don't even want.

You have decisions to make today, yet you may be feeling ambivalent as you're pulled simultaneously in two different directions. Instead of looking for one long-term solution, focus on the satisfaction you can derive from helping others now. Being of service reminds you of what matters and motivates you to do your current job as compassionately as possible.

You're in the mood to play today, even if you must finish your work first. Your desire for self-indulgence is high throughout the month as your key planet Venus luxuriates in your 5th House of Spontaneity and Pleasure. Lighthearted fun takes precedence now, but it's still wise to concentrate on your boundaries so you don't eat, drink or party more than you should. Maintaining a healthy balance means more time to enjoy yourself in the long run.

Idealizing the past could make you feel nostalgic today, giving rise to tension about a current situation. You are more attracted now to creature comforts at home, but might be overly hard on yourself as you fulfill your needs instead of resolving a problem. However, you are not just taking the easy way out by being kinder to yourself. You are also building a foundation for the big changes that are already on their way.

Your love light could undergo changes as you trade common sense for greater independence over the next month. You have a more mental attachment to pleasure now that resourceful Venus is visiting your 3rd House of Communication. Although someone might think you're pulling away, you are just less concerned with expressing your passion. Don't let anyone else's reactions put you off. Revealing your unconventional needs to a trustworthy friend doesn't mean your freedom is at risk.

Contrary to what your heart is saying, it makes more sense to build on what you have already started over the past few months. Sweet Venus enters your 2nd House of Possessions today, where she triggers all your delicious cravings. Although you Goats know that stability is more important than fleeting gratification, sometimes you deserve to indulge. However, be careful about putting yourself in a financially precarious position as you strive for emotional satisfaction through the material world.

It may take a few days for an energetic wave of good feelings to wash over your life after lovely Venus dances into your sign. However, someone else might notice a change in you right away. You have a twinkle in your eye now, making you even more alluring. Take advantage of this time by upgrading your image any way you can. Wanting to present yourself in a positive light is not shallow; it's simply a reflection of your healthy self-esteem. Real beauty shines from within.

Feeling compassionate places an uncharacteristic strain on you now because you want to establish clear boundaries between you and others. Paradoxically, it may be this sense of separateness that enables you to be so empathetic, since you don't need to be concerned now about being swallowed up by your own sensitivity. As long as you accept the fact that you cannot save the whole world, you can certainly help some deserving people along the way -- including yourself.

You are psyched to accomplish a lot today, but circumstances could change so much that you must modify your schedule to make it work. Taking success for granted isn't wise since you may have to put in extra effort now to see any real progress. Don't be sidetracked by any shortcuts either, for they will only slow you down in the long run. Instead of putting on an air of bravado, get serious and keep bringing your focus back to the tasks at hand. Self-discipline is an essential key to success.

Your feelings may be tied up in knots as you face an annoying setback today. Even a simple desire grows more complicated if you obsess about someone trying to control you. However, your current worries might just be the result of an overactive imagination. Don't waste time preparing contingencies for scenarios that will never happen. Your best shot at satisfaction comes from concentrating on the present moment and relentlessly working to reach your goals.

There's no need to be discouraged about your overall lack of progress on a creative project now, for things will turn around on their own accord. Although your key planet Mercury is finally regaining speed as it continues to recover from its retrograde phase, you still have a long way to go to make up for recent delays. Don't make major changes to your existing plans until you allow enough time to see how far they can take you. Have patience; everything is going to be alright.

You are eager to begin the process of letting go as the reflective Moon moves into your 12th House of Endings. But your work may not flow as easily as you wish now, and there's no simple way to force yourself through the current creative block. Instead of getting hung up about something on the job that isn't gaining traction, pay attention to the signs and observe the clues around you. Once you decipher the message, you can proceed to the next step of preparing for your future.

Your role at work grows complicated today as relationship dynamics turn more social. However, you have personal business that must be attended to now, even if it's not much fun. Once you push through your own resistance, everything seems to become easier, freeing up enough time for you to do something totally unexpected by your peers. Setting your mind on a particular accomplishment is a wise strategy, but things won't necessarily turn out as planned. Let the element of surprise work in your favor.

It's all about establishing healthy patterns today and sticking to them, whether you have something better to do or not. Your place of employment may be a bit overrun with people experiencing powerful emotions -- yet you're not interested in becoming one of them. Be fierce as you monitor your own performance in light of your career objectives. Make a few positive modifications to your daily routine before you try to move further up the ladder of success.

Your relationships may be a source of disappointment these days, especially if you're not getting all your needs met. Your romantic urges are strong now as flirty Venus hangs out in your 5th House of Creativity and Romance. You would rather be spending quality time with someone you love than being on your own today. No matter what you do, remember to relax; you really have more time to fulfill your personal goals than you think.

Your emotional detachment is rather disarming now because this lack of intensity isn't in character for you. You want to take a rational approach to sort out unresolved issues today. You're able to smooth ruffled feathers, but your friends might still be uncomfortable because they can't read your energy through the layers of insulation. Maintaining boundaries may be the best way to protect your vulnerable core. Secrets are useful at times, but don't withdraw any more than is necessary.

Be quiet and listen to other people's words today, because there is a lot at stake. The most useful information comes to you from your coworkers while the Moon is still visiting your 6th House of Employment. You won't want to skip a single opportunity for a meaningful conversation because this is a time of such significant changes. Even if you share your own perspective, pay close attention when relevant feedback is offered in return. Being patient enables missing puzzle pieces to fall into place.

It's often impossible for others to argue with your authority, but this may not be true today. It's especially challenging if you're feeling socially awkward, leaving you to doubt your ability to handle the current circumstances. Rest assured that your personal integrity is ultimately one of your greatest strengths, so don't even think about sacrificing it for the sake of expediency. Remain open to the advice you receive but following your moral compass is still your best bet.

You might have opportunities to share your feelings in a variety of situations today, but the dynamics could grow more complicated once you actually start talking. However, it's not a very smart idea to stop midstream, even if you don't understand the potential influence of your words in the moment. Fortunately, everything should make a lot more sense within a few days. In the meantime, don't waste energy imagining all the scenarios; the future will unfold soon enough.

Although others may not notice, you have a lot of emotional turmoil just beneath the surface today. Even if those close to you ask revealing questions, you can smoothly evade them with a smile. However, you would be wise to pay close attention because someone might have less than honorable intentions. Keeping a healthy distance is a good idea if you're feeling uncomfortable now. Don't overanalyze; trust your intuition.

Setting priorities and focusing on the most important tasks first maximizes your productivity today. However, you may be fighting an uphill battle because the Gemini Moon tempts you to scatter your energy. Nearly every thought you have now inspires you, making it tough to complete anything before running off with another great idea. Thankfully, you can take control of your restlessness by consciously committing to finish whatever you start.

You're excited about sharing a recent spiritual experience or an interesting dream with someone special. However, once you get started, you might say more than you initially intended. Ironically, you could use a lot of words now and still not tell your whole story. Omitting significant pieces of information is one way to avoid the truth. There's nothing wrong with this evasive strategy if you promised to keep a secret for someone; however intentional forgetfulness just to save your own skin will lead to trouble.

You're more responsive to others now that the Moon is back in your sign, but your coworkers may not fully understand your message. Your words are clear enough; however, your moods change so quickly that you might be on to feeling something new before you're finished describing your previous emotion. Fortunately, no one needs to know about every single whim that crosses your mind. Your internal process can unfold on its own as long as you are attentive to those around you.

The words are running through your head so fast today that it's challenging to find a place to jump in and start talking. Your fantasy life is very rich now, yet nearly everything feels too complicated to explain. It's tough enough sharing even a simple idea. You might know what's going on, but still may choose to remain silent. Trust your instincts and wait for just the right moment to tell everyone your thoughts.
