You seem transparent to your friends now, but there's more happening in your world than meets the eye. You're not going out of your way to hide anything; it's just that your words can't quite describe the nuance of your feelings. It's easier to throw yourself into work than share what's on your mind. Everyone seems to appreciate that you're putting in extra effort today, yet it's the tangible projects that endure over the long run that truly count.

You don't want to reveal your true feelings today because you're worried that others will sense your scattered energy. While the restless Gemini Moon could have you bouncing off the walls, you somehow manage to hide your high anxiety anyhow. You're not likely to accomplish as much as you want now, but you're not quite as unfocused as you think. Keep bringing your attention back to your current obligations, rather than losing yourself in a sea of distractions.

Don't avoid confronting the source of your current tension just because it's easy to escape from your mental struggles today. The Moon is visiting your 9th House of Travel now, indicating that distant horizons are the most attractive subjects of your fantasies. Your visions may be rather captivating, but real satisfaction requires you to work things out closer to home. You can be the king of the world in your dreams, yet it's in your best interest to create a more honest relationship with reality.

Sometimes, complicated issues are best met with simple solutions. Set aside the allure of unconventional emotional entanglements and avoid the intriguing possibilities of interactions that may never happen. Carefully steer clear of all drama now that doesn't directly concern you. Although you're tempted to spin tall tales today, you're wise to keep things as uncomplicated as possible. Discretion is the better part of valor.

You're alternately pulled between being quite serious and very silly today since the emotional climate changes on a moment's notice. Both extremes make perfect sense, but only for a while and only one at a time. Keep in mind that your moods are more dependent than ever on those around you. Stay flexible now while openly responding to the current dynamics by sharing what's in your heart.

Your need to sort through all the information at work today could test everyone's patience. This incoming mountain of data may create a rather delicate situation, especially if someone is waiting on your assessment. It's not that you are any less reliable now; it's just that you could take on more than you can finish. The smartest way to avoid unnecessary conflict is to set boundaries early in the day so you don't make unrealistic assumptions and tempt others to have unreasonable expectations.

Managing your disappointment might require extra effort today, especially if you're dealing with a variety of obstacles. Fortunately, your hope is buoyant and you know that things will only improve if you keep the faith. Your positive attitude could be enough to transform a difficult situation into an opportunity that ultimately works in your favor. Even if you can't control the outcome, you're still responsible for how you respond.

Your tender heart inspires you to assist those less fortunate, but you may be required to contain your feelings today. Ironically, your current compassion might quickly lead you astray and provide a coworker with easy ammunition to put you in your place. There's nothing wrong with wanting to help others as long as you meet your obligations first. Although it's wise to acknowledge when your timing is off or your actions misguided, don't waste energy apologizing again and again. It's better to just work harder now than it is to harbor unproductive feelings of guilt later on.

Slowing down to take it easy sounds like a good idea today, but reality might still have a surprise or two in store for you. Unfortunately, this isn't the best day to get some rest so you may as well embrace the interruptions instead of attempting to avoid the unexpected. Even if you don't produce anything tangible now, an unplanned detour can ultimately turn a boring day into one you will remember for a long time to come.

Someone might expect you to give a lot of yourself without receiving much in return today. Although you may derive personal satisfaction from your service to others, putting out the effort can take its toll on you. It could feel like you're losing ground, as if the currents are actually carrying you backward now, but this is just a temporary illusion. Thankfully, you know something about being patient. Don't even consider giving up; your persistence will bring rewards soon enough.

You may feel frazzled with the emotional Moon in your sign today; you know something that others don't but you can't say anything about it yet. Perhaps you made a promise to keep quiet. Or maybe the current timing isn't quite right. Stick to your previous decision about what should and shouldn't be shared. Don't be overly concerned now because so many things are in the process of change, anyhow. It may take a while before your boundaries are clear and you have a viable plan in place.

You have more data at your fingertips now than anyone realizes, but you don't have to tell everyone everything you know. Luckily, your current breadth of knowledge is probably sufficient to answer most questions today, but you still may be tempted to push your luck and try to uncover even more. Instead of struggling on your own, be brave and ask for help if you need it. And, when someone offers assistance, accept it graciously with a smile.

There's really no need to worry about what you must do today, for you are at your best when you're just being spontaneous. Although you can quickly become distracted by your cohorts, forget about trying to entertain everyone else for now. For once, just follow the course of least resistance, and let the magic of the day take you wherever it goes. Embrace the unknown; serendipity is your friend.

Many of your acquaintances are looking to you for guidance during these uncertain times, even if you aren't interested in accepting a leadership role now. It isn't that you lack the skills to be an excellent manager; it's just that you might be tired of always having to tell everyone what to do. For a change of pace, cut yourself some slack and do something special just for you. Encouraging self-sufficiency has its benefits for all involved. You can always check back in to see how others are doing later on.

It might seem strange that this weekend isn't even over and you're already dreaming about the next one. On the surface, this type of foresight sounds like a smart idea, but it's rather challenging to totally enjoy what's happening right under your nose when you're thinking about the future. Relax and take time to smell the flowers today. Living in the moment is your fastest route to fun.

An enjoyable interaction may morph into something special as the flirty Gemini Moon aspects the radiant Sun and chatty Mercury today. But you must be willing to shine and play your part in order to see where the relationship goes. If you don't try to connect with others in a deeper way when you're given the opportunity, then you'll never know where it could lead. A friendly smile might be all you need to get the ball rolling.

Concentrating on just one activity at a time today is nearly impossible because you encounter one distraction after another. You might try to convince others that you are being practical now, but your willingness to accept the next invitation -- whatever it is -- proves otherwise. Instead of just jumping at whatever comes along, take time to explore your options with those involved. It's better to know what you're getting into prior to being stuck somewhere you don't want to be. Speak now or forever hold your peace.

It might be quite reassuring today to honor a family tradition or a personally meaningful ritual from the past. You may decide to take a quick trip to see your kids or visit your parents. No matter what you choose to do, try a new and improved approach to the old and familiar. Instead of falling in a rut, break up the drudgery with something that's a lot more fun. Wandering down Memory Lane can be quite a joyful experience.

You could be worried that the weekend will come and go before you can finish what's already on your plate. Unfortunately, slipping into denial won't enable you to sidestep what's heading your way. However, it's more useful to concentrate on the present moment instead of focusing your attention on the future. Scaling back your expectations now gives you extra time to relax and count your blessings.

Although you're sure about what you want now, you might get confused if you don't know exactly how to get it. Today's Gemini Moon stimulates your curiosity and makes the day more interesting, but it also complicates your life. You grow even more conflicted because your head is saying one thing while your heart is tugging in an entirely different direction. Ultimately, you are happiest when you let your conscience be your guide and do what feels right.

You are highly driven to participate in group activities now, yet it's also essential to allow time for quiet contemplation. However, your patience may run thin today and you might remember why you often prefer to work or play alone. It's difficult to express your frustration to others who don't keep up with your pace. Thankfully, your current inclination for solitude goes beyond convenience, so recharge your batteries while you have the chance.

You may not be sure about sharing your feelings today because you don't want to risk the stability you recently created. But withholding crucial information can leave you vulnerable if you have to focus a portion of your mindshare on monitoring everything you say. Make a conscious effort to discuss your fears or your unexpressed emotions will give you away, anyhow. Ultimately, an honest approach is the safest one for everyone involved.

The hectic pace of the past few days should slow down today, giving you time to integrate recent events. Reconsidering your assumptions enables you to switch positions, if necessary. It's like you are playing defense on a baseball field; when something comes your way, you must be ready to catch it. The faster your reflexes are now the faster you can react, giving you extra time to calculate your next move and execute your plan successfully.

You are feeling rather wobbly about your feelings today because your moods seem to be shifting radically from one moment to the next. You want to pour out your heart to a friend or lover now, and yet minutes later you want to crawl into the safety of your secret cave. Ground yourself the best you can and then let the waves gently wash over you. Don't make any long-lasting decisions until your emotions settle down and your clarity returns.

It might seem as if no one really sees who you are, even if you are in plain sight. You don't understand how people can sidestep your point of view as you proudly hold your head high and carry out your assigned task, even while your heart is hurting. A humble disclosure might bring the recognition you seek, even if it makes you feel a bit uncomfortable at first. Oddly enough, others will appreciate your weaknesses as well as your strengths. Shine your light in the dark if you want to get noticed.

You're eager to accept the support of your friends and colleagues today, but moments later you might be pushing them away. Your behavior may seem full of contradictions, but you appreciate the camaraderie, nevertheless. Of course, you can take care of yourself, but nothing is gained by alienating those around you. Soften your stance and let others help you, even if you think you're already doing fine. Celebrating success is more satisfying in the company of those you love.

Tricky emotional currents today might require you to relinquish some of the control you wish you could keep. It may come as a shock that you're not responsible for anyone else's feelings but your own. Don't attempt to fix a situation by making someone more comfortable. Instead, shift the energy and focus on improving yourself. Once you change your automatic response to something more positive, others will begin to do the same.

You are content exploring your emotions in the privacy of your own space today. Your personal security is extremely important to you now and you are happiest wherever you feel safe and sound. Once you are comfortably situated, you can open the floodgates and go anywhere you desire by traveling on the wings of your imagination. Meditating in a sacred place gives you the chance to discover spiritual dimensions you never knew existed before.

Cosmic forces might be bending you out of shape today, encouraging your naturally adventurous personality to adopt a more cautious stance. There's no need to succumb to the pressures of social expectations. You can't please anyone else if you haven't acknowledged your own needs first. Give yourself permission to withdraw until you feel ready to work with others. Make the best of the situation and take this time to reconnect with your heart.

You don't have the time or the patience to babysit a friend or colleague while he or she goes through an emotional meltdown today. Nevertheless, you can still respond in a compassionate manner. Just make sure to establish clear boundaries before you find yourself in over your head. Being aware of your own feelings is healthy, even if their expression doesn't always fit neatly into your schedule.

You might feel as if a relationship crisis is looming, but don't use your personal life as an excuse if you're falling behind at work. Although you may see both sides of a conflict now, it's not worth the effort trying to justify your position. Nevertheless, running away is not the answer either. Instead, retreat only enough to create some space between you and everyone else to reduce your need to escape any further. Focus on what you can control and forget about the rest.

You're slowly drifting away from the crowd today as you hone in on a creative realization that continues to occupy more of your time. Luckily, you should be able to direct this energy toward playful expression, whether for work or your own personal amusement. In either case, having a little fun will ultimately make you more productive in the long run. Let loose and follow your heart.

It may be time to offset serious work with a bit of socializing today, especially if you have been overly ambitious these past few weeks. However, the theme of the day isn't about escapist fun; it's about creating a dynamic network that empowers you to expand your horizons. Hanging out with colleagues or friends is a great idea if it stimulates your dreams of the future. Spread your wings; just make sure you're in supportive company before you take off.

You have high hopes for the week ahead, but you might be hesitant to share your plans until they are more developed. In the meantime, do whatever is required now to fulfill the promises you recently made. But doing your job well isn't your only goal today; you also want to be acknowledged for your contributions. Placing your personal ambitions on hold for a while may be necessary so you can shine while meeting your current responsibilities.

Although you might be motivated to improve your finances today, there's no simple way to achieve the results you want. Nevertheless, what you do now can have a positive impact on your future earnings. Don't let self-doubt prevent you from working on your plan for prosperity. Instead of aiming for immediate satisfaction, a slower and more methodical approach increases your chances for success.

You have a keen intuitive sense of how to handle your feelings today, even if circumstances are a bit complicated. It's quite possible that your emotional needs are not being fully met now by your current relationships, but you might not have better options at this time. Being appreciative of your blessings doesn't mean you need to accept the status quo. Expressing your desires clearly without worrying about the outcome may be enough to set the wheels of satisfaction into motion.

Relationships are a source of delight and frustration these days and your clarity in communication helps to keep things on the positive side of the equation. Although you could make much progress diffusing conflicts today, the underlying problems won't likely be resolved very soon. Even if others don't meet your high standards now, you can still find joy if you accept the love that comes your way. Obviously, you don't need to settle for less than you deserve, but sometimes it helps to remember that everyone's doing the best that they can.

Although you typically come through with whatever is required, attending to the details today might be quite irritating. It may be wise to temporarily set aside your perfectionist tendencies in favor of a more fluid style now. You could receive more help from your friends than you expect, so give yourself permission to delegate some of the tasks on your list. Allowing others to pick up the loose ends works out well for all involved.

You're so eager to express a more artistic side of yourself today that you're willing to do it any way possible. Unfortunately, you might try so hard to be Picasso that you end up with a blank canvas. Instead of attempting to push the river of creativity, it's wiser to just let it flow on its own natural course. Don't worry if the process takes more time than you expect; fill in the hours with unrelated activities that also need to be finished. A relaxed approach is more productive in the long run.

You often prefer flying under the radar. Instead of seeking recognition for your work, you have more freedom if you remain unseen now. But don't waste the independence you have earned; use this time wisely to plan the next phase of your life. There's no need to make any noticeable waves yet. Entertain all possibilities and then narrow down your choices over the next few weeks. The less others know about your upcoming adventures, the better.

There's so much going on in your life right now that it's time to pull the plug on some unnecessary distractions. You might wish you could escape from the noise for a few days, but you must continue to meet your responsibilities. However, you also need to stay connected with the emotional support you receive from your friends and family. Ultimately, balancing the personal and the professional sides of your life boosts your confidence and motivates you to reach for the stars.

Being nurtured by a loved one is good for the soul, although sometimes you're not comfortable with too much dependency. On the other hand, it's tough to come through for someone you love while also taking care of your own needs now. Even if you're currently working on personal issues, it's probably more productive to focus on helping others today. The gratitude you receive could lift your spirits when you need it the most.

You derive great benefit from the power of positive thinking because you are more sensitive now that the responsive Cancer Moon is activating your emotional receptors. You don't have the luxury of doubting your recent decisions or your current capabilities. Instead, put your efforts toward fine-tuning your plans; get your ducks in order so you're ready to fly when the time is right.

You're not in the mood to explain your behavior now; words would only detract from your profound process. You're quite happy today swimming around in deep waters because you feel safer being far out of sight. Luckily, there are metaphysical treasures waiting to be discovered beneath the surface if you're willing to leave language behind. Losing yourself in the feelings and the images can be a magical experience, especially if you take time to remember your dreams and write them down upon your return.

You're ready to let go of an old resentment today because you realize that holding a grudge serves no purpose. You're quite capable of making your coworkers feel at ease, but not if you're pointing your finger in blame at someone else. Your intentions may be altruistic, yet you still might meet a bit of resistance. Give it time; others can't help but soften under the influence of your friendly approach and sincere effort.

You know you have choices to make today, but your goals might not be clear enough to choose a direction. At first your path seems straightforward, but it grows convoluted as you get sidetracked by someone else's feelings. A battle of wills is destructive if you each have your own agenda, but clearing the air can reduce the tension. It's easy to declare your willingness to be flexible now, but you must actually be open to change if you're to jointly decide where you want to go next.

There are still plenty of details to hammer out, but the possibility of resolution continues to grow. Even if you don't have a lot of available options today, you might need to make a decision, nonetheless. Your optimism may be temporarily replaced with annoyance if your responsibilities distract you from having fun. Although life could seem harsh in the moment, don't over-personalize the current situation. Pay attention to what others are telling you and if the feedback makes sense, then take it to heart.

You may have big ideas about what you want to accomplish today, only to realize that you don't have as much energy as you need. Trying to fulfill all your current obligations is stressful because you must work so hard just to keep up with everything. Additionally, your emotions could wear you out now as you grapple with the subtle nuances of your subconscious desires. Setting a sustainable pace right from the start can prevent an unnecessary meltdown. Be kind to everyone, starting with yourself.

You might have to postpone a social activity today because of an important deadline. Perhaps you need to cut back on your expectations now, especially if you discover that your goals are unrealistic. However, there's no need to stress about a missed opportunity if you can't make something happen right away. Instead, accept the limitations of your circumstances, do whatever you can, and move on with a clear conscience.

Rethinking your position on an important matter may be necessary today if you encounter resistance to what you say. However, the discord likely comes from within; you could be your own toughest critic now that your key planet Mercury squares off with taskmaster Saturn. Although your ideas are worthwhile, they still might not seem good enough to you. Unfortunately, if you channel enough energy into your fears, something will undoubtedly go wrong. Instead, improve your attitude and concentrate on creating a positive outcome.

You might feel bounced around by what others are saying now. It appears as if they aren't thinking about the consequences of their words, yet you could end up feeling their negative effects. This drama may be playing out within the workplace today and it seems as if you're being drawn into a no-win situation. However, there is still good news, since your natural willingness to find where differences of opinions turn into common ground can ultimately set the stage for negotiating lasting solutions.

Building on your previous achievements makes much more sense now than starting all over to do something completely new. Luckily, your dreams can be a rich source of inspiration upon which you can build a sensible plan. Don't let anyone talk you out of something that you already know, but they haven't yet learned. Trust your instincts over anyone else's advice to steer you in the right direction today.

Your emotions are intense today, especially if you choose to keep them to yourself. Although you're still fairly optimistic about your future, insecurities creep back into your thoughts as quicksilver Mercury stressfully squares naysayer Saturn. Keep in mind, you can be realistic in your assessment without having a defeatist attitude. All you need to do is believe in yourself and trust the process. Patience is a virtue, especially now.

You may be hiding your wounded feelings today, especially if someone rejects your plan without even hearing you out. You might feel as if obstacles are being placed in your path for no apparent reason until it dawns on you that you have been moving your agenda ahead too fast. In order to accomplish your goals, wait and let circumstances catch up to your dreams of the future. If your new ideas are worthwhile, they'll be even better in a few days.

The pressure to take care of unfulfilled responsibilities has grown stronger in recent days. Unfortunately, you also have to attend to your daily chores, no matter how many exciting ideas you want to pursue today. Reevaluate your workload; perhaps it's time to temporarily cut back on your activities if you are spread too thin. Although you may be judged by your current performance, it's more crucial to be true to yourself now than to live up to the expectations of others.

Although relationships may bring you emotional satisfaction, some of the greatest rewards take longer to manifest. So, whatever you do, don't get discouraged now when it comes to love and creativity, even if progress seems slower than ever. Don't waste energy today complaining about what can't be changed. Instead, work hard to meet your responsibilities so you have sufficient time later on to spend on romantic or artistic pursuits.

You're all set to blast ahead today and you might not give it a second thought if you shoot out of the gate quickly enough. However, taking pause for even just one moment may be all that's needed to send you into a tailspin of self-doubt. Ironically, this bout of uncertainty could be the best thing that happens. Fortunately, your detour won't last long, and it can open your eyes to alternative courses of action that ultimately prove to be smarter than your first choice. Don't rush your decision; you have more time than you think.

Demonstrating your affection for your friends is a lovely gesture today, but grandiose acts of generosity might reveal more about your insecurities than you wish. Try not to go overboard in your attempt to get your feelings across. However, you can't worry about how others respond to you now; your analysis could backfire if you attempt to outthink them. Instead, keep it simple and just lead with your heart.

Your quick wit is more likely to get you into trouble today than charm anyone or solve an existing problem. You are able to think faster now that your mind can slip in and out of alternate realities without others even noticing. But sloppy logic hijacks your day if you don't take the time to separate your fantasies from the real world. There's nothing wrong with dreaming a little dream as long as you know when to wake up and deal with the truth.

You may be surfing on a wave of adrenaline that carries you outside of your comfort zone today. When you finally realize how far you've traveled, a secondary current of excitement can transport you even farther from your usual place of safety. Fortunately, once you push through your initial fear, you might be surprised at how easy it is to say what's on your mind and take things to the next level. Don't hurry the process; you are laying the groundwork for what's to come over the next couple of months.

There's no reason to stifle your roar now because everyone already knows how you are feeling. Although you won't reveal any shocking news today, the intensity of your pent-up anger still might catch others off guard. But their discomfort with your message is not your problem. However, with the Moon back in your expressive sign, it's simply your job to reflect the truth as you perceive it. Just remember that there are many ways to frame the same situation, so don't assume that you have a corner on all the answers.

You have plenty to say today, but you might end up deciding that it's better to wait a few days before sharing your thoughts. Taking time to consider a variety of options makes sense, but it's also wise to observe what happens next before you commit to a specific path. You may be feeling confident right now, but navigating the shifting currents requires a soft touch and the willingness to readjust your course as needed.

Your friends and colleagues may be planning something in the next few days that sounds like a lot of fun to you. You would love to join them, but previous commitments could complicate your schedule. Nevertheless, what seems like an irresolvable conflict at first might be the catalyst for an overdue discussion and a much-needed change. Don't say no before you try to figure out how to balance work with play.

It really doesn't matter what you're feeling today; the show must go on regardless. Maybe you have been withholding your thoughts and are finally ready to express them now; however, this may not be the best moment to let down your guard. You have a specific role to play at work and in some ways it is the same as giving a performance. Act like a true professional and demonstrate your competence. Wait to share what's on your mind for a more appropriate time when you have an appreciative audience.

Your feelings are irrepressible today and you're ready to shout your truth from the rooftops. Even if you are very sensitive to others now, you still won't be able to withhold your opinions. Although you really don't mean to upset anyone, your direct communication style can seem abrasive. You don't have to alter the content of your message; you just need a bit of finesse in your delivery style.

You are intrigued by the power of your actions now and may go out of your way to agitate complex emotions that escalate a situation into a conflict. However, your strategy won't likely bring you any closer to your goals, and it could even damage a close relationship. Don't toy with someone's feelings just to satisfy your own curiosity. Instead, discussing your plans for the future can set the stage for real progress while also increasing the level of intimacy.

Someone new may enter your life now that the affectionate Leo Moon is visiting your 7th House of Partnerships. Or, perhaps, an old business or personal relationship might be rekindled. In either situation, it seems as if hidden forces are at work, turning a normal event into something very special. Don't try to make logical sense out of everything that happens today. Just keep your heart open to the possibilities and watch the magic unfold.

Everything keeps looking bigger and better, yet it seems as if the reward is always just around the next bend. However, this time it really is waiting for you, assuming you are diligently working toward your goals. Although it's easy to believe you're fooling yourself, your extra efforts are very likely being noticed by someone who matters. Continue doing the best job possible without vying for any special attention. Remember, what goes around comes around, so don't give up now when the end of the rainbow is so close.

Focusing on the present moment is challenging today because you may be so concerned about your future. Ironically, a recollection of something in your past might be more of a problem than whatever actually happens next. Thankfully, this confusing detour down Memory Lane can be a significant learning experience. Trust in the intelligence of now, rather than obsessing on unresolved feelings left over from your sentimental journey.

You may grow so preoccupied with one single idea that it's nearly impossible for anyone to get you to talk about anything else. Nevertheless, following others is a smart move now since they will lead you in a positive direction. Voluntarily minimizing the importance of your own thoughts is a wise tactic today and makes you more accessible to your friends and coworkers. You currently gain more through cooperation than you possibly can on your own.

You're willing to let go of your worries and dream your troubles away today, but you are also concerned about leaving loose ends untied. Unfortunately, your lack of responsibility may be an all-too-familiar theme for you. Nevertheless, this is a great opportunity to learn from your past mistakes. Forget about recreational activities until you wrap up your unfinished business. It's much easier to enjoy yourself once you have done the right thing and demonstrated your dependability.

The power of positive thought gets you off to a great start today, but you must follow up with good old-fashioned hard work. Complete all of your chores so you're able to fully enjoy the pleasures that you so richly deserve. Even if you plan a quiet evening at home, give yourself the time and space to imagine the positive changes that you want to experience in the near future. There aren't many reasons to restrain your creative vision now; if you can visualize it, chances are you can make it happen.

You thought that you would be ready to make a major move today, but instead you grow more contemplative as the day wears on. You know that you should be thankful for the stable ground in your life these days, but you also are aware of those obstacles that block your progress. Nevertheless, there's no need to focus on what's wrong; concentrate on all those things that you could be doing to continue your personal growth. Slow and steady change wins out in the long run.

You might try to hide your true intentions today. Even if you're sure about your feelings, you still don't like the idea of others knowing your secrets. However, withholding information could be a serious waste of energy now, especially since your peers probably know more than you realize. Including your inner circle in your plans isn't as much of a risk as it seems. In fact, if you are willing to listen to the feedback offered, you may receive valuable advice from an unexpected source.

You're tempted to express yourself in an outrageous manner today, but your common sense ultimately prevents you from going too far. If you feel resistance to your efforts to do your own thing, go ahead and fall back on your charm and grace. Be true to yourself now while also keeping your mind open to different perspectives. Relinquish your control for a little while and go along with others for the sake of group harmony.

If you keep to yourself today, you may end up wishing you took a more social route. Breaking out of your shell requires extra effort on your part; but once you push past your own resistance, you might truly enjoy the company of others. Luckily, there's no need to hide your emotions or temper your desires now. Trust your instincts to pick just the right moment to share your feelings. Timing is everything when it comes to matters of the heart.

If you're buzzing around like a busy bee today, you might be too distracted to fully appreciate the camaraderie of your friends and associates. Nevertheless, there's a solid support system in place, ready to carry you to the next level if only you would let it. Allowing yourself to be vulnerable with those you trust can prove to be the exact catalyst you need. Slow down and smell the flowers right in your own backyard.

You are taking your responsibilities quite seriously now as the Sun trines your ruling planet, somber Saturn. It may feel as if you're immersed in projects, yet you're also eager to face the new challenges ahead. Nevertheless, you're still committed to finishing the jobs you have already started. Be patient as you build on your accomplishments and wait for the opportunities to reap the rewards. Your work ethic is a shining inspiration to everyone around you.

Other people may motivate you to start something new now, but you need to be willing to change and grow so you can maximize the current opportunities. This transformational process becomes a lot more challenging if you're unable to let go of the past. Don't cling too tightly to the status quo or you won't be able to take advantage of the amazing possibilities that are right in front of you. Open your mind and embrace the future.

You can learn a valuable lesson today by stopping to reevaluate your recent history. Paradoxically, your review process might also stimulate your anticipation of the future. Your life begins to take on a greater meaning as you see social systems bending under the pressure of change. Meanwhile, you're committed to finding stability in the midst of transition, even if you don't yet know how you will manage it. Don't worry too much about the details; you can't get lost if you follow your intuition.

There is a contagious enthusiasm to your energy today, yet periodically you may sink into the cooler waters of isolationism. Fortunately, your energy level is high between these momentary bouts of discouragement, so make the most of your positive attitude while you're feeling optimistic. Balance your need for relationship security with your desire to express unusual feelings without restraint. Give those who love you a chance to accept you just the way you are.

Jumping into the wild seas of unrepressed thoughts isn't as dangerous as it sounds as long as you put on a life jacket. Taking precautions prepares you for almost anything that might come your way now. You won't drown, but you may be carried off course by the storms of experience today. Use your common sense to keep your head above water. Taking care of yourself opens up the possibility of helping others that need it, allowing you to save the day.

You could set the world afire today with your clever thoughts and winning charisma. Sometimes, your adaptable personality works well for you and sometimes it doesn't. However, you must stay conscious of your intentions now or you can lay your charm on too thick. It's easier to exert self-control early in the game than to start something that you cannot stop. It's up to you to find the fine line between superficial and sincere.

Emotional encounters stir up repressed feelings while the Moon is in your sign. Still, you're not interested in sitting in a corner brooding; nor do you want to withdraw from interpersonal engagements today. You have things to do now and people to see. Your day may not go according to plan, so don't try to hold onto your previous schedule just to prove a point. You can maintain inner stability and increase your sense of security if you are willing to change with the outer dynamics.

You are wise to tread lightly today, since whatever you do will probably still create quite a noticeable impact. Unconscious patterns can overtake your day while circumstances grow out of control pretty quickly. Find someone you can trust with your deepest secrets. Unwrap your buried feelings, for they only bring you sorrow when they stay deep within. Act with courage but be gentle with your heart.

At first, you think that your day will unfold according to your plans, but unfortunately it's just not going to be that simple. Too much intensity is floating around in the atmosphere and the energy needs to go somewhere. But even with a surprise or two, you can keep things relatively under control. In fact, if you embrace the unexpected, you could turn the liability of uncertainty into a viable asset.

A great idea temporarily lured you into the stratosphere but now reality has brought you back down to earth. However, your energy level is still running strong and you are psyched for whatever comes next. Considering how high-strung you are these days, it's amazing that you can be so practical in your approach. Oddly enough, the more grounded you remain, the easier it becomes to express yourself in new and exciting ways. Find your center and see what happens.

Although you may not feel like you're a rock of stability today, there's a certain peace in knowing that you are free enough from tradition to embrace your unique idea of the future. It might seem as if you're walking a tightrope between the new and the old, but you make it look so easy now that others will respect the path you choose to travel. Take a few deep breaths, don't look down and just keep moving forward. Believe in yourself and others will follow.

Practical concerns require you to downplay your craziest plans now, while also acknowledging that your wild dreams are not going away. You may talk about your fantasies as you imagine your future, but don't place too much stock in anything that lacks a solid foundation or you might regret it. Ultimately, the most pragmatic approach to a radical idea will steer you in the right direction.

Strong feelings arise as relationship dynamics shift unexpectedly and you may choose to share them instead of biting your tongue. If you are experiencing conflict with others at work today, it's best to roll with the punches instead of fighting back. Something big is about to change, and it can alter the way others see you. Try not to anticipate what's about to happen. Just allow the situation to unfold naturally without attempting to fix the outcome. Time is on your side.

There may be so much going on at work today that it can be rather distracting. Nevertheless, you might enjoy all the activity as quicksilver Mercury activates your key planet Uranus. If life becomes overwhelming, keep in mind that the intensity will not last more than a few days. You have the potential for great originality as long as you don't try to avoid the noise. Genius is often born out of chaos.

Although you may wish you could remain invisible in a crowd today, you will still be noticed by your admirers. Others may see you as more passionate than you really feel now. You are running on intuitive energy and there is no limit to what you can do as long as you can imagine it. You will be happier if you pay less attention to everyone's expectations and listen to the signs of your heart, instead. Tune out the distractions, and channel your creativity into your art.

Your desires pull you in many directions today, yet you are determined to settle on the most practical one. Although your final decision might not be your first choice, your need for efficiency grows throughout the day. But making up your mind isn't easy because circumstances tempt you with pleasurable distractions. Remember, you can do the right thing and still have fun if you set your mind to it.

A romantic attraction could hijack your day, but it might not be all fun and games because love comes with a price today. You may even feel rattled as if you're on an emotional roller coaster. Nevertheless, you need to stop for a moment to catch your breath and consider how to best meet your needs. Paradoxically, your willingness to relinquish control of the details can bring you the satisfaction you seek.

Your desires may lure you into realms of your imagination today that can't be comprehended by logic. Unfortunately, you need to rationally understand what's going on could lead to a frustrating dead-end. You find it challenging to restrict your thoughts or limit your feelings now. Of course, having valid information at your fingertips is useful, but it's time to let go of your intellectual safety net and move into an unfamiliar world that is beyond words and reason.

You love the idea of embarking on an adventure of the senses today and might even receive encouragement from your friends. However, interactions with others can stimulate powerful emotions, which in turn amplify your desires. Luckily, you don't have to worry about setting limits because something holds you back and prevents you from going too far. Enjoy your current experience for what it is, without trying to define its long-term significance. Perspective will come in due time.

Staying nice may be tricky when you are also trying to be real. The good news is your passions are aroused and you feel strongly enough to share them. However, others might not want to hear what you are saying, for your position could very well be upsetting to them. For now, don't worry too much about the consequences as long as you continue to speak your truth and come from a place of love.

Relaxing and enjoying a little downtime can be difficult today when you have so much work on your plate. Although you can't avoid your responsibilities, you might be able to successfully escape for a while today if you are willing to limit your playtime. Unfortunately, overindulging won't be tolerated, especially if you let someone down by failing to fulfill your promises. On the other hand, taking a bit of time for yourself is rejuvenating and gives you the extra energy you will need in the days ahead.

You may want to have a quiet day at home without doing much at all, but your reverie will likely be interrupted by circumstances beyond your control. Fortunately, these unexpected twists and turns can actually add excitement to your life. Anything that surprises you by altering your regular routine brings you unexpected joy today. Don't be so rigid in your behavior that you miss out on the potential fun knocking at your door.

The emotional currents are wild as your two key planets, intense Pluto and impetuous Mars, take you on a bumpy ride. You're not completely in control today and you won't be able to fend off the surprises by solely relying on cool logic. Instead of fighting against the changes, you're better off jumping right into the rapid flow. Pay attention to every moment as if nothing else matters and you could be rewarded with an incredible ride and a memorable experience.

You are basking in the spotlight of recognition today, whether or not you have asked for all the current attention. There is a part of you that uncharacteristically might choose to work and play in the shadows now, for you realize that the best magic sometimes occurs out of sight. Nevertheless, your explorations can be most meaningful if you let someone else control the variables. An unexpected blast of light at the right moment may be exactly what you need.

You are not interested in superficial social activities unless they directly further your personal ambitions. You don't really want to be part of the group scene now, although social obligations might impose upon you anyhow. Fortunately, you can have the best of both worlds by limiting the number of people you encounter today. It's really quite simple; interact with those around you when you must, and then kick back to enjoy your solitude when you get the chance.

Finding free time can be quite challenging today, even if you were planning on taking the day off. However, energetic Mars is fueling artistic Venus in your sign now, and you may not have too much of a chance to rest, especially if you're on a creative jag. Nothing is gained by trying to stick to your original plan. You must be ready when inspiration strikes; if the muse comes for a visit, invite her in.

Everyone around you seems particularly picky today, as if nothing you do is good enough. However, your current lack of confidence might be negatively coloring your perceptions of others. Instead of assuming that you are letting anyone down, accept their feedback as constructive criticism now. No one wants you to fail; in fact, just the opposite. Your allies may be hard on you only because they want you to succeed. Count yourself lucky if your friends care so much.

Your lack of patience messes with your plans today. You have good intentions while the Virgo Full Moon illuminates your 6th House of Daily Routine, reflecting your desire to finish your chores. But boredom sets in quickly as the Sun irritates action-hero Mars. However, it's not time to leave your current schedule behind, even if your visions of escaping are hard to resist. Don't let go of your dreams; just relegate them to the back burner for now. You can explore ways to break free once your commitments are fulfilled and your desk is clear.

Playing the role of the hopeless romantic could catalyze the chemistry within an existing relationship today or have you searching for a new one as the picky Virgo Full Moon lights up your 5th House of Love and Creativity. However, an over-analytical approach might prevent you from reaching your goals. Don't assume you know the best way to achieve happiness now. Your willingness to shift gears helps you accommodate the demands of the changing social landscape.

You normally make promises with the intent of keeping them, but today may not be a normal day. Your emotions could be at odds with other people's expectations now as the Virgo Full Moon floods your 4th House of Foundations. Something might not go exactly as you planned, giving you a bit of explaining to do. But instead of trying to rationalize your reactions, just concentrate on improving the current situation. Focus your attention on being practical and save the philosophical analysis for another day.

Your long-term goals start to shift today, leaving you floundering with uncertainty as you approach the next workweek. The Virgo Full Moon lands in your 3rd House of Information, filling your day with so many distractions that it's difficult to follow through with your previous commitments. However, changing your schedule might not be worth the stress; just do what you promised as best as you can. In the meantime, let others know what you're thinking. Putting your thoughts out on the table shakes up the dynamics and enables you to move on.

You may be particularly hard on yourself today, even if you receive emotional support from others through their kind words and praise. Still, you're tempted to ignore everyone's optimism because the critical Virgo Full Moon occupies your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, precipitating a crisis if you begin to doubt your own assumptions. Don't make things more complicated than they already are; just employ the healthiest strategy possible based upon the positive feedback you hear. For a change, follow someone else's lead and your confidence will return before you know it.

How you are able to function with so much intense energy in your environment today could be a mystery, yet your satisfaction depends upon finding sensible solutions to the current problems. Today's Full Moon in your exacting sign overwhelms your analytical approach with waves of subjective feelings. Nevertheless, don't try to force any issues now. When others see how graceful you perform under pressure, they will continue to support you, whether or not you ask for their help.

You might be feeling a bit discouraged today because you don't have a plan to shake off your negative energy. You want to come clean and start anew, but sharing your worries may be difficult because the Virgo Full Moon is shining in your 12th House of Secrets. Paradoxically, the more you try to express your buried feelings now, the less sense you make. It's as if you're chasing your shadow. Don't try so hard; just relax and let things unfold organically. Adopt a position of gratitude. Your happiness may be waiting around the very next corner.

You feel spiritually refreshed and hope to take the fastest route to success now. However, hard work is still the most reliable way to get what you want. Today's Virgo Full Moon brightens your 11th House of Aspirations and activates your dreams. Forget about the ingenious ideas and clever shortcuts; stick to the tried and true methods if you want to reach your highest potential.

Although you may see yourself as an instigator today, you might not be causing as much trouble as you think. The earthy Virgo Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Status, giving you the impetus to dig in your heels and make a public statement based on your newfound sensible approach to life. You're not interested in turning everything upside down now; you just want to make steady progress toward your long-term goals. Your drive and determination are an inspiration to others.

Set aside your impractical dreams of traveling around the world now that the pragmatic Virgo Full Moon rattles your 9th House of Adventure. Fortunately, you should be able to keep your mind on your work with a bit of conscious effort and wrap things up early today. Rather than flying off to a foreign land, try studying its culture or learning its language, instead. You may end up discovering there are many constructive ways to feed your wanderlust besides leaving town.

A heated interaction with someone who doesn't appear to have your best interests in mind could be motivated by fear today. The Virgo Full Moon falls in your 8th House of Deep Sharing and you might be afraid that others are trying to control you for reasons you don't understand. Fortunately, your current concerns will probably fade quickly, but you're still better off investigating further to ameliorate any lingering doubt. Be cautious in negotiations; remember, a lack of finality now won't necessarily slow you down in the long run.

You exist as a part of the greater whole, since the entire school is more important than any one fish in it. Today's Virgo Full Moon highlights your 7th House of Others, reflecting the great paradox for you sensitive Fish. You must stand up for yourself by expressing your individuality. However, you also need to stay connected to the universal spirit that flows through everyone. The key to your current success is finding a middle path by practicing moderation in everything you do.

People seem to be going out of their way to be extra nice to you today, but their actions might not have the impact they expect. Even if you appreciate their efforts, you find it difficult to trust the motives of others, making it difficult to receive their gifts with an open mind. However, your fears may be more of a statement about you than anyone else. But you don't need to go to extremes and ignore all your concerns. Being aware of your own resistance allows you to see the best in everyone.

You approach your duties with an optimistic attitude today, assuming your most sincere efforts will produce positive results. Unfortunately, tangible production could fall short of your intentions because other people don't seem as industrious as you are now. You may try to gain efficiency by working on your own, but this option might not be a viable one. Don't be too concerned about losing ground; no one will fault you if you're doing the best job you can.

Concentrating on your chores may be an uphill battle today because you would rather be amusing yourself doing just about anything else. Although you might be able to successfully pull off a quick escape now, you won't likely have enough time to indulge in the pleasures you seek. But be careful; if you choose fun over work, it's quite possible you will get caught and then have to pay the price for being irresponsible. It's not worth trading long-term satisfaction for short-term pleasure.

You're lost in your own thoughts now and you can make yourself seem so invisible that others don't even notice your temporary self-absorption. You're capable of keeping up appearances today while also creating extra time to reflect on personal issues. But sustaining this type of duality is exhausting. If your temper grows short, take a break from your contemplation and channel your energy into something more tangible.

You might be quite the diplomat today, voluntarily placing yourself in the middle of a conflict because you believe you can help. However, you may be quite annoyed that others are wasting time arguing when you just want to steer them into a more harmonious place. Your current strength comes from the fact that you aren't willing to take sides now, so listen to every individual's story while focusing on the common ground and not the differences. Let your natural generosity of spirit be your guide.

Your power of concentration is one of your strengths, but today might be an exception to the rule. You may have your share of details to manage, yet your mind can be rather uncooperative now. Don't set yourself up for failure by trying to accomplish too much. Instead, give yourself permission to waste a bit of time in idle fantasy. Your dreams inspire you to reach your potential in the long run.

A combination of cosmic influences encourages you to join the party today, even if you know better. Thankfully, you have no problem now thinking one way while acting another. But even if you are comfortable with this inconsistency, it still could be stressful for others -- especially if your indulgent actions affect them negatively. Oddly enough, turning down the invitation and being responsible ultimately brings you the most satisfaction. There are many roads that can lead to joy as long as your heart is in the right place.

You might feel as if an era is coming to a close, yet you're not quite ready to step into the next one yet. You may even be somewhat disoriented as you try to figure out where you are going. Although you can be uncomfortable when there are too many loose ends, it still could take a while longer before you get the closure that you need. Be patient while walking in both worlds; this transformation is a work in progress.

Staying present in the here and now can be challenging if you can't take your mind off the myriad of possibilities ahead. But all your weighing and judging won't make the future any more certain. Ironically, the more you ponder the decisions you must make, the muddier they seem. Nevertheless, it's still better to initiate some action today than to continue endless rounds of analysis.

Career issues are in the spotlight today, but your frustration might build as you find it increasingly difficult to resolve a current dilemma. It seems as if everyone is telling you to make your choice, but you may see validity to more than one possible path. Even if you feel anxious under the pressure, don't succumb to the outside influence of individuals with a special interest. Stick to your position of neutrality for a while longer with as much grace as you can muster.

You may feel the stress nearly everywhere you turn today, but oddly enough you seem to be unaffected by the noisy drama playing out around you. However, this doesn't mean that you are sailing along without any worries at all. Simply stated, you're in your airy element now and you can clearly discern what's happening in your immediate environment, enabling you to react efficiently. There's no room for self-doubt; just follow your instincts and you won't go wrong.

Your intuition allows you to perceive things that are extrasensory. Unfortunately, you could fall into your own trap today by allowing your desires to fill in the missing details as you stare into a foggy landscape. It's better to acknowledge what you can't see and leave it at that. But you're tempted to dream up a best-case scenario, project it onto your perceptions and then confuse your fantasy with reality. Being aware of your feelings can prevent your preferences from leading you astray.

Although everyone seems to be doing their best to keep you calm now, you're not interested in placating anyone else. Unfortunately, sharing your hidden desires can be shocking to others, and certainly more complicated than just telling them what they expect to hear. Sometimes being direct is a good idea, but today it may make sense to take a more gentle approach. There are many ways to express your unconventional nature; however, you might have to do it alone.

Your nerves are on edge today as electric Uranus cranks up the volume on your key planet Venus. But rather than trying to contain your erratic energy, you can transform an awkward situation into one that brings a smile to your face. This is your chance to make the positive changes you want. Don't resist the adrenaline rush; ride it for all it's worth.

A sudden bolt of lightning turns your workplace upside down today. Even if the commotion adds unsolicited chaos to your life, it might turn out to be the best thing that could happen. Buried tensions are being released now, unblocking your creativity. No matter what occurs, express your inner artist however you can. An unexpected series of circumstances may just magically morph into an opportunity for personal growth.

New ideas pop into your head today but no matter how much you like them they might not fit into your long-range plans. Although you usually choose safety and security over the unknown experience of an adventure, you are more than ready to take a risk now. The potential payoff seems to justify any discomfort you might encounter along the way. Don't bother trying to rationalize your desires; just act on them. Follow your bliss and don't look back.

If you recently gambled your heart, things might not be working out quite the way you hoped they would. But the energy is shifting and you have reason to believe that your efforts could still pay off. Don't give up; continue to express your emotions as honestly as possible. You can best take advantage of the current dynamics by exploring your feelings without worrying about where they lead. Happily, you may be pleasantly surprised with where you end up.

A close friend or romantic partner might catch you off guard today with his or her reckless actions. Or, perhaps you receive an unexpected invitation to participate in something you have never done before. Although you tend to be highly refined in your tastes and cautious in love, this is your opportunity to step beyond your own limitations. You won't ever know what was possible unless you break the rules, throw away the map and explore uncharted territory.

Your work schedule may be disrupted today and there doesn't seem to be much you can do other than quickly adapt to the changes as they occur. Remaining flexible now means the difference between experiencing professional satisfaction and facing a temporary setback. If something happens out of the blue, just respond like the resilient willow tree; bend like a branch in the winds of change.

Your creative genius surges today, enabling you to express your originality and brilliance -- as long as you don't try too hard. Paradoxically, the more you attempt to force the process, the less likely you are to succeed at making magic. You are being offered an important lesson in spontaneity; connect with your muse and let your inner child out to play.

You are often the one who starts the party or plans the big adventure, but you might try to focus on more serious endeavors in spite of all the distractions today. Even if you can tame the wild energies that are running rampant, your real nemesis could be your own unexpressed desires. Whatever remains hidden now has the potential to create unexpected conflict, so get past your fears and share what's in your heart.

You're doing your best to keep everything at work on a fairly even keel today, but contradictory thoughts and feelings somehow still slip through your defenses and rattle your professional world. Instead of overcompensating by reverting back to a familiar agenda, find comfort in the current ambiguity. Expand your horizons by exploring options you might otherwise pass by. Even if you don't like the uncertainty at first, being flexible with your plans now increases your chances for success.

The winds of fate are blowing up a major storm now in your 2nd House of Self-Worth, so prepare for a possible windfall. On the other hand, the upcoming shift could leave you wondering what happened, with less money in your bank account than you prefer. Either way, the changes are likely to be swift as they alter your fiscal condition. Shaking up the energy could ultimately work in your favor if you're ready to settle down and take of business.

Tell others exactly what you want, even if it's not what they wish to hear today. In fact, if you blast open the communication channels, you have a better chance of receiving your heart's true desire. However, you can easily shock someone with your weird ideas. Lay the groundwork carefully while discussing your feelings in order to allow everyone else room to draw their own conclusions. Being true to yourself now encourages others to do the same.

You aren't interested in small talk today because you are more intrigued by people's hidden agendas rather than what appears on the surface. Although words come to you easily now, you might want to avoid using too many of them because they could dissipate your energy. Don't let anyone lure you into a philosophical discussion; however, fascinating it may be -- unless the topic furthers your search for truth. Expand your horizons and deepen your understanding of what's happening in your world while you have the chance.

You might have to respond to a surprising change of circumstances today but, fortunately, you see this unexpected twist of fate in a positive light. You have sufficient stamina to deal with nearly anything that crosses your path, along with an intuitive sense to know when to be patient. Trust your gut reactions and don't let analysis override your feelings. Rely on your heart instead of your brain for the best outcome now.

Although you like to have a plan in place, you often reserve the right to change your mind up to the very last moment. Sometimes coworkers don't understand your reasons for modifying your priorities, but there's almost always sound logic to your thinking. Nevertheless, make certain that you're not just taking the easy way out now. If your new and improved strategy is really better, there's no reason to hesitate or waste time justifying your actions to everyone else. You don't need to prove anything to anyone but yourself.

You may startle yourself today because of your sudden willingness to take a risk. However, gambling on a sure thing might be a smart move, even if others attempt to convince you that you're making a mistake. Unfortunately, inaction could carry a different type of consequences. The fear of personal failure isn't as motivational as the possible regret of not trying at all. Overcome your internal resistance and follow your heart.

You may uncover previously untapped resources today if you're willing to fully commit to a single goal. However, it's necessary to move beyond your doubts and acknowledge that you are serious about what you want. If you're unsure of your objectives, it's wiser to wait a day or two so you can sort things out. In the meantime, don't be afraid to stubbornly hold your ground, even if you feel a big change is looming just around the corner. Only you will know when the time is right.

Choosing whether or not to go ahead with your plans is tricky because the pros and cons are pretty evenly balanced now. However, if you finally decide against pushing ahead today, you could surprise yourself by impulsively taking the next step anyway. Exercise reasonable caution; if you initiate action prematurely, you might just have to start all over next week. Doing a bit more research is a better use of your time and energy.

Upsetting the status quo isn't normally your favorite thing to do, but you might actually reconsider a radical idea that inspires you today. You are intrigued by strategies to spice up a relationship that has become entrenched in routine. Unfortunately, you'll never know if they work if you don't try them at least once. Think outside of the box; you can always return to your old ways if your new approach doesn't work out.

A creative strategy to solving a problem could lead to success on the job or, at least, recognition by your coworkers. This feels like an exciting time, but you must establish a steady and sustainable pace to make the most of it. Although you're full of bright ideas now, it isn't helpful to make a one-time big splash. Save your flashy presentations for some other day; instead, impress others by demonstrating your ability to complete whatever you start.

You might be able to get away with mischievous behavior today because others are likely to admire your edgy attitude. The Sun's last day in imaginative Pisces allows your philosophical nature to shine through for everyone to see. Thankfully, your willingness to risk your stability to do things your way shows your intent to succeed without sacrificing your integrity. You can still be a nonconformist while doing what's right.

You're riding a growing wave of emotions that is motivating you to take action today. However, it may be smarter to slow down now or you could squander a rare opportunity to share your success. Being an inspirational leader can be challenging  if you're too eager to reach your destination. Don't just race ahead of those who should be following you; instead, set a pace that allows everyone to be a part of the process.

Hiding your intentions from others is nearly impossible today with the emotional Moon's presence in your 10th House of Status. Even if you think it's a good idea to keep your feelings quiet, a surprising turn of events may require you to think on your feet while including others in your decision-making process. Sharing your dreams requires courage; however, exposing your vulnerability now removes unnecessary boundaries between you and your peers, cultivating an atmosphere of mutual admiration and respect.

Even if your feelings make total sense to you now, there still might be trouble if you tell someone what you really want. A misunderstanding could occur if you become so enthusiastic about your current strategy that you just bounce from one thought to another. A better approach is to work quietly toward your goals today while waiting to share your overall plan until you develop it further. Give yourself some time to breathe and others will be more eager to support your endeavors.

You are impatient to start something new, but it makes sense to moderate your impulses now. The Sun's month-long visit to your sign boosts your vitality and provokes you to strike while the iron is hot. But instead of wasting energy on an unsuitable venture, think twice before you cannot undo what you've done. If it still seems like a good idea after some serious thought, then methodically proceed with your plan. After all, it is your time to shine.

You are feeling conflicted today because sharing your ideas with others is the next logical step in your journey. Nevertheless, something tells you that it's wiser to keep things to yourself a while longer. But your current introversion isn't about the fear of being seen; it's just that you still have some important spiritual processing to do. Don't be overly concerned if someone accuses you of being stubborn; you're actually more eager for change now than usual. Take whatever time you need to feel safe enough before coming out of your shell.

Although you rarely lack for things to do, the Sun's entry into your 11th House of Friends today marks an even busier social month ahead. You are less interested in working hard to get ahead now than enjoying the camaraderie of your buddies and coworkers. Instead of jumping through hoops to be noticed, relax and blend into the group. There's no need to stir up any more trouble than is necessary. The connections you cultivate are crucial keys to your success.

You're ready to swing into action today without any prior reflection on what you're about to do. Ironically, this spontaneous behavior goes against your typically reticent nature, but it's a tough day to wait patiently for a sign to start. Ultimately, you may choose to restrain yourself, but you still might experience frustration if you don't express your feelings one way or the other. Be open to acting out of character, for the alternatives will continue to look better as the day goes on.

Last year's unfulfilled ambitions begin to fade away today as the Sun's entry into your 9th House of Big Ideas draws you into the future. However, this cosmic turning point isn't about defeat; you don't have the luxury of focusing on failure. Let go of the past and start looking toward the successes ahead. Although it may take some time to feel as if you're gaining ground, don't lose faith if you really want to reach your destination.

You might be wondering if your coworkers and friends are supporting your efforts now or if they're just pacifying you with approving nods. Unfortunately, you won't necessarily know if someone is currently working against your progress. However, it may be a waste of time and energy trying to figure it out, anyway. Just be patient and wait until you're given the green light. In the meantime, it's more important to enjoy yourself while working toward your goals today than it is to reach them.

Libra is the relationship sign and you are likely drawn toward working and playing with others more than most. But a friend or partner might suggest that it's time to do something on your own today. Don't think of this as a rejection; there's probably nothing personal about it at all. It's just part of the evolution of any long-term connection. Once you reestablish your own center, it will be even more fruitful to reunite and share your experiences with each other later on.

Seeing so many options in front of you while realizing that your path has already been chosen is frustrating now. But even a slight improvement in the weather could be enough of a reason to set responsibilities aside and go out to play. Unfortunately, the timing isn't right because you cannot escape your obligations today. Anyway, you'll be able to have more fun later once your work is done and your conscience is clear.

You're probably quite pleased with yourself now because your creative energy is running so strong. It's easier than ever to express yourself however you may choose today. But something still prevents you from having as much fun as you expected. Letting go of previous assumptions might help, yet the ultimate solution comes with time. There's no need to be in such a hurry; slow down so you can truly appreciate the present moment.

You don't react well to someone leaning on you to make a quick decision. In fact, you could become downright argumentative if you have to defend your right to move at your own speed, rather than follow another person's arbitrary schedule. However, turning this difference of opinion into an open conflict is not a smart idea and won't bring you any closer to your heart's desire. Loosen up; exercising flexibility in response to external demands can flip a difficult situation around to your advantage.

You may find yourself juggling conflicting agendas today. You need some downtime and might think that working on your own is the smartest way to get it. But you don't want to miss your chance to learn from the people in your immediate environment. Unfortunately, there's no way to be alone and with others simultaneously. You can, however, benefit from the best of both worlds if you alternate your approach throughout the day. Stealing a few minutes at a time could be all you need to take care of your personal matters.

It might appear as if others are just beginning their big projects, yet you already started yours a while back. Take your efforts to the next level by creating more structure in your life. This could involve a unique approach to allocating your time. Instead of focusing on an inspirational or creative process, increase productivity by prioritizing your tasks and then doing them methodically, one after another. It's time to make your dreams come true.

On one hand, your reality can mysteriously blend with fantasy today, making it hard to tell the difference. On the other hand, the Moon's move into fiery Sagittarius rejuvenates your spirit and inspires you to think big. Your energy is irrepressible, even if you don't know exactly where you're going. Patience serves you better now than blindly pushing ahead; you don't have to act on every whim unless you want to stir up trouble.

The wide-open spaces in front of you may be a bit daunting because it's nearly impossible to know which opportunities make the most sense now. Fortunately, you can rely on your friends and colleagues for the guidance you need today. Listen to what they have to say, even if you aren't sure that they truly understand your interests. You can greatly benefit from the wisdom of experience if you remain open to the helpful advice. Just remember that the final choice is still yours to make.

You might not run into any obstacles today, yet slowing down is a wise strategy anyhow. Emotional issues can present problems, even in the most cooperative relationships. You may feel as if you are split in two, with your heart telling you one thing now while circumstances require you to act differently. Don't try to solve the dilemma yet; just be aware of the source of stress. Taking full responsibility for your own feelings makes it easier for everyone involved.

Even if you have been a bit too anxious recently, you may feel the soothing waves of contentment wash up on your shores today. Somehow, you can see the whole picture more clearly now and you're happy to do anything that fits into the larger plan. Unfortunately, you could get caught up in the excitement, committing to more than you're able to deliver. Taking careful baby steps is a better approach than running too fast and falling down.

Although you might attempt to remain confident today, you continue to gain awareness of complex feelings that you were hiding from yourself. Perhaps you remember a particular event from your childhood or maybe someone shares a deep secret with you. Either way, you probably feel more vulnerable now than you prefer. Don't push away the uncomfortable emotions since they can work as an amazing catalyst to your next phase of growth. You don't have to perform to impress others with your courage.

You may believe that someone is being manipulative in their dealings with you today, giving you plenty of justification to withdraw. Paradoxically, you might consider your retreat as an act of kindness; if you don't walk away from the situation now, you could lash out and say something that hurts others. But one person's bad behavior doesn't need to ruin it for you and everyone else. Find a way to maintain your boundaries without turning into a hermit and spoiling all the fun.

Knowing how to respond to circumstances at work grows more difficult as the day wears on. Your beliefs may be called into question today, especially if you rely on them to rationalize your current actions. Stick with the facts; don't let your subjectivity color your decisions. Be as fair-minded as possible now when separating the truth from the fiction. Others will appreciate your honest approach and sincere intentions.

Your search for meaning takes top priority once the Moon enters philosophical Sagittarius. Nevertheless, you also wish you could forget about your troubles and have a good time today. Even if you are often quite serious about your spiritual journey, laughter may be the best medicine for your soul now. Instead of looking for answers in the shadows, it's time to let your dreams play in the light.

Being connected to a deeper source of inspiration can be tricky business for you today, since your tendency is to put a positive spin on everything you do. However, your current path may drive you into the hidden realms of your own emotions, confusing an already complex situation. Instead of isolating yourself from others now, try sharing your feelings even if it makes you more vulnerable. It's okay to open your heart as long as it's with someone you trust.

Instead of basing your decisions on concrete information today, you may be better off paying more attention to your dreams now than to hard data.
