Obviously, it's foolish to ignore the facts, but you can quickly see that they don't tell the entire story. If you act on your intuition, don't waste energy worrying about the judgment of others. Ultimately, your integrity speaks for itself.

You might uncover a misunderstanding over money matters today, but a bit of extra attention should quickly put the situation to rest. Perhaps you took action on something you thought to be true, only to later discover that you don't have all of the numbers in front of you. If you feel overwhelmed or unsure of your next move now, ask your friends and coworkers for advice. They will offer you immeasurable support and help you put your financial affairs in order.

You feel as if you're drifting in a thick fog today, but others still see you as a person who knows what he or she wants and how to get it. Nevertheless, strong emotional currents are pulling you in a variety of directions that confuse your navigational process. Don't worry about the lack of visibility now; trust your moral compass and have faith that you will arrive safely at your still-unknown destination.

Your enthusiasm might be so strong that you could plow your way through a challenging situation on blind optimism and faith alone. However, your emotions are so intense today that you can work yourself into a frenzy before checking out the facts. Obviously, it's healthier and less destructive to take a gentler approach. The only reasons to fight now are imagined ones, so mellow out and escape into the company of your friends. Put down your warrior shield and channel your energy into something (or someone) that ignites your passion, instead.

When the going gets tough, you stubborn Bulls can become more determined than ever. You're not likely one to take no for an answer, so you push harder and dig in deeper, instead. However, you may forget what your goal is in your haste to make progress today. Don't worry if you feel temporarily lost because it won't last long; it isn't your style to drift aimlessly in confusion. But it's your imagination now, not your single-mindedness, that inspires you to overcome nearly any obstacle in your path.

Clear thoughts grow fuzzy around the edges now that your planet Mercury hooks up with nebulous Neptune. You might have to fight a growing urge to escape from the boring restraints of your life because running from them won't help your cause. Instead, you need to practice patience to reach your long-term goals. Although it may be difficult to maintain a slow and steady pace today, adopting a more methodical approach is the main ingredient in your current recipe for success.

You may be feeling out of sorts today as the cosmic currents pull you into the unbound expanses of the oceans of experience. Open spaces can make you nervous because you often prefer the safety of a familiar cove. On one hand, you're free to explore new territory and your thoughts can float unencumbered by old fears. On the other hand, the lack of structure confuses you, leaving you slightly disoriented. Stop resisting the inevitable; fully embrace this adventure, instead. You never know what you might learn along the way.

Finding a workable balance between your outer intensity and your fertile imagination may be an ongoing challenge today. Your optimism motivates you to aspire to the potential greatness that stands in front of you. But there is danger lurking in your current tendency to gloss over significant details as you push relentlessly toward your goal. A bit of caution is advised now; if you acknowledge your limitations first you have a much better chance of reaching your dreams.

It's a time of paradoxes for you meticulous Virgos because you're expecting to uncover plenty of facts to support your opinions. But with spacey Neptune conjuncting your planet Mercury today, you're pulled into the nebulous sea of dreams and away from the precision-guided world you prefer to work in. You may be inspired to follow your intuition now rather than limiting yourself with logic. However, don't wander too far off the map. Find a middle path that allows you to stay in contact with both ends of the spectrum so you don't lose your way.

You are traveling through the hazy twilight zone of logic and your thoughts are drifting off into space. Thankfully, there is no danger if you can trust the fantastic ideas that now come your way. It's in your nature to balance the cosmic opposites, but sometimes you have a tough time making up your mind. Now you can make a decision, but might not be able to justify it to others. This is artistic and romantic inspiration at its best. Just don't confuse it with reality.

Embrace the future today, even if you can't see what's around the next corner. Dance to the music, even if you don't know where it's coming from. Find your own inner optimist and ask for the guidance you need. There is magic all around you, and being aware of it is a good start. Don't worry about other people's expectations now. Your job is to transform the obvious insolvable dilemma into a situation that works to your benefit -- and maybe even creating something mysteriously beautiful in the process.

No matter how confident you are today, you still might have to contend with a temporary wave of self-doubt. There may appear to be a deep and impenetrable fog between you and your goals. Your spiritual beliefs can help you cope, as long as you don't try to overpower the uncertainty you now face. Instead, transform your vulnerability into compassion and your confusion into flexibility. Focus on your inner work rather than pushing to succeed in the outer world. Peace of mind comes from within.

Oddly enough, exploring your imagination today enables you to find the emotional energy to climb the mountain that is looming in front of you. Sink beneath the surface reality into your own fantasy world, for this is where the answers lay hidden from view. Use the dreams that arise from your subconscious mind in order to paint the future as you wish it to be. Whatever you do now -- don't believe what you see; instead, see what you believe.

You hold the key to the future in your dreams. You are like the wise shaman who is channeling visions and others may seek your guidance today, whether you want the role or not. This responsibility might temporarily restrict your ability to be independent, for there are serious duties that fall on your shoulders now. Don't try to escape this spiritual calling. If people are relying on you, do whatever you can to hold up your end of the deal. The positive impact you have on those who trust you will ripple back to you many times over.

Your picture of a perfect world may be so vivid that you're dismayed when you realize how far removed it is from your current circumstances today. However, it isn't always bad news when the clouds of illusion rain down to Earth because this is where the tires meet the road of life. And this is when your real work begins. You have experienced both sides: you have imagined the fantasy and you have seen the naked truth. Now it's time to create a magical path that allows you to travel freely between these two interrelated worlds.

You're willing to work hard in order to keep things from falling apart today. However, your efforts might be futile because your life grows more complex when you succeed. It's like a video game where you're promoted to the next screen once you finish the current level; this is a sign that it's time for an entirely new strategy. Instead of wasting your resources on maintaining control, simply stop playing for a while. Surprisingly, relinquishing your authority now may be a lot easier than you think.

You normally think things all the way through before you say what's on your mind. However, you may be feeling on edge now, especially if you are trying to keep a secret since hiding something only makes you more anxious. Thankfully, there's little reason to worry about upsetting others today; it makes more sense to concern yourself with your own motives, instead. The details of your message aren't all that important as long as your intentions are honorable and you speak from your heart.

You might inadvertently dig your hole a little deeper instead of successfully doing damage control for something you recently said or did. Unfortunately, you can still trigger someone's anger now, even with the best of intentions. Of course, your sincere apology could work wonders, but it only has impact if you actually mean it. Keep in mind today's little drama may still take another day to play out before your relationship world stops spinning.

Backing down from a confrontation might be challenging today, even if it would be to your advantage if you did. You may feel as if you are beyond the point of no return now, which encourages you to take a risk for the sake of your beliefs. Luckily, you don't have as much to lose as you think. Just be certain that the current issue is really significant before you jeopardize what you have already gained. Choose your battles wisely to conserve your energy for when you need it most.

Your plan of attack may be an impressive one, but it certainly isn't perfect. When your current situation changes, you must be willing to adapt or you could lose your competitive edge. Unfortunately, you're more rigid in your thinking than you realize, and your refusal to modify your agenda might alienate your closest friends. Be sensitive to the reactions of others so you can respond intelligently, instead of stubbornly holding onto a fading dream for no reason at all.

Although you may feel nervous today, you should be able to transform your uncomfortable tension into useful productivity. Throw away your old expectations and admit that you haven't a clue where you are going. Nevertheless, it's okay to say what's on your mind, even if it places you in a socially awkward position. Remain open to a completely different approach and then confidently follow your new plan to its successful conclusion.

You're likely to receive cooperation and support today, but it might not arrive in the manner you prefer. It may even seem as if your best friend or partner is working against your best interest, but that's not what is actually occurring. Everyone appears to be marching to their own drummers now and you would be smart to encourage them. Your friends and colleagues will show up on their own schedules to help as long as you give them the latitude they need.

You might experience a much-needed breakthrough on the financial front today, but you still need to scale your plans back prior to initiating action. Fortunately, you aren't afraid to try something radical you haven't done yet. You are so quick to learn new techniques now that others are surprised by your adaptability even if they can't grasp the complexity of your life. Although you are tempted to accomplish a lot, it's best not to bite off more than you can chew.

Everyone believes they know just what you're feeling today because the unabashed Sagittarius Moon inspires you to wear your heart on your sleeve for all to see. There are no easy escape routes now, for ignoring your emotions only feeds them and gives them additional strength. Your best strategy is to express what's in your heart to a trusted friend on a regular basis to keep the drama at a minimum. Don't let your fear of rejection get in the way of a meaningful dialogue.

Although instability continues to plague you now, you still want everything running like a precision watch. You prefer not to worry where to focus your attention today, but you can't forget about your responsibilities and just turn your back on your work. Nevertheless, it makes sense to wait and see which way the currents of change are flowing before you take irrevocable action. Following your heart will not steer you wrong, but it might take some time to reach your destination.

You probably have way too much on your plate now, and it may be necessary to lean on your closest friends for support. You're quite surprised when others rush to your assistance so quickly, demonstrating to you that you're not alone. Nevertheless, you need to be careful about how you communicate or you might annoy someone with your sarcastic humor. Slow down and think before you speak. Expressing your genuine appreciation makes everyone feel good about helping out.

You grow more pensive throughout the day, which might mean that you don't do much at all today. However, exercising self-restraint when it comes to starting new projects isn't a reason to also suppress your emotions. Spending some time alone gives you a chance to process the most meaningful content from your daydreams. Contemplation is productive as long as you keep your feelings flowing. The source of your strength comes from your vivid imagination and your receptive heart.

If your life has recently taken a serious turn, adopting a sensible approach to your current responsibilities helps you make the most of this challenging day. Don't try to sidestep any emotional intensity now because your feelings can teach you something useful about yourself. The more you're able to concentrate on what you need today, the more effective you are in overcoming your own resistance to change. Demonstrating your willingness to face the issues inspires others to do the same.

You are truly a force to be reckoned with because you can accomplish nearly anything you set your mind on today. But making choices is still a bit overwhelming because you're aware of the significance of your current decisions. You can breathe a bit easier if you simply remember that the most practical course of action is now the most intelligent one. It's not wise to take any foolish risks; patience works in your favor. One small step at a time will lead you to a promising future.

You may seem somewhat contentious to those around you today, but you're truly not looking to create any additional conflict. It's just that you might not take the time to think about the impact of your words now. You know you're telling the truth, so you believe it's unnecessary to stop and consider that you could be stirring up a hornet's nest. Remember, everyone doesn't need to know everything that you do. A little compassionate discretion will go a long way to keep the peace.

You could be impressed by a coworker's level of commitment today, even if your plan is completely different. But if you enter into a debate with those who oppose your ideas now, your frustration builds and can eventually outweigh any admiration you might have had. You would be wise to keep an open mind while discussing the merits of the various alternatives on the table. Nevertheless, it's never advisable to negotiate away your core values.

Don't be surprised if you are the brunt of someone's anger because you're not the easiest person in the world to get along with today. You may even engage in a public confrontation with a coworker now, which creates additional problems. Although an argument causes unwanted stress, others will respect you for standing up for yourself as long as you don't take it too far. Paying attention to the cues of those around you could help you dissipate the tension before it reaches a boiling point.

Sometimes it's nearly impossible to sort through all the details. However, you are the one who seems to be able to put enough of the small pieces of a puzzle together today so you can see the big picture. People depend on your holistic thinking now, so there's no reason to hold back when sharing your advice. Trust your intuition but don't lose sight of your common sense; your moral compass will lead you in the right direction.

You have something important on your mind today, but it's not that simple to share it with your peers. Every time you approach the topic, others appear to grow uncomfortable and change the subject. However, you can see things that are not apparent to anyone else and you're not willing to pretend that you know less than you do. Remember, if you're going to be the one who sounds the alarm, at least do it with kindness and without blame. Choose your words carefully so you don't alienate your audience.

Your closest friends may attempt to avoid you for a while today because they can tell you have something on your mind that they aren't ready to hear. Meanwhile, the Moon's conjunction with powerful Pluto bolsters your emotional intensity and emboldens your courage. Just remember that your words might be more searing than you realize if you let them pass your lips uncensored. A little self-restraint makes a lot of difference in the successful delivery of your message. A spoonful of sugar helps the medicine go down.

You're so passionate about your beliefs today that you temporarily forget about the facts. However, others won't let you get away with sloppy thinking now and they continue to confront you with the truth. Rather than becoming overly defensive and taking a stand based on self-righteousness, make every attempt to listen to what is actually being said. This is not about you -- or anyone else -- being right or wrong; it's about keeping an open mind and finding clarity on a subject. Sometimes it takes a village to get it right.

You want to make sure that everyone knows exactly where you stand on a controversial issue today as the evocative Moon connects with ruthless Pluto in your 1st House of Personality. You're ready to express your passionate perspective every chance you get. But a volcano derives its strength from the intense heat that is simmering beneath the surface. Likewise, you have a chance to increase your power by choosing what to say on your own terms. Carefully controlling your message gives you the chance to create the impact you desire.

People may stir up trouble today by accusing you of something you didn't do. You might feel personally attacked or even betrayed by someone you once trusted. Unfortunately, it's probably too late now to return to the way things were. Even if your pride is hurt, think twice before retaliating because your unrestrained anger could escalate a minor problem into a major conflict. Step back and count to ten before you say something you'll quickly regret. Take the high road and see who follows.

You might not have the ability to accomplish your long-term goals on your own, but you have access to all the tools you need once you recognize that the resources are within your network of friends and associates. Keep in mind that no one person is the center of authority now, so you could lose control as soon as you attempt to consolidate it. Remember, cooperation is much more effective than any attempts at global domination. Your success is all but assured when you realize that you are part of a greater whole and act accordingly.

You are caught between two different ways to manage the energy of your day. On one hand, you have work that must be completed and others are depending on you to follow through on your promises. On the other hand, you have your own desires that cannot be easily suppressed. Instead of trying to ignore your needs, do a balancing act between the two extremes. Don't blow off your responsibilities, but be sure to schedule some time to explore your dreams, too.

You want meaningful connections with your peers now that the Moon is traveling through your 9th House of Higher Truth. However, it might help to find someone special who shares your goals. In spite of your high hopes, it's not easy to let go of your relationship concerns, which could place unnecessary boundaries between you and a friend. Instead of allowing your fears to get in the way, be willing to talk about your feelings. Once the ice is broken, take the path that opens up in front of you.

Unchangeable circumstances prevent you from sharing everything that's in your heart today, even if you want to take a relationship to the next level. Unfortunately, you must watch what you say now or you could create an uncomfortable situation. Keep in mind that there's more time than you think to deliver your message. If you sense any awkward energy, just let it rest for a day or two before reactivating any kind of romantic pursuit. Timing is everything when it comes to matters of the heart.

Figuring out what to do is challenging today because your natural rhythms are disrupted by something that's completely out of your control. Naturally, your self-confidence empowers you to find your way, but you must settle for less comfort than you normally prefer. Keep in mind that whatever occurs now is a small part of the larger shift that continues to unfold during the months ahead. Your positive attitude is key to your success.

Even if you're sure you know what you want today, it's still not easy to determine the most reliable way to get it. Your thoughts may be stuck on sweet pleasures that are hard to come by at this time. You might believe that everything will ultimately be okay in spite of your insecurities about how to proceed in your pursuit of happiness. Don't be distracted by external circumstances now; instead, seek joy from within.

You might feel pleased with your cautious approach to self-expression today. Your current obligations actually give you a solid framework of safety, establishing limits that are already being placed upon your time. Even if you long for something more spontaneous, it's still easy to settle back into the emotional security of your predetermined schedule. It's okay to wait until you are ready; there's no need to rush the inevitable. Trust your intuition to tell you when the moment is right.

You may feel as if you are on an emotional see-saw and are weary of the extremes that exist in your life. Obtaining what you want is fraught with delays these days as Mars continues its retrograde dance in your diplomatic sign. Unfortunately, jumping off a ride while it's still in motion is significantly trickier than getting on it in the first place. Do everything necessary to keep your hopes and dreams alive, but proceed carefully so you don't upset the current balance.

You have ideas about what is possible now, but there are still so many hurdles to jump over before winning the race. You might actually succeed if you focus on your destination rather than taking a shortcut to avoid an unstable situation. Remember, setting ambitious goals is not problematic as long as you make certain that they are sufficiently supported by verifiable facts. It's great to dream big but you still must do the work to make the magic happen.

The truth could precipitate a storm today, yet if it does, the results probably won't be as bad as you think. Actually, this clearing of the air may be your big chance to see things as they are, rather than as you wish them to be. When your dreams diverge from reality, it's crucial to know the details so you can make intelligent decisions. Pay extra attention to the little signs as you search for clues about what to do next.

Change is in the air, especially with the moody Moon back in your productive sign; however, circumstances beyond your control still make you nervous. Of course you want to stabilize your feelings, but there's too many unrelated events happening simultaneously today. Instead of trying to do the impossible, take a deep breath and step back from the chaos. The energy will become more manageable once you give up the idea of being in charge of everything.

You might wish you had more time to relax or meditate today but your busy schedule probably won't allow it. You're unable to stop your mind from spinning around and around in circles, leaving you with little time for anything else. Unfortunately, there is just too much going on now for you to ignore your responsibilities. Don't be so hard on yourself if you can't do everything; after all, you're only human. Practicing self-acceptance is your best path to inner peace.

You are eager to put your best foot forward today, but you continue to fall short of your own high expectations because you keep getting caught up in everyone else's dramas. If you attempt to retreat, your friends grow concerned about your well-being -- which, in turn, adds to the intensity you're already trying to avoid. It's tricky walking the fine line between feeling compassion for others and taking care of your own needs. Thankfully, a deeper stability is beginning to emerge if you simply let it happen.

You don't have a lot to say today because your most important thoughts are too complicated to put into words. You're not particularly interested in getting ahead now; you prefer spending your time wandering through your daydreams. Do whatever is necessary to keep up outside appearances, but don't be overly concerned about your current lack of ambition. Your need for action will return before you know it. In the meantime, let your imagination run the show.

You want everyone to see you as a caring friend now, but you would rather display your affection in non-emotional ways. Your ability to listen and respond in a compassionate manner could win someone's heart, but you're oddly disassociated from the outcome of your interactions. Fortunately, this detachment favors business over personal communication; just make sure that you read the fine print prior to signing any contracts. You're good to go as long as you are authentic in all you do.

You may be sending out mixed messages, but for some reason you're able to get away with it today. Instead of calling you out because you're being duplicitous, others admire the integrity with which you maintain your professionalism. However, too many details are slipping through the cracks now, making it obvious your heart isn't in your work. Gracefully retreat until you have enough time to sort out your feelings and figure out what you want.

It's usually a bit unnerving when you sense an emotional gulf between you and a loved one, but today you might actually prefer the breathing room. You may choose to keep your feelings to yourself, so others won't even notice anything is wrong. You can hide your insecurities, but it's still healthier to confront your fears now and discuss the distance you perceive instead of pretending that all is well. Silence breeds discontent; communication leads to a closer connection.

You're buzzing with optimism today, making it difficult to see the potential pitfalls in your current plans. Although the power of positive thinking can carry you a long way, it won't necessarily win out over inaccurate assumptions or faulty logic. Avoid overcompensating by acting like everything is fine if it's not; actually, an honest assessment of the pros and cons improves your chances for success.

Nearly everyone seems to be more upbeat than you today, and you're not sure why. At first, it seems great that others are so enthusiastic about your plans. But after a while, it's hard to tell if they really like your ideas or they're just saying nice things to make you feel better about yourself. Save your worry and cynicism for another day; for now, gratefully accept any support you receive at face value and continue moving your agenda forward one step at a time.

Changes are being made at work, creating new opportunities for your future if you're up for the challenge. Thankfully, your job doesn't feel as tedious now; in fact, you're able to express your creativity as the clever Mercury-Jupiter alignment encourages you to open your heart in a new direction. You're poised for success as long as you're ready to believe in yourself. Don't think about it too much; just spread your wings and fly.

The sky is the limit today and there's really no reason to scale back your vision of the future. Your plans for an adventure that seemed too crazy yesterday may have already overcome several hurdles on its way to manifestation. But don't fall into the trap of getting too comfortable. Anything that keeps you on edge now plays a pivotal role in your current motivation. Make a splash and do something completely out of the box. The more outrageous your scheme, the better your possibilities.

You may be so over-the-top confident today that you're ready to share nearly anything -- even your darkest secrets. Your emotions are uncontainable as loquacious Mercury harmonizes with boisterous Jupiter. However optimistic you feel now, think twice about what you're going to say before you actually open your mouth. Your inner strength shines through no matter what, especially when you use the wisdom of enlightened self-restraint. If your message is worthy, there's no need to shout it from the rooftop.

Your patience is being tested now as everyone around you encourages you to just say yes. Meanwhile, you want to take your time and evaluate each invitation and idea that is presented to you. But they all sound so good you may choose to immediately accept, even if your calendar is already booked. Thankfully, you have plenty of experience juggling many things at once. Nevertheless, your life runs smoother if you pace yourself by delaying the start of some projects for a few more days.

It's easy to pour on the sweetness today, but charm is not a substitute for sound thinking. Luckily, you're on a roll and you are able to coordinate all the pieces to make things happen just as you envision it. But remember that logic will only take you so far; imagination, on the other hand, inspires others and carries you anywhere you want to go. Don't stop believing; if you can dream it with enough clarity, you can make it real.

You might be a real motor-mouth today and, in fact, once you start talking, it's nearly impossible to shut up. Mercury the Messenger is visiting your 1st House of Personality, prompting you to share your opinions with anyone who will listen. And giant Jupiter's superconductive trine to Mercury emboldens you to inflate your ideas and prattle on incessantly about them. Don't waste this excellent opportunity to shine on idle chatter; create your special brand of magic, instead.

You don't want to work alone now, even if you usually prefer to run ahead of the pack. The receptive Moon's visit to your 11th House of Groups links your feelings to other members of your social network or the entire group, itself. However, you could end up feeling rejected if someone doesn't want you to be part of the team. But there's no reason to hold onto a grudge; you'll feel better about things tomorrow if you keep a positive attitude today.

You possess an uncanny ability to know what to do at work now, even if your ideas seem to go against the prevailing opinions. Don't waste energy attempting to prove that your way makes the most sense now. Your coworkers probably won't believe you anyhow. Fortunately, you know your job better than anyone else, so quietly get busy putting your plan into place. You'll gain respect and admiration once everyone realizes that you mean business. This is your opportunity to shine.

Although you're not often at a loss for words, you're willing to keep quiet and go along with the general consensus now -- even if you disagree with it. You might consider putting up a fight at first, but will probably acquiesce to the majority for the sake of harmony. Fortunately, nothing is written in stone today, so allow external situations to determine your next step. You really don't have to push so hard to prove your worth.

You might be in an odd state of confusion because you want to be emotionally closer to those you love but ironically, they could choose to put a little bit of distance between you now. Naturally, this imbalance is stressful, so it's wise to reevaluate your feelings before it's too late. Ultimately, it's not just about maintaining the status quo; it's about getting what your heart desires. Try not to take things too personally today since all relationships have their own ebb and flow; focus on pursuing your dreams, instead.

Ideas are popping up like flowers today and your senses are awakening to the smell of spring in the air. Nevertheless, knowing how far to take your unorthodox thoughts is challenging now, for saying too much might have negative consequences on your current lifestyle. Remember that you don't need to share everything that crosses your mind. Consider your audience before you spill all of your secrets. If anyone asks a question, a mysterious smile might be all you need for an answer.

Letting off a little hot air doesn't do a thing to further your ambitions today. However, you can use the current delays to your advantage. Instead of running off in search of a different job that meets your expectations, stay on the same track for a while longer. In the meantime, keep your options open by working several disparate threads into one complex master plan. Your chances for success are great as long as you keep your eye on the final prize.

Approaching your work with a fair-minded attitude and a healthy dose of logic is unusually challenging today. However, it may not pay to be overly practical, for it's the most radical ideas that now produce the best solutions. Don't waste time trying to maintain the balance as you decide your next move. Shaking everything up brings a wider variety of choices than cautiously staying on the straight and narrow path. Sometimes taking a leap of faith is the best way to create positive change.

You have a different strategy to managing minor problems at home today. Instead of practicing a hands-off policy, you are ready to jump in and take control of anything that's out of whack. But exerting too much authority could backfire now, especially if you don't have all the facts at your disposal. Step back and play the role of a researcher by listening carefully to everyone's opinions. Luckily, you can save the day by putting all the pieces of the puzzle together. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

You might feel like you're putting out one to many fires today with the emotional Moon traveling through your 3rd House of Communication. It's a struggle keeping up with so many separate interactions, yet you may not understand how one relationship pattern affects another. However, rest assured that nothing happens in a vacuum. Take the time to consciously connect with others and don't worry if you can't find all the answers just yet.

Reexamining your motives and adjusting your goals accordingly helps to make your path easier to navigate. But your intentions might not be as clear as you think now, so you need to start the process by making a vigilant effort to untangle your subconscious desires. Don't be afraid to confide in someone; the advice you receive from a counselor, a life coach or a trustworthy friend can make all the difference in the world today as you prepare for your journey. It's a sign of strength to know when to ask for help.

You may be overly sensitive to little things today as the high-strung Aquarius Moon brings your emotions right up to the surface and into full view. But don't force anything because you might not have enough time to delve into a significant issue now. In the meantime, just observe your reactions, and open and close your heart when appropriate. You will do best in the long run if you can wait a while longer before attempting to sort out your feelings. In the meantime, demonstrate your love through your actions and not your words.

It feels like you're walking through a dreamworld  and the surreal symbolism sticks with you throughout the day. The problem is that the lingering images don't make sense to your rational mind; as soon as you try to explain your thoughts today, they vanish in an instant. Cultivate your dreams by giving yourself permission to wander down the rabbit hole now, even if you're not sure where it leads.

It doesn't seem fair if you have to address an unpleasant issue that you thought was already handled. Nevertheless, you can't let go of your concern if someone abuses a position of power. You're likely to fight for an underdog now, even if you have nothing personal to gain. If you attempt to turn the situation to your advantage today, your efforts might backfire and won't accomplish anything positive. Thankfully, working for the benefit of all produces more fulfilling results.

You might want to speak up for someone at work today, but be careful about assuming that other people's goals are in alignment with yours. The differences between you are not apparent at first glance, but start to grow obvious as you become more involved. Don't take a position that you can't personally support or you may have to back down and let your coworkers fend for themselves. Rallying to the defense of your peers is admirable as long as you know your limits.

Making a choice between taking care of your personal needs or handling a relationship issue at work is tricky business today. Your career objectives might be in a state of flux, making the dilemma even more complex. It's difficult enough to decide what you want for yourself; adding others to the mix just increases your anxiety. Alleviate the pressure by giving yourself as much time as you need to reevaluate your current priorities. In the meantime, turning on the charm allows you to play both sides of the fence for a while longer.

You may unwittingly be a part of a coworker's power play today, yet your instincts could warn you of a potential problem before it fully manifests. Although you can prevent an unnecessary confrontation by sharing your feelings, you must communicate in a manner that avoids any accusatory words. Just casting light on someone's secret agenda might be enough to turn the tables in the right direction. Let everyone know that you believe honesty is the best policy and see what happens next.

You could be misunderstood today when something you say with the best of intentions is interpreted as a grab for power. But you're not interested in usurping anyone else's authority now; you just want things done the correct way and may believe it's necessary to intervene before anything goes awry. Don't be too authoritative in your approach; be patient and explain your motives as clearly as possible. Once you've spoken your piece, simply let events take their own course.

Although a coworker or friend may seem unsure of the current dynamics in your relationship now, the confusion could be all yours. Perhaps you are seeking more clarity than is possible at this time. Ironically, your insistence on having more information might actually cause the other person to overcompensate by avoiding your questions. Don't push so hard that you scare someone away with your intensity. Taking a kinder and gentler approach might actually lead to the closer connection you seek.

Pay attention to every word that is said today, even in a casual conversation, for there may be more at stake than is apparent at first. A simple discussion about the weather could reveal a crucial piece of information. Keep in mind that if you receive a significant message now, you're not obligated to respond right away. Take the time to consider all your options before deciding what to do next.

Your tone may be more intense than you think as interactive Mercury activates passionate Pluto today. However, you're not interested in establishing common ground; you know what's right and are willing to fight for it. Unfortunately, you could lose your advantage if you believe that your perspective is the only valid one. State your case without attempting to change anyone's mind. Agreeing to disagree is healthier now than drawing battle lines that cannot be erased.

Instead of trying to persuade others to conform to your agenda today, attack scheduling problems the other way around. You may think it's nearly impossible to change your calendar, but ultimately a simple modification could free up enough time to make your entire day flow smoother. Going out of your way to be flexible now might reward you with a golden opportunity that you otherwise would miss.

Your words pack quite a punch today and you could come across as cold and calculating, even if you believe that you are acting out of kindness. You might not even be aware of how much power you wield as mental Mercury supports intense Pluto in your ambitious sign. Toning down your delivery may be enough to soften your impact. Don't wait until it's too late; practicing a little conscious compassion can go a long way to creating harmonious relationships.

It might feel like everything is taking longer than it should today and the faster you try to complete a project, the more there is to do. Don't work yourself up into a nervous state, for your current deadlines are likely more flexible than you think. Before getting bent out of shape, explain your situation to those involved. Coming up with a  practical game plan removes some of the pressure. Luckily, you can nip the problem in the bud by maintaining an open dialogue right from the start.

Your emotions are very close to the surface today, making you more vulnerable in your own skin. You might employ uncharacteristic stoicism as a tactic now, denying your sensitivity and sidestepping the crucial issues. However, another strategy is to show up as you are and share your irrational side with the world. Once you realize that you don't need to hide your feelings any longer, your inner strength will shine through for all to see.

You wake up and are out the door today before you even know your exact destination. But later on you may feel the need to pull back and reassess your direction. You intuitively know that something isn't quite right and you are correct to trust your instincts now. It's okay to socially retreat until you are ready for more involvement. Don't make a big deal about your change of heart; just let everyone know your current uncertainty won't last long and you'll be back to your old self before they even know it.

Paradoxically, you may be acting in a confident manner today while being hesitant at the same time. Your key planet Venus is under tense pressure from austere Saturn, and you might temporarily feel quite alone, even undeserving of love. Thankfully, Venus also forms a sweet trine to energetic Mars, empowering you to overcome your self-doubt. Switching your focus to others and spending some time with your friends ultimately helps you feel better about yourself.

An uncomfortable feeling may be gnawing away at the edge of your awareness today and you cannot shake it off. Although you're often quite lighthearted, relationship dynamics might not seem in sync now. You don't feel as if you fit in the way you usually do, and being alienated on your home turf isn't fun. It seems like the problem is external, but closer analysis could reveal that the emotional discord is connected to your fears. A change in your attitude can improve the chemistry quicker than you think.

You might want someone's shoulder to lean on today, but you may not be completely satisfied with the support you receive. There's no need to put on a smiley face if you're not feeling it. However, initiating an inner dialogue with your own subconscious can help to uncover the source of your loneliness. Establishing temporary boundaries around your heart protects you from being hurt, but withdrawing emotionally could be isolating. Take care of your needs without shutting down your heart in the name of fear.

The dynamics of a partnership seem so good and feel so bad all at the very same time. Circumstances appear to be going your way at first, but things might not end up according to your plan. You feel as if you don't want to be here today, but here you are, nonetheless. The good news is you are fully responsible for creating pleasure in your life. Whatever you do, don't give up on making positive change. You may be pleasantly surprised with how quickly things turn around in just a few short days.

Current responsibilities may create complications today because you can't spend much time with those you love. Others might be getting the wrong idea as they feel a distance between you, but you're not really trying to push them away. Nevertheless, they will likely react negatively as if you are shutting them out. Letting people know about your time constraints in advance keeps the expectations to a minimum.

You're well-known for your ambivalence, which can make your life more difficult than necessary. Although magnetic Venus is visiting your 5th House of Love and Money, she travels through some tricky territory today. You might even want to run and hide instead of facing the music. However, making a decision can't be forced. Thankfully, your willingness to be patient ultimately brings the satisfaction you seek.

You are entering into a period of transformation, but first there is this eye of a needle for you to squeeze through. Unfortunately, it's not large enough for you to take all your emotional baggage with you. Although it might not feel good to leave some of your attachments behind, lightening your load puts your most intimate relationships on more solid ground. Although this is a sobering time, keep in mind it's preparing you for something wonderful just around the corner.

Today's recipe entails mixing two tablespoons of unbridled optimism, a heaping tablespoon of caution and a tiny dash of unpleasant memories. Shake it all up until you are really unsure of which way to go. Then, spend some time pondering whether or not a current relationship is really worth the sacrifices you are making now. Even if you're confused, your romantic life will emerge stronger in just a day or two if you're willing to face the truth.

You take your commitment to love quite seriously today and want to share your perspective with anyone who will listen. But the reflective Moon in your busy 3rd House of Communication can create logistical cross-currents as everyone distracts you from your agenda. Don't change directions now; just temporarily operate on blind faith. Your unwavering devotion should bring you closer to your goals sooner than you expect.

Relationships may feel strained today because it seems unlikely that you can find the peace and quiet that you seek. Perhaps money issues have crept back into your life and place a negative spin on your personal interactions. Unfortunately, there might not be a quick and easy way out of your current dilemma. Instead of running away, face the situation with confidence. Learning to trust your instincts takes practice, but there's no better time to start than now.

Figuring out the best course of action is tricky and you may need to proceed before you make a decision. Naturally, moving forward before you are ready is neither fun nor easy, yet it can be a life-altering experience. Ironically, Saturn creates enough resistance to act like a catalyst, temporarily pulling you into uncharted emotional depths. Luckily, you have nothing to fear and everything to gain on this magical journey.

It's pointless to use logic to talk yourself out of taking a risk, since today's impulsive Aries New Moon is all about you. If you experienced a false start recently, now is the perfect time to try again. Success could be yours if you are persistent and keep the faith. Don't be afraid to show up with your best intentions and a willingness to work harder than anyone else. This is your moment to shine.

Your vivid dreams may have given you quite a restless night of sleep last night. Fortunately, you can refocus your attention by simply jumping into your busy day with a positive attitude. Today's New Moon in your 12th House of Imagination stirs up unconscious fears, but it's easy to overcome the resistance once you confront it. The busier you are now in the outer world, the less likely you are to get lost in your doubts.

Volunteering for a worthwhile organization or a political cause might sound like a good idea with the Aries New Moon in your 11th House of Groups. You could be looking for something constructive to do, but you're not going to be happy unless your distraction also has a positive social impact. Although mingling with others is usually a source of joy, choose an activity where you can see the results of your contribution right away. Take pride in your efforts to make the world a better place.

Establishing ambitious goals isn't enough; you must be ready to put your good intentions to work today by making your move. It would be a shame to waste this powerful moment of initiation without taking decisive action since the enterprising Aries New Moon falls in your 10th House of Career. Don't worry about what you accomplish or how far along the path you actually travel now. Remember, the first step is the most important one.

You can manage a complex scenario today, even if you don't consciously know the best way to deal with it. You may have already struggled with a similar issue more than once, but today's Aries New Moon in your 9th House of Big Ideas reveals a radical solution that wasn't obvious before. Actually, there's no way to predict if your actions will have the desired effect. Take a chance and see where it goes. There's no rational reason to wait any longer to find out; you only live once.

Today's events may initiate a journey of questioning where the deeper you delve, the less you know. The current lesson is that real wisdom only arrives after you stop obsessing about your search. The transition point that contains the mysteries of birth, death and the cosmos occurs when one cycle ends and the next one hasn't yet started. The New Moon in your 8th House of Regeneration is a not-so-gentle reminder that you don't have all the answers. Nevertheless, after conferring with others, you still need to trust the process and move on.

It may be time to heat up the dynamics of a current relationship or to fan the flames of a new one now that the fiery Aries New Moon emphasizes your 7th House of Partners. This Sun-Moon conjunction joins erratic Uranus, prompting you to shift directions quickly, without apparent forethought. However, if you don't honor your need for independence, others might pick up on your suppressed energy today and act impulsively to shake things up. Take proactive measures; it's better to express your feelings than have someone else do it for you.

The day has finally arrived for you to make long-overdue changes to your daily routine, but your actions don't have to be overly dramatic to create a positive impact. The enterprising Aries New Moon activates your 6th House of Details, suggesting that starting small is the smartest strategy. Anything that adds to your efficiency is helpful. But don't wait until tomorrow; you need to do something right now to take advantage of this magical moment.

Your ongoing struggle is about balancing work and play, yet the Aries New Moon in your 5th House of Fun and Games currently emphasizes the lighter side of life. It's nearly impossible to be overly serious now, even if you have many obligations to fulfill. But don't sweat it if you leave a task unfinished today. Obviously, it's still wise to acknowledge your previous commitments or life will quickly get complicated. Be responsible, even if you feel like a kid at heart.

You would like to go on record with a straightforward statement about your feelings today. However, the Aries New Moon triggers your 4th House of Emotional Security, so it might be better to share your feelings in the company of someone you trust. You want others to understand you, yet it's more appropriate to only disclose this kind of information with the closest of friends and family. There's no reason to panic now, so wait until you find the right person, place and time before spilling your darkest secrets.

Everything you say sounds more important now with the assertive Aries New Moon zapping your 3rd House of Communication. Fortunately, you're able to establish the tone for the changes ahead by writing about your goals, informing others about your perspective and even inspiring your friends and associates with your progressive ideas. Don't wait for someone else to take charge; state what's on your mind and then be ready to put your words into action. He who hesitates is lost.

Utilizing the powerful energy of the Aries New Moon to concentrate on your finances is a wise move today since this lunation lands in your 2nd House of Money. However, you could make a spontaneous decision that doesn't ultimately serve you well. Instead of rushing to turn things upside down, take your time before initiating any significant changes. Working toward long-term stability is a better strategy than attempting to fix everything all at once.

Striking up the band and leading a parade might be your idea of fun today, because you want to get people up and moving with you. But the Aries Moon opposes combative Mars in your 7th House of Others, indicating the need to soften your message. Although music can raise the vibration, it's more effective to lower your volume so your friends don't have to cover their ears and miss out on what you are saying. Remember, not everyone is feeling as playful as you are now, so don't take it personally if they don't want to join in your game.

You are not happy if a coworker is on your case, but defending yourself is a common reaction with your obstinate nature. Unfortunately, you may not be all that comfortable handling this awkward situation today. It's easier to hide your anger than to confront the origin of the problem. Keep in mind that this emotional retreat is not a cowardly act. Your self-restraint is wise now; otherwise you might lose control and create additional damage instead of leaving well enough alone. It takes real courage to walk away.

You need to watch the way you interact with people today or your current intensity may appear overly aggressive to others. You might even think that you are being extremely logical, only to have someone tell you that your ideas are too outrageous for them to follow. Instead of ranting about all the details, speak softer and say less. You really don't have to use that many words now to get your point across if you choose the right ones. There's no need to do a sales job when you have authenticity on your side.

You could surprise someone with your ability to defend your choices today. You may be willing to listen to the feedback you receive, but once you've heard what someone else has to offer, your reaction is strong and swift. Although you are uniquely sensitive of the needs of others, be careful about diluting the strength of your argument by attempting to placate everyone's concerns. People will be suitable impressed when they see you stand up for your beliefs.

Putting your best ideas on the table for all to see is not an alien concept to you. However, there is so much expressive energy floating around today that you may not know when to stop your self-promotion. Your confidence motivates you to be so assertive that you might offend even your strongest allies. It's much easier to gain support once you remember that you don't have to shout just to get your message across. A laid-back approach will take you further now than a pushy one.

It seems like there's too much drama in your life now, triggering a turning point in your relationships. Someone's negativity boils over and then everything goes silent. But don't mistake less noise for less intensity; it could be just the opposite. There's no reason to feel so much anger that you say things you don't really mean. Withdraw your energy until you have regained your strength and composure. Stepping back to create a bit of space gives everyone a chance to cool off.

You're a natural people-pleaser and can be preoccupied with making everyone else happy. But the Sun and Moon are dancing with wild Uranus in your 7th House of Partners now, prompting you to  blurt out what you want without thinking about the impact of your words. Don't let anyone stand between you and your goals; setting well-defined boundaries ensures healthier relationships in the future. Taking a risk and revealing your needs can create the breakthrough that you've wanted all along.

You're able to start new tasks at work today without becoming overly obsessed with the details or other people's expectations. Unfortunately, follow-through becomes a problem if you don't keep up your initial momentum. Once you slow down you could lose track of your direction, so ask your friends and associates to either lend a helping hand or simply get out of your way. You may be surprised at how much you accomplish if you're willing to focus on the big picture.

You might be feeling a sense of urgency today, but don't expect others to share your concerns. Although your friends know that you can wax philosophic with the best of them, they're not very patient as you enthusiastically ramble on about something that may be significant only to you. Your ideas are flowing fast and furious now, making it tricky to tell which ones are worth pursuing. Don't become too attached to any one thought until you see how it stands up to the test of time.

You feel emboldened to pull rank at work today, but you could easily overdo it. The idea of demonstrating your authority can be so enticing now that you may lose sight of your original intent to get ahead. Nevertheless, success doesn't stem from maintaining control; manifesting your dreams is dependent on innovation and collaboration, and not status. Remember, the whole is greater than the sum of its individual parts.

The power of your positive thoughts motivates others, but your enthusiasm could be off the charts today. However, blind optimism isn't of much use at all. If someone thinks you can't discern fact from fiction, there's a good chance that he or she will lose faith in your entire message. You can muster support for your plan by being as realistic as possible now. Although everyone wants to hear good news, it's more important for you to be completely honest. The truth will set you free.

Creating new strategies to increase your income should be top priority today with the Sun, Moon and brilliant Uranus moving through your 2nd House of Self-Worth. You have plenty of enterprising ideas about how to generate wealth, but are not sure that any of them will work. Asking for a second opinion from someone you trust is a smart move now. A bit of unconventional wisdom may be all you need to get the ball rolling.

Although you might not be able to concentrate for long today, you will get by if you remember to be practical every time you need to make a choice. You have the power to turn molehills into mountains now or to believe a pretty average idea is the most amazing thing ever. Don't get fooled by illusions of grandiose success; keep your feet on the ground and make sure to meet all of your obligations before you spend your time planning world domination.

You may be stretched ridiculously thin today, especially if you promised too much in order to please someone special. Naturally, you don't want to let anyone down, but you must deal with the consequences of your overinflated expectations -- and the sooner you do, the better. Luckily, the Moon in your sign works in your favor now, facilitating communication and enabling you to focus on the tasks at hand. Don't be a quitter; determination and persistence is the key to your success.

Friends or colleagues may bring you good news or an exciting opportunity today. Nevertheless, you should be exceptionally cautious, even if you feel like your lucky star is following you around. Thankfully, the potential is excellent for something you start now, but it's easy to exaggerate the value of the potential rewards. Remember, there's not much to fear except your current tendency to gloss over important details. Whether you like it or not, patience and due diligence are your friends.

Disappointment may set in quickly if you believe your positive attitude will be enough to get you through the day. Obviously, self-confidence is much more productive than self-doubt, but if you are too sure of yourself today, you might forego the very preparations that could make you successful. Don't assume that everything will just turn out for the best unless you're ready to do some heavy lifting along the way. Success is only one part inspiration; the rest requires dedication and perspiration.

You're unstoppable today, especially if everything goes according to your plan early in the day. But you're courting trouble if you believe that your life will simply continue to improve on its own. Although maintaining your regular routine is one way to strengthen the foundation of your life, it's not emotionally fulfilling. Enjoy the company of others now, instead of spending every moment strategizing on how best to climb the ladder of success. You can enrich your life in intangible ways by simply being with the ones you love.

You're likely to enjoy a busy day that is chock full of fun distractions, chatty friends and fascinating ideas. However, the good times could get out of hand and you might wish that there wasn't so much noise in your environment. Nevertheless, you may not be able to change the magnitude of events now. Instead of trying to limit your activities, enjoy the sense of spontaneity while it lasts. Make the most of the moment by flowing with the energy until it settles back down.

You could sacrifice quality for quantity today, so it's crucial to remember that more of something isn't necessarily better. Although it's tempting, you might not need a second helping of dessert or another drink. Developing one fantastic idea is more useful now than being distracted by lots of mediocre ones. Overindulging can lead to non-productivity and even unpleasant consequences. Paradoxically, fulfilling your most basic needs enables you to stay on a healthy track. One brilliant inspiration is all you need to create a masterpiece.

You might place too many unrealistic expectations on your boss or coworkers today. Even if you receive recognition for your accomplishments, it's not wise to think that this trend will continue unabated. Instead of trying to please everyone by taking on more work than you can possibly handle, setting boundaries now enables you to be more effective. Your smartest strategy is to demonstrate excellence at one or two things rather than mediocrity at many. The satisfaction of a job well done may be your most satisfying reward.

Nearly everything seems to be coming up roses today, yet you can be misled by your own enthusiasm. Jovial Jupiter squares the glorious Sun, shining in your 5th House of Fun and Games, empowering you to turn both sides of the street into the sunny side. However, making time to explore the shadows is not the same thing as being a Negative Nelly; it's smart to take a realistic approach. Acknowledging the truth now can prevent unseen problems down the road.

Keeping your thoughts to yourself is challenging today because the idea of sharing your wisdom makes you smile. However, other people might not want to see the whole picture now. They are lost in their bubbles of fantasy, believing that everything will somehow sort itself out just in time. Nevertheless, your practical nature enables you to assess the situation in an objective manner. Wait until the afternoon to tell your story, for your words gain power throughout the day. However, keep your expectations to a minimum; you can lead a horse to water but you can't make it drink.

You may feel uneasy today if everything appears to be flowing along smoothly because you don't fully trust your current optimism. You're worried that you might be missing a significant piece of the puzzle -- and this is actually a real possibility. Practicing a little self-restraint early in the day could bring a more solid boost of confidence later -- one you can truly rely on. Remember, even if you want to race to the finish line now, managing your progress assures sustainable stability.

Go out and treat yourself to something special today. Although you may be tempted to spend more than you should in the name of pleasure, the price of your purchase is not as important now as what you acquire. Remember, this isn't about making an astute investment or a lucrative deal. It's simply time to honor your inner child with a fun toy or a beautiful gift. Fortunately, a little self-indulgence doesn't have to break the bank if you choose wisely.

You could make the people in your life somewhat crazy because you're not interested in fulfilling their expectations. But today's Sun-Uranus conjunction in your sign demands that you act from your own heart. Don't suppress your feelings; if you do, you might regret it sooner than you think. Your job now is to lead by example instead of doing what anyone else thinks you should. Start your own personal revolution by showing the world who you really are.

A situation that seems to be beyond your control could push you into a corner today. If you feel emotionally threatened you might strike out at someone only to later wish you kept your extreme reactions to yourself. Your deepest secrets become fair game for discussion now, so you may as well disclose the truth before you have to do it under duress. Instead of attempting to maintain any semblance of control, use this as an opportunity to clear the air. Taking preemptive action is smarter than waiting and responding after the fact.

An apparently mellow meeting or social event can quickly grow out of hand as too many conflicting emotions agitate the group. Everyone seems to have a different set of needs and tries to steer the situation accordingly. If no one is able to rise above the noise and restore calm, it may be wise to leave the fray for a while. A temporary break might be enough to allow the chaotic energy to settle back down to a manageable level. Put this time to better use by writing down your unconventional ideas to share with everyone later on.

An unstable situation at work might actually be just what you need to come out on top. Someone who was supposed to be running the show may fall short of living up to his or her responsibilities, leaving you with an unexpected opportunity to fill the slot. You probably have more to offer than you realize; don't wait any longer to step up to the plate and show what you can do. Act now and deal with the fallout later.

You might be reconsidering your travel plans today -- not because something is wrong with your itinerary, but because you simply don't want to be too tied down to a set schedule. Attending a lecture, seminar or any kind of event that allows you to expand your mind into new areas of study might be your answer. Grab any chance to widen your horizons now, even if it's outside your normal areas of interest. Be fearless and explore new worlds.

A spiritual awakening can come in a variety of guises. You may be touched in ways that you cannot possibly anticipate today as buried feelings or new realizations explode into awareness. There's no specific practice to make this kind of breakthrough happen on schedule. It's like trying to predict exactly when and where lightning will strike. Nevertheless, don't try to run away from it when it does, for it's only dangerous if you close your mind and heart. There's nothing to fear if you have faith in the inherent wisdom of the universe.

Your world may seem more chaotic than you wish, but the instability also brings great potential for making necessary changes. Unfortunately, your insecurities might be stirred if people act erratically, but their radical behavior could be just what you need to shock you out of your complacency. If someone comes to you today with a totally outrageous idea, don't dismiss it until you truly consider its merits. Recognize genius before it's too late.

Skipping some of your regular routine is wise today because shaking things up might be the best thing you can do. Paradoxically, the more rigid you remain, the more difficult it is to stay on track. Even if you try to maintain consistency, one interruption after another may finally force you to set your schedule aside. However, there's no need to work yourself into a state of frustration. Accepting the instability of the day and responding with flexibility frees you to reinvent yourself without the restraint of old habits.

Even if you're a natural-born adventurer, pushing into new territory now encourages you to take creative risks you might not have previously considered. Your enthusiasm is high and you are suddenly inspired to try doing things differently than ever before. Others are watching you to see what you are going to do next. Surprise them with your unorthodox behavior today as you reach for the stars. If you act like the innovator you imagine yourself to be, you can be an inspiration to everyone else, too.

Your spirits may be lifted by good news today, or perhaps you are just ready to fly no matter what is happening in your life. Normally, you would advance your next project methodically one step at a time. Although you typically like to keep your feet on solid ground, your foundation might feel a bit unstable these days. Open your mind and widen your horizons. Instead of looking back for security, let go of the past and take a leap of faith into the future.

Even if time already seems to be moving fast, the pace of your life is accelerating again as the Sun catches up with your key planet Uranus. You may be thinking about a quick escape, but it's not about running away from the hard work. To the contrary, you're probably eager to jump into a project now, but it's challenging because you're distracted by so much noise in your immediate environment. Embrace the unknown instead of avoiding it. This quantum leap could bring the positive changes you seek.

Your finances may be impacted today in one of two ways. You could face an unexpected expenditure that puts you into a precarious position. Or, you might actually receive a windfall as money comes to you from out of the blue. Either way, react with caution; don't assume that this sudden change of fortune -- for better or for worse -- will last. It's not helpful to panic or to spend impulsively. Conserve your money and your energy for a rainy day.

You may employ an all-or-nothing approach to accomplish your goals today, but could inadvertently hurt someone's feelings along the way without even knowing it. You are so determined to manifest your dreams now that you might take things too far. Ultimately, you progress further if you can empathize with the perspective of others, too. Slow down to fully experience the present moment instead of living for the imagined success of the future.

You want others to adopt your point of view today, even if you aren't willing to defend your position. Either way, it isn't that simple since there might be an emotional trap lurking just out of sight. Expressing what's on your mind is advised, but the passionate reaction you receive in return can be way more intense than you bargained for. Thankfully, there's no reason to be in a hurry to share all of your ideas at once. Don't rush; a measured approach has a more enduring impact with less collateral damage.

Although you certainly don't need any additional stress in your life, trying to avoid drama only seems to draw it closer now. You might think that filling your social calendar will distract you enough to make the tense atmosphere easier to handle. However, this kind of strategy could backfire by complicating matters further. It's smarter to confront an uncomfortable issue head on today than trying to sidestep it. Face the music and dance.

Relationships could be the source of discomfort now as you feel a growing pressure to choose between your home and your career. However, any lack of support you experience forces you to go through your own metamorphosis, which could be a positive process in the long run. Don't go overboard in your attempt to restore balance. Nevertheless, releasing old assumptions is required before you can begin to develop healthier ways to express what's in your heart. To thine own self be true.

Someone may see your behavior as ruthless now, but you're running on adrenaline and don't have the time to stop and think about how your actions impact those around you. Still, a conflict at work could tempt you to manipulate others if you believe it's in the best interest of all involved. Unfortunately, you might be so self-righteous today that you fail to include anyone else's position in your plans. Loosen up; no matter what you're doing, it's not as important as it seems.

You are often content to work quietly in supportive roles, but you could grow frustrated now if you don't receive the recognition you deserve. Fortunately, you're still able to separate your current disappointments from your job performance, enabling you to meet your professional obligations without revealing your deepest feelings. However, hiding your vulnerability extracts a cost. It's smarter to share your concerns without placing blame on anyone. Expressing your needs allows others to connect with you in a more genuine manner.

You might expect to receive the support you need today, but it could be withdrawn at the very last minute. Change is in the air and soon you won't be able to go back to where you were. But even if you can't solve the entire problem now, you're off to a fabulous start. Don't take no for an answer; if you do run into resistance, simply retreat, revamp your plan as needed and then try again when the time feels right.

There may be no resolution in sight to a dilemma that just won't go away. Perhaps you think you just need to create some fireworks to clear the air once and for all. However, you're probably not all that eager for change now. Although the clash between your beliefs and what you must do can incite you to stubbornly take a stand today, you are wiser to proceed slowly and let the stress resolve on its own.

You feel exceedingly clever today, but you still can't just charm your way past the current obstacles. Be careful, something has to give if you push people too hard. A clash of values may be expressed through a personal drama, but delays and setbacks are symptoms of a deeper issue that also needs attention. Handle any resistance that surfaces now, for avoidance only makes matters worse. Finding that sweet spot between too much and not enough isn't simple, but it worked for Goldilocks and it can work for you.

You don't need any surprises now, but the new emotional landscape indicates that you could be thrown for a loop anyhow if you discover that someone has been secretly working against you. Nevertheless, the best defense is an intelligent offense, so don't just wait for something bad to happen. Ultimately, striking up a conversation about a delicate subject is much more productive than reacting to a crisis after the fact. Shining the light into the shadows is the quickest way to illuminate the truth.

You may actually believe you can remain emotionally detached from a drama in your immediate environment, but your feelings are so connected with everything today that it's impossible to escape. In fact, it's frustrating if all your hard work still doesn't produce the income that you want, leaving you shorter on funds than you expected. Canceling some of your travel plans might be enough to help you regain your lost balance. If you slow down your spending you'll have a better chance of reaching your goals faster.

You might think you're being manipulated by external events now. However, your peers may be doing the sensible thing by just attempting to protect themselves from the tides of economic change. Paradoxically, tightening the reins isn't your best strategy today since you can't control all the variables, no matter how hard you try. Thankfully, others are willing to share the responsibility if you loosen your grip and let them work with you instead of against you.

You may be in a state of low-level panic today because you believe that you're running out of time. Even if you have special plans for the weekend, restrict your activities so you have enough time to finish your chores. It's not easy to make the best choices now unless you take a few steps back from the social whirlwind, set your priorities and then follow through in a sensible manner. If you find yourself getting swept up in the moment, reconnecting with your center might be enough to bring you back down to Earth.

Fitting everything into your hectic schedule is tricky now because your day is already hopping before you even jump out of bed. But you don't want to cut one activity short just to make time for another because you hope to get the most out of each experience. However, you're also tempted to squeeze something else in just because it sounds like fun. Remember, doing more today is not necessarily in your best interest; quality wins over quantity nearly every time.

Sticking to your schedule is such a struggle today that you might believe it's not worth even trying. But don't think that having fewer plans means that you will be able to relax. Life will be easier if you accept the fact that you must respond to changing circumstances throughout the day. Keep in mind that your flexibility is currently your greatest asset. Nevertheless, don't let your eagerness to adapt stop you from digging deeper to uncover the origins of your current desires.

You're bouncing all over the emotional map today and might not be able to moderate your feelings. It's easier to manage your desires by keeping them to yourself, and luckily, others can't see past your smokescreen of complacency. Once you share what's on your mind, everything grows more complicated, so be careful about what you say in the first place. Wait until tomorrow when the evocative Moon is back in your sign before revealing your vulnerable side.

You may have extremely high standards today, creating unrealistic expectations that are difficult to meet. You can logically understand the reasons behind the behavior of your friends now, but even your objective rationalization doesn't diminish your disappointment. Instead of judging those you love, cut them some slack for being who they are rather than who you want them to be. Open your heart and simply be the friend you want.

You have high hopes today but things just might not unfold as planned, demonstrating early on that nothing is as certain as it seems. You could end up very frustrated if you attempt to force your agenda onto the changing landscape. Instead, it's a smarter idea to practice relinquishing control now. Surprisingly, not only will you enjoy yourself, you'll also accomplish more than you think.

Although you may choose to take a break from riding the rollercoaster today, your emotions continue to rise and fall, giving you a queasy feeling in the pit of your stomach. You have grown tired of the thrills and chills, yet there doesn't seem to be much you can do about it. Don't worry; the key is to enjoy what you encounter along the way without being overly concerned about what you might find around the next bend. Be here now.

Your feelings are raw and deep today, yet you are able to navigate through difficult spaces quite efficiently. You're processing dark feelings quite rapidly now, but not because you wish to avoid them. In fact, it's just the opposite; you can benefit from your willingness to jump into the fire, experience the intensity of the heat and then let go as the metamorphosis occurs.

Although you might be sidetracked today by someone else's drama, you won't be able to stay serious for too long. You're quick to employ your advanced skills of evasive active, especially if they help you to avoid an awkward issue.
