But applying a bit of wit and charm at the right time can be the perfect antidote for an intense situation that could use some levity to counteract the gravity.

Playing a heavy-handed role today might not be the best strategy to reach your goals, especially if your attempts fall short of successfully pulling it off. Luckily, you won't waste too much time being self-critical because you can see the silver linings in every dark cloud now. There's no need to rush in the pursuit of your dreams. The sky will clear on its own.

Your feelings are transforming too fast to make any long-term decisions now. Although your overall values are constant, your moods continue to shift as you learn more about those close to you. Even if you're afraid of losing control in a relationship, your fear is likely worse than any possible outcome. Focusing on the best-case scenario now actually helps it to manifest. Your imagination clears the path for reality to follow.

Losing your faith is nearly impossible today, even if you bump up against difficult emotions. An old issue might resurface, prompting you to feel insecure about your family or social relationships. But once you accept that the present circumstances are quite different from your past, it's much easier for you to see the sweet potential rather than doom and gloom. Set positive intentions, but don't expect instant miracles.

Consider the wide variety of alternatives in front of you today, rather than stubbornly fixating on any one idea. However, focusing on your future may not be as straightforward as you wish. Although you can explore new perspectives without losing track of your original destination, you might still be overwhelmed with all your choices. Keeping your channels of communication open increases your chances of reaching your goals. Help is readily available if you simply ask for it.

An unresolved financial issue may capture your attention today. Even if the problem is something you prefer to avoid, it's better to face the music sooner than later. However, when all is said and done, you still could have a few loose ends to tie up. Unfortunately, you might need to simply accept that you're only human and move on. Don't let current circumstances drain your energy or your positive attitude. You need to be operating at your best for whatever the future holds.

Quieting your mind is an impossible task now because your thoughts continue to bounce around, prompting you to change your mind on a whim. However, the Moon's current visit to airy Gemini brings a sharp edge of focus to your perceptions. Take whatever time you need to write down your best ideas, but wait a day or two before making any final decisions. Choosing the right moment to act is an art in itself.

People trust you more these days if you give them an opportunity to share their feelings with you. Unfortunately, everyone is so busy now that it's nearly impossible to connect with them. Thankfully, you know when to walk away from all the noise. Your best bet today might be to find a quiet spot where you can talk privately with a friend. All is well when you're taking care of those you love.

Working with others can be quite a challenge now, especially if a fearful person's resistance is slowing down the entire process. Hold tightly to your objectivity; losing patience isn't in your best interest today. Show your strength by adapting to the circumstances instead of digging in your heels. Your generosity of spirit overcomes nearly any obstacle that stands in your way.

Your current plans don't make as much sense now that everyone is running around in different directions, making it hard for you to stick to your agenda. Letting go of your expectations brings welcome relief today, especially if you maintain a sense of humor. Laughing releases tensions, enabling you to gracefully move through an uncomfortable situation. Keep an open mind and you might even learn a valuable lesson that you can apply later on.

Cramming a lot of activity into one day doesn't necessarily mean that you are being productive. You might feel as if you're running around in circles today on a quest for something to challenge you. But you may grow weary of searching for the missing puzzle piece that makes sense of everything else. However, the answer to your malaise can't be found externally. Time spent in contemplation or meditation offers more rewards now than wasting energy on pursuing worldly distractions.

Delivering on your promises usually feels gratifying, but today it can also present a unique set of problems. Your feelings shift as do the prevailing winds of change, and you would be wise to modify your plans accordingly. If you run into someone who has recently decided to take a different course or wants to alter an agreement with you, don't bother fighting it. Just absorb what is said and make the most sensible adjustments as quickly as possible. Cooperation leads to more progress now than competition.

Your partner may agree to your plans today, but the energy is too scattered to make much progress. Don't waste time attempting to get others on board; instead, remember that different points of view could be just as valid as yours. There are multiple answers to any question, so consider all your options rather than cleverly trying to find one quick solution to sell to everyone else. The process of collaboration ultimately produces the best results.

The tiniest little detail might be what counts the most today. An apparently insignificant event can complicate your work and delay your progress. Pay meticulous attention to how everything fits together to assure there's no trouble. Balancing your powerful focus with a graceful flexibility grounds you while also freeing you from your current dilemma. Think outside of the box to discover a different route to success.

A creative project might come to a temporary standstill today because there are so many intriguing possibilities on the horizon. You need to decide if you want to continue on the same path or change your direction. You may be overwhelmed by all the choices, making you second-guess your original plan. Don't be afraid to examine your motives in greater depth to enrich your understanding of the entire process. Instead of losing yourself in endless analysis, let your intuition be your guide.

Managing a dynamic situation at home might look like child's play, but you still take it very seriously. You really don't want to be distracted by any career or community involvement now as you realize how important your family is to you. Communication is a significant key to conflict resolution, yet it's easy to get swept up into someone's passionate argument today. Maintain your objectivity while tuning into the emotions behind the words. Oddly enough, your rational outlook and compassionate heart are an unbeatable combination.

Everything seems to be happening so fast now that you don't even have time to think about what you're going to do; you simply do it. You barely complete a conversation or finish a project before something new comes at you from another direction. Fortunately, you are a master at thinking on your feet and reacting quickly. No particular planning is necessary today; you can always make adjustments later on. Give yourself permission to embrace the spontaneity of the moment.

You're resistant to participating in a group event now because you don't want to relinquish your sense of control over your day. Although you might be able to muster up enough energy to slip by unnoticed, others may perceive you as lazy because they don't feel your enthusiasm. However, limiting most of your activity to the non-physical world of emotional fantasy isn't a waste of time since today's dreams can turn into tomorrow's reality.

You may be quite excited about what's ahead but something is simultaneously anchoring you to the past. Ironically, the future might even feel more real than the present moment. Unfortunately, it's probably harder than you think to execute your plans today. Instead of trying to manage all the variables, take a radical approach and just let go of control for a while. Floating on the waves without resistance is more productive now than struggling to maintain your current direction.

You could be feeling stressed today, especially if your friends expect you to be a team player and you want to relax. Even if you spend much of the day at home, it's challenging to take your mind completely off unsettling dynamics at work or in your community. Thankfully, you don't have to resolve the tension immediately. Instead, allow your feelings to ebb and flow with your own emotional tides, putting off significant decisions until the pressure subsides.

Expressing your feelings is not as simple as it sounds today. Even if you try to share what's on your mind, language falls short of communicating your experience. Although anger from an old emotional wound may linger, it's hard to stay in a negative place for very long now because of all the possibilities you see waiting on the horizon. Instead of talking about your dilemma, improve your life one positive step at a time. Actions speak louder than words.

Typically, your top priority is putting all your facts in order rather than exploring your feelings about a complex situation. However, you can push through old emotional limitations and into new territory today because you want the most intense experience you can find. Your impulsive behavior might surprise your friends because you usually adopt a more cautious approach. Acknowledge your desires even if you're afraid of being judged. Don't let this special opportunity to create positive change slip through your fingers.

Improving relationship dynamics takes some extra effort now because it's difficult to rein in your thoughts and feelings. Nevertheless, it's a smart strategy to try to open the lines of communication anyhow. Be careful; if you are a procrastinator, you may have to contend with someone who has a very different idea of what you should be doing today. Nevertheless, don't worry too much about other people's expectations. Do what you can to keep the energy flowing, but take care of yourself, too, even if it means doing nothing at all.

You are willing to freely express your feelings today because you're not so worried about receiving a harsh reaction from anyone else. You might even get an adrenaline rush from stepping over the edge of acceptability, if only for the shock value. However, revealing your quirkiness is safer now because you are so focused on whatever work needs to be done. It's easier to get away with being weird when you are also highly efficient.

You may appear overly enthusiastic today because you throw yourself wholeheartedly into nearly everything you do. Others have a hard time keeping up with you as you race around fulfilling your current obligations. Ironically, you still might feel as if you're running out of time even though you're on a creative roll now. Remember that other people need to adhere to schedules, even if you're less attached to their concept of linear time. A little sensitivity goes a long way toward establishing harmony.

Your day could offer the respite you need, though it still may be challenging for you to sit back and fully enjoy it. A hectic day on the home front magnifies your desire for some peace and quiet, but you might be bored by the time you finally get it. Remember, there's no reason to create additional drama where none previously existed. Your attitude can make all the difference in the world; finding your center enables you to grab moments of calm even in the midst of chaos.

You might experience an intellectual breakthrough today. You could learn something new from a close friend that helps you understand how much others value your contributions now. But rather than resting on your laurels and basking in the warmth of the compliments, you're already eager for the next project. It's admirable to pursue your ambitions so passionately, but first take time to celebrate your previous accomplishments.

The real world may not seem very important now as you entertain your fantasies. Fortunately, your daydreaming might turn into quite a spiritual journey if you are ready to minimize your attachment to material needs. Nevertheless, no matter how this kind of inter-dimensional thinking plays itself out, financial concerns could bring you crashing back down to earth today. Attend to your commitments with the same urgency that you give your dreams so you can return to your creative pursuits as soon as possible.

You want to make sure that everyone knows exactly what's on your mind as communicator Mercury marches into your spontaneous sign. But it feels as if your intentions are thwarted over and over again today. Ironically, the more determined you are to speak your piece, the more frustrated you become. Perhaps it's best to take your cues from the current circumstances and keep your thoughts to yourself for now instead of fighting against the tide. Your delivery will be more convincing if you wait a few more days.

You know what you should do today, but may be so entangled in all the details that you don't have a clue where to start. Each time you revise your plan of attack, you bump into another problem that needs to be resolved before you can make any real headway. You might be tempted to throw your hands up in the air and walk away. However, the current dilemma is more like a test than a setback. There's no reason to panic or give up; just keep calm and stay focused on the final destination.

Patience is not usually your strong suit, but there's no way to escape the fact that you must play the waiting game today. However, your desire to find an immediate resolution to a pesky problem only makes matters worse. Concentrate on finding a long-term solution rather than a quick fix, so the resistance will dissipate and things can gradually start to move in your direction. Steady progress is best achieved now one step at a time.

You might instigate a power play today, yet your family and co-workers probably don't even realize what's happening. You have a plan to reach your goals but could go about your business in a rather sneaky manner now. Working toward a specific goal is admirable, but don't get caught up in complicated schemes. Find the courage to tell others the truth about what you're doing and why. You may be pleasantly surprised by the support you receive when you are completely honest.

You rarely have trouble letting others know where you stand. However, you may be more secretive now than anyone realizes. You appear to be straightforward when you tell everyone what's on your mind, but your spoken words differ from your desires. Don't be too hard on yourself; you're under no obligation to disclose your emotional needs as long as you're meeting your current obligations. Share your personal story with your associates later on if and when you feel like it. Your heart doesn't have to be an open book for everyone to read.

You want to be more engaged with your coworkers, but your cautious nature prevents you from being too friendly. Nevertheless, you still might find yourself in a social situation now where you need to interact with someone who isn't in your closest circle of friends. Don't be overly critical of anyone today, including yourself; save your judgment for another time. Getting along with others is easier once you accept yourself just as you are. A warm smile might be enough to get the ball rolling.

You are comfortable falling back on your role as peacemaker by listening to all the stories being told at work today. Even if you're expected to hold a centrist position that validates each individual person, you aren't as neutral as everyone thinks. Nevertheless, you feel the pressure to keep your opinion quiet now. Although your frustration may increase throughout the day, rest assured the tension will eventually fade, allowing space for a whole new round of negotiations.

There may be rules at work that seem very rigid, perhaps with good reason, but you want them to change anyhow. You're tempted to unilaterally break out of the old routine, but sudden action on your part today could destabilize the whole system. Instead of expecting everything to shift immediately, keep up a gentle but constant pressure. Although nothing seems to move fast enough for your tastes, your steady force can ultimately bend reality in your favor.

Something dramatic happens today that impacts your attitude and empowers you to think outside of the box. Although your thoughts may be unrestrained, an array of complications prevents you from openly sharing them with others. Perhaps your ingenious idea will work, but there's a high cost of upsetting the current stability of your relationships at work. Don't speak too soon; make sure your solution is practical before telling others about it later in the week when the timing is better.

You may feel a bit like a military leader now, preparing for your next campaign. But warrior Mars harshly opposes the willful Sun tomorrow, already making it tricky to draw the line between assertive action and overt aggression. You could get so worked up about accomplishing a specific task that you temporarily forget that not everyone shares the same goal. Step back and ask what others need before assuming that they want to follow your orders.

The pace of your life is hectic these days, yet you're enjoying the exciting buzz of energy. However, it's difficult to stick to your daily routine and accomplish your goals for the day. You might be torn between talking about all the amazing things that are happening now and having to perform your same old job in the same old way. You know what's possible, but it seems a step away no matter how quickly you walk. Work smarter instead of harder; you have a better chance of catching up with your intentions next week.

Feeling happy about what you're doing is one thing, but it's something entirely different to communicate your experience to someone else. Although you seem to be making progress, you might not receive the support that you expect today. Confronting others won't help; in fact, it only heightens the tension. Just get along doing the best you can on your own; your friends and associates will be suitably impressed when they see the results of your productivity.

Set priorities and start tackling your to-do list early in the day. Although you're eager to work hard, everything could still take longer than you think. You're in a feisty mood today as the Sun opposes your key planet Mars, but it's hard to know where to direct your passion. Relationship dynamics may feel tense now, making it crucial to avoid petty ego disputes. Don't waste your energy trying to win an argument, even if you know you're right. Taking the high road isn't easy but it's the most reliable path to success.

Even if you were planning on kicking back and relaxing today, there's more going on in your immediate environment than you can ignore. Attempting to avoid the action only creates tension now, for you're likely to be pulled in by unplanned circumstances anyhow. It's best to throw in the towel sooner than later, for you just might have fun once you let yourself be swept up in the social whirlwind. Embrace the element of surprise and anything can happen.

You have been operating on overdrive for a while now and you wish you could take some time off before you run out of steam. Although there are signs that you can slow down ahead, you won't be let off the hook just yet. You might be able to amaze others with how much you accomplish, but burning yourself out in the process is surely not worth it. If you're feeling somewhat depleted today, sneak away to recharge your batteries before you jump back into the race.

Someone may be expecting you to do more than you can deliver and you don't like to let anyone down even if you're feeling overcommitted. In fact, you don't want to miss out on any of the action now, so you might say yes before you think about the consequences. Allowing yourself to be talked into any activities that scatter your energy is not a good idea today. Creating healthy boundaries gives others the opportunity to respect your limits. Taking care of yourself is just as important as nurturing everyone else.

Your current service to others may be tied to your spiritual aspirations, but spinning lots of wheels at once can also prevent you from attending to your own dreams. Interactions with friends act as a catalyst now, sending you back into your colorful imagination. There is nothing wrong with entertaining your fantasies as long as you don't use them to escape from a conflict in the real world. Nevertheless, avoiding unnecessary drama allows your generous spirit to shine while still leaving time for your inner journey.

You have more time to figure out how to improve your cash flow, yet you still might believe that you have to make a decision right away. If you feel an overwhelming sense of urgency, take several deep breaths and step back from the situation. Hasty actions won't be productive today, so consider all your options before you shift into gear. There's no need to rush now; believe it or not, everything is unfolding according to schedule.

Someone's behavior may not be totally transparent now and he or she might even be working against your good intentions. Don't lash out if you discover that a friend isn't being supportive; take what you learn in stride. Making others feel guilty will only waste your time and energy. Be thankful that you know the truth about what's really going on, for what you don't know can hurt you more than you think. Although it's wise to watch your back, giving another person the benefit of the doubt is an exercise of compassion.

Unexpressed feelings can be complicated to manage if your anger or resentment has nowhere to go. Unfortunately, it could be tough to understand what is motivating you now and how deep your passions run. Don't just jump into an argument today since you may be tricking yourself into believing that a simple solution exists. Move cautiously, for you are so receptive now that your emotions may be projecting from someone else. A current conflict is more easily resolved by doing your inner work than by just fixing something externally in your environment.

Remaining practical while diving deeply into your own emotional reservoir can be a challenging task today. You're probably reluctant to set aside unrealistic dreams, even if obligations are keeping you on a short leash. Stay true to your highest ideals by doing the most responsible thing. Be as thorough as possible when it comes to your work for more is going on than meets the eye. There's a fine balance between taking care of business and honoring the whims of your heart.

Although you are extremely impatient today, honoring your responsible nature minimizes the chances of doing anything foolish. Fortunately, you have a secret reserve of energy, enabling you to finish what you start as long as you don't fly off the edge on an emotional tangent. If you find yourself itching to do something else, just remember that there will be plenty of time later to start a new project. Be consistent and stay on your path without making any sudden changes in direction.

Trust what you feel in your body now instead of solely relying on your intellect to discover a solution. Nevertheless, you still need to dig beneath the obvious since you won't be satisfied until you know the whole truth. Others may not understand your interest in subjects that seem irrelevant to them, but don't worry about what they think. If it seems significant to you, then take the time to check it out. After all, you're the director of your own movie and the star of your own show.

It's not too late to review your action plan for the days ahead if you stumble upon an important fact you previously missed. Don't waste time arguing with others today; it's more critical to uncover the truth than it is to make your point. Avoid lingering in discouragement, even if you discover something you don't like. This is a wonderful opportunity to refine your strategy and improve your chances for success.

You can accomplish a lot today as long as you don't set work aside in order to pursue pleasure. Thankfully, overcoming obstacles is easier now because the Moon is traveling through your 5th House of Self-Expression while she supports the radiant Sun in your sign. However, it's more important to deliver on your promises than it is to find immediate gratification. But don't try to place the blame for your dilemma on external circumstances. Just consider the consequences of your actions and do whatever makes the most sense in the long run.

You can't escape your responsibilities today, yet you're more likely to be concerned with expressing your desires than you are with meeting your current obligations. Your romantic heart may be in direct conflict with your pragmatic head, distracting you from accomplishing your work. Even if you are motivated to follow your feelings now, there's no need to do anything about them. Allow your emotional stress to peak and then subside before swinging into action.

You're in your element if your coworkers turn this into a very busy day because you prefer to stay in motion now. You're in rare form and can show off your wit and charm, flitting from one activity to another. However, irrepressible desires are brewing just beneath the surface, so don't waste your time on trivial matters today. Take this opportunity to deliver a meaningful message. But keep some energy in reserve for when you will need it over the next several days.

You can be so sensitive to other people's moods that it's often tough to take direct action, especially if you're unsure of the reaction you may receive. However, instead of adopting a wait-and-see approach today, you're more likely to respond without thinking to a complicated situation at work. But being wildly impulsive isn't helpful either. Overconfidence leads to recklessness; it's smarter to solve the existing problems now than to create new ones.

Your actions might seem transparent today with the demonstrative Leo Moon lighting up your 1st House of Personality. But you're in touch with feelings that haven't fully reached the surface yet, so someone may get the wrong idea about you. Paradoxically, your thoughts carry even more weight now because they are unspoken. Observe how others judge you without saying any more than is necessary. It's better to share what's on your mind after you figure out who you can trust with your secrets.

You try to keep your preferences quiet today because you don't want other people to know your likes and dislikes. You can easily rationalize hiding your desires because you're unwilling to hurt anyone else's feelings. Nevertheless, the dynamics are more complicated than they seem, since remaining silent about your needs further contributes to the awkwardness. Sharing your feelings in a sensitive manner encourages cooperation rather than resistance.

You want to demonstrate your appreciation for your coworkers and associates today, but you prefer to do it in an emotionally detached manner. However, your need for objectivity becomes more noticeable once you start sharing your feelings because others are likely to be more responsive than you expect. You may be required to confront your own ambiguity now, especially if someone reacts with great intensity. Even if you are resistant at first to revealing your vulnerability, you'll feel relieved once everything is out in the open.

You may startle yourself today with the speed of your reaction to an event that seems to be beyond your control. You might say that you're willing to go with the flow, but the emotional Moon is in fixed Leo, making it difficult for you to adapt to the changes. Most surprises should turn out for the best as long as you're willing to step into unknown territory, face the current challenges with a positive attitude and stay open to altering your overall course of action.

Meeting your match is momentarily enchanting today as someone with lots of big ideas captures your imagination. However, you might wish that you could escape if the energy gets to be too much, but you won't likely try very hard. No matter what you do now, philosophical conversations seem to follow you around. Fortunately, you can learn something quite valuable from your interactions with others. Keeping your mind open enables you to widen your horizons and cover new ground.

Nothing is as simple as it appears today; although you want to stick to your agenda, you find it tedious to follow the ins and outs of a complex conversation. Oddly enough, you're feeling restless and you might prefer to jump around from one topic to another. Or, perhaps you just slip off and disappear into your daydreams where no one can find you. The tables are turned now since you're the one who is seeking the fun and resisting the work. Let the good times roll.

Although you might appear to be open to change, your mind is probably already made up and more facts won't likely alter your thinking today. Unfortunately, this rigidity on your part can amplify your troubles now. You don't gain anything by allowing yourself to be controlled by unexpressed fears. Talking about your current apprehensions with a trusted friend is the most effective way to dissipate negative energy before it creates a more persistent problem.

You would like to impress everyone with your hard work today, but it may be a struggle to walk your talk. Unfortunately, your immediate needs might be in conflict with those around you, making it more complicated to know what to do next. However, there's no reason to set aside your desires just to placate others. Ultimately, you know what will work best for you, so quiet your mind and listen to your own intuition rather than seeking answers from anyone else.

You're feeling so confident today that you don't think you should have to play by the established rules of the game. Nevertheless, there is more going on than meets the eye. You could be confused about the dynamics of your current relationship or you might be in love with someone who doesn't return your affection. Even if you're anxious underneath your air of bravado, don't make any sudden changes. Your answers are still on the way.

You might be worried today because you're not as certain about some of the very same things you normally take for granted. You could act as if you know what you're doing but you are less than secure, especially in your role within your family. Thankfully, being in the company of others helps you feel better about yourself. However, don't go overboard by trying to be the center of attention now. Surrounding yourself with those you love reminds you of what's most important.

You may find yourself totally immersed in an intriguing discussion about world politics, great literature or the latest pop culture trends -- only to realize there was a misunderstanding earlier in the conversation. Although it might not be significant in the long run, it can ruffle some feathers in the moment. Slow down and take a more conservative approach until you know that everyone is on the same page. Listen at least as much as you speak today so you don't unintentionally step on anyone's toes.

Sharing your feelings with someone special could be wonderful today, but you should be on the lookout for hidden agendas, nonetheless. It is pleasant enough as long as you stay in the present moment, but as soon as you try to navigate into the future you might inadvertently set a course for conflict. Watch where you step for the next few days and let each situation guide you as you go. Paying careful attention to the clues enables you to steer clear of an unnecessary drama.

It helps to give your feelings plenty of room for expression while the Moon is visiting your sign. This is your time to explore a variety of emotional responses to your current circumstances. But don't be overly naive or someone will quickly pull the wool over your eyes. Take responsibility for your own feelings even if you don't yet know where they will lead you. However, there's no need to pretend you're in control, especially since a few surprises could still pop up along the way.

You are naturally a hard worker and you rarely have trouble delivering on your promises. However, it may be okay to let some of your responsibilities fall to the wayside for a while and take some time off today. Visit the outer limits of your imagination by losing yourself in a movie or a book. Step outside of the box in which you normally contain yourself so efficiently and float off into your dreams.

You're standing on a slippery slope where it's all too easy to confuse friendship with love. Although relationships are in the spotlight today, they can actually be a source of instability, especially if you depend on the other person to make the first move. Consider what you want and act on your feelings before the winds of fate blow you into dangerous waters. There's little room for ambiguity if you're clear about your intentions right from the start.

You are being pulled in two directions today. You feel the need to retreat from social obligations for a while so you can just chill out. But simultaneously, an inner voice reminds you of how much fun you have when you're hanging out with the right people. However, you first must push through your own resistance. Happily, you can have the best of both worlds if you pick your playmates carefully. Spending time in the company of those who love you is good for your heart.

You should be able to enjoy the fiery Leo Moon today, for it encourages you to stretch beyond your regular limitations. Unfortunately, everything is not as upbeat as you might expect, especially if you're reminded of a difficult time in your life. You may even begin to worry that something similar could happen again. Keep in mind that your fears only make things worse. Instead, lean on your innate wisdom to recognize the difference between then and now. Grab this opportunity to shine while it lasts.

Your feet are so firmly planted on solid ground today that you can safely poke your head up into the clouds. However, you should be careful since the rug can be pulled out from under you if you lose touch with reality. This twist of fate may come as a rude surprise to you sure-footed Goats, especially if you climb too far, too fast. Enjoy your explorations into uncharted lands but don't forget the way back home. You will need to return to your practical perspective before you know it.

If someone comes to you with a larger-than-life idea today, remember there's probably more to it than your realize. This isn't to suggest that the plan won't work; it's simply important to be aware that everything now appears better than it is. Look at all opportunities through the most realistic lens possible. And don't bother asking others for advice, for they'll just tell you what they think you want to hear. Your best bet is to wait a few days until your clarity returns.

You have a long list of mundane chores to finish today. Unfortunately, your fantasies may be much more interesting than what is actually happening in your real life. Luckily, if you change your attitude and get to work, you can make your reality nearly as awesome as you wish. However, don't let the details overwhelm you. Just fulfill your obligations as quickly as possible and then get back to whatever fills your spirit with fire.

If you feel tired today with more on your plate than you can handle, this is an obvious sign that you need to take some time to reevaluate your current direction. First, think about what your heart truly wants and pretend that nothing could keep you from your goals. Secondly, consider the very real obstacles you must overcome to reach your destination. Then methodically make the necessary changes to put your life back on track.

There may be something quite reassuring about being with your friends now, but social activities distract you from making progress at work. You can tell that something is happening, but your progress seems to be hidden from sight. Trust your own counsel, even if your inner voice sounds uncertain. The fundamental changes you make today bring positive results if you are patient.

You might want to go along with everyone's plans for the day, but you don't like the idea of being so closely tied to their schedules. You're probably not as attached to tradition as some other people are, but there's something to be gained now by going along with the crowd. Even if you want to take a more radical approach, a bit of self-compromise can actually bring you closer to the elusive happiness you seek. Find joy in whatever you're doing; you'll have your chance for more variety soon enough.

You're ready to jump into a project and do whatever needs to be done. There's no reason to waste time on frivolous activities these days. Still, you're quite aware that maintaining a professional appearance ultimately brings you closer to the security that you seek. Remember, you don't have to give up your real goals; instead, just wait a while longer to make your big move.

You have more than your fair share of common sense now, and even if this isn't normally your greatest strength, others are relying on you to hold things together. However, you might be motivated by something more personal than just helping everyone else. You are changing your life bit by bit in order to make your daily routines more efficient and productive. The more open you are to a variety of possibilities, the healthier this transition can be for you. This is your chance to bring your most colorful visions down to earth.

The potential for change is all around you. You may feel rather lighthearted today, unless you haven't already completed your work chores. However, once you are done you are ready to play, but you must know exactly what you are getting into before you can enjoy yourself. Don't scatter your energy before you meet your obligations or you might miss your chance to have fun later in the day. The more time you have away from your regular routine, the more time you have to explore all the possibilities on the horizon.

You may feel that someone is on your case now; no matter what you do, you should have done something else. Today's analytical Virgo Moon can bring emotional stress with home activities and family members. You might need to justify your actions even if you try to avoid the conflict. Do whatever you must to get through the awkwardness of the current situation without attaching too much meaning to anything that happens. Thankfully, keeping the peace buys you time until you gain additional perspective.

Even if you feel resistance emanating from others, you must take some of the responsibility for the tension. Your destiny is in your own hands; whatever situation you created you can unmake. But it will take a real commitment, along with enough courage to engage in a difficult conversation. Bringing someone into your confidence might be just the catalyst you need to transform the current dynamics.

You must be as practical as possible now in order to counterbalance everyone else's fuzzy thinking. But you could just as well be the ringleader of a pie-in-the-sky scheme, yourself. Either way, you have much to lose if you let your unbridled imagination run away with the facts. Making a list of the pros and cons enables you to sustain your newly found stability. Scaling your big ideas down to a manageable size greatly improves your chances of success.

It's crucial to honor your feelings today, even if they aren't consistent with your previous plans. But don't think that the solution is to just drop whatever you are doing in favor of something new. You must find a workable balance between the opposite forces pushing and pulling on your life now. However, you might grow more confused as you try to resolve the dilemma. Thankfully, talking it over with friends can help, especially if you're willing to listen to their sound advice.

Your imagination plays a significant role in your life today, but it's up to you to utilize the unrealized potential of the moment. Nevertheless, don't get so lost in your dreams that you can't keep up with your responsibilities. Go ahead and let your thoughts take you where they will without deviating from your regular schedule. Trusting your intuition is smart now, but keep your feet securely planted on the ground when reaching for the stars.

You are of two minds now. You would like to forget about your chores and join in the fun, but something prevents you from jumping overboard. There may be too much going on to escape from your previous commitments and you won't be able to enjoy yourself even if you do. Nevertheless, your friends are calling and they have an enticing plan. Take your time and make your choice only after you consider your options and decide what makes the most sense.

You think that you can't tell your friends what you really want now because you're afraid of being judged. Nevertheless, several planets are traveling through your feisty sign, prompting you to take a risk and express your feelings anyhow. However, it's crucial to consider the impact of your words on a loved one before saying something that could be misinterpreted. Don't be afraid of sharing your truth; just know when to stop or you could find yourself enmeshed in an unnecessary drama.

Although your desires may seem deliciously warm this morning, it could get much hotter than you expect as your ruling planet, Venus, continues to lure you into the heat of fantasy today. However, if you believe that you have overstepped your bounds, you might cool off rather suddenly and pull away. Unfortunately, someone could misinterpret your behavior and assume that your emotional retreat is because of your lack of affection. Avoid needless problems by communicating clearly from the start.

You might feel relatively clueless about your direction today, but the more you try to map out your destination, the less you seem to know which way to go. Unfortunately, your rational analysis won't give you the whole picture now, for reality is being augmented by emotional rather than logical currents. Stop trying to think your way through these circumstances. Oddly enough, you gain a sense of freedom, or even temporary exhilaration, when you surrender to your feelings and follow your heart.

You could seem a bit absent-minded today as you slip in and out of contact with your imagination. However, if you lose touch with other planes of existence, they still make themselves known in the here and now. You can stretch your awareness and have momentary glimpses of how all the pieces fit together. But eventually, you may close back down and might even be confused by the whole experience. Luckily, it's possible to relieve some of your anxiety by remembering that life is a mystery after all.

Reality may act just like a wet blanket as the truth dampens your spirits, especially if your expectations are overinflated now. But satisfaction might be within reach if you adjust your attitude so you can joyfully accept whatever opportunities you're being offered. This temporary setback isn't about lowering your standards; it's about practicing the art of being grateful for what you currently have. Counting your blessings is an excellent first step.

Your over-the-top optimism sets you up for disappointment today. Or, maybe, you're already discouraged and an enthusiastic friend tries to lift your spirits. No matter what occurs, you still might not feel very supported now. Just recognizing that others appreciate your talents and acknowledge your contributions could be enough to put you back on track. But don't withdraw if you feel misunderstood for any reason. Be clear about your intentions and you have a better chance of ultimately being seen for who you truly are.

You're often the one who takes the time to understand what others are feeling, even if your empathy ends up making decisions more difficult. However, interactions with people around you might leave you with a sense of disillusionment today. Relationships may seem like a total mystery now and you don't even know where to begin to put things back in balance. Thankfully, cultivating emotional detachment allows your perspective to return to normal in just a few days. In the meantime, keep the lines of communication open without making any sudden moves.

You don't ask for a lot today; all you want is the connection of familiarity with a close friend. Unfortunately, your support network might seem somewhat distant now, leaving you feeling lonely or nostalgic. However, it's not nearly as bad as it seems at first because the gulf between you and others won't last long, especially since it's largely the result of your own runaway imagination. Don't worry; the real world is on its way back, bringing more clarity along with it.

Your playful spirit might run into a wall today, but the external resistance won't hold you back for long. You may be required to readjust your goals, but that's just because they weren't all that realistic in the first place. Once you bring your hopes back into line, you could discover that the new obstacles will be much easier to overcome. If success starts to slip through your fingers, keep a positive attitude, reconsider your objectives and try again.

You have no trouble acting as the taskmaster today while the Moon aligns with stern Saturn. However, playing this lead role can be more work than you expected because charming Venus is attempting to soften your heart. But neither flirtation nor temptation should distract you from your current goals. Don't give in; you must hold up your end of the bargain now by being the most responsible one in the group. Ultimately, others will appreciate your perseverance and singular focus.

Sustaining your connection with your imagination isn't your top priority today because you want to produce tangible results. Although you're normally quite capable of depersonalizing your feelings so you can have a more universal understanding of reality and the human condition, today's Virgo Moon demands that you bring your ideas back down to earth. Don't go too far in either direction; seek ways to balance your dreams with your present circumstances so you can experience the best of both worlds.

Fitting yourself neatly into a box that's been created by someone else may be impossible today. But a close friend or partner has very specific expectations about how you should behave now, and you might not perform as desired. Conflicts between your personal styles or values is only a problem if one of you is so insecure that you need the other person to agree with you one hundred percent. Assure those you love that expressing your individuality doesn't mean you love them any less.

You may be so engrossed in the details of your life that you spend time on a task that ultimately proves to be relatively unimportant. Step out beyond your own personal dilemma long enough to see the situation from someone else's point of view. Backing away from the intensity enables you to broaden your perspective and perceive things in a whole new light. Anything is possible if you're ready to take a calculated risk and then work to make your dreams come true.

Looking your very best makes you feel confident enough to take on the world. But too much emphasis on glamour is a trap and you could get hooked into worrying about superficial matters. No matter how sharp you appear today, you still might be feeling insecure. Go ahead and be as stylish as you want, but don't let it stand in the way of being yourself. Your authenticity makes you much more attractive than keeping up with the newest fad or fashion. All it takes is to shine your light from within.

The pressure of responsibility is intensifying today, but it won't prevent your excitement from growing along with it. However, you're eager to inject a bit of joy into a sobering situation. Don't be shy; celebrate this energetic shift by spontaneously playing with friends or expressing yourself creatively. Having a little fun now is a great antidote for these serious times.

Choosing the exact words to share your story could be quite a challenge today. You have something you need to get off your chest, yet you aren't certain how to approach the topic. Maintain objectivity and avoid being overly emotional as you address specific situations rather than general concepts. Although your passion can be quite convincing, it's more important now to be precise so that others understand your message.

You know what everyone wants and are wise to trust your intuition today. But overconfidence might present problems, so show some humility along the way. Your persuasive charm and unflappable determination combines to make a stronger statement than you realize. Paradoxically, your intensity can have the opposite effect from what you want now, leaving you confused because you can't convince anyone to join you. Don't try so hard; letting go of your expectations gives others the space they need in order to say yes.

It's not too late to show your compassion and offer words of praise instead of constructive criticism. It's often easy to point out the flaws in those you love, but you don't realize how harsh your casual judgment can sound. Being gentle in your approach improves the delivery of your message. Remember that it's not always about aspiring for perfection; it's ultimately about giving positive reinforcement that encourages growth and transformation.

Your careful preparations will be rewarded today, especially if you take time to consider how others might react to your behavior. Unfortunately, having everything in order is not enough. You must also focus on your own feelings now that the reflective Moon is back in your sign. Don't worry about recognition; there will be plenty of time for acknowledgment later on. Just do your inner work and stay in touch with your heart.

Your idealistic intentions are commendable but you must balance them with conscious restraint now to give them the chance they deserve. If you indiscriminately scatter your energy everywhere, your assistance won't have the positive impact you want. Keep in mind that working on your own spiritual development can, paradoxically, be your greatest gift to others. When you are centered and coming from a place of love, your mere presence is a powerful healing force.

You may be especially productive if you are collaborating with other people today. The responsive Moon is currently hanging out in your 11th House of Groups, enabling you to reach your goals without upsetting the collective process. If you are in charge, consider how each person on the team can successfully contribute to the overall project. Take time to make the best strategic assignments now, for this is your surest path to success.

You innately understand how to inspire people to push beyond their normal limits. The diplomatic Libra Moon is visiting your 10th House of Career, empowering you to assume a position of authority today. Just remember that you don't have to make promises you can't keep just because you want to please someone. Setting ambitious goals is crucial now, but don't raise the bar so high that it's out of reach.

Your need for greater independence encourages you to try things on your own, but flying solo isn't the most effective route to reach your destination now. Slow down and seek out the advice of an expert today; you really don't have to reinvent everything yourself. The savings in time and energy is well worth it and could quickly give you a boost of momentum on your way to achieving your objectives.

You can see the beauty in an unorthodox approach to a problem, but you could miss the mark today if you don't think things through to their conclusion. Before sharing anything with others, make sure your ideas are solid enough to bother defending in the heat of battle. Steer clear of endless debate, for open conflict, even if it's civil, won't likely lead anywhere productive. You have a choice now; pick peace over unnecessary drama.

Considering everyone's feelings prior to initiating action means making decisions is very difficult today because you see everything from multiple perspectives. Even if you are in tune with your desires, you may be unsure of the best time to make your move. However, you might think you don't have the option of waiting, but that comes from a false sense of urgency. Stop to assess the alternatives and postpone your final choices as long as possible. In this case, doing your research really counts.

Your natural tendency is to tackle your tasks one at a time and just methodically plow through them. However, there's so much going on now that you might not be able to decide where to begin. Unfortunately, procrastination is not the answer today because the longer you put off the inevitable, the harder it gets. Be courageous and jump in anywhere you can. Things will fall into place once you quit worrying and get to work.

You might think that you can have fun while running errands or doing your chores today, but you may need to work hard to overcome the obstacles you encounter along the way. You could even wonder if someone is blocking your progress, but don't jump to any hasty conclusions before you have sufficient facts to support your concerns. It's best to keep moving toward your goals rather than wasting time rationalizing why you should turn around and give up. Taking the high road gives you an opportunity to shine.

It's a bit simplistic to believe that you can accommodate everyone's needs just because you see a complex issue from all angles. Although you may not have an easy answer, you could be the right person to mediate a serious domestic conflict today. Nevertheless, the picture might grow more complicated if you feel pressure to take sides. Don't be afraid to establish strong boundaries by letting others know that you will share your assessment only after you are ready.

You want to take the time to hear everyone's plans for the future before revealing your own. Unfortunately, you might need to make a critical decision that ends up disappointing someone, even if you do your best to take the concerns of others into consideration. It's great to be optimistic in your outlook, but you won't likely agree with every person involved. Explain your choices as kindly and firmly as possible; the best thing you can do next is to lead by example and move on.

Your analytical skills are your greatest strength now, especially when you build on your previous work instead of beginning something new. However, you might face your own internal resistance before taking your work to the next level today. Although your fear of failure could make you worry that your efforts will go unnoticed, this isn't the right time to reassess your direction. Just stick to your present path with as much confidence as you can muster; you may be progressing faster now than you realize.

You don't have a lot of patience with others who act selfishly, but it's awkward to tell them what they already should know. You're on edge with the evocative Moon back in your sign now; however, it's a mistake to keep your annoyance quiet just to maintain the peace. Unfortunately, there could be an emotional price to pay if you don't express yourself today. The good news is that with a little social finesse you can remain authentic without placing blame on anyone else.

Every task -- no matter how minor -- is more complicated when you cannot make up your mind about what to do first. Ironically, the facts seem clear, yet you're struggling with a dilemma as your imagination pulls you in opposite directions today. Unfortunately, your refusal to give up on either side prevents you from making the best choice. Your best bet is to wait out your uncertainty until the answer becomes more apparent. In the meantime, flexibility is your friend.

Expressing your emotions honestly always sounds like the best policy, but a spontaneous declaration of love may not go over very well today. Unfortunately, writing about the desires of your heart in an email or text won't necessarily fare any better. Mischievous Mercury's influence can bend your emotions out of shape, so you might not have a very clear perspective now, even if you believe you do. Only fools rush in; be smart and wait a few days before saying what's on your mind. Channel your passion into expressing your creativity instead.

You may have to play the role of the bad guy in a family conflict today. Or, perhaps someone is in dire need of your parenting skills now. However, you would rather hold a neutral position while you listen to everyone's concerns. Even if you've had more than enough of hearing other people complain, you don't have the luxury of being able to let your attention wander. Seeking the meaning behind the words instead of being distracted by the emotional intensity can trigger the breakthrough you were hoping for all along.

You have things to do that you've never done before, but fortunately, you like the excitement of new experiences. Your knack for balancing what you know with the unknown comes in handy today. However, you still must exercise caution or you could become lackadaisical in your approach. There's very little margin for error, so don't get lazy. Lowering your guard now is a likely invitation to trouble. Enjoy the adrenaline rush of embarking on an adventure, but make sure to be back home in time for dinner.

You are strong enough to handle the deep emotions of those around you, but you may be riding a seesaw today as you try to balance someone else's feelings with your own. You truly want to be present for those you love, but you're unsure about opening up to outside negativity now. The real lesson comes from being a supportive friend while still maintaining healthy boundaries. Your compassion can have a much more powerful impact if you're willing to share your heart.

Your impulsive nature is even more reactive than ever today. The Libra Full Moon Eclipse electrifies your 7th House of Relationships, pulling you out of your comfort zone as you attempt to keep peace with your partner. Although it's easy to say that the next time you will think before you act, it's going to take consistent effort to follow through on your good intentions. Nevertheless, tempering your sense of immediacy has a calming effect now on everyone involved.

Today's top priority is to find a comfortable middle ground between being selfish and taking care of others. Your sweet nature inspires you to act in a selfless manner today as the Libra Full Moon Eclipse polarizes your 6th House of Service. Thankfully, you also know how important it is to fulfill your own needs. Avoid getting swept up in a cause unless it is an issue that is close to your heart. Following your moral compass guides you to give back generously in ways that really count.

Although you may be willing to go along with the group's plans now, you still must make time to have a meaningful interaction that involves just you and one special person. Today's Libra Full Moon is eclipsed in your 5th House of Self-Expression, prompting you to say what's on your mind. Naturally, it's fun to hang out with your friends, but don't let the possibility of transient pleasure be a distraction from the tougher issues you need to address. Establish your priorities and initiate a serious discussion with the one you love.

You are easily annoyed if professional obligations keep you from spending time with your family now. The Libra Full Moon Eclipse emphasizes your 4th House of Emotional Security, reminding you of the contrast between the life you live at home and the one you experience out in the world. However, it's liberating once you realize that you don't have to make a choice. You just need to balance these two aspects of your life the best you can without turning frustration into resentment. Oddly enough, a shift in your attitude may be all it takes to make everyone happy.

You may have plenty of expectations about where a current friendship can take you. However, now that the Libra Full Moon Eclipse shakes up your 3rd House of Information, your plans might not reach fruition unless you're willing to discuss your concerns. Express your emotions without blaming anyone else or you could get sidetracked by an unnecessary conflict that sidesteps the real issue. Facing your fears isn't so scary if you keep the lines of communication open.

You might think that your intentions are obvious to others and that you are truly sharing your innermost feelings now; however, you still remain an enigma to those around you. The Libra Full Moon Eclipse lands in your 2nd House of Values, requiring you to look within yourself to uncover deeply rooted beliefs that block your expression. Bring what's most important to you out into the open today or things may not turn out the way you wish. Your willingness to be transparent helps everyone involved gain more clarity.

Finding the harmony that you wish to have in your personal relationships is elusive now. Today's Lunar Eclipse occurs in your sign, indicating that you or someone very close to you may be dealing with unexpressed emotions that stand in the way of intimacy. Holding back what really needs to be said only makes matters worse. But shifting the focus by accusing another person of wrongdoing won't help either. Taking the high road by sharing your fears first enables you to find solutions by looking ahead rather than searching for causes in the past.

Sometimes it's impossible for you to keep cool when your emotions heat up. However, other times you can feel so agitated that you turn to ice in order to prevent the situation from boiling over. Today's Libra Full Moon Eclipse rattles your 12th House of Secrets, challenging you to engage with those around you without overwhelming them with your intensity. Thankfully, following your regular routine allows you to channel your nervous energy into less volatile activities. Throwing yourself into your work might be enough to take the edge off.

You may be a hopeless romantic searching for love, but instead you only find playful pals as today's Libra Full Moon Eclipse triggers your 11th House of Social Networking and your 5th House of Romance. Although there is surely nothing wrong with the camaraderie of good friendship, it isn't the same as the more intimate relationship you want now. Don't get discouraged and go silent. Keeping your heart open can ultimately attract the type of soul connection you seek.

You are in high demand on the job today, but this professional popularity might place pressure on the home front as the Libra Full Moon Eclipse stresses your 10th House of Career. Don't try to cover your insecurities by shifting into overdrive if you are unsure you can fulfill all your responsibilities. Even if putting in more hours at work seems logical, it can exhaust you -- and you still may not complete your assignments. Instead, establish a sustainable pace now so you have more time to spend with those you love.

You could be treading on unstable ground today as you attempt to keep a previously scheduled trip on track. You might even worry about travel plans falling apart now that the Libra Full Moon Eclipse overstimulates your 9th House of Faraway Places. But don't let your irrational fears impact your current decisions. Even if you're ready to just pack your bags and go, consider all your options before picking one path and following it off into the sunset.

Staring down your deepest fears might not be your idea of fun, but intense emotional issues appear in a variety of forms now. The Libra Full Moon Eclipse falls in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, indicating a possible struggle with an intimate partner. However, one of the benefits of interacting with someone you love is discovering previously hidden parts of yourself. Shining your light of awareness into the shadows can reveal buried treasure if you have the courage to delve into the unknown.

You tend to express what's on your mind without hesitation, but you need to be extra careful today before opening your mouth or you may face unpleasant consequences. You might have so much to say about a particular topic that it comes across as if you've been suppressing it for a while. However, you haven't necessarily been holding back; it's just that you're ready to throw caution to the wind now. Thankfully, simply considering the ramifications of your words and your actions could save you from an uncomfortable situation.

As much as you might want to compromise today, you can still be pretty stubborn when it comes down to something that matters. You may act in a diplomatic manner, but you could annoy someone if you try to gloss over the difficulties without answering the tough questions. Decide what is more important now -- your ego or your peace of mind. Once you make your choice, your next move will be obvious.

When push comes to shove, you cleverly start to plan your escape route. You don't necessarily enjoy direct confrontation unless it is done in the spirit of mutual respect. However, there may be an irrepressible emotional issue that ripples to the surface today. Whether or not it's a smart idea to pursue resolution doesn't seem to matter because you're ready to rumble. Don't be the victim of circumstance; use your powers of self-restraint to avoid an unnecessary meltdown. Sometimes the best offense is to just walk away.

You need to pay attention to your thoughts because what you don't say can be a source of trouble. Your inner voice is attempting to convince you to communicate a significant message to someone at work. You may come very close to opening a can of worms, leaving you with a real mess to clean up. On the other hand, if you say nothing, your hurt could turn to anger and resentment now, which isn't any better. Seek the elusive middle path for the best possible results.

Your thoughts are quite loud today -- maybe even too noisy for your own good. You can irritate others if you don't let them complete their sentences before you respond to what they haven't yet said. They might even falsely assume that you're not interested in sharing the spotlight. From your point of view, it's just a matter of expediency. You want to take the fastest route to the finish line. Paradoxically, if you slow down and listen now, you will have a real shot at finishing first.

You can execute nearly any mental maneuvers like a skilled general today. But be careful about coming out with all guns blazing because revealing too much aggression has a funny way of backfiring. Your key planet Mercury opposes warrior Mars now so it's wise to rely on your intellect rather than direct action. Fortunately, your sharp verbal and analytical skills will serve you well as long as you don't lose your temper. Cool your jets and think twice before you speak once.

Although your friends and associates may be extremely nice to you, something is still bothering you enough to trigger an emotional response. Thankfully, you probably will exhibit enough wisdom to keep your negative feelings to yourself. Instead, dissipate the emotional energy by working it off doing chores and buzzing around like a busy bee. Meanwhile, you still might feel angry, even if it seems inappropriate. Moderate your reaction and say as little as possible until you have things back in perspective. Better safe than sorry now when it comes to sharing your heart.

You are drawn into the mesmerizing mysteries of your own imagination today. Anything beyond your five senses is a captivating attraction, luring you down a metaphorical rabbit hole. However, you may be seeking hidden meanings where there just aren't any, and your frustration can make you cranky. Even if you feel a bit paranoid now, don't blame anyone else for the images arising from your subconscious. Just sit back and enjoy the show.

Your thoughts are zipping around today, possibly moving so fast that you can't even finish one idea before you jump to the next one. Others may criticize you for your sloppy thinking, but their negativity only irritates you since you were hoping for their support. Instead of posturing to defend your ideas, use the feedback you receive to help sharpen your perceptions and improve your plans. There is a distinct advantage to being a team player now rather than trying to prove you can do everything on your own.

You want to bring a serious thought out into the open, but you fear there will be serious fallout from what you have to say. You might have been hurt emotionally and it's still difficult to express your pain. You may be mad at someone, but you don't relish hurting their feelings, too. Naturally, you think through the conversation beforehand so your message will be both clear and fair. The only problem is that once you begin to talk, you quickly go off script. Relax; everything will be alright if you speak from your heart and not your head.

You may feel as if your energy is all backed up like a sewage system in a commercial for a 24-hour emergency plumber. You make the call, but the plumber's phone number has been disconnected. Thankfully, your current situation is not nearly as bad as it seems now. However, your panicky reactions could be a large part of the problem. Even if this seems like a weird time, it's best not to do anything too drastic. Trusting your intuition is more helpful in the long run than jumping to an erroneous conclusion that just makes matters worse.

There's no reason to play the role of a victim today. If reality is giving you a hard time, simply acknowledge your part in the current drama. The truth is that the present circumstances are unfolding with your participation and in some unknown way according to your plan. Even if you feel overwhelmed, remember you can methodically navigate your way through these crazy times as long as you don't expect everything to change overnight.

You may be worried about the consequences of taking time off now because you believe that you shouldn't receive the goodies without putting in the effort. So, instead of heading out to play with your friends, you're probably working like a busy bee today. Although your conscientious attitude is admirable, it's also important to stop and enjoy the fruits of your labors. Make the most of your day by setting aside a bit of time to live in the present moment and have fun.

Although you might set out to be practical today, common sense quickly loses ground to the possibility of finding pleasure. Your desires are intense and satisfaction appears to be within reach now, so it's difficult for anyone to talk you out of your pursuit of happiness. Happily, your key planet Venus is harmonizing with indulgent Jupiter this evening, indicating that there's no reason to deny yourself a delightful experience. Stop questioning your luck and gratefully accept the blessings of the day.

You have a charmed day on your hands and you may not even be required to wave your magic wand or recite a secret incantation to make everything go your way. Ironically, you don't have to work hard to have your wishes fulfilled; it might feel as if you won the lottery for no reason at all. So, let go of any lingering negativity and take the good fortune as it comes. Put off some of your chores until tomorrow. Go out and play while the planets are smiling in your direction.

It's probably not your style to express everything you feel, but you still might find yourself stepping beyond your normal limits today. Even if you believe you're being cautious, your need for an emotional escapade is heightened now -- and you're ready to stir up some excitement. Although the current opportunity for finding pleasure may be quite unexpected, there's no time like the present to say yes. You'll never know unless you try.

It may be nearly impossible for others to hold you back from having your fun today, and yet you might not be able to contain yourself either. The good news is that you have an excellent chance of finding the love, money or acceptance that you are currently seeking. The bad news is that whatever wonderful experiences come your way now, they probably won't last. Don't try to capture the magic; just follow your bliss and let your heart dance with joy.

Rewards for your creativity are closer than you realize, but you need to set clear priorities and pay attention to what's most important. Luckily, an opportunity to enjoy yourself might be a part of your payoff. Even if you're worried that your feelings are based on wishes rather than reality, you are still likely to go ahead and express them anyhow. This lack of inhibition isn't your normal style, but you may feel certain that this is your chance to create a memorable experience. Jump right in; the water's fine.

You feel like you're rolling in a field of four-leaf clovers today because not much can go wrong when your key planet Venus forms an easy trine with auspicious Jupiter. It may not matter what's specifically going on for you now because you can create something magical, even if you don't have the best ingredients. However, if you overindulge your senses or overspend on unnecessary luxuries, you could wake up tomorrow regretting your lapse of good judgment. Fun is yours for the taking, but moderation is essential.

Although you might not be able to break free from previous obligations, you can still find ways to make the day more enjoyable than you expect. Even in the midst of a tough situation, your long-term opportunities are looking great. You must do whatever makes you feel good about yourself, for the rewards will follow if you do. Don't be afraid to take a risk; expressing your heart's desire now can move you closer to achieving it.

You can see fabulous possibilities nearly everywhere you look today. Your positive attitude is capable of inspiring even those who are lost in the doldrums. It's difficult for others to remain down in your presence while your key planet Jupiter harmonizes with beautiful Venus, casting a lovely glow onto most everything in your life. You may even be on the most wanted list now -- not for punishment, but rather for fun and games. Enjoy the temporary notoriety while it lasts.

Your optimism grows throughout the day, but you can be in danger of overextending yourself. Everything appears to be coming up roses, but it might not be as awesome as you think. You may have a quiet sense of self-satisfaction now that temporarily releases you from the stresses of your everyday life. Others appreciate your support and admire your ambitious nature. Nearly everyone wants to help you today and you would be wise to let them.

All kinds of positive events are happening in your life now, yet they might not be apparent to anyone else. The real action is taking place deep within the recesses of your own subconscious mind -- yet you can tell these changes are real. Be careful not to get so sidetracked by your current optimism that you fail to see potential trouble spots. Coworkers may share their plans for fun today and you're ready to join them without a second thought. Remember, it's all too easy to say yes, even if there are other things you should be doing first.

Even the stickiest of circumstances will smooth out today without too much effort on your part. A potential conflict that appears to be heading toward a showdown can be effectively averted with just a simple gesture of compromise. However, it's not that all your problems are vanishing into thin air. More likely, the rain clouds are simply dissipating and you are reminded how delicious the sunshine feels. Enjoy your bliss while it lasts because your responsibilities will call you back to work soon enough.

You might not know what's around the next corner, but you can see unexplored possibilities everywhere you look. Unfortunately, you don't have enough time in the day to pursue every intriguing opportunity. Therefore, establishing priorities is the most crucial component to your happiness now. Luckily, the idea of slowing down and doing less sounds good to you today, making it easier to pare back your activities. Spreading yourself too thin could prevent you from finishing what you start. Choose quality over quantity for a change.

You're not too eager to jump into something new today even if you're feeling more confident about a recent decision. It isn't that you're worried about the uncertainties ahead; it's just that you have a better chance of achieving success if you take your time now and proceed slowly. Remember, there's no reason to stress out because of someone else's arbitrary schedule. Set a pace that works for you and then stick to it.

People seem to have unrealistic expectations about what you might accomplish today, and you aren't interested in arguing with them. Nevertheless, you don't want to make yourself crazy by working extra hard when you know you can't meet an impossible deadline. Even if it is uncomfortable to address the real issue up front, everyone will feel relieved if you do. Don't turn your disclosure into a major drama; simply be honest and clearly tell others what you know you can deliver. Revealing your vulnerability is scary, but it will serve you well in the long run.

You are often all too aware of your limitations, but may get so caught up in your eagerness to please today that you commit to more than you can possibly manage. Unfortunately, your good intentions aren't enough to power you through the day, especially if you're delayed by unforeseen obstacles. However, there's no reason to sell yourself short. Don't be too concerned about completing your tasks on time; it's better to strive for perfection now than to sacrifice quality by rushing your work.

Your roar may be a bit muted today but, thankfully, no one seems to notice but you. Your coworkers see your positive attitude and unwavering commitment in action and they believe that you're rock solid even if that's not how you actually feel. However, it's not a smart strategy to talk about your insecurities now; there's no point in exposing your weaknesses unless you have no choice. You can improve your chances for success by keeping your feelings private for a few more days while you concentrate on giving the best performance of your life.

You may have a clear picture of where you want to go now, but cannot find a direct route that gets you there quickly. All the roads before you appear more circuitous than you prefer. Fortunately, whatever path you pick will probably straighten out once you are on your way. The best strategy might be to just head off in the most sensible direction without worrying if you are making the right choice. There are many ways to reach your destination; just don't forget to appreciate the scenery along the way.

Your illusions intertwine with reality today, making it tricky to separate fact from fiction. Paradoxically, it might not matter which is which because your visions have the potential to become real if you believe in yourself. Putting too much faith in the analytical data sets up artificial limits that could end up preventing you from realizing your highest potential. Thankfully, a bit of magical thinking now can inspire you to manifest your dreams.

Your emotions may settle down today, enabling you to concentrate on your backlog of work.
