Ultimately, letting your dreams guide you is a better strategy now than trying to keep your feet on the ground.

Although your days may be as busy as ever, you are growing more adept at filtering out the excess noise. The choice is yours today; you can smile and walk away instead of engaging in all the commotion. Make use of the time you gain by relaxing in a quiet space. Meditating or daydreaming recharges your batteries and if you time it just right, you might not even be missed when you slip away for your little escape. Luckily, others will appreciate your improved attitude when you return.

You might have to reconsider your previous plans if you decide to add any more activities to your schedule now. However, you can take the power of positive thinking too far today. Your blind optimism could tempt you to over-commit, letting others down in the process and leaving you discouraged. Be cautious; managing your time wisely prevents unnecessary problems and enables you to accomplish more than you originally thought possible.

It seems as if you're receiving more help than you asked for today. Unfortunately, your first reaction might be to shut it all down by telling others that you can take care of your commitments by yourself. But you are in a unique position now and are capable of making steady progress on your long-term goals if you don't try to do everything on your own. In fact, accepting assistance is a sign of intelligence. Don't let your ego stand in the way of success.

Enjoying simple pleasures whenever you get the chance comes naturally to you these days. However, you have chores to do now and it's not wise to put off your current obligations. There's no reason to tell everyone about your inner process, making it a good idea to keep your feelings to yourself today. Instead of stopping to justify your behavior, just continue to move deliberately through your day while taking the time to smell the flowers and savor the coffee along the way.

You're not interested in being the leader of the pack today; you prefer to be just another face in the crowd. But the reality is that not everyone is as committed to perfection as you are. The Moon's visit to your efficient sign now places you in touch with your drive to get things exactly right. Fortunately, you can be a valuable team player if you relax your high performance standards enough to collaborate with others. Sometimes it's more important to just get the job done.

You're hesitant about making a decision today that has a direct impact on others at work because you're not willing to determine the outcome on your own. You can usually take a few steps back and let someone else assume leadership responsibility. But it might be impossible to pass the buck now because everyone's depending on you. You have nothing to worry about as long as you check in with your intuition before choosing a path.

Don't waste time lost in analysis because logical thinking won't bring you the best answers today. The rational realms can only take you so far now. Instead, trust your instincts because your psychic radar is right on track. Stop trying to explain your decisions to anyone; just listen to your gut. Oddly enough, your imagination offers solutions that are currently more practical than traditional methods. Dream your way to success.

You appear to be the life of the party today as the Moon in your 10th House of Status aligns with your key planet Jupiter. Nevertheless, you may be a bit worried that you're missing something very important. Go about your daily routine, but take some time to make sure you don't glide over unexpressed feelings that need to be addressed. Put away your philosophical justifications and move past your own resistance to explore deeper and more personal issues. Taking an emotional journey might be more rewarding than you can imagine.

Someone may be tuning into your thoughts today, but you could be so busy working toward your goals that you don't even notice. However, connecting with others makes a big difference in your progress, so don't withdraw because you are worried about appearing vulnerable or dependent. Be bold; take the initiative and share your concerns with a friend you can count on. You might be pleasantly surprised by the positive reaction you receive to your disclosure if you are willing to speak from your heart.

You're fully engaged with your immediate environment today and everything seems to be copacetic as long as you don't stop moving. You may believe that your emotions hamper your productivity. However, slowing down to consider the deeper significance of your current circumstances might be the smartest thing you can do. Fortunately, once you are back in touch with your heart, you will see things in a completely different light than earlier in the day when you were stuck inside your head.

You might be feeling more content today, even if your life is busier than you prefer. As long as you know you gave your best effort now, it's okay to be satisfied with your recent job performance. Ultimately, it may not matter if someone is on your case because you didn't pay enough attention to the details on a project. Thankfully, your happiness is not dependent on external events or the opinions of others. Integrate your own values into everything you do to lessen the importance of receiving approval from anyone else.

There is little margin for error now; you must behave responsibly rather than ignoring your commitments while taskmaster Saturn opposes the willful Sun. Unfortunately, there aren't sufficient hours in the day to do everything you want and still meet your obligations. Although you hope to have as much fun as possible today, it's less painful to acknowledge your limitations sooner than later. Attending to  your business right away keeps things from unraveling later on.

You might not want to show all your cards today and luckily others won't even notice if you hold some in reserve. Just the same, it's wiser to face your fears and play your hand, or you could miss out on a big payoff. Instead of clinging to the status quo, it's more advantageous now to be flexible. Paradoxically, your willingness to negotiate and compromise reveals more inner resolve than digging in your heels just to prove your point. When opportunity knocks, don't hesitate to open the door.

It seems like you're running around in circles without getting much done now, yet you're ready to break out of an unproductive pattern. Although this new attitude doesn't mean that you will change your ways permanently, you are less inclined to sneak off and play today until you have finished all your chores. Thankfully, being disciplined enough to fulfill your previous commitments enables you to truly enjoy yourself later with a clear conscience.

A domestic issue demands your attention today, even if you wish you were doing something else. Unfortunately, any attempts to sidestep a serious situation only make the problem worse. Don't be afraid to let others know your position on a delicate matter. You might have to play the role of a heavy hitter and take a stand on what you believe is true. Although there is room to negotiate, everyone must know the score first. Don't retreat until you're sure that your message is heard. People often look to you for nurturing support, but your voice of reason is what they really need now.

You have a few big ideas about what you want to do now, but first you must handle a tricky situation in your immediate environment. Don't waste energy fretting about the current restrictive conditions. It's more important to keep your promises than to run off in pursuit of a good time. Save your dreams for another day. There will be plenty of opportunities to play later on, but only if you do the responsible thing today.

You have to pay the piper today, especially if you waited until it's too late to follow through on your intentions. Thankfully, you can work wonders and make up for lost time if you put your mind to it. On the other hand, this might be a day of fruition as recent hard work finally shows signs of paying off. Either way, you still must complete unfinished business before you move on. Begin early in the day and, hopefully, you will find a quiet satisfaction in living up to your word.

You may wonder why other people can take the day off while your responsibilities seem to be piling up to a tipping point. However, nothing is to be gained by comparing your plight to anyone else's. Your determination and discipline are being tested and you have an opportunity to demonstrate your dedication by working extra hard now, even under intense pressure. More importantly, you can prove that you're tough enough to handle whatever challenges come your way. This is your chance to recognize your strength and to banish any lingering self-doubt once and for all.

You know exactly where you want to go today, but there's no obvious way to get there. There are obstacles blocking your path, but, thankfully, they aren't permanent. It's just that your ideas are being challenged and they must stand up to the current resistance. Forget about the big picture for a while and focus on taking one tiny step at a time until your progress becomes readily apparent. Once you make it through this eye of the needle you should be able to build enough momentum to carry you to your destination.

It seems as if your friends are being hypercritical of you today, and you might think their judgments are unfair. Perhaps they're expecting too much from you and you feel that they are keeping you from your pursuit of happiness. However, they are only protecting themselves from getting swept up into your next wild adventure. There's no reason to wallow in discouragement; you can follow your bliss whether or not anyone joins you on your journey.

Others admire your stamina today; your hard work and perseverance enable you to reach your goals in record time. However, your patience is tested now as your key planet Saturn opposes the radiant Sun, requiring you to pull back on the reins of your life. Naturally, you prefer to continue progressing carefully toward your destination without having to slow down for anyone else. Nevertheless, the sooner you let go of your previous agenda and timetable, the easier it will be to create new and improved ones.

Your friends may not realize that you are currently struggling to fulfill your commitments. The pressure could be intense enough that you're tempted to just walk away today, although that won't solve your problems, either. Fortunately, there's a third solution now; instead of taking an all-or-nothing approach, just reevaluate your priorities and give it your best effort. Make sure you let others know your revised schedule so they can adjust to the new deadlines based on your ability to deliver on your promises. You just might receive unexpected support from someone who appreciates your honesty.

A discouraging fog could roll in today, dampening the fires of your visionary inspiration. It's nearly impossible to be creative when your energy is pulled in more mundane directions and your resources are limited. Fortunately, you don't have to succumb to the negative atmosphere. These clouds shall pass; in the meantime, imagine the best-case scenario to show you the way and your faith will do the rest.

You may convince yourself that you're on the right track, but you won't get others to believe you now unless you actually are. However, sharing your current plans with your friends and associates is a smart move because they can see through any faulty reasoning. However, keep in mind that your cleverness could backfire if you're too smooth in your delivery. Remember, it's better to know the shortcomings of your new strategy sooner than later or you will end up wasting a lot of time. Initiating an honest dialogue leads to a more realistic approach.

You're caught between your natural need to be straightforward and your current tendency to embellish the facts. You're not purposefully trying to mislead anyone now; it's just that you might get mixed up between what you want and what is real. There's nothing wrong with sharing your dreams or taking a trip to Fantasyland as long as you tell everyone the truth. Your imagination is a garden where your best ideas can take root.

You are so persuasive now that others may rally to your support only to discover that your plans are not as practical as they sound. Your key planet Mercury awkwardly aligns with passionate Pluto and dreamy Neptune today, increasing the intensity of your words while decreasing your connection to the real world. Instead of having to untangle your story to get to the truth, it's wiser now to just work with the facts. Save your song and dance for a rainy day.

Solving a problem today won't bring you satisfaction if your solution is less than enchanting. The British poet Keats concurs and wrote, "Beauty is truth; truth beauty." However, you could mislead yourself into thinking you know where you want to go when you are actually heading in the wrong direction. It's time to put on a very practical pair of glasses. Ultimately, the best answers come to you now when you see things exactly as they are.

You might not realize how forceful your actions are today as you attempt to get what you want. Even if you mean well, your friends could easily misinterpret your aggressive behavior, setting the stage for a war of words. However, an argument is just a waste of energy now because you're probably in closer agreement than you realize. Consciously softening your approach goes a long way toward making everyone happier in spite of the confusion. Listen more than you talk for the quickest resolution.

Your energy may be stretched very thin now because a recent burst of enthusiasm prompted you to say yes to one too many projects. Don't wait until you are mentally exhausted to make a change. Instead, exercise sensible restraint today because it's more important to follow through on what you already started, even if you are tempted to run off in search of the next great thing. Part of your charm is your dependability, so honor your commitments before you do anything else.

You are engaged in a strange dance now between the old and the new. Your friends and coworkers may urge you to leave a worn-out habit behind, but you might not be ready to release your attachment to the past. Paradoxically, the more you analyze your current affairs, the more confused you become. Stop thinking long enough to act on what you are feeling instead of what others are telling you. The answer is simple: follow your heart and see where it leads.

If you are lucky enough to have special people in your life that you can lean on, it may be disconcerting if they are not readily available today. You might feel as if you are being abandoned, but rest assured that isn't what's happening. In fact, your friends probably don't even realize the intensity of your current process. By simply changing your attitude you could turn this moment into an opportunity to explore your dreams without any interference from others.

Clinging to a desired outcome probably won't bring you much happiness today. You may come close to recapturing your lost sense of emotional security, but it slips away as you approach the magic moment of fulfillment. Instead of building your hopes up only to have them dashed, keep bringing your focus back to the moment at hand. It's perfectly fine to allow cosmic opposites to exist simultaneously without taking sides now. Let things hang in the balance until your clarity returns.

It's as if you are at the movies, watching your fantasies unfold on the miniature silver screen inside of your head. Although each separate scenario represents a possible turn of events, you would rather be dealing with the hard cold facts and not dreamy illusions. Nevertheless, you can't just stop your thoughts by decree. Instead of trying to force change, recognize that today's fanciful excursions are an effective way to explore the potential of the present moment.

You're being asked to forgo your rational approach now and adopt a more poetic style. Don't worry about being productive today because you have more pressing work to do reconnecting with your soul. Even if you can't explain your current spiritual yearnings to anyone else, rest assured that the right words will come later. But the magic won't happen on its own; you must take the time to cultivate your dreams and exercise your creativity.

The good news is that you can still connect with your spiritual nature even if you are too busy to commune with others. It's not about how much time you can take from your hectic schedule now; it's more to do with how you use what's available. Just setting aside a few minutes for meditation or relaxation might be enough to get you back in the groove. Finding your center empowers you to reach for the stars.

You may feel as if you must explain something you did recently, but don't say you're sorry until you reexamine your motives. Of course, a sincere apology is in order if you actually stepped over someone's boundaries. But don't just go through the motions today, pretending to regret your behavior if your intentions weren't clear. Remember, you are not responsible for how others react to your direct approach. Nevertheless, an extra dose of kindness goes a long way to smooth over ruffled feathers.

Even if you encountered a few rough spots at work last week, you will likely feel more optimistic about what happens today. Unfortunately, your change of heart could be motivated by your current eagerness to sidestep any more trouble. Make sure that you don't slip into denial so you can try to float through the day without worry. It's best to tackle stress directly and handle the situation calmly rather than acting like everything is fine when it's not. Others are depending on you to hold up your corner of the universe, so don't let them down.

You're in a generous mood when sharing what you want today, enabling you to use your charm to your advantage. But you could go overboard in your desire to be accommodating to those you like. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to acknowledge your own desires, even if you can't rationalize them at this time. Although operating in the realm of logic is naturally easier for you, it's not healthy to detach from your passions. Listening to your heart takes extra effort now, but it's worth it in the long run.

Your search to find balance between your inner and outer worlds today may fall short of your perfect scenario. Your direction at work might be changing yet you still are tempted to hang onto your old long-term goals. However, you're tired of fighting off the upcoming shift; surrendering to the larger wave now enables you to successfully ride it, instead of having it pull you under at the last minute. Making lots of small adjustments works better than trying to fix everything all at once.

You are observing your life through a new pair of eyes today and what you see is different than ever before. A strange attraction could lure you to take the first step on an incredible journey but don't worry if you cannot envision a clear path yet. For now, any movement is better than none. Your destination will be revealed to you in due time. Follow your intuition and enjoy the scenery along the way.

You are growing tired of handling one surprise after another and may be craving a return to a simpler life. Fortunately, the fast pace could finally begin to slow down this week. In the meantime, pursue your interests but don't wear yourself out. You can't control anyone else's emotions, but you can change the way in which you react to unexpected events. Practicing flexibility is your smartest strategy for a while longer.

Your emotions are running all over the place now and they become less manageable as you try to rein them in. Instead of attempting to stop your moods from changing, just go with the flow and express what you feel in the moment. Remember, there's no need to take action on any single thought today. Let your extreme reactions simmer over the next few days so you can gain clarity about what your heart really wants.

Although others may be placing pressure on you to make up your mind today, it's their sense of urgency and not yours. Don't accept anyone else's arbitrary deadline as your own, for it could prompt you to make a foolish decision. Take your time and consider each possible choice. Wait until the reflective Moon enters your mysterious sign this evening to see your path in a brighter light. Follow your heart and don't look back.

You may have an emotionally detached view of your future and you don't really care which way the wind blows now as long as you're moving forward. Paradoxically, your perspective on the past is more complicated. Your strong opinions and desires might be projected on to your personal history, especially if you are retelling stories from your childhood. Reminiscing is a liberating exercise today, giving you a chance to recognize old patterns. Just don't attempt to rewrite the facts to support your current fantasy, or your sentimental journey will be for naught.

Decisions in the workplace don't come easily now, for you can see both sides of most issues. But just because you can sympathize with multiple points of view doesn't mean that all choices are equally good. Continue weighing your options today, but put off your final answer until the Moon enters transformational Scorpio later tonight. There's no stopping you once you know which mountain you want to climb.

Complex circumstances pull you off track today so it's pointless to think you're going to make noticeable progress toward your goals. However, you can still do amazing things as long as you don't waste energy fighting the inevitable. Everything is moving fast, so focus on the immediate events in the present moment instead of worrying about the future. By narrowing your attention, you will be able to experience the full power of now.

There's currently so much going on in your life that you might want to coast through the day. Of course, you must do a certain amount of work just to get by, but you intuitively know that it makes more sense to conserve your energy today than to expend it. Believe it or not, even more will be required of you soon enough. It's going to be a whole new ballgame, so you might as well rest up while you can.

Your finances are on your mind today and you may feel more driven now than ever to take positive action. However, you might not respond well to the stress that comes from having to make big decisions at this time. But don't lose sight of your long-term goals or you could act impulsively for all the wrong reasons. Taking the time to observe the intensity of your current feelings is smarter than reacting to them out of fear. Developing your strategy before jumping in is your quickest route to success.

Relationships are fertile ground for growth these days and they can teach you a lot about yourself. But you could run into familiar obstacles to your happiness today even with the best of intentions. Be careful about being too rigid, for you might set yourself up for disappointment if you have too many expectations now. Pay attention to how your memories influence your current reactions. Remaining open to future possibilities is healthier than unconsciously replaying events from the past.

You're tempted to set aside your chores in search of exciting experiences, but the real growth opportunities come from making a commitment now and integrating your goals into your everyday routine. However, fulfilling your obligations might require you to decline an enticing invitation. Don't stress about what you may be missing; setting priorities and acting responsibly brings longer lasting satisfaction than a few hours of pleasant distraction.

You finally feel ready to express feelings that you have been keeping to yourself. You might be worried about how others will respond to your disclosure today, but something keeps pushing your fears away just enough so you can speak your piece. Although starting the conversation may seem awkward, don't back down. Your words could be the catalyst for a discussion that ultimately demolishes the emotional walls and establishes the foundation for a closer relationship. Take a risk and share your heart.

Deeply-rooted fears might rise to the surface today, but don't let your worries prevent you from having a well-deserved good time. There's no reason to deny yourself a bit of pleasure if you have been putting in long hours and extra effort to achieve your goals. Residual negativity from a previous hurtful experience doesn't have to hold you back any longer. If it seems like reality is giving you no for an answer, make sure it's not really coming from you. Celebrate the little victories while you have the chance.

You may cherish your friends and family even more these days, but your dependence on them also causes you some concern. It's not that you're unwilling to show your vulnerability; it's just that you might want more time alone. If so, let others know what you need as kindly as possible so they don't feel rejected in the process. Setting healthy limits ultimately strengthens relationships as long as the wishes of everyone are heard and respected.

You are no stranger to catering to other people's demands, but you may need to be very firm about stating what you want now. You could be tested today by a self-centered acquaintance who expects more from you than you are willing to give. Don't fall into the trap of questioning your own intentions. If you don't take care of yourself, you won't have much to offer anyone else. Establishing healthy boundaries is critical to your physical and emotional well-being.

It's time to reexamine your relationships now that the evocative Moon is visiting your sign. Your emotional intensity has been known to scare some people away in the past. However, this is not a good reason to hide your feelings. It's better to know if someone is afraid of your passionate nature before you grow more entangled. Nothing is gained if you're downplaying your own inner strength just because it makes others uncomfortable. Surround yourself with people who love you for who you are, instead.

There is a lot more going on in your world now than meets the eye. You may be playing for big stakes and your next moves are crucial to your success. Fortunately, you don't have to share your inner process with everyone you meet. However, if you are captivated by someone -- or by a new idea -- don't push to get closer. Give it time; your perspective might change along with your feelings over the next few days. Wait and see what happens before you act in ways you can't undo. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

Even if your friends and coworkers are usually supportive of your behavior, they may withhold approval today for no obvious reason. Nevertheless, you're pretty sure that you're doing the right thing and you're willing to wait for others to come around to your point of view. There's no need to waste energy trying to convince anyone to join your cause. Your actions don't have to be bold to be successful; they only need to be well-considered and effective for everyone to take notice.

Although you might run into a complicated emotional web today, it's advisable not to get involved in any sticky business that isn't yours. Steering clear of confusing situations and political undercurrents demonstrates that you can be conscientious and productive at the same time. Instead of wasting time on the telephone or gossiping at the water cooler, set a quiet example by taking the higher road and focusing on the work at hand.

You may finally be in a position to be acknowledged for your contributions today, even if you aren't standing on center stage. The appreciation you receive now for your previous efforts could be long overdue, but this doesn't make it any less real. Just make sure you don't let the accolades go to your head, or you might lose the respect that you worked so hard to gain. It's wonderful when your talents are recognized, but it's your kind and humble heart that makes you truly shine.

Pursuing your desires gets your adrenaline pumping, but feelings can grow more complicated than you expect with the enigmatic Scorpio Full Moon spotlighting your 8th House of Intimacy. You must be cautious when expressing your needs today because it's difficult to stop once you start to stir up some excitement. Although you're often the first one to take a risk, it might not be such a good idea now. Believe it or not, sometimes your feelings should be kept to yourself.

Today you could discover that you overcommitted in a relationship, making you feel as if you can't deliver on what you promised. However, you need to be careful with your assumptions now that the Scorpio Full Moon illuminates your 7th House of Partnerships. You may not even notice that you have taken on too much until it's too late to change your course. Nevertheless, it's still wise to reconsider your plans and establish new priorities once you realize that you made a mistake. Taking responsibility for your actions is the right thing to do.

Your daily routine has a strong impact on your overall health and the current stress prompts you to stop and consider how to make things better. But with today's Scorpio Full Moon shining in your 6th House of Routine, it's counterproductive to turn your life upside down all at once. Make small improvements without creating chaos. Even a slight upgrade to your exercise regimen or a minor modification to your diet could be enough to add an extra bounce to your step.

You might take a relationship too seriously now and try to transform a casual friendship into a full-blown romance. It seems as if it would be easier to lighten the emotional weight, but the unrelenting Scorpio Full Moon's presence in your 5th House of Love may mean that your feelings are beyond your conscious control. Don't try to redirect what is in your heart; just let the currents carry you along for the ride today. Remember, it's prudent to observe your changing desires without impulsively acting on every whim.

You may be misled by a close friend or family member who charms you with their convincing sales pitch. It isn't that you're naturally gullible, but the Scorpio Full Moon occurring in your 4th House of Home and Family encourages you to trust others if they carry an air of authority. Exercise caution by doing your research before making any promises you might later regret. Reining in your enthusiasm is your best move until you can determine what's really going on.

Your big ideas could sweep you off your feet today. You might attempt to keep everything in a practical perspective but today's Scorpio Full Moon lights up your 3rd House of Communication, bending your thoughts out of shape. Thankfully, by exercising a little self-restraint, you can minimize problems that arise from inflating a sensible strategy into an overextended one. Wait until next week to finalize your plans. In the meantime, explore all the possibilities without the pressure of commitment.

You might need to be conservative about spending money on discretionary activities while the magnetic Scorpio Full Moon stretches your 2nd House of Resources out of shape. However, you still may be tempted to purchase something prior to analyzing the real costs. If you're unsure of what to do, ask for advice from a trustworthy friend or a financial expert. Thankfully, involving someone else in your decision-making process will bring clarity as to whether or not you can really afford to satisfy your desires now.

It seems as if time has run out, making you aware of how much work you have on your plate today. You may decide to postpone a previously scheduled getaway to finish a project that's on a very tight schedule. Additionally, the passionate Scorpio Full Moon emphasizes the urgency of your feelings as it lights up your 1st House of Self. Although your initial response might be to focus on your responsibilities and delay your fun, there is room for both work and play. Instead of giving up all of your freedom, make a plan that allows you to meet your deadlines and chase your dreams, too.

Your current schedule may be packed, yet you're still clever enough to turn your work into play. Nevertheless, your day probably won't unfold the way you planned it since the Scorpio Full Moon activates your 12th House of Destiny. However, your temporary lack of judgment encourages you to get involved in one too many projects now. Ultimately, it's less stressful for you, and certainly more considerate of everyone else, if you set reasonable limits before making any more promises you can't keep.

You want to be more involved with others now, even if you don't have enough time for yourself. You may be overwhelmed with one too many commitments while the intense Scorpio Full Moon aligns with restrictive Saturn in your 11th House of Social Networking. However, avoiding your personal needs only increases your anxiety. Establishing priorities is a sensible place to start, but only if you add your heart's desires to the list. It's fine to be attentive to the wishes of everyone else as long as yours don't get lost in the shuffle.

You secretly enjoy it when others acknowledge your wisdom by seeking you out for advice. You might even feel hurt if they go to someone else for help first. However, your motives may not be completely clear today with the subjective Full Moon brightening your 10th House of Responsibility. You could be more interested in being distracted from your own problems now than you are in solving anyone else's predicaments. Fortunately, you can still be of assistance to those you love, no matter what your reasons are in the moment, as long you have their best interests at heart.

If you have been dreaming about furthering your studies, this is your chance to pursue something completely different from your current interests. You may need to make an important decision about going back to school now that the provocative Scorpio Full Moon illuminates your 9th House of Higher Education. Unfortunately, you could get lost in the logistics of unrealistic goals. But rather than setting your plans aside in frustration, try modifying them to align more closely with reality. Bringing your vision down to earth makes it much easier to manifest.

Your mind is wired with so many exciting possibilities today that it's hard to know which way to turn first. However, you might also wish that you had more stability in your life now. These divergent feelings could grow into a real dilemma, especially if you aren't willing to admit that a part of you is very comfortable to continue with your same old patterns. Once you acknowledge your basic need for security, you can happily return to chasing your dreams.

You aren't easily satisfied today as your key planet Venus joins unpredictable Uranus, tempting you to reach for something or someone that you cannot have now. Instead of wasting your time trying to fulfill your transitory desires, talk about your dreams with someone you trust. Scaling back your expectations isn't a sign of defeat but offers an unexpected opportunity to create a practical plan that could actually succeed.

Socializing with your friends sounds quite enticing today, but it may be tricky to actually follow through with your plans. Someone close to you might need your assistance and you can't ignore a request for your help. It's critical to process any unexpressed anger or resentment you have over a change of schedule so that it doesn't get in the way of a meaningful experience. Being adaptable enables you to make the most of a difficult situation. In fact, if you remain open you might be pleasantly surprised with where the unexpected twists and turns take you.

It's important to put on a happy face today, even if you're reluctant to let go of your worries. But reflecting your joyful nature is not a license to avoid the pressing issues of the day. Your smartest strategy is to stay consciously aware of the current duality; remember that your inside and outside are following different scripts now and you don't have to fit everything into a tidy package. As the stress continues to settle down, your temporary smile just might turn into a permanent grin if you let it.

Your mind is not on work today, even if you can't escape your responsibilities. You're zooming off into the future, looking forward to a bit of indulgent behavior. Unfortunately, your need for fun and games may be incongruent with your previous commitments. Remember, you don't have to take an all-or-nothing approach. There's no need to be overly self-critical just because you're human. Cut yourself some slack and enjoy the present moment however you can.

Although you can't shake your natural tendency to be practical, especially as the Sun moves through earthy Taurus, you're still looking to stir up some mischief today. Thankfully, work and play are not incompatible, but you could run into a problem as you try to juggle the two. Your day becomes more complicated if someone throws you a curve ball by inviting you to do something special. Your pragmatic inclination is to say no, but the cosmos is telling you to take a chance and say yes.

Someone might shock you today by expressing what they want without censoring their words. Luckily, beautiful Venus bumps into radical Uranus, encouraging you to enjoy what you hear even if the disclosure is totally unexpected. Although you are being invited to step outside your comfort zone, you don't have to accept unless you're ready. Nevertheless, don't close down your feelings in fear. At least consider the potential of new and different experiences. Exploring your options in a conversation may feel safer now than actually acting on an impulse.

You're eager for change and you may become agitated today if you have to do things the same old way. However, if you can't break out of your current routine, at least you can still talk about your desires. But even if you think you're being lighthearted, your words might carry sharp hooks. You are a champion of sarcasm now; your dry humor and incisive wit could be more biting than you realize. Don't water down your ideas but do your best to express your truth with kindness. And then don't forget to give your audience a fair chance to offer their opinion.

Your current dilemma could pit your desire for fun against a more responsible need to save money. Your financial condition might be a bit unstable now, yet you don't want a lack of expendable cash to deter an impulsive spending spree. Fortunately, you may discover that it's easier than you thought to cut back on unnecessary spending without negatively affecting your quality of life. Keep in mind that adding excitement to your day doesn't necessarily have to cost anything at all. The best things in life are free.

Your private life is anything but boring these days. Unfortunately, tension in your personal world might mean that you don't have as much stability as you prefer. Oddly enough, the regularity of your job could take some of the pressure off by giving you the daily consistency you crave. Nevertheless, it's not a good idea to let your professional duties keep you from dealing with the stress at home. Confront the uncertainty by initiating an open dialogue. Resolution may not come right away, but everyone will feel better once you get the conversation started.

You're on a thrilling joyride today and your creativity is soaring. But just because you're enjoying the adrenaline rush doesn't mean that everyone else is on board, too. You're often captivated by unconventional ideas, but now you're passionate about anything that's off the beaten path. Don't let your attraction to radical thoughts and unusual behavior sidetrack a productive day. The good news is that being responsible doesn't have to prevent you from going anywhere you dream in your imagination.

You might think that someone's trying to make you feel guilty today, especially if you're acting rebelliously and want to do something unusual that fills you with pleasure. However, it's not your job to keep everyone else happy while you are left out in the cold. This is a great time to experiment and express yourself in radical ways. Stepping outside of the box can lead to surprising satisfaction, and being adventurous also elevates your self-esteem. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Your need for adventure could get the best of you today. Even if you have important responsibilities to fulfill, you still might ignore them to make more time for pleasurable pursuits. Although you may feel invincible now, you probably won't be able to escape unnoticed. Don't act surprised if you are held accountable for any impetuous actions. As is often the case, you're eager to leap into action before thinking about the consequences. However, counting to ten before you make a move makes more sense.

It's unproductive to spend a lot of time today doubting your own priorities. Nevertheless, your desires may not be as altruistic as someone else's now. Keep in mind that everyone is different and comparing yourself to others is a pointless exercise. Leave competition on the playing field where it belongs and simply do the best job you can. Being true to yourself is the surest route to success.

Others may encourage you to take on more than you can handle today as the enthusiastic Sagittarius Moon visits your 7th House of Partners. Fortunately, you could be revitalized by your accomplishments if you agree to contribute to someone's project. However, you might already be busy and turning down an invitation places you in an awkward position. Nevertheless, it's better to be honest now than sorry later. There's no point in making promises you can't keep.

You might surprise yourself with your desire to participate in someone's plan now, especially if you need to relinquish control in the process. It may even be a relief to be a passenger without having to also play the role of a back-seat driver. It doesn't matter what kind of activities you already have on your calendar; the thought of doing something different today brings a smile to your face. Oddly enough, sometimes playing a supporting role is more fulfilling than being the star of the show.

You have the green light to put on your party shoes and kick up your heels today as the fun-loving Sagittarius Moon travels through your 5th House of Play. No matter how popular you are now, set aside some time just for yourself. Get outside for a walk, schedule a massage, or do something creative that helps you to unwind. A bit of solace is enough to recharge your batteries. Today, it's truly all about you.

Your coworkers often rely on you to think critically and calmly analyze the situation at hand. However, you may not be very logical now because you're seeing the world through a very optimistic lens. Even if your life is in really good shape, you still might be happier if you delay an important decision and simply kick back and enjoy yourself today. The Moon's visit to your 4th House of Family suggests that you should find some time to relax at home instead of making your imprint on the world.

Your I-can-do-it attitude tempts you to say yes to every good idea and every intriguing invitation that comes your way today. Unfortunately, your eyes may be bigger than your stomach now because pursuing each opportunity takes time and you will run out of room in your day while you're still adding items to your plate. Scale back your expectations just a bit; you can still partake in pleasurable activities without overdoing it. Moderation is key.

Your idea of a successful day includes a bit of relaxation. Unfortunately, you won't likely have time to slow down and take a break today. Your willingness to adapt to changing circumstances can be your secret weapon now. Even though you must follow through on your commitments, you know that improving your attitude makes all the difference in the world. It's even possible to have fun while maintaining your hectic schedule, especially if you understand that you can rest on another day. Whistle while you work and see who joins in.

You may be eagerly lost in your current exploration of all the things you want to accomplish today. Unfortunately, you might not make much progress if you try to do too much. Your energy level is probably quite high now that the Moon is visiting your sign, enabling you to respond to others quickly. However, you can easily burn through your reserves faster than you expect. Even if you think you're the Energizer bunny, it's smarter to react slowly and steadily like the tortoise if you want to finish the race.

Your natural tendency is to control your exuberance even when you're excited. However, your enthusiasm is even more invisible to others today as the inspirational Sagittarius Moon visits your 12th House of Secrets. Nevertheless, there's a quiet spirituality about you now; others know that more is going on than meets the eye. Let your friends and acquaintances draw whatever conclusion they may. Just remember that you don't need to waste your energy on maintaining privacy when you have more important things to do.

Playing down your confidence is a clever way to sneak in beneath the radar today. If your coworkers are aware of your positive energy, they will likely expect even more from you. However, if they can't see the twinkle in your eye, you might be able to get away with a bit of social mischief. Although your strategy may be sound, your plan can still backfire. You have a better shot at achieving satisfaction now by letting the good times roll and not worrying about anyone else.

Your coworkers may be the source of inspiration today as they unexpectedly include you in their adventurous plans. Unfortunately, things can grow complicated if there are overlapping events because you obviously can't do two things simultaneously. Make smart choices early in the day to lessen the stress that could arise if you try to juggle too many activities. For now, less is definitely better than more.

You might not be very happy today, for it could feel as if someone is raining on your parade; however, this is just a test of your character. You must change your attitude to take the problems you now face in stride. Thankfully, you're able to overcome obstacles, but you will have to get more serious when it comes to your commitments. Rolling up your sleeves and putting in the effort early in the weekend increases your chances for fun later on.

You're dedicated to living your life in accordance with your beliefs, but there could be differences of values that arise today, requiring a frank discussion with a friend. Don't make the mistake of taking questions from others as personal attacks, for you might be overly sensitive now. Be as clear as possible in all communication while accepting criticism gracefully. Cooperation breeds success.

If someone presents you with an intriguing opportunity today, don't assume it's a final offer. You could have some serious negotiations ahead and you have a better chance of getting what you want if you think through your strategy in advance. However, the other person may end up dictating the terms if you try to make it up as you go along. Doing your homework can make all the difference in the world.

Don't be afraid to take the initiative in a relationship now as uncertain feelings fade. If you're standing on the solid ground of clear thoughts, you can continue to gain emotional strength throughout the day. Just make sure that you express your needs and desires without being bossy. Partnerships work best when all your cards are on the table and everyone knows the score.

Channel the creative energy of the past few days into something constructive now. Your dreams will fade unless they are stabilized with concrete action, yet dedication and focus can transform fantasies into reality. However, this process also requires discipline and sweat, but it could surely be worth your extra effort. You'll never know unless you try.

You don't have to relinquish any authority today, but neither do you need to be everyone's parent. Although you may be more serious now, your playful inner child will come out to have some fun when it feels safe. Your imagination is lit up in vivid colors, so use your new sense of creative confidence to turn drudgery into spontaneity. Remember, a more joyful approach to life can actually improve the quality of your work.

The high-flying ideas and big talk of the past few days are now put to the test of reality. Honesty and optimism are surely admirable traits, but they require a solid commitment to transform them into something tangible. Be a planner today and apply your energy wisely to make the difference between success and failure. Patience and hard work are an unbeatable combination in the long run.

Your recent efforts are coming to fruition and may begin to pay off now. This might not be the best moment to sit quietly on the sidelines, but you're not quite ready for the big debut yet. Take small steps to offer guidance to your peers today, but don't attempt to run the entire show. There's no need to assume full responsibility for your new direction yet; just plant the seeds and let everyone respond accordingly.

A serious mood washes over you today, but your somberness doesn't have to mean the end of the fun. It's just that more important issues are coming back into focus. Be sensible now and manage your resources carefully. Remember, you are the archer; aiming your intentions with consciousness increases the chances of hitting your mark.

You wish everyone would come down to earth and talk about the future with you because you believe you know exactly what to do. Even if no one seeks you out for advice now, overplaying your authority card won't bring the results you seek. Don't worry; your knowledge will still be greatly appreciated as long as you don't make others feel inferior. A little humility goes a long way.

You and your friends may have hatched some brilliant ideas recently, but now you must make something happen in the real world. Talk is cheap; it's time to turn theory into practice. Don't try to avoid the practical necessities today. Play by the rules and demonstrate how your plan can help you and others be more successful. Roll up your sleeves and get to work.

You have been carrying a heavy load, but now others are ready to jump in and help you bear the burden. Unfortunately, you might have grown weary along the way. If so, don't hesitate to ask for assistance since playing the role of a martyr rarely pays off. There's plenty of support available to you, if only you let others know exactly what you need today. You may be pleasantly surprised with the results if you're willing to show your vulnerability and delegate some of your work.

You can talk a good relationship game today as your feelings are pulled into realms that are illuminated by your words. Your fantasy life is rich now, which in turn fuels the fires of romance. It all comes back to one question: how do you feel about yourself? This is not about the bravado that you display for others. It is about who you really are and what your heart needs. Instead of pretending that all is well, take a risk and be your authentic self.

There are two distinct voices in your head today. One is enticing you to enter the dance of relationships. This voice encourages you to move out beyond your own bubble and emotionally connect with someone else. Meanwhile, there's another voice telling you not to make any sudden moves and stay within your own internal fantasy world where it is safe, but lonely. Listen to both points of view for the best possible outcome.

You are alive and buzzing on the mental plane of existence, but the real growth for you now is in the deeper emotional realms where you are being drawn. Perhaps your current exploration is motivated by a romantic attraction or a curious fascination. However, this is about a pleasure that is deeper than clever words can convey. Take a more creative approach to expressing your feelings today; sometimes you must stop talking in order to say what you really mean.

If you are in a position where you can spend time developing your creative skills, then this might be a most fruitful time for you. It's not that you are irresponsible; just because you are fond of daydreaming doesn't mean you are intentionally trying to avoid your commitments. However, the right words still arouse your desire to escape. Nevertheless, it's better to capture a bit of the magic rather than letting it capture you.

You're more serious about finding meaning from your relationships with friends and associates today. You could even be drawn into social activities that aren't normally your cup of tea, but it might be in response to someone close to you who is giving you mixed signals. Perhaps the messages are not as contradictory as you think they are. In fact, it may be the receiver that needs tuning and not the transmitter. Look beneath the uncertainty to figure out what you truly want.

Your word for the day is nuance, but it could get lost in the outer noise. Keep in mind that it's less important what you say now than how you say it. There's a vast difference in the various shadings of gray, and it may be the very subtle perceptions that have the biggest impact. Don't be afraid to spend the necessary time to be certain that you have a realistic perspective on things. Otherwise, you might make a mountain out of a molehill for no reason at all.

There's no need to go out of your way to make your situation look more attractive than it is today, even if that's your natural tendency. You can fall in love with the idea of love, instead of what or who is actually in front of you. The most significant problem you now face is emotional inflation, inspiring you and others to over-commit or over-spend. There's nothing wrong with an occasional bit of extravagance as long as you don't take it too far.

Just because you have strong desires and a big appetite now doesn't mean that you must pursue everything that catches your eye. It is okay to just let yourself feel; it's even okay to wander around inside your own fantasies for a while. No one has to know what you are conjuring up within the privacy of your own imagination. Your mind is hyperactive today and the emotions attached to your daydreams might feel overwhelming. Sharing only on a need-to-know basis prevents you from having to justify your attractions to anyone else.

If you can keep your ego in check and your needs in line, you could be in for a most incredible day as your key planet, Jupiter, is stressed by sweet Venus. Fortunately, this may feel like a good kind of stress because having more of a pleasurable experience is a good thing in your book. Of course, the potential dangers include over-estimating and over-indulging. William Blake wrote: "The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom." Enjoyment is the key word now, but knowing when to stop still makes sense.

Today can be a bit unnerving as all attempts to keep your feet firmly on the ground are defeated by the sometimes magical and oftentimes confusing temptations of the day. You might struggle to find a middle path in the chaos. But if you are too somber and attempt to plant yourself too deeply into the practical realms, you could miss the magic. On the other hand, if you forget that you are an earth-bound Capricorn goat, you just may go drifting off into space. Dancing on the edge between reality and fantasy gives you the best of both worlds.

Boundary issues can create complications as others convince you to become involved in circumstances that don't really belong to you. But you're fascinated by all the amazing opportunities and could momentarily forget about what you previously learned. Your curious nature and sense of wonder make it easier for you to let down your guard. Vulnerability is not necessarily a bad thing, but now it is more of a distraction when you just want to have some fun.

Sometimes the waters appear so crystal clear that you intuitive Fish actually believe that you can see forever and a day. However, the truth is that even the clearest of waters create visual distortion. Normally, you take this simple fact into consideration, but now it is tempting to forget that things are not as they seem. Step back and remind yourself to get a reality check before you find yourself in too deep. Trust your psychic radar but take your paddles just in case.

Even if you have important obligations to fulfill today, you can probably figure out how to involve your friends and make your work more fun. It's all about relationships now as assertive Mars turns direct in your 7th House of Partnerships. You could feel like Tom Sawyer, making your chores appear so enjoyable that others want to jump in and join you in your efforts. Everyone may end up having a wonderful time, regardless of the work at hand. Ultimately, it's the feeling of camaraderie that makes this day a memorable one.

You would like to demonstrate your intelligence today so others see you as a masterful leader. Staying two steps ahead of everyone else enables you to command just enough authority to be in charge. However, you might have a challenging time with all the responsibilities that come with the territory of being seen as the top dog. Figuring out your next move requires patience because you're not sure about the choices you have to make. Worrying won't make anything better, so just decide the best you can and move on.

Thinking about your future fires up your imagination while the evocative Moon travels through your 9th House of Faraway Places. However, everything grows more complicated if you have to include others in your dreams. At first, you may enjoy the idea of developing a strategy to get someone else involved, but executing a concrete plan is more challenging than it appears. You might even grow irritated because your friend isn't interested in playing by your rules. If the frustration level escalates today, don't be afraid to just take the high road and proceed on your own.

You have managed for a while to pull off a balancing act between your personal needs and your public responsibilities, yet now a conflict with a close friend or partner complicates things even more. You don't care about the superficial aspects of what's happening; you need to share on a much deeper level now. Nevertheless, it's not easy to open up if you are afraid of being hurt. Revealing your emotions without being overly attached to the outcome is no easy task, but it can alleviate the pressure, enabling you to overcome your fear and speak from your heart.

Even if you're very hopeful about a new relationship today, you still may experience wide mood swings as the emotional Moon activates your 7th House of Partners. There is no reason to allow your fear of abandonment to stop you from connecting with others; don't over-personalize a situation if someone inadvertently excludes you. You are best off trusting your friends and giving them the same freedom now that you want given to you.

Although you may be feeling a bit anxious today, setting priorities and concentrating on the most practical chores should help to soothe your nerves. Unfortunately, maintaining your focus isn't a simple task because you can see so many possibilities ahead, making you more resistant to the upcoming changes. Bring your thoughts back to the here and now, since the present moment is the only place where you can create a real impact. Don't worry about the inevitable; your future will arrive exactly on schedule.

Looking back over the past couple of months might reveal less progress than you expected while energetic Mars retrograded in your sign. But now, as the action planet turns direct, you could be envisioning a big leap forward. Just remember that it takes time for the momentum to build, especially when coworkers are part of the picture. Ultimately, your interactions with others give you a mirror with which you can see into your own soul.

Mistrusting your feelings is your natural reaction while the emotionally detached Aquarius Moon visits your 4th House of Security today. You're uncomfortable when your rational thoughts are all but commanding your heart what to do. And you're particularly vulnerable if you lose touch with your feelings. Finding balance is tricky now because ignoring your passions leads you further from your truth. Nevertheless, take time to reconsider your response before doing something you may instantly regret.

Your friends and associates might find it nearly impossible to accept the fact that you're so confident now. They may think something is lurking in the mysterious twilight behind your bright and friendly smile. Luckily, they are wrong. Although profound issues can unexpectedly rise to the surface over the weeks ahead, you are quite capable of handling them on your own. Don't worry about what others think; just be true to yourself and follow your heart.

Financial uncertainty has crept into your life and nothing you do seems to make sense of your current fiscal picture. Even a simple decision about a straightforward purchase could set you on a path that culminates in the realization that you do not have an endless supply of money. Although you might understand how to manifest abundance now, it may take a while before you have enough cash to buy what you want. Fortunately, your patience is the key to achieving the prosperity you seek.

Sometimes you don't realize how much of an impact you have on those around you. However, it's useful to contemplate the results of your actions before you undertake something that wastes your time and energy. No matter how good your intentions are now, you still might come on too strong. It's counterproductive to annoy someone who normally supports you. However, you could raise suspicions if you are overly cautious. Your smartest strategy is to acknowledge your own power, but wield it only if necessary.

You are enamored with your own fantasies today as the reflective Moon drifts through your 12th House of Imagination. You might even forget when to return to reality if you get lost in your mind. Although floating off into your dreams is often a rejuvenating activity, you aren't allowed to turn your back on your responsibilities now. Planning a temporary escape to another dimension can work as long as you cover your bases in the real world first.

Everywhere you look today there's so much going on, but you thrive on the adrenaline rush anyhow. You feel quite alive as the volume on your life is turned up loud and you feel quite alive. It's a wonder that you can do everything that is expected of you now. In all your busyness, remember to stop long enough to appreciate the beauty around you. A smile in your heart is worth more than lots of words slipping off your tongue. Spread joy not stress.

You might feel panic-struck as you realize you can't tie up all the required loose ends prior to beginning a whole new set of projects. Meanwhile, others may be depending on you to demonstrate your strength of character by following through on your commitments. Breathe deeply to calm your energy; roll up your sleeves and focus on fulfilling your previous obligations before making any new promises. A little determination and elbow grease go a long way.

You can realize your fantasies as long as you remember two things: First, even if your goals seem to be within grasp, it's not going to be all that easy to reach them. Second, some ideas are better left unrealized, for they won't bring satisfaction once they are materialized. Be aware that you always have multiple choices as to which dreams to chase. Choose wisely before you begin your pursuit.

You are receiving weird signals on your psychic radar, but you may not be able to decipher them today. It might seem as if they are somehow coming from your own future, yet remain just barely out of range. Don't struggle trying to make sense of these unintelligible messages. Just show up and listen; keeping your mind open and maintaining awareness is good enough for now.

The weeks ahead bring promises of a busier social calendar and more exciting interactions with your friends. Although this sounds like good news, you have to pay attention to all of your relationships now since they can be the source of assumptions that have crept into your life. Don't accept things on face value, especially when it involves love. A meaningful conversation is useful to explore the possibilities before heading off in the wrong direction.

You may be harboring secret illusions about how you want to live your life. Although you could be successfully deceiving yourself, you're probably not fooling anybody else. Take an objective look at your current lifestyle and realign your priorities with your new goals. If necessary, change some of your habits to positively impact your health and increase your vitality. Undoubtedly, you will be happier for it.

Your future shines with unrealized potential as the clouds of your imagination dissipate -- or so it seems. Active daydreaming lulls you into the belief that all is copasetic, even when unresolved issues are still present. Enjoyment is still possible as long as you don't lose sight of your long-term goals and the extra effort needed to reach them. Achieving success starts with inspiration yet still requires hard work.

Circumstances might seem a bit chaotic today, but it feels good to be passionate about your life. However, there might be a voice in your head suggesting that you are missing something important. The good news is it's not an all-or-nothing proposition. Find middle ground where you can celebrate the present moment without feeling as if you are avoiding your more mundane responsibilities.

Although you may be committed to creating a future that's more in line with your long-term goals, you might not be ready to talk about what's really important to you yet. For you, communication is often used as a defense mechanism where you keep the conversation -- written or verbal -- in emotionally safe territory. It's not necessary to change your tactics today, but it is wise to be more aware of them so you can make better choices in the present moment.

A fairly straightforward set of circumstances may get muddled today as you uncharacteristically play the role of Pollyanna. Negativity isn't constructive, but a dose realism will certainly help to bring clarity to the mix. You can get a better idea of what's going on now by asking others for feedback. Listening good good advice and focusing on your options strengthens your current position.

You could be stressing about a simple misunderstanding that has created an awkward situation. Paradoxically, the more you try to make it right, the worse it becomes. Instead of fixing anything in your outer world today, the solution may be easier to find if you simply alter your own frame of reference. Everything changes when you change your mind.

You're not one to peek ahead to the end of the book; you prefer to take the pages in order and dream about all the possible outcomes on each and every page. However, you might be frustrated now because you may see paths around you coming to an end. Nevertheless, you have an opportunity to decide what's next in your life, rather than grieving over what is slipping away. If unexpected events precipitate change, take this as a signal from the cosmos that these shifts are long overdue.

You might be enamored with your dreams these days, but you're also acutely aware that there's more to life than your fantasies with so many incomplete projects demanding your attention. Even if you postpone a deadline for another day or two, you can't escape thinking about the work you have yet to finish. Unfortunately, worrying in advance only creates stress unless you're ready to do something about it now. Don't put off for tomorrow anything that you can do today.

Your down-to-earth reliability earns the respect of your associates, especially if you make a decision today and stand by it. Even if your current ideas are unpopular, your serious demeanor persuades others to consider your point of view because they realize how much thought has gone into your opinion. Nevertheless, picking one solution over another is tricky business now, so give yourself permission to change your mind later on if you are so inclined.

You can't easily calm your wild thoughts because you're busy analyzing every possible repercussion to each and everything you're doing today. Your previous optimism may be flagging because a special opportunity isn't looking quite as appealing now. Intuitively, you know that once you make up your mind you won't be able to go back and undo your decision, so take all the time you need before announcing your final choice. Time is on your side even if you feel rushed in the moment.

People at work probably won't be aware of your stress today because you're able to keep it carefully contained. You might have a very specific notion about what you want your future to look like; however, you may think you're not on the right track. Don't try to talk yourself out of your dreams, even if they make your life more complicated now. Your current self-doubt will soon fade, leaving you to realize that nearly anything is possible once you put your mind to it.

You have a very unique point of view today that allows you to surprise others, especially if they expect you to remain inside a traditional box. Ironically, your perspective isn't as radical as it seems at first; it's just that you may overstate your position as you make your case. Although you're quite opinionated, you still should be able to get the support you need now as long as you mix integrity with your passion. Demonstrating your willingness to engage in an open dialogue doesn't mean you have to compromise your values.

You may have an erroneous view of your partner or coworker today that's based on fantasy, yet you're still able to logically justify your conclusions. Thankfully, you have an open mind and are willing to change your thinking as you learn more about the reality of the situation. Although you're tempted to scatter your energy now, you can achieve better results if you concentrate and address the tension in a significant relationship. Resolving interpersonal dynamics allows you to find the time to pursue your other goals, too.

Instead of applying all your efforts on your tasks at work, you might wish you could kick back and take it easy today. But you may have to fulfill your responsibilities first, so don't agree to any extra work beyond your regular routine. Your wisest strategy is to minimize your obligations so you can balance your professional duties with a bit of playful abandon. There are no either-or decisions to make now; both aspects of your life contribute to your overall satisfaction.

Last night's brilliant breakthroughs seem to fade with the glare of the morning light. You might even be hard-pressed to remember your best thoughts unless you took the time to write them down. Don't stress trying to recapture what's been lost. Surrender to the intuitive Pisces Moon with the knowledge that your most solid ideas will resurface in the next few days in a more tangible form. In the meantime, intentional daydreaming enables you to keep the context for your visions alive.

Although you may need to show up at work today, you probably prefer remaining cozy in your own home while the dreamy Pisces Moon occupies your 4th House of Security. Nevertheless, once you report for duty and fulfill your obligations, you can return to your private haven, turn off the phone and declare temporary independence from the outside world. For someone who is often the life of the party, hiding out might just be your secret guilty pleasure now.

There are many small choices to be made in the course of your regular routine today. However, an emotional gulf between you and others may leave you feeling a bit detached and a little lost as the reflective Moon merges with indecisive Neptune in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Even if you say all the right inspirational things, you still might think you're a fraud because you don't see yourself clearly now. Thankfully, your carefully chosen words can be even more effective if you actually believe in them yourself.

You are full of hope that springs from being true to your values today as the Moon joins idealistic Neptune. But you might also be fearful that your efforts won't be sufficient to improve the current situation. Don't waste precious time doubting your contribution. Transform the energy by focusing on the positive things you can do, instead. Global change is not likely to happen with just the extraordinary work of a few people; it will come from the combined smaller deeds of everyone. Lead by example and see who follows.

You are unable to detach yourself from the emotions of everyone around you today as the evocative Moon hooks up with spiritual Neptune in your compassionate sign. It's nearly impossible to find the boundaries that normally separate you from all of humanity and the entire cosmos. Don't bother trying to figure out where your thoughts and feelings are coming from now. You're a psychic sponge for the day; revel in the wisdom that all fish live in the same sea and that individuality isn't as important as it seems.

Your desires are pulling you into unknown territory today as you consider a variety of possibilities that stretch out before you. But your life doesn't follow a straightforward path, so you can't just think your way into your future. You're heading toward a major readjustment if you attempt to take on too much now. The sooner you narrow your options and face up to your current responsibilities, the quicker your next adventure will begin.

You may be feeling centered, but you still could hit a rough spot midday when your key planet Venus skids on the uncertainty of Neptune. Even if you're not sure what you want, it might seem as if someone is working against you behind the scenes. Don't attempt to tackle your problems head on, for if you try to bring everything out into the open now, it could take even longer to achieve your goals. Stay as calm as you can and hold your position. Your time for action is drawing near.

Stress remains steady throughout the day and even as you're making progress on one set of issues, another tricky situation pops up on your radar. Fortunately, you can handle the crises one at a time if you pay close attention to your feelings. But don't just act on every hunch; balance your blind optimism with a touch of practical realism. You might feel as if you're trapped and there is no direct avenue to your preferred destination. Rest assured that using force won't help your cause. Acting with finesse increases your chances for a successful negotiation and a satisfying outcome.

Demands being made on you now can bring up unresolved anger issues since you don't like being manipulated by others. It's typically not even your style to respond to an uncomfortable situation directly. Unfortunately, a passive aggressive approach may not produce the desired results. Try a different strategy; avoiding confrontation might be more pleasant in the moment, but it really only delays the inevitable. Take a risk and speak up for your own needs if you want to be acknowledged. The squeaky wheel gets the grease.

It seems as if you're much closer today to embarking on a big vacation, even if you know that your budget just won't stretch as far as you want to go. Meanwhile, you're making steady progress with your plans in spite of your fiscal limitations. Don't slip into the time-consuming trap of believing that you must explain your actions to others. Just keep pushing forward, inch by inch, in the pursuit of your dreams.

Pay attention to everything that happens to you today since you may be offered important clues to what to expect over the next couple of weeks. If a friend or partner is acting out of character, look to your own behavior before criticizing anyone else. If you're not living your life according to your ideals and striving to reach your potential, don't be so hard on others who are truly trying to follow their dreams. Integrating external events with your internal process empowers you to make the best choices in the present moment.

An open conflict with a coworker can put you in touch with your own issues that you're avoiding. Don't pretend that what's happening is separate from you; this is no time to arbitrarily sidestep a confrontation. Instead, be willing to stand up for your own beliefs now. If you try to gloss over the differences, you'll only have to deal with a more intense version of the same stress later in the month.

You are traveling familiar ground now, yet you might be inclined to push through the discomfort of change once and for all. You are ready to take a risk to prevent being here again next year. You could have love in a form that you don't want or you want love in a form that you can't seem to find. Either way, the dissatisfaction will ease over the weekend even if you don't initiate any significant action. Nevertheless, proactive behavior works on a deeper level, minimizing the possibility of a re-occurrence of the same dynamic later on.

What starts as a difference of opinion can quickly evolve, leading to a productive day filled with creative adventure. Let go of any preconceived notions or old expectations; sticking to your previous agenda won't serve any purpose in the present moment. Instead, focus on cultivating self-expression and appreciating life's little blessings. Your flexibility leads to success faster than your determination. Thankfully, your positive attitude is enough to set the course of events into motion.

You need to sit down and talk about the source of your discontent in a no-nonsense manner; otherwise you might discover too late that you're past the negotiation stage. However, engaging in outright conflict isn't the wisest plan at this time. Things might not go according to your wishes, and the more you try to control them, the more irritating everything is. Putting your needs out in the open is the first step toward resolution if you can be patient with the process.

Your core beliefs may be in conflict with those closest to you; however, this divergence doesn't mean that you have to downplay your values or change your mind just to fit in. Additionally, it's not a good idea to try to convince anyone else to adopt your perspective. There are as many different viewpoints as there are roads that lead to Rome. For now, accept the differences and move on. Life would be awfully boring if we were all the same.

Once you have your little meltdown today, it may feel as if the pressure is off you for a while. Unfortunately, this temporary sense of relief doesn't necessarily mean that everything will run smoothly. It takes more than just one outburst to resolve the current emotional dynamics. Initiating an honest discussion enables you to move through your discomfort in a healthier manner. Keeping your emotions close to the surface minimizes the need to lose your temper in the future.

Your restlessness might get the best of you today, especially if something intriguing catches your eye.
