But you could cause an unexpected breakdown in a routine that's working just fine if you move too quickly. Take your time and be your own critic, rather than provoking others to rain on your parade. Follow through with your best ideas, but only after you reconsider each step of your plan in the most practical manner. Better safe than sorry.

It's nearly impossible today to know if you're better off listening to your friends or acting on your own volition without waiting for anyone else's advice. There's no right or wrong way to proceed now; both strategies have their pros and cons. But even if you're absolutely certain you know what you're going to do, it still doesn't hurt to consider another point of view before actually initiating action. Exploring all the possibilities ensures your success.

Your overriding concern today is about your insatiable desire for acknowledgment from your friends and family. You could receive some enthusiastic support for your efforts but it isn't consistent, prompting you to think you might be doing something wrong. Unfortunately, changing your tactics mid-course won't help you win any allies. Just continue doing the best you can without worrying about the judgments of others. You are the source of your best advice now, so listen to your inner wisdom and let your actions speak for themselves.

Even if you have doubts about going on a trip alone, your frustration level might only increase if you wait for someone else to accompany you. People may nod their heads in approval, but they still could back out when the time comes for their participation. Assume that you're on your own today while leaving room for a friend or partner to join in later. Reducing your dependence on others creates a strong foundation for healthier relationships.

Nearly everything appears to take longer than you expect now, yet you may see signs that the energy is starting to shift. Nevertheless, instead of impatiently pushing forward today, take time to finish a project that continues to hang over your head. Give yourself a few more days to tie up loose ends before initiating action on your new project. Leaving a job well done enables you to forge ahead with confidence.

You might be so sure of your position today that you bait someone into an argument just to prove your case. Unfortunately, even a casual conversation with a friend could turn tense if you are overly stubborn about your opinion. Wasting energy on debate is only a distraction now. It's not helpful to be arrogant when you would be better off observing the rapidly shifting tides. Improving your current strategy for success is as simple as keeping an open mind.

Focusing on details is a smart strategy today as long as you don't miss the overall dynamics of what's occurring in an important relationship. If something happens out of the blue, consider it as a reminder from the universe to pay close attention to your feelings because repressed emotions are now likely to zap you unexpectedly. Address an uncomfortable issue as soon as you see it coming rather than waiting until the tension disrupts your day. You might surprise others with your direct approach, but everyone will appreciate it in the long run.

You may unilaterally declare this a day to be one of fun and relaxation, only to discover that there's still something else left undone. Keep in mind that you don't have to run out on your responsibilities to create time to enjoy the fruits of your labor. Even if you can't get away for long, at least plan on partaking in a pleasurable activity that's not associated with any sort of enduring accomplishment. Give yourself permission to feel the joy that can be found in the present moment.

Your sense of anticipation is growing, but you still might not know what's around the next corner. You could successfully talk yourself out of your excitement today, only to feel the adrenaline rush again a little later. Stop attempting to resist the future; reclaim the optimism that you recently set aside to focus on pressing issues. A more positive attitude is an invitation to a whole new range of possibilities.

You could be caught off guard today by the intensity of your feelings. Although you are optimistic about your recent choices, you still might run into a serious roadblock that tests your determination. Slow down so you can navigate through the obstacle course without giving up. The road clears ahead if you have the sense to push forward with unflappable resolve and unwavering faith.

You might be feeling anxious now if you can't decide how to spend your time. However, the pressure to choose is a symptom of the larger issues in your life that require you to balance your irrepressible dreams with a more realistic acceptance of what's ahead. Instead of believing that you can do whatever you want, moderate your expectations to avoid disappointment later in the day. Focus on what you can change rather than what's out of reach.

Hopefully, you have already taken time to check in with your own needs, instead of being totally distracted by everyone else's. However, your period of self-reflection is rapidly drawing to a close, and you must make a decision that will guide you through the weeks ahead. Stop looking over your shoulder and wondering what you could have done differently. Aim for the stars and imagine all that you can possibly do in the future, instead.

Your recent encounter with your own emotional vulnerability may have left you a bit rattled. However, you're ready to face your fears today and overcome them once and for all. Somber Saturn is your ally now, defining what is out of bounds and what is within reach. Instead of running helter-skelter all over the map, settle into the present moment and remain open to feeling what's in your heart. Sometimes being true to yourself takes work.

You're growing tired of the push-me-pull-you games that are clouding the dynamics of your relationships these days. Fortunately, you may be offered a way out today, so you don't have to go around again and again. The solution won't likely come from choosing one extreme or the other. Instead, your current differences of opinion might become insignificant when you focus on the long-term goals instead of fleeting satisfaction. Sharing your dreams helps you discover common ground.

Doing your chores may be a bit tedious today because of the hard work required. Unfortunately, avoiding them doesn't make much sense now since you can't enjoy socializing with your friends this weekend until your obligations are fulfilled. Fortunately, finding a steady production pace that you can maintain throughout the day will be handsomely rewarded with ample time off later.

You're not the least bit interested in taking the easy way out today, since you might doubt your abilities unless you can meet other people's expectations. Nevertheless, you may feel so weary of struggling that you surrender to someone else's assumptions about you, leaving little room left over for your creative self-expression. Thankfully, propitious Jupiter is on your side now, so you should be able to find time for everything, including your personal growth. Don't give up; finding your own voice could reveal a promising new path to your future.

Unfulfilled family commitments may return in an unexpected manner today. Perhaps you mistakenly thought that the old business was already wrapped up, only to discover that there's another round of work that's expected of you. A bit of intense concentration could ultimately offer you more freedom than you realize. You're being given a second chance to demonstrate your reliability, so take it and prove that you're the leader of the pack.

It seems as if you're tied to the clock today, with very little flexibility to adapt to someone else's schedule. However, you probably have to make adjustments anyway, even if changing your plans adds layers of complications. Nevertheless, don't hesitate to ask for help if you need it. Just be ready to say yes if your guardian angel arrives to offer assistance. Don't let your pride get in the way of your success.

The reality of your financial situation is such that you might not have much choice when it comes to selecting your work hours. You can't afford to miss a chance to increase your income today, whether it's generated by a new project or just an unexpected bump in your business. Luckily, adopting a serious demeanor could lead to a fresh perspective and a brand new way of looking at your options. In any event, thinking outside of the box improves your chances for success.

You may feel restrained by circumstances beyond your control, but paradoxically this can also be quite reassuring. Unlike some of your peers, knowing and working with unalterable limitations makes you feel surprisingly safe now. Your life has a purpose today, even if it's simply to focus your efforts on resolving the situation at hand. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to loosen up enough to enjoy yourself. All work and no play is not a viable solution.

Even your closest friends could misunderstand your intentions today. You're not making it any easier for them now because you're unlikely to tell them everything they need to know. You aren't trying to make the situation any more complicated; it's just that you are afraid to share things about yourself that might be uncomfortable for others to hear. Nevertheless, taking a calculated risk should pay off if you balance your optimism with a healthy dose of practical realism. Spill the beans and hope for the best.

Sometimes you feel as if you don't fit into your family or community, and that others have trouble understanding your serious approach to life. However, you might be surprised with the generous support you receive now, making it easier for you to be part of the fun. If you are offered a chance to participate in a group activity, don't let a previous bad experience ruin the day. You have power over your thoughts, so allow old fears to morph into today's enthusiasm. Make the most of the moment and embrace the current opportunities; they won't wait at your door forever.

Whatever you think your current role is in the outer world, you may be afraid that you aren't making your mark today. You're likely to overcompensate for your career-related insecurities now by glossing over your shortcomings or failures. But don't be afraid to silence your doubts by thinking big and acting even bigger. Grandiose plans could actually be your key to success now if you're willing to show up and do your part.

Although you may be naturally cautious, you're especially eager to make the most of today's amazing potential. Jolly Jupiter is currently journeying through your 5th House of Playful Self-Expression, inspiring you to share the brighter side of life with anyone who will listen. Instead of just repeating all the excuses you have to say no, it's your time to step forward and say yes. Your success is contagious; following your bliss empowers others to do the same.

Although you want to be part of the fun today, you would rather march in front of the parade rather than get lost in the crowd. You're feeling your oats, but just because witty Mercury gives you an extra sharp tongue now doesn't mean you have to use it at the expense of someone else. Unfortunately, your current tendency toward excessive behavior can land you in trouble unless you think before you speak. Soften your message so others don't have to cover their ears and miss out on what you are saying.

You aren't very happy if you are the brunt of someone's sarcasm, but defending yourself may be a common event with your stubborn nature. However, you might not be that comfortable responding to this particular situation today. Sometimes it just easier to hide your anger than to confront the origin of the problem. Keep in mind that this is not a cowardly act. Your self-restraint is a sign of wisdom now; otherwise you could lose control and complicate matters instead of leaving well enough alone.

You need to stay vigilant or your intensity starts to sound overly aggressive to others. You might even believe that you are extremely logical today, only to have someone inform you that your ideas are all-but-impossible to follow. Instead of explaining every little detail, speak softer and say less. You really don't have to use that many words now to get your point across. But you may have to wait a little longer before your message is completely understood.

You might surprise everyone with your ability to fight for your choices today. You may be willing to listen, but once you've heard what someone else has to offer, your reaction can be strong and swift. Even if you grow more aware of the opinions of others now, be careful about diluting the strength of your message. Attempting to cover too much unfamiliar ground all at once won't get you very far; narrow your focus and speak from your heart.

Expressing your creative ideas isn't an alien concept to you, but today there is so much positive energy floating around that you might not know when to stop. Your confidence tempts you to be so bold that you can easily offend even your strongest allies. Things will go more smoothly if you remember that pompous Jupiter's magnifying lens is making everything you say sound more important than it actually is. A laid-back approach will take you further now than an arrogant one. Save the drama for another day.

Your interactions may seem to be emotionally volatile now that you are approaching a real turning point in a relationship. Someone's negative thoughts might boil over and then everything becomes quiet. But don't mistake less noise for less intensity; it could be just the opposite. Don't allow yourself to feel so much anger that you say things you don't really mean. Withdraw your energy until you have regained your strength and composure. Reclaiming your center is as simple as changing your attitude and listening to your heart.

You can be such a people-pleaser that sometimes you become overly concerned with making everyone else happy at your own expense. But the impulsive Aries Moon bumps into radical Uranus and loving Venus today, indicating that you could suddenly blurt out something straight from your heart without thinking about the impact of your words. It's not your intention to hurt anyone, but at the same time you have to take care of yourself. Setting well-defined boundaries assures healthier relationships in the future.

You're finally motivated to begin new projects now with so many planets visiting your 6th House of Work. Unfortunately, completing what you start can become a problem if you don't keep up the momentum, especially if people distract you with their own agendas. You may lose track of your direction if you slow down today, so ask your friends and family to either lend a helping hand or simply get out of your way. Anything is possible if you set your mind to it.

Even if your current message sounds critical, don't expect others to automatically drop everything and share your concern today. Although your friends know that you can wax philosophical, they still grow less patient if you enthusiastically ramble on about something that's significant only to you. Your ideas are flowing fast and furiously now but it's hard to tell which ones are worth pursuing. Don't grow too attached to any one thought until you see how it stands up to the test of time.

Wielding your power is exhilarating today, but you could easily overdo it. The idea of proving your authority can be so enticing that you may lose sight of your original intentions. However, success doesn't stem from being in absolute control; reaching your goals is dependent on cooperation and innovation now, and not hierarchy and tradition. Inventor and visionary Buckminster Fuller defined synergy as the whole being greater than the sum of its individual parts.

Positive thinking is the single most powerful force that can motivate others, but you might take its intensity too far today. Blind optimism isn't useful because if others believe that you can't discern facts from fiction, there's a good chance that they will lose faith in your entire message. Muster support for your plan by being as realistic as possible when sharing the details. Everyone wants to hear good news, but it's even more essential to tell the truth.

You're eager to create new strategies for increasing your income while the enterprising Aries Moon travels through your 2nd House of Money. You may have a lot of brilliant ideas today about how to improve your cash flow, but you're not sure that any of them will actually work. Keep in mind that dreamy Neptune's long-term presence in your sign can drain your confidence now, so don't be afraid to ask for support from others. Relying on good advice from a trustworthy ally helps you determine a sensible course of action.

Today's focus shifts away from your need to express your desires while the concern for establishing more stability in your life now moves to the front burner. The best way to ensure success is to build a solid foundation first. Handle your current responsibilities as sensibly as possible without waiting for a more opportune time. Finishing your chores in the morning allows you to relax with a clear conscience later in the day.

If the recent hectic pace has left you off-balance, today may bring welcome relief as the Moon's return to your sign gives you a renewed sense of certainty. Taking time to hang out with friends and family enables you to moderate the hyperactivity and find your way back to a mellower existence. You're in your own element now, so soak in the positive vibrations while you can.

Your morning begins on an uplifting note as social networking lures you away from more serious matters. However, later in the day, you may not be as eager to waste time on endless phone calls, emails or text messages. You might need a bit of solitude now so you can concentrate on what's really important. Sometimes even you lighthearted Twins crave more meaning in your life, so don't be afraid to explore your heart to figure out what you want.

Even if you have big ideas for a family celebration today, you may tire quickly of such thoughts when you realize how much effort your social ambitions require. It's not that you're lazy or unmotivated; it's just that you need to be as practical as possible about your expectations. Take extra time planning all the logistics; you won't make a wrong decision if you consider all available options before committing to one direction. Celebrate life's blessings no matter what else you do.

You need to shine your light brightly in all that you do today, making it difficult to completely relax even in the lighter moments. Your drive for excellence isn't negotiable now, but others could become annoyed with your persistence anyhow. However, it doesn't really matter what anyone else thinks of you; what counts is how you judge yourself. Nevertheless, as long as you don't compromise your integrity, a little flexibility on your part may be just what the doctor ordered to soothe everyone's nerves.

Your mood greatly improves as you slide into a groove of productivity this afternoon. Naturally, it feels good to deliver on whatever you promise; it's even better to know that you are doing your job really well. But efficiency isn't enough for you now. Your current happiness also depends upon your ability to surround yourself with beauty and love. Paradoxically, the positive energy you experience originates within your own heart.

You instinctively know today what is beautiful and what is not as your key planet Venus graces you with even sharper aesthetic judgment than normal. Unfortunately, it may be challenging to justify your sense of style without becoming overly critical of others. Remember, you don't need anyone to agree with you; your taste stands on its own. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder so channel your passion into creative pursuits, instead.

People may seem inflexible today as they go about their regular business. It's frustrating when your suggestions fall upon deaf ears. Instead of wasting time trying to have meaningful discussions with others who aren't even interested, gently withdraw from unnecessary dialogue unless you are asked for your opinion. Be brief when explaining your position; using extra words only creates unnecessary stress now. Silence is golden if it means you can concentrate on your work with a singular focus.

Whoever thinks that you Archers aren't industrious should stand back and just watch you in action today because you could demonstrate the true meaning of going the extra mile. No matter what, you are determined to come across with the goods and do something special. If you told someone that you would take responsibility for a particular task, then don't let anyone charm you out of doing the right thing. Your integrity is on the line now, so stop talking and get to work.

You're willing to work diligently for what you want today, even if you have to shake things up a bit along the way. Luckily, your desire for profound change is supported by a harmonizing lunar aspect to transformational Pluto in your ambitious sign. Although others might resist your efforts at first, you're not likely to take no for an answer. Make adjustments to your strategy as needed while keeping your eyes on your goal. Your calculated persistence will wear down the opposition in the end.

Your friends and family may show up with extra support today, yet it might be challenging to accept it graciously. You could be caught off guard with the realization that people think you need help, but don't let your ego get in the way. Deal with your insecurities as efficiently as possible and remain open to sincere offers of assistance. Letting others contribute to your success is a winning proposition for all.

There's no reason to be in a hurry this morning since your day begins like a freight train, moving very slowly at first and then steadily picking up steam. If you attempt to start out too fast, you could quickly run into an obstacle and then have to backtrack to get it right. However, quick fixes won't solve any problems today. You must look at the entire system and approach the solution holistically for it to be of lasting value. Putting your shoulder to the wheel is not for the weak-of-heart, but the rewards are great if your determination is strong.

The real magic is not found in the supernatural world today; you can experience it in the meaningful connections you make with others. But don't expect to be buzzing with excitement. Instead of seeking something mysterious beyond the senses, concentrate on the more mundane aspects of your current relationships. Too much searching now blinds your eyes from the most extraordinary things that are right in front of your nose.

Allowing your moods to rise and fall with their own natural rhythm is your best strategy now, since the Moon's visit to your sign amplifies the intensity of your emotional reactions. Although your feelings may ebb and flow with greater uncertainty than you wish today, you're only pulled off balance if you resist the current flow. Your best bet is to hold off on making any long-term decisions until the energy settles down. You can't control every aspect of your life, but you can control how you respond.

You may have important secrets to keep, yet even a tiny glimpse of the bigger picture now can shift your perspective and convince you that it's time to talk. Your unconventional approach might be exactly what's needed to catch others off guard today. Take advantage of your window of opportunity to present your case in the best possible light and be open to where the conversation leads you. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Social activities can be emotionally healing today, especially if you're gently nurtured by your friends. However, accepting what is offered may be challenging, but showing your vulnerability might be just the right thing to do. There's really no need to put up artificial walls in order to protect yourself from those who love you the most. The first step to creating true intimacy is to open your heart and let others in.

Although taking some time off today sounds like a good idea, you might not want to turn down an exciting opportunity to assume a leadership role. Whether you take charge at work or at home, others are likely to appreciate your guidance as long as you don't act like a prima donna. Thankfully, you can be even more effective now by working behind the scenes or quietly off to the side. You don't have to be the star of the show in order to inspire others with your spirit of generosity.

If you recently postponed an important decision, grab the chance to clearly state your preference today. The practical energy from the earthy Taurus Moon gives you the ability to be decisive in a manner that creates lasting relevance. Don't be distracted by your tumultuous emotions now; the best way to keep your balance in the present moment is to focus on the distant horizon.

Although you may be in touch with your inner voice of reason today, you are still tempted to indulge in pleasure if given the opportunity. You could consider all your options and make the most responsible choice, only to toss logic to the wind at the very last moment. Fortunately, staying aware of your current spontaneous inclinations might be enough to prevent you from acting unconsciously. It's not difficult to do the right thing now if you just acknowledge your impulsive desires without automatically letting them control your life.

A stubborn associate who is satisfied with his or her current situation can stand in the way of your happiness today. It's hard to break out of a current relationship pattern, especially if it's meeting some of your basic needs. Normally, achieving stability is a positive accomplishment in your world. However, maintaining the status quo now can prevent you from taking the next step. Don't worry if your breakthrough doesn't happen yet; things will change when the moment is ripe.

A return to your regular routine makes the most sense now, but you might not be willing to give up on your dream of embarking on a journey of some kind. Nevertheless, it seems as if you are running out of time and can't get away with wasting your energy on non-productive activities. Luckily, with the right attitude, even the most boring chore can suddenly transform into its own adventure.

You're blessed because you can find fulfillment today from the simplest of pleasures. Your needs are not complicated now and satisfaction is certainly within reach. But you won't achieve your long-term goals if you just continue to aimlessly drift through the day. Establish your desired destination and then move with purpose in that direction.

You might prefer staying home and laying low today. However, you may have to head out into the real world even if you're not ready for another round of work. Instead of getting caught up in your disappointment, stand up to the challenges of the day with fierce resolve. Fortunately, you can have the best of both worlds by taking care of your obligations first and creating some quiet time for relaxation later. You have the power to improve your day by simply changing your attitude.

You could be uncharacteristically stubborn in your thinking today and unwilling to change your mind. People may be surprised if you're not as agreeable as usual to bend your personal agenda to meet their needs. However, you're not required to explain your motives in detail, so just kindly tell others that you already have your own plans and then get busy with what makes your heart happy. Some adventures are meant for you alone.

Your dilemma seems quite real today, even if you're feeling confident of your decision-making abilities. You think that you know what you want and it doesn't appear too complicated but the Gemini New Moon occurs in your 3rd House of Information, scattering your thoughts and confusing your priorities. Achieving satisfaction isn't as easy as it sounds because there's a big difference between your personal goals and what others have to offer at this time. Your current happiness depends on your willingness to modify your highest ideals with what is actually possible.

Your physical energy may be low today, leaving you to feel a bit discouraged. Perhaps your smartest strategy now is to simply take it easy and recharge your batteries. The breezy Gemini New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Resources, making it tough to tackle a significant project. Don't waste too much time worrying about your lack of progress; your stamina should return soon enough. In the meantime, increase your chances for future success by getting some much-needed rest and relaxation.

You are very aware that your emotions are affecting your productivity today as the flighty New Moon buzzes your 1st House of Personality. Your feelings shift with the breeze, making it nearly impossible to settle into your work. Your moods may continue to fluctuate, challenging you to maintain a calm demeanor. Minimize your frustration and avoid being overwhelmed by only taking on what you know you can finish. Limiting your goals now makes room for spiritual growth.

You may be so sensitive today that you feel under the weather for no particular reason. However, it's crucial not to succumb to negativity with the Gemini New Moon falling in your 12th House of Spirituality, since circumstances are probably not as bad as they currently seem. Above all, remain honest; any attempts to stretch the truth will only backfire now. However, sharing your fantasies with a trustworthy friend can be an uplifting experience as long as you clearly differentiate your dreams from the facts.

No matter how great you feel about your prospects today, your usual demonstration of courage and vitality may still be difficult to pull off as the Gemini New Moon muddies your 11th House of Community. Unfortunately, positive energy isn't as readily available now. Ironically, bringing your self-doubt right out into the open can turn the day around. Others are more likely to offer a helping hand once you stop pretending that you have all the answers.

Although you may be operating on information overload, Neptune's square to the Gemini New Moon in your 10th House of Public Responsibility makes it difficult to tell which data is useful to your career plans and which is not. It might even be impossible to discern fact from fiction now. Naturally, you want to deal with the real world based upon objective truth; however, your fuzzy thinking gets in the way of your progress today. Soften your stance and don't push for clarity where there is none. The seeds of your next success story must be planted in your imagination first.

You may grow more optimistic in thought and lighter on your feet as the day unfolds. However, you also might become confused about your future plans as the Gemini New Moon highlights your 9th House of Big Ideas. Unfortunately, you're less able to tell what's real and what is imagined today. Your thoughts come and go quickly now, so don't worry if you can't hold on to any of them. Attempting to control your mental meandering is an exercise in futility. Instead, drift along with the currents and enjoy the day for whatever joy and inspiration it brings.

You might actually believe you can logically think your way around a current dilemma, but reason seems to break down just as the solution comes into sight. For now, it is practical reality versus creative imagination as the clever Gemini New Moon lands in your 8th House of Transformation; it's difficult to hold on to both sides at the same time. Give yourself permission to entertain your dreams today, since they are a catalyst for the positive change you seek.

You are being flooded by vivid images arising from your subconscious today. But you may feel as if a friend or partner is pushing you to do something that doesn't really fit into your notion of reality. Someone might stir your anxiety as the inquisitive Gemini New Moon activates your 7th House of Companions. The more you try to figure out what it all means, the farther away the answers seem. Don't take your lack of clarity too seriously, for it will pass soon enough. In the meantime, open your mind and enjoy the show.

People usually trust your answers because you have plenty of common sense and seem to know exactly what to do in a time of crisis. However, you may be unclear about where to place your efforts as deceptive Neptune clouds today's Gemini New Moon in your 6th House of Work. Your lack of confidence could lead you down the path of less resistance, which isn't necessarily your intended direction. Allow yourself the luxury of wasting a little time now, even if it feels counterproductive. Your best solutions come when you're not looking for them.

Although you may be quick to leap out of bed and prepare for work today, something in the back of your mind could still be bothering you. Even if you don't know what's expected of you, the mischievous Gemini New Moon's presence in your 5th House of Self-Expression is a cosmic reminder that you can be extremely creative if you let go of the details for a while. If you refuse to relinquish control, you could inadvertently invite unnecessary irritation. However, remaining open to change leads to rich and meaningful experiences.

There's no need to panic today, even if you don't have your full game plan in place yet. In fact, expressing your fears might just make matters worse as the chatty Gemini New Moon culminates in your 4th House of Emotional Security. Unfortunately, you're not fully in control of your immediate environment; the more you try to force something to go your way, the more resistance you encounter. Attempting to resolve an issue could make your frustration level soar; trust your psychic radar and just float through the uncertainty for a while longer.

It's time to break free from any old habits that no longer serve you. You've been on the verge of change for a while and now you might be worrying that you missed your window of opportunity. Don't succumb to unnecessary discouragement; instead, shake up some of the more mundane aspects of your day just to create some much-needed excitement. A sudden rush of adrenaline could be enough to kick-start the next phase of your life.

You can waste too much time today wondering if everything is okay because something that you usually take for granted may be less certain now. You might be hesitant to build anything because it feels like the sand is shifting beneath your feet. The good news is that your foundation is more stable and solid than you think. Try not to be overly concerned about issues that won't ultimately matter, for your insecurity will pass and your confidence will return when you start trusting the process.

Your imagination has a life of its own now that the evocative Moon is back for her monthly visit to your sign. You may find it challenging to separate your feelings from what is actually best for you, leaving you less concerned with the undeniable facts and more enamored with the endless possibilities. Don't make any final decisions before thinking your whole plan through one more time. Every fantasy doesn't have to become real.

You have fantastic ideas but it will still take considerable effort to execute your plans. It's not that your goals are so grandiose that they are unattainable; it's just that you tend to adopt a more thoughtful and methodical approach. Carve out a bit of time to reconsider what you really want to do now before moving in your chosen direction. There's no reason to rush the journey when there is so much at stake.

There is considerable pressure in your life these days, even if you hide it well. However, you may be less inclined to keep everything to yourself today. Thankfully, supportive friends come to the rescue, whether or not they realize how much you needed help. Temporary peace is yours if you allow yourself to be distracted from your deeper concerns for a while. Your little escape enables you to return to your unfinished business feeling refreshed and ready to meet the challenges ahead.

What appears to be a professional setback at first could actually be an unexpected opportunity to make improvements on your plans. You might not see the details clearly now, but the passing weeks will give you a different perspective on what's going on. Don't fight so hard against the resistance, for it's probably based more on your fears than on reality. Thankfully, your practical and patient nature saves the day.

Your interpretation of what someone says may be a bit distorted today since your fantasies are coloring your thoughts. It can be frustrating if you attempt to stay in the logical realms, for your imagination demands to be included in the process now. Contrary to what others are telling you, working harder isn't always the answer. Paradoxically, giving yourself permission to daydream actually helps you accomplish your tasks in a more innovative manner.

Your directional bearings cannot be found by analyzing a map today, for no one else has traveled along your path. Your road through life is for your steps alone and it's not realistic to expect others to make it easier for you now. But if you are inventing your own reality there's no time for you to fall asleep at the wheel. Paying close attention to what's in front of you increases your chances of successfully reaching your destination on time.

Managing your relationships requires extra vigilance these days. However, an unexpected twist can turn your day upside down, but a surprise can also set you free. Your logic may be somewhat clouded now, so put off the big decisions for a while longer. In the meantime, remain flexible to the needs of others. Ultimately, let your dreams be your guide as you explore the possible paths ahead.

You practical Goats prefer solid footing beneath your feet, so it's unsettling now when the very things you were most sure of start to disintegrate before your eyes. Don't panic; it isn't like your life is falling apart. The problem is your internal GPS isn't operating at top efficiency, so you may have to fly by the seat of your pants for a while. Loosen up and enjoy the ride -- even if you have no idea where you are going.

There's a fresh breeze blowing into your life now, but you must open your windows to notice it. However, you are distracted by everything that's potentially pleasurable, so it could require a conscious decision to let in the deeper emotional issues. You may not choose to experience the day in a particularly intense manner, but you can still sense the storm building on the horizon. Have fun today without stressing about tomorrow, for it will arrive soon enough.

Thinking about your home and family in radical new ways may offer a unique solution to an ongoing predicament. Even so, transformation won't likely happen overnight, so try not to make too much of a fuss about what is going on now. Although your personal lens on reality might make things seem different than they actually are, closing your eyes won't make the problem go away. Truth works better than denial if you really want to create positive change.

You could grow tired of listening to the sound of your own voice today. Even if you start out talking fast, you might think it's wiser to say nothing at all once the Moon slips into cautious Cancer. However, keeping secrets can be as problematic as sharing too much information. There's no reason to fuel a melodrama that evolves from an all-or-nothing strategy. Minimize the internal tug-of-war by finding a middle path that doesn't go to extremes.

Your concerns about money may turn a delightful day into one riddled with angst. Luckily, it helps to remember that some things are simply out of your control, including how much cash you have on hand today. Nevertheless, you're responsible for specific behaviors that can immediately impact the current situation. Adopting a more conservative approach ensures that you'll have what you need tomorrow. A penny saved is a penny earned.

You might not feel very cooperative today, even though you care deeply for your friends and associates. You want everyone to be successful at whatever they choose to do, but you prefer to keep things low-key now and not share your feelings. Although saving your energy may be a smart strategy, it doesn't hurt to simply nod your head in approval so others at least know that you heard what was said. Just be sure to take some time alone so you can sort out your thoughts before jumping into your next group project.

You have a clever way with words today and might choose to hide your uncertainties behind a mask of humor. The reflective Moon's return to your contemplative sign this morning may raise doubts about your chosen path. Unfortunately, your desire to acquire something beautiful could create its own complicated story. Postpone a non-essential purchase and focus on building trust, instead. Strengthening your relationships can greatly improve the quality of your life.

Attending to practical issues at work today takes precedence over encouraging the whimsical dreams of others. Although you still might want to help a friend turn a fantasy into reality, don't let your concentration on the material world drift off. You may need to set aside some of your big-hearted generosity in order to get serious about meeting your own objectives. Take care of your business first so you can offer your unwavering support later on.

You know exactly what needs to be done today, but you might be paralyzed with the fear of doing something wrong. You probably have taken on a lot of responsibility at work, but when you return home later, you still must handle unfinished domestic chores. Don't let all your running around being busy distract you from the important personal growth that demands your attention. Your desire for perfection doesn't have to get in the way of your happiness.

Your romantic dreams motivate you to take drastic action today so you don't end up stuck in a world of illusions without achieving success. But accomplishing your goals may not bring you the recognition you want or the love you seek. Being swept up in an exciting flurry of emotions is invigorating, yet it's still crucial to refocus on your core beliefs now before discovering that you're heading off in the wrong direction. Navigating with your moral compass will lead you exactly where you want to go.

Your strong reaction to a family discussion today could carry you off into tumultuous waters. Although you might prefer to sidestep a direct confrontation and move on, you can feel your emotions gaining in strength and you know something will have to give. Naturally, it's healthier to express your concerns before they become serious issues. Resolve your differences quickly and defuse a potential conflict before it reaches a critical state. Clearing the air is beneficial to everyone involved.

You may have a variety of things to do today, yet it's essential that you keep up the appearance of being a strong leader at work and at home. However, you might not know the exact recipe to make this happen. Forget about the how-to book filled with step-by-step instructions. Instead, reclaim your power by trusting your instincts and being your authentic self. You don't have to have all the answers to be an inspiration to others.

Your current dilemma pits your need for independence against your desire for relationship security. Unfortunately, there aren't any quick fixes to your deep cravings for a more meaningful and spiritual connection. You may long to rediscover the missing magic that you set aside to climb a corporate or social ladder. Instead of expecting everything to fall into place today, simply focus on the most immediate tasks and leave the bigger issues for another day. There's no sense in worrying about things you can't change anyway.

Keeping up with all the social activities going on around you leaves you slightly out of breath. However, it's time to slow down now and reconnect with the more mundane aspects of your existence. But don't bother making big plans and looking too far ahead, or you'll just end up in a state of confusion today. Save the dreaming for another day while you focus on the current daily grind. Sometimes, counting your blessings is enough to remind you of all the joy in your life.

Someone might not approve of what you are doing, but you have no clue why. The more you investigate, the more convoluted the whole situation becomes. You may be ready to give up now and simply let the winds of change carry you wherever they will. Unfortunately, your current obligations prevent you from escaping because other people are counting on you today and you can't just run out on them. Just keep doing your best without wasting energy trying to please everyone else.

There's not much that will get in your way today. Even if a mountain suddenly appeared between you and the finish line, you might not notice the insurmountable obstacle -- where others would just throw in the towel and go home. However, a new set of problems may arise from your unwillingness to face the facts. Being realistic now is wiser than operating under a false sense of confidence. Even positive thinking can be taken too far.

You have more than enough energy to finish what you start today; you may even feel as if you're at the top of your game. But something might be happening in your life now that you don't quite understand. Be careful as you move into the shadows, where it's challenging to see things in their true light. Don't let distractions pull you off track; if you stick with the concrete facts, you can effectively steer clear of the negativity or confusion that uncertainty brings. Keep it simple if you want to reach your destination on time.

Many of the situations in your life seem to be beyond your control now. It's as if circumstances are driving your car instead of you. But you can be the hero that saves the day if you honor your own feelings and embrace that which you don't fully understand. If this sounds like a contradiction, then you are already on your way to solving one of the current unsolvable mysteries of your life.

Unpleasant circumstances can force an issue between you and your partner -- a romantic companion, a family member or a coworker. Whoever it is, it might seem like your ideas are being stifled, but you won't idly sit this one out. You feel the need to defend your prerogative to speak on your own behalf. This is no time to be shy; make sure everyone knows where you stand. Expressing what's in your heart is less risky now than remaining silent.

Strong desires can prompt you to spread your cards on the table in an attempt to attract what you want. But you might have missed a trick today, for your play doesn't necessarily bring you the results you were seeking, even if you get pretty close. Run your game plan through an extra round of analysis with someone you trust before putting it into motion. Reviewing all your options one last time is worth it when so much is at stake.

Although your feet are firmly planted on the ground, your feelings are being pulled in several directions. You can talk yourself into things you would normally dismiss as unrealistic. However, today you're willing to believe that anything is possible. Even if it is, don't try to convince yourself that you have super powers. Accept your limitations and you won't get in over your head. Fortunately, you can still ride to the rescue in your human form.

Conflict may arrive at your doorstep today in the form of unrealistic demands. It may feel as if people are expecting you to do or say things that are just not part of your original agenda. Go ahead and surprise others with your decisive behavior, but don't waste valuable energy defending your right to choose how to spend your time. Just remember that acting for the good of all doesn't mean you always have to set your needs aside to please someone else.

You may be pretty sure that your perceptions are right on target today and you're willing to go out on a limb to make your point. However, you're not interested in wasting your time lost in endless discussions about your plans. Swift action now speaks louder than philosophical debate that only delays the inevitable. Unfortunately, you still might have to manage a situation that stems from an unexpected response to your behavior. Address issues when they arise as efficiently as you can without taking responsibility for other people's reactions.

If you're in some type of sales or public relations work, you might as well go for the whole enchilada today. If you believe in what you're selling now, the sky is the limit and you can even bend reality in your favor. This is a wonderful opportunity to make substantial progress toward achieving your goals, but be careful not to abuse your power in the process. Misrepresentation of the truth for personal gain is frowned upon by the planets. Anything is possible as long as you play by the rules.

You have your own personal agenda today, but you might not want to undertake a new path on your own. Thankfully, you're able to tease the truth out of a complex array of facts and fictions. But if you believe in fairy tales, you could find yourself struggling to return to reality later on. On the other hand, if you keep one foot on the ground, you're more likely to find someone to collaborate with on a dream project. Your success depends on your ability to keep it real.

Even if the focus of your life is on your public image now, you have some very real concerns that you might be keeping to yourself. However, there's no need to hide your feelings from those you love. Once your erratic emotions are off your chest, you're ready to settle down and get to work. Although your disclosure might mess with other people's expectations, being truthful about your uncertainty ultimately contributes to making your relationships more stable.

Your physical stamina can pack quite a punch today. Although you have lots of energy, you're also acutely aware of your own limitations. The more you talk, the more everyone can see the weak spots in your grand plan. Save the speech for another day; big promises only land you into trouble now. Get busy while you have the momentum; lead by example and others will follow.

You often prefer to charge ahead without exhibiting any signs of caution, but today you need to stop, listen and think about your actions. Don't be so quick to defend yourself or your plans. Instead, reconsider what you are doing now with an objective eye. If it's not working, make the necessary changes before moving on. This isn't about past failure; it's about getting it right in the present moment.

You might be questioning the value of your work today along with your contribution to your family or community. This self-reflection could be part of a healthy reevaluation process, but be careful not to judge yourself with impossibly high standards. Make positive changes at work that increase your efficiency over the next few weeks, but don't promise more than you can deliver. Minor adjustments today bring major improvements down the road.

Everything seems to be going your way today, but you can still give the wrong answer or misinterpret what you hear if you jump to erroneous conclusions. Although it's nearly a week until your key planet Mercury turns retrograde, he's already slowing down, confounding you with his mischievous antics. You could spend the day being frustrated at life's little ironies or laughing with the universe. The attitude you choose makes all the difference in the world.

A wealth of profound symbolic material is bubbling up from your subconscious today, yet you may not be so quick to tell anyone about it. Although you tend to keep your feelings to yourself even more now that the Moon is visiting your sign, you have much to gain by sharing your inner world. In fact, expressing your vulnerability may be the best way to grow closer to someone you trust. Believe it or not, it's okay to let others nurture your dreams for a change.

Your ideas appear to have a life of their own and may even stumble over each other as they fight to be heard and appreciated. Your associates and friends expect a lot from you, but you don't have to try so hard to impress them. Set your priorities, slow your pace and start at the top of your list. You are a force to be reckoned with when your goal is within sight. There's no stopping you now once you have a practical plan in place.

It may be time to share an unsolvable problem you have been keeping to yourself. Running through the same analytical line of thinking on your own one more time won't necessarily bring you to a different conclusion. However, a close friend or associate might offer a new perspective that unlocks a viable solution. Carefully articulating your concerns starts the process, but make sure you listen closely to the feedback you receive to glean the most wisdom out of the conversation.

Retreating into your safety zone is an intelligent strategy today if you are feeling emotionally vulnerable. But remember, encountering an obstacle doesn't mean that you have failed on any level. To the contrary, you're receiving a notice from the cosmos that you just reached beyond your normal grasp. Instead of running scared, consider what you can learn from the experience. Keep your wits about you and your sense of optimism close at hand as you begin to revise your plans for the weeks ahead.

You're certain that knowledge is power, yet there may be more to this belief than is obvious at first glance. Unfortunately, you can't always persuade others to follow your dreams by simply giving them a map and minimum instructions. But mind games and power struggles won't help your cause, either. Instead, continue with your process of spiritual growth and let everyone else do the same. Self-exploration enables you to forge new ways of working with your allies to accomplish your goals.

Although others might believe that the gift of gab comes naturally to you, you may have a challenging time expressing what you mean now. Nevertheless, people aren't too surprised if you say something upsetting or controversial, for they expect you to speak your mind freely. You can be honest without offending anyone if you just think about your words before opening your mouth. However, if you don't stop to consider the impact of your message, you will soon be dealing with unintended consequences of premature communication.

Relationship dynamics may be confusing today and it's unclear what your best strategy should be to regain clarity. Perhaps you recently went overboard and said more than was necessary. You might have to pull back a bit now to reestablish a more sustainable balance of energy. Just don't retreat so far that you cut yourself off from your network of emotional support. The good news is you don't have to walk this path alone.

You are easily irritated today by someone who has a perspective that's dramatically different from yours. You might try to avoid a confrontation, but end up getting into a disagreement anyway. Instead of waiting until you've been pushed into a corner, act preemptively by stating your position as succinctly as possible. The best way to handle a difficult interaction is to shift your attitude from having to win an argument to simply understanding the other point of view. Establishing common ground is the first step to a happy compromise.

The data stream that has been fueling your feelings tapers off now, leaving you uncertain about what to do next. Theoretically, you should be comfortable with the slower and more methodical flow of emotions; but instead you might feel dazed or confused by the sudden change in the relationship landscape. Sort out the new dynamics gradually. You have more time than you realize as long as you keep your heart open throughout the process.

It's a breeze for you to accomplish a lot today now that the playful Leo Moon harmonizes with energetic Mars. You may be tempted to set aside your obligations to pursue pleasure, but it's probably not a good idea to trade your promises for immediate gratification. Don't try to shift the blame for your current dilemma onto anyone else. Just consider the consequences and do what makes the most sense in the long run. Find a creative way to have your cake and eat it too.

Although you can't completely avoid the weight of responsibility today, you are likely to be more concerned with expressing your feelings than doing your job. Your romantic heart is in direct conflict with your practical head, distracting you from finishing your chores. Even if you are motivated to push further ahead, you don't have to do anything drastic now. Allow the emotional tension to reach its crescendo and then subside before you swing into action.

Your coworkers or friends may keep you quite busy today, and that's just how you like it. You are at the top of your game, showing off your charm and wit as you fly from one activity to another. But strong desires are brewing just out of sight, so don't bother wasting your resources on trivial matters. Save some energy in reserve for when you will need it over the next few days. Setting a sustainable pace now improves your chances for success down the road.

You could be so sympathetic to people's emotions that sometimes it's tough to know how to respond. However, today you're more likely to immediately react to a difficult situation at work than to take a wait-and-see approach. Don't overcompensate with wildly impulsive behavior just to prove your point. Too much confidence leads to recklessness, which might create new problems faster than you can solve the old ones. Taking the time to listen to what others want enables you to discover a more lasting resolution.

You appear to be an open book to everyone around you while the demonstrative Leo Moon lights up your 1st House of Personality. Although some of your peers may not recognize it, you're in touch with profound emotions that are still working their way to the surface. Your thoughts carry even more weight now because they haven't been expressed. Once you share what's on your mind, the tension should dissipate quickly. But there's no need to shock anyone with your colorful disclosure. Consider your audience before you proceed.

You don't want everyone to know your likes and dislikes, prompting you to keep your preferences quiet today. You can easily rationalize hiding your desires by attributing it to your unwillingness to hurt anyone's feelings. However, your predicament won't be fixed by simply withdrawing. Remaining silent about your wishes contributes to the problem and not the solution. Talk about your emotions with enough sensitivity that you don't push others away. No one can fulfill your needs if you don't take a chance and tell them what you want.

You enjoy expressing your affection for your friends and colleagues, but you prefer doing so in an emotionally detached manner. However, staying cool becomes almost impossible once you start revealing your desires because others are likely to be more responsive than you anticipated. You might need to confront your own ambiguity today, especially if someone reacts with great intensity. Although you may be resistant to being vulnerable at first, you should feel better once everything is out on the table. Take a risk and open your heart.

You could surprise yourself today with the speed and intensity of your reaction to an event that is outside of your control. Although you may say that you want to go with the flow, you still have a hard time being flexible now with the Moon's presence in fixed Leo. Luckily, most things should turn out okay if you are willing to step into unknown territory and courageously face the current issues. Remaining open to altering your plans offers you a lot more room for growth.

You may feel overjoyed if someone with lots of big ideas breezes into your world and blows your mind with an unexpected opportunity. However, you might also secretly wish you could escape the noise, but you likely won't get very far. No matter where you go now, ungrounded philosophical conversations seem to follow you around. Thankfully, you can learn something very valuable from these animated discussions. Even if you are overwhelmed with too many details today, new information continues to widen your horizons in a way that you truly enjoy.

Nothing seems simple today. Although you plan on sticking to your agenda, you don't necessarily feel like following all the meanderings of a complex conversation. Uncharacteristically, you might prefer to jump around from one topic to another or slip off into your own daydreams where no one can find you. Don't judge yourself too harshly if you can't live up to the expectation of others. The tables are turned and this time you may be the one who's seeking the fun and resisting the work.

Although you appear to be flexible today, it's more likely that your mind is made up and additional facts won't be a catalyst for change. Unfortunately, your rigidity can get you into serious trouble now. There's nothing to be gained by letting suppressed fears govern your behavior. Disclosing your current apprehension with a close friend or partner is the smartest way to dissipate the negative energy before it creates real problems. Shining the light of your awareness into the shadows of your subconscious is the first step on your journey of self-discovery.

You want to impress everyone with your exemplary work ethic today, but it may be a real struggle to walk your talk. Unfortunately, your immediate needs are in direct conflict with your distant goals, making it tough to know what to do next. Quiet your mind and listen to your own intuition instead of seeking answers from external sources. Ultimately, being true to yourself says more about your character than anything else.

You might believe you have all the ingredients necessary to whip up the perfect plan for a pet project today. You feel confident because your vision is clear and you know how to reach your destination. But your positive attitude may be covering up a sneaking suspicion that you're missing an important piece of the puzzle. Too much rigidity makes it impossible to create the future you want. Entertaining unknown scenarios now could change everything.

You can get bent out of shape today if you believe your extra effort isn't making things happen faster. You may even wonder why you're working so hard when no one else seems to care as much as you. Even if you're frustrated by the snail's pace at which everything appears to be moving, don't let your annoyance trigger an emotional meltdown. Take a deep breath and cultivate your patience. It's easier to settle into the current flow when you're not in such a rush.

Everything appears copacetic as your day begins to unfold according to your plans. However, something might distract you before you find your rhythm, making it nearly impossible to maintain steady progress now. Nevertheless, it's still a good idea to keep non-essential thoughts to yourself. Letting your fantasies run wild without sharing them can be quite amusing, but talking about them could land you in big trouble. Staying in touch with your own feelings may be all that's needed to balance the energy now.

It's a breeze to finish your work today if you already addressed the issues raised by last week's distractions, rather than just temporarily diverting them. But if similar topics resurface now, focus on constructive resolution and stick to the process until you know that the energy has played out. Retreating prematurely will just create more problems down the road. Hang in there; your persistence will win out in the end.

You may grow more theatrical in your personal expression now that the evocative Moon is ambling through your proud sign. You might even become so enchanted by your own intensity that you momentarily forget that you are just one of the players in a complex set of circumstances. Step out of the spotlight and ask questions about what you can do to broaden your overall perspective. Widening your scope of vision helps the energy flow more smoothly for everyone involved.

Handling your responsibilities quickly leads you in the right direction now. Obviously, you want to meet your obligations efficiently, but may be uncertain about the best approach. Remember, your emotional well-being is directly connected to your productivity today. Plan your day strategically and don't be afraid to make use of the people and resources that are at your disposal. Keeping an open line of communication is your secret weapon for success.

You want to show your friends how much they mean to you now, but nearly everything you do feels contrived and somehow misses the mark. Falling short of your own expectations might lead you to try even harder. Forget about impressing others in your personal life today. Instead, just concentrate on doing your job to the best of your abilities. An unexpected reward may come your way as long as you get your work finished on time.

Shifting gears and planning your next career move now may not be as easy as you wish. Fortunately, you feel strong enough to manage the pressures of change without letting anyone know that you are struggling with the transition. Nevertheless, revealing your vulnerability and admitting that you can't do everything by yourself can actually create opportunities for positive growth. Expressing your feelings sets the stage for others to offer you the heartwarming support you need.

You're dreaming of distant horizons now that the Moon is visiting your 9th House of Faraway Places. However, reaching your destination may require more than simply heading off in the right direction. Luckily, with a little extra effort today you can organize your life so it resonates with your long-term goals. Think small at first and tend the seeds of your ideas until they grow into a strategic action plan that guides you into the future.

A relationship with a powerful person may have more impact on your future than you want to admit. However, this is not the best day to ignore a problem, for it won't just go away on its own now. Push your buried anger out into the open so it can't fester any longer in the dark. After the air is clear of judgment, everyone is likely to feel more optimistic about the future and willing to invest in your success.

You seem to know what someone wants before anyone else does today, but you still might not be in the mood to drop everything and lose yourself in service. The Moon's presence in your 7th House of Companions reflects your heightened sensitivity to the feelings of those around you. But don't be too self-critical if you just want to escape into your own world for a while. After all, replenishing your emotional vitality enables you to be more supportive of others.

You may be disheartened if you realize that you can't satisfy your craving for adventure now. The extroverted Leo Moon is occupying your 6th House of Habits, encouraging you to take a chance and break out of an old routine. However, something tells you that it's not quite time yet to step out of your comfort zone. Fortunately, you will be better prepared to make your move later on if you stop and focus on every little detail that confronts you today.

It really doesn't matter if you are eager to take a risk and make something outrageous happen; you won't likely get your crazy plans too far off the ground today. Unfulfilled promises weigh heavy on your mind until you handle your current obligations. But don't let frustration get the upper hand because having an emotional meltdown now won't improve the quality of your life or endear you to anyone else. Overcome your impatience and wait for a better moment to start something new.

Although you believe you can work within the current limitations being placed on you, you can't help but fantasize about your favorite escape anyhow. Of course you realize that rebellious behavior wont necessarily bring the results you want, but you're not sure you have enough control to keep things stable today. Nevertheless, even if blasting your way out of a rut sounds like a good idea, common sense should win out for now.

You have personal matters that demand your attention today, even if you're also pulled toward more public obligations. You might think that your job will offer you some respite from your domestic responsibilities, but you won't be able to avoid your family duties for too long. Just don't try to outsmart anyone by pretending to do your work when you're not. Be honest about your situation while handling your responsibilities the best you can. Put your integrity into action and the rest will fall into place.

You might become annoyed if someone at work pushes you too hard today. People may have inflated expectations, yet you know that there's only so much that one person can do in one day. Unfortunately, trouble arises if you don't establish clear limits. There's no need to complain about anything beyond your control because that only makes the situation worse. It's more constructive in the long run to let others know exactly what you can and cannot do. Setting healthy boundaries earns you respect and admiration from your peers, even if they resist at first.

An unexpected out-of-pocket expense is more difficult to absorb if your current financial situation is unstable. But it doesn't make sense to get discouraged now, even if you don't see how you're going to balance your incoming funds with your outgoing cash. Although a longer-term solution may take conscious effort, the immediate problem is temporary and should ease with just a little effort on your part. Consider this a gentle reminder to save for a rainy day.

You may feel as if you're being bounced around emotionally today while the changeable Moon moves through your sign. You want nothing more than to focus on what is most useful; however, your day won't likely unfold according to your plans. Instead, you might have to revise your agenda several times to accommodate the shifting tides, which are apparently beyond your control. Letting go of your earlier expectations enables you to transform a challenging day into one that's filled with pleasant surprises.

Your associates might not realize that you're having a tough time today because you're adept at hiding your concerns. Ironically, your doubts could be greatly eased by the simple act of sharing them with someone you respect. However, your fear of being criticized could be your biggest obstacle to letting your guard down. But remaining silent and engaging in endless analysis won't lead to a logical resolution. Although you may surprise others with your radical perspective, initiating an honest dialogue establishes a new level of trust.

There are so many things happening in your life all at once now that you may not have time to create a sensible game plan. Figuring the details out on the fly might get you through the day unless someone questions your integrity, prompting you to defend your intentions. However, open conflict isn't a constructive course of action today so change your tactics and be less impulsive in your approach. Focusing on your goals and ignoring your detractors enables you to circumvent an unnecessary argument. Channel your passion into your work.

You must find a harmonious balance between your perfect vision of the future and your current reality. A sluggish feeling in the morning may create more delays on a project. Although you won't likely receive exactly what you want now, your ultimate fate is still in your hands. What happens next will be determined by your response to your disappointment. You pride yourself in taking a realistic approach to domestic issues now, making it nearly impossible for anyone to convince you to change your opinion. Your illusions are bumping up against reality and you don't know what to think now that you can see the truth. Slowing down enough to sink into your emotions is challenging today, especially if you're afraid of what you might discover. Turning your goals into a workable plan can be challenging today. Acknowledging that you deserve some downtime is part of your solution now; the other part is cleverly scheduling your day to fit in both work and play. Once you have your reward in mind, you can finish your chores in record time.

You might feel as if you're at odds with yourself today because you can't find the right balance between too little and too much. Thankfully, you are naturally competent in handling a myriad of details. However, your current extravagance tempts you to commit to more than you manage, especially if you consciously skim over a crucial piece of information. Dreaming about every possibility now is healthy as long as you remember that your common sense is still your greatest asset.

Your friends may believe that you are a bit imbalanced today, especially if your exuberance pushes you toward big thinking. Although everything may appear better than it actually is now, you could overcompensate by seeing potential problems everywhere you look. Keep in mind that the truth is somewhere in between the extremes and it's smarter to moderate your excitement rather than going overboard in either direction. It's easier to make adjustments along the way than waiting until it's too late.

You may not be willing to let go of your financial concerns, even if you're more positive now about the future. The upbeat Sagittarius Moon shines her spotlight on your 2nd House of Possessions now and you recognize that your success depends upon consolidating recent gains. However, you could end up jeopardizing your progress if you try to bolt ahead too quickly. Cultivate your enthusiasm, but move forward cautiously until you build momentum that you can sustain for the long haul.

Your feelings are key to your happiness today as the evocative Moon returns to your inspirational sign. Unfortunately, you are tempted on occasion to override your emotions if they get in the way of a potentially exciting activity. Nevertheless, you're unable to ignore what your body tells you. Your moods are vital indicators of your overall well-being now, so pay extra careful attention to honoring what your heart needs.

Oddly enough, you're quite talkative today, even though you might prefer being left to your own devices. You're not eager to engage in small talk now, making it wise to avoid social events and large crowds. Initiating meaningful one-on-one conversations allows you to connect on a deeper level with someone special. Although networking could help you achieve your goals, it's okay to save the superfluous words for another day.

It's not easy to take your job seriously now, unless it involves interacting with your peers. You're buzzing with optimism as the Moon brightens your 11th House of Friends, firing up your social life. You long to be connected with your tribe, even if it's in a business rather than personal setting. Fortunately, you could receive the support and admiration of your coworkers if you deliver on your promises as expected. Going the extra mile pays demonstrates your willingness to be a team player.

Your inspiring vision of the future captures the imaginations of your colleagues today, leading you to assume a greater amount of authority. You might not want to be the boss, but others realize that you're one of the few people who intuitive know how all the puzzle pieces fit together. Don't turn down a leadership role if you are chosen by your peers. Stand up now and play your part; you can always step back with a sense of accomplishment later on.

A concrete plan is not enough to find love and keep it alive. It's no secret that it requires hard work to make a solid relationship endure through the long haul. You may feel more isolated now, prompting you to reach out to someone you trust. Although your current communication may not ignite passion, it is still useful for building a firm foundation for the future. Don't be concerned if immediate satisfaction seems elusive today; there's a larger game playing out. Believe it or not, some things are worth the wait.

You're motivated by financial rewards or anticipating a romantic interlude only to hit the wall before fully engaging your motors. This may feel like a setback, but it doesn't necessarily mean defeat. Take extra time and test the waters before diving in. Exercising a little patience can prevent you from getting in over your head too quickly. Taskmaster Saturn is opposing your key planet Venus, demanding that you're sincere in your efforts. Thankfully, your persistence is an integral part of your success.

A close friendship or love affair can hit a speed bump today as illusions give way to the stark reality of the situation. It's not that things are that bad; it's just that you need to address unresolved issues before you return to pursuing pleasure. Listening with an open mind now is just as important as speaking your piece. You stand to learn something constructive about yourself if you are secure enough to hear what's being said.  A change of attitude can turn an obstacle into an opportunity.

You may be doing better financially and professionally than in the romance department, but complications could still surface where you least expect them. The problem is that your feelings might not fit into your current workplace. You know there is a simple answer, but today you just have to deal with your own sense of limitations if resolution isn't yet in sight. Acknowledging your emotions is more productive now than trying to change anything in your environment. Keeping your heart open isn't always easy but it's the right thing to do.

Gracefully accepting the restrictions being placed on you empowers you to make the best of your current dynamics. A radical approach to expressing your needs turns a tricky situation into a positive one, even if a black cloud appears above you to block the sunshine today. But grabbing an umbrella won't necessarily keep you dry on a day like this. Instead of shielding yourself from the storm, your lesson now is to learn how to sing in the rain. Ultimately, your attitude makes all the difference in the world.

At first, you may be overly idealistic about your professional aspirations, but current obligations prevent you from losing touch with reality. Even if you do get a chance to escape for a bit of recreation, you still might not enjoy hanging out with your friends or family as much as you wish. However, the stress you experience now can be channeled productively if you set realistic goals, make a plan and stick to it. Establishing a sustainable pace at work is your best route to success.

You can be your own worst enemy today, although you could skillfully blame the current circumstances on someone else. Sobering Saturn hands a reality check to romantic Venus and your temporary resistance to experiencing pleasure might play out in the realm of relationships. If you need to pull back emotionally now, take full responsibility for your feelings; what you say influences others more than you know. But don't forget, stepping out of your comfort zone could lead to a lasting connection.

Your resistance to an authority figure could create tension today, especially if you don't acknowledge your role in the stressful dynamics.
