Perhaps, in your eagerness, you overlooked a critical piece of the puzzle and you need a reminder to see the whole picture. Don't shoot the messenger; it's possible that others are being hard on you because they respect you enough to tell you the truth.

Although you have high hopes for your future, an interesting dilemma could complicate your agenda today. You truly want to make progress toward your goals, but your efforts might not be enough to change the current trajectory. However, you don't have to see this setback as a personal failure; it's not a reflection of your capabilities. Your character is being tested at this time; long-term solutions come from common sense and perspiration now rather than from inspiration.

It might seem as if the reason for your current predicament is a lack of resources now, but it could also stem from an underlying fear of forming close emotional ties. Perhaps you have gone to extreme measures to keep your heart safe and are having a tough time integrating the expectations of others. Hold onto your long-term goals and trust your recent decisions. The blockages you face today will not outlive your dreams if you're willing to take a risk and let down your guard.

Walls of resistance that have sprung up around you may not be an indication that you are on a wrong track. The problem could originate from an overdue attitude correction, instead. Someone might get on your case if he or she thinks you're not working hard enough. But don't worry too much about the judgment of others. Get serious, focus strictly on the business at hand and your efforts will likely be appreciated in the long run.

You may be singing the blues today, but this is no reason to slip into denial. It's just that you might believe you have to temporarily set your feelings aside in order to achieve your goals. However, if you do try to suppress your emotions, it's unlikely that you'll reach your destination any quicker -- and you won't enjoy yourself as much once you get there. No shortcuts for you now; do the work and the pleasure will follow.

Your enterprising approach to life colors your day with optimism, yet you still have the good sense to meet reality head on. The Sagittarius Full Moon brightens your 9th House of Big Ideas, but circumstances don't make it easy to hold on to your ideals. Everything seems more complicated now than it should be, even if you have a plan in place. It's essential to remain open to the possibility that your desires will change over the days ahead. But don't let anyone rain on your parade; determination and perseverance are more important than ever.

You might be vacillating between having a good time and experiencing the depth of your feelings today. The Sagittarius Full Moon lands in your 8th House of Intimacy, reminding you to enjoy sensual delights without retreating from the fear of sharing too much. Your discomfort with intensity is based, at least partly, on your desire for simplicity. Sometimes the only way to recapture a less complicated existence is to go through a phase of increased complexity. Don't withdraw from your emotions, for this process will lead to the stability you seek.

Naturally, you are intrigued by a variety of interests and you love to flit from one clever thought to the next. But today's expansive Sagittarius Full Moon lights up your 7th House of Relationships, amplifying the emotions of those close to you. However, you might resist the flow of feelings and even doubt your desirability. Stop collecting data and start acting on what you already know to be true. It's time to get out of your head and into your heart.

You don't always express your desires to others -- even those you love and trust. Unfortunately, this overly cautious strategy minimizes your chances of being fully satisfied in a relationship. Your assumption that someone should just know what you need isn't the way it works in the real world. Today's outgoing Sagittarius Full Moon in your 6th House of Habits empowers you to step out of your comfort zone. You can improve your chances for fulfillment if you put your feelings out in the open. Honest communication in a relationship builds a solid foundation for continued growth.

You are overdue for a little romance in your life, but you must meet your previous commitments first if you really want to enjoy yourself. The adventurous Sagittarius Full Moon highlights your 5th House of Play, emphasizing your current desire to open your heart and let someone in. Just be certain that you know exactly what you're getting yourself into before taking things to the next level. Making a list of the potential risks versus rewards can help you decide whether or not to move forward in the game of love.

You may feel stressed today, but the tension can push you into some very dynamic situations. Although you might not be as relaxed as you wish, the Sagittarius Full Moon falls in your 4th House of Security, prompting you to seek clarity in professional and personal relationships. Concerns about your career could dredge up old fears and emotional insecurities. Thankfully, they have less power once they are seen in the light of day. You have the power to transform negative patterns into positive actions once and for all.

You could feel very far away from the harmonious interactions that you crave, but don't worry about what you might be missing now. The Sagittarius Full Moon spotlights your 3rd House of Communication, enabling you to express what you want from relationships. You're experiencing a higher level of intensity now, but don't try to light up the darkness too quickly or you may prevent the most powerful magic from coming to fruition. Channel your passion into creating a viable plan for the future. Controlled growth is more sustainable than a sudden breakthrough.

Facing your fears can place you into a new relationship with your beliefs. You can't easily love others or expect them to love you if you don't fully love yourself. Thankfully, today's colorful Sagittarius Full Moon brings inspiration to your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, encouraging you to see yourself in a new light. You have the power to eliminate old tapes that are playing outmoded songs. Don't wait for a better time to dance to the music; create a new soundtrack for your life while the planets are working in your favor.

Your intensity can be a lot to handle today and others might tiptoe around you so they don't trigger your temper. Today's Full Moon occurs in your exuberant sign, prompting you to go the extra mile when making your point. You're not interested in being placated; instead, you want your partners and friends to understand your truth. Just remember that everyone doesn't think like you, and your opinions may not be perceived to be as important as you believe they are. You can be the life of the party if you turn off the rhetoric and tone down your volume just a notch.

You have been relatively satisfied with your daily routine recently, but today you are less sure about your selected path in life as the Sagittarius Full Moon illuminates your 12th House of Destiny. Give yourself permission to go through the process of self-doubt, but recognize that this is just a temporary phase. Your task now is to gain an objective perspective on your current habits so that you can begin to eliminate the ones keeping you from achieving your highest potential.

You have a deep understanding of the power of the collective and you can play your knowledge to your advantage now. The Sagittarius Moon shines in your 11th House of Social Networking, enabling you to intuitively know what the group needs to thrive. Using your charm helps you get what you want, but be careful about stirring up emotionally charged material. You might not even be aware of the psychological buttons you are pushing today. Remember, there's nothing wrong with keeping the energy light and easy, especially when things are going your way.

You're conflicted about whether or not you want to be in the spotlight now. The carefree Sagittarius Full Moon floods your 10th House of Status, allowing you to feel comfortable on stage or in a public arena. However, the Moon opposes the Sun in your 4th House of Home and Family, encouraging you to keep a lower profile. Even if you're working behind the scenes and you don't want the world to see your accomplishments, it's still time to own the power that you have rightfully earned.

Giving your emotions enough time to settle down is a great idea in theory, even if it isn't an easy path to follow in practice. You may be moody today and fixing for a fight, especially if circumstances aren't going your way. However, you might be hard-pressed to find a sensible target for your aggression. Instead of losing your cool, take several deep breaths and chill out. Although physical exercise can reduce your stress, expressing your truth now is still essential to your overall well-being.

This seems like a great day for a quick getaway, but you might not have the chance to actually follow through with your plans. Even if you can't get out of town, go ahead and create small pockets of time for spiritual rejuvenation. Being alone for a while enables you to center your energy. Try taking a walk, sitting in meditation or practicing yoga. No matter how busy you are today, make space to listen to your own inner voice rather than succumbing to the stressful demands of others.

Relaxing doesn't usually come easy to you and today it's even harder if you're dealing with an extra layer of stress. Thankfully, you correctly sense that things are changing for the better, but the energy won't turn around overnight. You might feel as if others will be in your way for a while longer. In the meantime, don't vent your annoyance on innocent bystanders or ignore the dynamics that are triggering your current resentment. Avoid acting on extreme emotions; instead, create a middle path and try to stay on it the best you can.

Although you feel the positive energy coming from within your heart today, annoying distractions prevent you from being as happy-go-lucky as you like. Perhaps someone is placing unreasonable demands on you or trying to manipulate your emotions, drawing you into an unexpected argument. Ironically, you could make the best leader of all if you're simply willing to speak up and fight for your beliefs. Make a stand; your heart won't steer you wrong.

Your passions are swimming through some very deep waters today and you might feel uncomfortable if others unwittingly jump into your emotional turmoil. Your confidence is a bit shaky now, but your actions could tell a very different story as you courageously roar your way through the day. Remember that false bravado won't make your certainty return any sooner; it only alienates you from those who want to help. Displaying your vulnerability can be a positive step toward developing greater intimacy.

Nothing is gained by pushing the river, for the water ultimately arrives at the sea in its own perfect time. The same now applies to your life; don't push others to react faster than they can, for it won't help your cause as you move into the next phase of your life. Instead, remain intellectually open and emotionally flexible. People are more willing to cooperate with you when they feel supported by your actions and encouraged by your words.

It's nearly impossible to escape an intense emotional interaction with someone close to you as you confront the gulf between your thoughts and your feelings. Nevertheless, take a chance and open up to another person now, instead of accusing them of upsetting your day. But compromise isn't possible if you only look at things from one perspective. Avoid being too dependent on logic alone because you need both the objective and subjective sides of reality to round out your experience today.

Social interactions might stir up your latent insecurities, adding another layer of drama to an already intense day. You may feel as if you are engaged in a battle that you must win, but actually your fears fuel the flames today. There's nothing to be gained from overreacting with unrestrained passion now as Mars and Pluto -- your two key planets -- duke it out. Seek ways to salve the open wounds rather than irritating them further. Consciously slowing down your own emotional roller coaster enables you to stop the ride before things get out of control.

You may feel a rush of adrenaline today, but the high won't last very long. Even if you believe that you have passed through the eye of the storm, there is still more turmoil heading your way. There are bigger issues developing on the horizon and you might just make the situation worse by bringing an unresolved matter to a premature conclusion. Let the energy take its own course without trying to control the outcome. Forewarned is forearmed.

Your opinions are much stronger now that you're developing a fresh perspective on the events of the past few days. But your current view of reality may be distorted by your unexpressed emotions. You struggle between the thoughts in your head and the desires of your heart, leaving you unsure about which path to take. Lean on your friends for support today, instead of pushing them away. Trusting someone else is the first step to regaining your clarity and rediscovering your route to happiness.

Fire up your intellect for a little bit of excitement now and break out of old routines wherever you go. Enjoy the show as you actively engage everyone around you to gain perspective on your own feelings. However, avoid any negotiations that require emotional detachment today, since it's difficult to separate your logical thoughts from your irrational needs. You are happiest now when your heart is fully engaged.

Your passions are so intense today that you're willing to take a risk in an email exchange or a real world conversation with someone you want to know better. Listen to your heart, even if you hear your fears trying to talk you out of expressing your desires. The first move may be hard to make but it's worth it in the end. Just remember to give others enough latitude so they can be comfortable to share whatever they feel, too.

You may have just enough cool logic to make an effective plan, but your heated emotions might still get in the way of what you want to accomplish today. Even if you think you can override your desires, they just reappear in the form of a projection if you try to suppress them. Pay extra attention to the tone of your voice if you disagree with someone now; an aggressive nature could indicate you have unexpressed feelings that are working their way to the surface. A kinder and gentler approach to sharing your thoughts eases the pressure all the way around.

You have errands to run today and the sooner you get started, the better you will feel about your accomplishments. Unfortunately, some chores take longer than you expect, which could have a cascading effect on your schedule. Nevertheless, it's best to take your tasks one at a time without panicking and trying to do too much at once. Keep in mind this might not be the best time to start a new project. Creating closure is more important now than planning your next move.

Although you wish you could do whatever you want today, you don't have the luxury of following your heart's desire. You might be happier if you didn't have so many obligations to fulfill, but there are plenty of chores demanding your attention. Get serious about practicing self-discipline because everything you do now sets the tone for the rest of the month. Making progress is easy if you can cleverly turn your work into play.

You tend to be hesitant about personal disclosure, yet you're still willing to work closely with others in pursuit of your goals. Meanwhile, your coworkers may be impressed by your emotional warmth today, even if you are feeling more reserved than they know. Although it's wise to keep healthy boundaries, don't go overboard in hiding your vulnerability. Let down your guard; surprisingly, your peers can be more supportive than you expect.

Friends and associates seem emotionally detached today, putting you back in touch with old fears of abandonment. But it's crucial to separate your fantasies that are based upon painful memories from what's actually happening in the present moment. Even if your feelings have been recently agitated by someone you love, don't take it personally now if current relationship dynamics require a bit of a cooling-off period. Having enough room to breathe might be just what the doctor ordered for everyone involved.

Even if you have an ambitious plan to mount a carefully choreographed attack on several projects all at once, your day may take a sharp turn into unknown territory. Taking a methodical approach to getting things done is a smart idea at first, but you might grow bored with doing everything the same old way. Add some excitement to your day by trying something completely new. But don't wait until it's too late; take action now while you still have time to savor the experience.

You may feel the heaviness lifting today as the main source of your tension is temporarily removed. You're eager to take one more shot at affecting significant change at home or in your career, but a serious issue on your agenda isn't going away so fast. Thankfully, you have been granted an extension to a deadline, giving you additional time to sort out your priorities. Don't waste this opportunity or you'll be sorry you did when the stress returns down the road.

Acknowledging the gulf between your new found freedom and unfulfilled commitments may leave you feeling uneasy. You're caught in the middle of a large-scale tug-of-war with conflicting situations vying for your attention. But it's not an all-or-nothing game; you can't just pick one side over the other. Instead, balance the opposing forces as well as you can, trusting that the stress will eventually settle back down once you roll up your sleeves and willingly address the unresolved issues.

If you're trying to get a handle on your life by making plans for the future, it's time to be practical and put one single idea into motion today. Don't worry about reaching your destination immediately since it could be a long distance from where you are currently standing. For now, just take one tiny piece of the puzzle and fit it into your present life. The larger pieces will fall into place later on if you have faith in yourself and trust in the process.

You're receiving mixed messages from the cosmos today as you attempt to build on your recent accomplishments. But yesterday's project may need to be set aside for a while as older unfinished business cycles back through your life. You can't move ahead with your current goals until you tighten up the loose ends that are beginning to fray. Creating sensible priorities now is the first step toward putting your life back in order.

Managing your personal and professional relationships is crucial now, because you can't reach your goals without having a reliable support system in place. The Moon's return to your eclectic sign is a cosmic reminder that you have to do things your own way, but you cannot just ignore the wishes of your friends and co-workers. The healthiest strategy is to creatively balance your non-conformist tendencies with your innate need to be a part of a larger community. The good news is you don't have to sacrifice your individuality to be an integral member of the team.

Although your dreams successfully mix the past, present and future, you regain your sense of reality once you awaken. There's nothing wrong with visualizing what's ahead as long as you continue to participate in the real world. Thankfully, the Moon's current visit to your 12th House of Soul Consciousness helps you recognize the power of now. Yesterday and tomorrow do not exist; they are constructs of the human mind. In the meantime, it all comes down to cultivating faith. Believing is seeing.

Reexamining the most important relationships in your life is a smart idea today. Even if you think that all is harmonious, you may be looking at life through a Pollyanna lens. Instead of falling back on your natural confidence now, stop and check in with those most significant to you. Simply ask others how they feel about your connection and then listen closely to what they tell you. You might be quite surprised by what you hear, but you can make important improvements if you take what you learn to heart.

You might feel less freedom of movement today because you have so many tasks to complete for work. You could even be willing to take a foolish chance just to shake things up. Luckily, you're capable of moderating your emotional expression once you have a specific goal in mind. Giving yourself permission to fantasize about your escape enables you to continue on the same path until your current restlessness dissipates. Remember, there's no need to turn your life upside down in pursuit of a pipe dream; there's joy to be found in your everyday surroundings.

You can't wait to jump in and learn as much as you can about something new today. Fortunately, you could absorb the basics of a difficult discipline or a technical skill quite quickly and are eager to show others how clever you are. But an impressive performance isn't enough, so consider how to take your brilliant ideas and transform them into something that's actually real. Make the best of this moment and manifest your dreams.

You could be feeling disappointed or regretful today and it may be challenging to settle your thoughts. Your worries weigh heavy on in your mind, making it hard to filter out the extraneous noise. But don't be too self-judgmental; it's natural to be fearful when so much is unknown about your future. The best thing you can do now is to pay attention to your heart's desire while you continue experiencing the unfolding mysteries of your life. Forgiveness is the first step to moving on.

People around you may be acting strangely today as the quirky Aquarius Moon travels through your 7th House of Others. But some of the weird behavior that you observe might be more reflective of your own desire to do something out of the box. Claim your power by telling others what you want, instead of projecting your need for independence and unconventionality onto them. Let your true colors shine through.

It may be socially awkward to share your strong feelings for someone today, but you could end up regretting your actions if you let fear prevent you from expressing what's in your heart. You're being pulled in two directions now and no matter what you do, you might wish you took the other course. Thankfully, just knowing that there is no single correct path enables you to be more accepting of the outcome. You don't have to force a final decision yet; trust your instincts to tell you when the time is right.

You would like to believe that all is well in the kingdom and that everyone is doing fine. However, this fantasy may not be the entire story today as negativity from a recent interaction leaks over into current events. Although you're the one who usually plays the role of peacemaker, it currently falls on you to stir up a bit of trouble. Don't worry about what others think. It's your job now to act as the heavyweight and talk about those subjects that everyone else is avoiding. It's better to address the issues now than receiving an unpleasant reality check down the road.

You feel optimistic about your role in the world right now even if your place doesn't seem overly important in the big scheme of things. Thankfully, you can still see the positive impact that you have on others on a day-to-day basis. Remember, success comes in many shapes and sizes. Fame and fortune are on one end of the spectrum while personal meaning and spiritual growth are on the other. Don't judge yourself by the expectations of others; instead, pick your own path and follow your heart.

So many activities sound like fun today that it's difficult to decide how to spend your leisure time. You love the idea of playing with your friends; however, the Moon's dynamic square to stern Saturn could put the brakes on your social plans. Fortunately, you can get ahead of the responsibility curve with more effective long-term planning. Return to pursuing pleasure later; for now, it's time to get serious about your future and commit to achieving your goals.

Money matters may be taking up more of your time these days, but new opportunities for growth and happiness make it challenging to concentrate on the material world alone. Nevertheless, professional responsibilities are calling, and you can't say no today. Being preoccupied with your personal life doesn't make following a career path any easier. Avoid making any major financial decisions until the current distractions pass. Take care of business but leave enough wiggle room to change your mind.

Weird thoughts are exploding in your brain today, challenging you to figure out exactly what to do today. You want to take each and every idea and run with it, but you cannot possibly finish everything you start now. Be careful, for you could initiate action on enough projects to keep you busy for a very long time. However, don't stress if you still have lots of loose ends by the end of the day. You still have time over the next couple of weeks -- during Mercury's retrograde phase -- to wrap up incomplete business.

You may be feeling uncomfortable as you face a predicament in your personal life. Although you sense that something is wrong, you can't quite put your finger on it. At first there seems to be no quick way out of your current circumstances. However, you have superpowers now that allow you to pull one of your magic disappearing acts. Just don't try to do too much all at once. Keep in mind that everything doesn't have to happen overnight; any positive changes you make, however small, helps your cause.

Your thoughts are spinning around like hamsters on a wheel, making it nearly impossible to get any traction. You can't figure out what you're doing wrong when Mercury retrogrades back into jittery Gemini. Instead of trying to make anything special happen, it's best to enjoy the speed at which your ideas seem to run around in your head, even if you don't gain much progress now. Accept the present circumstances as they are until the ride slows down enough to let you jump off. Inspiration is currently more important than productivity.

Even if you seem to be calm, cool and collected to your friends at work, communication issues might surface if anyone jumps to quick conclusions about you today. Beneath your mellow veneer, you could be a complicated bundle of nerves, yet you most likely will keep your insecurities to yourself now. Instead of trying to quiet your thoughts, allow yourself to be entertained by them without having to say anything at all. Let others think what they want; the pressure dissipates once you commit to being true to yourself.

You can't find the off-switch for your brain today and too much mental activity can be exhausting. But setting a moderate pace in the morning keeps the creativity flowing all day long. Nevertheless, you still might notice a midday shift in the content of your thoughts when the Moon slips into surreal Pisces. Don't try to control your stream of consciousness; let it drift without any interference. Your best ideas come to you now when you're lost in fantasies. Your imagination holds the key to your future success.

You might feel very reclusive today while the rest of the world appears to be in frenetic motion. You know something momentous  is about to happen and can't help but wonder if you should spend more time in preparation. Nevertheless, the super sensitive Pisces Moon reminds you that it is wiser to wait a few days before pushing your agenda ahead, even if you're restless now. Don't worry about being judged by others; trust your intuition and follow your heart.

You're anxious to begin something new today, but your impatience may have you missing an important piece of the puzzle. Fortunately, you can navigate the many variations between smooth success and risky business if you aren't in such a hurry. An exciting ride to an unknown place is in front of you, so don't ruin it by failing to take the time to consider the consequences of your actions. A little advanced planning doesn't have to spoil the fun.

Talking about your feelings before you conduct your careful analysis of the facts may be more problematic than constructive today. You could forget to consider how someone might react to your bold ideas, only to be surprised with the speed at which the emotional landscape changes. It's awkward at first to push through the nervous tension, but once you have a game plan in place, speaking from the heart can move things in the right direction a lot faster than you expect.

Attempting to keep to yourself to get your chores done probably won't work today. You're likely to be drawn out of your escape mode before you can fully disappear. It's quite a challenge to focus on your responsibilities when there are so many lovely distractions occurring throughout the day. Engaging in fascinating conversations with creative people is much more fun than the drudgery of your daily routine. Paradoxically, you might accomplish more when you're still plugged into the world around you. Find a way to balance business with pleasure for the best results.

You may be experiencing emotional dissonance today as you attempt to reconcile your desire to be compassionate with your annoyance of others at work. Unfortunately, your associates might not be holding up their end of the deal, yet you still want to encourage everyone to contribute as best as he or she can. You are perceptive enough to see the most efficient way to perform a task and you have no problem assuming authority to get the job done. Keep in mind that you cannot control others; ironically, you can find peace by changing your expectations, instead.

You can cleverly invent many ways to avoid your obligations today as if you still have a lingering case of spring fever. However, pursuing pleasure is difficult because your mundane responsibilities won't just disappear on their own. Nevertheless, you still might be able to talk your way into a sweet situation by capitalizing on your current charm. Just don't push your luck too far or you could run into bigger problems later when trying to complete your unfinished work.

Although you might find yourself recycling yesterday's ideas, the best ones will be even better today. Fortunately, there's a cooperative connection between your head and your heart now, so it's easier to gain clarity on your dreams. But don't worry too much about being practical; there will be plenty of opportunity for that later on. Nevertheless, it's wise to write down your thoughts as they occur without pushing your agenda on anyone else. Develop your plans but wait until the logistics make sense before you put them into action.

It's great to see everything click into place today -- especially when you are packing so much life into a short amount of time. But don't add too many new activities to your schedule or you'll suddenly be overbooked before you know it. Make a conscious choice to lessen your load by moving an appointment or two to another day when you may have more flexibility. Ultimately, allowing room for the unexpected gives you space to breathe when you need it the most.

Integrating all the changes that seem to occur daily is quite a monumental task. If you have been secretly hoping for the pace to slow down, you may temporarily get your wish. Although you won't necessarily have total control over the specific timeline, everything will flow smoother now if you are less demanding of yourself and others. Simply by acknowledging that everyone deserves a break helps to lighten the atmosphere for all involved. Being kind never hurt anyone.

You're extremely confident about your life now, but someone might say something that tugs on your conscience. Although you may not have any reasons to feel guilty, you dislike being misunderstood. Naturally, you want to clarify your position before moving on, so don't put off important communication for a later date. Attend to any unresolved issues as quickly as you can, so you are ready for the action-packed times ahead.

Positive feedback from your friends and colleagues strengthens your feelings and lifts your spirits today. Luckily, your key planet Venus receives an emotional boost from generous Jupiter, encouraging you to feel even better about yourself and those you love. However, this is no time to stand on ceremony or harbor false pride; willingly accept recognition and support from others when it's offered, even if you didn't ask for it. Don't resist the inevitable; it's your turn to shine.

It seems as if you're on an energetic roll now. Or, maybe, you think you should be preparing for something really big that's just around the next corner. You can sense change is in the air, even if worries or fears linger at the edge of your awareness. Today's thoughts shape tomorrow's destiny, so visualize the most amazing possibilities in front of you. Tying up loose ends from your past helps to prevent anything from standing in the way of your future.

Even if your life seems to be unfolding as planned, you still aren't sure that you should trust any good news you hear today. Unfortunately, you might also learn something that raises your concern. You may overcompensate by gathering all the information you can find to justify your positive perspective. However, you really don't need any more data; just make a choice and then take a few healthy steps in the direction you want to go. Follow your heart and don't look back.

Your friends and associates ride to your rescue just in the nick of time, even if you committed to more than you can possibly deliver now. Fortunately, they bring you more than good cheer and emotional support; your allies are also willing to volunteer a fair amount of hard work. Don't be greedy about personal profit or recognition since it's karmically crucial to share the rewards with those who contribute to your success. In the meantime, showing your appreciation makes everyone feel like part of the team.

Working extra hard to put everything in order might be a lost cause today, especially if other people seem to be preoccupied with their own dreams. It sounds like a practical idea to prioritize your goals and then make a list of the steps needed to reach them. Unfortunately, concrete plans aren't all that useful because so much seems to be occurring at once, leaving little time for detailed analysis. Let go and trust your intuition; acting on your feelings will bring you as much success now as any other strategy.

You can see the positive in almost every situation today, even on the job, as aesthetically pleasing Venus harmonizes with propitious Jupiter in your 10th House of Career. You might be considered for a promotion or, at least, acknowledged for your hard work. Your optimism is on the rise now, along with your income potential. Just don't be presumptuous and expect too much too soon. Nevertheless, set sail with your ambitions; rest assured that the winds of positive change are blowing in your direction.

You could miss an unexpected opportunity to share an amazing experience with a close friend today if you overreact to what is said. There is little doubt that this is a strange day, but your morning apprehension need not detract from the beauty that you perceive around you. Instead of seeking depth and intensity now, keep the mood light and easy so you can relax and enjoy yourself. Ultimately, the potential for pleasure abounds if you release your fears and open your heart.

Instead of escaping from your daily routine, you prefer exploring alternatives to make your job more fun -- and that could include other people. Although everyone around you seems to be submerged in their own worlds, you wish they had more time for you. Thankfully, beneficent Jupiter is supporting resourceful Venus in your 6th House of Work, enabling you to enjoy meeting your obligations rather than avoiding them. Don't worry about anyone else; honoring your commitments ultimately brings its own kind of quiet satisfaction.

You may be up for a raise or, perhaps, you simply receive an appreciative thanks from someone at work as lucky Jupiter harmonizes with lovely Venus in your 2nd House of Money today. Naturally, a boost in your salary is wonderful, but a heartfelt acknowledgment from your boss is validating, too. However, you need to come to terms with the simple fact that your contribution is of considerable value. Don't be shy about accepting praise now; displaying too much doubt can cause you to miss a chance to bask in the limelight and take pride in your work.

You believe your aim is true today and you're right on target; nevertheless, your unflagging optimism may seem overwhelming to everyone else. Although you are the epitome of the power of positive thinking now, someone might try to rain on your parade. There's no need to give away your authority. Being strong and sensitive in your approach enables you to make room for others who are struggling to hold their position, too.

You could be lost in a hazy dream world, so it's wise to pinch yourself a few times during the day just to remind yourself that you're actually awake. Although you probably have good cause for your rosy outlook, it's important to maintain a clear sense of reality now or you might set yourself up for disappointment later on. Avoiding extremes is a challenging task today unless you have someone in your life that you trust enough to use as a sounding board. Asking for advice is one thing, but following it is another.

Worrying about all the possible negative paths a relationship could take is a waste of your energy today, yet you might not be able to simply turn off the noise in your head. This may feel like a very familiar theme and chances are that you are here again only because you've been here before. Realizing how your present condition is vastly different from the past one can help you move beyond your fears and release you from the vicious cycle. Awareness of your personal history frees you from having to repeat it.

If someone approaches you with a big idea today, don't close down before you give it a fair shake. Obviously you're not interested in chasing windmills, but you could inadvertently say no to an innovative plan just because you were recently burned by another grandiose scheme. Remain open-minded so you can weigh what you hear on its own merits and then act accordingly. Don't look a gift horse in the mouth.

Keeping your thoughts quiet might feel safer than sharing them, but the isolation you manifest today may be completely unnecessary. The real problem isn't what you are thinking, but how you communicate your ideas now. Don't attempt to make anyone else responsible for your feelings or expect someone to solve your dilemma. Others won't be able to fix your problem, but they can listen and be supportive of your process. There's no need to prove anything by carrying your burden alone.

You might attempt to take total responsibility for a misunderstanding, but somehow your good intentions still could get muddled. Others may misinterpret your words today, even if you think you're being very clear when explaining your motives. The more you say, the more entangled it all becomes now. Quit trying so hard to justify your actions; a simple apology should suffice as long as your heart is in the right place.

You may as well put in extra effort this morning, for it could be your best chance today to get some real work done. Your new plan of attack might be an excellent one, but it's still highly likely that you'll run into more obstacles later in the day. Don't be self-critical if you fall short of your own expectations now. Get plenty of rest tonight; tomorrow is a brand new day.

You are capable of secretly holding onto an old wound for too long, even after you've forgiven everyone involved and allegedly moved on. But even if you can detach from your personal pain, it's not necessarily the smartest strategy for happy living. You have an opportunity to create change now; yet it might require that you look back one more time. Once you have relearned your lesson and passed the test, you will finally get to take things to the next level. You can't embrace your future until you have fully dealt with your past.

You could lose your patience very quickly today if you believe that someone is trying to pull the wool over your eyes. But even if you don't know exactly what kind of tricks others are up to now, you can clearly tell the difference between fact and fiction. Trust your inner voice more than anyone else's advice; your intuition won't lead you wrong as long as you maintain a modicum of objectivity along the way.

This is a transition day for you, so finish up your current projects so you can be ready for an interesting new opportunity. The sparks of excitement may already be flying in your mind, but you can't make your enthusiasm last longer by exerting control over all the variables in your environment. Your best move now is to temporarily let go of your previous agenda and simply be as spontaneous as possible. The real magic comes from living in the present moment rather than engineering your future.

You wish you could take it easy today so you have the chance to integrate recent breakthroughs into your creative process. However, you probably won't get the peace and quiet you seek, even if your morning starts out slowly. You may be your own worst enemy now as you wrestle with emotional ghosts from your past. Fortunately, you can end an unrewarding pattern by talking about your concerns with an understanding friend. Working through your feelings is a more productive use of your time in the long run.

It seems as if the clock is ticking and there's not much time left to untangle a couple of loose ends; unfortunately, you might have to leave some things unfinished before moving on to what's next. Don't fret about incomplete projects since you may have time over the next few weeks to revisit what's been left undone. For now, just do the best job you can without being too much of a critic when judging your own accomplishments. Practicing compassion includes being gentle with yourself.

Your day has a split personality -- coming in like a lamb and going out like a lion. A roar of energy occurs midday when the Moon marches into feisty Aries, reminding you of your warrior nature. You may decide early on to adopt a spiritual approach and not force your ideas onto others. However your laid-back demeanor only lasts so long; when you decide it's time to make your move, at least do so with kindness and awareness. An act of courage doesn't have to be delivered at the tip of a sword.

Your upbeat manner just might be your clever tactic of covering a growing insecurity. However, others probably won't even notice that you're faking your way through the day. Examine your motives behind your false optimism later. Believe it or not, it's best to go ahead and share your feelings now, resigning yourself to dealing with the consequences as they unfold. Playing your cards too close to your chest may be worse than not playing them at all.

You're itching to take a risk today, prompting you to turn things upside down to make your point, if necessary. Prepare for the pace to pick up, for your life might feel as if it's in a heightened state of emergency. Be ready to interact with anyone who crosses your path, for it is your current sense of urgency that assures your success. Just remember that everything is cyclical; the energy will settle down next week. Make the most of this intensity while it lasts.

Your day begins calmly enough, but by evening you may have stepped all the way out to the edge of your comfort zone. Thankfully, you could be offered an opportunity to find your way back home quite soon, but for now you must remain as flexible as possible. The roller coaster is twisting and turning on its tracks and your most important job is to hang on until it stops. Once you get over your fear of the uncertainty, you might enjoy yourself more than you can imagine. Embrace the surprises along the way.

Expecting the unexpected is as paradoxical as your entire day. Wildly eccentric Uranus electrifies your key planet Mercury, destabilizing your assumptions. It may even feel as if the ground upon which you stand won't support you. You can regain your stability by swiftly adapting to those things you cannot change or preemptively changing those things you can. Either way, firm up your foundation before adding more complexity to your life.

You might be overwhelmed by the busyness of your life as you unsuccessfully attempt to find comfort in all the noise. Although you aren't going to solve your problems overnight, you still could benefit by getting them out into the open. Buried issues can shatter through the resistance today. If you are seeking change, don't wait for a better moment; this could be it.

You may wake up on the wrong side of the bed today because you have so many things to do. Oddly enough, the steadiest of routines could be the first ones to unravel. Longstanding emotional tension brewing beneath the surface is now the source of crisis. Most likely there won't be one single major conflict, but rather a series of problems requiring your undivided attention. For best results, maintain your focus and take care of each issue as it arises. Keeping your sense of humor close at hand just might save the day.

Your hectic schedule is just one indicator of your vibrant mental state these days, yet the lively pace might not settle down as soon as you wish. You might secretly worry that your life is spinning out of control -- and your best strategy is to let the chips fall as they may. Attempts to regain control can just lead to more frustration now. Seek creative ways to express your unique individuality instead of trying to conform to the norm. Be true to yourself and the reach for the stars.

The good times aren't necessarily over but there is too much work to be done and you can't ignore your responsibilities any longer. However, even with the best of intentions, you won't be able to fulfill all your commitments today. The loose ends are like the mythical many-headed Hydra who would grow two more heads each time one was cut off. Complexity could be unraveling as fast as you are simplifying it. Try not to get too stressed out by all the drama. You can always put everything back in its place tomorrow.

Fortunately, you can experience the pleasurable benefits of some of your favorite things today, including exploring the unknowable mysteries of life. But resolving your current dilemma isn't as critical as you think. Instead of exhausting yourself attempting to emerge as the hero or heroine, admit you don't have an exclusive on the truth. There's no need to uncover the ultimate answer now. Instead, be receptive to little flashes of awareness along the way to discovering the truth.

The world seems kinder to you today as your spirit soars with expectations outside of the ordinary. Still, your positive thoughts may be challenged by a flow of surprising twists and turns, which can be difficult if you are too rigid in your thinking. However, the good can become even better if you remain open to the flurry of changes. Remember, it's just not as important to be right as it is to be adaptable to new perspectives. Flexibility is your friend.

You may need to jumpstart your plans today, but then the momentum builds quickly and you can end up spending much of the day engaging in creative activities. If you have been working overtime chasing your dreams, you deserve the chance to pursue whatever makes you happy. Go for it; break out of your current routine and surrender to the joy of the moment.

As the day unfolds, you might become less and less comfortable about something that you realize cannot be easily changed. You may feel strongly about what you see as a potential conflict between your values and what you now want to do. Go ahead and explore new avenues of self-expression today, even if they don't fit into your pre-established notions of who you are. Healthy experimentation leads to personal growth.

You're experiencing a whirlwind of activity in your life but your imagination is soaring, enabling you to have an amazing time now without necessarily finding pleasure or peace. Nevertheless, you still must play your part in the current drama. Make a conscious effort to slow down later in the day. Feed your senses with inspirational music that soothes the soul and good food that fuels the body. Spend time in nature or soak in a hot tub; whatever you do, be nice to yourself.

You may feel as if reality is taking control of the wheel and gently applying pressure to the brakes now that the Sun has shifted into cautious Cancer. Even if you have ambitious goals in sight, your head is saying one thing but your gut instincts are telling you something else. There's no need to share your internal conflict yet; keep your thoughts to yourself for a while longer. Use these next few weeks to practice listening to your heart.

Normally, you have more than your fair share of common sense, but for the moment you're cruising under the influence of subconscious drives. Fantasies may be growing out of control and you could even convince yourself that they are real today. Your current progress might have you feeling overly optimistic, but the sooner you face the facts, the better. You can reach your destination, but it won't be as easy as it now seems. Fortunately, your determination increases over the weekend, empowering you to overcome nearly any obstacle in your path.

Your energy is operating on full tilt today, just as you like it. The biggest problem is that you may be heading toward a wall, even if you don't see it yet. Unless you begin to slow down in order to get a solid grip on the road, you might be rudely awakened as you deal with the situation ahead. Luckily, demonstrating just a bit of restraint now goes a long way toward avoiding immovable objects and accomplishing your dreams. Keep your eyes wide open and be ready to stop at a moment's notice.

Your current dilemma is one you have encountered many times before. When conflict builds, do you quietly hold your feelings within and go with the external flow? Or, should you bring your needs up to the surface where you face the possibility of rejection? Although balance is key, it's a sensible strategy to ride your emotions through the intensity of a midday crescendo before making any major decisions about what to share. Keep in mind that whatever you choose to disclose today will have a powerful impact on your relationships.

Impulsively expressing your feelings today can land you into a bit of emotional hot water. If you tell it like it is, you could easily shock someone you love, triggering an immediate backlash. But if you hold steady to your convictions, the results can ultimately be quite satisfying for everyone involved. Nevertheless, silence is not your friend now; take a risk and walk on the wild side.

When the emotional waters get too deep, you Virgos like to fall back onto your strong analytical prowess to find your way back to solid ground. However, you may have to trust the feelings in the pit of your stomach because you don't have time to run everything through your logic tubes today. You really don't need words now; you only need your intuition and a bit of common sense.

Wearing your heart on your sleeve only takes you so far today; you must also be ready for an unexpected conflict to arise. Although you are often the Champion of Nice, there's no reason to waste your energy trying to be diplomatic now. Even if you thrive on making others feel at ease, it's not currently about being gracious. Push past the infatuation stage where you give your power away to others, and then push even further beyond your dreams. It's time to get real and make your move.

Circumstances might feel uncertain on the romantic front now, and it's up to you to create balance between your craving for immediate pleasure and your need for long-term stability. Thankfully, you can have it both ways, but you must proceed with caution. Go ahead and pursue your heart's desire, but remember that your current actions will have significant consequences. Consider the extremes prior to taking a more moderate course.

Unexpected events create more intensity and drama in relationships than you need. But don't let the negative possibilities prevent you from fully engaging with someone you love; the more you try to avoid the issues today, the crazier things become. Beneath the veneer of normalcy, there are profound realizations to be had. Embracing the uncertainty now makes it much easier for you down the road.

It's crucial to gain a better handle on what you need from other people now -- and to clarify exactly what you may or may not be able to get at this moment. One thing is for sure: your relationships are undergoing a powerful metamorphosis. Don't waste your time struggling to maintain the status quo. Instead of standing in your own way of progress, be willing to explore the possibilities of your new reality.

Normally, you have enough emotional detachment to focus on the present moment and visualize future opportunities. However, now you're required to reassess your relationship with the past, especially if it uncharacteristically holds on to you with a grip of steel. Don't be afraid to look back into your history in order to process these memories one last time. Even if this sentimental journey takes a few days or longer, it is worth it in the end. Clear the air so you can once again be swept up into the exciting whirlwind of what's to come.

The time to hesitate is through; you must take a stand for what you want. But don't be careless in your actions since your passionate defense could go too far today, provoking a surprising battle for control. Don't play the role of a victim because it won't help you get any closer to happiness. Instead, let others know what you need without compromising your integrity. Summon the courage to speak from your heart.

Even if everyone is cheering you on today, you still must rely on your own determination if you want to finish what you start. Your day might begin rather slowly and it could feel like you need to move faster to catch the wave. Perhaps you should just let this one wash over you and not do anything about it at all. Instead of trying to be productive, give yourself a personal holiday and take the day off.

You may be self-conscious about your appearance today. Wearing something that boosts your self-esteem can certainly help you get the day off to a proper start, but remember that it's not just about looking good. Your beauty extends beneath the skin, and connecting with your inner self enables you to fully shine your light. Expressing your heart offers you the best chance to get what you need.

Finish up as much old business as possible today since you may want to start something completely new tomorrow. Obtaining closure on a project or a relationship issue might require that you stick to the work at hand, even if your natural tendency is to move on. Tenacity pays off now if your intentions are honorable. Showing up with integrity and demonstrating your persistence inspires others to join in your cause.

Others stand by you now and even come to your aid if you need it. It's not that you are necessarily in trouble; it's just that you feel more secure knowing that you can rely on your allies to ride to your rescue. If possible, plan a social activity with your family or a small group of friends. Something as simple as going out to brunch with the ones you love can be just the right thing to put a perfect spin on your day.

The spotlight is shining on you whether or not you want to be the main attraction today. Your ability to see things through to completion can now hold you in good stead with your peers, for they are relying on your sense of duty and generous nature. You have what it takes as long as you don't lose sight of your purpose. Don't try to garner extra attention by making your role in the events of the day bigger than it is; just give your best performance and take a bow.

Others may fantasize of far-off places as their means of personal escape, but you envision your adventure with a more realistic attitude. This pragmatic perspective actually might allow you to take the trip of your dreams. Since the Moon is in your 9th House of Big Ideas, you can also travel in your mind. Grab every opportunity available to learn something new about a culture or place you wish to visit. Imagination is the breeding ground for reality.

A matter of intrigue might be so alluring that you become compulsive about figuring it all out. You have a practical sense about you today, but you still can't quit until you find the missing piece of the puzzle. You are determined to solve the mystery now, but it's wise to check in with reality to make sure you aren't sliding off into the world of illusion and fantasy. Dreams feed your soul as long as you know the difference between when you're dreaming and when you're awake.

Although you sometimes love the complexity of life, now you are searching for simpler pleasures. There's nothing complicated about spending time with the ones you love or appreciating a satisfying meal, a hot bath and restful sleep. However, if fulfilling your desires were really that straightforward for you, life would be too easy. Nevertheless, the little things can be just enough to make you smile today.

Pay attention to health issues, even if you are currently feeling fine. You can make simple improvements to your lifestyle that have subtle, yet long-lasting consequences. If you are thinking about a new exercise program, this is the right time to start. If you want to make changes to your diet, now is better than later. These don't need to be major modifications, for even small positive adjustments have a significant impact on your life over the long run.

If your thoughts are drifting toward love, it's probably about practical considerations versus emotional issues. Even if you're romantically inclined, your mind is preoccupied with the real world now. Think about how you can be the best partner or lover possible. Do everything that's within your power to make the most of your current connection with someone special. Taking the time to express your true feelings is the first step to cultivating intimacy.

Your imagination is soaring high above the real world today. Memories of your childhood flood into awareness, bringing with them a sense of nostalgia. You often have a fairly matter-of-fact outlook on your past, but now things are a bit softer and more diffused. Enjoy the flights of fancy, but don't forget to return to your current responsibilities when needed.

You might find yourself with another hectic day on your hands. Your calendar doesn't seem to give you any breathing room and you could feel like a stage magician who is juggling one too many balls. A radical solution is to just postpone one or two appointments today, so everything doesn't come crashing down around you. Paring back extraneous activities early in the day restores the calm and eases your busy mind.

Even if you can envision your ideal life, the road from here to there isn't very straightforward now. You're drawn toward multiple possibilities with a variety of wonderful paths branching out from this present moment, and you are ready to eagerly embark on any one of them. Nevertheless, something real or imagined is in your way and you must overcome your current fears about the future before you are given the green light. Slowing down and processing your feelings today helps to lessen the resistance and increases your chances for success.

You may be sad to say goodbye to your key planet Venus as she moves from your sensual sign into airy Gemini. But all is not lost, for the love planet moves into your 2nd House of Self-Worth, boosting your popularity and improving your financial situation. Use your charm to attract people who are naturally fun to be around, rather than those who bring unnecessary drama. Just don't get carried away with your playful manner now because stability in relationships brings you the most satisfaction.

You need to exercise a bit of self-restraint because someone who enters your life might appear too good to be true. Magnetic Venus dances into your flirtatious sign today, offering you the possibility of love and prosperity. Just remember, she doesn't arrive with a guarantee; you must earn whatever you receive. A little common sense goes a long way now to keep you grounded; without it you might quickly discover that you have been fooled by your own illusions. All that glitters is not gold.

It might feel as if a heavy burden is lifting from your shoulders today. The sky is growing bluer and the birds are singing happy songs. However, your sunny attitude may have very little or even nothing to do with external circumstances. A reconnection with your higher self could be all you need to alter the appearance of your outside world. The power of a spiritual orientation can chase away the dark clouds now and add more joy to your world.

Although you might not be fully satisfied with your current lot in life, you could be so distracted from the present moment that you don't even notice something's missing. You can move from one fantastic event or fascinating person to the next, without stopping to think about the important things that truly matter. A persuasive person could talk you into nearly anything unless you suddenly come to your senses. Remember, you can't avoid a critical lesson, so wake up and face reality now before it's too late. After all, you're the master of your own fate.

You could be pleased with how a relationship is developing, but you're still reluctant to share your feelings. You don't want to reveal too much because you may be fearful of how others will respond. However, you might be surprised with your sense of relief when you don't have to control all the variables in your environment. Love ebbs and flows with the tides of emotions now, so just let the currents carry you back and forth until they eventually settle down. Surrendering to the universe allows magic to happen.

Although you could be tied in knots with unexpressed anger, you may appear quiet and accommodating if you're uncomfortable with a current situation. However, if you feel emotionally safe, you could just as easily ramble on endlessly, sharing whatever thoughts cross your mind. Either way, you might still be withholding something significant. The good news is it's not up to anyone else to decide what you say and when you say it. Trust your instincts and you will know when it's time to tell all.

At first, everything seems to be in order today; your emotions are giving you signals to go ahead. But the sudden appearance of an obstacle could elicit a fearful reaction that reminds you of a similar experience from your past. However, there's no reason to believe that a repeat occurrence is inevitable. Remain focused on current events and don't let a hurtful memory stand between you and the potential joy of the present moment.

You may take on too many tasks today, only to feel frustrated that you didn't finish everything you started. Although your self-judgment can be overly harsh now, others probably only notice what you did, rather than what was left undone. Don't waste energy over analyzing your behavior; instead, enjoy the variety of activities that fill your day. Sometimes the most significant experiences are the transient ones that have no apparent tangible value at all.

You could be somewhat stressed today because you have so many things to accomplish that you don't even know where to begin. The truth is that it really doesn't matter which item you cross off your list first; you simply need to jump in and do something. In addition, it's less important to gain closure around any one issue than it is to stir up lots of excitement, even if this is normally out of character for you. You can always refocus your energy in a few days after the dust has settled back down.

Taking your work seriously is nearly impossible when there are so many lovely distractions around you. Intriguing possibilities for fun and games pop up everywhere you look today, even if you don't act on your desires. Nevertheless, those pesky responsibilities aren't going away on their own. The sooner you attend to them the more time you have left over for pleasurable pursuits. Luckily, following your bliss can be its own reward.

You might be tempted to seek approval from others who are equally as passionate about your interests, but today the recognition may come from your closest friends and family. You appreciate the support being offered, but there is still an edginess to your emotions that you don't understand. It's challenging to trust the signs enough to slow down and show your vulnerability. Nevertheless, the most direct way to improve the quality of your life now is to face your fear of rejection rather than running from it. Sharing your feelings is a great place to start.

It's not always easy to take someone else's feelings into consideration when making a decision because expressing your independent nature is part of being a pioneering Aries. Your patience may be at an all-time low while electric Uranus opposes warrior Mars in your 7th House of Companions, complicating relationship dynamics even more. Thankfully, you have the option of tempering your approach when telling others what you need. Speak from your heart, listen with compassion, and don't compromise your truth.

A social injustice at work might make you hot under the collar today, but losing your temper won't fix anything. Instead of stirring up more trouble, explain what's bothering you without placing blame on anyone else. Seek answers based upon establishing common ground rather than fanning the flames of discord. Even if helping to mediate the conflict takes extra effort on your part, it will be worth it in the long run. Cultivating harmony earns you more respect than you know.

You are at the top of your verbal game now that the evocative Moon is back in your witty sign. Unfortunately, your humor could pack more of a punch than you realize, especially if you are withholding your feelings because you don't want to upset your friends or coworkers. Nevertheless, you can still shine your light brightly as long as you remember not to take your sarcasm too far. Ultimately, being kind trumps being funny almost every time.

Unexpected changes at work could be destabilizing if you're trying to cling to the safety of the past. However, the status quo isn't as secure as you might think and the more you worry now, the tougher the transition will be. Thankfully, you have the power to influence your future in a positive manner by playing through the various scenarios in your head. Instead of focusing on what you need to let go, think about what you're making room for in the days ahead. Be ready to embrace the opportunity when it knocks on your door.

You might think that anything is possible today, inspiring you to be overly optimistic about your plans. Luckily, you're partly right; there's a great deal of potential in your immediate future and it's up to you to figure out how to best manifest your dreams. However, stretching reality too far can create a backlash and leave you wondering how you lost your way. Set your goals high and reach for the stars; just don't lose your footing while your imagination is soaring above the clouds.

Keeping your mind on work is tricky today because there are so many other fascinating ways to fill your time. In fact, you might provoke an argument with an associate just because your current priorities are so different. Even if you're tempted to go to the mat to make your case, it's not wise to force an issue now. Instead of copping an attitude and trying to justify your actions, take the high road and happily follow through on your commitments without creating any drama. Meeting your obligations swiftly frees you to explore your interests later on.

You're not so likely to compromise in order to keep the peace today, creating additional stress in your personal life. Communication is complicated by buried tensions that may be starting to surface now. However, it's not a good idea to suppress your feelings, even if they don't meet other people's expectations. You have an opportunity to revitalize a relationship by addressing a difficult topic in a rational manner instead of waiting until the energy grows out of control. There's no need to be afraid of change, especially if it improves the quality of your life.

You're searching for new and exciting ways to express your creative nature. Fortunately, you don't have to throw the baby out with the bathwater; you can make small yet meaningful changes that revitalize both your work and play. However, suppressed needs will likely work their way out into the open today with or without your permission. You might be surprised if someone loses his or her temper just when you thought you had things under control. Instead of waiting for the lightning to hit, make a preemptive strike and demonstrate your brilliance for all to see.

Others look to you to be the life of the party and, fortunately, you're more than willing to fulfill their expectations. You're not eager to slow down and relax today, but overdoing the play can be exhausting. Enjoyment is not an all-or-nothing proposition; you can adjust the magnitude of your experience now. Let the good times roll, but keep your hand on the volume control. Setting a sustainable pace allows your fun to last a lot longer.

Changes on the home front require your undivided attention today, especially if you recently swept an unresolved problem under the rug. You wish you could sidestep a direct confrontation because you're afraid of what you might say once you open the door to your feelings. However, if you have been quietly putting up with an unsatisfactory situation, this is your chance to finally clear the air. Even if you unearth buried feelings that exacerbate your discomfort, everyone will likely feel better once all the issues are out on the table.

Although you're innately attracted to the weird and wonderful side of life, things may be getting a bit strange these days even for you. You might feel anxious if those daily routines that you rely on are less than stable now. However, you are being given a chance to improve your day-to-day habits. Instead of trying to maintain the status quo, practice being more flexible than ever. If you're willing to roll with the waves for the sake of change, they can take you on a most amazing ride of transformation.

A sudden change in finances might create extra stress today, whether it's from an unexpected expense or a shift in income. Although you could experience a windfall, it's more likely that the material world is challenging you in some way. Perhaps you should let go of a few possessions you no longer need. Or, maybe, it's time to restructure an old debt. In any event, the tension is a symptom of your evolving relationship with money. Rather than worrying about what may be lost, maximize the positive long-term benefits by remaining open to the current opportunities.

Provoking an argument to resolve a difference of opinions isn't a wise move unless you have exhausted all other options. Instead of picking a fight, turn the tables and demonstrate how helpful you can be today. Cooperation is your smartest strategy now; it's certainly better than wasting energy in unnecessary conflict. Trying to prove that you're right won't solve anything; take the high road and use a disagreement as an opportunity to evolve.

You might have to deal with a difficult person today and, luckily, you have the necessary skills to safely protect your boundaries. However, winning a border skirmish isn't enough; you must also behave in a kind and supportive manner. Oddly enough, your apparent nemesis may not be a real adversary now unless you push him or her into the role by escalating a minor conflict into a major crisis. Putting things in a healthy perspective before you defend your position goes a long way toward keeping the peace.

You aren't interested in adhering to social conventions now, but you also don't want to be left out of the action. You may claim you're willing to have a heartfelt discussion with a close friend or loved one, yet you prefer to keep the conversation on the light side as long as possible. Although exploring your feelings might reveal your innate discomfort with emotional vulnerability, it could also bring a deeper sense of intimacy. Take a risk and let others know what you want; it's healthier to face your fears now rather than ignoring them.

A recent misunderstanding over who is in charge raises intense issues today that might provoke extreme feelings. Fortunately, you can tap into an inner clarity that allows you to express your frustration without shifting blame to anyone else. Seeking your personal truth could lead you back to your own emotional center, but even the most amazing revelations won't have much significance unless you find the courage to be vulnerable now. Don't worry too much about the wrong things; sharing your heart with a trusted friend is safer than you think.

You are quick to overreact today if a lingering disagreement about plans for an upcoming trip remains unresolved. Focusing on the dynamics now rather than the details can turn the whole situation into a bigger deal than you intend. But suppressing your feelings isn't a useful tactic, either. If you hold back your emotions because you think it's safer to stay quiet, the unexpressed energy acts like a lightning rod. Wait for an appropriate moment to calmly share your concerns and hope that others will do the same.

Telling someone how you feel today is more complicated than you expect, especially if you're worried that your disclosure might be a catalyst that triggers unpleasant memories. Nevertheless, you may not be able to relax until you open up and express what's in your heart. Be careful; revealing your inner process might elicit a backlash of powerful emotions, but the lessons you learn now could make your journey entirely worthwhile.

You know that delivering on your promises is critical today or others will judge you rather harshly. You may be obsessed with following through on your commitments, and might work extra hard to fulfill your responsibilities now. Don't let anyone hook you with an emotional drama that isn't your direct concern. If you diligently stay on track, you could accomplish all you set out to do, and with a little luck still have time to relax.

You may lose control of your schedule today as others place additional requirements on your time. Perhaps you are seeking more independence in your job, but your everyday routine has grown so demanding that you feel stuck with no way out. Trying to force a solution won't bring satisfaction now and might just annoy everyone around you. Stay aware of your feelings, but wait until the intensity settles before you initiate action you can't undo. Count to ten to save yourself from regret.

You think you know exactly how to regain control over a complex situation, but you may be feeling uncharacteristically insecure. Don't overcompensate by pretending that everything is sunshine and roses. Although you wish you were having more fun, these aren't necessarily carefree days. Nevertheless, your inner child is itching to come out and play, and might even throw a temper tantrum to have its way. Thankfully, with a bit of conscious effort you should be able to find less disruptive ways to express your creativity.

It's nearly impossible to prevent you from accomplishing your objectives no matter how tired you are feeling today. There's an inexhaustible supply of energy on reserve now waiting to be tapped, so keep plodding through your tasks, one at a time. Additionally, you are blessed with an extra dose of unwavering determination. Even if you must fight to defend your beliefs, set your goals high and then do whatever it takes to reach them.

You must be brutally honest with yourself today or you might face a dark night of the soul. But instead of reacting with fear or denial, shine the light of your awareness on your buried concerns. Keep in mind that current events may challenge the usefulness of an agenda that has already served its purpose. Rather than rushing to make a new list of things to do, spend your time now seeking the source of your emotional angst and reprioritizing your goals.

Your defensive shields are up and you may be cruising for an argument today since you are already pushing against the will of others. Unfortunately, you could feel excluded from the group process, even if you are normally an integral part of the team. Although your inclination is to withdraw if you don't think your services are wanted, you can't escape your current responsibilities. If your frustration morphs into anger, you might ruffle some feathers. Nevertheless, it's still wise to give peace a chance.

You may be worried that you're running out of time and you still have an important decision to make. Nevertheless, it's probably smarter to wait a day or two before taking any drastic measures. Don't overreact; it's not the best time to rush ahead just to show everyone how well you can handle a crisis at work. Nothing will be gained by trying to inspire others with your courage. Instead of mustering up false bravado, honor your emotions without trying to prove anything.

No matter how much work you have on your plate, others might not realize how busy you actually are. Fortunately, you're not seeking recognition now, so working quietly behind the scenes suits your style. However, it's not that you're purposefully trying to avoid the spotlight either; you just don't want to waste energy playing to a crowd. In any event, there's nothing wrong with graciously accepting acknowledgement for your valuable contribution. A little appreciation will do your heart good.

Your moods fluctuate wildly today; each time you make up your mind something happens and your feelings shift again. However, you could be worried with how others interpret your instability now; nevertheless, you don't have the ability to change their perceptions. Wait to share your opinions until your emotions settle down and your clarity returns. Rather than attempting to fix something that is out of your control, concentrate on remaining true to your core values, instead.

Hiding your feelings today may not be as easy as you think. The evocative Moon's return to your sign this afternoon can fill you with pride or raise fears that you prefer to avoid. In either case, be ready to go on a bumpy ride. Just remember, it's best to manage your moods as they change or they will just get in the way of the next emotional cycle that starts with tomorrow's New Moon. Let go of your old expectations; maintaining an open mind helps you discover a new direction for the month ahead.
