You have secret permission from the cosmos to keep to yourself today because you could benefit from some quiet time to listen to your heart. It can be challenging to hear your own voice if you're always busy running around for everyone else. It's not your fault if people are pushing you to perform. Instead of feeling like a dancing bear in a circus, do what's best for you now. Others will forgive your current need for privacy when you return with a new and improved attitude.

You could confuse others at work with your scattered energy today and inadvertently distract them from their chores. Although your intentions are good, you're not interested in establishing an agenda for anyone else. But before you claim that you don't want the extra responsibility now, consider the practicalities involved in the trade-off. It may be smarter to negotiate for what you want than to just walk away and miss out on the chance to make a difference.

Your natural concern for the well-being of others at work is one of the things that makes you such a valuable team player. However, you might set yourself up for disappointment today if you spread yourself too thin by taking care of everyone else. Try weaving an invisible protective web around you so you don't get pulled off track from your personal goals. Your current feelings of scarcity can dampen your enthusiasm and impede your progress. It may feel like a stretch to change your attitude now, but you certainly have the power to do it. Counting your blessings is a great place to start.

You realize you must focus on the present moment instead of holding onto an old dream that stands in the way of your happiness. If someone questions your life strategy today, avoid falling into the trap of feeling like you must defend your long-term goals. However, keep in mind that clinging to your past or dreaming about the future doesn't leave you with much time for now. As Einstein wrote, ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important.

It seems like everyone wants to spend time with you now because you know how to kick up your heels and have fun while still remaining emotionally available. However, you can avoid the stress of being in such high demand today by redirecting the subject of a conversation away from your feelings and onto the concerns of others. Your cleverness allows you to skip through the day, but be careful that you don't sacrifice the needs of your heart in the process.

You prefer others to be forthright and to say exactly what's on their minds; otherwise your imagination transforms the unknown into something worse than the simple truth. You aren't very pleased if a friend or partner holds out on you now. Unfortunately, your desire to know another person's feelings could drive your own emotions deeper into hiding. Relax your intense curiosity today; an indirect approach may be the perfect catalyst to trigger a necessary conversation. Too much looking often blinds the eye that seeks but never finds.

Your desire for an intellectual debate may be thwarted today as other people's feelings keep cycling back into the discussion. You might steer the topics away from subjective biases. But your attempts to modify the natural flow of the conversation could anger someone, eliciting the very same emotional outbreak you wish to avoid. Instead, allow the dialogue to meander on its own without imposing your agenda. The wisdom of the cosmos shines the brightest now when you're not trying to be in control.

If you think a coworker is attempting to take unfair advantage of your kindness, your swift response today could catch him or her off guard. Sometimes you can be forgiving to a fault, but you might overreact now if you feel pushed too far. Don't be afraid of engaging in a power struggle if necessary; just keep in mind that your compassion is still your most effective weapon. Taking the high road earns you the most respect in the end.

If a relationship with a friend or family member is energetically stuck, you may want to get off to a new beginning today. Unfortunately, the cautious Cancer New Moon in your 4th House of Emotional Security makes you uncertain about how to best move forward at all. In fact, there's a voice within suggesting that you shouldn't start anything now, for you could create more problems than you intend. Don't let fear stop you from sharing your goals. Even if you must take things slowly, it's time to look ahead and get ready for what's next in your life.

You think you have important things to say, yet after careful consideration you might decide that you are better off listening to others than blabbering away about your own stuff. The nurturing Cancer New Moon falls in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, prompting you to spend much of the day amongst family and friends without feeling the need to go venturing far from home. Even if you must go to work, don't waste time taking on extra activities. Conserving your energy while you can puts you in a better position to pursue your dreams in the days ahead.

Although you crave peace and quiet today, there are some commitments you won't be able to avoid. Nevertheless, the Cancer New Moon occurs in your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, reminding you to create some time to be alone now, no matter what it takes. However, being by yourself is not the same as being lonely; it's about reconnecting with your inner self, which often gets crowded out by all the noise and activity you manifest in your life. Taking a few steps back is like hitting the reset button and giving yourself a fresh start.

You can't ignore your needs today, even if you choose not to share what you want with anyone else. The New Moon in your self-protective sign encourages you to pull your energy in and keep your feelings all to yourself. Unfortunately, satisfaction will remain elusive unless you take a chance and talk about your desires. Knowing when to push past your fear of rejection is a sign of intelligence. Pick someone you can trust and open your heart a little at a time.

You have a lot of hidden feelings brewing beneath the surface today. You are often quite upfront, telling it like it is. However the introspective Cancer New Moon intensifies your 12th House of Secrecy, making you less likely now to share what's in your heart. Nevertheless, you still must honor what is happening within. It's not necessary to act on every emotion, but don't push them away either, even if they complicate your life for a while. The only way out is to go within.

Getting together with your friends to share your dreams sounds like a sweet idea now, but previous commitments may hold you back even though you don't want to say no. Perhaps the Cancer New Moon's presence in your 11th House of Community means there's just too many activities today and something has to give. Thankfully, you don't have to discuss all the complications of your schedule with anyone else. Wait and see how the day develops and participate only if you have time. A little less structure and a bit more flexibility will do you good.

You secretly would love to crawl into the security of your own private world today and luxuriate in the notion that you don't have to go anywhere or see anyone. However, reality may not let you off the hook without a good fight. You might be called on to take responsibility for others now that the Cancer New Moon washes into your 10th House of Career, and you begrudgingly rise to the occasion. Oddly enough, if you play your cards right you can assume a leadership role while still feeling safe within your own shell.

Your emotions draw you into uncharted realms as the watery Cancer New Moon floods your 9th House of Big Ideas, whether or not you are ready for the next adventure. Even if the territory is new, there is a haunting familiarity to the landscape, as if you were here before. But you cannot remember if it was in your dreams, a past lifetime or if you are seeing signposts to your future. For now, there's no difference between yesterday and tomorrow, so make the most of today.

Although the intensity continues to settle down, your nerves still might be on edge today. Perhaps you are being sucked into an emotional drama now that the Cancer New Moon influences your 8th House of Intimacy. Nevertheless, there's not an easy way to circumvent the tension. Sure, there's always the next flight to Antarctica, but what would you do once you got there? Forget your ideas about the Great Escape. Sink into your feelings with the assurance that your positive attitude will return and you'll be back to your buoyant self soon enough.

You are experiencing a personal high tide of emotions that pull at your most fundamental relationships now that the sensitive Cancer New Moon lands in your 7th House of Others. You Mountains Goats are quite comfortable when striving for stability, but you don't feel as sure-footed when the waters rise. Keep in mind that it's perfectly safe to let your feet leave the ground. Swim through the swirl of feelings without clinging to any one desire along the way. Adaptability is now your key to happiness.

You can sense the energetic shift as the Cancer New Moon in your 6th House of Daily Routine distracts you from your high-flying thoughts and drops you into a pool of messy details. No matter how hard you try to separate out the different strands of emotions, they are tightly interwoven to create a complex tapestry. You may feel as if this emotional fabric is too heavy for use, but it lightens up dramatically when you wear it as if it were your own.

A fresh start with respect to love can be highly energizing, but this is not a ticket to leave a current relationship that may be going through a stressful period. Instead, today's nurturing Cancer New Moon activates your 5th House of Spontaneity, infusing your new feelings into an existing partnership to foster a deeper intimacy. However, if you aren't romantically involved, take this opportunity to pursue creative interests, instead. No matter where you channel your passion, it's crucial to move tentatively for the longest-lasting results.

Although you have plenty of errands to run, you still may feel like staying home and hiding out today. The self-protective Cancer Moon asks you to soften your aggressive stance and show more sensitivity to those around you. However, displaying your vulnerability isn't necessarily comfortable for you warrior Rams. Going on the offense might just be your clever way to avoid feeling fear. Thankfully, there's no need to act like a superhero; it's really okay to be human after all.

Hanging out with friends and family sounds like such a good idea today that you might want to invite even more people to join in the fun. You may think socializing with others can help you stabilize your own shifting feelings. This tactic could work as long as you don't get distracted by endless gossip and meaningless chatter. Remember to pay attention to your emotions, even if they are making you anxious. Your heart is trying to send you a message; being with those you love allows you to be your authentic self.

You might not be able to shake off your nervous energy today and your lack of self-control is quite bothersome. You want to make your point, but wonder if you can stand up for your beliefs in the face of opposition. Although your inner voice is telling you to let it go, think again before going silent. Actually, you're more tenacious than usual and won't give up without a good fight. You may be better off now if you take a chance and share your feelings. What you don't say today, you could regret tomorrow.

Your feelings tend to run quite a bit deeper than others might realize. Nevertheless, you're at home in your own depths, even if you're having difficulty communicating your emotions to anyone else. Don't worry about other people's expectations. Start slowly and share something easy; then work up to more challenging material later in the day. Be gentle with yourself; getting the ball rolling is enough for now.

Be careful about pushing your beliefs on others today or you may end up provoking an unnecessary argument. However, if you choose to keep your desires to yourself, it certainly doesn't mean you are lacking in emotions. Nevertheless, it's a smart idea to take time out of your busy day so you can get in touch with the hidden issues that are waiting in the shadows. A little self-reflection will do you a world of good.

You could feel a bit detached from everyone else today, as if your emotional connections are not very strong. At first, maybe you thought that your intentions were understood, yet you suddenly retreat when you realize that your message was misinterpreted. Keep in mind that it's common for misunderstandings to occur when you talk about ideas that are beyond the description of language. Don't take things too personally; your key planet Mercury is playing the role of the trickster now, and it's best to laugh your way through it. Your sense of humor is your secret weapon.

Your feelings are unusually intense today, yet you may choose not to say a word about your internal drama. You might want to show someone special that you care, but prefer to express it through actions instead of words. However, this doesn't mean you can't keep all channels of communication wide open. Just continue to follow your heart, even if it seems awkward at first. Let your passion fuel your momentum to create a memorable moment.

You're in a contemplative mood today as you reflect on your current conditions and re-evaluate your future plans. However, the watery Cancer Moon can overload you with whirlpools of powerful emotions, intensified now by your key planet Mars. Nevertheless, even if you try to be practical, your heart isn't listening to your logic. Don't try to force your feelings into a box; just let them play out on their own accord and allow the cards to fall where they may.

You Archers aren't typically interested in directing your aim at the inner worlds of emotions. Your intent may be fiery, but your bowstring is currently heavy with the worries of the Cancer Moon. Although you like to point your arrows toward lofty ideas and engage in philosophical debate, you won't be able to think your way out of this one. Give up the struggle; for once, your feelings just need to be felt.

Your current circumstances grow more complex as the day progresses. You could be lured into a heated interaction with a friend or family member whose feelings are at odds with yours. This irresolvable difference of opinions is frustrating, for the most sensible solution seems so clear to you. Why can't others set aside their emotional baggage so you can move on with your day? This dilemma might not have an immediate solution. Thankfully, you have another option: you can simply smile and walk away.

You could be feeling so uncharacteristically moody today that your irrational emotions blur the clarity of your perceptions. But fate lurks in the shadows and might spring upon an unsuspecting moment to suddenly transform everything. Don't sweat what you can't change; this cosmic surprise can work to your advantage if you roll with the waves and stop thinking that you need to be in control. Set logic aside and let your imagination soar.

Your emotional desires are strong today, motivating you to engage in playful romance in order to get what you want. You often realize that rational thinking doesn't make sense out of everything, but it's particularly challenging now to leap into the unknown. Nevertheless, you cannot talk your way to satisfaction. You just have to trust the universe and jump in with your heart wide open. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

It appears you're eager to take a risk to get what you want, but behind your optimistic veneer you might have more self-doubt today than anyone realizes. Luckily, once you finally climb out on a limb, you suddenly realize that things will be okay. Build your strategy on proven facts alone and not faulty assumptions based on unrealistic dreams. Having a pragmatic plan in place can make the difference between failure and success.

Don't initiate action too quickly today because the truth is elusive and by tomorrow you might want to base your plan on an entirely different set of parameters. The Moon's visit to your 4th House of Home and Family reminds you of all your unfinished domestic chores. Nevertheless, your key planet Venus titillates you with romantic visions now, tempting you to drop everything for the possibility of finding love or fortune. However, your integrity is at stake so it's prudent to set aside transient fantasies; real satisfaction requires patience and persistence.

You may be anxious today because there are so many things you want to do, yet you have trouble prioritizing your projects. Usually, you're quite comfortable dividing your time over several tasks at once but now, the closer you get to making up your mind the more uncertain you become. Thankfully, your confusion should dissipate once you choose to postpone a big decision. Waiting until the fog lifts enables you to see your options in a clear light.

Your imagination is hyperactive today, but even those closest to you might not realize how much is going on behind your calm demeanor. Unfortunately, your current lack of clarity can land you in a heap of trouble if you jump to an incorrect conclusion. Don't rely on your logic alone since you're able to bend reality in your favor now. Ask someone you trust to give you their honest perspective. Although a reality check may not change your mind, it's still helpful to get a second opinion for safety's sake.

There's nothing wrong with your decision-making skills today, yet you could still upset the apple cart if you act on an impulse instead of taking a more rational approach. Your fascination with someone special or an intriguing idea may have you wandering around in circles. However, exercising some self-restraint is wise while you consider the consequences of immediately pursuing your desires. If your plan makes sense, waiting a little while longer won't reduce your chances to find satisfaction.

You do your best work when you filter out extraneous data before making any important decisions. But the Moon's shift into your 12th House of Destiny prompts you to take things even more seriously; you want to thoroughly understand both sides of a current issue before heading off in the wrong direction. You're more inclined to spend additional time to distinguish fact from fiction once you accept that fantasies can now appear real. However, exploring your imagination also offers benefits as long as you remember when to return to earth.

Your need for pleasure leads you into a complicated set of circumstances today without an exit strategy in place. You are fascinated by the possibilities when your key planet Venus squares magical Neptune, but things may turn out very different than you expect. You don't have enough reasons to avoid the complexity because the delicious potential is so sweet. Unfortunately, you could find yourself in deeper emotional waters than you planned. Every now and then, sinking into your feelings is good for your soul.

You are inspired by the notion of putting on a show today as the dramatic Leo Moon moves through your 10th House of Public Status. However, it's nearly impossible to prevent your mind from wandering with two planets dancing in whimsical Gemini. Your fantasies may be quite lovely now, but it's totally up to you whether or not to encourage them with your attention. Fortunately, you can enjoy the present moment more thoroughly if you understand how it contributes to the ultimate satisfaction of reaching your goals.

Follow through with your promises today because others are counting on your performance. You want to take your job seriously, yet it's all too easy to misinterpret what is expected from you if you mix up the details. Write your instructions down and then double-check that you heard them correctly. This extra step might seem like overcompensation to someone else, but your meticulous approach now saves you from wasting valuable time and energy. Getting it right the first time makes you the hero of the day.

Even if you're on a creative streak, it's still a challenge to find an outlet for your best ideas. Unfortunately, your actions might not have the results you want, leaving you feeling discouraged about your dreams. But it's not wise to give up now since your clouds of illusion will start to dissipate later in the day, offering you a clearer vision of the future. Happily, as long as you focus on your goals, your unwavering determination and hard work will eventually pay off.

You may reconsider recent relationship choices today, especially if you suddenly discover an option that is potentially more enjoyable. However, you could make a foolish decision because you're viewing the future through Neptune's rose-colored glasses now. Although you might be sure about your desire to change direction, it's wiser to let the energy settle down overnight. Don't fall into the trap of chasing bright lights and shiny objects. You can always take a more radical approach to life once you see things in the light of a new day.

You might build your expectations for the day around unrealistic fantasies as sweet Venus aligns with your key planet idealistic Neptune. Oddly enough, sharing relatively insignificant chores with a close friend or significant other could be all it takes to rekindle relationship magic today. Although you can be very obstinate in your unwillingness to compromise now, you don't want to be alone. Choosing your battles carefully minimizes your need to sacrifice what is ultimately most important to you.

You're feeling lucky today and are capable of turning almost any situation into a good time. Paradoxically, you don't even have to do anything special; just showing up seems to make everyone smile. The biggest danger can come from being overconfident now since your positive attitude can't cure everything. Thankfully, acknowledging your limitations and focusing on the things you can change inspires others to do the same.

You might prefer to live a simple life these days, yet you really don't want to give up on your long-term goals. Unfortunately, you could tire yourself out attempting to determine the best path to follow. You don't enjoy being pulled simultaneously in different directions because it makes it tough to go along with the flow. Stand back from the pressure of the current circumstances so you can reconnect with your own voice before committing to any one choice.

You're feeling an uneasy tension between your anticipation of what's next and your desire to hold onto the past. You may be moving faster today, but still can't keep up with all the changes in your life. Nonetheless, you might be okay with the uncertainty even if you're a bit overwhelmed. Retreating from the chaos is the smartest thing you can do now. You'll be more effective in the long run if you hang tight for a few days before pushing your agenda ahead again. The waiting is the hardest part.

You may experience the proverbial calm before the storm today, yet your fear of the unknown might feel more ominous than anything that's happening in the present moment. This weekend could mark a turning point, and your recent efforts finally start to bear fruit. Be practical and prepare for the next round of change that is on the horizon. Instead of letting worry discourage you, cultivate a positive attitude by starting from a place of love.

Your life grows more complicated now that you can see the whole truth, especially if someone is trying to hide it from you. Your overactive intuition makes it nearly impossible to currently engage in any form of superficial interactions. You're not interested in what others think of your ideas today; your truths aren't up for negotiation. But there's no need to act self-righteously since it's easier to gain support from your friends if you acknowledge that there are several viable ways to look at the same situation. Pride goes before a fall.

Acting with brilliance may be a lot simpler than you think today. Even if you're under pressure to perform, there's no need to jump through any hoops just to demonstrate your reliability. All you're required to do now is to show up with your common sense intact. Let your intelligence shine through, but don't try to solve every little problem that pops up. Do what you do best; set priorities and get busy crossing things off your list.

You might not have reached your destination yet, but you are, nonetheless, at the end of a road. Your current position is challenging because your sense of falling short may leave you feeling frustrated today. Thankfully, you can ease the tension now by simply changing your perspective. The emotional landscape has already started to shift; there will be plenty of time to reach your goals once the path in front of you clears again.

You could run out of patience today when you encounter nearly anything that isn't already on your radar. You are easily distracted if something alluring catches your eye. However, you may grow annoyed with yourself if you succumb to following your whim instead of your schedule. Paradoxically, you still might wonder what you missed if you keep yourself on track. In the long run, it's more important to explore new territory than wasting time worrying about which route to choose.

Although you truly believe you have an inexhaustible supply of energy, it's not smart to take on more than you can manage. Your enthusiasm, even when supported by unrelenting determination, doesn't mean you're invincible. Unfortunately, seeking guidance from others won't likely produce the clarity you seek now; you must make decisions about what you can and can't do on your own. If you overextend yourself today, you'll likely run into trouble next week. Save your strength for when you will need it most.

You may be expected to manage a complex issue today that involves a financial transaction. Or you might just be feeling pressure from the lack of clarity in a business relationship. Either way, resolution could be delayed because you need more information. Nevertheless, you are still tempted to make an impulsive choice before your time runs out. Don't give in to the expectations of others; wait until later in the week when you have more data at your disposal. Ultimately, you're the one who must live with your decision.

A friend might express his or her feelings in a manner that catches you completely off guard today, complicating your relationship dynamics. You prefer to keep everything casual and on a rational basis because the energy is simpler to handle. But you can't go back to the way things once were unless you choose a path of denial. Unfortunately, avoiding issues only makes them more difficult to manage. You can try downplaying the drama, but actively engaging in a constructive dialogue is the only way to reduce the complexity.

Distinguishing the separate threads of truth is challenging now, for the thoughts have already been woven with a believable blend of fact and fiction. This complex tapestry entangles your imagination if you overanalyze the situation. Be careful, for your current false sense of certainty allows you to make a decision based on an incorrect assumption. Instead of forcing the issue today, just appreciate each moment as it occurs. It should be easier to sort everything out in a few days.

You were caught in a crossfire of conflicting interests last month as Mercury retrograded in your 3rd House of Communication, home territory for the messenger planet. Your life has been very busy and you are still fighting against a mental undertow. As the tide begins to change, you can start to see all kinds of enterprising possibilities roll out before your eyes. Don't wait any longer; launch your ship of ideas into the seas of commerce. Your next journey starts now.

You have been intensely focused on business matters, but progress might be slower than you prefer. Fortunately, if you did your homework, things begin to fall into place now. The work you have done behind the scenes finally has a chance to pay off. Although significant changes may not happen overnight, you can still feel the potential blowing in the wind. The sky is the limit; spread your wings and get ready to fly.

You want to travel -- either in the outer world or within your imagination -- but a weird string of circumstances has come between you and your desires. However, you need mental stimulation more than anything else now. You have reached a saturation point in your current process and must find new ways to revitalize your thinking if you're to make progress toward manifesting your dreams. Pack your bags and hang on to your hat; the universe may be about to grant you your wish.

No matter what is already on your schedule today, you're tempted to just stay home and bury your head in the sand. You're in a contemplative mood and are hesitant to share your thoughts. Your retreat period could last longer than you expect yet the additional time gives you another chance to overcome your fears and gain new spiritual awareness. Don't worry about being isolated since it's only a temporary situation. Trust your instincts; you'll know when it's time to put your ideas, however unformed, out into the open for everyone to see.

Social demands during the past few weeks have required more of your time than you prefer. However, your attitude begins to change now that interactive Mercury turns direct in your 11th House of Community. Although working within an organization or group might still feel restrictive, you're more willing to engage in a collective effort. Don't give in to the temptation to strike out on your own; you have a wonderful opportunity to learn a lot about yourself today if you're willing to collaborate with others.

Although career decisions continue to be in the foreground, you might have seen your share of roadblocks while your key planet Mercury retrograded back into your 10th House of Profession. Now you are standing at an important crossroad, although it may feel more like a deja vu. Stop and review the events of last month one more time before choosing your next direction. Make new and improved plans based upon your current analysis of the big picture rather than fixating on any one single moment in time.

The lure of adventure has been on your mind, but thankfully, there is more than one way to travel to new lands. Learning expands your mind in a way that is similar to taking a trip. Conveniently, you don't even have to leave the comforts of home to make the most of this cosmic energy. You may have felt like circumstances prevented you from satisfying your current wanderlust, but this is your time to embark on a new journey into uncharted metaphysical realms. Embrace the mystery with an eager spirit and an open mind.

You may spend lots of time these days thinking about subjects that are not normal concerns for most people. You're naturally quite comfortable delving into the mysteries of sex, death and the meaning of life. However, recently you haven't known what to do with your thoughts because they don't seem to fit in with the current topics of conversation. Test the waters by sharing some of your less controversial ideas with someone you trust. But don't go too far out on a limb; start slowly at first and build momentum. It's more fun if others willingly come along for the ride.

Conversations within your individual relationships may have been turned inside out during the past month, creating misunderstandings and leading to confusion. It is now time to revisit these unresolved issues and sort out the truth once and for all. Surprisingly, talks that were previously impossible can now happen without further complications. Remember, it's not only about sharing your point of view; it's also about actively listening to the feedback you receive from others. Healthy communication is a two-way street.

Paying attention to the details of your everyday routine has grown increasingly difficult while trickster Mercury retrograded through your 6th House of Health and Work. In fact, you may have faced one too many complications when trying to maintain consistency in your daily habits. Instead of wasting time analyzing the past, focus on the specific issues at hand and start to set things right. Demonstrate the power of now by making a decision that can improve your life.

You might feel as if your self-expression has been blocked during the past few weeks, but the tables are about to be turned. Don't worry too much about your recent lack of progress; instead, restart your creative engines and visualize the alternatives ahead. If romance is on your mind, don't hesitate to share what's in your heart. Let love overcome any lingering fears of rejection; you'll never know what might happen unless you're willing to take a chance.

You may have recently gone on a sentimental journey back through your childhood. Mercury's retrograde into your 4th House of Roots might have even inspired you to revisit your family home or place of birth. Fortunately, you can learn much about your current life by re-evaluating your relationship with your family of origin. But dwelling in the past offers diminishing returns; bring your new perspective back to the present moment where it can positively impact your life.

Your anxiety level rises today if you can't figure out a way to complete everything that you promised. Naturally, it's not a good idea to blame anyone else for things that are ultimately your responsibility. Fortunately, you are able to approach your dilemma in a mature manner now, gently sharing your current concerns with those involved instead of dwelling on the mistakes of the past. Focusing on what needs to be done in the present moment elicits cooperation instead of conflict.

The idea of revealing what's actually on your mind might be enough to increase your insecurity today, because you may be afraid that the reaction you'll receive won't be in your favor. However, if you only share some of your emotions, you could set up a situation where you inadvertently alienate a close friend or lover. Your attempt to withhold parts of your story is more transparent than you realize. It is better to simply get everything off your chest now and then deal with whatever fallout occurs. Honesty is the best policy.

You're not thrilled about needing to withhold your desires as the cautious Virgo Moon squares sensual Venus in your sign today. Unfortunately, emotional suppression only makes matters worse; it's healthier to acknowledge potential problems before they manifest. And, if your current plans aren't adequate enough to do the job, work on improving them now -- and not after the fact. There's no time like the present to create the positive change you want to see in your world.

You have an exciting opportunity to get a glimpse of your future -- but you may need to let go of an immediate goal before you can move forward. However, shifting your course shouldn't be considered a failure now since your current trajectory might not be the best way to reach your destination, even if it seems like a direct route. Forget about your preconceived conclusions and draw a new map that's based on today's incoming data instead of yesterday's news. You are the captain of your own destiny.

Your work week might not be going exactly as planned, but everything could turn out fine as long as you don't try to control too many of the variables. Paradoxically, the more you resist change now, the harder it is for you to adapt. Set your short-term goals aside for a few days and dream about the distant future while you respond to the current circumstances the best you can. Thankfully, you don't have to sacrifice any important values or slip into denial just to avoid getting lost in self-doubt.

Although you can put your best foot forward now by acting more confidently than you feel, you realize that your workmates expect even more out of you. The reflective Moon's visit to your perfectionist sign raises worries as you try to balance your feelings with your current objectives at work. Don't be afraid to acknowledge your limitations. Your honesty is refreshing to others and motivates them to support your cause. Expressing your vulnerability cultivates an atmosphere of mutual respect.

Your role at work is slowly but profoundly transforming as others begin to acknowledge your authority. You might have had to struggle recently to get your opinion heard, but now your astute perspective is in high demand. However, micromanaging your world may temporarily bring your success to a halt. Keep in mind that it's not important to be on top as long as you have your hand in co-creating the changes that are unfolding. Sharing the power allows you to share the success.

Relationships aren't as complicated as they appear, even if your feelings are more intense than others can handle today. You are willing to work on your communication style, but you want to be noticed for your good intentions and extra effort. Unfortunately, painful memories may cloud your mind, making it harder to hear the positive feedback you receive. Don''t let old emotional tapes drown out any praise that comes your way now. Turning down your volume just a notch creates a more harmonious tone to your interpersonal dynamics.

Separating fact from fiction may be a tricky endeavor if someone says one thing but means something else. Nevertheless, you're willing to roll with the incoming waves for the sake of convenience. Although your new goals may not be fully grounded in reality now, they can still inspire you to break through old limitations. However, it might seem as if your current work duties are delaying your long-term success. Don't make any significant changes just yet; fulfilling your immediate responsibilities helps your progress more than you realize.

You are at a fork in the road and your professional objectives could prompt a minor crisis today, requiring you to choose which route to take. Fortunately, you're not restrained by someone else's arbitrary rules, allowing you to find solutions where others have already failed. Ironically, accepting new responsibilities now might stand between you and success. Ultimately, your ability to remain detached from the outcome is what gives you the winning strategy.

You might openly disagree with someone at work today, assuming that a heated argument is needed in order to shift the energy. However, conflict won't likely bring you any closer to the truth, and it could even add to the existing animosity. You can be highly productive now as long as you aren't distracted by a petty disagreement. Instead of letting yourself get hooked by your emotions, rise above any differences of opinion and commit to working for the highest cause.

You may appear lost in dreamland today as the shimmering Moon opposes surreal Neptune in your intuitive sign. Surprisingly, you're more pragmatic now than others realize since the exacting Virgo Moon sharpens your senses. Don't get sidetracked by what anyone else might be thinking; they will soon recognize the usefulness of your ideas as your plans take shape over the days ahead. In the meantime, let your imagination be your guide.

You're energetically charged and may feel as if you have your act together today. However, you could face tough opposition as if someone is trying to stop your plan from ever seeing the light of day. Nevertheless, don't waste your precious resources by engaging in an unnecessary battle. Instead, plan carefully and save yourself for the main event.

You are eager to take advantage of an opportunity at work because you can see the potential in this moment. However, you might overlook an important piece of the puzzle in your exuberance. The plot thickens throughout the day and you could end up in a power struggle with your ideas going up against someone who is holding all the cards. You may be tempted to give up once the odds are not in your favor. Nevertheless, things are not as they appear. Change is imminent and compromise is inevitable; you still may get what you want.

Your intentions are clear; you prefer to avoid an unpleasant meltdown that might occur if you expressed your hidden feelings. You are often adept at sidestepping sticky issues, but it appears that you must face them head on now. Don't waste too much energy resisting; even direct engagement isn't your first choice, an intense interaction today can release stuck energy that otherwise would have remained in your way. Show your courage and don't back down.

You might be the impulsive one in your group today, but you won't make any friends by just going off on some tangent. You're better off taking several deep breaths and thinking about the source of your current sense of urgency. You may encounter strong resistance to your ideas, so don't fret if you can't change anyone's mind right away. Rely on the strength of the Crab and use your pincers to hold on to your current position. Be patient; the opposition will tire.

Others may be giving their best performances today just to get you to change your mind. However, you will likely remain unconvinced. You're fairly certain you know what's best and there is little anyone can do to make you reconsider your position. Even if their argument involves facts, you might require a few days for new facts to impact your thinking. Just remember that your rigidity can backfire on you. If you soften your stance, you'll still get much of what you want.

You are in a long-term process of having one shell after another peeled off you, like the layers of an onion. Now, another veil is being lifted and you are nearer to the ever-elusive truth. Resist the temptation to think that you are close enough to grab it at any cost. The more desperate you are to reach your goals now, the farther you appear to be from your final destination.

Your ideas have great impact on others at work today, but your influence doesn't come without paying a price. You're quite impassioned about your beliefs and are willing to do battle to defend them. You can be quite convincing now, but not if your colleagues think you're trying to beat them down with your persistence, rather than just relying on the substance of your ideas. Put your thoughts out there; the best ones will be embraced.

Your beliefs and values continue to undergo dramatic evolutions in a slow-moving and long-term process. Today, someone may come along with an intellectual flashlight to illuminate these changes for you. It can be difficult, but highly empowering, to actually realize how much you've transformed. You may feel somewhat nostalgic, but mostly you are resigned to completing the transition in order to maximize your chances of finding happiness.

Typically, you Archers are exceptionally good at comprehending the big picture. You tend to see your life projected onto a wide screen. However, you need to put blinders on today so you can narrow your focus and pay your respects to the details. You may want to rebel because concentrating isn't as much fun as opening up. Nevertheless, it's just what the doctor has prescribed.

If you recently built a strong foundation at work, you may be ready to make substantial changes and take things to the next level. If you have been slowly getting more worked up over a dysfunctional situation, a little crisis might come to a head now. You are fed up with the irresolvable tension and are tempted to take drastic action to relieve the situation. Nevertheless, it's wise to move forward cautiously so you don't inadvertently stir up a hornet's nest.

You are energetically bumping into people today and there seems to be no easy way out of the conflict. But is this a problem between you and them, or is it really an internal struggle between two parts of yourself? If this is an inner dynamic, you'd better think twice before pushing the situation to red alert. Compromise will work, but only if you are aware of your own inconsistency.

You have grown weary of all the talk; it's time for concrete action. However, the difficulty is that you may be hesitant to fully feeling your own power. Don't hold back, only to explode onto the scene with your newly found direction. Instead, move steadily with determination and conviction. If you are willing to lose a few battles along the way, you greatly increase your chances of winning the war.

You won't likely hesitate to state your position today, even if it means your popularity might sink. In fact, you gain a strange sort of pleasure now when you stand alone. It's not that you're interested in fighting a losing battle; it's just that you are attracted to the adrenaline rush you get from feeling independent. Thankfully, you can enjoy the thrill of being alive without starting a war of words. Find a worthy opponent and then surprise everyone by establishing common ground.

Your words don't convey exactly what you're feeling today, even if you think everyone is receiving your message as intended. Oddly enough, your positive attitude could prevent you from seeing things in their true light. Facing reality may temporarily upset your sense of well-being, but discovering the truth is ultimately better than fearing the unknown. You might be unexpectedly pleased with what you learn especially as your self-esteem grows in the process.

You naively believe everything will improve if you just say what's on your mind today. But Mercury's smooth trine to the Moon's karmic North Node can't guarantee a positive outcome since you're not in control of other people's reactions. A confrontation won't solve anything now, so wait until the energy settles down before striving for resolution. Instead of trying to prove your point of view is the right one, simply acknowledge the different perspectives and move on.

You're inclined to put your new plan into motion now, but your ideas may be at odds with nearly everyone else's. Nevertheless, you believe your opportunity will be lost if you don't initiate action right away. You might talk yourself into withdrawing into the security of your shell because feeling vulnerable makes you nervous. Trust your intuition; protect what is yours without letting irrational fears influence your choice. Nothing ventured; nothing gained.

A close examination of your feelings might reveal suppressed anger, although you may do your best to avoid focusing on negativity today. Even your dearest friends might not be aware of your emotional turmoil since you could easily disguise your inner process by putting on a happy face. However, unresolved tensions resurface if someone tries to manipulate you. Express your hurt or disappointment with kindness to avoid any lingering conflict. Being more transparent with your thoughts helps to clear the air.

You may be driven toward getting your own way now, yet it might be a challenge to stand up to a powerful person who has a different idea in mind for you. Your vehement response when defending your position could surprise even you, especially if you try to stick to your plan at any cost. Unexpected twists and turns require you to set aside your previous agenda so you can fully concentrate on the road ahead of you. Remember, flexibility is your secret weapon in today's encounter with change.

Distinguishing between what is public and what is private in your life could be tricky today. You may be very passionate about a new idea, yet still shy away from any potential conflict. If you still end up in an argument, avoid making statements about your own personal beliefs or habits that are better kept to yourself. Too much information might escalate a civil discussion into a debate you can never win. It is better now to err on the side of discretion; politely make your point and then retreat to let everyone else come to their senses.

Irrational passions are aroused as the Sun opposes your key planet Pluto today. You might work yourself into an agitated state if something goes wrong, but expressing your extreme feelings is not a simple matter now. Unfortunately, denial won't solve your problems, either. The way out of this delicate situation is simply to accept the fact that multiple points of view can exist simultaneously. Happily, yours is not the only solution, even if that's how it seems at first.

You might precipitate an emotional meltdown if you try to play the role of a wise philosopher today. Assuming a spiritual position could just be another clever attempt to circumvent your feelings. Paradoxically, you will feel much better if you can get out of your head now long enough to express what's in your heart. Those around you will breathe a sigh of relief too, especially if they're tired of you pretending like everything is okay. Allowing others to see your weak spot isn't as scary as you think.

Once a topic is brought out into the light, everything may appear as if it's beyond your control. Ultimately, you want to have the final say in each and every matter, even if it seems like you're asking for too much today. However, you could be pleasantly surprised by what happens if you have enough faith to loosen your grip on the steering wheel. Letting someone else run the show increases your power in the long run while also enabling you to make tangible progress toward your goals.

You could dream up an entirely new way to say the same old thing today, but this isn't just some kind of parlor trick. Inspiration can strike at any moment so make a special effort to communicate now, especially if you have been trying to convey an important message to someone you admire. Even if you aren't getting through at first, your charming persistence ultimately pays off. Your originality is impossible to resist.

Step back and take a fresh look at where you find pleasure in your life. Even if you don't have much time for relaxation today, schedule a few enjoyable activities over the weekend. Do whatever you can to meet your obligations but don't let anyone place a guilt trip on you. No one will have a valid reason to obstruct your progress if you continue to act with integrity. Although you have plenty of work in front of you, squeezing in some fun cultivates a healthy and happy balance in your life.

You are driven to talk about what you want because you recognize your goals may not be the same as others. You might feel as if you are getting the short end of the stick, but nevertheless it's best to downplay your personal desires. Although you Rams are often concerned with issues of self-determination, today's Libra Moon asks you to honor the needs of others, too. Don't succumb to the illusion of urgency; you have more time than you realize. Ultimately, your patience will be rewarded if you step up to support the ones you love.

You wake up eager to finish some projects now that the Moon visits your practical 6th House of Logistics. Although it's the weekend, you still might get bogged down with the details and have trouble putting your work aside. It's okay to withdraw for a while if you feel like you are on information overload. Don't worry about what is left undone; others are not likely as concerned about your accomplishments as you are now. All work and no play is not a sound strategy to achieve happiness.

Even if you typically thrive on lots of social interaction, you can still get thrown off course when the noise level gets too loud. Unfortunately, it may seem as if you can't find the volume control today and there is little you can do to tone down the annoying interference. Remember that even if it seems otherwise, the current static is internal and not external. Participating in activities that soothe your soul goes a long way to improve your mood. Everyone needs to escape from the demands of the real world now and then.

You have a variety of possible paths to follow today, yet it's nearly impossible to see where each one leads. Even if you think that a practical decision will set your day right, a midday surprise might turn your plans inside out anyhow. Don't give in to your fears by acting in an emotionally conservative manner. Ironically, your safest choices now are the most radical ones. Take a risk; you might feel surprisingly exhilarated if you try something totally out of your comfort zone.

Your actions speak louder than words on most days, but might fall short today. You prefer to talk about your emotions, although it may not be easy to start an overdue discussion with a loved one about a difficult subject now. Even if you have a disagreement, you will still feel relieved after the dust settles. There's no time like the present; just jump into the conversation before you lose your nerve. Be courageous and don't stop roaring until your message is heard.

Your analytical powers are operating on a highly efficient level today, but it still may be impossible to tease out the most useful information from the rest of the noise. There might be too much data for you to discern which bits are the important ones. Nevertheless, stick with your task the best you can. Everything will likely make a lot more sense later tomorrow once the stress begins to subside and your clarity returns.

Emotional issues have moved to the forefront of your life now that the evocative Moon is joining passionate Mars in your sign. Don't fight the lunar tides by trying to resist your volatile feelings, even if old memories surface and temporarily make you angry. This is your chance to get in touch with your heart so you can better understand what you need in your current relationships. You don't have to act on every changing mood as long as you let the energy rise and fall without rational interference. You can't always control circumstances but you can choose how to respond.

You could feel as if your nerves are on edge today and may even lose control of your temper before you know it. Thankfully, the chance of this outburst happening now is not as great as it seems, for the planetary turmoil is not significant enough to create major stress. However, if there is already frustration building, current annoyances can produce a trigger reaction that acts as a catalyst. But without a preexisting cause, you might just feel a bit bent out of shape. Consider your options and make sure an issue is worth the drama before unleashing your emotions.

Making up your mind with respect to a group activity may cause you extra worry today. You want to participate in the fun, yet you could feel as if your energies would be better placed somewhere else now. Your choice probably won't matter in the long run as much as you expect. You will likely remain ambivalent about your decision either way so you might as well follow your bliss.

Something could be gnawing at your confidence today and working harder doesn't seem to make it go away. You might have a bone to pick with someone and you want to clear the air; however, current circumstances could make it quite inconvenient to stir up unresolved issues. Even if you're tempted to blow everything out into the open now, you can improve your chances for a mutually beneficial outcome by waiting until the emotional intensity passes before sharing your feelings. Timing is everything.

You might have misjudged the size of a job and now must face the consequences of your error. Maybe your expectations are blown out of proportion as you look forward to turning work into play. Whatever the situation, you're not going to get out of it, even if you feel like making a mad dash for the exit when no one is looking. Resign yourself to doing what you said you would. Being the responsible one in the group casts you in a favorable light. Happily, the level of satisfaction you experience later on will make your extra efforts worthwhile.

You may approach your feelings in an overly logical manner today, even though this isn't your natural style. Normally, you just jump in and swim in the emotional waters without too much analysis. However, your mind is working overtime now as you try to sort out what's really going on inside your heart. Don't fight this process because it's not just mental gymnastics; you really stand to benefit from your current intellectual exercise. A little objectivity will do you a world of good.

You may need to be reminded to talk about your feelings today, although you might resist this friendly advice at first. Nevertheless, time is running out and the window of opportunity could be closing before you know it. It's crucial to speak your personal truth now. Keep in mind that you're not responsible for how others react to your message; you are merely responsible for delivering it with as much compassion and awareness as possible.

A day of total rest sounds good at first, but too much relaxation leads to boredom rather than satisfaction. There is a variety of things you want to do, but for some reason it's difficult to get motivated. Don't be too self-critical if you don't accomplish a lot now; just do what makes you feel the most comfortable. Sometimes an easygoing weekend spent in the pursuit of simple pleasures is exactly what you need to get back on track.

You are at a critical turning point and might be ready to explore the source of the tension in your life. This emotional journey can be particularly significant if you have recently avoided acknowledging stressful dynamics within an intimate relationship. The sensory overload from the past few days may subside enough for you to uncover what's beneath the surface noise now. Bringing hidden issues into the open sets the stage for inevitable transformation. The sooner you start the dialogue, the more positive the outcome.

You grow less interested in planning for your future and more concerned with achieving immediate satisfaction as the day wears on. Although you may be in touch with your desires, people might think you are hiding something important. However, worrying about anyone else's judgment is a total waste of energy. Listen to your heart and encourage others to do the same.

You are full of big ideas about how to make your dreams come true today. You really want to experience pleasure, but you can end up missing out on a good time if you reach too far and fall short of your expectations. Instead of overinflating your hopes, change your attitude and be grateful for what you have. Happiness comes from counting your blessings rather than always longing for more.

Operating with self-restraint feels all too familiar these days. Even if the situation at work is beginning to turn around now, you thought you would be farther along than you actually are. The timing of progress is like the tides; they shift according to their own rhythm and not yours. Talking about your situation with someone you respect helps you to prepare for the upcoming transitions. In the meantime, entertain all options without attaching singular importance to any one of them.

Someone may come into your life to help you manage your finances today, but you might see the offer as a potential threat. This doesn't mean that anyone is going to wave a magic wand and simply make your problems disappear; instead, you must learn how to value yourself so that others recognize your worth, too. Remain open to different points of view. Your perspective can undergo fundamental change if you take to heart what's being said now -- and this is exactly what the doctor ordered.

Clean up old emotional business while there is still time, for your life is about to change for the better. Stick to your regular routine until the real action begins; paying attention to the details can make or break the success of what is to come. Focus on what needs to be done today without worrying about the future. Setting clear priorities now enables you to make room for the next wave of exciting opportunities to arrive.

There are serious issues that require your attention now, but you may have a difficult time concentrating on any one of them for too long. It's not that your mind is wandering; it's just that you prefer to think about lighter, more enjoyable matters. But it's not a good idea to escape into your daydreams until you process what is on your plate of reality. Take time to deal with whatever remains unexpressed in your relationships before drifting back into your fantasy world.

Speaking honestly about what's on your mind today might not seem like a plausible option since you don't want to stir up any unpleasant feelings. You've been dealing with disruptive energy for weeks, but only in minor dosages. However, your anger will be less problematic in the long run if you can express it with kindness. Remember, a good conversation has two points of view. Giving others a chance to share their sides of the story, too, helps to establish common ground.

Although you're willing to try old things in new ways, you don't know yet which approach will work best for you. Thankfully, nearly everything you do now seems to be propitiously timed. However, the end results could be even better if you continue to build momentum while clever Mercury is activating  your 5th House of Self-Expression until July 13. Don't give up if you encounter any obstacles to your progress; your resilience is formidable, so keep trying until you succeed.

The water energy is flowing freely again and you Fish are among those who can intuitively sense the elemental shifts. However, it's not just about blindly following your instincts. You actually feel better now if you exert some self-control to prove that you're not at the whim of changeable emotions. Making prudent choices is easier today if you stay in touch with your immediate goals instead of being distracted by all the possible paths to pleasure. You can't always get what you want, but you can get what you need.

Life is complicated when you feel one thing but end up doing something else. Although your head is in conflict with your heart today, this stressful condition isn't as bad as it sounds. There's no easy way to satisfy both sides of the equation, but then again, who says that you have to now? Taking other people's feelings into consideration can help you make a decision as long as you remember to keep your own needs within your awareness, too. It may be impossible to please everyone, but your efforts won't go unnoticed.

You're motivated by internal forces today and you need to be even more responsible than usual -- especially when revealing your feelings. Something is pulling your heart into deeper and more passionate waters, and you want to share this memorable experience in order to capture the magic of the moment. However, the more you talk about it, the more difficult it is to define. Remaining silent might just be your key to satisfaction. Sometimes the most meaningful experiences can't be expressed in words.

You may be anticipating a deep and powerful wave of emotions, but it's not quite yet washing upon the shores of your consciousness. Nevertheless, something big is brewing out there in the greater cosmos -- and it's heading your way. Your moods can come and go today, but the sinking sensation that you need to face a significant issue will be around for a while. Take your time and be open to an important life lesson. It's never too late to learn a new trick.

One of your greatest strengths is the gentle control you exert on your environment in order to make it safer for those you love. This nurturing instinct is a natural inclination for Cancers, and you can create a hard outer shell large enough to contain your family and loved ones. You are taking this role of responsibility quite seriously now, but your altruistic concerns may not be fully appreciated today. Quiet persistence is your best course of action; let your heart be your guide.

You are a champion when it comes to demonstrating your appreciation and love, but logistics are standing in your way now. Perhaps the timing isn't just right or maybe the object of your affection isn't within listening range. It's even possible that he or she doesn't know you exist. Take whatever frustrations you experience in stride, for they will quickly pass as long as you maintain your composure. Your sense of humor is your saving grace.

A solution to your current problems may be discovered in how you relate to other people. It could feel like friends and associates are holding you back for some unknown reason. Or it's possible that you have social obligations you prefer to skip. Your resentment can backfire if you don't tell people exactly what you need. Others can't be held responsible for your unhappiness if they don't know what you want. Taking a risk and sharing your feelings fosters the cooperation that you crave.

You might feel the resistance as you share your desires with someone you trust today. Unfortunately, there's not a lot you can do to clear the obstacles from your path. Whatever -- or whoever -- is blocking your progress now, it's not significant enough to confront it directly.  If you make a big deal out of the issue, the tension could drain more energy from you than if you just let the situation pass. The less attention you give the negativity, the less it rattles your cage. Focusing on what you can change is your recipe for success.

The idea of starting a project today may sound better than actually doing anything about it. Ultimately, you must honor your values, for they are critically important to your success. Maintaining integrity with your beliefs can now have the greatest impact on your current situation. However, if you choose to follow your own path, you might temporarily feel out on a limb alone. Thankfully, pursuing your heart's desire empowers you to reclaim your abandoned priorities and strive to actualize your potential.

It's nearly impossible for you to be sad about much of anything now, but this doesn't mean you can't also be serious about what's going on in your life. Actually, your current tendency toward being overly responsible may curtail the more pleasurable activities you had originally planned for today. But don't waste any energy thinking about the fun you might be missing. Believe it or not, the satisfaction you derive from a job well done will outlast the transient pleasure of a good time.

A partner or an associate may deliver a reality check today -- and if you are receptive to the message, there's a lot you can gain from what you hear. However, if someone is hypercritical, take their words with a grain of salt. It's not that you should ignore the truth or deny the facts. There's no reason to spiral down to the depths of self-doubt, either. Instead, consider the advice as a gift from the universe; use what's valid and then throw out the rest. Your willingness to improve your strategy now bodes well for your future success.

You may feel suddenly excluded from a group that has been an important part of your life recently. Many Aquarians have mixed emotions with respect to social dynamics, anyhow. Ideally, you want to be an integral part of the community, but you also have a strong desire to establish your own separate identity. However, you might have personal issues that currently demand your attention. Thankfully, once you straighten out your affairs, you can jump back into the action with a clear conscience and an undivided focus.

Unfortunately, this is not a day made for daydreaming. You may find yourself being pulled back into the mundane world every time you drift off into one of your lovely reveries. Although you want to express your creativity, real needs require real attention. However, this still can be a wonderful day unless you try to sidestep your responsibilities. If you commit to fulfilling your obligations first, then all should go as smoothly as can be expected. Your hard work pays off in more ways than you know.

Someone may be overbearing in ways that make you uncomfortable today, yet it's difficult to confront the situation without creating additional turmoil. Nevertheless, things aren't better left unsaid now. Playing by the rules doesn't ensure satisfaction. Be courageous and speak your mind; don't let others limit your choices. If you are careful not to push too hard or too fast, you can bend reality in your favor. Just remember that with power comes responsibility.

Others might be so dramatic today that your first inclination is to turn around and run. But don't retreat so fast because you can learn plenty about your relationships if you are open to the issues at hand. However, you must push past your fear of change; you could be a lot happier once you reach the other side of a much-needed discussion. It's not as scary as it seems at first.

A variety of relationship issues could be jostling for your attention now, yet personal demands and faulty assumptions get in the way of your career path. There is a potential conflict brewing between your needs and the expectations of others. Don't let your desire to be your authentic self interfere with your productivity. It's up to you to figure out how to do your job without sacrificing your independence. Knowing the difference between what's important and what's not makes all the difference in the world.

Your inspiration motivates you to take the lead, especially at work, but it's hard to know how assertive you should be now. Thankfully, you might see the big picture from vantage points that often elude you. Don't ignore important details, but remember that you may not be able to micromanage your plan. You could be a fountain of ingenuity today, but try not to go crazy in your desire to be unconventional. Find a way to fit your radical ideas into a practical container.

Your excitement is building yet someone might think you're coming on a bit too strong. It's fine to feel optimistic about the current circumstances, but there is a thin line between cultivating a positive attitude and being in denial. If you are overly enthusiastic about the possibilities, consider the fact that you could be hiding the truth from yourself. Give your plans more time to develop; trust your instincts to know when it's safe to bring them out into the open.

A radical change of direction could be your best strategy today to handle an unexpected outburst from a close friend or partner. You can't control the behavior of others, but at least you can positively impact your immediate future by carefully contemplating your response. Narrow thinking isn't useful now; nitpicking won't bring satisfaction or happiness. Instead, meet someone halfway in order to demonstrate your willingness to keep an open mind.

Your schedule might change dramatically today as simple tasks become mired in details. Your tendency may be to try to do everything as you originally planned, yet it is more efficient to choose what is most critical and focus your attention solely on that now. Don't get overly vested in maintaining the status quo; letting go of control clears the way for something better to enter your life. Paradoxically, your natural grace and flexibility leads to greater stability.

Although your emotional needs may be off the charts now, you still might be able to find satisfaction. The key to your current success lies in the unconventional approach you take to expressing your feelings. Others enjoy your frankness and originality today. In fact, even those who previously opposed your efforts could be converted by your brilliant style, especially if you back your performance up with substance.

Your fantasies could easily overtake reality today if you let them. Your secrets may isolate you from others, so it's critical that you untangle your inner world enough to express your thoughts clearly. If it seems as if someone is undermining your efforts, don't waste time playing the blame game. Instead, search deep within to see what you are hiding from the rest of the world. If you can bring the truth out into the open, then the resistance might dissipate as quickly as it came.

Your friends distract you from your work today, and although you could easily enjoy yourself, it's not wise to let your responsibilities slide. Take time to address your current obligations before slipping out for a long and lazy lunch. Even if you choose to slightly bend a rule or two now, don't bend the truth in order to justify your actions. Pushing the envelope is perfectly acceptable as long as your words don't lose their integrity.

The emotional intensity you are experiencing at work can take a lot out of you now, but the rewards are potentially great. Don't put up obstacles by imagining all the things that might go wrong; instead, jump in with a positive attitude. Keep your eyes on your ultimate destination. If you are unrelenting in your belief of your own success, then you will continue to get closer to reaching it day by day.

You may daydream of escaping a humdrum existence today. Your imaginative wanderings can point you in the right direction and lead you to successfully break out of your current cycle of boredom. Happily, your routines will likely change for the better without a lot of effort on your part. Don't force any issues because you could alienate others with your passionate persuasion now. Instead, just set your course and take the first steps of your journey while the planets are favoring your actions.

You may jump out of bed raring to go today, but your enthusiasm for life fades into weariness as the day progresses. Fortunately, you're able to pull through and do whatever must be done, even if you lack some of your regular vim and vigor. Don't fret about your shortage of energy now. Keep plowing through your work and you will be justly rewarded. Showing up is half the battle.

You're confident enough about your stability now that you can listen to what others are saying without fear of being swept up into their turbulent storms. Even if your emotions are charged with passion today, they are probably well grounded. Don't refrain from sharing your feelings; no matter what you might encounter, you are certainly capable of holding your own position while still meeting someone else halfway.

Although you may have an exciting event on your calendar today, your commitments at work might keep you from your plans. You tend to indulge in your share of social activities; however, consider saving the fun and games for another day, no matter how much you want to pursue pleasure. Ironically, a pragmatic approach to scheduling your time is more satisfying now than a few passing hours of recreation.

Serious feelings about love and romance can dominate your thoughts today. It's not that you're singing the blues; instead, you're oddly empowered by a sense of realism that settles over your life now. You have a clear idea of what you want and a workable plan for obtaining it. On the other hand, it's possible that you're quite satisfied with the dynamics of your current relationships. Either way, don't let other people's expectations pull you away from what you already know to be true. Follow your heart and the rest will fall into place.

Things have started to shift energetically since yesterday and others may not realize how inwardly-directed your thought process is now. You are quite adept at keeping up outer appearances, but you might not reveal how entangled you are with your own feelings. If you are split between your inner and outer worlds, don't be distracted by external events. Trust your intuition to lead you in the right direction.

This is a very emotional time because you have a detailed picture of what you want to convey to someone near and dear to you. However, you are also feeling uncertain of the response you might receive and wonder if it would be wiser and kinder to keep some of your desires to yourself. Although it may seem like an all-or-nothing proposition, you can test the waters by sharing just a little bit at first. Step in the shallow end and then wait until you get a reaction before deciding whether or not to dive in deeper.

You can significantly improve the dynamics of an ongoing conflict with someone at work today by making use of your natural gift for diplomacy. In fact, once you begin a true dialogue, the previous disagreement might suddenly seem like a trivial matter. Thankfully, it's easy to find common ground now because both parties appear more willing to forgive and forget than to squabble over who's right. Just don't sweep a difficult topic under the rug or you might miss out on a very liberating conversation.

Slow and steady is definitely the best course of action as you seek support for your innovative plan today. Unfortunately, you might feel the need to push against whatever resistance you may receive from others. It seems as if now is the time to state your case, but this sense of urgency is an illusion. There's no reason to panic; you have all the tools you need to build solid foundations. Acting with integrity is more important than rushing ahead to prove your point.

You may currently be in the midst of an existential dilemma. Although everything appears to be in order and you believe that the time for taking initiative is now, something is still amiss. You can't shake the feeling that your intended actions seem destined to fail. Timing is everything and you can waste valuable resources pushing against an immovable force if you try to make something happen. Patience is an admirable virtue, but your philosophical outlook could save the day.

Your biggest concern today is trying to determine the best way to reach your goals. Your battle plans have been drawn and you're moving closer and closer toward executing your strategy. However, your sixth sense is telling you to wait a bit longer. You might be more fortunate if you postpone a major move but, in the meantime, do something that solidifies your intentions. Small, steady actions today greatly improve your chances for long-term success.

You are in a unique position to make the most of your current situation at work, but you must step up to the plate and take the initiative. Nevertheless, you wonder if you can make the first move without upsetting your coworkers with your bold behavior. You don't want to appear like you're making a power play, since your overly ambitious nature could inadvertently offend others today. Explain your motives in detail to gain trust from your peers. If your presentation is successful, they might even want to be a part of your plan.

You intuitively sense that the wild roller coaster ride of life is finally beginning to slow down, even if you still feel on an emotional edge today. You can't just jump off yet, but you can see an escape route out of a difficult situation that has pushed and pulled you long enough. Don't worry if you have to give up something in the negotiation process to get what you want. Make sure you have your priorities in order and be crystal clear when sharing them with others. Your transparency allows those closest to you to understand your true intentions.

Positive feelings linger as if you're under a magic spell, and yet you realize your optimism can't last forever. Your return to earth might be abrupt if your self-confidence begins to wane. You may think letting others know what's on your mind will fix your problems, but sharing too much creates more trouble than it solves. Discretion is advised today or you could needlessly hurt the feelings of someone you like. If you can't say something nice, don't say anything at all.
