You feel like being on your own today, but there may be too many demands on your time to completely withdraw. Unfortunately, satisfaction is elusive regardless of your schedule. If you are home alone, you can't keep your mind off everything you want to do. And if you are out with friends or family, you just long for some peace and quiet. In any event, don't fall into the trap of blaming your dissatisfaction on anyone else. Graciously accepting the current circumstances frees you up to enjoy yourself in ways you can't yet imagine.

Close friends may be the source of your dilemma du jour, especially if they have an obvious agenda that differs from yours. Social activities can play an important role in the upcoming weekend, but you might grow bored with the agreed-upon schedule. Don't get roped into doing anything you cannot easily change. Staying aware of your ever-changing needs helps prevent awkward tension from developing later on. Treat others with the same respect you would want in return.

Rather than taking charge for any sort of group activity today, you would prefer that everyone shares in the responsibilities. You really don't have much patience now, and everything seem to take longer than it should. Although you may feel the need to enthusiastically hurry others along, take a radical approach and slow down your pace, instead. You may be surprised at how well it works out if you let go of your expectations and simply go along with the flow.

You are so eager for a vacation now you can already visualize every aspect to it. Unfortunately, your schedule might prohibit you from taking an extended trip; luckily, a quick weekend getaway should be enough to alleviate the pressure. Don't worry if you haven't made any concrete plans yet. Even a spontaneous day trip could be exactly what you need to recharge your batteries and get your motor running.

A dramatically different approach to how you handle conflict with a partner might be enough to alter a difficult relationship dynamic. But don't expect to suddenly make any gains now without some sort of uncomfortable confrontation. Opening your heart is the first step to demonstrating your trust. Once you put your feelings out into the open, others will be able to engage authentically and this can make all the difference in the world.

An interpersonal conflict that's been quietly brewing for several days might suddenly explode on to the scene today. Even if you believe you have an airtight case, keep in mind that someone else might think the exact same thing. Luckily, reality can support multiple points of view, so don't turn this into a fight to the finish. Instead, cultivate harmony by discovering a solution that allows everyone to be a winner.

Finding new ways to do the same old things brightens your day with much-needed fun and excitement. But just because you have an inventive idea doesn't mean you can turn it into reality overnight. Rather than trying to take on too much and change everything at once, just make a minor modification to your routine and see where it leads. A small adjustment has a greater positive impact than you realize.

Although you want to play today, someone's unspoken agenda can still pull on your heartstrings, making it nearly impossible to just go off and have fun. If you choose to ignore other people's feelings, you might end up feeling so guilty that you can't enjoy yourself. Don't be in such a hurry to escape an awkward situation. Lending a supportive shoulder gives you the opportunity to be the kind of friend you would want to have in your corner.

Staying at home today may not be as relaxing as you wish since the day is chock full of distractions, no matter what you do. Even if you try to block out all the noise, you still might be pulled into the day's events, so why fight it? By involving yourself voluntarily, you will end up feeling more connected to everyone around you. You can manage your time more successfully and ultimately feel better about yourself by simply taking a proactive approach.

Your day may seem like one little personal crisis after another if you try to spend it in solitude; others will likely be more involved with your business than you wish. But even if you are left alone for a while, you won't be able to completely relax now, for there are work-related tasks to do and errands to run. Although you believe you know what's best for you today, practicing flexibility encourages others to cooperate with your plans. Going along with the crowd has its rewards if you're willing to be a team player.

A bit of retail therapy might elevate your mood today, but this temporary improvement is merely a symptom of a deeper issue. Your values are changing and you're eager to surround yourself with material objects that reflect your new outlook on life. Be honest with yourself and acknowledge your impulse to spend money; however, avoid future regret by making certain that your purchases are more practical than frivolous. Money can't buy you love.

You are so set on achieving your goals today that you might not even slow down if someone purposefully obstructs your progress. Unfortunately, direct confrontation isn't the best way to respond to resistance. Although you may be obsessive about your desires now, it makes more sense to take it easy while you come up with a plan of attack. Instead of depleting your energy by pushing the river, relax now while you have the chance.

Your stubborn behavior could serve you well if you're traveling on your desired course, but it can land you in big trouble if you've wandered off track. Nevertheless, you might need a little help from your friends to steer you in the right direction, even if you believe you already know the best way. Don't resist sensible advice from a trustworthy colleague; remain open to all the good ideas you hear. You may receive the most valuable pearls of wisdom from a totally unexpected source.

You may feel awkwardly restrained by circumstances beyond your control today, since you don't have much leeway to express your creativity. You're being challenged to limit your thinking to fit your ideas into the constraints of the day. Even if it seems as if others are putting you in a box, focusing your attention on a narrow spectrum of possibilities now might help you be more effective than you ever imagined.

Someone could get on your nerves today if he or she has an itinerary that doesn't necessarily match up with your own. You quickly lose your cool when others just assume that you will put your agenda on the back burner to assist their cause. Although you may choose to bury your true feelings and be a team player, this tactic won't bring satisfaction in the long run. Common sense rules now, so support the best plan no matter who thought of it first.

Holding on to unresolved feelings can complicate relationship dynamics today. In the big scheme of things you know that it's best to adapt to change and just move on, but clinging to the past might be your way of maintaining some semblance of control now. It's healthier to acknowledge your emotions without obsessing about them. Ironically, adopting a more philosophical attitude puts you back in the driver's seat before you know it.

You might be dreaming about a spiritual journey that's for your steps alone. Even if you're exploring ways to reclaim your power, current circumstances may not support your plan at first. But don't attempt to manipulate others to act in your favor. Your strength returns naturally as you rediscover your metaphysical center of gravity. Realign with your core values and exhibit the highest integrity possible in all that you do.

You might be annoyed with yourself now if you didn't already let someone know exactly how you're feeling. Thankfully, you can gain clarity in a way that previously eluded you. Don't question your analytical capabilities even if you find it difficult to integrate all the data at your fingertips. Plotting your next move is a waste of energy today; staying in the present moment and observing your emotions has the most  positive impact on your future.

You may be in a position now to receive emotional support that's long overdue. Don't try to sidestep change, whether or not others come forward to offer personal assistance today. Although you could feel pressure to perform, it still seems as if your world is becoming a friendlier place. You might need to delay handling an unresolved relationship issue, but there's no reason to continue worrying about it. Instead, concentrate on keeping your balance as the big waves of transformation wash through your life.

It hasn't been all that easy to fully relax lately because so many different avenues seem to lead to fun and adventure. You are relieved that your schedule isn't as hectic today because there may be a few serious issues that need your undivided attention. Unfortunately, you might be missing some relevant information, but you're willing to dig around for it. Nevertheless, everyone -- including you -- requires a bit of downtime, so accept any peace and quiet as a gift from the cosmos. Counting your blessings is a wonderful way to remember what's most important.

You might be feeling content now that both feet are firmly planted on stable ground. However, you are already wondering when to take your next step and exactly where you're going. Although you may be experiencing a bout of uncharacteristic self-doubt today, it won't last long if you are committed to your goals. Nevertheless, you can sink into your emotions while the Moon travels through your sign. You can't afford to get lazy; do your planning right away instead of waiting until you're in the middle of the next storm.

Trusting your mind over relying on your heart is often appropriate when making decisions; however, the tables are turning now. You're drawn to the idea of intimacy and may be willing to overlook the facts for an opportunity to intensify a relationship. You've been thinking about pushing past your resistance for a while, but powerful emotions can still leave you feeling uncomfortable. Remember, although you aren't required to share you secrets all at once, there's no time like the present moment to start turning fantasies into reality.

It's wise to involve others in your planning process today, since group participation makes your day more enjoyable and efficient at the same time. Don't allow old fears of failure to sabotage your current dreams by filling you with doubt before you even start. Your friends and coworkers may enter the picture with important keys to your future, and if you don't welcome their presence with open arms, you'll never know what might be possible. Have faith; anything can happen.

Your self-doubt makes it tough to stay positive today as you consider your place in the world. You might grow annoyed if everything doesn't go your way now that the ambitious Capricorn Full Moon rattles your 10th House of Responsibility. The good news is that you can be close to people who have goals that are very different from yours. Reconsidering your assumptions is healthy as long as you don't mistrust your own logic, even if your choices are not what others expect.

Your current caution may be justifiable today because it's crucial to send the right message when you finally reveal what's on your mind. But hesitating too long isn't a good idea or you might miss your chance to influence the thinking of those around you. The calculating Capricorn Full Moon stirs your 9th House of Adventure, conjuring up dreams of exotic travel. However, keep in mind that your plans will continue to evolve. Nevertheless, the sooner you start engineering your future, the better.

Saying yes to friends could be a really smart move today if you don't inflate your expectations so high that you end up being disappointed. Meanwhile, chatty Mercury and charming Venus are in your fickle sign, making it easy to skirt around uncomfortable subjects. Thankfully, the dutiful Capricorn Full Moon brightens your 8th House of Deep Sharing, requiring you to overcome your resistance and tackle a difficult issue. Choose your topic carefully; consider all the consequences before attempting to reach for the stars. The best relationships are built on a foundation of give and take.

Interpersonal dynamics may be stretched to the breaking point as today's Capricorn Full Moon intensifies your 7th House of Companions. Unfortunately, your emotions aren't as rational as you think, so don't assume that a current disagreement is troublesome unless you know all the details. Your satisfaction isn't as dependent on the reactions of others as you might believe. Create a safe haven within your own mind, where your feelings are determined more by your attitude than by events in the outer world. Meaningful conversations are possible when you come from a place of love.

You have lots to complete before you can begin the more relaxing part of the weekend -- and the quicker you jump into your chores, the sooner you finish them. Nevertheless, the conscientious Capricorn Full Moon lands in your 6th House of Details, suggesting that you should focus on the little things rather than on the bigger picture. Wrap up all the loose ends first; then you will feel guilt free about moving on to something that is more fun.

You could be on such a tight schedule that it's challenging to get in touch with your creativity. Thankfully, your busyness works in your favor now because your overall efficiency is at its peak when you don't have time to get lost in your thoughts. Today's Capricorn Full Moon activates your 5th House of Self-Expression, inspiring you to follow your heart. Don't take everything so seriously; enjoying your journey enables you to remain connected to your muse, even when you're focusing on the mundane tasks at hand. Whistle while you work.

You are driven to push past the surface and get to the bottom of a complex situation as today's determined Capricorn Full Moon illuminates your 4th House of Roots. You might be too unsettled to share your fears with anyone else, but you could discover that the situation changes for the better once you shine the light of awareness onto your concerns. Don't delay; a significant discussion now may shift your perspective in a positive direction faster than you can imagine. Confession is good for the soul.

You are acutely aware of how your feelings affect your attempts to be objective. You may believe that you're considering all the facts, yet you still might fall prey to your illusion of reality instead of accepting the actual truth. Fortunately, today's earthy Capricorn Full Moon lights up your 3rd House of Communication, prompting you to tell everyone what you need. But steer away from idle chatter or trivial discussions. Don't suffer any fools; cut to the chase and maintain your integrity at all costs.

Spending money frivolously now is not wise because the serious Capricorn Full Moon floods your 2nd House of Possessions with heightened subjectivity. You could develop an emotional attachment to nearly any object that is currently on your radar. A purchase today may be based less on logic and more on a whim. Avoid buyer's remorse by waiting a few days before acquiring something you really don't need. Re-evaluate your priorities and create a sensible budget that can carry you these tricky times.

You may feel anxious today if you get caught up in a drama that you would normally avoid. Today's Full Moon in your pragmatic sign symbolizes an existential crisis as your emotions collide with your ambitions. Your desire to succeed is formidable now, making it nearly impossible to establish a clear perspective on what you want. Don't make any demands on others until you can objectively clarify what you truly need. In the meantime, explore your feelings and figure out where you want to go.

Shaking off a confusing dream is difficult today, even after you are fully awake, because the Capricorn Moon disturbs your 12th House of Soul Consciousness. However, forgetting your vision is futile now, so contemplate the message that's being sent from your subconscious, instead. Don't be concerned if it eludes logic; simply replaying the images in your mind can be enough to alter your perspective. Your imagination holds the keys to the buried treasures within.

You truly appreciate having supportive friends on your side and you're eager to express your gratitude. The ambitious Capricorn Full Moon shines in your 11th House of Social Networking, encouraging you to connect with others who share your values. Nevertheless, there's so much going on in your head now that you just want to be left alone with your own thoughts. Even if your calendar is already booked, find a way to create a bit of quiet time to indulge in the peace of solitude.

You're so popular with your friends that it might be a challenge to find time to be by yourself today. You may be swept up in a series of events where you lose your individuality, becoming just another face in the crowd and feeling lost in the group process. The bottom line is that the more you participate and express your opinions now, the better the outcome. You have something special to offer and others are counting on you to show up and put your best foot forward.

Although your drive to establish your role in the community is unstoppable now, you may still be confused as to the best way to proceed. You want to share your feelings with others, but you can also choose to remain quiet if it seems like the timing is wrong. Unfortunately, postponing communication cuts you off emotionally from those closest to you. Meanwhile, someone might draw you in with their persuasive charm and you could end up spilling the beans, anyway. Balancing the desires of your heart with the logic of your head keeps you moving in the right direction.

You're looking ahead with a smile on your face as the potential for pleasure continues to swirl around you. Even if you want to be practical with your plans, you still might be caught up in your need for adventure now. Although you may want to jump in with both feet, it's smarter to proceed slowly with both eyes wide open. Until you honestly re-evaluate your current position and share it with others, you won't be free to move into the future.

You might feel an odd sensation in your gut today as you stop to get in touch with your intuitive self. It's as if you were issued a private invitation to the unveiling of a cosmic mystery. However, you may not be able to settle comfortably into your emotions because mental Mercury just entered your sign, prompting you to over analyze your feelings. Don't say anything about your inner process until you're ready; the issues could resolve on their own with just a few days of constructive contemplation.

Someone may encourage you to step up and push past your comfort zone today. You are expected to consider the needs of others and not just concentrate on your own desires. However, there's a part of you that just isn't buying the story, no matter how good it sounds. Suspend your disbelief and trust the process for now. Don't question everyone's motives; be a team player this time around and, surprisingly, everything might work out for the good of all.

You could be worried about falling into a rut with your regular weekend regimen and can't help but feel like you need more independence. Part of the problem is that you don't want to act inconsiderately while making changes. You certainly have no intention to hurt anyone's feelings as you pull back from your domestic responsibilities. In the meantime, maintain the status quo for now; the time for shaking things up will come soon enough.

No matter how busy you are today, you're still inclined to take some time off to play as assertive Mars in your sign harmonizes with flirty Venus. Understandably, you're more eager to experience spontaneous fun now than you are interested in fulfilling your obligations. Nevertheless, allow plenty of time for meeting your prior commitments before making a beeline for the exit. Adopting a conservative approach to your responsibilities early in the day means you get to be even more creative later on in your pursuit of pleasure.

You may feel a strong connection with humanitarian and environmental issues that compulsively drives you to take action now. You're motivated to change the rules so the current social conditions are more supportive of your goals, but others are not moving as quickly as you wish. Remember to focus on the long haul and not only on what you can accomplish today. Don't give up hope just because you might feel overwhelmed or disenfranchised. Patience and  faith are instrumental ingredients in creating a gradual yet permanent shift.

You could be so annoyed with a situation in your immediate environment that you decide to change it for the better. You believe a solution can be found, even if it's not fully implemented today. Unfortunately, your penchant for change might run into resistance since others are vested in the status quo. Nevertheless, your own personal happiness may be linked to releasing them from their outmoded beliefs. Let your natural optimism rise to the surface and communicate the truth as you see it.

There are signs all around you now reminding you to conserve your energy, but you have to pay close attention to notice them. You're receiving concrete messages about the purpose of your life, but may have problems integrating the vision into your real world. Your values could clash with what you must do, but today isn't the best day for radical action, anyhow. Use this time for quiet contemplation, but prepare to shift into high gear over the next couple of weeks.

Staying on course is challenging now that the changeable Moon is back in your sign. Sweet and shiny distractions lure you one way, and then another. Make the most of this emotionally tumultuous time by creating something special within the realms of your vivid imagination. Then, consciously and deliberately project your inner world onto the outer circumstances. Don't suppress your dreams; letting them out of the closet will surely bring more excitement to your day and add rich inspiration to your life.

Swimming in the deep waters of your own imagination can be a luxurious and refreshing experience. However, it's critical to understand that an inner symbolic journey might trigger a deep longing for meaning that cannot be easily found in the outer world. This could be a bit discouraging now unless you consciously stay grounded in reality. Luckily, turning negativity into a positive force is possible by feeling the same gentle compassion for yourself that you have for others.

You're not very motivated today and you might try to slide by without putting out a lot of effort. The social aspects of your job may be more important now than what you actually accomplish. But even if you don't have to go to work, getting out of the house is a smart idea, for it can take your mind off tedious domestic responsibilities and confusing relationship dynamics. Just remember that you can't escape from reality; it will still be waiting for you when you return. Enjoy the reprieve while you have the chance.

Attacking an old problem in a different way can help to break unhealthy patterns of co-dependency. It's important to come through for those you love, yet you are more apt to work harder when you don't feel uncomfortable pressure from their unreasonable demands. Instead of trying to make nice, let others know that you need to take some time for yourself today. Everyone will appreciate your wisdom when you return with a new and improved attitude.

Your need for freedom can express itself in a variety of ways, but this may not be an auspicious time to hop on an airplane and take a trip. Keep in mind the duality of the current situation; not only are you thinking about going somewhere else, you're also escaping from something restrictive. Consciously shift your focus so you can clearly see what has held you back from following your dreams. Planning your future is exciting once you acknowledge what you're trying to leave behind in your past.

Your desire for intimacy might sound better in theory now than it turns out in reality, since your emotional needs don't necessarily translate easily into language. Remember, with thoughtful Mercury in your cautious sign until the end of the month, it may take additional time to be able to put your feelings into words. Don't try to push this process too fast or you may have to start all over again sooner than you think.

Try not to take it too personally if your partner seems emotionally remote today, especially since his or her issues might not even be about you. Nevertheless, the negative energy still could be aimed in your direction. Instead of withdrawing in a passive-aggressive manner or denying the distance between you and others, consciously give everyone the space they need. Rather than hastily attempting to fix things in your outer world, manage what's on your plate by addressing your own attitude first.

Doing the same old thing in the same old way isn't working for you now, making it crucial to break out of any patterns that have already served their purpose. However, part of your bigger problem is in the difficulty you have distinguishing what you call being in a groove from being stuck in a rut. Don't let your insecurities about the past keep you needlessly attached to it for too long. The time for positive change is now.

You may be eager for the chance to express your needs clearly in a romantic relationship today with the Moon in your 5th House of Love. However, make sure the other person understands that just because you are asking for additional personal space, you're not necessarily looking for an easy way out. In fact, the extra breathing room might be just what you need now so you can spend time in creative pursuits. Your inner joy rekindles another spark of attraction in the near future; after all, absence often makes the heart grow fonder.

Although you have spent a lot of time mucking about in your feelings recently, you might be ready to bolt as the reality of the current situation dawns on you today. But don't move too fast because there are still intriguing opportunities that you haven't yet explored. Your overall conclusions may be right on target, but don't assume that you know the best way to react. Continue to reassess all your options very carefully; thankfully, more clarity is on the horizon.

The day's events might not cooperate by falling in line with your planned agenda today, but divergence only becomes problematic if you are overly concerned about exercising your authority. In fact, you can enter into a futile struggle if you really think you must demonstrate to the world that you're in charge. There are circumstances beyond your control, so stop fighting the inevitable. A healthy dose of flexibility can save the day.

Oddly enough, you might feel safe and secure with your current sense of isolation, but you don't particularly appreciate having less than you want. It may not seem all that strange today to begin an austerity program with respect to money, love, and other pleasures -- but you need to know why you're doing it and what the payoff will be later. Acknowledge your frustrations, but wait a while longer before taking any drastic action. Thankfully, practicing a little self-discipline goes a long way to turn things in a positive direction.

You're at the top of your eccentricity cycle and are eager to demonstrate your unorthodox tendencies now. The Moon delivers a powerful emotional whammy, reactivating your concerns about what happens if you manifest your dreams. Once you acknowledge that your feelings might be bent out of shape, it's easier to justify inaction. Remember, there's no need to express every mood swing with the same intensity as you experience it. Your originality speaks for itself.

It's wise to build your strategy around flying beneath the radar and being as productive as possible today. Although you're naturally in touch with your wide world of dreams, it might not be such a good idea to indiscriminately share your inner process with anyone else yet. In the meantime, treat your fantasies with tender love and care, for they contain the hidden treasures that only you can discover.

You might feel a bit emotionally deflated today, especially if you see something you truly want yet know you cannot have. You could even grow annoyed with yourself for falling victim to your own unrealistic expectations. Thankfully, your frown can transform into a smile once you understand that you are the source of your own discontent now. The truth may not be what you wished for, but it still has the power to set you free.

You are on your best behavior today, but still could land in trouble if you assume that you can fix everything that is broken. It's tempting to overestimate the positive results of your actions now. You appreciate a new opportunity, but may become frustrated if it disappears as suddenly as it arrived. Even so, there's no reason for discouragement to come between you and promising prospects. Don't resist; allow your irrepressible dreams to pull you toward success.

You can't justify starting so many unrelated projects now, since your current responsibilities require that you follow one specific task through to completion. Naturally, you're feeling very restless and are inclined to jump from one activity to the next. However, don't attempt to beat the system and move on too soon; ironically, narrowing your focus onto a single goal can actually open new avenues for exploration.

You want nothing more than to live in a free-spirited world of sunshine and flowers today, but reality can't live up to your fantastic expectations. Unfortunately, the Moon's presence in your 9th House of Big Ideas isn't very helpful if you have more practical issues on your plate. Set aside a bit of time for aimless daydreaming, but then let your inspiration guide you gently back to earth.

You could have an amazing vision today, and by exercising patience and follow-through you might even be able to produce something special. Even if you're not Mozart or Picasso, a lack of artistic skills need not stand in your way. Although you want your talent to be appreciated, it's more important now to express your creativity whether or not anyone else notices your work. Remember, it's currently more about the process rather than the end results.

You can drive yourself nuts today if you try to focus your attention on answering one single question. Unfortunately, the more you narrow your concentration now, the more your mind escapes the confines of the current situation. The problem is that forced logic morphs into fuzzy thinking. Instead of looking at the dilemma from an objective point of view, just visualize the desired outcome and start off in that direction.

You are eager to share your inspirational ideas at work today, but they might not be quite ready for an unforgiving audience yet. It's like a dream that makes perfect sense in your head until you start to tell it to someone else -- and then it quickly fades back into the shadows. Paradoxically, even your most concrete plan begins to shift as you elaborate on the details. Skip the lengthy explanation for now; you can always bring others up to date in a day or two when they're more receptive.

You don't want to waste your time discussing trivial subjects today but ironically, it seems that you're unable to avoid it. You would rather place the endless stream of words on hold in order to intensify a current emotional dynamic. But you may have to engage in superficial conversations just to make it through the workday. It's not an either/or situation; you can still make time to explore more meaningful topics later with someone you trust. A little friendly banter never hurt anyone.

You're on an emotional high while planning for an upcoming journey, yet a quiet uncertainty is beginning to take root and you don't understand why. Concerns about your family or your own personal security may prevent you from traveling anywhere now. Happily, you can go somewhere magical without even leaving home. The advantage of a mental excursion is that no one has to know that you are gone. You can explore the far reaches of the universe in your imagination and still return in the blink of an eye to answer your phone.

You're not averse to wandering around in the fertile fields of your imagination today; however, you start to feel anxious if you go too far in the process. You may struggle if there's no apparent way to return to solid ground, but your fear is the only thing standing in your way. Avoid stress by consciously staying connected with your work even while you're daydreaming. Be creative, but don't fly so high that you get lost in the clouds.

It might feel as if you're losing touch with reality today, but your perception is only an illusion. People can't see your inner mental process, so they don't realize that you're struggling to keep it real; actually, your thoughts are quite pragmatic now. You can take advantage of this temporary confusion as long as you don't appear threatening to anyone. Be assertive and push for what you want. You may be pleasantly surprised at the results if you stay within your limits.

You are quite facile at shifting metaphysical gears today and slipping in and out of the real world so fast that no one even notices your absence. Even serious responsibilities won't stop you from indulging in your mini-escapes to other realms now. But instead of trying to squeeze your daydreaming into short moments here and there, consider scheduling a block of time for your metaphysical adventures. Stretching your mind into other dimensions is healthy as long as you also deliver on your promises.

Your intuition is sending you images today faster than you can decipher them. Your cosmic antennae are tuned into your imagination, but you're driven by your desire to turn your dreams into reality. Although generous Jupiter occupies your 5th House of Self-Expression for a whole year, there's still no time to waste. Swing into action now; determine the best way to ride the wave of your inspiration as far as it will take you. Let your inner child out to play.

It's easier to express your needs to your friends or associates now than it is to your partner or lover. You may be a bit confused because you're not sure whether to talk openly about your feelings or if it's smarter to keep them to yourself. Although you might be out of sorts today, uplifting Jupiter sails into your 4th House of Security, reminding you to stay in touch with your emotions even if it makes you a bit uncomfortable. Take a calculated risk and share what's in your heart with the people that matter the most.

You feel like a ping-pong ball as you bounce back and forth between two points of view today: the most comprehensively inclusive and the most specifically limited. On one hand, your imagination soars and you can see everything from a global perspective. On the other hand, it's not always easy to act on idealistic visions. Make the best use of visionary Jupiter's move into your 3rd House of Immediate Environment by thinking globally yet acting locally. Exhibit your spirit of generosity everywhere you go.

Although you can often appear as if you are resisting change, you are more highly adaptable than others may realize. After all, you Crabs are wired to flow with the ever-changing tides. But now, as opportunistic Jupiter leaves your sign, the emotional currents are shifting and it might be nearly impossible to tell which way the waters will ultimately be flowing. Acknowledging that you don't yet know where you stand in the new scheme of things alleviates the pressure. Hold tight to your current position for a few days before reconsidering your direction and setting a new course.

Your life receives a cosmic booster shot as prosperous Jupiter sets up shop in your sign for a one-year visit. Jupiter tends to make things bigger and better, but too much of anything isn't necessarily beneficial. You are standing at the threshold of a new cycle of growth and opportunity where anything can happen. Think in terms of your long-term goals and begin to move toward them with confidence while the planet of good fortune is in your corner.

Your spiritual and metaphysical interests can take on greater importance these days as philosophical Jupiter makes itself at home in your 12th House of Other Dimensions. Things are beginning to shift, but their long-term effects won't be immediately visible. There are dynamic changes heading your way, but they may unfold in the hidden realms of the subconscious. Let go of your reliance on rational analysis in order to gain the most personal growth from the year ahead.

You Libras know a thing or two about balancing the complexities of life, especially when it feels like an uphill battle. You can probably sense the scales tipping away from fulfilling your own needs now that Jupiter's shift into your 11th House of Social Networking favors taking care of everyone else first. But this isn't a new story for you; it's just the next chapter in your book. Keep your energy grounded if you want to avoid crashing into the side of the mountain you are climbing. Don't let your drive to help others stand in the way of your own success.

Even if you have recently been uncertain about where you are going in your current career, the future starts to make more sense. Your role in the outer world is more important than ever now that Jupiter is gracing your 10th House of Career, requiring you to make your work top priority. But, simultaneously, you also wonder if you should shift directions and place more attention on the inner dimensions of your soul. It's challenging to know where to apply your energy. There are no fast and easy answers; the dilemma remains a complex puzzle to be solved over time.

Your dilemma today is like a familiar old friend who comes to visit you from time to time. The visionary Sagittarian can't help but be attracted to the most grandiose plans. You want to live your life in the largest way possible now, yet unattended details may be coming back to haunt you with your key planet Jupiter journeying through your 9th House of Big Ideas. Don't let your exploration of the outer edges of reality carry you so far from home that you can't find your way back. Balance your penchant for adventure with a dash of common sense.

You may be pulled into the realm of relationships, but you must figure out how to keep both feet on the ground no matter what happens next. Jupiter's visit to your 8th House of Intimacy presents you with complicated emotional issues. Strive to maintain clarity in all your interactions, for it's possible to misunderstand someone's basic values if you make unsubstantiated assumptions. Personal growth is much more likely if you're willing to open your mind and share your heart.

Intimate relationships are a significant source of fulfillment now that benevolent Jupiter has set up camp in your 7th House of Companions. Actively listening to what the other person is saying takes extra concentration because words can actually get in the way of the message. And you certainly won't help the situation by pushing your perspective onto anyone else. Consciously allowing multiple points of view to exist side by side might be enough to dissipate tensions and cultivate trust.

There are unrelenting demands being placed on your shoulders and you may be richly rewarded if you respond to them dutifully now that auspicious Jupiter is calling the shots in your 6th House of Daily Routine. Meeting your obligations in a timely manner requires consistent effort as you check off the items on your to-do list one at a time. Unfortunately, you could find it tricky to maintain such a high level of concentration because your imagination is a master of temptation. Take care of your responsibilities first so you can wander in your dreams with a free conscience later on.

Although you can charge forward into the unknown today, it's smarter to consider your options before you find yourself in over your head. Your natural way of overcoming fear is to rush into a situation as soon as you feel the adrenaline building. However, the Moon's shift into your sign puts you in an uncharacteristically sensitive mood, making you more aware of any potential problems. Thankfully, you're adept at thinking on your feet, but a bit of forethought is still advised for the best possible outcome.

You're so energetic today that you think you must hide your excitement or you could upset the delicate balance that's holding everything together. Unfortunately, denying your feelings only increases the intensity of everyone's emotions, rather than alleviating it. A total lack of self-restraint exacerbates a problem, but your options are not limited to an all or nothing response. Be cautious; revealing your feelings gradually prevents others from being overwhelmed by your enthusiasm.

You prefer your friends to be open and honest when they tell you what they need from you today. But simultaneously, you are afraid that their words are masking unexpressed feelings. You might even be tempted to act foolishly if you try to expose someone's hidden agenda. Nevertheless, there's no reason to force an issue now because the truth will become apparent on its own. Your interference might only make matters worse so let others share their secrets when they're ready.

Your desire for everyone to observe your courage in action today motivates you to bury your feelings and push beyond your usual limitations. Your current satisfaction is dependent on your public image, leading you to hide your anxiety so effectively that others think that you are fearless now. However, there is no need to trick anyone into believing that you're a superhero. Just quietly do your very best, and the results will speak for themselves.

You are super-excited about all the possibilities for growth and adventure today, yet you are also aware that you must make sacrifices to accomplish your goals. Thankfully, you're not concerned about anything that could get in the way of your success now. In fact, you might be so confident that you assume you can overcome all obstacles that crop up. Improve your chances by creating a practical plan and following it through to completion. Temper your passion for life with a healthy dose of humility.

You face an uphill battle now as you try to figure out why your recent plan went wrong. You may be struggling to unravel the complex factors playing out in the present moment, but it's apparent that you must make a mid-course correction or you won't reach your destination. Nevertheless, it's not wise to make changes too quickly. Overreacting is even less constructive than doing nothing at all. Don't waste time looking back to uncover your mistakes; instead, look ahead and plan for your future success.

A conflict in a relationship creates additional stress today, especially if someone rebels against your plan for no apparent reason. A close friend or partner might surprise you by unexpectedly expressing a position that is radically different from yours. Although you may choose not to argue, just letting others do what they want isn't in your best interest either. Confronting small problems directly prevents them from growing into major ones later on.

You are not satisfied by just doing good work today; you want others to acknowledge your brilliant contributions as well. Attacking an old project in a new and different way isn't enough of a diversion to hide your insecurity. But there's no need to put so much effort into seeking recognition, especially if your current desire for the spotlight allows you to forget that your initial purpose was to get the job done. Creating a detailed plan can be quite helpful, but micro managing every element might get in the way of your productivity.

It's nearly impossible to contain your exuberant self-expression today now that the enterprising Aries Moon is striking up the band in your 5th House of Spontaneity. However, your creative excitement may be too much to handle for those around you. Being less demonstrative is not a sensible solution, but it helps to give others time to show off their talents, too. Encouraging friends and co-workers to embark on an adventure with you might be more rewarding than just standing on the stage alone.

You may be stepping into unfamiliar territory today as you struggle to balance your desire to be with those you love with your need to withdraw into your own world. Fortunately, you can play both extremes now. Keep your heart open while also mindfully setting boundaries and respecting the wishes of others. It doesn't matter if you're feeling uncomfortable because it's at these awkward spots that the real magic happens.

You are an intense bundle of erratic thoughts today as familiar ideas combine to create new and ingenious plans. Luckily, you can showcase your talents without much effort, dazzling others with your brilliance. However, there is a huge difference between an adequate job and an awesome one. Putting extra time into your preparation pays off now, so don't take any unnecessary shortcuts just to impress anyone else. Your good intentions don't mean all that much unless you follow through with decisive action.

It's scary to progress ahead so fast that you must scramble your way back to safe ground. There's no need to throw out your sensible plans now just because you momentarily lose track of where you're going. Risk-taking isn't necessary now; just slow down to a sustainable pace. Stick to your current path; don't let the increasing pressure trick you into reacting impulsively.

Your dreams have grown so vivid that you want to tell everyone about them as soon as you wake up. Nevertheless, it may be wise to keep quiet today. There's nothing wrong with expressing what's on your mind or in your heart, but it's smart to wait for the best time. Remember, other people have stories they want to share, too, and your life could be enriched by hearing them. Practicing patience now strengthens your character and gives you a special opportunity to shine the spotlight on someone else.

You may believe that you know exactly what you want today, and are tempted to share your thoughts in great detail. You're just expressing your opinion, but others won't be able to hear your message if they think you're overstating your position. It's better to keep your words to a minimum now. You will have time later on to further expound on your ideas once the energy settles down and your audience is more willing to listen.

Your co-workers might seem a bit emotionally detached today, but they are likely to support your current efforts anyway. Nevertheless, you're not seeking comfort from them now; you want decisive action. You would currently prefer someone to just do anything, rather than idly talking about their plans. Plenty of words have already been spoken and it's time to push ahead. Don't wait for anyone else to make the first move; lead by example, instead.

You are determined to show your boss and your coworkers that you can take charge today, for it seems like lately they have drawn a different conclusion. Remember, you don't have to prove yourself to anyone. All you need to do is acknowledge what happens as you push past your self-doubt and do whatever needs to be done. Unfortunately, you are capable of being the biggest obstacle to your own success. Get out of your way and allow your intuition to safely guide you toward your future.

You're sorely tempted to continue on your current mission without stopping to notice the details that might prevent you from being successful. However, it's not productive to get so entangled in fine-tuning your strategy that you end up doing nothing at all. Initiating action is more effective today if you don't blindly bolt ahead too fast. It makes more sense to simply sustain your efforts than to run around in circles. Taking time to do something right the first time is better than having to redo it later on.

You may be so excited about starting something new today that you grow anxious unless you're busy every moment. This nervous impatience isn't your normal style, but could be your natural way of overcompensating for the current uncertainty. Talk with your friends about any discomfort you're experiencing since acknowledging your ambition might help to alleviate your stress. But nothing positive is gained by totally reversing your methodical approach; gradual change is more likely to last.

Even a casual conversation with a friend might feel like a disagreement today, although your desires don't necessarily conflict with one another. More likely, your tactics simply vary because of your individual creative styles. Instead of trying to agree on one correct way to accomplish your current goal, recognize the advantages of both strategies. It's more productive now to be inclusive than to be right.

You don't want to be at odds with anyone, but might grow hot tempered now that the evocative Moon is stirring things up in feisty Aries. Nevertheless, you are likely wise enough to keep your emotions in check anyhow. Redirecting your pent-up energy into your work or channeling your angst into physical exercise helps you release the additional stress today. Although it's crucial to honor your feelings, it's still up to you to decide how and when to express them.

Don't worry if you can't rationalize your optimism today, for your positive attitude doesn't necessarily correspond to anything specific occurring in your life. Nevertheless, your thoughts have more power than usual, enabling you to impact your future by changing your attitude. Just be careful that you aren't avoiding an issue that must be faced sooner than later. Taking control of your life is a smart idea as long as you aren't trying to run from the truth.

You may be entangled in the stresses of everyday life as you wonder how much to share about your ambitions. You can't help but worry that verbalizing your intentions will dissipate the energy and diminish your motivation. Nevertheless, you still want everyone to know what's important to you now. Pushing ahead without an explanation can be confusing to others, so take the time to make sure that your closest friends are kept in the loop.

Although you can feel the pressure starting to build, you're still optimistic today as you navigate the changes at work. But it's crucial to pay attention to any unexpressed negativity that might be lurking in the shadows, even if you think you have everything under control. Unfortunately, keeping secrets now only adds to your troubles later. Consider taking someone into your confidence, because getting another perspective casts everything in a brand new light.

Swinging into action today might produce the positive impact that you seek, but you first must convince yourself that you are ready for this moment. You have inertia to overcome, and the longer you do nothing, the harder it is to get going. Your time is now; step up to the plate and show everyone what you can do. Trust your intuition and don't let the opportunity pass you by without making a concerted effort to hit a home run.

You feel as if you're being pushed to defend your position today as your key planet Mars squares off with the willful Sun. Simultaneously, you are being cosmically coaxed to seek softer styles of expression. You might attempt to balance these opposite responses now, but without conscious intervention warrior Mars could win out. It's more important than ever to temper your sense of urgency with a kinder and gentler approach. Make love not war.

You may choose to disobey the rules today, but you really don't have to openly rebel to prove your point. Showing disrespect only adds more complications that you really don't need. Instead, lean on the harmonious aspects created by the Moon's presence in your sensible sign to find a more peaceful resolution to your current anger. Thinking outside of the box is essential now in order to put your brilliant plan into practice.

It's nearly impossible to think straight today and you're wise to postpone a significant decision if you can. But if you can't delay making your choice, at least don't try to fool yourself by believing that you're being objective. You may have already formed your opinion and new information won't likely change your position. However, keep in mind that impulsive reactions can be magnets for trouble. Whatever you decide, take additional time to consider all the options before giving your final answer.

It's out of character to wear your feelings on your sleeve but you may be unhappy about something at work, prompting you to discuss the matter with anyone who will listen. Proceed with caution, for your strong opinions might provoke others to react aggressively, beginning a cycle of conflict escalation. Defending your convictions is healthy, but it's really not necessary to turn a minor disagreement into a major battle. Taking the high road makes you a hero for the day.

It's all too easy for your annoyance to boil over into anger if you don't stay one step ahead of your emotions today. You might believe that expressing dissatisfaction is the most responsible thing to do but unfortunately, you could take your position too far. Don't worry so much about self-disclosure. It's more important for others to see that you can get the job done right than it is for them to know your personal feelings. Set your grievances aside; ultimately, the only thing that really matters now is your performance.

Your self-reliance is admirable but you're still not free to just go off on your own. Other people are depending on you and you are committed to meeting your obligations, even if you believe you might be happier being on the move now. Don't let your frustration turn into anger or it may get the best of you. The choice is yours; you can blame someone else for the current situation or you can assume responsibility for your actions. Take control and start making improvements to create positive change in your life.

A serious tone is settling over your life now, reminding you that patience will bring better results than an impulsive reaction. Your key planet Venus creates an anxious aspect to somber Saturn today, requiring you to demonstrate self-restraint when expressing your feelings. Staying aware of your changing moods enables you to maintain a healthy perspective. Losing your temper might feel satisfying in the moment, but doesn't necessarily help your cause in the long run.

You could become so irritated with a friend or colleague today that you don't know how to express what's on your mind without losing your cool. You believe that your criticism is justified, but your intensity level may be too much for some people now that the Sun squares your key planet Mars. However, it isn't necessary to bury your feelings. Engaging in physical activity can help you move through this stress with grace. Another option is to confide in a close friend who understands your passionate nature. Finding an appropriate outlet for your energy saves the day.

Pushing others too hard today could be an exercise in futility. Instead of acting aggressively and stubbornly trying to get people to do things your way, just work on your own for a while. Don't bother drawing up complex plans and procedures; just jump in and figure it out on the fly. It's great if your friends offer to help, but don't rely on their assistance or you could end up waiting all day. Simply demonstrate your leadership skills by setting an example that everyone will want to follow.

You may find yourself in an awkward predicament today if your current strategy lacks substance. You might have added lots of facts and figures to your plans to make them seem more concrete, but now you need to take an entirely new approach. Letting go of your frustration or any regrets about a missed opportunity is the first step to creating change. Re-evaluating your objectives and refining your tactics move you closer toward your goals. If you don't succeed at first, try, try again.

You could find yourself in an uncomfortable position if others expect more from you than you can give now. You might have assumed that you would have more discretionary time available, but you don't seem to be able to handle the chaos if circumstances fly out of control. Losing your temper won't make any of your current problems disappear. Instead of lashing out at whoever is in your way, practice the art of patience by remembering that this, too, shall pass.

Layers of complexity might plague your personal relationships today, making it impossible to know which way to turn. In fact, it's easier to forget about the emotional dynamics so you can focus solely on fulfilling your responsibilities. Although it seems as if you're doing more than your share of the work, it's best to grin and bear it, rather than rocking the boat. Your emotions are amplified now, so wait a couple of days before you make your next move. In the meantime, channel your angst into your work.

You might be worried that you missed your window of opportunity to handle a relationship issue now that yesterday's excitement has passed. However, rather than dwelling on what you should have done, focus on settling your energy and sustaining your progress. Don't get so caught up in your personal agenda that you forget to respect other people's limits. If you start to obsess about anything, see it as a sign to stop pushing so hard. If you take time today to integrate recent changes, success will come easier in the future.

You may feel so lazy now that you wish you could let the day slip by without getting much accomplished. Fortunately, the Moon's return to your pragmatic sign inspires you to simplify your life. Your senses are sharper today and your conclusions are logical, but you still might get into trouble by giving someone the benefit of the doubt. Everything is not always as good as it appears; processing negative feelings requires courage, but can also lead to better decision-making in the future.

Your witty words can make it seem as if you are fully engaged in connecting with others, but your clever repartee could also serve to hide your emotions. Although you may conclude that your limited disclosure is a wise strategy today, whatever you keep secret might have just as much impact as what you share. Instead of laughing off your vulnerability, take a deep breath and try to express what's actually in your heart.

Receiving solid support from your friends and family today goes a long way to bolster your confidence, but there could be unspoken demands that are intrinsically tied to their help. It feels as if there are powerful undertones to everything that happens now and you might be obliged to return a favor even if you never were told that was part of the deal. Don't let your annoyance turn into resentment; be upfront and express your reservations clearly from the start. Ultimately, your transparency works in everyone's favor.

You struggle to rein in your exuberance today, but you could inadvertently offend someone if you don't curb your enthusiasm. You may be reveling in the adrenaline rush of taking a risk, yet it seems that expressing your desires isn't in your best interest now. Instead of assuming that you will get what you want, it's healthier to graciously accept the current circumstances without clinging to any additional expectations. Others will be more likely to support your dreams if you turn down your volume just a notch.

You're not eager to become overly involved in a friend's melodrama today, but you could be pulled into it anyhow. Thankfully, your listening skills are augmented by your cool objectivity. Maintaining a practical outlook is exactly what is needed now to smooth out everyone's ruffled feathers. Don't worry if you need to put your personal satisfaction on the back burner while you help out someone you love. Karma rewards positive actions in ways you don't always understand.

Your closest friends may set a lovely example today by displaying their affection and respect for you. Unfortunately, everything isn't as perfect as it seems at first. Upon close scrutiny, you might notice unexpressed feelings lurking just beneath the surface, adding a sense of apprehension to your interactions. Don't let a minor miscommunication morph into a major meltdown. Requesting immediate clarification minimizes the chances of reading more into a situation than is actually there. Clearing the air gives everyone the chance to speak from the heart.

You might think that sharing your current worries with a close friend today will assuage your fears. But the obstinate Taurus Moon in your 7th House of Relationships runs into an opposition to stern Saturn, revealing more complications than you expected. Even with the best of intentions, whatever you say now can precipitate an emotionally volatile conversation. Although you may regret expressing your feelings at first, the results will likely be extremely worthwhile for all parties involved if you stick with it.

You have a nuts-and-bolts approach to complex problems today and may truly believe that any situation can be resolved if you simply maintain a positive attitude. Fortunately, an unexpected conflict of interests won't likely create any long-term problems, even if it temporarily wreaks havoc on your stress levels. Rattled nerves should calm down pretty quickly if you don't feed them with fear. It doesn't matter if you can't establish common ground right away. It's more important to respect everyone's right to his or her own opinion and expect nothing less in return.

It's not your choice to tackle an emotional issue that doesn't seem to have an immediate impact on your productivity. However, you might be receiving signals from your subconscious that warp your perceptions just enough to throw a conversation off course today. It's a smarter strategy to get to the source of a problem before it becomes even more complicated by your denial. Stay calm, cool and collected; others are counting on your practical approach to navigate through these tricky waters.

A friend or family member may be extra nice to you, tempting you to lower your guard. Normally, you would be happy to comply, but he or she might be working with a hidden agenda today, making for a complicated interaction. Listen closely to what's not being said because the missing information holds more sway over your day than what's actually shared. In the meantime, don't let your fears isolate you from those you love. Strike a healthy balance by actively participating in the day's events while waiting for the rest of the story to surface.

Your methodical approach to your daily routine can make the difference between a frustrating day and one that brings deep satisfaction. However, you might feel as if other people are trying to  impede your progress. Unfortunately, if this is true, you may not have the chance to directly address the problem yet. Instead, of confronting anyone, continue to shine your light by taking the high road. The external resistance will eventually fade if you choose not to empower it with your own negativity.

Your instincts tell you that something extraordinary is lurking just around the next bend in the road, but you must work diligently or it could disappear before you get there. Don't give up now when it's more important than ever to stretch beyond your normal limits; be prepared to do whatever it takes to overcome any obstacles you might encounter. Show the world what you can do if you put your mind on reaching the stars.

You might feel a strong need for comfort and familiarity, but you realize that taking the easy route isn't in your best interests now. Even if you want to hold on to a recent memory of an enjoyable experience, sustaining pleasure doesn't necessarily nurture your growth. Don't be complacent and fall back on old habits just to avoid your emotions. Take a risk and share your feelings if you sincerely want to improve a significant relationship.

Expect the unexpected when it comes to your schedule for the next few days. You might plan on some peace and quiet at work or at home, only to have surprise visitors arrive and disrupt your surroundings. There's no need to fight against having a day of discovery and maybe even meeting new people, since spontaneous socializing comes naturally to you. Happily, trying different experiences stimulates your mind and makes life more interesting. Enjoy the diversity while you have the chance.

Spending time with friends at work or play sounds like a wonderful idea today. However, you may start to internalize your feelings after the Moon shifts into your 12th House of Invisibility, making you less motivated to be a part of the group. Instead of slipping into your natural role as caretaker, turn your attention toward what makes you happy. Ironically, you will have more energy for nurturing everyone else once your needs are acknowledged. Dream a little dream, and then make it come true.

Taking charge of a situation is easy when you know what to do, but being a real leader requires extra patience today. You can't be too ambitious or push others too far if you want them to follow you. Oddly enough, you have a better chance of success if you take yourself and the situation lightly. Ultimately, the heavy expectations weighing you down are probably your own. Give yourself a break; everyone else will probably be more forgiving than you think if your heart is in the right place.

Step away from all the hectic noise today and escape your ordinary routine. Use your imagination to look out into the distance beyond the horizon and expand your vision by embarking on a journey of the mind. Philosophical discussions can open your eyes to radical new perspectives. Don't worry too much about the cost because there's no price that can be put on the wisdom of experience.

You might have your heart set on deepening a significant relationship, but unrealistic expectations expand the bubble of your dreams until it pops. An unexpected turn of events spins the day in an awkward direction, but your flexibility prevents things from flying off track. For example, a stubborn partner may put a damper on your fun. But your own unwillingness to change now could be the real issue. Even if everything doesn't move along seamlessly, a little surprise could add a touch of spice to your love life.

You may be able to finally stop working for a while and start enjoying the company of others. Put down your tools, kitchen utensils and keyboard; get out and connect with some real people who can make you laugh. Thankfully, an easygoing person helps to calm your anxieties. Indulging in basic pleasures is an excellent exercise in creating the healthy balance that you need at this time. Life can be simple if you simply let go and relax.

Your feelings are being pulled all over the place today as the uncommitted Gemini Moon skips through your 7th House of Companions. Today's cosmic message is to take relationships slowly or you won't have anything to show for all your emotional turmoil. It might require gentle persuasion to convince your friend or partner that you mean business. Be flexible enough to recognize new channels of communication that can be of benefit both personally and professionally.

One of the secrets of the zodiac is that although you Capricorns are known for working hard, you like to play hard, too. People often see you as so serious and ambitious that they underestimate your ability to have fun. Romance can certainly play a role in your activities these days, but don't fall into the trap of being too goal-oriented. Instead, take a day off from the need to accomplish anything. Living in the present moment enables you to return to your responsibilities with a fresh perspective on life.

Traditional values amongst family members prompt you to keep some things to yourself today. It might be best to stop talking about your personal needs for now since people won't even notice you until they're ready, which isn't necessarily according to your schedule. Remember, successful communication requires paying attention to the mood of your audience and adjusting your message accordingly. When it comes to matters of the heart, timing is everything.

Your thoughts are exceptionally clear today and you're able to bring your colorful visions down to earth. Fortunately, conversations with sensible people help you locate the ground in which you can nurture the seeds of your powerful imagination. However, you may have to get cleverly creative to overcome any obstacles that crop up along the way. Staying positive about the big picture helps you work through any stress that arises when confronting the details. Whatever you do, don't stop believing in your dreams.

Your perceptions may be crystal clear but you must limit the quantity of data you receive or you could change your mind every few minutes throughout the day. You are fascinated by new concepts and are eager to fully embrace them as yours. Rather than overreacting by jumping to the next good idea, choose one and take it as far as you can. E.E. Cummings wrote, "I'd rather learn from one bird how to sing than to teach ten thousand stars how not to dance."

There's nothing wrong with your logic today, but don't focus on the mistakes of others. Lead by example and do what you can to improve your own work, instead. However, a critical attitude by itself won't prompt you to make personal changes, for you are most likely to acquiesce when gently coaxed, rather than if you feel forced into action. You're more likely to succeed if you believe in what you're doing.

The pace of the past few days may have seemed a bit slow, but today's mentally active Gemini Moon continues a fresh energy cycle that inspires you with one idea after another. You could actually have too much on your plate, making it difficult to decide what to do next. It's best not to take on more than you can handle, but this means you must stop long enough to establish your priorities. Think first; act later.

You are some what agitated by your overactive imagination that could make prolonged concentration very challenging today. You can make the most of this creative buzz by finding a quiet place to unwind a bit. If possible, take some time away from your work now, but don't confuse needing solitude with being lazy. Let your mind travel where it chooses and you just might come up with a brilliant new idea that makes your escape seem worthwhile.

You are feeling overly vulnerable today and words that would normally roll off your back may feel like an attack. Maintaining an objective perspective is a smart way to stay calm, for the situation is not likely as threatening as it seems. Although others may be in a playful mood, you might be missing the joke. Instead of letting your pride get in the way, stop taking everything so personally and join in the fun.

Casually contacting a friend could end up helping you professionally now. Even someone you barely know may be of assistance in ways you cannot yet comprehend. Today, your job isn't to criticize anything or anyone, but to simply open yourself up to the possibilities. There is more going on than meets the eye, so save your judgment until you better understand what others can contribute. You can't rush some things; trust develops on its own schedule.

It's an excellent day to smooth out wrinkles in an existing relationship, even if very delicate diplomacy is required. The most crucial thing is to understand one another, especially in personal matters. Compassion is needed to keep a conversation going, so be kind with your tone while being truthful with your words. Balancing honesty with respect enables you to exchange points of view under the best possible conditions. Communication is a two-way street.

Discussions may grow more serious today, yet your persistence allows you to resolve a sticky issue. Engaging in dialogue won't be enough, though; a bit of flexibility on both sides is necessary to grease the process. Just remember that if you think you know the answer, there are still other possible responses to consider. Don't dig in your heels for no reason; make adaptability your mantra and you'll come out a winner.

New worlds of possibilities are calling, but first you have a few practical matters to handle. Starting out by tackling the most ordinary tasks now can give you the freedom to enjoy yourself later. Don't worry if you're feeling restless because your boredom won't last long. Hurry up and finish your chores; there will be plenty of activity to keep you entertained before you know it.

Your best-laid plans may begin to crumble under the pressure now as unexpected demands are put on your time and energy. Nevertheless, remember to give yourself a break as the pace of your daily life speeds up. Accepting that you can't complete everything today might be enough to change the dynamics and help you to relax. Paradoxically, doing only what is absolutely necessary might actually enable you to finish more, faster than you expect.

Exploring a delightful variety of stimulating people, places and activities enriches your life in so many ways. You are happily entertained by little things as romantic energies begin to stir. Even a casual conversation can suddenly turn flirtatious today. But don't get too attached to any particular outcome; enjoy the innocence of living in the moment. Acting spontaneously adds a lovely element of surprise to your day.

Life is simpler these days if you have fewer family obligations, so don't complicate matters by making so many promises now that you fall behind on your commitments. Acting with confidence is healthy, but blind optimism is not. Even if everything appears to be under control for the moment, conditions can change unexpectedly. Avoid being caught off guard by consciously setting limits and sticking to them.

Your confidence might have flagged during the past month, but change is in the air and things are beginning to improve. A noticeable shift in your attitude won't occur overnight, but you feel more positive day by day. Allow the current events to unfold without resistance while continuing to affirm that better times are on the way. Believing in yourself, coupled with the Sun's move into your 5th House of Creativity, is all it takes to chase away the clouds of self-doubt.

You are more in touch with your feelings while the Sun's presence in your 4th House of Roots lights up your walk down Memory Lane. However, you could be hijacked by your past if you're not careful. Don't bother trying to hold onto childhood perspectives any more, especially if they reinforce your concerns about scarcity. Remember, the universe is overflowing with unlimited possibilities, so show up with a smile and do what you can to transform your fears into love.

A wave of insecurity might cause you to overcompensate and show only your very best side today. But your positive attitude could come across as false if you sound blindly optimistic. It's of no value to hide the truth now, even if it's not what you think someone else wants to hear. Don't get bent out of shape over the wrong things; stick to the facts and let others take responsibility for their reactions. The only person within your control is you.

You might feel a surprising sense of relief as the relentless Sun leaves your sign. You're no longer in the spotlight, allowing you to work more quietly behind the scenes. But you might not want to withdraw into your shell for too long because the Moon slips into your 11th House of Social Networking tonight. You wish you could just make up your mind but you're being pulled in two totally different directions. Instead of buying into the illusion that you must make a choice, you will be happier if you just go with the flow.

You're in your own element today; you have a specific agenda and nothing will stand between you and your destination. There's only one problem with believing you're invincible: you're not. You might run into danger if you try to outsmart reality. Luckily, your wildest dreams are within reach as long as you have enough flexibility to respond to the changing conditions of the road. The power of positive thinking works in your favor, but you can't rush success.

You aren't a happy camper if you discover someone is keeping pertinent information from you today but, thankfully, you are able to efficiently handle the situation. Even a difficult experience can quickly morph into a positive one if you exude confidence, rather than doubt. The willful Sun and opinionated Jupiter are both traveling through your 12th House of Secrets; change the game now by preemptively exploring the hidden realms of your subconscious. Happiness comes from the clues you find buried deep in the shadows.

You want to keep up with your friends because they appear to be having more than their fair share of fun. Even at work, your associates don't seem to be working very hard today. The good news is your productivity won't necessarily suffer if you join in the social festivities now. Luckily, the brilliant Sun's shift into your 11th House of Long-Term Goals enables you to find pleasure in the present moment while also keeping an eye on the future.

It's disconcerting if someone assumes that you will always drop your personal priorities when asked. You wouldn't mind offering your assistance out of the goodness of your heart, but you don't appreciate the pressure of being told what to do. There's no need to say yes and jump right in. Believe it or not, others will get by without you immediately rushing to their rescue today. Considering all your options before responding may be enough of a cue to convey that you don't want anyone to take advantage of your generosity.

Perhaps you're busy dreaming about unrealistic scenarios to avoid dealing with the promises you already made. Your intentions may have been sincere in the moment, but your time is running short and you don't know how you're going to fulfill all of your obligations now. Keep in mind that even a minor task could grow into a major one today. Don't make any sudden changes to your overall strategy yet; wait a few days to see how the new landscape takes shape and then re-establish a fresh set of priorities. Your future is bright as long as your energy isn't spread too thin.

Even the most surefooted of you goats can slip if you're moving too fast, and an overabundance of bravado today might be enough to make you careless. Believing in dreams is crucial, but overconfidence could cause more harm than good. Don't give reality a reason to teach you a lesson in humility. You have a better chance of reaching your ambitious goals if you focus on each step along the way. Slow and steady wins the race.

Everyone you know is playing a part in your movie now that the dramatic Leo Sun is holding court in your 7th House of Others. Unfortunately, you may be growing weary of someone's self-promoting behavior. You crave sincerity and truthfulness, but could feel as if you're currently being shortchanged in your relationships. It will be a lot less stressful if you accept the fact that others are probably giving all that they can. Instead of wishing for more, be appreciative of what you have today.
