You would like to have more free time at your disposal today, but you may have already overcommitted yourself in the chores department. Running errands and helping others prevent you from following your fantasies. But don't complain about your obligations; just doggedly finish what you can with a smile in your heart. Thankfully, if you apply yourself diligently during the day, you should have time for more pleasurable pursuits in the evening.

Words roll off your tongue so easily today that you could create trouble before you know it. In fact, you might have so much to say that it sounds like your feelings have been brewing beneath the surface for too long. But even if you haven't been holding back, you're ready to throw caution to the wind now. Staying aware of the ramifications of your message saves you from complicating the situation further. Don't dwell on the past; instead, let your forgiveness work its magic so you can move ahead with a clean slate.

You aren't happy if someone opposes your plan, yet it's challenging to compromise if your stubbornness gets in the way. You may believe you're acting graciously now, but you might irritate others with your attempts to gloss over difficulties. Thankfully, you have a chance to do something special that can have a positive impact on those closest to you. Decide what is more important -- accomplishing your goals or nurturing your loved ones. Taking the road less traveled requires courage and sacrifice, but the rewards are worth it.

Your agile mind may already be planning multiple escape routes. However, you might not seek out direct confrontation when push comes to shove, unless you do it in the spirit of playful banter. However, unspoken emotional issues can overwhelm your desire to be lighthearted. It doesn't matter now how well-meaning your intentions are until you find a way to exercise your limited powers of self-restraint. Thankfully, your positive attitude is contagious if you listen as much as you talk. A constructive dialogue clears the air and gives everyone a chance to speak their piece.

Exercising caution is wise because the hypersensitive Cancer Moon might stir up plenty of emotional turmoil today. Thankfully, your self-confidence can quiet your insecurities, even if you end up revealing more than you initially intended. Thinking twice before spilling the beans prevents a sticky situation. However, if you say nothing at all, your hurt could easily turn to resentment. Don't give up while searching for that elusive middle path between transparency and secrecy; your relationships will benefit from your persistence.

Your imagination may be too active for your own good today; you could annoy your coworkers by cutting them off before they complete their thoughts. They might think you are hungry for attention and can't stand to share the spotlight. However, from your perspective, it's just a matter of expediency. A Sun-Jupiter conjunction in your sign fills you with bravado, prompting you to push harder to accomplish your objectives. Paradoxically, giving others an opportunity to shine ultimately improves your chances of reaching your destination.

Your goals may be so altruistic now that you begin to wonder if you are fooling yourself. It's one thing to strive to positively impact the world, but quite another if you grow resentful because your personal life is neglected. Don't wait until your good intentions turn sour; balance your spiritual pursuits with your practical needs. When service to others is tempered by common sense, there's no limit to what you can accomplish.

Although your friends might seem pleasant enough today, something is still bothering you about their actions. Unfortunately, the more you think about their behavior the crankier you become; nevertheless, you won't likely get what you want by blowing your top. Instead, work off your pent-up tension by buzzing around like a bee in a garden. Thankfully, putting integrity back into your relationships only requires a decision on your part to change your attitude. You don't have to be a victim of your worries. Take the high road and choose love over fear.

Your career is on the launch pad now that the Sun is hooking up with Jupiter in your 10th House of Public Life. Nevertheless, you might still have some reservations about taking the next step on your ladder to success. Fortunately, you can play both ends of the spectrum today. Honor your intuition, even if it's telling you to wait before making your move. However, in the meantime, clearly state your intentions to the universe without holding back. Time is on your side.

Grandiose visions about an upcoming adventure can capture your imagination today. Your mind is moving fast -- so fast that you may not even finish one thought before you're on to the next one. Others might criticize you for your sloppy thinking, but it's your loss if you respond in anger. Instead of posturing to defend your ideas, use the feedback you receive to help sharpen your plans. Rolling with the incoming waves is almost always a smarter strategy than fighting against them.

You might bring important information out into the open, but the positive effects of what you say can be lost if you don't know when to stop. You could be angry at someone today, yet you don't want to hurt his or her feelings just for the sake of revenge. Be as fair as you can while speaking directly from your heart -- and not your head. Equanimity increases your chances for finding a peaceful resolution.

This is a rather strange time for you as a tug-of-war develops between your inner needs and your outer expressions. Others may encourage you to take a risk because they truly believe in you. But don't do anything rash because expressing your unrestrained emotions can create more problems now than they solve. Instead of reacting impulsively now, place additional room between an external stimulus and your response. A quick dash to the finish line sounds wonderful, but you're more likely to be a winner if you set a sustainable pace.

An unexpected change of plans may turn your world upside down today. If you are unsure of what to do next, acknowledge your culpability in the present circumstances instead of denying it. Remember, theoretically, nothing happens to you; reality unfolds with your assistance. Even if you feel temporarily overwhelmed, don't move too fast. Keep the faith; you have the ability to overcome nearly any odds now with lucky Jupiter on your side.

Taking a sentimental journey through your memories might sound like a good idea today, but it could open a can of worms before you know it. Recollections of your youth may be spiritually uplifting until you remember something that also brings hurt feelings into the present moment. If you become stuck on anger or resentment, the best way to move forward is to shake off the past by starting a project that requires your total concentration. Redirecting your energy into something creative is the fastest route to bringing your focus back to the here and now.

You might try a strategy of passive resistance today if someone at work makes unreasonable demands on your time. You're not interested in wasting your energy arguing with anyone or explaining why you believe people are out of line. Instead, you opt to display your infamous bullheadedness because you assume that actions will speak louder than words. Nevertheless, others won't correct their errant ways unless you take the time to give them constructive criticism. Just make sure you treat everyone with the same respect you expect in return.

You often make spur-of-the-moment decisions to spend money on something that you want. However, you're more serious about your financial situation now that the retentive Cancer Moon is visiting your 2nd House of Possessions. It may be a prudent idea to say no to an unnecessary purchase today, but don't take your frugality so far that you pass up a really great bargain or a promising opportunity. Considering all your options from a practical perspective helps you to make a fiscally wise choice that continues to feel good into the future.

One moment you're enthusiastic and eager to take on your day with confidence. However, the next moment you may be complaining about how much work you have on your plate. Ironically, your moodiness could annoy everyone else more than it bothers you today. Thankfully, it's easy to prevent negativity from recycling back to you. Take some time to recharge your emotional batteries without blaming anyone else for your current need for a break. As long as you fulfill your obligations as promised, no one will fault you for your choice.

The spotlight may continue to shine on you as the radiant Sun and boisterous Jupiter travel through your performance-oriented sign. But now the emotionally defensive Cancer Moon is hiding out in your 12th House of Escapism, tempting you to search for the nearest exit. Although you normally love the idea of performing on stage, today you value your privacy even more. Whether or not your heart is in it, you Lions know better than anyone that the show must go on.

You really don't want to disappoint your workmates, but they may be expecting so much from you these days that you begin to worry. Nevertheless, a dash of self-doubt can be therapeutic if it motivates you to do the necessary research to prepare for your job. However, your fear of failure is problematic if it prevents you from doing anything at all. Keep in mind that you are your own biggest critic and it's nearly impossible to satisfy your standards of excellence. Setting more realistic goals enables you to feel positive about your accomplishments.

You may be more responsive to your associates at work than you are to a friend or lover, setting the stage for a possible relationship meltdown today. The Moon's visit to your 10th House of Profession reflects your current drive for success, but you could be so eager to get ahead that you end up paying an emotional price. Thankfully, remaining aware of your ambitions allows you to step back and find your center before you lose your balance.

You could feel uncomfortably restrained today by the same set of circumstances and responsibilities that seemed just fine a few days ago. Part of your current problem is the strong wanderlust you are feeling now that the Moon is traveling through your 9th House of Adventure. Overcome your current inclination to let an opportunity pass because you have so much to do at home. If you are offered a chance to get out of town, take it. You can always finish up leftover chores when you return. You only live once.

Interpersonal interactions take on an air of intensity now that the Moon is swimming through the waters of your 8th House of Intimacy. Oddly enough, you aren't as interested in clever conversations that explore the far reaches of the cosmos as you are in getting to the bottom of your feelings. But emotional clarity isn't the only thing you need today; you also want to create a magical moment with someone special. With the right person, you could turn an ordinary day into a memorable one.

Even an easy going relationship might seem fraught with emotional tension today with the sensitive Cancer Moon's presence in your 7th House of Others. You're willing to express your feelings now, without even realizing that your openness increases your vulnerability. Unfortunately, your fear of losing control can be triggered if you're pulled too far off track by an intense interaction. Don't walk away from this chance to connect. Rather than shutting down your heart, see what you can learn by exploring unfamiliar ground.

You wish you could set aside your emotional needs today so you can focus on the logistics of your everyday life. Although the Moon's visit to your 6th House of Daily Routine encourages you to ignore your passions, denial isn't a viable strategy. Push up against your discomfort by openly expressing your desires, even if it means taking a risk. Happily, you might be pleasantly surprised when you discover that others support your unconventional pursuits.

Expressing your needs to someone you trust deepens a current friendship or sets the stage for a new romance as the reflective Moon moves through your 5th House of Love. Don't pull away from displaying your tenderness because you feel more alive when you're busy nurturing others. Nevertheless, it's crucial to maintain a clear perspective on your emotions, or you could become more attached than you planned. Make sure your intentions are clear before the waters get too deep.

You feel free to be yourself today without worrying about receiving approval from anyone else. You don't want to suppress your creative process with the Leo New Moon stimulating your 5th House of Spontaneity. If you have been anticipating changing directions, strike while the iron is hot and approach everything you do with a playful attitude now. If you aren't having a good time, perhaps you should improve your attitude or try your hand at something else.

You may be building your domain on shifting sands as today's dynamic Leo New Moon rattles your 4th House of Roots. Although the exuberant Jupiter connection enables you to display an air of confidence, you might not feel as secure as you appear. Even if your close friends and family usually support your efforts, issues come to light now that have you wondering if you can truly count on them. Although honest dialogue is enlightening, your truth must come from within.

Your schedule might end up being an albatross around your neck today if you attempt to fit too much into one day. The universe is sending you private messages, reminding you to slow down and smell the roses. The expressive Leo New Moon illuminates your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, intensifying your interactions with those closest to you. If a seemingly innocuous event turns into a more serious problem, don't feed the drama with additional negativity of your own. Happily, your positive input can inspire others to see things in a better light.

You might have to change how you manage your money since today's Leo New Moon falls in your 2nd House of Personal Resources. You may be spending your cash under the illusion that you have more than you actually do. But you should consider your overall relationship to your current possessions and whatever else you want in your future. As you already know, material wealth is not the true source of happiness; concentrate your efforts on what really matters in the long run.

It's a perfect day to create a fresh list of goals because today's proud Leo New Moon celebrates a new beginning in your life. But just writing your wishes down on paper won't have the positive impact you desire because it is the act of focusing your intentions that sets your life into motion. Once you visualize whatever you want in your mind's eye, commit to be unrelenting in reaching your objectives. The sky is the limit if you're willing to put in the time and effort to make your dreams come true.

You have arrived at a crossroads where your intuition is telling you one thing, but the facts are telling you something else. You might be able to rationalize your behavior now, even if it is different from what you logically know is best. But this Leo New Moon's presence in your 12th House of Destiny prompts a spiritual crisis as you try to align your actions with your beliefs. Don't worry if others can't understand your emotional dilemma today. Follow your dreams wherever they lead.

Your social calendar could fall apart at the last minute with today's Leo New Moon landing in your 11th House of Networking. But rather than taking a disruption personally, it's wiser to realize that some things are simply beyond your control. The drama of the day could run you through a gamut of emotions. But don't overreact and rush to put everything back together yet. Uncertainty is in the air, so avoid drawing any final conclusions until the dust settles. Flexibility is your friend.

Voluntarily keeping a secret is one thing, but being pressured to remain silent is entirely different. Today's showy Leo New Moon zaps your 10th House of Public Life, making it nearly impossible to hide your feelings for long. However, there's no justification for blame or mean-spirited behavior. Instant karma will get you as unnecessary negativity is reflected back to you faster than you expect. Go ahead and say whatever needs to be said, but be soft-spoken and kind in your delivery.

You may feel like celebrating today rather than tackling your chores yet, ironically, you could increase your chances for finding pleasure by meeting your responsibilities first. It's not that you can't have a good time with the audacious Leo New Moon activating your 9th House of Adventure. But extravagance might get in your way, especially if you want to prove something to someone else. There's absolutely nothing wrong with a playful approach, but everyone will have more fun if you avoid competition.

Trouble surfaces in an intimate relationship today if anyone is anything less than fully honest. The theatrical Leo New Moon emphasizes your 8th House of Deep Sharing, making it tough to hide any secret agendas. Relationship dynamics may be stressed when unspoken resentments or buried jealousies see the light of day. However, the temporary emotional discomfort is worth it if getting things out in the open makes everyone feel better in the long run.

You may be surprised by an energetic shift in your business and personal relationships as today's lively Leo New Moon triggers your 7th House of Partners. You're searching for clarity about how to reach your long-term goals. Your emotions may seem erratic, yet standing on the edge of your future is the most exciting thing imaginable now. You may be presented with an exciting opportunity to demonstrate your flexibility. Fortunately, you can successfully pursue a course of action now even if your heart isn't fully in it. Your behavior may seem highly erratic now, challenging others to trust you if they don't already know your heart. Yesterday's stress begins to settle back down today, especially if you expressed what was on your mind. Your bubble might not actually pop today as long as you accept that it can't get any bigger. The safest way out of your current predicament is to figure out how to deflate it before it explodes. Practice the same compassion for others that you wish to receive for yourself.

You might appear to be extremely outgoing today, revealing your thoughts even before you are asked. Your key planet Mercury is energized with the awesome power of Jupiter and the assertive force of Mars. You're longing to tell all you know, but you can still keep a secret now with three planets clustered in your 12th House of Privacy. Consciously decide what is most significant and cannot be shared under any circumstances. Choose wisely and let everything else be fair game for discussion.

Throwing a party sounds like a wonderful idea, but you could make a mess instead of a social gathering if you sweep the details under the rug. Even if you're attending someone else's event, you might still end up playing the role of host or hostess because you are so good at making others feel at ease when you turn on the charm. You may be eager for pleasure, but don't let your desires trick you into overindulging or the good times will slip away before they come to fruition. Moderation is your friend.

Going on a mini-retreat can be very rejuvenating today; it's as if you are taking a long summer vacation compressed in time. Thankfully, walking away from your responsibilities is easier now than it sounds. Just be certain to gradually express your powerful emotions throughout the day or you may experience a minor volcanic eruption when you least expect it. Channeling your volatility into positive action transforms scary shadows into magical places of healing.

There might not be enough stable ground to stand on as you're buffeted around by strong emotional currents. Chatty Mercury hooks up with your key planet Jupiter, inspiring conversations and encouraging you to take a chance by talking about your dreams. Touch your deepest fears and highest hopes, but don't do it alone. Making memories is more fun when you share the adventure with someone you can trust.

You are driven by a strong need for recognition by your peers. You're optimistic about your future and may strive toward your goals with greater gusto than before, as if you have been tapped for a personal mission. However, if you have fears about your own competence, don't allow them to slip off the radar. Share your feelings with someone close to you, for you are being presented with a rare opportunity to experience a new level of intimacy. No risk, no reward.

You may run out of patience now as unexpressed petty annoyances stack up like dirty dishes in the sink. Your best strategy might be to escape the current situation by dreaming of what's around the next bend. This cerebral traveling brings you an opportunity to develop your long-term goals by encouraging your imagination to drift into the future. Keep in mind that even the greatest journeys of exploration start with a single step.

You are eager to let go of your expectations so you can have some good old-fashioned fun. Nevertheless, there are intense feelings rising into your awareness now, making it difficult to circumvent the truth. Running off in search of transient personal pleasures just leaves you unsatisfied. Instead of falling victim to your own whims, take the no-nonsense path today. Keep your priorities straight and self-imposed limitations won't hold you back for long.

You may be feeling the pressure of someone's unspoken emotional demands, and there's no quick and easy way to escape. Although it's summer vacation for many, you still must remain present and fulfill your obligations. A crazy idea could pop into your head today that you hope will save you time and increase your productivity. However, it is smarter to stick with a tried and true method now, even if it ends up taking longer to finish. Save your creativity for another day.

A friend or partner may offer you more authoritative advice than you prefer today. You can feel as if others are overstepping their bounds and trespassing on your personal space. But you need to remember that you don't live in a vacuum; you are better off listening with an open mind. Try not to overreact since constructive feedback could be exactly what you need to hear now. Give people the benefit of the doubt; they might just want to help.

You are attracted to all kinds of paradoxes, but a situation today may remain an unsolved puzzle. The more you focus on your list of chores, the less certain you are about how to fit everything in to your day. Unfortunately, seeking another perspective from a friend or associate only confuses you even further. Oddly enough, relinquishing your need to finish on time helps the day go smoother for everyone involved. Not every mystery is meant to be solved.

You might be playing several emotional angles all at once today, but you need to be careful or your ambitious behavior could backfire on you. Strategizing for success is fine, but you must be absolutely straight up about your motives. Don't be afraid to let others know what your needs are without embellishing them for the sake of drama. If your friends understand why you are acting in a particular manner, they are more likely to support your endeavors rather than resist your efforts. Transparency is your friend.

Feeling sorry for yourself is a waste of energy today, whether it's because there's a lack of romance in your life or you are at odds with your partner. Although clever Mercury is zipping through your fun-loving sign now, something may be awry as the willful Sun anxiously aspects uncompromising Pluto. Happiness doesn't only come from finding someone special and living out a fairy tale. Rather, you can find joy by committing to express your love, no matter what you receive in return.

Don't dismiss someone's new idea just because it's radically different from yours. You might have to struggle to remain open to alternatives now, but you'll make better decisions if you do. The presence of three planets in your 3rd House of Information sharpens your perceptions and helps you to hone your perspective. Nevertheless, you can convince yourself that nearly anything is true -- until you check it out in reality. Look before you leap for the best results.

You have grown so concerned about the opinions of your friends that you could lose sight of your own. However, your ideas are just as valuable as those of anyone else. Ultimately, self-esteem comes from within and not from what others think. Just be careful not to misinterpret the facts; you can easily stretch the truth and lead yourself astray. Remember, extreme reactions may be a clue that emotions are now overtaking reason. Temper your responses by filtering out extraneous noise and listening to your own inner voice.

You're pulled one way by your feelings and another by logic as the reflective Moon in your emotional sign intensifies your moods. You have a high level of self-awareness now, but it's hard to know whether to trust your heart or your head as mental Mercury gains stature in your 10th House of Status today. Keep in mind that your inner struggle won't likely impede your progress, even if you end up changing your direction in the very near future. Integrating your passion into your work is your secret to success.

You can talk yourself into nearly anything today because your key planet Jupiter is still under the influence of persuasive Mercury. You are able to motivate others by sharing the power of your own dreams. But your performance may feel disconnected from your real purpose now, leaving you with an empty sensation in your gut. Rather than trying to inspire anyone else to support your ideas, check in with your conscience to confirm what you really believe. Being completely honest with yourself is the first step in the right direction.

Even the best-laid plans won't assure success today, but they could help you to leverage your current position in your search for meaning. You don't stand to gain anything from your negative judgment, even though you might not reach your original goals. Instead of compulsively pushing toward the summit, take the scenic route of discovery for a change of pace. Your mission now isn't to reach your destination faster than anyone else; it's to get as much personal growth as possible out of your journey.

You won't be satisfied with a simple and dismissive answer today; you're eager to do whatever is necessary to get to the bottom of an issue. But digging beneath the surface can unexpectedly take you out of your comfort zone. Although you might grow unhappy with what you discover, knowing the truth is better than accepting the easy way out. Don't worry if others find your approach overly intense now; putting your passion into action is just what you need to do to set things right.

Although it appears as if there are multiple paths to your future, none of them stand out as the absolute best route to manifesting your highest potential. Your uncertainty makes it challenging to set your plans into motion while pressing circumstances force you to concentrate on one specific option, whether you are ready or not. Don't worry if your original choice fails because every little step you make now moves you closer to your goals.

It's as if you have x-ray vision and can see through the veneer of social etiquette today, revealing fears that are often kept safely hidden. You are aware of an unspoken agenda, even if everyone else is acting in a lighthearted manner. Your intuition might prompt you to retreat now because you're not sure that you want to engage in a conflict. Just don't pull inward too quickly; it may be that your worries were exaggerated. The person you thought was being negative could turn out to be your closest ally if you give him or her a chance.

You might believe that a relationship can't possibly meet your expectations today. Instead of overcoming your fear and scheduling a memorable encounter, you may choose to just settle back into your familiar routine. However, this laid-back approach is not your best strategy and could leave you feeling disappointed with your choice. Taking the safest route now won't necessarily help you reach your destination any sooner, so open up your heart and make the first move.

You may discover an important piece of information that you previously overlooked. You might have innocently assumed that others admire your creativity and support your ideas. Unfortunately, strong emotional undercurrents raise concerns as you try to comprehend the complexity of the situation. Don't attempt to figure it all out now; the energy shifts tomorrow, enabling you to gain a clearer understanding of your options.

Maintaining your self-esteem is challenging if your friends and associates don't share your values. You want everyone to understand what is really important to you, but the more you talk about your concerns, the wider the gulf becomes. You can try to analyze the situation and logically determine your best course of action, but cool reason may not lead to an ingenious solution now. The wisest answers arise more easily once you stop seeking them so desperately and let your intuition guide the way.

Your life is not as happy-go-lucky as others assume; it might appear as if you are having a lot of fun, even if your heart is troubled. Your defense mechanisms effectively hide a deep well of emotions today. But just going through the motions isn't very rewarding, so share some of what's on your mind with someone you trust. If you're having a hard time starting the conversation, write down your thoughts and use your notes to get the ball rolling. Being your authentic self opens the door to a meaningful exchange.

Although you hope to balance your personal desires with the needs of others, your good intentions might run into resistance today. You wish you could just gloss over your annoyance if you think that someone is keeping a secret. However, your suspicion can turn into anger if you don't voice your concerns now. Ironically, you may be wrong about your hunch, but you'll feel a sense of relief once your fears are out in the open. Illuminating the shadows almost always makes them less scary.

Your attempt to maintain your cool today is like trying to out run a tsunami. You know big changes are coming that could impact your closest relationships. Even if the shift still seems far off, you may already be feeling the pressure internally. Thankfully, you are capable of finding your way back to the center now if you concentrate on honoring your core values instead of worrying about external events. If you remain true to your highest ideals then everything else will, hopefully, fall into place.

You don't need to tell everyone what they already know, yet anyone who is overly critical today may be rudely surprised at the intensity of your response. However, you're not looking to alienate others. In fact, it's just the opposite; you yearn for meaningful contact with your closest friends. Those who are seeking shallow social banter could get an earful when you share the truth as you see it. There's no valid reason to bite your tongue; just prepare to deal with the consequences of your radical honesty.

You aren't interested in discussing your feelings today while the Moon visits your 12th House of Secrets. Even if others think that you're sharing your soul, you have more happening internally than anyone realizes. In fact, your philosophical ramblings can cleverly hide the real juice. Keep in mind that you probably won't benefit from changing your tactics now. It's wiser to take the conversation to the next level only if you're ready to be more vulnerable with your heart.

You are more reserved in your conversations with others today as you reconsider what you really want from relationships. Although you aren't likely to isolate yourself completely, you're wary about getting entangled with someone who might create unnecessary drama. Trust your instincts and be ready to walk away from a situation that could complicate your life without offering you any tangible benefits.

Although you have the best of intentions now, your plans may be thwarted anyway through no fault of your own. Of course, you can't possibly control all the variables in your surroundings, but you can take full responsibility for your response to an unexpected event. Paradoxically, an overly positive reaction could be just as troublesome as a very negative one. Avoiding emotional extremes enables you to make the best of these tricky circumstances.

Your current state of heightened awareness puts you in contact with emotions that may be challenging to integrate. But denying feelings that you don't fully understand creates an entirely different set of problems. You could inadvertently disconnect from the source of your inspiration today if you shut down your compassion. Thankfully, you can gracefully move through your day as long as you remember to keep checking in with your heart.

A new wave of optimism could make your energy a little too much to handle today, even if you're unaware of the impact you have on others. Your friends may grow tired of hearing you ramble on about how great your life is going. Temper your exuberance with a dose of compassion for everyone else. Too much of a good thing isn't necessarily a good thing. Turning down the volume on your enthusiasm creates a healthier environment for more balanced relationships.

You aren't shy about your wish to deepen the level of emotional disclosure with a close friend or lover today. Although your direct approach may surprise others, they will be more open to your ideas if you give them time to adjust to your current style of communication. Staying aware of someone else's perspective might not come easily now, but your sensitivity helps to build trust in relationships. Paradoxically, your fixed intentions are best served when everyone brings a flexible attitude to the table.

You might not be so quick to run off on your own today because the idea of collaborating with someone else sounds quite appealing. You are more attentive to what others are thinking while the Moon in your 7th House of Relationships shifts the energy away from your needs and toward those around you. However, your analytical skills may be lagging, so use extra caution when choosing your partner. Test the waters before jumping in with both feet.

Your current confidence has you believing that you can power your way through your work today and still have plenty of time left over to unwind. Unfortunately, you're likely to underestimate how long it will take to finish your assignments with the cavalier Sagittarius Moon influencing your 6th House of Routine. Allow extra time for each task; if you leave a job unfinished, you may not be able to relax, knowing there is still more to do. A sensible approach to planning your day keeps everything running smoothly.

You're craving for some excitement today, even if you still have unfulfilled promises to keep. However, you believe that falling short of your goals now shouldn't prevent you from having your fair share of the fun. You may be so jazzed that you're ready to do nearly anything to escape work. But if you walk out before tying up loose ends, at least let everyone know that you will finish up as soon as you can. A lack of communication could turn a lovely play day into a day of regret.

If you have been working long hours, it's time to claim your portion of the fun. But the adventurous Sagittarius Moon is visiting your 4th House of Roots, suggesting it may be fulfilling to stay close to home, instead of going out of town for a short vacation. You might even be able to get your kicks today by starting a simple domestic project or, perhaps, by inviting a friend over to share some quality conversation. Anything that breaks you out of your normal routine helps you to recharge your batteries and gain a fresh perspective.

Your restlessness complicates everything today as the action-oriented Sagittarius Moon travels through your 3rd House of Short Trips. You might feel so confined that you make an extra run to the store just to get out for a bit. But don't be self-critical now if you haven't made much progress by the end of the day. If you can't concentrate on your work, it's probably smart to just call it quits and start again tomorrow. However, breaking free for a while might be enough to settle your energy so you can return refreshed and ready to go.

You may be riding high on your horse, feeling secure enough to spend money on something special. You could be overly optimistic about your income potential now, enabling you to justify a luxury purchase. Nevertheless, it's wise to wait and see how you're feeling about your finances in a few days before making a large expenditure that you might regret. In any event, conserving your resources today leads to additional wealth tomorrow.

Impulsively sharing your feelings with someone special can open the door to a magical experience. You seek a heart connection with others because your own emotions are so close to the surface now that the reflective Moon is visiting your sign. Unfortunately, simply expressing your needs and fears is only one part of the equation. Give everyone enough time to share his or her story; real intimacy lives on a two-way street.

Hiding your optimism isn't usually advised, yet it may be socially savvy for you to be cautious now when sharing your feelings. Your overconfidence could offend someone and you really want to avoid trouble as you rally support for an ambitious idea of yours. Thankfully, your diplomatic skills are currently polished enough to take you far if you can trust your instincts today and do whatever you believe is best. A touch of humility helps to keep things in their proper perspective.

Your dreams are as vivid as your waking life now, motivating you to share them with like-minded people. Fortunately, you seem to be surrounded with a cadre of friends and associates with the Moon traveling through your 11th House of Social Networking. Luckily, you may already feel the camaraderie you seek, but still want to connect with more people as you push the edge of the envelope even further. Nevertheless, you might do better in a smaller gathering that allows for the intimacy of one-on-one conversations.

Defending your political or social beliefs can be quite empowering today, whether it's at work or out in your community. Your unique perspective is inspiring to others now, so don't hold back when you are sharing your practical ideas about the future. But remember, taking care of business in the present moment is more important than daydreaming about unrealistic possibilities. Seize the day by being the creative leader that others want to follow.

There's more than enough to keep you busy these days, yet you're eagerly anticipating the future. Although your current trajectory is aiming you into exciting new territory, it will still take a while to reach your destination. But just because satisfaction is delayed doesn't mean there's time to distract yourself with unimportant frivolities. Procrastination is tempting, but self-discipline is essential if you're going to deliver on your promises. The time is now and the clock is ticking.

You might be preoccupied with what happens next in an existing personal or business relationship. Even if your daily routine is functioning smoothly now, you wish you had more options to consider. It is beneficial to explore existing assumptions and push beyond the current limitations. Although good news may be right around the corner, you must take the initiative and extend yourself to receive it. Sometimes others are simply waiting for you to walk your talk.

It feels as if worlds of possibilities are opening up in front of you now and you can get a quick glimpse of what your future might look like. You may even have an unexpected opportunity to share your vision with friends or associates at work. But don't ramble on forever; it's better if you keep some of your story to yourself today. Sticking to the broad concepts gives you room to fill in the details as they continue to develop over the days ahead.

Your initial reaction to an unexpected opportunity at work could be one of uncertainty today. Others seem to be in denial about the resources that are required to successfully complete the job. You're tempted to set them straight, especially if you believe they're avoiding important details; however, your criticism might make you sound more negative now than you actually feel. Don't respond immediately; take several deep breaths and consider how to speak your truth in a constructive and positive manner.

Your direct approach to life may be somewhat disconcerting to someone close to you today. You have a good sense of what you want and could even surprise yourself now by spontaneously taking a chance and expressing your heart's desire. Just remember that your overtures are more likely to succeed if you adopt a more cautious approach that allows time for processing along the way. It can be challenging to completely contain your energy; slow down and create a strong foundation instead of building a castle on shifting sands.

It's not your usual style to become so excited about the future that you're tempted to start a new project without regard for your regular sense of propriety. Although you're eager to act spontaneously today, it's not a wise idea to move ahead until you research the facts, reassess your resources and re-establish your priorities. Stick to what you already know to be true; the more advanced planning you do now, the better the results.

You might believe you can get away with nearly anything today because your confident air seems to clear previously insurmountable obstacles from your path. Unfortunately, your positive attitude won't fix everything; you're not invincible. Don't waste your energy pursuing unrealistic goals. A smarter strategy is to make sure your plans are sensible now so that you can complete whatever you start. Don't throw away your dreams; just keep them in a healthy perspective.

There is a surprising fork in the road today, requiring you to pick the difficult path or the easy one. It seems like a rather straightforward decision at first, but curves ahead obscure your vision. Whichever way you choose, you have a much better chance of arriving at your destination safely now if you follow a map. Ultimately, your current direction won't matter much in the long run. However, having accurate information at your disposal makes all the difference in the world.

You can make an inspiring assessment of where your life is leading with the reflective Moon lighting up your visionary sign today. You're in touch with your emotional needs and are able to communicate them clearly to others in a concise manner. However, this isn't the right time to fritter away your energy on lighthearted pleasantries, even if you're in an upbeat mood and are ready to play. Concentrate on what's most significant, instead; a more serious approach will take you farther now than one based upon immediate gratification alone.

Your imagination reveals a significant truth as the farsighted Sagittarius Moon travels through your 12th House of Destiny. But even if you uncover a long-buried secret, you may not be willing to tell anyone else yet. Keeping your discovery to yourself until after the Moon enters your sign tomorrow allows you to refine your thoughts until they are ready for prime time viewing. Trust your instincts when it comes to spilling the beans.

Social networks are a lifeline to your future now as friends and acquaintances encourage you to step beyond your regular limits and try something new. Oddly enough, it doesn't really matter whether or not you're able to turn your fantasies into reality today. It's exhilarating to feel free enough to allow your thoughts to reveal what's possible tomorrow. Save your practicality for another day; visionary thinking creates your path to success.

You are playing out all the variations of future scenarios in your head so you can map out the details of your ambitious strategy. Thankfully, you're thinking far beyond the narrow responsibilities of your current job as you contemplate your place in the world. But setting your goals too high could leave you feeling disappointed today. Nevertheless, dreaming big is still your best bet as long as you put your plans into action one small step at a time.

You can see the positive side of nearly anything today -- whether it exists in reality or not. However, you could be swept up in your own Pollyanna-like stories. You may be spinning your wheels, only to discover that you are not making any progress. However, your current job is to keep the faith no matter what happens. Luckily, your dreams might just come true if you maintain an unwavering belief in your potential.

You're willing to take a shortcut to finish your list of chores today because you can't wait until later to let your hair down and relax. Unfortunately, you're not likely to get your plans off the ground by just working faster. Don't be misled by jumping to conclusions. A slow and methodical approach improves your chances of reaching your destination sooner than you expect.

Your artistic and expressive energies are highly activated at work today. However, you may seek avenues of escape -- real or fantasy -- as a way of coping if you are stuck in a boring job. Unfortunately, this is a classic form of denial. Instead of slipping off the reality train into fantasy world, focus on the events in your immediate environment. Actively working to improve your situation today is smarter than burying your head in the sand.

You can easily spend much of this dreamy day lost in the inner spaces of your imagination. However, you could also get confused in the outer world by misinterpreting what you hear. You might even set off on your own, believing that you are following directions only to arrive at the wrong place. Do your best to stay mentally alert and physically present. Seeking out the company of others helps to keep your wandering mind from falling down the rabbit hole.

The pace of your life continues to be fever-pitched, and you might be growing weary of trying to keep up with all the action. Rolling with the punches isn't as easy as it sounds. You may feel less interested in external events and long for some peace and quiet. However, your self-interests take a back seat to the needs of others today, as your ego temporarily loses interest in receiving acknowledgment and approval. Connect with the people in your life who matter most. Communication is vital, even if you think you have nothing special to say.

The most in-depth analysis won't likely help to solve your current dilemma. Employing a rational strategy is a trap now since you cannot think your way out of the binds of logic with psychic Neptune in the picture. Whether you like it or not, you must rely on your imagination for the answers. Although the idea of dreaming your way to success makes you nervous, it's time to trust something beyond language. The power of faith is so strong that it might just rock your world.

You aren't being as clear as you think and could be easily misunderstood today, so back up your actions with verbal or written communication. Although your thoughts are original and eclectic, you might be feeling physically drained; you simply may not have the energy to follow through with your brilliant ideas. Don't be hard on yourself if you aren't as productive as you wish. Continue to visualize your goals, while remembering that good things come to those who wait.

You are swimming in a sea of your own feelings now. However, you could encounter trouble determining which way the currents are actually flowing and therefore you find it impossible to get your bearings. Your actions are dispersed by boundless Neptune and you might feel defeated or lost if you focus solely on personal gain. Take a deep breath and let your personal worries dissipate into the limitless sea of consciousness. The wisdom of the cosmos is yours if you get out of your own way.

It looks like you are pretty clear about who you are, where you are going and why you want to go there. But as you march along your path, circumstances evolve and morph into something different than the ones that motivated your original plan. Needless to say, this bait-and-switch by the cosmos can be rather daunting. It's imperative that you use your logic to think your solution to this dilemma through before taking any action. The good news is that you Archers are up for the challenge.

Subtle distractions are blipping on your radar screen and your tendency is to narrow your focus so that you can stay on track. If, however, you embrace the unknown mysteries of the day, you're able to move closer to your goals and have a more enjoyable time in the process. The difficulty is that your navigational bearings might get mixed up. The faster you drive toward your destination, the more lost you feel. Continue doing your work and don't try so hard to get somewhere else. Keep your heart open and be here now.

Old issues that need resolution are weighing heavy on your mind today. However, you might wish you could check out and avoid the whole mess. The problem is that you may not have a concrete plan in place yet, so your withdrawal reflects your uncertainty. But this lack of clarity isn't as bad as it seems, for your creative visions are in a heightened state of awareness. Slip into your daydreams and imagine all the colorful possibilities of your future.

Your smile can be an enigma to others since they have no idea what's making you so happy. You're secretly feeling proud of yourself as you have found a new direction in your life, even if it isn't obvious to those around you. Although you may be accused of irresponsibility today, you really aren't as spacey as you seem. You are, in fact, navigating with the best tool in your toolbox -- your imagination. Throw away the maps; you know exactly what to do.

You may be flying by the seat of your pants now while the Sun in your 5th House of Fun and Games connects with irrepressible Uranus in your impulsive sign. You're extremely motivated to see if you can outsmart karma with your radical behavior. Your mind is crackling with ingenious ideas now, and you are eager to see how they manifest in the real world. Although your drive for success is admirable, don't forget to balance your hard work with plenty of play.

You have a lot of details on your plate today, but you're clever enough to figure out a way to do something more fun instead. You might channel your creativity toward planning an escape from work rather than finishing a project. Ironically, the most radical ideas are the ones you can most likely get away with now, so be outrageous and think outside of the box. You won't ever know what could happen unless you try. Spread your wings and fly.

Events are unfolding so quickly today that you may not have a chance to analyze a situation before jumping into the drama. Normally, this wouldn't bother you in the least, but now you might find yourself in an unfamiliar social setting that surprisingly stretches your limits too far. Don't let fear prevent you from being fully in the moment. It's better to say too much now than too little. Expect the unexpected; the more flexible you are, the greater the rewards.

You're not completely thrilled about being pushed out into the public eye today, but it's probably a smart idea to hide your annoyance for a while longer. Overcoming your resistance enables you to surprise others with a stellar performance. Playing your part can bring recognition by your peers or even a raise in pay, so don't say no just because the thought of being on stage makes you feel uncomfortable. Step into the spotlight and shine.

You can get away with being as weird as you want now, setting the stage for a memorable experience. Your need to do something totally outrageous may reach a point of no return today, provoking you to act impulsively. But rather than being sensitive to the needs of others, maverick Uranus harmonizes with the Sun in your sign, encouraging you to do whatever you wish. Nevertheless, there are still unspoken boundaries. Don't step too far over the edge or you'll have to invest a bit of time later cleaning up an unnecessary mess.

You are on a mission today and you won't let someone get in your way without putting up a fight. Fortunately, you can emerge a winner if you are honest about your intentions and don't scatter your energy. Stand up for your convictions, even if you would prefer to avoid conflict. Hopefully, the skirmish will be over quickly and you'll be able to get on with your work once the air is cleared and others realize you mean business.

Quirky acquaintances inspire you today, especially if you see them as your ticket to ride. You may feel restrained by current social circumstances, challenging you to escape the boredom of the day. However, it's easier to try something totally different when you're hanging out with free-spirited innovators. Nevertheless, it's a mistake to expect someone else to make your move for you; push beyond your comfort zone and follow your bliss.

You could be the hero who saves the day at work if you are willing to move beyond your fears and share your unorthodox solution to a complicated problem. Although you might expect others to reject your eccentric idea, they may quickly approve of the plan because they appreciate your radical perspective now. Don't hold your punches; state your case and then let go of any attachment you have to the outcome. It won't take long for others to recognize your genius.

It's time to resurrect your dreams of taking a magical holiday to an exotic destination. The Sun in your 9th House of Travel creates an easy trine to irrepressible Uranus in your 5th House of Play, transforming an unfulfilled fantasy into a realistic possibility. But don't bother coloring in all the details yet; just declare your intentions now and start making plans. The anticipation is half the fun.

There are a few surprises in your personal life that demand your attention now, but ultimately everything should turn out better than you expect. Your drive for stability on the home front runs up against your desire for more personal freedom. Normally, you aren't thrilled when unexpected change strikes; however, you are relieved today when the stuck energy is finally released. Take advantage of this opportunity to finally let go of old fears because they only stand in the way of your potential happiness.

You have an amazing opportunity today to reveal a part of your personality that you have been hiding from the rest of the world. Fortunately, your key planet Uranus forms a superconductive trine with the Sun and Mercury in your 7th House of Partnerships today, electrifying your connections with others. An existing relationship can be strengthened now if you take a risk and share what's in your heart, even if your feelings are a bit unconventional. Don't hold back; this is your ultimate chance to be uniquely you.

A long-awaited breakthrough at work is possible today and it could impact your finances in a positive way. There's no need to restrict the stream of innovative ideas that you can bring to the table now. But don't waste time making plans or telling everyone what you intend to do in the future. Your intuitive channels are wide open, so get busy and follow your instincts right now before the cosmic tides change direction.

You may run head first into an obstacle currently blocking your creative expression. You are often able to impulsively power your way right through the resistance -- and you are awe-inspiring when this bold tactic works. However, an impulsive attack is fool hardy now and could even lead to further frustration. Stop pushing so hard and attempt to understand what this delay can teach you before making a new strategy and trying again. Save yourself from a colossal headache by not fighting the inevitable.

Self-judgments bubble up to the surface now, but you might be uncertain about what is triggering your uncharacteristic negativity. You could believe that you won't get what you want, but you probably are not able to see the entire picture at this time. You need to wait until the current situation plays through to its conclusion. Your words may not have as much impact today as you wish, but your patience and positive attitude still can dramatically shift the energy in just a few days.

It's easy to talk about all those things you would like to change, but making even the simplest adjustments can seem impossible now. This is not a time to accept defeat just because restrictive circumstances might prevent further progress. Don't give up; even if you aren't feeling very confident today, tactical discussions set the stage for the upcoming action. Instead of getting overwhelmed by the details, focus your intentions on the ultimate destination. It's an uphill struggle, but the joy you experience when you reach the top will make all the hard work worthwhile.

You might be feeling a low-level panic beginning to form in the pit of your stomach today. The cosmic energy has shifted and it may seem as if you have missed your opportunity to do something extraordinary. Although stern Saturn is testing you now, this current trial won't last very long if you don't let discouragement get the best of you. Instead, concentrate on gaining clarity about a crucial life lesson you don't want to repeat again. Immediate gratification is not as important when you are busy building a solid foundation for your future.

Your rational response to the difficult conditions you now must contend with has significant ramifications in the days ahead. Consider the various alternatives as you face the speed bumps on the road of life. If you take the obstacles too fast, they can wreak havoc on your nerves. But if you slow down and treat them with respect, there will be little lasting pain. Make all necessary adjustments, and make them again if you must. Watch the signs and take your cues from reality; it's telling you exactly what you need to know.

Some aspects of your home and family dynamics might not be going according to your plan, but today you can make positive choices which put you back on the right track. Paradoxically, your flexible attitude gets you farther than trying to sustain your current position. Even if your circumstances seem immovable now, continue to imagine your ideal destination. Once you visualize your goal, don't be afraid to work hard to make it real. Your tenacity is an essential key to your success.

You may be facing an emotional dilemma as your plans conflict with the schedules of others. Even your close friends add stress if they act too impulsively for your taste today. They might even expect your assistance in fulfilling their responsibilities. As unfair as it seems, your ability to roll with everyone's demands now helps your companions in the moment and you in the long run. Nothing makes you happier than when you create a solution where everyone comes out a winner.

You could grow quite philosophical today as you seek to fulfill your basic material needs while also satisfying your sensual desires. Your intuition encourages you to develop an integral vision of your ideal future, but it's apparent that you must make adjustments to your plan as circumstances continue to shift. You might not be able to change your current situation immediately, but consistent effort over a longer stretch of time brings you a lot closer to achieving your goals.

Although you have recently felt the expansive power of optimistic Jupiter, you might realize that all is not rosy in the kingdom today. You don't like being brought back down to earth by somber Saturn, but it's nearly impossible to remain confident when you experience a setback on your path. Don't fight what you cannot change; retreat long enough to regain solid footing. Take the necessary steps to stabilize your life now; the pace is likely to speed up soon and you will want to be ready to race forward as soon as reality gives you the green light.

Focusing on your weaknesses now could lead to a temporary loss of confidence. However, this nagging self-doubt is not because you are less than capable. Your key planet, sobering Saturn, is stressed by a square from the Sun today, highlighting your shortcomings and making others sound overly critical. Don't be concerned with the negativity, even if you feel the brunt of someone's personal attack. Take a deep breath and simply acknowledge the feedback, whether it is valid or not. Use whatever constructive advice you receive to improve your work and then move on.

Accepting the temporary limitations may not be an easy task now, but it might be the key to your personal freedom. However, this isn't an excuse to ignore your responsibilities or other people's boundaries. Rather, it's an exercise in working within the confines of the current awkward circumstances. Resist acting on your impulsive reactions just enough to maintain the status quo. Today's problems will seem less overwhelming in the brilliant light of tomorrow's Aquarius Full Moon.

The wide-open seas have no distinct boundaries, symbolizing an ideal environment for you Fish. However, restrictive Saturn now presents you with structures that seem to restrain your movement. Don't become overly consumed with regaining your sense of mobility. Instead, use the current situation as a catalyst to reconsider your direction. Take care of your personal needs first; your offer of help meets less resistance from others if you have your own life in order.

Even if you believed that everything was under control, you wake up today realizing that you must have been dreaming. The Aquarius Full Moon activates your 11th House of Hopes and Wishes, firing up all your favorite fantasies. As long as you are willing to ride your feelings to their logical conclusions, it can be a very stimulating day. But don't try to stop the show too soon or you might only make matters more complex. Get out of your head and let your heart lead the way.

Perhaps you thought this was going to be just another typical weekend, but apparently, the cosmos has different plans in store for you. Set your schedule aside now, for it probably won't play out anything like you expected. You may be disappointed that you're not getting your way as Saturn the Teacher squares the Aquarius Full Moon in your 10th House of Status. Nevertheless, flexibility can simplify your life and take the pressure off your production anxiety at the same time. Relaxing your rigidity gives magic a chance to happen.

It may be wise to let someone else put on the show and dance at the edge of the cliff today. However, your overconfidence could lead you to take on too much as the Aquarius Full Moon shines in your 9th House of Big Ideas. Thankfully, you are a natural at juggling thoughts and can keep more balls in the air than anyone else. Pare back your commitments before you find yourself in over your head. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

Although it might seem as if everyone is getting in your way to purposefully upset you today, this conspiracy theory is highly unlikely. Unfortunately, people can send a message that lacks compassion as the Aquarius Full Moon stirs up trouble in your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Nevertheless, your acute sensitivity leads you to take things too personally. If you step back to gain perspective now, you will be better equipped to handle any emotional twists and turns that come your way.

Your moods are like a pendulum today, slowly swinging back and forth between your wish to be responsible and your desire to escape from your obligations. Hopefully, you aren't planning on a day of relaxation because your life might be fraught with complex relationship choices now that the Full Moon rattles your 7th House of Companions. It may feel like you have to defend your integrity but that can be more your issue than anyone else's. Your good intentions will shine through if you just continue to act with kindness.

It may take all of your concentration just to keep up with your own thoughts today. The Aquarius Full Moon lights up your 6th House of Routine, asking you to let the most radical ideas slip away while catching the best ones in the net of your consciousness. Don't bother trying to accomplish too many mundane tasks now; just go wherever your mind wanders. You will land safely back on earth later in the week inspired to be more productive than ever.

You might be a bit out of alignment with your friends today, as if you can't quite make the awkward interpersonal dynamics work. Although you may attempt to control your feelings as stern Saturn squares the Aquarius Full Moon in your 5th House of Self-Expression, it's challenging to overcome your anxiety. It's okay if you don't meet someone else's expectations now; your current job is to be true to yourself. Let your words flow directly from your heart; resolution is more likely when you are your authentic self.

It is as if you're driving on an open road without a posted speed limit. Your responses are highly tuned today and there isn't much that appears in front of you that you cannot successfully navigate. However, the Aquarius Full Moon brightens your 4th House of Foundations, allowing you to optimize the energies of the day while still enjoying your mental sightseeing tour. Slow down your thoughts to get the most from this lunar light; focusing on your long-term goals is smarter than trying to find a short-term solution.

Although you are often only interested in the big picture, you're more inclined to concentrate and deliberate on one thought at a time today as the Aquarius Full Moon spotlights your 3rd House of Information. You might feel as if you need blinders to help narrow your focus. But don't waste energy trying to make sense of every little detail in relationship to the distant horizon. Acknowledging the tension between your individual perspective and a more global approach may be enough to improve your attitude and inspire your progress.

You may be intrigued by an alternative to augment your income now that new enterprising ideas pop into awareness. However, you can still feel restrained by your outdated beliefs as your key planet Saturn squares the Aquarius Full Moon in your 2nd House of Money. You might have to let go of an old plan in order to see what's around the next bend. Instead of waiting for a situation that requires you to react on the fly, pre-emptively process what's on your plate to make room for the present.

You wake up excited to face the day, although you might quickly discover that you're not in complete control of your changing moods. Normally, you prefer a conceptual approach to your feelings, but today's Aquarius Full Moon lifts your buried emotions to the surface. Rather than succumbing to your unpredictable desires, seek out other like-minded eccentrics with whom you can travel to the edges of the universe. Philosophical conversations with friends help to balance the current vagaries of your heart.

Often times, you're more comfortable with your dreams when they are just a series of symbols that play out in your imagination. However, you are more likely to invent long-winded explanations today that end up lost in translation. Your environment is intellectually noisier than you prefer now, especially while the Aquarius Full Moon illuminates your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. It's easier if you remember that the distractions arise from within you and not from the outer world, regardless of appearances. A bit of silence is part of the cure.

Staying within your own limits is a tall order today, especially if someone is sending you mixed messages. It may seem as if a friend is flirting with you one minute and ignoring you the next. Don't be afraid to ask for what you really want, but be prepared to receive a cool reality check if you need it. There might be more going on within your imagination than you realize. Nevertheless, every fleeting fantasy doesn't have to come true.

You may be confused about what you're supposed to be doing today because you don't know whether to help out at home, volunteer at a community event or lend a hand to a friend in need. Although striving for your highest ideals is admirable, you might think that you've failed before you even start because it's impossible for you to live up to your own expectations now. You're tempted to take on too much and miss the meaning of life in the process; slow down, be gentle with yourself and enjoy the ride.

You feel as if you're being pulled in opposite directions today as you attempt to apply your ideas to advance your agenda. However, it's counterproductive to try to solidify your plans while the Moon is journeying through otherworldly Pisces. In fact, the more you narrow your focus, the farther off track you go. But don't totally surrender to your fantasies, either. Your best strategy is to explore your imagination for a short while before returning to your work in the real world with a fresh perspective.

Your dreams are so vivid now that they won't go away even after you wake up and start your day. You might try to stuff them back into a convenient compartment so you can concentrate on your work. Nevertheless, it's not in your best interest to limit yourself to the rational realm today or you could miss out on the benefits of riding an inspirational high. Let others know that it may take more time to put all your facts in order. Celebrating your creativity is the ultimate way to capture this magical buzz.

You might not be ready to express your desires today, but your uncharacteristic caution doesn't mean that you are uncertain about what you want. You just need more time for everything to settle down in order to decide how much to share. Until your mental clarity returns, it's best now to err on the side of saying less. You can always tell the rest of the story later when the moment is right. In the meantime, let your dreams run wild and enjoy the show.

It seems as if your friends and coworkers have grown wishy-washy, resisting your requests to be more specific about their feelings. It's frustrating when everyone appears to stop just short of what needs to be said. You're puzzled by their behavior and might not even be able to intelligently respond to the awkward silence now. Instead of asking more questions and putting others on the defense, wait a couple of days before seeking answers again. You can catch more flies with honey than with vinegar.

You may be disappointed today when you realize that your vision of the future is built on a fantasy. Whether you had your hopes pinned on an image of success in business or in love, they might fade as you get closer to the object of your desire. However, continuing to feed your dreams may be enough to keep them alive until your current confusion passes. Nearly anything is possible if your faith is strong enough and you're willing to put in the required work. Don't stop believing.

Your soft and gentle approach may seem a bit out of place today, but a deep desire to connect with others flows from a newfound sense of vulnerability. Fortunately, you don't mind being seen in this state now, yet old self-protective fears still encourage you to maintain some emotional distance. Keep in mind that your actions might be misunderstood now, so take the time to explain your intentions as clearly as possible. Speak from your heart and you can't go wrong.

You aren't expressing yourself freely these days, but this uncharacteristic silence isn't because you're intentionally withholding information from those who want to know more. Your motives are likely quite simple now, yet sometimes language complicates matters in unforeseen ways. Instead of trying to justify your feelings, just let others know that you need a bit of time to sort yourself out. Avoid confrontation at all costs; don't stir up any trouble until tomorrow when the cosmic forces are more harmonious.

Drama seems to follow you wherever you go today. Although your practical outlook helps you navigate the bumpy roads of relationships, you might run into an abrupt ending of the highway. If you want to continue on your way, you have no choice but to clear a new path to travel on. Don't worry about the logistics for now; maintain a positive attitude and keep inching forward. Taking the high road whenever possible leaves you sitting pretty by the time you reach your destination.

You encounter an unexpected glitch today that stems from your current financial condition. Even if you believe that you're in good fiscal shape, it might become apparent now that you overlooked a small detail that could become problematic. Unfortunately, there's no friendly superhero to magically bail you out just in the nick of time. Even if you must dig yourself out of trouble on your own, take heart because your current efforts should do the trick. You're more powerful than you think.

You have a lot to say now because your inner world may be in a bit of turmoil. Fortunately, the Moon's presence in your 1st House of Self allows you to share your feelings without becoming overly emotional. The good news is that others know what's in your heart before you open your mouth. And when you start talking, your poetic words can mesmerize everyone today before they even know what hit them. Use your intuition wisely; don't squander your gift on meaningless matters.

Something flashy catches your eye and perks you up today because you're up for a good challenge. But it's nearly impossible to remain excited about upcoming events if you feel restrained by the memory of a previous failure. However, you can turn an emotional corner now as romantic Venus moves into your 5th House of Love for the next three weeks. There''s no reason to cling to past disappointments; it's a new day and adopting an optimistic attitude is the first step toward creating the happiness that you seek.

You tend to long for more emotional security in your relationships now that your key planet Venus is visiting your 4th House of Foundations. Nevertheless, you can be so insistent about what you want today that problems may arise if you are overly inflexible. Instead of worrying about what you lack, count your blessings. Luckily, your confidence is growing day by day, enabling you to feel happier about your current situation. You have a better chance of finding satisfaction when you demand less and give more.

Sometimes love seems illusory and far away, like a pot of gold at a rainbow's end. However, the action is closer to home today. Your social life receives a cosmic boost when magnetic Venus shifts into your 3rd House of Immediate Environment for a three-week stay. Connecting with the positive vibes around you is more satisfying than dreaming about unrealized possibilities. Demonstrate the warmth of your feelings with a romantic gesture. Don't leave things to the imagination; get up close and personal so others know exactly how you feel.

You are experiencing an emotional transition and may worry that the good times are slipping out of your grasp now that sensual Venus has left your sign. Thankfully, you could benefit by looking back over the past few weeks to see what gifts the planet of love and beauty may have brought into your life. As the Goddess of Pleasure settles into your 2nd House of Self-Esteem, build on what you have already established. Focusing your energy on creating more stability in your relationships gives your feelings a chance to grow.

People fall under your charming spell while enchanting Venus is enhancing your 1st House of Personality. Consciously integrate the beauty of Venus into your current lifestyle by paying more attention to your image. Just remember that how you relate to others is completely up to you. Don't ignore the love that's already in your life or shut off a potential admirer prematurely. You can't help but be noticed now so make sure to present the best version of yourself. Keep in mind that your big heart is your best asset.

You might feel remorseful today if you recently suppressed your desires because you were afraid of the possible consequences. Fortunately, all is not lost; you still have ample opportunities to experience pleasure ahead. In the meantime, transform your cravings for romance into something more spiritual while Venus journeys through your 12th House of Soul Consciousness. Love comes in many guises now, so open your heart and let the magic begin.

You don't have as much time to yourself as you want these days because your social life is keeping you hopping from one event to the next. Although it's wonderful to be part of a group where affection and camaraderie flow easily, you may be fearful about losing yourself in the crowd. The emphasis on social activities could define the next few weeks as your key planet Venus charms her way through your 11th House of Friends and Associates. Don't miss your chance to mix and mingle now; you can pull back and redefine your boundaries later once you've had your fill of the fun.

Although you could put on quite a performance today, your fear of failure might be holding you back from deciding how much effort to channel into a current project or relationship. You may have to manage the conflict between your personal desires and social obligations, but you are still likely to receive accolades from an adoring crowd anyway. Don't try to compartmentalize everything in your life now; just accept the emotional goodies wherever they appear. Celebrating the magic of the present moment doesn't mean you are any less serious about your future.

You may seek the respite of taking time off now, especially if you have been putting in long hours at work. Unfortunately, even your social calendar is brimming with commitments you can't escape. You must deliver on your promises today but, luckily, you can enjoy yourself in the process as flirty Venus shimmies into your 9th House of Exploration. All work and no play isn't part of the Adventurous Archer's game plan. You can take the party wherever you go.

You might truly believe that your life will quickly unravel if you don't act more responsibly than everyone else. But there is a time and a place to let go of unfinished chores and unfulfilled promises. Don't judge yourself negatively just because you want to partake in the fun. If you have carried your share of the load, it's now time to recapture a more innocent and playful attitude. As Tom Robbins says, "It's never too late to have a happy childhood."

If everyone around you seems to be having lots of fun now, this is a not-so-gentle reminder that you deserve to enjoy yourself, too. Perhaps you recently had to limit your recreational activities because so much was expected of you. However, the energy is shifting now as amorous Venus dances into your 7th House of Companions. Make a phone call and schedule a play date with someone you admire. You have earned the privilege of self-indulgence, so seize the opportunity for romance while it lasts.
