You can't help but grow weary of people who assume you are always willing to drop your personal agenda in order to go with the flow. You may be annoyed with those who expect you to set your personal desires aside in order to please them. Although you compassionate Fish are often happiest when serving an altruistic cause, the Moon's current visit to your sign makes you aware that your own desires require attention, too. Discuss your needs openly; tense relationship dynamics should relax once everyone understands your current position. Simply being honest gives others a chance to love you more.

Conflicting cosmic messages motivate you to boldly take charge while they simultaneously add confusion to your life. It's not a simple matter to sustain your natural rhythm today because your fear of rejection can hold you back and prevent you from swinging into action. Your task is to find ways to honor both perspectives. Go ahead and move into new territory, but proceed slowly to allow time for your emotions to catch up with your intentions.

You are dreaming in bright colors today and the symbols are different from what they once were. Nevertheless, you are not ready to let go of familiar thoughts and feelings. Don't be hard on yourself; you really don't need to move any faster than what feels right. It isn't necessary to justify your actions -- or lack of them -- to anyone now. Just trust the amazing timing of the universe and graciously accept that you are right on schedule. Exploring your imagination opens the door to new worlds.

Restless feelings may be distracting today, yet you still can play the role of a quiet observer and carefully make notes while considering your alternatives. Allow your inner strategist to lead the way now, enabling you to be more comfortable with the faster pace of your life. Cultivate this intuitive voice as it works to create the most calm and efficient path possible through the stormy emotional seas that rage around you.

You need to be noticed and appreciated by others while the extroverted Aries Moon travels through your 10th House of Status. Although your passions are strong today, they may still be in direct conflict with the logic that you've wrapped around yourself for protection. Thankfully, you instinctively understand that the emotional tidal currents are in constant flux. Ride this wave out and you'll feel like your old self soon enough.

Even if you're still uncertain about your priorities today, you're probably feeling more optimistic than you did yesterday. Your path is opening up and you are, at least temporarily, aware of your destiny. However, you might quickly grow frustrated if you believe you need to reach your destination right away. Your journey is going to take time to unfold. Don't strive for goals that are so unreachable that you set yourself up for short-term disappointment. Grant yourself permission to have fun along the way.

You know you must do the right thing now, whatever the emotional cost. Perhaps you recently retreated for a while to make certain your feelings are stable enough to build your future on. Now that your analysis is complete, you are ready to set your plan into motion today; unfortunately, this may not be as easy as you think. Go ahead and make your move, but remember your real goal is your long-term happiness and not immediate gratification.

You are able to play out the current situation with your usual style and grace, even if you face a crisis of uncertainty. However, you can dramatically improve the outcome of a tricky set of circumstances if you show up with the proper attitude. You just might snatch success from the looming jaws of defeat, especially if you're working in a partnership now. Remember that you are creating foundational structures and you will have plenty of time to add all the bells and whistles later on.

You're acutely aware that something is lurking in the shadows of your life now. Thankfully, you are better equipped to deal with things once you bring them out into the light. Although there is a dark side to the magnetic power of Scorpio, this mystery adds to your mystique. It isn't an evil force; it's merely a portion of reality that is not yet known. Watch carefully for signs of suppressed possessiveness, resentment or jealousy. Facing an unresolved issue with fierce determination today all but ensures that you will emerge stronger and brighter in the very near future.

You easily fall in love with life now and you're eager for something special to happen. But you're unable to fully express your usual happy-go-lucky optimism as long as your progress is being impeded. Don't look at a current problem as an obstacle blocking your happiness. Instead, view this delay as a gift from the universe. Slowing down to reassess your priorities gives you the chance to learn an important lesson from your experiences along the way.

You are likely to exhibit self-restraint today rather than sharing your initial reaction to an intense situation. Your conservative approach isn't about politics; it's about your emotional health. Every personal relationship brings its own set of baggage and it's up to you to determine how much you want to carry. You are willing to settle for less excitement, love or money than gamble on the chance of losing everything. However, nothing ventured; nothing gained. Taking a small calculated risk now is better than playing it safe.

Your telephone is ringing off the hook today, but the psychic calls seem to contain mixed messages. You can't decide whether to follow your initial instinct to socialize or your current craving to be alone. Whatever path you choose now, interpersonal dynamics continue to change whether you like it or not. Staying flexible enables you to gracefully handle the current contradictions as you experience them. Listen to your intuition but trust your common sense.

You might feel as if you aren't receiving enough emotional support now from your closest allies. You could grow discouraged today, but being down on yourself or others isn't an effective use of your time. Your smartest strategy is to analyze the situation objectively, isolate the source of your negativity and then let it go. Create healthy new patterns and keep the communication channels open; even if the process doesn't start off smoothly, stirring things up can bring positive changes down the road.

Containing your emotions could be an ongoing challenge today as the Moon hooks up with wild Uranus in your impulsive sign. Part of the problem is that you may have to revise your agenda when facing circumstances beyond your control. Instead of creating more drama by attempting to escape, settle into the work that's now on your plate. Shifting your mind set to a more spiritual perspective helps to reduce the immediate stress. Thankfully, finishing an incomplete task now opens the door to possibilities for enjoyment later on.

You might not be fully forthcoming about your intentions today because you think that your exuberance could attract unwanted resistance. Practicing discretion now is a wise move; however, it's not enough to sit back and wait for the right moment. Use your current time wisely to improve upon your strategy for success. Your perseverance is very likely to be rewarded even if achieving satisfaction takes longer than you wish.

Other people's demands on your time could be distracting if you are surrounded by associates who just want to have fun. However, you know you can't take the risk of playing games that might pull you off track. Nevertheless, you would love to partake in the activities if the pressure of unfulfilled obligations wasn't weighing heavily on your mind. Don't bother with long-winded explanations; simply let those around you know that it's nothing personal and that you will join in the recreation after your work is done. Putting your priorities in the proper order is your best bet.

You're not interested in playing the role of the bad guy just because no one else is taking responsibility for what needs to be done today. The current dynamics can be nerve-racking, especially if your colleagues are as disorganized as they appear. But don't focus on what's wrong; although you might be correct in your assessment, confrontation won't bring you any closer to your goals now. Fortunately, your frustration should begin to fade tomorrow when everybody seems to be on the same page. Wait it out; time is on your side.

Your unrestrained exuberance about an upcoming adventure could make others slightly uncomfortable. Unfortunately, curbing your enthusiasm might create an energetic block that prevents you from getting much accomplished. Instead of slipping into denial because you're afraid of stepping on anyone's toes, just soften your delivery. It's not an all-or-nothing proposition; you can share what's on your mind without ill effects and continue to meet your obligations as long as you keep everything in perspective. A little sensitivity goes a long way.

You don't mind fighting fire with fire as long as you're well trained in pyrotechnical matters. However, it may be in your best interest to downplay your authority now and save a confrontation for another day. It's much easier to feel confident when you're in total control of the situation. Don't attempt to force any issues yet; temporarily acquiescing is a sign of strength, not of weakness. You'll be in a better position to apply your skills when you're back in the driver's seat tomorrow.

You can't postpone making a commitment for too much longer. Unfortunately, your current options may not yet include exactly what you're looking for now. You could even become so discouraged that you're tempted to throw in the towel and walk away from it all. However, accepting defeat won't make you any happier in the long run. Your persistence might help you find a way through the complicated maze of relationships. Be honest and admit your dissatisfaction while continuing to search for common ground.

If you are working on a major project, you might attempt to sprint to the finish line today, only to sadly realize that it's still too far away. A healthy dose of self-discipline is required so you don't burn out before you reach your goal. However, you're so ready to move on, it's nearly impossible to graciously accept any delays. Rather than wallowing in frustration, focus on the deep sense of gratification that you will feel when your work is completed and you can celebrate a job well done.

It seems as if there's a high price to pay if you take a risk to do something differently today. But your need to express your creativity is so strong that you worry about turning your life upside down. However, you might be too concerned with other people's reactions. Instead of wondering how your behavior will impact anyone else, simply focus on being as productive as possible in the present moment. No matter what happens, you will be in better shape later if you concentrate on being true to yourself now.

Expressing your emotions doesn't come easily today because you think your goals won't be supported by anyone else's expectations. You might assume that someone is already squaring off for battle, even before you say anything at all. However, you're not interested in engaging in a conflict; you just want people to acknowledge your feelings and validate your perceptions. You can defuse a potentially tense situation by avoiding the blame game and taking full responsibility for what's in your heart.

You could waste valuable time and energy exploring a wide variety of interests today. Although you're able to make progress, it still might feel as if there are stop signs in front of you, no matter which way you turn. But attempting to cover so much ground is a double-edged sword because you could miss an important lesson now unless you pause long enough to gain a clearer version of the current picture. There's no need to be in such a hurry to go anywhere when there's plenty for you to do right where you are.

You may erroneously believe that spending money on something you want today improves your chances for happiness. You might be tempted to take a quick weekend getaway, but don't necessarily have the extra cash for discretionary purchases. Nevertheless, don't get too discouraged because good news could arrive as early as next week. Believe it or not, focusing on work brings you a deeper satisfaction than the temporary pleasure of any escapist behavior.

Retreat from the center of the action today so you can take stock of your resources and gain a new perspective on recent events. The Moon moves into your 2nd House of Money, shifting your focus from fulfilling your psychological needs to handling practical matters. Although you prefer to dream about the good times in your future, managing your financial affairs may be the most rewarding thing to do now. Believe it or not, sometimes the mundane is more magical than anything else.

You might wake up on the wrong side of the bed today and convince yourself that your dreams can't possibly come true. However, the true source of your current frustration isn't that you're being denied the pleasures you seek; if anything, your problem is handling the excesses in your life. Scaling back your over-the-top expectations is a wise strategy that can help you find satisfaction now. Count your blessings; you might discover that you already have more than you need.

You may actually think you're being sensitive to the needs of others, but they might not share your perspective today. It's possible that your coworkers see you as more stubborn and overbearing than you actually feel. Re-examine your role in the current situation to make sure you're not sending out mixed messages that contribute to the misinterpretation of your actions. Having good intentions won't be enough to put your day in order unless your behavior is aligned with your long-term goals.

Fulfilling your current commitments becomes more important to you as the day wears on, even if it's tricky keeping up with everyone's expectations. You're willing to postpone a social activity in order to buy yourself more time. If your last minute change of plans offends someone, apologize and then move on -- but don't doubt your actions if they are consistent with your priorities. Trust your instincts; you know your limits better than anyone else.

Domestic responsibilities might conflict with professional obligations today, requiring you to make some difficult choices. Even if you're growing more optimistic about your plans for the future, you must acknowledge that you are only one human and you can't do everything all at once. You want to take care of those who depend on you, but others may have to temporarily fend for themselves. Simplify your life by fulfilling old promises before making new ones.

Don't let your cautious approach to making travel plans prevent you from considering more exotic possibilities. Although logical Mercury's shift into your analytical sign brings your common sense into play, you can be practical while simultaneously imagining a dream vacation. Just keep in mind that you will need to do your thorough research and create a solid itinerary if you are going to escape to someplace that's truly beyond the ordinary.

You are more than ready for a little downtime today so you can integrate your recent social activity and prepare for the next round. If you are tempted to take a chance on something or someone new, you still might be hesitant to leave the safety of the status quo behind. Even if your friends are encouraging you to push beyond your limits, don't do anything unless it feels right. Remember, you're not required to justify your actions; trust the intuitive flashes you receive and act on them with confidence.

A friend or partner might annoy you with obstinate behavior today as the fixed Taurus Moon plods through your 7th House of Relationships. Fortunately, you can maintain your position without letting your emotions get the best of you because of a harmonious connection between your key planets, assertive Mars and powerful Pluto. Others quickly discover that they are no match for your intensity now. Just remember not to expect results immediately; worthwhile objectives may take a while to reach fruition.

Putting a carefully considered financial plan into action now could save the day, but it's imperative to be conservative in your approach. Fortunately, you have sufficient energy to make changes and enough stamina to finish what you start. But it's still challenging to be responsible and act with restraint when you know what you want and see a way to obtain it. Fortunately, it's your choice; spending time on the details of your new budget can be the smartest strategy to prevent spreading your resources too thin.

Love may knock at your door today while the sensual Taurus Moon glides through your 5th House of Romance, but reality could fall short of your idealistic dreams. You might not be able to tell what has changed -- your feelings or the other person's -- but something seems different now. Even if you're not happy with the new situation at first, be patient. Don't be so stubborn that you miss the magic that's happening right in front of your nose.

Your inflexible opinions about a very close friend or family member could lead to conflict today, unless you're willing to meet others halfway. Instead of wasting everyone's time and energy with territorial posturing, stay aware of the changing dynamics on the home front so you can establish common ground. Giving others the benefit of the doubt is a healthy way to get the ball rolling. A consciously negotiated settlement based on mutual trust is ultimately more stable than a unilateral one built on fear.

You could run into logistical problems today if you are trying to follow a schedule that's overly rigid. Even the smallest delay in the morning could jumble your plans if you haven't allowed for some flexibility. Thankfully, you can be more productive and enjoy a slower pace to the day if you just postpone an appointment or two. More importantly, lightening your load gives you the room to easily respond to a surprise visitor or invitation, if necessary.

Although you may be acutely aware of the differences between what you want and what you actually need, you can't necessarily resolve the conflict. Your strong desires can lead you into a complicated interpersonal entanglement you might regret. Sometimes it's thrilling to succumb to your attractions without knowing the outcome, but it's wiser now to exercise caution so no one's feelings are hurt, including your own. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

You are drawn toward people who aren't afraid of expressing their feelings but you would prefer to avoid excess drama. You long for a deeper emotional connection and it's easy to move beyond your fears now if you are pushed by someone you trust. Naturally, you might try to resist by talking yourself into playing it safe one more time. However, a profound experience awaits you if you're willing to let go of your resistance and open your heart.

If you aren't keeping a secret today then someone else might be hiding the truth from you. In either case, there could be an important topic that needs to be addressed. Nevertheless, it may be better to just let things slide for now and focus on what you already know for sure. Everything else will be brought out into the open when the time is right. Patience is the key to your success.

Your friends may seem inflexible today, making demands that you're just not willing to acknowledge. It's tempting to just give them the silent treatment, but denial doesn't serve anyone's interests. Instead, be clear and let others know that they are asking for too much. You might be more inclined to offer them the very same thing they previously wanted once they stop pressuring you. Supportive behavior is best when it originates straight from the heart.

You might not be a happy camper today if you're wrestling with an old ghost that comes back to haunt you. Just when you think that you were done with complicated feelings of envy and jealousy, someone's poorly considered actions stir everything up once again. Don't be too hard on yourself or you could get hooked into the negative pattern. Instead, just observe your reactions and then let them go. There's no reason to let your past hijack the joy of the present moment.

You are all set to enjoy yourself today because your heart and your head are finally in sync. It is reassuring when your feelings and thoughts are on the same page and this internal consistency gives you an extra boost of confidence. However, you may have a run-in with a stubborn friend who has his own agenda and doesn't even try to see things your way. Don't press the issue now; there's no need to worry about something that won't even matter tomorrow.

Your diplomatic approach usually enables you to create common ground to avoid a disagreement. But today you could lock horns with a friend or lover and you might not opt for the easy way out. Standing up for your point of view is healthy as long as you make sure to pick your battles carefully. If you decide to fight for your position, just remember that it may take longer to resolve the issue than you expect. Keeping the conversation civilized allows you to state your case without hitting below the belt.

You don't understand why people seem resistant to your ideas today and could grow frustrated with their ambivalence. However, you might not say anything about your feelings because you don't want to create a scene. Unfortunately, withheld anger may turn to resentment if you don't attend to the issue directly. Ironically, if you manage to get things out into the open, a difficult situation can turn into a lovely and memorable one. Delivering the truth with kindness cultivates closer connections.

You have a short list of unavoidable chores and you're convinced that you have figured out the best way to finish them all efficiently. Unfortunately, you could be feeling so confident that you inadvertently offend someone by offhandedly dismissing a suggestion that was given with good intent. Just remember that you can still accomplish what's on your agenda, even if you take the time to seriously consider a different approach. Happily, you might be able to improve your original plan if you're clever enough to keep an open mind.

It may be a smart idea to set aside your important responsibilities for a while and take some time for yourself. Doing something that makes you smile can be exactly what the doctor ordered to increase your vitality and enthusiasm for your busy week ahead. Remember, all work and no play makes you an unhappy Goat today. Go out and kick up your hoofs while you have the chance.

There's a wide world of exciting possibilities in front of you, but previous promises may require you to limit your recreational activities. Even if you aren't ready to completely walk away from your social life today, it's wise to keep your intentions a secret until you're ready to make your escape. Just remain flexible enough so you can still make the most of your day even if satisfaction continues to remains elusive. Fulfilling your commitments brings its own unique type of gratification.

You aren't likely to give up your original agenda, even if changing circumstances demand that you modify your plans today. Your emotional mobility is limited with the obstinate Taurus Moon camped out in your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Nevertheless, you still have the ability to adjust your schedule if you consciously choose to cooperate with others. Improving your attitude is key to shifting the flow of energy in a positive direction.

A creative project may not go as planned now, yet there might not be much you can do about it. Strong feelings trigger an undertow of tension, setting into motion a sequence of events that pull you off your desired course. Each time you straighten things out and regain your center, everything quickly becomes bent out of shape again. Don't waste too much energy fighting the inevitable. You will feel better tomorrow if you let go of control today.

You might be confused about your long-term relationship aspirations today, especially if you get lost in the fog while wrestling with a romantic issue. Ironically, your goals become less clear the more your feelings are involved. Although you are at your best when you have a concrete plan in place, it's essential to rely on your faith now. Letting go of the wheel shows your willingness to be vulnerable and allows someone else to steer until you regain your sense of direction.

Your environment at home may be uncomfortably intense today, but this melodrama can be a blessing in disguise. You aren't typically inclined to hang out in the darker places of your mind, but now you are drawn into an exploration of heavier emotions. Consciously try to find a rhythm that works without necessarily pushing the outer edges of the envelope too hard. Making an effort to keep communication channels open inspires others to do the same.

Trusting your current optimism is tricky today if you secretly believe the good times won't last. Even if you receive great news, you're probably reluctant to accept it at face value. Your fear of flying by the seat of your pants could pull you down into a familiar watery world of feelings. However, your confidence can soar to new heights if you make time to explore your attachments to the past before attempting to master the future.

You might have to face strong resistance now when you share your concerns about your home or family. It feels as if you're tied up in a tight emotional package. It may seem as if you have no easy way to transform the tension, but an intuitive solution could be within your grasp. Even if you don't think you can find the proper fix, rest assured that it will come to you. If not today, then tomorrow. If not this week, then soon. Patience with yourself ensures your success; trusting the process is the first step.

You have a more realistic picture of how others perceive you now than you had in the past. However, your new found clarity doesn't necessarily give you a direct route out of your present dilemma. In fact, the frustration you face may stem from your belief that the current problem shouldn't be difficult to solve. No matter the level of anxiety, your understanding of its cause will help you move more quickly through the obstacles that are in your path.

Even if you choose to follow your heart into action now, a down-to-earth practicality about your dreams emanates from your head. You're ready to make a change, but it must be for the right reason. The best justification for anything you begin now comes from your own core values. Remember, if your new direction brings you emotional balance and spiritual growth, you're probably doing exactly what's right at this time in your life.

As much as you might want to cling to your past, your ambitions are pushing you into brand new territory today. Your strongest passions are undergoing metamorphosis as you explore new avenues of self-expression. You are at the center of your world now and carry a real sense of purpose. You have been preparing for this journey long enough; it's time to create a strategic plan that brings you a few steps closer to your desired destination.

You appear to be transparent to those who know you but your true colors are hidden from everyone now, even your closest friends. Complex worlds of fantasy are bubbling up from the depths of your own subconscious mind. Nevertheless, you need not be concerned with the workings of your imagination today; instead focus on bringing happiness and joy into the world -- even if you have to start with your own.

If a friend comes to you with a proposition today, you might have to tell him or her that you can't turn your back on your own personal freedom and integrity. Your response may feel harsh in the moment, but it must be said if it is the truth. Even if you have to deal with someone's anger, it's not your place to try to fix every situation. All you can do is listen and be a witness to whatever happens next. The only feelings you're responsible for are your own.

The battle between your logical head and your irrational heart is now in full swing. However, this conflict is playing out within your mind where no one else sees it. Instead, others think you're capable of holding a powerful position in the community while still remaining compassionate. The good news is you can be sensitive without losing face so there's no need to hide your process. You are more loveable when you share your inner truth.

Even if you currently worry that your world is becoming more restrictive, it's not. Reality demands that you take a leap of faith and focus your efforts on a singular path now. Keep in mind that this temporary narrowing of awareness also helps you to see the changing needs of those around you so you can respond accordingly. Thankfully, sharing your emotional perspective with your coworkers and friends makes all the trouble worthwhile.

No one knows better than you Rams how much easier it is to start a project than to finish it. However, pursuing pleasure sounds like a lot more fun than following through on your commitments. You're ready to cash in your chips today and head out for a good time as soon as an irresistible temptation comes along. Nevertheless, a creative approach to your work might help you settle down and focus. Meeting your obligations first allows you to play with a clear conscious later on.

A wonderful day could unfold before your very eyes without much effort on your part. In fact, if you must earn some money or venture into the world to work, you can't help but look forward to returning to the relaxation and fun that awaits you back in the comforts of home. Happily, you're able to enjoy yourself no matter where you are, as long as you feel safe and secure. The good news is you can take the party with you wherever you go.

You're operating at an extremely high level of efficiency, enabling you to achieve nearly any goal -- at least, that's how it feels today. However, you are so clever now that you could invite unnecessary trouble and your positive attitude can only go so far to save you. Happy times are heading your way, but don't get so blinded by the possible romantic delights that you forget your mundane responsibilities. Practicing moderation leads to more enjoyment than pushing the limits too far.

You are inspired by your attraction to the finer things in life now. Spending money is a tempting way to nurture yourself and your loved ones today. However, there are diminishing returns on buying your way to happiness. Stick within your budget while remembering that greater fulfillment can be found in the emotional and spiritual realms, rather than the material.

Life might be quite grand for you Lions now, making it all the more critical to remember that too much of a good thing can quickly turn sour. Your tendency is to gloss over anything negative at this time; you want to take a great idea and make it even better. Go ahead and pursue the enticing opportunities that come your way, but keep in mind that exaggeration isn't useful. Tempering your extravagances today enables your current pleasures to last into the future.

You are motivated to prove yourself on the job, but you may lack the follow-through you need now to stand out in front of the pack. You don't want to work so hard that you grow resentful because there's no time left over to relax. Relationship dynamics are tricky enough and expressing your personal needs does not necessarily add stability to the equation today. Naturally, it's lovely to be able to dream about your ideal scenario; but you can avoid creating drama by keeping some of your fantasies to yourself.

You can count your lucky stars now that your key planet Venus embraces bountiful Jupiter in your 11th House of Hopes and Wishes. You might receive a financial reward or, at least, fortunate news that positively impacts your life. However, your current optimism is not based on fate alone. Your sweetness works in your favor today, so use your cosmic good fortune to connect with like-minded souls. Dance until your heart is content.

You're ready to face complex issues that have been secretly troubling you. Yesterday's unconquerable mountain becomes today's pesky molehill. You're better equipped to project your needs into the world now, so others can clearly see your authentic self. Don't back down from your true purpose no matter what. Although you're tempted to kick back and enjoy the company of others while sweet Venus and joyful Jupiter are harmoniously working together, this journey is all about following your destiny.

Your planning period is coming to an end, so stop dreaming about your future and move purposefully toward it. Put your intentions into action by finally making those travel arrangements that have been floating around in your fantasies. The possibilities are endless if you're willing to take a chance and reach for your dreams. The time to hesitate is through, so get busy while the planets are smiling in your direction.

You have a rare opportunity to confront important issues about the secret mysteries of the universe and the complexities of intimacy. Fortunately, even the stickiest of subjects is now fair game for open discussion. The good news is things will lighten up and others just might shower you with love and appreciation. Even if you already know you're blessed, consciously give yourself permission to bask in the light.

Someone special may be warming up to you today and it makes your heart smile. Although his or her message could be quite poetic, it might lack real substance. On top of that confusion, it's challenging to put your own emotions into words. Thankfully, you feel needed, even if you don't understand why others are being so nice to you. Although you're having trouble finding your confidence, use your current experience as an opportunity to practice the acceptance of love.

You can feel the good vibes all around you and are, in turn, eager to do whatever is necessary to demonstrate your good intentions to others. Nevertheless, you could easily take your exuberance to an extreme, so be aware of your current tendency toward embellishing reality to make it taste sweeter. There will be a price to pay if you emotionally over-commit now. Consider the ramifications of your actions before you push the edges of the envelope too far for comfort.

You're usually pretty sure of yourself when you say something in front of a crowd, but you might inadvertently climb out on a limb now without realizing what you have done. Thankfully, you can avoid an uncomfortable situation by shifting gears to think about how others will perceive you rather than simply concentrating on delivering your message. Check your facts; it's not worth jeopardizing your reputation by spreading misinformation just because you want to be the leader of the pack.

You might feel as if your emotions have been recently on display for the whole world to see. You only have to say a few words and everyone already knows the entire story. Although being in the spotlight can make you uncomfortable today, it's entirely possible that no one knows any more than you've told him or her; it's just your imagination that feels invaded. Don't waste energy protecting what isn't in danger and worrying about things that will never happen. Focus on reality instead.

It's a communication-rich day, but you might have trouble saying exactly what you mean because your mind is wandering with the Moon back in your changeable sign. Oddly enough, people won't understand you if you try to be too concrete when telling them the facts. You're better off today sticking with sharing your dreams than trying to give someone driving directions. For now, be a visionary and simply follow the lead of your vivid imagination as it paves a path into your future.

You long to share your secrets today and may go to great lengths to find the right time and place to tell someone what you've been hiding. However, one reason you are not as threatened now is that you are temporarily living in a world of dreams and might believe that you are emotionally secure. Just make sure you don't set yourself up for an unexpected surprise when, in a few days, reality comes knocking at your door. Finding a trustworthy confidant makes all the difference in the world.

An intense personal situation lightens up today, but it might only be a temporary reprieve in the storm. Unfortunately, the underlying problem is not so easy to resolve. It's more likely that you're just taking a break and aren't feeling the same sense of urgency to get to the bottom of the conflict. However, you are just putting off the inevitable. You might as well dig in now since you must deal with reality sooner or later. A simple attitude adjustment aims you in the right direction.

You want to convey the information you have at your disposal as correctly as you can. You are determined to be accurate with discerning Mercury now visiting your rational sign. However, dispersive Neptune is pulling the other way, diffusing your carefully chosen words and confusing your thoughts. Try to be less judgmental in your tone, for your attempts at clarification can be perceived by others as a power play. Let yourself think like a poet instead of a scientist for a change.

Your big ideas may conflict with how others want to do their job today. Naturally, you want to get along with your friends, but it's not going to be that easy because a simple misunderstanding could upset the dynamics. You must let go of your hidden motives for your own good. Maneuvering for power can interfere with your straightforward attempts to finish the work at hand. Don't try to solve a problem by aiming at the distant horizon, focus on the target closest to you instead.

One of your familiar dilemmas centers on your natural desire to go deeper and someone else's fear of those very same emotional depths. Instead of diving beneath the surface today, you might want to downplay your most intense passions. Nevertheless, your good intentions could backfire as your spouse, partner or friend grows annoyed and thinks you are being disingenuous. Rather than dancing around the truth, it's better to be honest and speak straight from your heart.

Relationship dynamics go through changes today as fast as the clouds drift by on a breezy summer day. Unfortunately, you may be confused by the current lack of stability, making it nearly impossible to tell what is true and what is not. Adjust your strategy and keep your long-term goals in sight instead of focusing on the minute details of your fluctuating moods. Ironically, consciously shifting your perspective to the changing circumstances actually anchors your emotions when you need it most.

You really want to understand the underlying motives of someone's behavior now, but the source of the emotional intensity is elusive. Every time you step closer to an answer, it changes form and slips away. Don't let your frustration level build too high as you attempt to solve the mystery. Accept that you may have to wait a few days to wrap your mind around the current puzzle. In the meantime, the best thing you can do is mind your own business and channel your curiosity into your work.

People all around you might seem as if they are too showy for your personal taste today. You're not sure you can trust their bold actions which appear to be covering up something else. Try as you might, you can't figure out what's beneath their slick veneers and charming smiles now. Instead of relying on logic, go to your own inner source by opening a channel directly into your imagination. Bypassing analysis is your fastest way to discovering the truth.

You would like to drift off in your beautiful balloon today, but people may be so demanding of your time that your fantasies will have to wait. It's as if you have lots of metaphysical information at your disposal, but it disappears as soon as you try to express it with any certainty. Some of the most magical experiences are better left unspoken. Keep the dream alive by trusting the creative process instead.

Visions of romance come and go with the wind but you need to express your feelings to manifest the love you seek. Unfortunately, your fear of rejection or commitment may prevent you from acting on your desires today. Your emotions can lead you astray if you let your imagination run wild. Rely on the facts now and not your intuition; cool logic keeps you on track better than chasing a dream.

Your uncharacteristic uncertainty prompts you to withhold your true feelings today. You might not feel emotionally safe enough to fully let down your guard out in public. However, you could find unexpected pleasure within the familiar comfort of your own home and family now. Nevertheless, current circumstances keep you busier than you prefer. You can't change everything to your liking, but making little adjustments throughout the day brings enough progress to keep you happy.

Your desire to keep the flow of information moving swiftly along is in direct conflict with complex circumstances that are requiring you to slow the pace down. Although you want to make something happen in the real world, you're more inclined to spend time in deep contemplation now. Ultimately, you must establish workable priorities by deciding which interactions are useful and which ones can be eliminated. A no-nonsense approach allows you to accomplish more than you expect.

Your self-esteem is on the upswing; you want others to notice your talents and appreciate what you have to offer. However, it's not easy to put your feelings into words while the hypersensitive Moon is traveling through your sign. Instead of sharing too much information about yourself today, process your emotions on your own and then tell your story after you have time to think about it for a while. Waiting a couple of days gives you a chance to fine-tune your message for the optimum impact.

Others may find you quite alluring these days as several planets move through fabulous Leo and your 1st House of Personality, but you can only bend the rules so far. The idea of self-indulgence sounds tempting enough to consider skipping out on your responsibilities. You may seek satisfaction through a quick escape; however, this strategy isn't a smart idea since the backlash at work could be more intense than you expect. Honoring your commitments offers its own sweet rewards.

Your brain has been operating in high gear ever since the weekend when cerebral Mercury moved into your analytical sign. Your senses are sharp and your thinking is clear. Nevertheless, you might still be distracted by your fantasies now, especially if someone is currently showing romantic interest in you. But don't waste precious time in the pursuit of unrealistic dreams; be rational and do what makes the most sense, instead.

Your friends might be more oriented toward building relationships than you are now since your attention is primarily focused on your career ambitions. Nevertheless, you don't want to lose your existing connections with others. Fortunately, you get along with nearly anyone at work these days because you can perceive unrealized potential everywhere you look. Remember, your current success may require you to keep your feelings under cover, so think carefully about your words before you start to speak. When in doubt, err on the side of silence.

You could feel a little bent out of shape now because you don't believe that your friends truly understand your intentions. Even if you specifically make a point to tell them about your inner process, they still might jump to the wrong conclusions. Nevertheless, expressing your opinion is still healthier than keeping it bottled up inside. Simply state your side of the story but don't force the issue; those who care the most will eventually appreciate the secrets you share.

You are on the hunt for the perfect travel companion to accompany you on your next great adventure. But even if you're flying solo, this is a perfect time to plan a special vacation or embark on a quick summer getaway. Nevertheless, you must be careful about how much you disclose today because other people's expectations may not match up with your desires. Share what you must, but keep your most unconventional thoughts to yourself until you know you are in like company.

Relationships may be playing the cosmic energy out on a battlefield now, especially if your needs go unrecognized by someone you love. You're tempted to retreat into the safety of your inner world instead of confronting your fear of rejection by asking for what you want. There's absolutely nothing wrong with taking a bit of time today to sort out your feelings. Fortunately, communication grows easier over the next few days, enabling you to resolve the current stress sooner than you expect.

Playful interactions between you and someone special may be deliciously sweet now. But it's not all fun and games, even if you can fire up a new relationship or refuel an old one. There might be underlying tensions that prevent you from feeling emotionally fulfilled. Clear communication is the most essential element. Take a risk and express what's on your mind. Sharing your dreams opens the door to wonderful possibilities.

You may feel as if you're swimming in an entirely different ocean today, even if you're still splashing about in the same old pond. Your current disorientation challenges you to balance your starry-eyed idealism with a more practical and grounded approach to life. Don't rely on anyone to tell you what's real because talkative Mercury's presence in your 7th House of Companions allows others to sound more definitive than they really are now. Analyze all the facts, listen to your intuition and then decide for yourself.

You may secretly worry that reaching your goals will take more time and effort than you have available. Nevertheless, it still makes sense to push forward today or you might lose your edge of enthusiasm. Life is challenging now because one part of you wants to race ahead while another voice is telling you to slow down and proceed with caution. Paradoxically, sharing your dilemma can alleviate your stress and help pave the path to your success.

You might have fundamental issues that need addressing now and, thankfully, you're up for the task. But, even if you are eager to discuss what's on your mind, circumstances make it difficult to rock the boat. You may be hesitant to soften your stance since you realize the overall significance of the current discussion. Push beyond the resistance; speaking your piece today is better than waiting for a perfect moment sometime in the future.

You can see a roadblock looming ahead, but your anticipation of a delay gives you more time to think everything through before opening your mouth. Often, you speak your mind first without knowing where the conversation will take you. However, making it up as you go isn't a smart strategy now. Summarize your thoughts by creating an outline to help you better organize your ideas. Doing your homework in advance helps you clarify your message.

You may feel emotionally charged, but it's not necessary to let your moodiness prevent you from expressing your truth today. Thankfully, you get extra juice out of a deep and meaningful conversation, but your perspective could be too extreme now for anyone to handle. Be sensitive to other people's needs if you must bring up a difficult subject. Remember, someone else might not be as inclined as you are to dig up hidden feelings, even if your intentions are good. Pay attention to the feedback you receive before going too far.

Something could happen today that triggers memories of a past emotional experience which might make you want to bury your feelings. Strong passions are lurking just beneath the surface and you would prefer to keep them out of sight. Don't try to force anything out into the open; trust your own judgment if you believe that acting cautiously is a good strategy now. You can always put your thoughts down in a journal, since this reflective exercise keeps your process moving along in a healthy manner.

Although logical thinking comes naturally to you and you're at the top of your mental game now, you may be quite hesitant to delve into the emotional realms. Still, you could end up engulfed in a complicated set of circumstances involving others. Don't allow yourself to get distracted by someone else's drama if it's just a way to avoid a serious matter of your own. Rather than focusing your energy on external events, honor your true feelings instead.

You might not enjoy being in the public eye today if you're feeling emotionally vulnerable, but you're likely to feel more secure as time moves on. But first you must get through these next few days of practical logistics and strategic planning, even if you typically prefer a more flexible approach. Thankfully, applying yourself diligently now improves your chances of being rewarded later on for your hard work. The only person you need to impress is yourself.

You are looking at relationship issues through a very practical filter today; however, dealing with mundane reality won't stop you from dreaming about your future. It's just that your fantasies are more likely than ever to cross the metaphysical gap and manifest as reality now, so don't waste a perfect opportunity on a passing whim. Take control of your life by visualizing exactly what you want to happen and then do everything in your power to make it so.

Surprising conversations about your career objectives may be initiated by other people today, and you might as well go along for the ride. There's a lot of ground to cover as you concentrate on the logistics of work. Even if you would rather take it easy now, don't miss this chance to solidify a business deal or stabilize your place in the community. Your peers will follow your lead if you act with confidence and integrity.

You could benefit from sharing your thoughts with others today since there are still significant issues that remain unresolved. Fortunately, your natural talent for organizing ideas makes your presentation even better. Nevertheless, it's also wise to trust your feelings and listen to your heart when you get a moment alone. You can always  ask your closest friends to warn you if you wander too far off track. It never hurts to have a second opinion from someone you trust.

You would like everyone to take you more seriously now; you're in a productive phase and want to be appreciated for your contributions. Show up and perform your job to the best of your abilities, even if it's behind the scenes. Don't worry if others appear to be unaware of your efforts since it may take additional time to gain recognition. Keep up the hard work; karma is on your side.

Taking a break from your daily routine sounds like a perfect idea today but practical concerns weigh heavily on your mind. There's no point in resisting your responsibilities now, so delay the fun and games until you finish your chores. Someone may demand even more of your time and energy than you think you have to give. Nevertheless, do your absolute best and then reward yourself with a bit of well-earned rest and relaxation once you're done.

Containing your restlessness might be a hopeless task today, even if you start out with the best of intentions. You can't settle down because wild and crazy Uranus just won't leave your key planet Mars alone now. This cosmic trigger could make you feel high-strung, yet you may not be able to fully capitalize on this electricity that is activating your nervous system. Go ahead and let others know you're on edge, but remember to be particularly sensitive to their boundaries so you don't make matters worse. Channel your frenetic energy into your work, instead.

It's all too easy to misjudge the severity of a relationship disagreement now. You might mistakenly believe that you can solve a dilemma with just a wave of your hand. But, of course, it isn't that simple. Thankfully, concentrating on the root causes and not the symptoms helps to soften the hard edges of a potentially explosive situation. Treat the ones you love gently and with the same respect you wish to receive in return.

Your current actions might inadvertently express more than you intended today as you unsuccessfully try to ignore what everyone else can plainly see. Denial is a waste of your energy, so just accept the consequences without resistance, instead. Even better, say what's on your mind without trying to hide the truth from anyone who deserves to know the complete story. You may be surprised with the outcome once the facts are out in the open.

You are capable of showing your best side now, but there's no need to overstate your case. In fact, others may see your grandiose gestures more as an expression of insecurity than anything else. Luckily, your confidence shines through if you just remain true to your beliefs. Maintaining your integrity is the key to successfully reaching your audience.

It might feel as if today is two different days wrapped into one. Your fear of vulnerability can make you uncharacteristically shy for the first part of the day. Then, as the evocative Moon dances into affectionate Leo, your caution quickly morphs into a more positive and outgoing attitude. There's no need to justify your change of heart; just do what feels right and let love lead the way.

Although you're not about to lay all your cards face up on the table, you might want to consider being more forthcoming with your feelings today. This emotional openness could prepare you for an unexpected encounter that brings your insecurities dangerously close to the surface. You don't gain anything by forcing the issue; everything will be revealed naturally at just the right time. Paying close attention to your dreams can show you a clear path into your future.

Even if you intuitively know that your silence on a particular matter could propel your agenda forward, it still may be impossible to keep your lips sealed today when friends or associates ask leading questions. You might eagerly disclose too much information, so it's critical to monitor your reactions prior to opening your mouth. Remember, you can't take back what's already been said. Look before you leap, think before you talk and take the high road whenever possible.

You won't have to go looking for distractions now, since others seem to have an abundance of fun-filled ideas to offer up for your entertainment. It's fine to take a break from your chores as long as you get the most crucial ones out of the way first. Nevertheless, you can't escape the inevitable; your unfinished work is not going to disappear on its own. Evading your commitments today could create a serious backlash next week. Demonstrating responsible behavior sets the right tone for everyone else.

Your wanderlust has you feeling irrepressibly restless today, making it challenging to maintain the status quo. You might be worried about how long you can sit still before making your big escape. Keep in mind that you don't actually need to leave town to satisfy your craving for adrenaline. Don't jeopardize your security for the sake of an adventure: find ways to infuse your life with more excitement now without necessarily turning everything upside down.

It's time to put on a little performance so you can show everyone how serious you are when it comes to having fun. Whether you are thinking about a quick getaway with your family or just hanging out with friends for the evening, make certain that you have a solid plan in place. However, your original agenda won't likely work perfectly because of changing circumstances. Your flexible attitude brings you closer to discovering the pleasure you seek.

Relationship dynamics don't seem to get any less complicated today, even if your intention is to simplify your life. Nevertheless, you could experience an unexpected clash of values with no resolution in sight. Paradoxically, withdrawing from the conflict only amplifies the lingering tension. But expressing your needs falls short of a full solution; you must also be willing to actively listen. Communication is a two-way street.

Although you may be tempted to act spontaneously today, it's crucial to slow down so you can establish a healthy routine in your life. Unfortunately, the more rigid your schedule is now, the greater your need to demonstrate your unconventional side. But don't sacrifice one extreme for the other. Your ultimate happiness depends upon being both emotionally stable and wildly creative at the same time.

You may feel as if it's now or never. You're worried that your window of opportunity is going to close before you're ready. However, it's not wise to try to make up for lost time now. You had your moment in the Sun and it's best to let the magical experiences ripen naturally instead of panicking and acting out of desperation. In the meantime, allow your feelings to come out to play before the changing tides carry them into the past. To every thing there is a season.

You prefer to finish what you start and may grow anxious when there's so much happening that you can't keep up with the pace. Other people are expecting so much from you now that you don't know what to do first. In a last-ditch effort to manifest the simplicity you seek, you might overreact and do nothing at all. Of course, this act of rebellion won't solve anything. Gently push against your own frustration without becoming desperate. Sharing your secret fears with someone you trust tips the scales in your favor and brings you peace of mind.

You may find yourself interacting with a new group of friends today, wanting to discuss subjects you never dreamed of sharing. But your unconventional ideas flow easier within your imagination than in reality. Your naivete bumps up against other people's more cynical ways. Although your mind is racing at warp speed, you need to slow down and take someone else's feelings into consideration before blasting ahead with your agenda. You don't have all the answers yet, so wait for the rest of the story to be revealed before doing something you might regret.

Conflict between what your head tells you and what your heart knows can resolve only if you have the courage to listen to both perspectives. Your thoughts are valid and you don't need to adjust them. But what you do with your emotions is a different story. There's no rule that says you have to express everything you feel. Finding balance now may be challenging, but you will be happier if you, at least, move in that direction.

Just when you settle into a pace of life that works for you, change arrives on your doorstep. You may sense that summer is soon coming to an end, reminding you of everything still left undone. Fortunately, your indefatigable confidence can overcome the doubt you might have about narrowing your options. Keep your eyes on the future and your finger on the pulse of the present moment. There's still time to experience the power of now.

You receive a cosmic attitude upgrade today; people actually see a "sunnier" you now that the radiant Sun is back in your sign for the next four weeks, illuminating your 1st House of Personality. Paradoxically, you might not feel quite as positive as you appear, but you don't want anyone to know. Thankfully, acting as if all is copacetic actually helps to manifest the emotional shift. But don't rush the process because it could take a few more days to make the energetic transition.

You could be quite assertive today and more willing to go out on a limb so that others know what you want. It doesn't even matter if your chances of satisfaction are slim; it's less about the destination now than the journey. Nevertheless, your persistence might still lead to surprising results. In any case, just putting your feelings out in the open may be enough of a catalyst to make magic happen.

Monitoring your schedule is crucial now because you might sacrifice more of your time than intended if you don't maintain solid boundaries. Fortunately, you are ready to take immediate action to regain control of your life. However, others may see your unorthodox behavior as erratic. Don't be concerned about anyone's judgments; consider what you need first and build the rest of your schedule around your priorities. The good news is once you nurture yourself you will have even more to give to those you love.

Although you crave your personal freedom at any cost, there still may be a hidden price to pay today for having things your way. Although you're willing to jump through the necessary hoops, others might not support your agenda now. It's honorable to give those you love the benefit of the doubt but their lack of enthusiasm bothers you. Don't let your annoyance fester or it could turn into something worse. Expressing your truth a little at a time is healthier than letting your anger take control.

You can see a relationship meltdown in the making and may do your best to sidestep any sort of melodrama. But somehow you might be pulled into a complicated web of feelings anyhow. The tension is obvious but how to resolve it is not. Keep in mind you can't fix today's problems with a shortsighted approach. Concentrating on the horizon offers the best chance for finding the long-term solution you seek.

It's really true that all things must pass, but why does it seem that the good times roll on so much faster than the rest? You might wish that relationships could always be lighthearted. But now comes the hard work of establishing depth of feeling, although the intensity makes you want to bolt. Nevertheless, stay with the process even if it's temporarily discomforting. An emotional metamorphosis brings new levels of intimacy if you give it a real chance.

You might try to ignore the practical considerations of your finances today, even if you make a big deal about wanting to attend to all the details. You could successfully delay the work in front of you, but reality won't take no for an answer now. You must manage your response by staying away from extremes. Whatever resistance you experience at first, it becomes easier to make a concrete plan once you start. Trust your common sense and you can't go wrong.

You have so many plates spinning on sticks today that you can't keep up with all of them. Although the playful Leo Moon encourages you to stir up some fun, you could quickly realize that making time for yourself isn't going to be as easy as you thought. Nevertheless, you spontaneous Rams are able to respond to unforeseen circumstances better than anyone. However, before you accept a surprise invitation, consider what you may need to give up in order to add something else to your busy schedule. Choose quality over quantity and you can't go wrong.

It may feel like the perfect day to stay at home and focus on long overdue creative projects. Even if you decide to head out today, your daydreams follow you around everywhere you go. Your current need for social interaction conflicts with your desire for solitude now. Rather than attempting to choose between your inner and outer worlds, be present in both realms and see where your flexible approach takes you.

You're buzzing around like a bee without much to show for your work yet; however, you haven't lost sight of your larger goals. But your need for tangible results grows so insistent now that you might have to modify your schedule sooner than you wish. You know what you want to do but could run out of energy too soon. Stop wasting your precious time on superfluous distractions. Come back to the hive and focus on the real task at hand instead of escaping into the field of possibilities.

Dealing with a personal financial matter in a creative manner might bring you the positive results you seek. However, thinking too far outside of the box today could tumble your precarious house of cards. It's possible that you haven't thought your plan through as carefully as you should. Still, you may be able to find a way to maneuver around an obstacle that has prevented you from buying something you want. It's better to be safe than sorry; your current purchase is likely a smart move now as long as you're not fooling yourself.

You're doing your best to keep your plans to yourself today, but people seem to know what you're thinking anyhow. Although you usually don't hide in the shadows, it's not like you  always want to broadcast your feelings on the evening news either. However, everyone is  reading your thoughts now as if they have been printed and pinned to your forehead. Nevertheless, there's no reason to avoid engaging with others, for the give and take can actually help you clarify what you truly want. Don't let your pride stop you from connecting with those you love.

You're not saying everything that's on your mind today and you have good reason for your secrecy. Other people may mistakenly believe that you're already telling the whole story, but that's merely a false assumption. Meanwhile, you realize that it's more advantageous to circumvent a conflict now than it is to reveal all your true emotions. Enjoy the twists and turns of your thoughts without feeling the need to rock the boat.

You may believe you are at a point of no return, but you can't put your finger on anything unusual that's happening right now. Nevertheless, you might need to make a decision within the next few days that could have long-lasting impact on your earning power. You're extremely optimistic about the eventual outcome, but could be seriously concerned about the immediate future. Don't let the weight of your current responsibilities negatively influence the potential for success.

Handling an internal conflict between your head and your heart is likely quite familiar to you. Logically, you know what you should do today and are resigned to play your hand accordingly. But emotionally, you aren't as certain. There are aspects of your future that are quite appealing and you don't want to jeopardize what you already have in place. This is not the best time to turn everything upside down just because you are unsure of your path. Patience, grasshopper; clarity will arrive sooner than you expect.

Stepping into a leadership role is natural today because you could persuade others to join you on nearly any venture you conjure up. At first blush, relying on your charm seems like a great idea since you appear to be at the top of your game. However, real danger may be lurking in the shadows if you go off on an ill-conceived adventure with your entourage in tow. Stop yourself before you do something everyone might regret. Taking the right preventive medicine is healthier now than trying to manage the unpleasant symptoms that will manifest later on.

You are not content to hang out splashing around in shallow waters today. You're being called into the deeper mysteries, where spiritual meaning overshadows the primacy of reality itself. This journey may not be an easy one; an old emotional wound might come back to haunt you when you least expect it. Healing can occur on many levels if you are willing to accept a surprise visitation from your past as a blessing in disguise.

Nearly everything you do creates an immediate reaction now with three planets clustered in your 7th House of Relationships. But the responses you receive from others aren't necessarily what you expect. You need to manage things as they happen, even if it takes time and energy from previously scheduled activities. Don't try to stick to a predetermined timetable; as frustrated as you might be by the distractions, there may not be much you can do to change the course of events today. Relaxing the reigns of control helps to ease the tension for everyone involved.

There's no escaping into familiar fantasies today because you have important responsibilities to fulfill. Nevertheless, no one can take away your irrepressible desire to dream. It's just that you're continually snapped back into the real world each time you drift away, for there are pressing issues that demand your attention. The deadlines are real, so stay on task as much as possible now. Hang in there; thankfully, the current sense of urgency will begin to fade after tomorrow's New Moon.

You're eager to explore new territory, but the cautious Virgo New Moon falls in your 6th House of Habits, holding you back until you have enough information to make an informed decision. Unfortunately, initiating change is impossible if you are too attached to your old routine. Thankfully, you could successfully launch a new project if you can pursue your unconventional ideas in a controlled manner. Your frustration with delays could dissipate quickly once you accept the limitations of your current circumstances and demonstrate your willingness to work within them.

You must be extra attentive to other people's feelings now if you want your relationships to grow this week. You might believe that rules are for everyone else except you while your key planet Venus resonates with rebellious Uranus. Although the Virgo New Moon dances in your 5th House of Love and Creativity, an authority figure might sweep in and rain on your parade. But if you're willing to put in the extra effort, you could be rewarded with a magical experience. Keep up the good work; finding pleasure is easier when you're doing something of value.

You want all your plans to unfold perfectly today, but your disappointment won't likely show if the results of your work fall short of your expectations. The exacting Virgo New Moon influences your 4th House of Security, pressuring you to reconsider the details of your schedule one more time. But even with plenty of preparation, you still won't be able to anticipate what happens next. Letting go of your preconceived notions eases your worry while also adding an edge of excitement to your day. Spontaneity is your friend.

You can't allow distractions to pull you off course today because people are depending on you to deliver on your promises. However, the pace of events and the variety of interactions in your life are on the upswing as the Virgo New Moon activates your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. Practicing self-discipline will help you accomplish your goals, but don't close yourself off to the amazing growth you could experience if you meander off the beaten path for a while. Not all those who wander are lost.

You may feel as if you're in harmony with your core beliefs now that the pragmatic Virgo New Moon triggers your 2nd House of Self-Worth. However, your strong convictions can pit your will against someone else who is also passionate about his or her beliefs. Don't act so cocky that you miss a perfect opportunity to appreciate a variety of perspectives. Gentle yet persistent self-exploration is exactly what the doctor ordered today; just remember to listen as much as you speak.

You could be entangled in an internal argument about whether to move forward and deepen an existing commitment now or to head off in an entirely new direction. Today's reactive New Moon in your competent sign stimulates your 1st House of Personality, marking a turning point in how you relate to others. Although you may consider making sudden changes, ultimately your analytical approach enables you to see a a myriad of alternative outcomes to your current situation. Entertain all the possibilities before selecting the best one to pursue with unwavering passion.

You have a lot to gain by tuning into your imagination today. The orderly Virgo New Moon energizes your 12th House of Fantasy, inspiring you to imagine the most creative scenarios possible. Meanwhile, romantic Venus is busy spicing up your relationship life and fueling your desires. Paradoxically, making a schedule and adhering to it gives you the time to follow your dreams. Excitement abounds now, so it is important to keep centering yourself while anticipating the fun ahead.

You are often a force to be reckoned with because you are absolutely fixed in your purpose. In fact, you're not likely to bend to someone else's demands today, regardless of the pressure. You have your own trajectory and, if necessary, will fly solo into the future. But self-doubt might surface because the analytical Virgo New Moon intensifies your 11th House of Groups, prompting you to question whether or not you can find satisfaction on your own. Nevertheless, your willingness to break away from the crowd to express your individuality is your current key to success.

Your words have such a powerful impact today that you need to be careful how you use them. Today's rational Virgo New Moon occupies your 10th House of Authority, demanding that you acknowledge your role within your community or at your workplace. Others place a lot of stock in what you say now, even if you secretly lack self-confidence. Although exercising caution may be the smartest way to steer clear of trouble, you might be willing to sacrifice peace in order to add more adventure into your life.

Although your self-restraint is legendary, it may be a struggle to stay out of trouble today. A cosmic drama is playing out in your life as you overcome the obstacles standing between you and success. The Virgo New Moon lands in your 9th House of Adventure, encouraging you to dream of grandiose schemes and exotic places. But a Mars-Saturn hookup requires you to take your foot off the accelerator before you lose control of the wheel. Fortunately, making concrete plans now can better your chances of reaching your destination later on.

You have more than your fair share of practical thinking to do today if you're in the process of buying a home, car or some other jointly owned property. Don't rush into making any sort of investment on a whim because a promising purchase could quickly turn sour unless you are diligent in your research. The Virgo New Moon stirs your 8th House of Shared Resources, making relationship dynamics more complicated. A calculated risk may work in your advantage, but there are no free lunches now. You must put in the blood, sweat and tears if you want to reap the rewards.

If you are waiting for the right moment to share something that's been on your mind, don't skirt around the edges any longer. You have thought about what you want to say long enough. However, the picky Virgo New Moon's presence in your 7th House of Relationships could indicate that others are overly critical about your words. Thankfully, you can tilt the odds in your favor by being fully prepared for any response. Just be sure to balance your need to be heard with your willingness to take the feedback you receive to heart.

Someone you love might seem to throw an obstacle in your path to happiness today. Your very first impulse when you encounter trouble is usually to push, kick and fight with whatever appears to be in your way. Now, however, your anger could make things worse and beating yourself up won't get you anywhere at all. Instead, your healthiest option is to slow down, treat everyone with kindness and learn from the situation rather than trying to power your way through it.

Just as you start to grow comfortable with your place in a relationship, there seems to be a hurdle in your way. You are likely taking yourself way too seriously today, and this sobering tone hampers your spontaneity. Unfortunately, you can't just talk yourself into being lighthearted. Your best course of action now is to stop fighting your emotions. The current cooling of affections you might be experiencing is just a temporary phase. However, the sooner you adjust to the new reality, the quicker your playful attitude will return.

You may be shadowboxing today as you struggle to complete your chores. You strive to focus all your attention on the work at hand, but too many responsibilities make it nearly impossible to finish, even if you put in extra hours. Although you can multitask with the best of them, your schedule can grow overwhelming unless you step back and sort out your priorities. A bit of alone time might be all you need to get back on track.

You are usually hesitant about sharing too much personal information too quickly in a new relationship. Trust is a significant issue for you, especially when you're afraid of being hurt or used by others. Your caution works to your advantage today as reality impedes your forward movement. Reconsider recent events and rethink your current plans. Wait a few more days if possible before announcing your final decision so you have enough time to process your feelings.

It takes a lot to bring you strong Lions down, but even a disagreement with someone you love won't keep you down long. Don't get too discouraged if others are judging you harshly. There's little justification in feeling defeated, for today's reactions will have major impact on your immediate future. Keep in mind that you aren't the only person ever to get sent back to the drawing board. Turn your disappointment into an opportunity by carefully re-evaluating and re-adjusting your plans. Your natural resilience is one of your greatest strengths.

Your secret desires might go unfulfilled today, blocking your natural expression of energy. Circumstances could appear rather discouraging, especially if you don't have enough money or resources to follow your dreams. Even if you lower your expectations, you still may feel that nothing is moving along fast enough. Your patience is being tested now more than ever; being grateful for the little things changes your entire perspective.

A friend may be on your case for no apparent reason. Or, you might feel a financial squeeze so strongly now that you are ready to scream. Regardless of how you experience Saturn's pressure on your key planet Venus today, there are plenty of things to do to turn the negativity around. Fortunately, you can facilitate positive change by courageously facing issues instead of trying to avoid them. Chin up; even if circumstances seem challenging, something is likely to improve very soon.

Planning for the future now could seem more like work than play, but this responsible approach doesn't mean you can't enjoy yourself anyhow. Oddly enough, you may not realize how much control you have over your current situation. All you need to do is change your mind and you can take some time off for rest and relaxation before you even know it. A bit of downtime will leave you feeling refreshed and ready for another round. Pace yourself; achieving your goals is more like a marathon than a sprint.

You Archers are often so accomplished at seeing the larger picture that sometimes you miss an important detail along the way. Although you may be dealing with the results of your own previous careless behavior, the outcome might not be as bad as you think. But you still have a challenge on your hands if you are going to set things right. Allowing time for meditation and other spiritual practices can help you manage your mundane responsibilities with a healthier attitude and a more compassionate touch.

When the circumstances start getting tough and the weak of heart surrender, you motivated Mountain Goats are ambitiously scheming to take over the world.
