However, you may be overwhelmed by your own aspirations now as you begin to realize the complexity of your chosen path. Nevertheless, don't succumb to doubt; tackle any and all obstacles head on. Your optimism will be rewarded as long as you also keep your shoulder to the wheel and never lose sight of your dreams.

You are preoccupied with the unrealistic expectations of your boss or partner today, which can make you quite frustrated. However, you're more likely to take care of your own needs once you admit you can't miraculously produce what others want in one day. Remember, there's more to life than instant gratification. The finer things are often well worth the wait. Your willingness to compromise makes everyone happier in the long run.

Listening to others now is the key to your success, especially if you lack clarity about your next step. Much of the resistance you're currently meeting may actually be your own, even if it appears to come from someone else. Take any advice you receive today very seriously because it can help you overcome your self-imposed limits. Free your mind and the rest will fall into place.

You are more aware of everyone else's needs once the reflective Moon takes up residence in your 7th House of Companions. Putting your desires aside comes naturally now in order to make sure that others are at ease. However, your patience is tested today as flirty Venus teases your key planet Mars, provoking you to be more assertive in your quest for personal satisfaction. Channel your energy into creative pursuits, instead of letting frustration get the best of you. You'll be happier in the long run if you simply let your inner child out to play.

You might believe you have too many chores on your plate today and worry that you cannot possibly finish all of them. Although you intend to meet your obligations, you're also tempted by your wish to spend time with someone special. You have been anxiously waiting for this moment and you're eager to connect on a deeper level. However, being responsible in the outer world is in direct conflict now with fulfilling your desires. Balance is key; make an extra effort to honor your current need for both work and play.

You have been taking life far too seriously long enough and are anticipating nothing but good times today. However, it may not be that simple to escape from the burden of work. The Moon's shift into your 5th House of Frivolity gives you the impression you can temporarily avoid difficult issues. However, bossy Saturn won't let you lighten up too quickly unless you respect your commitments. Don't begrudge the life lessons you're learning now since they will put you in good stead for the exciting opportunities ahead.

You wish you could be more objective today in your pursuit of love, but your strong judgments entangle you in uncomfortable relationship dynamics. You may be able to regain your equilibrium later in the day by remembering to balance your subjectivity with cool logic, but your personal interactions might still be a bit unfulfilling now. Instead of retreating emotionally, tell others what you want. You have to step outside of your comfort zone and express your needs; you'll never know what can happen unless you try.

You might assume you missed your recent chance to receive the personal satisfaction that you seek. Acting impulsively may seem like your best strategy now as you grasp for the possibility of pleasure. Nevertheless, sobering Saturn isn't far from the picture today, requiring you to attend to immediate obligations first. Being flexible isn't easy once you've made up your mind, but changing your schedule allows you to accommodate both your emotional and practical needs. A minor modification to your calendar can make all the difference in the world.

Playing hooky sounds like a great idea in theory but it won't be so easy to pull off your plan today. Even if you have a bullet-proof scheme up your sleeve, you still may need to re-evaluate your priorities and save the fun and games for another day. Instead, concentrate your energy on either bringing in additional money or cutting back expenses. Managing your resources efficiently is more important now than the pursuit of pleasure.

You can turn a challenging situation to your advantage today. However, you may have to fight to get what you want as resourceful Venus squares off with warrior Mars. Under normal conditions you might choose a peaceful strategy, but you're too impatient now for diplomatic gestures. People seem to be looking to you for solutions, but you're at your wit's end because you don't have any advice to give. Although it feels like your job is to please everyone all the time, it's not. Take the time to figure out your own needs before doing anything else.

Reaching your destination is an uphill climb if your current direction isn't aligned with your true desires. It may be that your chosen path -- professionally or romantically -- isn't bringing you happiness and you don't know how to change things for the better. Instead of worrying about a lack of emotional fulfillment, focus on what you can do to spread hope and love today. Concentrating on creating positive energy works wonders as it resonates and returns to you many times over.

Your responsibilities may seem overwhelming now, but your attitude quickly improves if you simply step back from your work and reassess your long-term goals. This review process isn't about setting a new course of action yet; there will be time for that later. It's sufficient to simply acknowledge that you're being pulled in conflicting directions. Consider several different scenarios without picking any particular one today. Explore your options, but wait to narrow your path until you have more clarity about your destination.

If you've been in an emotional funk lately, today could be a significant turning point. You might feel as if you're an outsider because your desires deviate significantly from your friends and coworkers, but your priorities are not up for negotiation. Nevertheless, don't let your differences interfere with making important decisions; setting aside your personal feelings is the right thing to do now. However, self-restraint is effective only if it comes from a place of deep conviction and not a sense of obligation. Let your moral compass be your guide.

You might be wondering if you're doing something wrong because everyone except you seems to be having more fun today. However, the good news is you're making more progress toward achieving your goals than you realize. Whether or not you recognize it yet, you are rounding a corner and will soon be moving in a new direction. Don't let self-doubt creep into your life or you could close down during this critical time. It may take a while to find your balance, so stretch your wings slowly and wait to see where they carry you.

Although close partnerships may be on your mind today, you're not satisfied with simply meeting your commitments. You want to increase the intensity and depth in your intimate interactions, and won't be completely satisfied until you do. But don't place all your hopes in one basket or you could miss out on the possible pleasure that's right in front of your nose. Cultivating your relationships methodically creates the environment necessary for the kind of emotional connections you crave.

Your closest friends may get on your nerves today if they won't hurry up and make up their minds. You want answers now and can quickly grow annoyed if your impatience gets the best of you. Much to your chagrin, no one else seems to share your heightened sense of urgency. The whole situation becomes more manageable once you admit that the problem is really about your needs and not about everyone else's shortcomings. Do yourself a favor; lighten up and give others room to be themselves just as you would want in return.

Others might be bewildered by your lack of motivation today, even though you have specific chores that still require your attention. However, you may not feel the need to jump in and take care of your responsibilities before heading out for a little fun. Nevertheless, it's wise to pay attention to your obligations because you can't let loose and enjoy yourself if you don't honor your commitments. However, taking the time to reconnect with your dreams enables you to tap into your passion and inspires you to be your best.

Looking forward to an easygoing day is natural when the Moon is reflecting the needs of your 5th House of Fun and Games. However, there is so much going on in your life now, you may not have sufficient time to pursue the various options for entertainment. But don't take your frustration out on others; even if there's something blocking your progress, it isn't about anyone else's actions. Ultimately, changing your own attitude is the most expedient way to overcome the external resistance you feel today. People are taking their cues from you so lead with your best foot forward.

Although you may not know exactly how to handle a family matter today, your uncertainty does not come from your indifference. To the contrary, you're so preoccupied with events in your personal life that you see all the pros and cons of each possible solution. You might even reach a point of frustration and are tempted to walk away from the whole mess. Don't sell yourself short by quitting; just make the best choice you can, even if you aren't one hundred percent certain about your decision. Any positive action now is better than doing nothing at all.

You may choose to play the role of the noble diplomat today, positioning yourself between two other people who are in the throes of a disagreement. Thankfully, you're able to listen to both versions of the story while maintaining your neutrality. Keep in mind, you aren't the final arbiter of truth and justice. Instead, you are more effective now if you can simply help the conflicted parties establish a piece of common ground on which to stand.

You aren't as in touch with your feelings today as you were over the past few days when the evocative Moon was camping out in your sign. Thankfully, your innate critical thinking can lead you in the most sensible direction. However, lowering your high standards is not part of your strategy for success. You don't have to be overly judgmental and say no to nearly every new idea that comes your way; instead, allow for the element of surprise. Embracing the unknown increases the potential for magic to occur.

You should be able to continue working toward your personal goals today if you're able to integrate your needs into a social context. The Moon's current visit to your sign might overwhelm you with contradictory feelings. Thankfully, you may be certain enough about your position that you can easily go along with nearly any group decision. Unfortunately, someone could assume that your willingness to yield is a sign of weakness. Don't bother trying to convince others that they are wrong. Keep your integrity intact and those who matter most will shift their assumptions over time.

You are ready to throw off the shackles of self-restraint and share a secret or two today. However, telling the entire story isn't necessary since you like to keep some things private. However, you certainly don't want to come across as ambivalent, so you might just choose a side and then remain loyal to whatever you pick. Ultimately, it doesn't matter if you are right; what's more important now is that you listen to your heart.

Hanging out in the summer sun with your friends sounds like a perfect plan for the day. Happily, connecting with like-minded people is actually nourishment for your soul. However, you're not as eager to relinquish control of your feelings today. Ironically, everyone else might assume you have your life more together than you actually do. This is tricky territory; others may not be willing to help you later on when you really need it if you don't show some vulnerability now. It's great to have fun, but sometimes it's better to just be real.

You feel as if everyone expects you to pull the right answers out of thin air; however, you're tired of being taken for granted and may not be willing to play their games now. Although you take pride in being an authority figure, you're just not as concerned with choosing one solution over another today. What's most critical now is staying true to your core values; leading by example is the most effective way to get your message across.

Nearly everything in your life seems to work well up to a point today. Even if you are executing a well-conceived plan, you still must be ready to set it aside if circumstances change suddenly. Instead of attempting to make a sprint for the finish line, take your time and handle any obstacles that pop up along the way. Keep your impatience in check; slow and steady wins the race.

You're interested in getting to the bottom of an emotional issue now that could come between you and the intimacy you seek. However, discussing your attractions and desires is not sufficient to deepen the bond on its own. It's no fun talking  about your feelings when you're scared of losing your rational perspective. Nevertheless, you're standing on safer ground today than you realize, so let your emotions wash over you without any fear of drowning. Exploring your heart isn't always easy but it's the fastest way to break on through to the other side.

You could fall for your own story today, even if you know it's not quite true. Your tendency now is to embellish the truth to create the impact you want at work. Unfortunately, your delivery is so convincing, your charming words might get you into more trouble than it's worth. Thankfully, you have the power to monitor what you say before you open your mouth. Enjoy the fruits of your imagination without thinking that you must share everything that comes to mind.

Although you might end up accomplishing a lot today, it's challenging to track your progress unless you establish clear goals from the start. Unfortunately, setting priorities doesn't come easily now and you could quickly exhaust yourself if you don't create sensible limits early in the day. Instead of trying to please everyone, say no to their enticing offers if the opportunities don't support your dreams. Ultimately, you can gain more respect for stating what you can't do than falling short of your unrealistic promises.

You may run into trouble for doing the wrong thing at work today, especially if you act in haste. Unfortunately, your good intentions only carry you so far if you receive ambiguous directions from your boss or some other authority figure. But even without clear guidance, you should be able to find your way as long as you take the time to put things in perspective. Consider all the possibilities before deciding what makes the most sense to do next.

Your natural ability to play it low key allows you to show up at work without revealing too much information about your personal life. Those who know you may believe that they can see the true you, but you might be turning on the charm in order to hide something you don't want to talk about. Nevertheless, your fear of being seen is likely based on a memory of a difficult experience rather than what's unfolding in your present life. Separating the truth from irrational worries frees you from repeating the past.

You have a good sense of what you need to do in order to increase your income. However, your plans to make money today are probably less formed than your original idea. Nevertheless, your psychic powers are strong now and you might catch some glimpses of the future, even if they are not as clear as you wish. Be patient; a more practical perspective is already beginning to emerge. Blending your intuition with the facts empowers you to turn your dreams into reality.

You realize that you're in the middle of an internal battle, even if it continues to play out now in the realm of relationships. The ever-radiant Sun encourages you to express the love that's in your heart while its opposition to spiritual Neptune dissipates the boundaries that normally prevent you from going further. If you look to your friends for practical advice, they aren't of much help today because they just tell you to throw caution to the wind. Being brave is surely an admirable trait, but you may end up regretting your actions if you act foolishly.

You want everyone to know that you're up for nearly anything the group decides to do today. You may even believe that it's more important now to support your friends and coworkers than it is to further your own personal agenda. Nevertheless, you also hope to enjoy yourself as much as anyone else. There's no need to be so fast to minimize your desires for the sake of the community. Although you're a valuable team player, you still need to establish your personal priorities separate from everyone else's.

If someone doesn't support your plans today, you might overcompensate by strengthening your resolve. However, it's nearly impossible to understand why everyone else isn't more concerned about the future, and it makes you feel like you have to hold it all together. Instead of attempting to tighten your control on the world around you, it's smarter to loosen the reins for a while and see where journey takes you.

You're extra motivated to shine professionally now with the Sun lighting up your 10th House of Status. You believe you're doing a great job and want everyone to know about your superhuman efforts. You may feel as if a new set of priorities is replacing the old list of rules. Don't question your change in direction; just adapt to the shifting currents until you can get your bearings. You can always return to your previous agenda later on if you so choose. In the meantime, ride this wave of cosmic energy as far as you can.

You might attempt to disregard your ever-changing emotions, but you don't seem to have a lot of control over your feelings now. You can feel the Libra Moon's tug as she diplomatically pulls you one way and then another in a process that ultimately finds the right balance. Let the winds carry you along because attempts to alter their direction may be fruitless. Take scenic routes and detours whenever possible today, for your horizons widen as soon as you step off the beaten path.

You may be struggling to find your way in a close relationship now, even if everything appears copacetic to everyone else. You want the current tension to dissipate all by itself before messy emotions erupt. But unspoken issues still lurk beneath the surface, like a boogeyman in a nightmare waiting for you to relax and let down your guard. Keep shining the light of your awareness to bring up your fears where they can finally be put to rest.

A door to a beautiful place may open and close faster than you're able to walk through it today. Oddly enough, if you grab onto an opportunity, you still must wait a while until it begins to pay off. It might feel as if you have been here before; somehow, it seems like the wheels of time are turning backward. Nevertheless, keep looking ahead; it's the future that's calling and not the past.

There's nothing you enjoy more than starting a new project, but you could run out of steam before you get very far today. You may be tired of spreading your resources too thin, especially if you aren't accomplishing as much as you expected. You don't want to wait another day or two to get back in the driver's seat again but you can't rush events that are beyond your control. Nevertheless, you can set a sustainable pace as you go about your business. There's no point worrying about things you can't change, anyway.

You are wise to get your chores done early in the day because you might be less inclined to work hard later in the afternoon. Don't worry if you fall behind on your original timetable. You can always get back in the groove by reclaiming your center and planting your feet firmly back on the ground. However, you can't depend on others to ride to your rescue now unless you're willing to demonstrate your unwavering commitment to achieving your goals.

Your sense of urgency is not the best indicator of good timing today, especially if you're secretly worried about an approaching deadline. Your natural tendency is to just run off and start something new in order to revitalize your life with some fresh excitement. However, you can't escape now until you finish what's already on your plate. Wait until some stability returns before adding anything else to the mix. In the meantime, simplify your life by tying up as many loose ends as you can.

You're feeling an extra boost of confidence today because you know that you have the final say over your schedule. Although you typically prefer to retreat when life gets hectic, you are eager to engage the energy head-on now. However, you might reach a point when you realize that you have taken on more than you can manage, making these next few days quite an intense ride. In all the whirlwind of activity, one thing is certain now: this could be an awesome chance to experience the full passion of life.

You can hold steady in the midst of an emotional storm, even while you're running through a variety of scenarios in anticipation of future events. You are naturally adept at handling intense feelings, but there could be a severe learning curve looming on the horizon. Withdrawing your energy from social activities and refocusing on home and family matters for a few days may be all that's needed to realign your balance. Even you courageous Lions need a bit of downtime to rest and recharge for the challenges of life.

Don't allow any distractions to hook you today or you could quickly be pulled off course. You're inspired by your own dreams and feel as if you are on a mission now, so you may appear quite single-minded to those around you. Passionately engaging  in the creative process is good for your soul, but cool your emotions with sound logic. Don't spend too much energy justifying your actions or you could waste precious time and lose your opportunity to make something wonderful happen.

You can try to cling to your neutral position with all your might but something has to give now. You intuitively understand that it's time to make your move once the Moon enters incisive Scorpio today and ambiguity quickly becomes a thing of the past. You know exactly where you stand and have no doubt about your destination. Your strength of conviction could seem out of place, but you feel as if your core values are at stake. Others are wise to follow your lead or just get out of your way.

It probably takes more effort to bury your feelings today than to just go ahead and express them. The Moon's monthly return to your provocative sign isn't always an easy process because it brings your passions right up to the surface. Your heightened emotions can be rather overwhelming to those around you. However, you have a chance to strengthen a close relationship if you're willing to reveal your heart. Fortunately, intimacy is within reach once you demonstrate your vulnerability and let others past your defenses.

You are usually a straight shooter with your feelings, but that doesn't mean you like to dwell on them. You normally prefer to let your actions speak for your heart, but you might actually have something to hide today. If you want to take the focus off of your inner process now, there's plenty of interesting topics to discuss other than your emotions. Talking about recent developments at work or sharing your long-range career objectives reduces the pressure and shifts the emphasis to something less personal.

It's possible to delay an inevitable confrontation for a day or two, but it isn't advisable if you want to find a peaceful resolution. Suppressing your emotions now could trigger a meltdown so you might as well face them sooner than later. It might seem as if you are hitting the proverbial wall today, but this could be a projection of your inner turmoil. Surprisingly, when you stop trying to control everything in your environment, your stress will  dissipate on its own and you might just discover that your fears are for naught.

You feel obligated to nurture everyone's goals at work today, but you may have to set aside your own feelings in the process. Unfortunately, it's all too easy for your unexpressed resistance to turn into anger or resentment -- which doesn't help you get along with anyone. Nevertheless, latching onto a ray of hope can be enough to encourage you not to lose confidence. Focusing on the myriad of possibilities ahead just might be enough to keep you in a positive frame of mind.

You may feel energetically reserved today, even if your hopes are pinned to a shooting star that's on its way upward and outward. Nevertheless, your intensity can become disproportionately dramatic when you finally break down and tell your story. Tread carefully; everything doesn't need to come out in the open all at once. This is an emotional journey and if you move along the path gracefully, your gradual metamorphosis will be less stressful for everyone involved. Buckle your seat-belt and enjoy the ride.

If your plans go awry today, it could remind you of other times in your personal history that have caused you heartache. Old heartaches may return to haunt you and you cannot make them go away by simply sweeping them back under the rug. Yet, you can resolve the present predicament by revisiting the pain of your past. However, it's important to discern which is which so you're clear about what you want in your future.

You could receive recognition for a job well done today if you successfully rise to meet a challenge. However, your current stress is more than just about about work as love and relationships are also in the mix. Keep in mind that your fantasy life is still in the spotlight, so it may be difficult to separate reality from your dreams. Thankfully, taking your obligations seriously enables you to concentrate on what's real. Achieving tangible results is more important now than nearly anything else.

You are on an intellectual trip now, exploring a variety of creative pursuits. However, you can't ignore the undefinable ripples that defy analysis as they come floating across your pond today. As hard as you may try, you simply can't put the essence of your experience into words. Appreciate the present moment for all that it holds; sometimes the things which cannot be said are the most magical of all.

It's nearly impossible to hold back a stream of big ideas that flood your consciousness today. You may be tempted by the possibility of something that hasn't yet demonstrated real potential, but this uncertainty probably won't stop you from taking chances. Although you might not want to travel to a foreign country or a distant galaxy, visualizing a wild adventure now could bring you a much-needed sense of freedom. Explore the alternatives by indulging in your fantasies. The good news is that you can always pick the most promising scenario and develop a game plan to make your dream come true.

You wish you could be objective in your interactions with others, but it's challenging to play the role of an unbiased observer. Complex emotional issues emerge from the depths of your subconscious now, pressuring you to immediately do something about them. Perhaps you feel like you must rush in to save the day. Act on your intuition, but remember that practicing compassion is more important than being a hero. Trust your heart to know the difference.

Your energy continues to oscillate like a pendulum today. This could draw you into a conflict that stems from a difference of perspective rather than an incompatibility of goals. It's likely that both parties want the same result, even if it's not readily apparent now. Use your analytical powers to establish common ground and work together from there. Taking the high road invites a cooperative approach to finding a healthy resolution.

In spite of your intense emotions today, you're probably feeling confident about everything that's going on. However, your optimism may suddenly waver for reasons you don't completely understand. You would rather remain aloof and prefer not to express your desires in the heat of passion. Remember, you can always retreat if you want some time alone. A little solitude and quiet contemplation could be just what you need to heal.

There is a familiar comfort to your spiritual life these days, regardless of the challenges you may be facing in the outer world. You're often able to close the door to your subconscious when it presents you with difficult material. However, images just trickle into your awareness now in symbolic messages that you can somehow decipher. Keep the channel open; trusting the guidance of your inner voice allows you to find the missing pieces of your future.

Protecting your feelings is top priority today, but this strategy can be confusing if your emotions are in discord with your actions. This lack of clarity isn't as bad as it sounds as you might grow more philosophical when your head and heart aren't aligned. Make sure that you work out the general principles now and then address the specific issues later as they arise. Approaching your problems with a healthy sense of humor might just give you the fresh perspective you need.

You can't afford to be lazy today just because you believe that something will work out to your advantage. Being diligent and taking care of your obligations increases your chances for success. Although you may be quite realistic about your long-term goals, you still might feel insecure about your social life. Thankfully, a little communication goes a long way now. Just say what's on your mind; there's no reason to hold back, even if you're afraid of being too serious. Everyone will feel better once you clear the air and speak your piece.

Setting aside your regular rational approach for a while might enable you to go places you've never been Indulge in a bit of unrestrained fantasizing to explore the different ways you can color your dreams. Just remember, facts take you only so far now. You can visualize whatever you want to do next; just sketch in the basics and let your imagination do the rest.

Your need for an adrenaline rush is at odds with a deeper desire for emotional security today. Even if you're quite lucky when it comes to taking risks, your friends and associates will probably advise you to play it safe by maintaining the status quo. They may be right; assuming the role of a responsible adult today allows your spirit to shine brightly in a more compassionate way.

Finding emotional satisfaction may be elusive today if your anger gets the best of you. Whatever you can do to manage your stress should be considered because blaming others will only push them further away. Something as simple as a morning walk or run could be enough to do the trick. Fortunately, the dynamics grow less complicated, making it easier to handle difficult feelings as the day goes on. Once you're back on track, you might just make the personal breakthrough you have been hoping for all along.

You're moving very carefully today, as if you are walking on eggshells. But it's difficult to treat others gently if you feel like they are attempting to instigate a fight. There's no reason to avoid confrontation now, but don't start something unless you're sure you want to fully engage in battle. However, it might be more beneficial for you to wage peace in your personal life, not war. Take the high road and see who follows.

Everyone seems on edge today, yet you can dance your way through emotional minefields with apparent ease. However, your graceful appearance is misleading because it hides your inner angst. Unfortunately, burying your anxiety might just cause it to pop up at inconvenient moments when you least expect it. The best way to soothe your nerves is to talk about your feelings instead of suppressing them. Sharing your story with someone you trust makes all the difference in the world.

The time has come to bring your secret resentments out into the open. Thankfully, you have a chance to improve the uncomfortable dynamics at work today, but it requires planning and courage to make it happen. You can emerge a superhero if you're willing to approach an old problem from an entirely new direction. Acknowledging your feelings without trying to blame them on anyone else is a good way to start the conversation. You don't have to express all your emotions at once; you just need to get the ball rolling.

It seems as if your most noble intentions are being thwarted by someone, but you may not be able to figure out who is behind the resistance. Ironically, you might suddenly realize that the obstacles in your path originate within you. Instead of lashing out at the wrong target, try to understand what you are doing that makes others annoyed with you now. You can't always change external circumstances, but you can modify your response to a tricky situation today. Assuming responsibility for your role allows both parties to move on.

Your current apprehension may evolve into a minor temper tantrum today, especially if you are overwhelmed by your unexpressed feelings. You might try connecting with someone on a deeper level, only to find that the other person isn't as accessible as you thought. Instead of pushing boundaries now, find a suitable channel of expression for your physical energies. Participating in a team sport or some other competitive activity is the perfect antidote to your stress. Exerting yourself is not only good for the body; it's good for the soul.

Someone's selfish behavior may trigger a surprisingly strong response from you today. On the other hand, you might choose to emotionally withdraw, yet your intense feelings won't likely diminish in power. You could even grow more frustrated since a straightforward solution doesn't seem readily available. Instead of making things worse by losing your cool, take a few deep breaths before saying anything. Once you regain your center, just tell the truth as diplomatically as you can.

You might try to hold back the flood of impassioned feelings this morning, but it may take an extraordinary amount of self-restraint. Unfortunately, others can be shocked by your emotional tsunami if you lose control and suddenly release your pent-up anger. Ultimately, you need to speak from your heart. But in the meantime, invoke a bit of Scorpio magic by transmuting dark negativity into illuminating love.

Although you might wake up with high hopes, today could get off to a slow start. Thankfully, your momentum picks up midday once the Moon returns to your fiery sign. Unfortunately, you may be holding onto frustration from earlier in the day when it was painful to express your emotions. Nevertheless, it's futile to keep your feelings secret, even if you think that others won't approve of them. You might have to take a chance and speak your truth to find out if it will bring down the walls that are keeping you from experiencing a deeper intimacy. No risk, no reward.

If someone pushes you too hard today, they may be surprised how strongly you push back. Unfortunately, your behavior can be disruptive because your patience is worn thin and your certainty is high. Even the most insignificant event could be a catalyst that provokes your fiery response now. But you have more control over your feelings than you realize; don't react too quickly or you might undo your recent gains. Keep your ultimate goal in sight while exercising a bit of your legendary Capricorn self-restraint.

Withholding your feelings is only a temporary strategy at best, but one that can serve you well today. The impact of your current actions may be out of proportion with your intent; whatever you do now seems to affect others in a direct and immediate manner. What you don't say is just as important as what is shared, so it's wise to think twice about the consequences of your words before speaking your mind. Practicing discretion is more for your benefit than anyone else's.

You may be riding a rising wave of anger today that stems from a clash of values you have endured too long. You are in touch with a wide range of shifting emotions now, some of which could be challenging to manage. Concentrate your awareness on your inner process rather than the outer events. Making time for meditation is healthier than being at the mercy of events you cannot control. Once you have reestablished peace in your kingdom, you can share your feelings in a more positive way.

An unexpected conversation may add uncertainty to your day, revealing perspectives that don't support your current plans. Unfortunately, the dilemma you are now facing will not simply fade away. Larger patterns are being established that can influence your success throughout the month. Sticking close to your original agenda is your best strategy as you won't be lured off course by someone else's ideas. Focus on what matters if you want to see results.

Although you are usually sure of your direction once you have made up your mind, it's a different story today. You may continue to engage in a debate within the private recesses of your mind long after you have arrived at an answer. Fortunately, there's no reason to reduce the current issues to black and white even if you're feeling the pressure to do so. Just listen carefully to all the voices without trying to silence any of them. Perfecting the right blend of logic and creativity serves you well.

Your natural ability to think on your feet is on point today, so put whatever you know to good use. The only fault in your logic that may cloud your perceptive intellect is a result of taking yourself too seriously. It really doesn't matter how crucial you believe your work to be, don't muddy the waters with big ideas about your self-importance. You might be pleasantly surprised at how much you can enjoy the day once you put your priorities in proper perspective.

You may feel out of sorts now that the moody Moon is moving through extroverted Sagittarius. Even the most lighthearted interaction could become more complicated today, especially if your search for meaning becomes blown out of proportion. There aren't any simple answers if your irrational emotions clash with your rational thoughts, making it more difficult to trust them. Luckily, you can rely on your intuition when the facts don't give you the information you need.

You might want more change than is possible now; however, there's no cause for alarm if circumstances don't appear to support your desires. Whatever you do, keep in mind that it's futile to row against the tide and expect that you can arrive at your destination any sooner. Your efforts will only be frustrated if you aren't patient. Weigh all the factors prior to making your next move and just let reality flow at its own rate. Discerning the difference between what you can change and what you can't is the key to your current success.

You may get clarity now on a situation that you were previously too close  to see. You could already miss the presence of your key planet Mercury in your analytical sign, but over-thinking a problem doesn't necessarily lead to a solution. So say goodbye to mischievous Mercury as it enters even-keeled Libra. You might have to face a bit of unpleasantness as you readjust to your new reality. Nevertheless,after you make the necessary modifications you can move on with a clear conscience.

You're eager to experience an intellectual rebirth now that cerebral Mercury breezes into your sign, bringing along his bag of clever trickster rationalizations. However, you must be careful of slipping into emotional detachment. You might believe that you are relying on your clear judgment, but your heart could have its own opinion that stands outside of logic. Don't try to force a single answer today; the best solution will reveal itself in time.

Sometimes you believe that your life would be less complicated if your reactions weren't so emotionally intense, but this isn't necessarily true. The depth of your passions is one of your greatest strengths. However, you're receiving new information from your subconscious mind now that can temporarily throw a wrench into the works. Don't resist your current flow of awareness, for soon you will better understand your feelings. Trust your intuition and let the process take its course.

You are all fired up about your future, but can also see the limitations of your current plans. This dualistic thinking might even prompt you to execute an absolute about-face on a previous strategy. You can clearly see both sides of the issue once you turn around, making your ultimate decision even tougher. Don't settle on any quick fixes now; you are better off holding out for a viable long-term solution. The right formula for success is yours if you're willing to wait.

There is a shift of power subtly transforming your life, though it may take weeks to fully manifest. Nevertheless, today's choices could play an important role in the upcoming changes, especially with respect to your career path. Just don't let the uncontrollable aspects of your life take over the rest of it. Managing a minor crisis now with finesse brings you much closer to realizing your goals.

You might not possess a lot of patience today if something is blocking you on the way to your destination. Naturally, advanced planning is useful in managing the obstacles in front of you, but don't bother trying to overpower the impediments because coercion just won't work. Conquering your environment will not help your cause, either. Instead, you need to learn how to work in harmony with your surroundings. Cooperating with the cosmic rhythms is more productive than fighting against them.

You don't have the luxury of being able to daydream as much as you wish today. Unfortunately, you might not be able to find enough time to pursue your indulgent fantasies as circumstances require you to deal with an emotional issue that has been brewing for weeks. Take responsibility for your commitments before the situation becomes even more unmanageable. Maintaining a more thoughtful approach to life now helps to ensure more time later on to slip back into your colorful dreamworld.

Although you wake up determined to do the right thing and finish your tasks at work today, your commitment grows stronger as the day continues to unfold. The pressure increases once you know what needs to be done, leaving you no option but to take care of business. However, it isn't wise to speed through your assignments or you could make a costly mistake. Establishing a sustainable pace right from the start is a healthier strategy than trying to be a superhero and doing too much too fast.

There's no reason to expend extra energy on an emotional outburst today when a low-key, rational discussion is more effective and creates less drama for everyone involved. Fortunately, relationship issues that might normally upset you are easy to take in stride because you believe that you can say whatever is on your mind. You may even feel so safe and insulated that you think no one is actually listening to your words. Nevertheless, others are more attentive than you realize, so consider your message carefully before you speak.

Your confidence is soaring today and you assume that your charisma enables you to get your ideas across to your audience. Even if you have enough charm and energy to swing into action without a plan, a cavalier attitude conflicts with a more contemplative side of your personality now. Although spontaneously expressing your creativity works in your favor, you don't need to ignore your previous research because it can help you hit your target with even more accuracy. The more tools in your toolkit, the better.

Your heart may win out over your head today in an internal battle between emotions and logic. Nevertheless, it's still smart to allow extra time to react to a situation before you do anything about it. Giving yourself sufficient space to process your feelings enables you to dig even deeper. Remember, it's fully acceptable to override a strong attraction now, but don't just shut down prematurely out of fear. Knowing what you truly want before you play your cards increases your odds of winning the hand.

Your anticipation of the unknown heightens your sense of excitement today. However, it's crucial to decide what is worth pursuing because you might get more than you bargained for now if you start nosing around somewhere you don't belong. You're relentless once you put your mind toward untangling a puzzle or digging up a missing piece of information. If you choose your mystery wisely, sweet satisfaction can be yours.

You could find yourself in discussions that don't seem to go anywhere practical today, but the journey could be extremely rewarding, nonetheless. Your words might sound very emotional, even if that's not the message you're trying to communicate. Although you may attempt to keep your vulnerability hidden for now, the truth will probably leak out in the next few days, anyhow. Don't hold back; riding the tide of your feelings can deepen a close relationship even if you are slightly uncomfortable along the way.

Although you would like to depend on others today, everyone seems to be on the edge of change and therefore somewhat unreliable. Meanwhile, you feel as if you can keep your own life in balance without anyone's help. Unfortunately, you may be operating under a false illusion based upon what you don't want to know. Keep in mind that it is less stressful in the long run to nip a problem in the bud than it is to wait and see what will happen next if you leave things to their own devices. An ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure.

Even if your work is piling up and you are feeling overwhelmed now, stopping midstream won't solve anything. The good news is you can finish your assignments if you just keep the faith and remain focused on what's most important. Although you might be tempted by a variety of distractions that lure you away from your mundane commitments, you need to ignore the interruptions for a while longer. Fortunately, the Sun's trine to your key planet Pluto gives you the unrelenting drive to maintain your concentration so you can reach your targeted destination on time.

Your over-the-top enthusiasm makes you eager to tackle your commitments today with an I-can-do-it attitude; however, your optimism alone doesn't guarantee success. You must demonstrate your professional competence before you ask others to accept you as their leader. Don't try to fake an authoritative air; stop talking and just put your heart into your work. Demonstrating your sincerity is the quickest route to gaining everyone's trust.

You may be feeling a bit of anxiety today that's coming from all the uncontrollable energy floating through the cosmos. But this unstable atmosphere isn't necessarily bad; it's just that you're not comfortable when you sense that things are out of your control. You might be worried that there's just too much noise in your surroundings now for you to find lasting peace of mind. Instead of resisting the inevitable emotional turbulence, simply let go and enjoy the bumpy ride.

It's in your best interest to immediately respond to any lingering questions from a close friend or partner because your window of opportunity is shutting quickly. Romantic Venus is ending her yearly visit to your 7th House of Others, so bring any relationship concerns you have now out into the open while you still can. Initiating honest dialogue is the first step to creating lasting resolution and deeper intimacy.

Express what's on your mind today while your emphatic words carry the conviction of your beliefs. The Sun in your 7th House of Partners is harmonizing with profound Pluto in your 11th House of Friends, empowering you to be more socially proactive. You're quite passionate about a relationship issue and, thankfully, you make a lot of sense now when you talk about your feelings. Aim your thoughts carefully and don't stray from speaking your truth no matter what anyone else thinks.

Although you may like the idea of acting impulsively, you accomplish a lot more when you make a plan today and stick with it. It really doesn't matter if you feel constrained when you limit your options with exacting schedules and pressing commitments because it's easy to waste time and energy now when you lack accountability. Stop rebelling against the rules; use them as guidelines to increase your productivity, instead.

You have no choice but to figure things out on the fly today; fortunately, you will feel more confident once you know the whole story and have an action plan in place. Although the practical Capricorn Moon urges you to set realistic goals, it's still tempting to reach too far. It's not wise to take on any more projects until you have finished what's already on your plate because your current deadlines might not be as negotiable as you wish. Ironically, exercising self-discipline empowers you to complete your work with a creative flair.

You start out the day expecting everything to easily fall into place, but you might have to buckle down in order to take care of your obligations. It's a big mistake to think you can simply ignore the unspoken tension around you. Family dynamics and office politics are distractions from your work and you don't have the time to listen to everyone's story. Prioritize what's on your plate; just be sure to plot your course of action based upon the good of all involved.

Your x-ray vision can see right through someone's emotionally cool demeanor because you know what it's like to hide behind a wall of detachment to protect your feelings. However, the tables are turned today. You are comfortable with your own vulnerability, but might not have a confidant who is sensitive enough to hear what you have to say. Focus your communication on the most practical issues now and save a tender discussion for the right person, place and time, instead.

What begins as a good time could morph into hard work now that the conscientious Capricorn Moon is visiting your 6th House of Service. The demands of your job are annoying today, especially if they get in the way of the mischief you wish you were making. You might even get sneaky and try to shuffle your schedule around so you can slip out of your obligations. Nevertheless, you must be rational and weigh the potential pleasure against your mundane responsibilities. Ultimately, adopting a practical approach may be your safest bet.

You are happy to be in your element today and pleased to have discovered a sensible solution to a lingering problem. Fortunately, you have realistic expectations now, so you should be fine even if your desires aren't fully satisfied. Accepting your current situation graciously could eventually lead to your success. Acting in a patient manner is a smart strategy as long as it's combined with the unrelenting pursuit of your dreams.

There is a rich complexity in your life today; your colorful fantasy life contains more than meets the eye. But your dreams aren't just about finding true love and winning the lottery. Darker issues lure you into the shadows, even on a bright sunny day. Don't waste energy complaining about how much work there is to be done now; just thank your lucky stars for the potential rewards that will soon follow.

Carefully consider every word you say before you open your mouth now that the emotionally reserved Capricorn Moon is creeping through your 3rd House of Communication. Although you want to make your point today, you're more likely to be successful if you're patient and wait for the right moment. Keep in mind that a loose tongue won't likely convert others to your point of view anyway. If you don't understand everything that's being said around you, ask questions first and speak your piece later.

A great opportunity for fun seems to slip through your fingers today. Furthermore, you might not want to be working at your desk when you could be out enjoying your next big adventure. Unfortunately, your immediate responsibilities may have you dreaming about a vacation getaway instead of actually packing your bags. Fulfilling your obligations isn't your idea of excitement, but you'll be more free to do what you want if you put work before play.

You're typically not that comfortable revealing your vulnerability, but the emotional Moon's current visit to your sign softens you up. Although you might not show as much warmth as you feel today, you still want to connect with others without overstepping anyone's boundaries. Following simple rules of etiquette helps everyone involved feel more at ease. If you take it slowly and speak from your heart you'll reap positive results..

Your lack of privacy can become a serious issue today as the Moon journeys through your 12th House of Secrets. Unfortunately, obsessive behavior isn't useful, so it's a good idea to redirect your energy away from your desire for solitude. Keeping to yourself is one thing; but withdrawing from the world because you're hiding your truth is entirely something else. Ultimately, the choice is yours; finding the courage to talk with a trustworthy friend may be all that's needed now to lighten your load.

Don't be thrown off track by someone's dramatic display of emotions now, for this type of grand gesturing might be more of a sideshow than the main event. Trust your instincts; you know better than to judge anyone based on surface appearances. Fortunately, you have close friends you can rely on for a second opinion, and they might just come through for you in ways you can't imagine. Count your blessings; you have plenty of emotional support in your corner.

Making up your plan as you go along isn't a smart idea today, even if this kind of improvisational approach usually works well for you. Listen to the message of the conservative Capricorn Moon and err on the side of being cautious rather than foolish. There isn't as much of an urgency as you might think; carefully contemplate your next move before taking decisive action that brings the results you want.

It's wonderful to be in the flow of things today, deftly balancing work with play. People admire how you can manage to have fun while still getting your chores done. Others randomly show up in your life now to offer enough of a diversion for you to find pleasure. Fortunately, the distractions are not great enough to hijack your day. Do not deviate very far from the rules, for an authority figure may react quickly if you fall victim to the temptations of irresponsibility. Keep it simple and stay on track to ensure the best possible outcome.

You have a keen sense of the difference between right and wrong today, making you an excellent arbitrator since you can easily understand both sides of an issue. However, your desire to see justice served doesn't necessarily give you the final word on a matter. Sharing your opinions in a non-judgmental manner is a wiser course of action, rather than simply declaring your pronouncements. Once you state your impressions, give others the time and space to form conclusions on their own.

Although you are fortunate enough to receive unsolicited offers of help, you still might hesitate to take initiative. Your friends or coworkers may encourage you to think big and keep pushing ahead with your latest idea or project. Nevertheless, it's more effective to proceed at your own pace. There's no reason to rush anything just because someone else thinks you should. The fact is you will instinctively know when to make your move; trust your inner voice above all else.

Domestic obligations are calling you and they can become more trouble than you want if you don't  handle them now. Nevertheless, there's no sense in wasting your energy feeling guilty about what you can't do. It's more satisfying to achieve a small success than worrying about everything you did wrong. Taking a block of time to relax enables you to shift your perspective and see things in a new light before returning your attention to an unresolved problem at home. A simple change in attitude can make all the difference in the world.

You may roll out of bed this morning already feeling better from the Moon's current visit to your 5th House of Fun and Games. But you don't hit the jackpot until midday when sweet Venus takes up residence in your sign for a three-week visit. A smile on your face seems to appear for no reason at all, but you can tell that circumstances are definitely improving. Happily, your positive energy casts you in the spotlight where others are inspired by your optimistic outlook on life.

Your willingness to stop and reflect on a personal matter can clear a path to a magical and memorable experience today. Unfortunately, your resistance to change intensifies if you singularly focus on your goals, instead of on the amazing journey that leads to your destination. Your current lesson is all about giving up control; ironically, loosening your grip on the reins of external events now also frees you from your own restraints. Let go to grow.

Pleasurable feelings flow back and forth between you and your friends, especially if you are collaborating on a project of mutual interest. In fact the positive vibes feel so good there's no reason to force any issues now or push for resolution on open-ended conversations. Just do your best to turn each interaction into a learning opportunity while still remembering to be methodical in your work. It might seem strange but your motto today is "All for one and one for all."

You're probably feeling more enthusiastic about your prospects at work now. This new wave of optimism might be fed, in part, by something as simple as getting sufficient sleep. You could even have a feeling that a memorable event is going to occur today. But don't leave everything up to chance; the longer you believe in a fantasy, the more likely you can actually make it real. Let your star shine brightly for the world to see.

Your hard work could be for naught today if you let a bad attitude get in your way of success. Changing your perspective is extremely helpful because you still might be clinging to a negative experience from the past. But slipping into denial to avoid your feelings isn't as useful as it sounds. It's much healthier to embrace old hurts so you can process them and move on. Thankfully, your current emotional state should settle down when the moody Moon leaves your sign later in the day. In the meantime, be gentle with everyone, especially yourself.

You might resist accepting compliments today because you aren't convinced that you truly deserve them. Unfortunately, you may be stuck in memories that feed your low self-esteem now, even if sincere appreciation comes your way. Stop fighting the inevitable; open your heart and allow the love to touch you without hiding behind walls of self-doubt. Learning to receive graciously is a gift in itself.

Handling criticism is easy today because it's probably being offered in a supportive manner. Of course, you would prefer approval, but you're truly interested in improving your game more than anything else. When others give you feedback now, they're not telling you what you did wrong; instead, they're sharing valid information that can help you succeed. If you listen carefully you might just hear a truth that could transform your life.

You might not be too worried about your responsibilities today as your thoughts drift toward the big picture. You are usually content focusing on the present moment. However, you may be looking further ahead now, wondering what could be lurking around the next bend in the road. It's wise to avoid making any major decisions about your future just yet. Keeping your options open for a few more days gives you a chance to explore your dreams for a while longer.

Reassessing your life path makes perfect sense when the Moon takes up residence in your 10th House of Public Life, but it may feel like you are traveling a circuitous route to success. You could even work yourself into a state of anxiety today as you try to make a straightforward plan to reach your goals. Ironically, it's healthier now to let go of your concerns; further analysis won't help you find a solution. Instead, pursue activities that relax your body and soothe your nerves. The best answers will come to you when you are in a calmer state of mind.

Your life seems to be flowing along a bit smoother now, even if the very same issues are still begging for resolution. Fortunately, you don't have to worry about fixing everything today which eases the tension sufficiently enough for you to enjoy the blessings in your life. Just remember that your overactive imagination could carry you far away, distracting you from the happiness that is right under your nose. Open your eyes and be grateful for what you have.

You may be feeling somewhat alienated today, even if your family and friends are within reach. You cherish your privacy and might keep your thoughts to yourself, but this secrecy only increases the emotional gulf between you and others. However, this self-imposed isolation also reminds you of your inner strength. Don't let lingering fears sidetrack your dreams; use your current time alone to visualize the path to your future success before reconnecting with those you love.

You might feel as if others are withholding their true emotions and pulling away from you now. The Moon's presence in your 7th House of Relationships shifts the focus from your own little world to observing the reactions of everyone else. Don't rely on your perceptions alone to give you objective data as you could get carried away with your false assumptions and not even know it. Stop spinning stories and just listen to your heart.

It's your usual no-nonsense style to roll up your sleeves and get the job done, but reaching closure on any project doesn't come so easily now. It might even feel as if your final destination is slipping away the closer you get to it. Obviously, giving up is not the preferred solution; it's smarter to accept the timing that reality imposes on you now. Keep moving forward without worrying how far there is yet to go; not all progress can be measured.

Ingenious thoughts are running rampant through your mind now as the Moon activates your 5th House of Self-Expression. But it's up to you to decide how to present your most creative visions for maximum impact. Unfortunately, a brilliant idea might have little to do with fulfilling your present obligations. Don't become discouraged before you even start; instead, work extra hard to be responsible in all that you do. Thankfully, letting your inner child out to play doesn't have to stop you from honoring your commitments.

Don't let the memories of your past come between the present moment and your future just because the Moon's visit to your 4th House of Foundations brings you back to your childhood. Naturally, you have big ideas about what your success looks like. You may even have your bucket list all sorted out and ready to go, but these dreams seem very far away right now. Although you have some serious issues to contemplate today, making minor adjustments can have an immediate impact on your life.

There are so many things on your to-do list today, that it really doesn't even matter where you jump in. One thing is for sure: procrastination isn't your friend. You may find yourself in trouble by the end of the day unless you hit the ground running as soon as you wake up. Remember, creating a sensible plan is a great first step, but you still must work diligently to follow through on anything that you start. The sooner you get going, the sooner you're done.

You don't want to be caught up in an intense whirlwind of activity today since you know that it's better to finish one project well than do many things carelessly. However, focusing on your work is an exercise in futility now, especially if your heart isn't in it. You will be fine if you just remember to employ common sense throughout the day. Others will be suitably impressed if you keep things genuine, no matter what curve balls are thrown your way.

It's tempting to suppress your emotions in favor of a more rational approach today. However, the Moon's monthly visit to your sign reminds you once again that you're happier when you honor your feelings -- even if they temporarily make you uncomfortable. Your evasive strategy might enable you to move more quickly through a situation, but you could miss an important lesson in the process. Slow down and allow your heart, instead of your head, to tell you what you need to hear.

Recent emotional confusion might have sapped your energy, leaving you too exhausted to talk about your feelings today. You may even want to take a temporary break from a romantic attachment now just to spare yourself the drama. Thankfully, the Moon's emphasis on your 12th House of Privacy encourages you to be alone for a little while. Don't worry about how others react to your current desire for solitude. Engaging in a spiritual practice is the best medicine for your soul.

Although nearly everything about your life may seem complicated today, it's not necessarily unpleasant. In fact, you're able to see subtleties that were previously imperceptible and you can seamlessly integrate them into your current perspective. But be careful; your impulsive style tempts you to jump to conclusions even if your assumptions are faulty. Adding a dash of common sense to the mix when you're making decisions now goes a long way to prevent problems later on.

Your vision of the future is based on a perfect combination of your pragmatic perspective and your legendary determination. Your dreams can be rejuvenating to your creativity, but it's nearly impossible to make plans now if you set your goals too high. It's not that you're greedy; it's just that everything good appears to be within easy reach. Let your imagination run wild, but reconsider your options next week when your clarity returns.

Your scattered energy stirs up plenty of trouble today, leading you to forget your previous plans and spontaneously make new ones. But you cannot just assume that your daydreams will turn into reality, for a sudden twist of events could jolt you awake and make you deal with the truth. Although it might seem like you're being inundated with a hodge-podge of information at first, you may be pleasantly surprised with the results.

Although you won't be able to shut off your overactive imagination, you cannot drift far from reality now without getting pulled back into the rat race. A friend or partner might remind you of your previous obligations, leaving very little room for flights of fancy. Nevertheless, you are inclined to listen to your gut instincts today, rather than your logic. A little daydreaming is okay as long as you don't let your fantasies distract you from the work at hand.

You are very passionate about someone or something today, and your intensity can be overwhelming to those who don't understand your intentions. However, your sense of purpose is strong and you want interruption-free time to focus on your work. Nevertheless, your desires are pulled in a direction which tests your resolve and self-discipline. Hiding your emotions only intensifies them now, potentially provoking a dramatic eruption later. Instead, express your feelings calmly while you have the chance to create a positive impact.

You're receiving mixed cosmic signals today, telling you to stick to the facts while simultaneously turning up the volume on your fantasies. You might try to ignore your daydreams, but they keep popping up whether they're invited or not. Stop thinking that you have to pick mundane reality over your creative vision. Instead, enjoy the dialogue between these two realms as long as possible. Oddly enough, cultivating your imagination is a wonderful way to enhance your productivity.

It's tricky to focus on practical matters today, even if you think you already have a viable plan in place. It doesn't really matter that you have made previous commitments; you want to do something more interesting than just fulfilling your obligations. Thankfully, making time for a quick escape or a creative diversion can be revitalizing to your spirit. Giving yourself permission to have fun now will enable you to return to your unfinished chores with renewed enthusiasm.

You could get so caught up in your desires today that you can rationalize nearly anything. Happily, love floats through the atmosphere this evening with the Moon hanging out in your 5th House of Play and Venus flirting in your 11th House of Social Networking. However, your heightened passion and faulty logic might lead you astray. Unfortunately, once your analysis is complete, you still must face the issues that you tried to avoid in the first place. Remember, you don't need to take everything so seriously; give yourself permission to bask in the good feelings while they last.

This could be such a busy weekend socially that you don't have enough time to hear your own thoughts. Fortunately, you may enjoy the wide variety of activities, but sometimes your friends and family might be too much energy to manage. Don't be afraid to establish healthy boundaries even if it means leaving the party a little early. You're not responsible for everyone's happiness today; make sure to take care of your own needs, too.

You may be disappointed with yourself if you don't meet all your responsibilities today. But your mind can wander far and wide now, making it difficult to live up to your commitments. You might attempt to curtail your daydreaming because you believe that it reduces your productivity. Ironically, the opposite is true; your active imagination feeds your creativity, enabling you to accomplish more than you expect.

Your innovative thinking brings unexpected answers to long-standing questions today. However, being too clever for your own good could prompt you to act on a false assumption or jump to an incorrect conclusion. Even if you want to uncover the truth, it may be better to trust your intuition now instead of only relying on the facts. A cautious approach is more productive than a spontaneous one, so take time to develop your idea before you put it into action.

Set aside your regular routine long enough to make time to get in touch with your soul today. Rather than running errands and doing chores, turn your day into a magical one by reveling in your creative imagination. Make use of the Moon's return to your dreamy sign by escaping from the everyday world and indulging in your fantasies or spiritual pursuits. You can always take care of unfinished business later in the week when you're in a more practical frame of mind.

You may convince a coworker that you respect confidentiality, but your intentions are better than your follow-through as erratic Uranus in your impulsive sign forms an anxious alignment with the willful Sun. Today's Pisces Full Moon brightens your 12th House of Privacy, sending mixed messages and bringing your secrets out into the light. Although explaining your truth might make you feel uncomfortable at first, being honest is a necessary first step toward creating harmony in your relationships.

Although you are normally content to remain in your comfort zone, you're eagerly anticipating embarking on a wonderful new adventure now. The Pisces Full Moon floods your 11th House of Social Networking, luring you away from your tunnel vision so you can catch a glimpse of the big world outside. Take a chance and reach farther than you have in the past. There's no room for complacency; the future is waiting for you if you are willing to step into it.

Business opportunities pop up everywhere you turn as today's intuitive Pisces Full Moon illuminates your 10th House of Professional Goals. Luckily, you see chances to show off your skills in nearly every interaction. However, your struggle now is to narrow the field of possibilities rather than wasting time running in circles of illusion. Several alternatives look so good that you can instantaneously imagine positive results. Nevertheless, you still have plenty of hard work ahead of you, so don't count your chickens before they hatch.

All the flowery language in the world won't pull you off your chosen path today if the intention behind a presentation doesn't make practical sense, too. The spiritual Pisces Moon shining in your 9th House of Philosophy reflects your need to justify your position by talking about your lofty ideals. Make a list of the things you can do now that will get you closer to your goals. Keep bringing your conceptual ideas back down to earth if you want to manifest your dreams.

There are fundamental differences between your needs and those of a close friend or partner today. Working with other people can complicate your life, but cooperation is now necessary since the Pisces Full Moon rocks your 8th House of Shared Resources. You might even try to avoid an emotionally tense discussion that rattles your core beliefs. Nevertheless, evasive action alone won't sustain your relationships for very long. Instead of running away from the truth, stop for a moment and embrace it.

You know better than to immediately choose one side in an argument just because you have some of the facts in front of you. Today's soulful Pisces Full Moon reflects the no-nonsense Virgo Sun from your 7th House of Relationships, requiring you to have compassion for your opponent. There's more to the current issue than simply playing by the rules; you may need to make a few allowances for those who aren't as logical as you. A little forgiveness goes a long way toward bridging the gulf between you and others.

Maintaining your objectivity may not be as useful as you think today. The dreamy Pisces Full Moon lights up your 6th House of Details, reminding you that following your imagination can take you farther now than simply executing your plan according to the book. Treating rules as helpful guidelines rather than bothersome restrictions enables you to listen more closely to your intuition. If you get a strong hunch about what to do next, stop asking questions and just do it.

If you can't justify taking a substantial amount of time off from work now, then at least try expressing yourself more creatively within the demands of your job. It's pointless to follow a previously created recipe for success or navigate your life by using someone else's map. Instead, take advantage of the Pisces Full Moon's energy in your 5th House of Play to add a bit of spontaneity back into your daily routine. Follow your bliss and let your inner child out to play.

You might not know as much as you think you do about the emotional storms brewing on the home front. Today's Pisces Full Moon enlightens your 4th House of Domestic Conditions, suggesting that you could be fooling yourself by believing that everyone is happy. To the contrary, someone close to you may be working hard to cover up his or her insecurities. Instead of accepting the truth as you see it, take time to explore the subtle messages behind the smiles. Opening your heart leads the way to deeper connections with those you love.

You may feel unsettled by the cosmic cross-currents today because you prefer to have your feet firmly planted on the ground. You need to know your current position and have a good map in your possession. But the Pisces Full Moon throws confusing light on your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, making it nearly impossible to discern navigational markers in the landscape. Nevertheless, there's no need to struggle so much; trusting the forces of the universe enables you to reach your destination on time.

Managing your cash flow today could be challenging as the fuzzy Pisces Full Moon fogs out your 2nd House of Finances. However, you can still get ahead of the curve, even if you are lacking the right answers. Luckily, you have a brilliant ally who magically appears at exactly the right moment. If you don't have a viable solution now, don't be afraid to lean on a trustworthy friend or find a professional adviser to set you straight. There's no reason to let pride stand in the way of your success.

Your fantasies seem to be blown out of proportion now that the emotional Full Moon spotlights your wildly imaginative sign. The Sun's aspect to unpredictable Uranus makes it even trickier to handle the erratic relationship dynamics that could catch you off guard. Nevertheless, you must maintain a healthy perspective on your dreams by behaving rationally in spite of your strong feelings. Instead of stressing about making any long-lasting decisions now, put them off for a day or two until you have regained clarity. In the meantime, throw your worries out the window and enjoy the spiritual ride.

It's not that you are digging up hidden information because you want to create any problems today; you may feel as if you don't really have a choice. Something isn't sitting  quite right and you won't be comfortable until you get to the bottom of it. Although you might worry that you won't like what you discover, your fear is likely blown out of proportion. Dealing with the facts is easier than stressing about the unknown. Fortunately, your current persistence works in your favor, so don't give up until you have uncovered the entire truth.

You're not in a negotiating mood today and could remain unmoved by everyone's attempts to change your mind. You are tired of hiding your motives but you still don't want others to know your true feelings just yet. If you are reluctant to engage in emotional interactions, you are not obliged to tell anyone why. Do whatever you can to avoid an outright argument now but don't compromise your integrity in the process.

You won't be coerced into doing anything that is outside of your comfort zone today. You are quite capable of holding your ground now, even if pressure is applied by a powerful adversary. Making your position clear is a good start, but don't waste words in endless explanations. You can always share more details later on after the intensity settles down. You won't offend anyone with your silence; in fact, others can't help but admire your fierce determination.

Your reaction to a loved one's behavior may be quick and intense now as quicksilver Mercury squares passionate Pluto in your 7th House of Partners. Even the most casual conversation could agitate your feelings and bring a dormant resentment back into awareness. Be extra careful today or you might inadvertently hurt someone if you express your heartfelt anger at the wrong target. A sensible dose of self-restraint goes a long way to keep the peace.

You may attack like a lion if you feel that someone is threatening your financial stability today. Although you could be driven to confront a powerful person, make certain it's necessary before you start something that could grow into an intense encounter. Take a few deep breaths and consider your alternatives first. If you really want to take care of business now, winning an argument isn't as important as getting your point across. Waiting a day or two to put all the facts in order might just work to your advantage.

Your words might be sharper than you realize today and could cut like a razor, even if that's not your intention. You can be very sarcastic as witty Mercury intensifies its intellectual edge in the fires of Pluto's passions.
