Unfortunately, your heightened emotional state diminishes your innate objectivity, so it's important to be as clear as possible in all that you say. However, balancing your message with a bit of compassion is helpful if you want others to respond in a positive manner.

You believe that you are being very rational now that logical Mercury is in your fair-minded sign. However, someone else's extreme reactions might be spilling over into your life. An emotional outbreak won't solve anything, and it could leave you feeling unsatisfied and depleted. Fortunately, you can soften the hard energy of the day by making a conscious effort to practice kindness wherever you go. Hopefully, your positive attitude will rub off on everyone around you.

You want to express your point of view in no uncertain terms today as communicator Mercury squares your key planet Pluto. But Mercury has taken up residence in your 12th House of Secrets, raising your anxiety about how much to say and what to keep to yourself. You could become obsessive as you sort out what makes the most sense to reveal. However, there are many ways to draw your boundaries, so it is up to you to decide what you want to handle. Err on the side of saying less now, since you can always choose to go deeper later on once you've established a certain level of trust.

You may be quite certain about your decisions today, yet your confidence could turn into rigid self-righteousness if you don't honor the feelings of others. Unfortunately, you could run into a problem professionally if you provoke a conflict with your boss. It's a waste of time and energy to think you can change the dynamics of the situation by rationalizing your actions. Go ahead and build your case, but don't stir up any unnecessary trouble until the emotional uncertainty passes.

Locating the source of your uneasiness is complicated today, but an unspoken truth could resurface again and again in a series of disagreements. However, you might be arguing about something that's completely irrelevant while the real issue remains just outside of your awareness. Be smart and save your criticism for another day after you've had time to calm down and put things into a healthy perspective. Take a much-needed break and do something special to soothe your nerves and lift your spirits.

Something has been bothering you and it won't go away until you tackle the problem directly. Unfortunately, you may not realize the source of your emotional discomfort now, making it difficult to resolve the situation. Don't blame anyone else for your extreme reactions. Instead, take full responsibility for your feelings and communicate with as much compassion as possible. Not only will you feel better after you share your heart, but others might also follow your lead.

Your friends may not be very supportive today as they take you to task on an issue that you thought was fairly straightforward. This unexpected disagreement creates additional anxiety because you aren't sure that you can trust your logical analysis, even if others are demanding that you do what makes the most sense. If your heart continues to tell you something different, follow its message now instead of all the words swirling around in your head.

Although you often know exactly what you want in love, your romantic goals aren't very clear now. You could idealize your desires today, which is a lot of fun as long as you don't assume they must be fulfilled. Too many concrete expectations hinder your current metaphysical journey. However, going with the flow may reward you with a very beautiful experience that can resonate in your heart for a long time to come.

You may misread an emotional interaction today unless you're paying careful attention to the subtle cues in every conversation. You might be feeling some ambiguity with respect to a developing relationship. Allowing your thoughts to wander around in the realms of possibility, although an enjoyable distraction, won't necessarily lead to personal satisfaction. Instead, focus on the most immediate issues at hand in order to set your train back on the well-traveled tracks of reality.

Although you plan to discuss practical issues at work today, your colorful fantasies are so enticing that you have trouble staying on topic. You may assume your position is clear but your coworkers might misunderstand your message. Unfortunately, you could convince yourself that further explanation isn't necessary. However, it's easy to avoid problems by unfolding your ideas one at a time and asking for feedback as you go along. There's no reason to bury your dreams as long as you keep them in check while discussing more mundane matters.

Your schedule could fall apart at the seams today if you don't allow time for everything that needs to be accomplished. You might not be as prepared as you prefer as people aren't sharing their expectations with you. Instead of floundering your way through the day in uncertainty, ask concrete questions to receive specific answers. Your friends and associates may surprise you with their down-to-earth responses that can save the day.

You could be living in a bubble of fantasy, even if you believe your self-assessment is grounded in reality. It may even be challenging to get a clear handle on what you can bring to the table. Unfortunately, facts are colored by your feelings now, and it's nearly impossible to separate your objective perceptions from subjective opinions unless you make a conscious decision to do so. Thankfully, the potential for creating meaning in your life grows stronger when your intuitive visions are fully integrated.

Normally, you can deftly manage the details of a complex project and keep all the separate tasks in order. However, it may be more effective now to save your critical analysis for another time. Instead of trying to limit your thoughts, give yourself permission to space out and explore unknown territory. Your imagination is your greatest asset today, so don't be afraid to put it to work. The most creative solutions to your current dilemmas will be the ones that arise out of unstructured thinking. Listening to your intuition allows you to tap into your unexpressed ingenuity.

You are quite introspective today as your key planet Venus takes center stage in your 12th House of Privacy. If you must spend the day with others, you can still withdraw into your dream world while appearing as socially astute as ever.  However, balancing your work obligations with your current desire to be alone might be a challenge. It's not an either / or proposition; you can collaborate with your peers and still retreat into your imagination for inspiration whenever you wish.

You may have a very specific idea about which activities you want to share with your friends now, but your job might not give you the freedom you desire. You're not one to run out on your responsibilities once you have made a heartfelt commitment. However, you can rearrange your schedule to finish up your work early without negatively impacting your productivity. Following through on your word is vital to your integrity, but so is pursuing your dreams.

Conditions on the home front can be all too confusing, but they aren't your biggest problem today. Things are not as they appear now and it's tricky to gauge the relative importance of a particular thought. Taking a clever idea and turning it into an overly complicated strategy won't make it any more successful. Keep your message simple and succinct. Misunderstandings that come to light in the next few days will make you glad that you strive for simplicity today.

Other people attempt to use ambitious schemes to lure you away from your previous commitments today. Unfortunately, you could grow overwhelmed if you can't control your personal desires. There are days when you can build the road as well as travel along it. However, today's planetary patterns are meant for exploring territories that are off the beaten track. Spend a bit of time wandering around, knowing that you'll be back on the highway and heading toward your destination again in just a few days.

Although you have specific goals and a concrete plan in place, you can't seem to find the inner resolve to achieve your goals today. People can see a gentler side of you as your hidden emotional tenderness slips through the cracks in your defenses. Instead of fighting it, consciously let others inside your otherwise impenetrable walls. Vulnerability is your strength now, not your weakness.

Today you might fall in love with a beautiful person, a spiritual practice or a fleeting vision. Unfortunately, it's unlikely that you can tell the difference between reality and fantasy now. Nevertheless, fact and fiction might just morph into a magical moment that opens your heart. Don't try to figure out what's happening; just relax and enjoy the experience. Untangle the threads in the tapestry of life on another day after the clouds of illusion drift away.

Complex issues continue to weigh on your psyche today, even as real world pressures appear to ease. Although you're trying to reestablish balance between your needs and the demands of working with others, you might overstate the importance of a personal preference. Consider backing down from your supposedly non-negotiable position since your strong opinions could instigate an unnecessary meltdown. Compromise is more constructive than conflict.

Although your intent is to come clean today, it may be impossible to put your feelings out in the open with the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Secrets. It's best to avoid being drawn into an intense disagreement that's fueled by fear of the unknown. Shining your light of awareness into the shadows of consciousness is complicated at first, but grows easier when the Moon enters your dependable sign later this evening. Demonstrate your commitment to the process by clearing the air as soon as possible.

You might experience a wide range of feelings that don't seem to have an acceptable outlet in your current social setting today. However, these unexpressed emotions still have a strong influence on what's occurring in your outer world. It may be tough at first to overcome the resistance, but the blockages are easier to handle once you realize that you are the real obstacle to open communication and not anyone else. Fortunately, your fears will subside in the face of your clear intentions and unrelenting persistence. Hang on until your logic returns.

You aren't hesitant about expressing your private feelings today so you might have no trouble at all saying exactly what's on your mind. This isn't about suddenly making outrageous demands; it's about honoring your inner voice. Don't keep your thoughts locked up now even if you're not sure about the consequences of your disclosure. Say what you must; just remember to be kind and gentle in your approach so others will be more receptive to your message.

Try not to overcompensate for any lingering emotional insecurity by acting more dramatically than you actually feel today. Disguising your vulnerability with an inflated demonstration of passion can trick others into believing that you have more self-confidence than you really do now. Find someone you trust and openly discuss your dilemma, hoping the ensuing conversation could help you sort out your fears and doubts. Oddly enough, just opening up helps you regain your self-esteem.

Hiding your feelings isn't a viable option now since everyone seems to know what you're thinking before you even say a word. Ironically, when you take the time to explain yourself in great detail, you still aren't sure that anyone else really understands what you need. Carefully examine your motives so you don't mislead someone in a way that could be problematic down the road. Once you are clear about your intentions, it will be easier to communicate them to others. Transparency is your friend.

You don't need to let anyone push you around, since you have more power than you realize today. Although it may be challenging to manage the uncharacteristic intensity of your immediate reactions, nothing is gained by obsessing about something that you cannot change now. Continue to practice moderating your extreme emotions and seek middle ground wherever possible. Thankfully, you can take a common sense approach without compromising your integrity.

Sexy Venus flirts with the fine line between fact and fancy today. You aren't in the mood to play games now, unless you believe they will lead somewhere pleasurable. Nevertheless, you still strive to do what's right, even if you already know what you want. Watch your step; make sure that everyone is on the same page before reaching a point of no return.

Logic isn't necessarily a part of your equation today as you attempt to satisfy your desires. You may be openly communicating with a romantic partner, yet your words can also act as a smokescreen that hides feelings you don't want to discuss. Avoid coercive tactics since they add power to what's not being said. Shedding light on your emotions minimizes unnecessary confusion later on. Engaging in an honest dialogue is the first step to being your authentic self.

Even your closest friends might have a hard time understanding how deeply your passions run today. Although you don't often use evocative language to express your needs, your heart can be just as vulnerable as anyone else's. Something special may be stewing in the emotional slow cooker, but it's too soon to declare it done. Don't hurry the process; good things come to those who wait.

Your desires could be overridden by everyone else's demands today. Ultimately, you might decide that it's better to conform instead of rigidly sticking to your own plans. It may be inconvenient to stand up to others right now even if you know what you want; the time and effort required isn't worth it. But your needs grow in strength if you simply try to ignore them. Avoid the possibility of losing your temper by letting others know your preferences without being attached to the outcome.

Simultaneously dancing in multiple realities can be exciting today, but it also produces additional stress. You are tempted to choose one set of emotions to live by, while burying another. However, you're being called to do powerful inner work while still maintaining external appearances. Keeping one foot in each realm helps you face your feelings now, even if you cannot fully integrate them into your current life yet.

You can barely contain your enthusiasm today as you visualize new money-making ventures or discover more efficient ways to do your job. Although you may resist settling down at first, it grows easier to find your rhythm as the day wears on. Fortunately, you can effectively filter out the impractical ideas now so you don't waste precious time scattering your energy. Instead of getting lost in unrealistic visions of the future, keep bringing your focus back to the present moment without being overly concerned about what happens next.

You may grow so complacent now that boredom sneaks back into your life. The Moon's monthly visit to your bucolic sign normally helps you find the solace you seek. However, you could begin thinking about different ways to stir up some excitement today. But tread carefully; once you open the floodgates, you might wish for the calmer times you left behind. Instead of destabilizing your life, just change your attitude. You don't have to turn everything upside down to make your day a success.

You're craving action today and plan to sneak away to play even before you complete your work. However, you can't just run off without suffering some sort of consequences. Unfortunately, your annoyance with the current constraints might grow into resentment and make it impossible to have any fun later on. Stop wasting your energy; meet your obligations expediently, so you have the time for a rejuvenating escape after you fulfill your promises and your conscience is clear.

You realize how amazing your friends are now, especially those who stand up to defend you or rush to your side when you need help. Although your allies may not think that their behavior is out of the ordinary, their humility is what makes their acts of kindness so special. There's no reason to turn your appreciation into too much of a fuss today as long as you make certain that those you cherish know how much you value their presence in your life.

Although you know that you should just follow instructions and do what you're told today, your heart might not be into it. You are not happy deferring to someone else's agenda and don't want to chase a pot of gold that isn't at the end of your own rainbow. It may be healthier to focus on your personal goals now rather than anyone else's. Just be sure that your new-found heightened practicality doesn't stand between you and an otherwise delightful time. You can have your cake and eat it too if you budget your resources wisely.

You could have an exciting vision about your future today, without necessarily becoming too attached to it. Although you can dream of an extraordinary outcome to your current situation, it's not likely to happen without your full participation. But be careful about stepping over the fine line between possibilities and fantasies. Believing in the impossible inspires you to stretch beyond your normal limits, but actually reaching your destination still requires advanced planning and hard work.

You're tired of being patient because you have a specific goal in mind and you see no logical reason to wait any further before executing your plan. Your sense of urgency may be fueled by someone who seems to be even more impulsive than you are today. Nevertheless, your current comfort level could be a deterrent to change. Don't over-analyze your feelings. Just listen to your intuition; if you think that postponing your move makes sense now, then that is exactly what you should do.

Someone might encourage you to take an unnecessary risk today, but your intuition might hold you back from leaping into the abyss. Although you may be tempted to reveal your current negativity, doing so could jeopardize your recent progress. Nevertheless, the unexpected support feels good and it makes you consider extending your reach to the stars. Naturally, you're free to respond in any manner you see fit, but minimizing your concerns helps calm your fears.

You could be tempted to lower your expectations today so your coworkers don't disappoint you with their lack of reliability. However, adopting a nonchalant approach isn't a smart tactic for long. Teamwork may be required to reach your goals, so don't let anyone off the hook too easily. Aim high and remind others of their commitments so you don't fall short of your target. Ironically, your colleagues might be counting on you to set an example for them to follow.

You may feel scattered and have trouble concentrating on your chores today because your mind keeps drifting to everything else you want to do. However, if your extracurricular activities aren't bringing you enough pleasure, your thoughts might be harder to control as you attempt to find your groove. Instead of trying to make progress on every front, just pick one and chip away at it. Limit your options now in order to expand your future possibilities later.

You wish you could get away with being irresponsible today and skip out on your previous promises. You might make a judgment error which leads you to think that you're more effective spending time motivating others now rather than just buckling down and meeting your obligations. But the truth is there's no substitute for leading by example. Don't dilute your power by talking about what needs to happen; just do it.

You might be reluctant to admit you're feeling so optimistic today because you're afraid it reveals too much vulnerability on your part. However, you probably do believe that better times are just around the next corner. Meanwhile, your personal life may suffer because you are focusing on the future instead of dealing with a relationship issue in the present. Bringing your attention back to the here and now is challenging at first, but opening your heart is the key to happiness in the long run.

Just when you thought you had everything under control, you suddenly realize that you must be dreaming. The electrical circuits are all switched on high, sparks are flying everywhere and mental fuses are blowing left and right. It's like a laser light show playing in your mind. But if you try to stop the performance, you might only make matters worse. As long as you respect the boundaries of others, this cosmic shock can be an amazingly creative experience.

Perhaps your mother once warned you about crazy days like this. You planned on enjoying your favorite Saturday routine, but the cosmos apparently have a wildly different idea. You might as well set your schedule aside, for it's not going to unfold as you imagined. At first, you could feel irritated that you're not getting your way but if you can relax into the flow, you may be thrilled with the unexpected twists and turns you encounter.

If you're a performer in a circus, it's wise to let someone else handle your high-wire acts today since the universe has a few surprises in store for you. However, if you are a juggler, you might be able to keep more balls in the air and more plates spinning on sticks than ever before. Just remember that when you are on a roll with events happening faster than normal, you can't rely on your brakes to stop in time. Planning ahead is still a smart move even if you need to make adjustments on the fly.

Your nerves could get rattled today by someone who appears to take delight in pushing your buttons. Although you might feel as if you are being attacked, most likely this isn't the case. People can unintentionally say hurtful things that don't carry an emotional charge for them, yet your acute sensitivity reads it as a personal affront. Step back, take a few deep breaths and shake it off. You can't control the actions of others but you can control how you respond.

Today can be packed with fun and frivolity as long as you're not planning on getting any rest and relaxation. There could be some unfamiliar emotional intensity in the air, prompting you to spread your wings and fly far away from the drama. Your intentions may be challenged by others but if you mean well, they will eventually forget their doubts and join in your pursuit of pleasure. Your passionate nature is hard to resist.

Don't bother trying to accomplish too many mundane mental tasks today. Brilliant Uranus electrifies your ruling planet Mercury, creating sudden epiphanies and taking every ounce of willpower you can muster just to keep up with your own thoughts. Try to keep the best ones in your net of consciousness. Give your mind a chance to explore uncharted space since you'll land safely back on earth by tomorrow.

Forget about reading a map to see where you are going now. Your key planet Venus is receiving thunderbolts from unstable Uranus, prompting you to feel a bit out of whack. Although others can't seem to settle into a routine today, you can escape their erratic energy by pursuing your goals instead. Remember the adrenaline rush you experience when you're in motion. Your thoughts and feelings are running one step ahead of your actions. Enjoy the excitement of self-discovery while it lasts.

It's as if your mind is racing on an open road without a speed limit, yet every now and then there is a sharp turn that suddenly appears with no warning. Luckily, there's no cause for alarm today because your responses are quick and nothing can be put in front of you that you can't navigate. If you consciously slow your thoughts down, you may  be able to appreciate the detours of the day even more. The journey might be just as rewarding as the destination.

You are known among your circle of friends for your big laugh and your bold ideas. However, you're focused like a laser today on one specific thought and won't be distracted by any of the usual suspects. Additionally, it's as if someone has changed the speed on your music player and everything is running faster than normal. The weird thing is that you can still understand all the words. Thinking inside the box now is just a study in frustration. Free your mind and the rest will follow.

A totally unexpected event could start your day with a shock. However, a sudden change of plans may open your eyes to an entirely new outlook on life. You may be intrigued with unorthodox concepts you've never thought about before. But as the day continues to unfold, try to find constructive ways to make use of all that you are learning. Let go of your preconceived ideas so you can fully embrace the future with an open heart.

It's as if there's an electrical current running through your nervous system today making you feel more alive than ever. However, it may be challenging to stay grounded in your body. The planets are singing your favorite tune now and your brain is buzzing with snap, crackle and pop as stimulating thoughts explode into awareness. A sensible strategy is to seek out other like-minded eccentrics with whom you can travel to the edges of the universe. Learning to fly is easier in a flock.

Sometimes you are more comfortable with your dreams and fantasies when they don't have any words to confuse the message. However, all forms of written and verbal communication are in the spotlight today. There's no escape from the high-frequency mental chit-chat that continues to follow you around. You might as well resign yourself to spending the day in your hyperactive world. Just remember that the noise is coming from within, regardless of how it seems. Take a risk and share your thoughts if you want any peace of mind.

Your intuition tells you to follow your feelings today, even if you don't know where they might take you. You are uncomfortable with the idea of giving up your freedom, yet this seems to be a relatively small sacrifice now for establishing a magical connection with a magnetic person. It's a gamble to put your eggs in one basket, but the potential to receive sweet satisfaction in return makes the risk worthwhile.

Emotional fulfillment isn't only about feeling good today; it's also about aligning with a higher purpose. Fortunately, accomplishing your goals is currently a breeze if your head and your heart are on the same page. You know exactly what you must do to attract prosperity and love, so don't let past dilemmas limit your current opportunities. Dream as big as you possibly can and grab the brass ring when given the chance.

Slowing down enough to sink into your emotions is challenging, especially if you're afraid of what you might discover. Nevertheless, you could be drawn into the dark recesses of your imagination today, where a clever turn of phrase won't be sufficient to bring you back into the light. Recognizing distractions for what they are now empowers you to ignore them at will. Negativity dissipates if you can find the courage to be patient. Buried treasures await your discovery if you're willing to dig deep enough.

You are ready to step up to the plate and help others overcome their fears today. You have already wrestled with your own inner demons and are eager to put your experience to good use. Although you don't have all the answers, you're willing to assist the process for someone else without feeling threatened yourself. Don't underestimate the commitment that is required; this is intense emotional work and your compassion will be greatly appreciated.

It's no simple matter to find an uplifting story in the midst of an intense encounter today. However, your persistent quest might just uncover important realizations that dramatically improve your day. Though you're learning new ways to maintain your emotional health now, your current lesson may be an unexpected one. You have not picked an easy path, but delving beneath the surface can change your perspective and bring you a whole new point of view.

Your passion is a source of power now and even a challenging obstacle won't likely take your mind off your need to express your feelings. Naturally, you wish to concentrate your efforts on managing practical issues that arise, but don't want to leave your emotions unacknowledged today. Thankfully, your critical thinking enables you to see through your own camouflage and effectively cut to the chase. Sharing your heart brings you closer to those you love.

Although you might try to avoid being pulled into a complex emotional drama today, it proves nearly impossible if it raises a familiar issue. Fortunately, the present circumstances are quite different from your past, yet you are reminded of a previous power struggle when you weren't necessarily in control of your feelings. Don't look back or your fears may prevent you from making the best decisions. Any possibility you put your mind to now has the potential of becoming real.

Your power comes from your amazing ability to undergo an unexpected metamorphosis. Now that transformative Pluto harmonizes with magnetic Venus, you can manifest the magic symbolized by the Phoenix, a mythical bird that arises from the ashes of destruction. People might be afraid of your dynamic changes, but you instinctively realize it's futile to resist these cosmic waves of evolution. Being smart enough to relinquish control and drift with the cosmic flow is a sign of strength today, not weakness.

Although you may disagree with the conclusion of someone else's story, it's not productive to argue about a simple difference of opinion. Nevertheless, explaining your beliefs allows you to distinguish them from the hard facts. Making this differentiation is quite helpful now, and reduces your chances of fighting about a subject where there will never be a clear winner. Ironically, avoiding a confrontation today might be the only way you can emerge victorious.

No one is going to sweet talk you into throwing in the towel today, but you could actually perform some gentle persuasion yourself. Unfortunately, if you feel like you have too much to lose, you may revert to sheer stubbornness as a last resort. Don't waste energy trying to protect the status quo; instead go out and do something creative in order to stir up the energy. Others will appreciate you making the first move.

Anything you keep to yourself today carries more weight than the thoughts and feelings you reveal. However, this awkward dynamic is not a permission slip to share everything with everybody. There are many things that are best left unspoken now. Think about your motives before you speak and then consciously choose the best time to talk. If your intentions are clear, your communication will  bring an important issue out into the open where it can be dealt with once and for all.

Your current analytical approach triggers an important decision about a relationship today. However, you might feel as if you are temporarily lost in a desert in search of an oasis. Although you exhibit strength of purpose in your choices, a lack of commitment to your larger set of goals could be problematic. The best way to find your bearings is to listen to what's in your head while also following your heart.

Apologizing doesn't come easily to you, yet it may be crucial now to overcome your need to always being right. It's healthy to acknowledge you still have a bit of growing to do. However, it's not enough to simply say you're sorry, you have to feel it from the heart. To truly get in touch with your emotions you'll need to stop and listen to the subtle messages behind the endless stream of words. Oddly enough, admitting that you're wrong brings you closer to others.

You want to concentrate on the good news today rather than focusing on feelings of insecurity. Project optimism and confidence now, even if your mind keeps cycling back to your unspoken fears. Your concerns may be valid, but you'll only make matters worse if you believe that you can handle your problems without involving someone you love. Keeping the channels of communication open is a positive catalyst for lasting change.

You might talk up a storm today, but your chattiness could just be an effective way to cover up your emotional vulnerability. You may not have as much self-confidence as others think, but there's no reason to hide the truth. Instead of trying to impress others with your cleverness, just be honest about your feelings. Thankfully, your innate flexibility enables you to learn something new if you simply remember to be quiet and listen.

You could stir up trouble today by imagining people aren't telling you the whole story. Your fears may be magnified if others have little or nothing to say, but it might be your own emotional reserve that encourages them to act similarly. Rather than asking lots of questions to show your interest, take a risk and share a bit about your own personal history first. Expressing your vulnerability is the fastest way to get the conversation flowing.

One of the ways you can honor the service-oriented Virgo Sun is to set aside any self-centered feelings. Naturally, it's important to have enough confidence to successfully start a new project, but too much focus on yourself isn't healthy. Disperse some of the imbalance by shifting your attention to your friends and associates. Ultimately, it's more efficient now to work as equals, even if you are actually running the show. Aiming the spotlight on others allows your spirit of generosity to shine.

Someone might try to persuade you that you're doing the right thing, but you're not convinced. Part of your predicament is that you can vacillate on nearly any decision today, possibly creating chaos in your schedule. Don't let your self-judgment call the shots; instead, look at the situation from a more objective point of view. Envisioning yourself as an integral part of the big picture reduces any temporary feelings of isolation.

You may be operating under the illusion that whatever you create now is artistically sound, even if it's not of practical value. However, it's counterproductive to justify your work based on the opinions of others. Even if you receive harsh criticism later, you will still learn a valuable lesson from your current experience. The best way to discover what's possible is to simply do it.

You're rarely interested in messing around with shallow conversations or frivolous activities that sidetrack you from more meaningful interactions. Today is no exception as you strive to experience the full intensity of life. Ironically, you might not want to get your hands dirty in the process since the Sun is in tidy Virgo. Keep in mind that exerting emotional control could ultimately turn it into exactly what you're attempting to avoid. Take your gloves off and dive in.

Although you may start the day in a rather easygoing mood, a friend or partner can get under your skin, eventually provoking you to snap. Be smart and don't try to hide your annoyance right from the start because it grows more disruptive if you bury it. Denying your feelings is not  currently a viable strategy. Express your frustration calmly today; everyone will feel better once the air is cleared and peace is restored.

You don't want to let your emotions stand in the way of your ambitions, but your irrepressible fantasies might lead you down a dead-end path today. Thankfully, you can negate your unrealistic expectations by asking questions and then listening carefully to the feedback you receive. Integrating critical information now increases your efficiency at work while helping you to be more successful in the long run.

Others tend to see you as less pragmatic than you actually are today. Although you yearn for the ideal because you want everything to be beautiful, there are limits even to your colorful daydreams. An imaginative view of the world based on obsessive thinking isn't necessarily helpful, so don't get so wrapped up in your own thoughts that you miss the beauty that's right in front of your nose. Deal with the truth today rather than waiting until damage is done.

You are eager to handle a tricky situation by quickly swinging into action now, even if you don't have a practical plan in place yet. Although you may not be the impulsive type, your idealism can inspire you to react without thinking about the consequences. Nevertheless, you are wise to reevaluate your options prior to committing to any one path today. Postpone the most critical decisions until you have had sufficient time to consider where your current strategy will take you. Better safe than sorry.

Although you might wish you could lay low as the passive Cancer Moon moves through your 4th House of Security, your key planet Mars energizes your 9th House of Adventure, activating your wanderlust. Ultimately, your frustration level will be intolerable if you can't get out and fulfill your need for an adrenaline rush. But you may be so eager for some action that you take off before you even know your destination. Your enthusiasm is admirable, but it's smarter to make a sensible game plan before you dash out the door.

All of a sudden you're so busy that you might not  have enough time to catch your breath. You may even feel a bit anxious about fulfilling your current stack of obligations today. Thankfully, you should be able to keep up with your hectic schedule if you make a plan and stick to it. If you're not sure about the best way to handle a particular situation, trust your instincts; let common sense be your guide.

You are contemplating a major change in your lifestyle these days. Thankfully, the hypersensitive Cancer Moon gives you an uncanny knack for seeing what's just beyond the horizon. But catching a glimpse of the future now isn't enough; you also have to take direct action. Don't just go back for another round of analysis today; announce your intentions and then prove your commitment by rolling up your sleeves and getting down to business.

Don't assume that you can get anyone else to help you with your work today. Even if you want to get others involved in your project, you're better off now to undertake it on your own. Going solo may not be your notion of an ideal situation, but it is much better than partnering with the wrong person at this time. Do the groundwork first and then find the right people to support your efforts later  when you have more resources at your disposal.

You may feel the need to retreat in order to reconnect with your dreams and there's no reason to deny your preference today even if you have promises to keep. Following your desires isn't always the most intelligent thing to do, but it could certainly have a positive impact now. Focus your attention on the present moment, even if you are tempted to look ahead to what's next. Additionally, eliminating attachments to the past adds to the power of now.

Although you might be dreaming about an exotic getaway to a faraway destination today, the current cosmos encourage you to concentrate your energy on responsibilities closer to home. Fortunately, you can rely on your ability to communicate clearly and objectively as long as you make a concentrated effort to limit the topics of discussion. Avoid the temptation of talking about your fantasies, however vivid and captivating they may be now. Setting priorities enables you to deliver your very best.

You want to offer your assistance to nearly everyone you know, but the simple truth is that you're struggling to just take care of yourself today. Although it may feel uncomfortable, it's necessary to be selfish if you want to have anything left over to give others. There's no reason to be too hard on yourself, especially if you're just trying to create a healthy balance that works. The rest of the world can fend for itself more than you think.

You may be feeling self-sufficient today, yet your desire to detach from others can bring some pitfalls. One problem is that a trusted friend might see you as unable to ask for help or unwilling to receive it. Keep in mind that you don't have to give up your coveted independence to receive emotional support. Letting someone else slip through your defensive boundaries and into your life could bring you more joy than you expect.

You're acting as if you've had an extra dose of caffeine today because your energy level is buzzing from active Mars gaining traction in your exuberant sign. Your enthusiasm can soar even higher now if you are able to let go of your past. Mars remains in your sign for six weeks, recharging your batteries and supplying you with extra passion and stamina. It's your time to start something fabulous. Don't wait for another invitation from the cosmos; this is it.

You're able to strike a balance between reasonable caution and radical thought today. However, it's not easy to keep your final goal in sight if you meet resistance. Don't give up, even if others tell you that your plans are too unrealistic now. Stay in the game by sharing your new ideas with someone you trust. Be persistent; one of them will hit the proverbial nail on the head.

You're seeking opportunities to explore your intuitive realms today, but you must remain practical about meeting your obligations. Thankfully, you won't have to endlessly analyze the details of your day, for everything is more on track than you expected. Nevertheless, it's wise to work out the timing of your schedule in advance so you'll be more prepared for the unexpected twists and turns you encounter along the way. Ironically, being flexible works best when you already have a practical plan in place.

Your creativity is out of bounds today with the Moon lighting up your 5th House of Self-Expression. However, you could be so eager to get your personal projects up and running that your performance at work slips. Luckily, supportive lunar aspects can help you smooth over the rough spots, but you might inadvertently make matters worse by taking on too much. Limit your promises to avoid unnecessary problems later on. Establish emotional security so your inner child can come out and play.

You're riding on a wave of excitement today but even though you are thrilled, you might be happier if you had more control of the present circumstances. Thankfully, you do have power over some things, but there are still issues that are beyond your authority. Don't bother wasting your precious time attempting to change something that is out of reach; instead, focus on responding to the shifting currents as best as you can. Maximize your overall effectiveness by adjusting your priorities throughout the day.

You might not feel very motivated today. However, you can be quite productive if you stop scheming to get time off. Ironically, you may actually enjoy doing mundane chores around the office or at home once you find your groove. Now is not the time to seek approval from anyone else, since your coworkers won't likely tell you what you want to hear today. Ironically, working solely for the deep satisfaction of a job well done brings admiration from others.

You can sense the anticipation in the air today as long as you're not afraid of trying something new and different. Although you are often  easygoing in your approach, you could be overly concerned today about getting every little thing right. If you relax your expectations you can still achieve your goals while having fun. Push yourself past your limits, but don't take yourself too seriously in the process.

You are tempted to take on so much responsibility today that you might feel discouraged once you realize that you can't complete everything you started. Thankfully, the current solution is rather simple: exercise caution prior to making another time-consuming commitment. Begin a new project slowly and build momentum as you go along for the best results. For now, it's better to promise less and deliver more.

Financial matters could be confusing now as uncertainty about a looming decision rises to the surface. You are moving through tricky territory, intrigued by a money-making scheme. Or, perhaps, you may be trying to justify a major purchase. In either case, you feel anxiety because the solution isn't clear. Your sense of urgency can push you to make an impulsive choice you might later regret. Remove the pressure by delaying your response for a few days. If the opportunity passes, then it's best to just let it go; time is on your side.

You like to think of everything in advance, but all the prior research in the world can't prepare you for the surprising twists and turns that your life is currently taking. However, don't get too caught up with the demands of the present moment or you might forget about your original intention. Remember, the issues aren't black and white now since setting your old plans aside enables you to be even more effective in executing your new ones.

Someone could catch you off guard today by overreacting to what you say or do, but you might not be aware of the behind-the-scenes story. Don't turn into a chronic naysayer just because you're uncomfortable with another person who chooses a different approach from yours. Even if people seem brash, remember that you can be gracious enough to allow for the wide variety of personalities you encounter. Taking the high road now may be more beneficial than you expect.

You might feel rather impatient today, yet your spontaneity is counterbalanced by your unrelenting drive to finish anything you start. It would be a severe mistake for anyone to assume that you're all talk now, even if you have a lot to say. Back up your promises with clear and decisive action while focusing on getting your work completed as quickly as possible. You don't have anything to prove to anyone but yourself.

You may be experiencing a high-frequency state of anxiety now, but some of your intensity is less than apparent. There may be more to the big picture than meets the eye as social Venus creates an awkward aspect to non-conformist Uranus. However, your creativity is irrepressible today. Hitting the gym or taking a long walk may be an ideal strategy to get your mojo flowing and start things moving in the right direction.

You're tired of struggling to stay on top when everything seems to be working against you. However, denial isn't a viable strategy; you certainly don't want to fall asleep at the wheel, only to discover that you missed a significant opportunity. Your greatest challenge is to believe that everything really could get easier from this point on. Whether or not the hardest part is over, you can set your life back on track by visualizing a bright future in the present moment.

You have a clear idea of how you'd like to spend your time today until someone crosses your path with an entirely different agenda. Your immediate reaction might be to explain why your plan is the better course of action. However, you only create more problems if you set up a competitive situation where there can only be one winner. Thankfully, establishing common ground enables everyone to work together successfully as a team. Cooperation is smarter than opposition.

You really don't want anyone telling you what to do today, especially since your mind is already made up. Nevertheless, it's still best to avoid open conflict now by imagining what would be possible if everyone involved was truly on the same page. However, don't let others push you too far, especially if their core values are vastly different from yours. Give them a fair warning and then take whatever action is required to maintain your integrity.

You may be disappointed by the way things are turning out today, but you're probably in better shape than you realize if you can let go of your previous expectations. You will have more opportunities later on to bring your day-to-day obligations into alignment with your high ideals. Now is the time to exercise self-restraint and deliver on what you've already promised rather than just moving on to what's next. Happily, your future looks brighter once you have handled unfinished business from the past.

You could inadvertently take on way too much today because you may underestimate the size of a job. Part of the problem is that you can't let go of a project until it feels right, so you may spend time going back over your previous work. Although others won't likely notice the difference, it's important that you honor your own need for excellence. Your best bet might be to postpone some chores for another day. Quality counts now more than ever; your reputation is on the line.

Slowing the pace of your work may not sound like the smartest thing to do, but it's wise to rest now when you have the chance. Unfortunately, you can't just declare today a personal holiday, so focus your energy on what you absolutely must accomplish before treating yourself to a bit of time off. Considering the long road you have ahead of you, replenishing your energy along the way is a good idea. This is a marathon, not a sprint.

The evocative Moon is rattling your 1st House of Self, taking you on a wild emotional ride. Stay unattached to every thought as it comes and goes. Don't push away anger and don't pull in the desires. Just allow your feelings to run their own course without trying to control them. However, this doesn't mean that you must share your inner process with those around you. Observing your journey from a slightly detached point of view teaches you a valuable lesson.

Although you Lions are known for your dramatic self-expression, putting your thoughts out in the open might prove to be too much trouble today. Once you let one little feeling escape, the windows to your soul are thrown open and all your emotions could come pouring out. Even if you think you have solid boundaries in place, it may be hard to stop midstream. Err on the side of caution now and keep your secrets to yourself.

You could be so concerned about what your friends are thinking of you now that you work yourself into a state of anxiety. The reflective Cancer Moon's presence in your 11th House of Social Engagements prompts you to feel as if someone doesn't want to include you in their social group. But it's your heightened sensitivity and not anyone else's negative judgment that actually motivates your self-protective tactics. Even if you're afraid to express your vulnerability today, try to remain receptive to the overtures of others.

Some of your objective thoughts might need to be hidden from view today because analysis leads you to one conclusion while your heart says something else. You can almost convince yourself that you don't have to become entangled in someone else's affairs. However, after considering all the rational reasons to retreat, toss them aside and do what feels best. Your gut won't steer you wrong now if you keep your ego out of the picture.

Your romantic dreams can be realized today if you counterbalance tender expression with an air of detachment. It's not that you want to avoid an intimate connection with someone special, it's just that you also need your personal space. Be careful; you could get caught in the middle as you try to sort out this internal conflict. Make it easier on everyone by refraining from extreme reactions either way. Sharing your heart isn't as scary as you think.

Seek the simplest way out of an emotionally awkward situation today by practicing the fine art of procrastination. Although this isn't often considered to be a healthy strategy, avoiding conflict and delaying an important decision could be your smartest move now. Letting events take their own course lessens the intensity, allowing the resistance to naturally dissipate on its own. Give things a day or two and then try again.

You can see the work piling up in front of you, but your inclination is to remain quiet rather than expressing your concerns. You may be guardedly optimistic because you have confidence in your skills, even if you realize that accomplishing your goals won't be easy. Don't waste time; start clearing the obstacles that are in your path so you can make it to the top of the mountain where you belong.

It's tricky to find your rhythm today because whatever you do, it feels like something's off-kilter. Oddly enough, this subtle discomfort motivates you to take care of many little tasks that remain unfinished. Instead of complaining about all your work, transform your annoyance into action with a little help from your friends. Leaning on someone you can trust sets you back on solid ground. Everyone needs a little friendly encouragement now and then.

It's not that anything in particular is wrong today; it's just that you don't have the luxury of saying what's on your mind. Sharing your real concerns might send someone else into an emotional tailspin, which would only make your day more challenging. Thankfully, you can step up to the plate and help others feel more comfortable with their feelings. Instead of rocking the boat now, be a hero by bringing stability into the lives of those you love.

Your intuition tells you that everything is coming up roses in the very near future. You might need to wait a while longer, but the current circumstances that have been holding you back are in the process of changing. Although it seems you have little to say today about what will happen next, it's crucial to voice your desires anyhow. If you don't stand up and speak your truth now, you could miss this window of opportunity. She who hesitates is lost.

You may be stuck in an outdated emotional pattern today, yet you know that the resistance you face won't last. Nevertheless, this lack of progress can still be quite frustrating, making it more important than ever to rely on your common sense. Consider what you want to change in your life, and then share your concerns with your partner or a friend who will tell you the truth. Communicating your apprehensions helps you to remove the obstacles from your path. Out with the old and in with the new.

Although your enthusiasm might have recently faded a bit, your outlook could improve rapidly today. The dark clouds are dissipating and you are ready to head out for a little adventure. Tread carefully, since even the simplest distraction along the way can catch you off guard. However, trying to avoid the unexpected is a waste of energy, a break in your routine could be exactly what you need. There's something to be said for the element of surprise.

Hopefully, you can set aside some private time this weekend for yourself. You are so skilled at taking care of others that sometimes you forget your own needs in the process. Unfortunately, you can't be everything to everyone. If your emotional batteries are drained now, then you may have nothing left to give. Put yourself at the top of the list for a change and do something special that makes your heart happy.

You can't help but sense the power of the soulful Moon once she settles into your sign for a couple of days. Make the most of this lunar visit by taking time to sink into your own emotional world. Be still and let your intuition be your guide, even if you prefer doing something more physically active. Sometimes stopping to smell the flowers can change your whole perspective on life.

It may seem like everyone is working against you now, but it's not easy to put your finger on the reason. It might not be very significant, but if you do feel like you are missing something, rest assured that this is a real possibility. Don't waste precious time trying to find the solution out there. Instead, look inside yourself for something obvious that you previously overlooked. Oddly enough, adjusting your perspective can make the apparent problem disappear.

You are eager to make new connections with others today and you're anticipating spending time with a group of like-minded friends. If you don't have particular plans in mind, take a leisurely stroll in a public park or explore a local museum. Whatever you do, get out and surround yourself with people, for temporarily losing yourself in a crowd can put you into a much more optimistic frame of mind.

You could be coerced onto center stage whether you like it or not, but you do appreciate that others are openly admiring your work. It's gratifying to be recognized by your peers, even if you grow uncomfortable when excess attention is showered on you. Thankfully, there's no need to go into hiding. Instead, find a compromise between the heat of the spotlight and the cold, dark closet. It's perfectly acceptable to feel proud of yourself when you deserve it.

You tend to bounce back quickly from disappointment because you see the glass half-full rather than half-empty. Today, as the sky clears, try to get out and do something that will add more joy to your life. Whether it's going to a concert or taking a long hike out in the country, find a way to recharge your soul. Better yet, bring a friend along and talk about what ails you. Expressing your vulnerability activates healing and the potential for more intimate connections.

Although you're confident that your plans will come true, you also are feeling some urgency about sharing what's on your mind. This doesn't mean that you must share everything your thinking today with other. No matter what you do, the road not taken may seem the better choice retrospectively. Don't judge your decisions so harshly. You are where you are now for a reason, determine your lesson and move on to what's next.

Someone may make excessive demands on your schedule now and you might not know what to do about it. Of course, you want to come through with the goods, since you know this would smooth over the rough spots. Nevertheless, it's not constructive to jump through hoops just for the effect. Fortunately, you can still be gracious while setting healthy boundaries. Ultimately, it's essential to remain true to your heart.

You might be required to produce further details about your ideas today, but these demands could annoy you rather than inspire you. Others may miss the fact that you are not particularly interested in the finer points now. Instead, you are content to let the little things take shape on their own. Still, demonstrating your good intentions by making a sincere effort to focus could strengthen your overall position within the group.

Schedule your social plans wisely because you may inadvertently commit to conflicting engagements. It might be that there are more events happening today than you can attend and it's nearly impossible to narrow your selection. Nevertheless, it's best to cut back on non-essential activities, so don't put too much energy into second-guessing yourself once you've made up your mind. Your first choice is your best choice.

Family members or close friends may now be the source of your current dilemma as they offer you an idea that seems attractive at first. However, upon closer scrutiny, the opportunity turns out to be one of those schemes that looks a lot better than it actually is. Be careful of jumping into any situation with both feet, since you might not have a quick way back to stable ground. Take your time before responding, and don't burn any bridges in the process.

Your lack of motivation could mean you don't get a whole lot of work done today. You like the idea of a repose, but your hectic schedule may not allow you the time for one today. The good news is that you have a real opportunity for growth in front of you, but you must push beyond your comfort zone in order to make the most of it. You will never know what can happen if you don't try.

Receiving unexpected praise boosts your confidence today. Unfortunately, there are surprises lurking behind even the most attractive situations, which could muddle your emotions and obscure your sense of direction. In fact, your self-esteem may go through a few ups and downs today. Don't let self-doubt get the best of you; maintaining a positive attitude impacts your future in a powerful way.

Your current inclination is to convince others that everything is fine, but this may not be the whole truth. You are captivated by daydreams of romantic love and sensual enjoyment. Shake things up today and share your fantasies with a sweetheart or close friend. Though complete satisfaction may not be attainable, now is not the time to hide your true feelings. You'll never know what magic you could experience until you open your heart.

The cosmic tides are pushing you to bring your unexpressed needs out into the open today so you can finally fulfill your desires. Keep in mind you are better off delivering your message with a sugar coating for it to have the impact you desire. It's crucial to remain gracious and kind in all your communications now if you want a shot at manifesting your dreams.

Your creativity is often in the spotlight as you seek ways to reflect the beauty around you, both in your interactions with others and in what you choose to create. Pay attention to the pragmatic side of your life today as you weave your magic to produce a positive impact on your own personal appearance and your self-esteem. You don't need to turn your world upside down. Small changes are the ones that last the longest.

Your personal relationships might be a formidable source of confusion now. You know what you want, but it's not clear how to achieve it. You're willing to sort out your feelings, but a fog is rolling in and it's nearly impossible to obtain reliable emotional bearings. Wait until the time is right before following your heart. Achieving emotional fulfillment will be easier once the illusions clear and you can see where you're going.

Your dreams of the future are a source of personal inspiration today. You might be so enamored with your exciting plans that you take every chance you can to share them with others. You're passionate about your vision and assume everyone else feels the same. However, this dynamic is more complicated now than you realize, leaving you dazed and confused. Reveal a little less and smile a little more today.

You welcome boundaries as they help you define your plan of action. When everything is neat and tidy you know exactly what you need to do, and you do it. But the edges of reality seem fuzzy today and things appear softer and more innocent. Intuitively, you know that you are looking at your life through the eyes of your inner child. Remember, just a small acknowledgment of reality will go a long way to sustain your dreams.

Significant changes are about to rock your boat and shake you awake. You probably don't have a clue yet about what is going to develop. Just ride the tides of your emotions as they go back and forth without acting on your feelings until the currents return to normal. Demonstrating your Aquarius resolve empowers you to overcome your uncertainty. Fortunately, your chances for success improve when you act with conviction.

You can be swept up in someone else's drama today without even realizing what's happening. Additionally, an unstable work situation could magnify your sense of surrealism. You may even set goals based upon your fantasies, rather than what is actually attainable. Be careful because you could miss an opportunity for personal growth if you misinterpret current events. Focus on realizing your potential and quit trying to save everyone else.

It's usually prudent to have a concrete plan in place prior to starting a big project. However, your need to have your ducks in a row could prevent you from gaining any progress today. Setting meaningful goals is helpful, but it's pointless to fill in all the steps too soon. A flexible attitude enables you to utilize your experience when responding to the changing circumstances. Having a general strategy as a guiding light is more productive now than nailing down all the details in advance.

Instead of letting the expectations of others rule you today, you might slip away for a bit of fun and games. You're tired of playing the role of someone's moral compass during an emotional storm and need to redirect your attention toward satisfying your own needs. Your key planet Venus is activating your 5th House of Play, adding a layer of sweetness to activities that are usually quite routine or even boring. Let someone else come up with solutions; even if they are not as solid as yours, you'll be free to chase your creative pursuits.

You could be a bit confused about your goals if your dreams linger even after you wake today. You might not want to undertake projects that require too much physical exertion. Instead of trying to control the external circumstances, contemplate which feelings to let go without remaining attached to a specific outcome. This meditative practice helps you align with the nurturing energy all around you.

You are in a familiar loop today, and might become deeply involved in an emotional concern, probably not of your own making. You have a tendency to judge others based upon your own personal values, but don't let your assumptions prevent you from supporting those you love. Your sympathy and caring spirit could be exactly what the doctor ordered to help your friends through a difficult time.

You are attracted to the idea of being fair-minded today, but may find it challenging to act on your good intentions. Part of your current dilemma stems from not knowing how much you should get involved in other people's affairs. Fulfilling your own desires is not your top priority now, leading you to become emotionally entangled in the drama of the moment. Tread carefully and conserve your resources for when you really need them.

You might be so concerned about the reactions of others that you are cautious about expressing your feelings today. A brief hesitation is probably sensible in the moment because it gives you additional time to make the best possible decision. Unfortunately, you could talk yourself into doing more research just to avoid choosing one path over another. However, procrastination is not a viable option; ultimately, taking any action is better than doing nothing at all.

Withholding information works in your favor now, but if you choose to reveal your feelings it must be done with good intentions and a high level of integrity. Keeping a secret is something you do well today, yet your unwillingness to share might backfire on you. Fortunately, your current discretion is healthy while authoritative Saturn aligns with vulnerable Venus. Decide what your limits are and don't let anyone talk you into saying any more than you want.

Expanding your horizons by furthering your education is a smart idea. You have considerable planning to do today in order to reach your goals. Thankfully, whatever you learn now can be very useful to you later on, especially in order to advance in your career. But don't obsess about the cost or the commitment of time; just move ahead as if it will happen. You must believe in your dreams if they are to come true; you can always figure out the details later.

You think you can trust your intuition, but impulsive behavior based on a gut feeling won't serve you well today. Instead of making up your plans as you go along, put some forethought into your actions prior to doing anything out of the ordinary. Stick with the facts to avoid fooling yourself with any pie-in-the-sky thinking. Playing it low key now allows you to shift into high gear once the pace picks up. Conserving your energy until the timing is right heightens your chances for success.

Although you are usually production-oriented, your practicality is off the charts today. Naturally, you want to acknowledge your desire to get ahead now that resourceful Venus is blowing an encouraging kiss to your key planet Saturn. Nevertheless, it's also important to be open to pleasant experiences that may have nothing to do with your professional ambitions. Sometimes the most valuable gifts are those that cannot be measured.

Even if someone tries to rain on your parade today, you are willing to acknowledge the temporary setback as a potential learning experience. Your current self-confidence enables you to simply alter the direction of the marching band without resistance. Your success depends upon your flexible attitude, so do whatever you can to be open to change -- even if it arrives in the form of something blocking your progress. Things are not as they appear now; an obstacle might be a blessing in disguise.

You may believe that you have invented or discovered a new and improved way to do the same old thing. If so, don't waste your time today trying to explain your brilliant idea to others. Instead, get on with your work and demonstrate the power of your vision through actions and not words. Pursue your creativity and see where it goes; there's no time like the present to make something magical happen.

It may seem like a hopeless battle today as your schedule goes up in smoke. Good intentions don't pave the road to success; instead, they can encourage your workmates to set unrealistic expectations about your productivity. Thankfully, you don't have to let others down if you are cautious about inflating your dreams in the first place. There's nothing wrong with thinking big as long as you maintain a healthy perspective about what is really possible. Promise less and deliver more.

Riding a wave of creativity feels empowering, but you might end up being disappointed if the end result doesn't fit your larger plan. There's no room for your pipe dreams now; you must bring your visions down to earth. You can achieve satisfaction if you can manage to stay grounded. You might feel as if you're running out of time, but you're not. Instead of panicking because you think you're approaching a deadline, imagine you're just shifting gears and taking control of the journey.

Maintaining your focus on one specific project can be challenging when there are so many interesting opportunities calling your name. However, this isn't the time to scatter your energy; for the best results you should limit your options. Establishing priorities helps you decide where to best apply your energy now. Instead of dreaming about what you want to do, put all your concentration on the tasks at hand. Exercising self-restraint today sets the stage for expanding your range of vision over the days ahead.

There's a lot going on in your life now, but not so much that it becomes unmanageable. Thankfully, you can make the most of the day by adopting a dual approach; keep one eye on the exciting potential of the future while focusing the other on making the most of the present moment. Envisioning your ideal situation at work or at home is fine as long as you acknowledge the power of now. Being hopeful positively impacts your current experience if you remember that what you do today is the best way to influence tomorrow.

You can have a powerful influence on those closest to you today as benevolent Jupiter highlights your 1st House of Personality. Your optimism is contagious and inspires others without much effort on your part. However, you may be so enthusiastic that you overstate your case or oversell your cause. Too much exuberance now might make you come across as insecure or even desperate. Don't push the river; let your energy flow naturally for the best possible outcome.

You might think that time is slipping by too quickly now that you've missed your chance to creatively express yourself. Even if you feel that your recent inspiration is fading, there's still time to make your dreams come true. However, the sooner you jump in to make something extraordinary happen, the less you will have to worry about. Believing in yourself is the first step to success.

Your days of working behind the scenes are nearly over; it's time to step out into the spotlight and let others acknowledge your contribution. This transition will not happen on its own; you must take the stage and show everyone what you have to offer. Don't let humility stand in your way. This is your moment to shine. When others are able to see your talent, they can give you the support you desire.

Although it feels good to lighten up and enjoy the company of your peers, you are hesitant to take things too far. Nevertheless, you can still lift others out of their doldrums as they pick up on your positive energy. Just remember, it's healthier to establish a sustainable pace than it is to burn out on extreme reactions. When you put forth a conscious effort you can find that sweet spot between connecting emotionally and engaging in too much personal drama.

If you are busy with community issues or your career, your recent efforts might have brought you into the public eye. Although you enjoy the admiration of your peers, it's time to step down from the pedestal and work with others as equals. The sooner you realize that you have nothing to prove, the quicker your relationships will improve. Share the glory of being a star today; when your tribe shines brighter so do you.

Sometimes you define yourself by your accomplishments. However, you must shift your focus now and manage your social dynamics rather than your professional goals alone. If a relationship issue takes up more of your time these days, it's a sign from the cosmos that you need to reevaluate your priorities. But don't slip into denial if the tension becomes unbearable. Channel the stress into an emotional teaching moment so that you can learn an important lesson about your heart.

Things are happening so fast these days that you might feel as if you've been shot out of a cannon at the carnival. Nevertheless, if you relax you may actually enjoy the adrenaline rush. Rather than worrying about what might go wrong, visualize the best-case scenario.  Your mind is offering you a ticket to a view from the top. Don't hesitate; take it and run.

You may be spellbound by another person's dreams, especially if someone approaches you with a smile and a story. Fortunately, this could turn into a lovely connection with several planets blessing your 7th House of Partners today. Enjoy the energy as it unfolds. Let the emotional waves ebb and flow without trying to change their direction. Practicing your flexibility can extend the good feelings longer than you expect.

Your performance at work is quite important to you today, but you must also express your creativity in order to feel fulfilled. You are bursting with originality now, but need to be careful about being too aggressive when sharing your ideas. When you channel your enthusiasm into the tasks at hand, you'll take your productivity to a whole new level.

You might choose to pursue pleasurable experiences today, whether or not you really have the time. Practice self-discipline, since you may find that the energy you waste on a passing fancy could be put to better use creating something that will have lasting value. Thankfully, you can have the best of both worlds now by incorporating joy into your daily routine. Love what you do and you'll never work a day in your life.

You may be at odds with yourself today as you remember a recent experience and wonder if you did the right thing at the time. However, you're unable to move on to whatever is next until you fully understand what is happening in the present. Even if you are nostalgic for the past, your current resistance could be a last-ditch effort to delay the inevitable. Take one good look in the rear-view mirror before letting go of your emotional baggage and heading out for your next adventure.

You might have recently experienced a spell of overconfidence, but you have the sense to be more logical now. Even if you're influenced by your emotions, take the time to focus on the positive while filtering out the negativity. Just remember that turning into a blind optimist isn't the best strategy, either. Balancing your head with your heart is the smartest route to success.

It's one thing to take a project to the next level, but it's an entirely different matter if you're considering initiating something new. An impulsive response seems like a good idea until it lands you into trouble. You're easily distracted now, so make a conscious effort to concentrate on what's most important. Pleasurable moments come and go. However, taking care of business today has lasting results.

A wave of optimism encourages you to make a significant commitment today. You're more likely to say yes because you're receiving an inspirational boost from the Moon's presence in your sign as she connects with pleasurable Venus. However, you might not have the stamina to tackle your work once the positive feelings pass. Don't put all your faith into a plan that could suddenly unravel; instead, be ready to create a new one on the fly. Thinking through your actions in advance improves your chances for success.

It's fruitless to try and prolong a project that's coming to an end. Excitement may be lurking just around the corner, but you must trust the process of letting go to get the most from tomorrow's Libra New Moon. You might want to run ahead, but a little caution goes a long way now. Haste makes waste; even if the opportunities seem worthwhile, don't charge forward until you are certain about where you want to go.

Your goals are in transition and there isn't much you can do to stop the process. Thankfully, everything looks better today as you catch a glimpse of the new direction your life is taking. However, you don't have to make any big decisions yet. Plant the seeds for your future by patiently cultivating your dreams and letting them grow into reality at their own natural pace.

Your confidence is growing by leaps and bounds, but don't assume that you can simply power your way through the most difficult parts of your current journey. Slow down and use your intellectual skills to decipher the complexities of your worldly ambitions. Work and play could benefit from a dose of cool logic to help you maintain a healthy perspective. Just because you feel like a superhero doesn't mean you can fly.

If you are currently working out relationship logistics, it's time to finish up with the details and put your plan into action. You are preparing for a new phase of expression. Don't lose sight of your goals; tie up as many loose ends as possible before moving on. Although it may not be comfortable, pay particularly close attention to your feelings now because they have the power to inspire you to even greater heights.

It might seem as if you missed a chance to make something significant happen, but by tomorrow you should be all geared up to try again. Nevertheless, don't let an opportunity pass by today without giving it serious consideration. Even if your expectations don't pan out as you hope, the process of visualizing the alternatives could fire you up with a wave of enthusiasm. There's no need to worry about the outcome yet; just be ready to act with clear intention when the time is right.

Take it in stride if someone offers you an idea today that conflicts with your previous plans. Unfortunately, it's all too easy to get into an argument over something that isn't as critical as it seems. Maintaining your objectivity is crucial now because your uncharacteristic impatience creates more problems than it solves. A little bit of caution can save you from unnecessary frustration down the road. Creating a path based on compromise could turn you into the hero of the day.

It's more fun to work with others today since they seem open to your crazy ideas.
