Today's Libra New Moon falls in your 7th House of Partnerships, setting the stage for creative people to enter your life. Although your need for independence won't just disappear, you could forget about it long enough to meet someone halfway now. Practicing the art of compromise might enrich your life in ways you can't imagine.

Going out of your way to make others happy is second nature today, but your nurturing behavior won't necessarily bring romantic fulfillment. Although relationships may lack warmth with the cool breeze of today's Libra New Moon blowing in your 6th House of Daily Routine, working with a partner increases your productivity. Don't close down emotionally; keeping an open heart enables you to find deeper satisfaction in the days ahead.

Sharing your feelings could lead to a headache if you don't use some discrimination along the way. Nevertheless, monitoring your words allows you to express your heart without taking things too far. Self-indulgence may come easily now that the Libra New Moon highlights your 5th House of Fun and Games. Unfortunately, you might be shortsighted when it comes to fulfilling your responsibilities today. Luckily, you can open the door to pleasurable pursuits after you honor your current commitments.

You need to retreat and create a safe haven for yourself today. The artistic Libra New Moon in your 4th House of Roots encourages you to create a harmonious space where you can find solace. Find the best way to make your residence or work space cozy and comfortable -- then spend time recharging your batteries in your peaceful new sanctuary. Home is where the heart is.

The pace of your life speeds up today as the Libra New Moon rattles your 3rd House of Immediate Environment, making it essential to meticulously manage your calendar. You are likely to fall behind schedule if you don't pay close attention to each and every appointment. Be proactive and plan ahead to capitalize on any opportunity that comes knocking on your door.

An unexpected expense might create cash flow problems today, but whatever happens may not be as serious as it seems at first. Watching your finances is crucial now that the Libra New Moon lands in your 2nd House of Money. An overdrawn account or some other financial glitch could prompt you to run around in circles doing damage control, but there won't likely be any long-lasting consequences from this fiscal hiccup if you respond to it right away. A stitch in time saves nine.

Instead of going overboard trying to please everyone, stay true to your heart by sharing your real emotions. Today's harmonious Libra New Moon tempts you to remain quiet unless your feelings fit into other people's expectations. However, don't agree to someone's plan just to sidestep an unpleasant conflict. Your best protection against unwanted surprises is to strike a healthy balance between your own desires and the needs of others.

The Libra New Moon occupies your 12th House of Imagination, drawing you into your subconscious with vivid fantasies. Naturally, it's essential to keep your dreams alive, but it's also critical to discern the difference between fact and fancy. No matter how clever your rationalizations sound, it doesn't necessarily justify acting on them. Traveling in spiritual realms is lovely as long as you know when to return to Earth.

Your social life may grow out of hand as the friendly Libra New Moon initiates a new cycle in your 11th House of Networking. Although you enjoy being swept up in the excitement today, you can't avoid your previous obligations. It feels as if nearly everyone is depending on you and you have no choice but to come through for them at any cost. Luckily, you might be able to have your cake and eat it too if you can establish reasonable limits and stick to them.

An unexpected shift of energy at work may temporarily distract you from an unresolved problem. Fortunately, things could turn out better than you expect. It's safe to assume you are performing your job duties admirably with the Libra New Moon spotlighting your 10th House of Career. However, a confrontation with a co-worker can be a sign that you need to make adjustments in order to progress further. Don't let your emotions get the best of you. Maintaining a calm objectivity in your conversations ensures your success.

Following your dreams is a smart bet, especially if they involve stretching far beyond your normal horizons. The Libra New Moon is stirring up the energy in your 9th House of Big Ideas today, so go ahead and do something out of the ordinary. Taking up an unusual course could send you on an unexpected metaphysical journey. Whatever you do, don't settle on the status quo now; dance to the rhythm of your own drummer even if no one else can hear it.

You have a special opportunity to work with others now in ways that take you beyond a normal partnership. Deeper connections create stronger bonds between you and your coworkers as the Libra New Moon emphasizes your 8th House of Transformation. Nevertheless, be wary about crossing the line of social acceptability today. If there's any room for doubt, keep your feelings to yourself. Don't let your emotional neediness get in the way of achieving success.

Although you might not be as comfortable in the emotional realms as when you are in motion, it's time to learn new ways of expression. The potential for growth may be rather subtle at first, but the long-term effects can be profound. Pay attention to any ideas that percolate into your awareness now from dreams or in meditation. The first step to gaining awareness is to slow down and seek the knowledge within. You need to stand still if you want lightning to strike.

The simplest activities at home can bring you great pleasure today but your mind may be distracted by other forms of enjoyment. Perhaps you are longing for a romantic adventure or a spiritual quest. However, you might also want to pursue more creative activities at work. Expressing your joy doesn't need to be limited to your personal life. Don't sell yourself short; put your heart into whatever you do. The results could be more rewarding than you expect.

Your intuitive nature is functioning at a very high frequency now, channeling powerful information that was previously inaccessible. Although your first impulse may be to shut down and rely on more rational sources, limiting your options would be a mistake at this time in your life. Do whatever you must to remain open to your shifting perspective now, even if you don't understand the process. Give your instincts permission to run the show today.

Set aside the struggles that are monopolizing your attention these days, so you can refocus on the future rather than dwell in the past. You are preparing to make powerful changes that can offer new avenues for advancement at work. It may even seem as if your career is on the launch pad. But you must be willing to let go of the details of your immediate responsibilities to widen your horizons. Don't weigh yourself down with old expectations; anything can happen if you believe in yourself.

Pushing against your self-imposed limitations today is the best way to overcome the obstacles currently in your path. You can get away with eccentric behaviors that might appear overwhelming at other times in your life. People seem to support you and your long-term visions now more than ever. Don't try to confine yourself to a situation that restrains your potential. Instead, relax into the possibility that your dreams really could come true.

There are secrets you must tell, yet it may take more time to determine the smartest way to share what you're afraid to reveal. This is a time of personal growth, and part of your current work is to increase the level of integrity in your life. Your spiritual practice and emotional processing are essential keys to deepening your awareness and breaking free from unnecessary restrictions that are keeping you from expressing your vulnerability.

Your feelings are quite close to the surface now, yet they may continue to evolve over the days ahead. Controlling your emotions is not the same as monitoring your reactions to others. Don't let your shifting moods set the tone for your social interactions or you could appear less stable than you actually are. Remember, you can act rationally even if you're overwhelmed on the inside. Staying aware of the differences between your inner and outer worlds eventually leads to a more balanced approach to life.

The details of your everyday routine grow less important to you now as you seek to break out of any stagnation that lingers in your life. Unfortunately, there may not be any quick fixes, for constraining circumstances will take time to untangle. Try not to get frustrated if things aren't moving fast enough today. Just keep your eyes on your long-term goals and save the small stuff for another day. Don't lose faith; change can happen when you least expect it.

Although you may secretly fear loss of the status quo, you are in an exciting process of gaining freedom as irrepressible Uranus zaps your key planet Jupiter. Even if you must stand up to an authority figure, the results will likely work out in your favor. Don't be afraid to take a risk to set the stage to make your dreams come true. Your destiny is calling and new adventures await your arrival.

Your most traditional ideas about home and family are currently in a state of flux. You are opening your heart to new feelings in surprising ways and your beliefs are changing with respect to your goals. What was most important over the past few years may be diminishing in relevance now. Don't worry if you're not ready to discuss your shifting priorities yet. Be patient; this emotional transformation will take a while to reach fruition.

An important teacher may appear on the scene now to show you new ways of thriving in relationships. You might discover that your preconceived notions about your spouse, lover, friends or associates are limiting your emotional growth. It's time to tear down the walls that prevent you from realizing your highest potential. But it's nearly impossible to get the most out of this transition on your own, so be willing to learn from the wise counsel of those you trust. An open mind leads to a deeper connection with your heart.

Your status at work can improve substantially over the months ahead if you have the patience to stick to your ambitious plan. Often you are willing to set your agenda aside in order to flow with the prevailing currents or to be of service to others. However, you are on a trajectory to a new level of success now if you're willing to put in the work and stay on track. Maintaining a consistent routine improves your chances for long-term success.

You could be blasting through these days with exuberance, but a familiar matter may be knocking at the door of your subconscious. Old issues are brought to light that you might have thought were resolved a long time ago. However, the unconscious mind isn't limited by our sense of linear time. Allow the memories of your past to resurface now, for they are messengers that can help you remember what is important to your current journey. All your past experiences make you the person you are today.

You may feel as if a power struggle is brewing with someone close to you. There are portions of this conflict that might not be out in the open yet. You won't necessarily prevent the current standoff by yourself because you don't have all the facts. If it seems like others aren't respecting your boundaries, try your best to be flexible in your response since this can help ameliorate the tension in the air. Acknowledging that you don't have all the answers is the first step to finding resolution.

An intense interaction today could leave you wondering what happened and why you ever jumped into the fray in the first place. Your reaction doesn't necessarily add negativity to the situation, but it's tricky to remain detached from the drama unfolding in your immediate surroundings. You might try to hide your response, but it's not going to go away on its own. Don't waste energy fighting your inner demons. Summon up your courage now and let your feelings, not your logic, guide your way.

You may wish you could escape your ever-growing list of responsibilities today. Your inner voice tells you to grit your teeth and just finish your chores, while a second voice encourages you to express your feelings in protest. You feel caught between these extreme positions and might not know what to do. It's best to share your concerns as kindly as possible now or the suppressed energy will come back and bite you when you least expect it. You must let others know what you need if you want them to understand your plight.

You might inadvertently start an argument by overreacting to a situation on the home front today. It sounds like a good idea to sidestep confrontation, but there is a price to pay for keeping silent. You may feel as if you're walking through an emotional minefield now, but being truthful is still your best option. Set your fears aside; no one needs to get hurt if you are considerate of other people's boundaries. Expressing your feelings is the first step toward clearing the air. Listen to the response you receive with an open mind and a receptive heart.

Everything seems to be moving at a faster pace today, but you would rather block out the world so you can recharge your batteries. Unfortunately, checking out from your responsibilities isn't as simple as you wish. Even if you manage to escape, it probably won't last for long. Don't fight against the inevitable. Cooperating with others relieves the pressure and sets a good example for everyone to follow.

You want to be as practical as possible today while fulfilling your obligations. Even just taking a bit of time to focus on your finances can give you a tangible sense of accomplishment now. But don't be afraid to reevaluate your personal values and integrate them into your life. Thankfully, establishing fiscal goals doesn't mean you need to have all the answers today. Just aim yourself in the right direction; there's more time to get there than you think.

You are feeling frisky now that the evocative Moon is deep in the passionate waters of your sign. You are craving a variety of desires and attractions, but may not know what to do with all your feelings. Remember to control your actions before you find yourself in over your head. Anything that gets your energy flowing will help you manage your emotions today. You are capable of doing an amazing amount of good with your intensity if you channel your energy into a productive outlet.

You are riding a surge of previously suppressed energy today, like a surfer on a building wave. You thrive on the excitement and the current adrenaline rush makes you feel fully alive. Just don't get so distracted that you lose touch with your unexpressed feelings. You may have a sweet opportunity to connect with someone on a deeper lever now, but you have to be willing to take a different kind of risk. Instead of avoiding the discomfort of vulnerability, discuss your desires with a confidant you can trust.

You may choose to kick back today and contemplate your current position in life. Naturally, there is always something else to do and more goals to accomplish, but just spending time with friends or family brings you great joy today. However, beneath your apparent happiness you might be struggling with a more serious issue which you aren't ready to share. Don't judge yourself too harshly if you decide to relax while you can. The existential questions of life will still be waiting when you return to them later on.

Your unique perspective inspires you to be hopeful, no matter how bleak the global economic or political landscapes are now. Even if it seems like the rest of the world has gone mad, you don't have to accept defeat in your personal world. Be relentless in your pursuit of a more meaningful life for you and those you love. Your optimism and persistence enable you to rise above the chaos and do the right thing for everyone involved. Your talent for seeing the glass as half-full motivates others to do the same.

There's an underlying tension creating a struggle between who you want to be and what others expect from you. There may not be an easy resolution to this emotional dilemma today, but you still might believe that things will work out if you just hang on for a while longer. However, this wait-and-see approach is a dangerous strategy because you can talk yourself out of initiating the necessary action that could bring you closer to happiness. Your life will change for the better once you start acting like you're the master of your own destiny.

You might feel invincible today, but in reality you are as human as ever. Your ruling planet Mars is happily working on your behalf now, but your enterprising spirit could make you sloppy. Be sure to have all your ducks in order and don't skip over any details, even if you're certain that you can succeed without them. An innovative strategy and solid preparation add the winning touch to your game.

Once you make up your mind to do something, your legendary determination works in your favor. Others may rush ahead in their excitement, but you are patiently building a foundation that's capable of sustaining your growth. However, you might be tempted to leap ahead today in a burst of adrenaline. Curbing your enthusiasm is challenging now, but everything will fall into place if you channel your passion in the right direction.

You are in your astrological element with three planets currently orbiting in airy Libra. People admire your skills and want to be in your company because engaging the world on multiple levels enables you to appear like a magician. However, your charm and cleverness can also get in your way of being truly authentic. Make the extra effort to deepen existing connections now, instead of just running off to create new ones. Taking a romance to the next level might seem scary at first, but could be well worth the risk.

Expressing your emotions isn't as easy as it sounds today. Fortunately, messenger Mercury sets up camp in your 5th House of Play, infusing your words with childlike creativity. However, staying aware of your emotions is tricky business since you naturally prefer to hide them. Try a different tactic by wearing your heart on your sleeve and see what happens. Others will appreciate your ability to remain present in conversations while being vulnerable at the same time.

Your mind is running on high-octane fuel today, but it's easy to underestimate the time it takes to persuade others to join your cause. The Moon squares boisterous Jupiter in dramatic Leo, propelling you to push harder if someone resists your movement. Nevertheless, it's wise to observe when the mood shifts later this evening and ease off the accelerator at the right time. A slow and steady approach might actually help you to reach your goal even faster than you expect.

Pushing to the front of the line often feels awkward for virtuous Virgos, making it difficult to get your best ideas heard by the right audience. However, your path is wide open today, even if you don't want to take the most direct route. Just remember that you could go too far delivering your message without even realizing how intently people are listening. Follow your agenda and save the improvisation for another day.

You tend to play well with others on most days and today is no exception. In fact, you might even give up some of your personal power as you run around making everyone else happy. Ironically, the best thing you can do now is simply respect your friends by listening and accepting them for who they are. Don't waste energy trying to create a false sense of harmony. Set a positive example by applying your passion toward your own goals, instead.

Although your stamina is strong enough to deliver on your promises and your heart is in the right place, you must be careful how you use your power now. You are receiving inspiration from unseen dimensions yet your friends could be overwhelmed by your intensity. For the best results, don't back down from your position, but play it just a little bit cooler today than you actually feel. Some things are better left unexpressed; a mysterious smile says everything others need to know.

Your dream to escape to an exotic locale are tugging on your heartstrings today. Or, perhaps you have an opportunity to start an ambitious project while fiery Mars is offering you the extra assistance you need. But don't try to set off alone. You will find that interacting with others is a source of great inspiration now. Ultimately, sharing your current experiences turns an exciting idea into a magical journey.

Your need to advance professionally is irrepressible as you make one final attempt to put your ambitions into words without stirring up any trouble. However, talkative Mercury's last stand in your 10th House of Status prompts you to say too much as you seek validation from others. Instead of cleaning up after the fact, keep your words to a minimum today. No matter what anyone else says, actions speak louder than words.

An inspirational person enters your life today, presenting you with an intriguing opportunity. You could be so eager for something new to happen that you start dreaming about all the possibilities without considering the practicalities involved. Be patient and try not to prematurely jump to any extreme conclusions. Although your conversation might not catalyze an immediate change, it could lead to something else that's ultimately a positive move.

An overly exuberant family member or roommate might be a nagging source of trouble today. Surrounding yourself with positive people is nearly always a good idea, but someone's optimism may be covering up a more complicated issue now. Nevertheless, gently asking questions could start a meaningful dialogue that evolves into a deeper discussion. Rely on your innate compassion to guide you as you step into unknown emotional territory.

It seems as if your motives are under scrutiny today as someone questions your authenticity. Don't waste energy defending your intentions; just be as honest as possible and then move on. Remember, your unresolved emotions could interfere with your happiness if you do not address them as soon as they arise. The resistance will quickly dissipate and you can push past any residual awkwardness with your usual confident charm.

It's in your nature to approach life from a down-to-earth perspective, but the drama of relationship issues can require a significant amount of your time now. Even if you try to set responsible priorities in your life, you probably won't be able to avoid sensitive home and family issues today. Say what's on your mind and don't worry too much if communication seems strained at first. Others may not appreciate you starting the conversation, but clearing the air is ultimately the best for everyone involved.

People might give you a hard time today if you try to avoid the consequences of your words. Your key planet Mercury inspires you to be brutally honest now that it's swimming through Scorpio's tumultuous waters. Although you're tempted to put everything on the table, the whole truth may be too much for others to handle if you tell it all at once. The best way to ensure that you won't have to take back what you said is to stop and think before you speak.

If you find yourself squaring off with someone today, rest assured that the argument won't likely last long. Your feelings are triggering unpleasant memories, which makes the current situation feel larger than life. Thankfully, it probably won't morph into something more problematic. However, you need to acknowledge that the emotions of others have just as much validity as yours. Finding common ground starts with establishing mutual respect.

You are eager to shine your light with unrestrained enthusiasm today, but you may be required to focus your attention on something that seems trivial to you. However, don't worry about what you must do now, for the sooner you take care of old business, the quicker you can return to your own agenda. There will be no allowance for sloppy work, so take your time and do it right. Not only will you please others with your penchant for perfection, but you might secretly please yourself in the process.

You might not communicate everything that needs to be said now that messenger Mercury is in Scorpio's secretive domain. In fact, you may be so concerned about making someone uncomfortable that you choose to withhold your feelings. However, you're currently not the best judge of other people's reactions because you're hypersensitive to every emotional nuance. Thankfully, your words wield more power if you wait until the right time and place to talk.

An old pattern might be back on your plate as you experience the pressure of Saturn's limiting aspect to the radiant Sun. Your feelings of inadequacy are revealed, where they can magically transform into more healthy expressions. Even if you are hitting a financial wall today, remember that you could gain a lot of perspective from this cosmic challenge. Pushing past your own resistance to change is your key to success.

Tensions arise from the raw power of your feelings. It's imperative to find a confidant who believes in your talent while the relentless Scorpio Moon motivates you to develop your plans even further. Postpone big decisions until after Luna slips into your 2nd House of Self-Esteem later in the day. Although others can help you clarify your strategy, ultimately your conscience is your best guide.

You Archers tend to be known as the fun-loving ones of the group, but you're feeling out of sorts today. You are more serious than playful now as you reassess your dreams and reevaluate your place in the world. Even if you disappoint someone else with your uncharacteristic somber attitude, your honest vulnerability can pave the way to stronger relationships in the long run. You will discover who your real friends are when you are not the life of the party.

A few days of monthly emotional housekeeping may be enough to keep you on track. It's time to prune stuck negative feelings from your overgrown garden. You are being asked to cut back several aspects of your life and if you do it voluntarily, the energy will flow much easier. Remember that eliminating unhealthy patterns now creates more room for the flowers to grow in their place later on.

You are standing on the edge of a precipice now, yet must hold your ground for the time being. You may have significant facts you want to share, but you can't tell anyone the whole story yet. If you reveal your plan prematurely, others will realize that you haven't done all your homework. Your current assumption might be missing a crucial piece of information and you must be patient until you have figured out the entire puzzle. Keep looking, you're closer to the solution than you think.

No matter which direction you Fish are swimming now, the current seems to be going the other way. Oddly enough, it feels like everyone is working against your best intentions. Whatever you do, step around the urge to sink into playing the role of a victim. You really don't have time or energy to waste on unproductive behavior. Your world is about to change and you need to be at your best to take advantage of it.

You might not be very flexible today, even if you understand that being receptive to the ideas of others could teach you as much as following your own brilliant thoughts. Although your positive approach to life helps you shake off the stress, you know there's a big shift in the works now, making it nearly impossible to discern what's coming next. Nevertheless, don't be afraid to share what's in your heart, even if you scare yourself. Stick to the truth and your fears will fade sooner than you expect.

You may be at a rather significant crossroads now, yet you still want to believe that you can keep things going just as they are. The fact is that something needs to change and you're not sure who to trust with your dilemma. But even if you are ready to make your dreams come true, your emotions could become too volatile to contain today. Forget about trying to manage your feelings; embrace the unknown instead of resisting the inevitable. Life is more fun when you're open to the element of surprise.

Although you are eager to change the dynamics between you and others today, it's challenging to regain normalcy once the energy begins to shift. There could be a lot at stake in a relationship now, but don't try to force your will on anyone else. The more you attempt to control the outcome, the more distant you grow from your goals. Express your passions and remain open to the many possibilities ahead.

Your heart is fully engaged, making it tough to set limits when sharing your feelings now. Complications may arise from your insistent attention to the big picture, even as you keep getting dragged back into the details. Maintaining a positive attitude is challenging today if loose ends start to unravel. Do the best you can to work with the uncertainty for a little while longer. Taking your journey one step at a time is the safest route to your destination.

It's nearly impossible to let go of your unexpressed feelings that still linger beneath the surface. Although you think everything is settled, a personal drama arises. Just when you are ready to move on, a reminder dredges up a wave of powerful emotions. Don't waste energy on fighting against the prevailing currents; instead navigate with your heart to work with the natural tides and not against them. Channel your intensity into your creativity and see what happens.

Your changing moods swing like a pendulum now, prompting you to go from focusing on the tiniest details of the day and then ponder universal concepts. Unfortunately, either extreme leads you into tricky territory as you step beyond your usual pragmatic approach. Thankfully, you can learn something of value as you move back and forth between practice and theory. Exercising your flexibility allows you to get the best of both worlds.

You may as well be in the middle of a noisy crowd today as there's probably little you can do to create the relaxing atmosphere you prefer. But it's not that you are having a rough time; it's just that everything seems overly intense these days. Give yourself permission to roll with your emotions, even if you aren't as easygoing as others expect. You don't always have to be the one who makes everything all right. Oddly enough, expressing your true feelings isn't nearly as risky as you think.

Your feelings are pulled in two directions today as you struggle with accepting the status quo. Even if you're dissatisfied with all the details of your daily routine, you can still see the positive aspects of the bigger picture. Nevertheless, there are some elements of your life that you cannot easily change. Your current happiness depends upon your willingness to acknowledge what is beyond your control. There's no point in chasing distant rainbows now; instead, concentrate on the joy within reach.

It may feel like your heart is being bounced around by random circumstances today. You truly love the idea of adventure, yet you also long for peace and quiet so you can bask in the beauty of your journey. Unfortunately, you don't have the luxury of wasting time on rosy nostalgia or restless fantasies. There's too much happening now that needs your immediate attention. Keep breathing; calmer weather is on the way.

Your stress might not be very apparent today, but that certainly doesn't mean it's nonexistent. You may believe that you're heading directly for unknown territory because you can't figure out what others are feeling. Unfortunately, the more you attempt to fill in the missing pieces of the puzzle, the more anxious you become now. Let go of your need to solve everything in one day and, surprisingly, you will suddenly have enough time to pursue what really matters.

You need to be accepted by those in your community, but you might think that they don't even know the real you. Acknowledging your role in this situation is crucial, because you may be hesitant to share your feelings if you worry too much about gaining approval from others. However, your fear of rejection could be more problematic now than what you won't disclose. Taking a risk by showing your vulnerability isn't an easy path, but it's a great start toward long-term emotional fulfillment.

You want to be appreciated and admired at work, but you may not be inclined to go the extra mile necessary to be outstanding. You're torn between your inner and outer worlds today. Pleasing others sounds so easy at first, but it grows more complicated once you actually begin the work. Don't make any commitments that you can't fulfill today.

Your influence on others isn't limited only to what they can see. Placing extra emphasis on your performance may have you looking the part but won't necessarily convey the real substance of what you have to offer. Be smart and save your act for another day. For now, proactively work with the major changes that are unfolding around you. The future will be here before you know it.

Declaring your feelings out loud sounds like an easy thing to do today, even if this isn't your normal style. However, think twice before saying anything that could upset the delicate balance between you and others. Your life is already more complicated than you prefer, so don't add another layer of drama on top of everything else. For simplicity's sake, keep your desires under wraps until the time is right.

You might feel as if you recently navigated your way successfully through a tricky situation. Now that you have demonstrated your skills as a negotiator by convincing someone to avoid direct confrontation, it's your turn to take a stand for one of your beliefs. Although this may require a serious commitment on your part, you could be pleasantly surprised with the outcome if you're willing to put your integrity ahead of convenience.

You wish you could move past recently hurt feelings, but it's not easy to forget them if someone is being inconsiderate today. Still, it's crucial to realize that you can't make people react to you in a specific way, even if you're tempted to manipulate their emotions. Instead of trying to change anyone else, find a place of acceptance within yourself that can transform your fears into a positive expression of love.

You are all set to put your best foot forward since you long to be noticed by those you love. Luckily, your charm cuts through most stressful situations now that the Moon is visiting your 5th House of Self-Expression, inspiring others to admire your performance. However, sometimes you can try too hard to make a positive impression. Once you have enjoyed your moment in the sun today, be gracious and give someone else a chance to shine for a while. Knowing when to step away from the spotlight is just as important as entertaining the crowd.

Your desire for adventure conflicts with your need for perfection today. You're intrigued by the idea of sacrificing quality in order to squeeze more into your day. However, you may regret this kind of foolish behavior later on. Your friends and family might not even be aware of your current struggle unless you choose to make your feelings public. Keep in mind that your experience doesn't depend on anyone else knowing about it. Ultimately, this is your personal journey and the solution must come from within.

You could grow worried about an uncomfortable situation with a friend, but it's hard to tell if it's real or if you're just making it all up. Either way, the results will likely work out in your favor since the Sun aspects auspicious Jupiter in your 11th House of Social Networking. While it's true that someone might try to undermine your position today, you are wise to avoid the drama at all costs. Focusing on the positive possibilities ensures the best possible outcome.

It feels like all the pressure is landing squarely on your shoulders now, but fortunately you know that your efforts are appreciated by those who matter the most. The uplifting Sagittarius Moon brightens your 2nd House of Self-Esteem and boosts your confidence, reminding you to look on the sunny side of things. But don't waste energy pretending that you are okay with life as it is if you're not. Being authentic counts more than anything else.

Unfortunately, your overconfidence can carry you away today, making you appear a bit reckless. However, the Moon's monthly visit to cavalier Sagittarius lifts your spirits and encourages you to share your optimistic outlook with those around you anyhow. It's great to have such a positive influence on others, but you could lose support from your closest friends unless you are also willing to acknowledge the more difficult aspects of life, too. Being sensitive to the full spectrum of experience opens the door to stronger relationships.

You are motivated by your desire to reach the top of the mountain, but this ambitious goal can be nearly impossible because the ground is shifting beneath your feet now. You can see many exciting possibilities on the horizon, but are also fearful that you could lose your sense of direction if you allow yourself to be distracted by pleasure. Thankfully, you have enough discipline to stay on track today as long as you remain true to yourself.

Although others are likely to share their feelings with you today, there's a good chance that you could misinterpret what they say. Relationships are complicated by unexpressed emotions now, especially if people think that you won't approve of their desires. Create safe space by demonstrating your willingness to be open-minded and non-judgmental if you want those you love to share their secrets with you. A good friend knows when to stop talking and when to start listening.

You can still make it look like you're having fun even if you don't feel like doing your chores or fulfilling your duties today. Your cleverness can turn your tedious routine into a game, alleviating boredom and adding more pleasure to your life. However, caution is advised because there is a price to pay for keeping your real feelings to yourself. It's wiser to be honest from the start if you want to break out of your rut.

You might land in a heap of trouble today if you think you should have power without first earning it. You could inadvertently set the wheels in motion on an idea that's fueled by passion rather than logic. Back up your decisions with solid facts and not your feelings if you want to reach your destination on time.

It's much easier to see the impact of the choices you make now because you aren't encumbered by other people's expectations. Your coworkers may have their own agendas, but their plans are invisible to you today because you're focused on your own goals. Nevertheless, going over your plans with someone you trust could be your wisest move at the moment. It never hurts to get a second opinion.

Today you have the ability to override your tendency to become bored and restless when the topic isn't interesting to you. The truth is you can't always have the lighthearted version of reality; sometimes you must sink beneath surface appearances to reach what's truly important. You never know what treasure you might find unless you're willing to look for it.

You might find that someone you truly respect won't take the time to listen to what you have to say today. Although you're not looking for anyone to fix anything, you don't like to be cut off while you're expressing your emotions. You need your feelings to be fully acknowledged so you can rest assured that your intentions are understood. If you wait until you have a receptive audience before sharing what's on your mind, you will have a better chance of receiving what you desire.

You have a specific list of tasks to finish today and you don't want anyone to distract you from your current agenda. You're highly resistant to changing your schedule just because someone else wants you to follow their lead. However, make sure that you aren't being so stubborn that you miss out on an exciting opportunity. Keeping an open mind at all times gives you the flexibility to live life to the fullest.

You know exactly what you want today and might try to involve others in ways that will be advantageous to your cause. You're quite serious about your feelings today, possibly prompting others to withdraw because they don't particularly want to be swallowed up by your intensity now. However, even if you have non-negotiable items on your agenda, kindness is always the best policy.

Your intentions might not be very transparent to others today but ironically, this uncertainty could actually work in your favor. Of course, you can always rationalize your actions to others. Once you make your position known today, be willing to let go of it for the common good. Compromise is the key to your success.

Involving others in your process is a smart idea today, even if they aren't fully supportive of your plan. However, there's no reason to express every idea you have out loud. It's more effective to live in the present than to dwell on the past.

It's not easy for anyone to change your mind once you've chosen your path. Unfortunately, the most logical appeal won't work any better than an emotional one today. You may be absolutely certain that you need to strike out on your own today, but it won't hurt to try to meet other people's expectations, anyhow. Taking other people's needs into consideration is critical today even if their feelings make you uncomfortable. You know what you need to do at work today, although it might seem overwhelming at first. It's a surprise when you realize that your initial plans may be different from what's actually needed. Surprisingly, you're not worried about how efficient your methods are at work today. Instead, you are preoccupied with whatever makes you happy. Domestic responsibilities could be very demanding today, especially if someone's expectations are different from what you're willing to do. You're likely to be drawn into an intense emotional drama, even if you wish that you could have more unstructured time for spiritual pursuits. You might become so obsessive about accomplishing your objectives today that you could lose track of your legendary pragmatism. Your daydreams may seem as if they came right out of a science fiction movie today and appear to have no basis in reality. You could be feeling so confident today that you staunchly defend your plans. You may believe you have to harden your position if other people are aggressive in their criticism. It may seem as if you're at a fork in the road, but a mental fog is making it nearly impossible to see the obstacles ahead. Your imagination is running on overdrive today as you head into unfamiliar territory. Your daydreams are alluring, but your fear of being irrational prevents you from acting impulsively. You may set your sights on indulging your senses, but exercising a bit of self-restraint goes a long way today to keep you out of mischief. Deepening the emotional bond with someone you love sounds like a wonderful idea, but romance may be overly complicated today. Placing too much trust in a friend or partner could land you in big trouble today. Focusing on your chores may be nearly impossible today as enticing opportunities unexpectedly drop into your life. You could be viewing the future through rose-colored glasses today, prompting you to miss a crucial piece of information. Your inability to complete all your chores and tasks today is not your primary problem. The real dilemma arises from your assumption that you can do anything you imagine now. Aspiring to lofty ambitions is admirable if it motivates you to push harder, but you may have unreasonable ideas about what you can finish today. You could be overly optimistic about your ability to make everything come up roses today. Your bold confidence might lead to premature exhaustion, especially if you can't deliver on your promises. You're eager to add a bit of spice into your daily routine, yet you don't want to stir up too much trouble. The awkward tension between you and others continues to grow over the next several days. However, you still hope to establish an emotional connection with someone special if given the chance. You wake up so excited today that you want to jump right out of your skin. Although calming your nerves is tricky business now, you can successfully channel your energy into your work. You know exactly how strong you want to appear to others today, but it may be tough to carry out your plan if your feelings get in the way. If your enthusiastic behavior triggers an extreme reaction today, you might need to make an apology, pull back on the reins and reconsider your next move before you make matters worse. Don't ignore your family responsibilities now because your true security depends on building a strong foundation. Your mind is taking you on a wonderful adventure today as the enterprising Aries Full Moon Eclipse fires up your 9th House of Faraway Places. Although you prefer to have everything pinned down in advance, you're better off keeping your options open today. Setting aside your personal agenda and joining forces with someone else today isn't as simple as it seems. A sudden breakthrough in your daily routine can lead you to doing your work more effectively than ever before. It's so easy to fall in love now that the ardent Aries Full Moon Eclipse is casting shadows in your 5th House of Romance. You're anticipating an energetic blast of something new on the home front, but you may not have the patience now to turn your plans into reality. Don't be distracted by a false sense of urgency; you're not the only one with changing needs. You might be inclined to suddenly shake up your schedule as the unstoppable Aries Full Moon Eclipse rattles your 3rd House of Immediate Environment. You are brainstorming original ways to make money today as the enterprising Aries Full Moon Eclipse zaps your 2nd House of Income. Scheduling time to recharge your emotional batteries is a good idea today, especially if your work duties are overwhelming. Instead, remain calm, cool and collected now; finding pleasure in the little things rejuvenates your soul.

Clever communication comes naturally to you, but something seems quite different now. Although you maintain a certain point of view, you aren't inspired to say much about it. You are inclined to draw a line in the sand today. You might think that you could lose your chance to do something very exciting if you don't initiate action immediately. You may not be very inspired today; in fact, you might feel downright lazy. An unresolved emotional issue may stubbornly work its way to the surface today while the Moon is traveling through your 8th House of Deep Sharing. Your closest friends mean more to you than ever, but the obstinate Taurus Moon's presence in your 7th House of Relationships makes it tough to accept the advice from someone who is trying to help. Oddly enough, once you acknowledge your own paradox, the external ones become much more manageable. Be grateful that you have people in your life who truly care about your happiness.

Letting go of the details is tough today, even though this approach isn't normally a problem for you. There's no reason to be too hard on yourself. You may believe that your closest friend or partner isn't giving you the support you need now, but you're cautiously optimistic about reaching your long-term goals, anyhow. The cosmic energies are rumbling quietly today, yet you know that there are more changes on the horizon. Your comfort level might be surprisingly high today, even if stress fades in and out all day. Creating your own sacred space helps you balance your worldly obligations with your spiritual needs.

It's time to take a project you already started and give it a lasting structure. However, if you can't add stability to your previous venture, it might quickly fade into the past. You might feel as if crucial information has been kept from you, but now something that was previously hidden may find its way to the surface. Although you assume your motives are completely transparent, others might have no idea what you are up to now. However, their lack of clarity may have very little to do with your behavior. Your friends are your source of stability today. However, there is still a bit of fog between you and reality, challenging you to watch your step so you stay on track. Eliminating unnecessary distractions enables you to smoothly sail along to your destination.

Previous attempts to learn something new may have led to  frustration. Now it's time to give it another shot, whether your education is experiential or academic. Integrate your desires with a dash of practicality and you can't go wrong.

Putting your feet solidly back on solid ground today is the first step to reestablishing stability. However, the recent intensity of your emotions lingers for a while longer, but now your confidence returns and you know exactly what to do. Don't take your eyes off the goal; you can be successful at your endeavors as long as you keep your optimism alive.

Something in the air has changed and you are suddenly ready to dig into an issue that you might have been avoiding until now. Your chances for success are high if you focus on working for the betterment of everyone involved. Setting a worthy example inspires others to jump in and do their part.

You have grown weary of the daily grind and now seek the simplicity of retreat. Fun and games are knocking at your door but you can't decide whether or not to let them in. There is a low-level angst building internally, reminding you that you have unfinished work to do today. Once your conscience is clear, you can live more joyfully in the moment.

The weight on your shoulders is lighter today because of the progress you are making on more enjoyable aspects of your life. You might try to ignore issues on the home front, but the sooner you face your feelings, the better it will be for everyone involved. The light of awareness shines with great clarity on relationship matters today, empowering you to make sound choices. You are insistent to win the approval of others today by wearing them down with your charming and innovative style. It's as if you are swimming against a great tide and it's nearly impossible to think logically today when your key planet Venus opposes rebellious Uranus. You are waging an inner war between two extremes today. You long for more action, yet may already have so much going on that your excitement can turn to a palpable anxiety. You wish you could distance yourself from your intense feelings today. You may have unrealistic visions about your future yet still believe you can manifest them through sheer willpower. A friend or associate might turn your day inside out when he or she behaves in an erratic manner. But you may react too quickly and judge someone before you even stop and think about it. You might find yourself dreaming today about the greener grass on the other side of the hill even if you're in a mutually satisfying relationship. You may have complicated issues at home to handle that end up getting in the way of more ambitious plans. You can be quite cavalier in your thinking now that cerebral Mercury is backpedaling in your 9th House of Adventure. You might make a significant conceptual breakthrough today that turns your life around and inspires you to come up with a whole new strategy for your future. Everyone else seems to have answers for your questions today, but you aren't convinced that any of them make sense. Instead of seeking more choices, just pick the most practical one available and don't look back.

Adopting a simplistic approach goes a long way toward raising your spirits today, especially if you feel overwhelmed by the recent pressures of everyday life. You are inspired to swing into action as the Moon's visit to your restless sign lights a fire under you. But running into a small obstacle could be enough to quickly change your mind. Bringing your focus back to your original point of view enables your creativity to come to the rescue and save the day.

Your dreams overflow into daylight hours, making it difficult to separate facts from fantasy. You can't help but feel enthusiastic about your future as the Moon shines in your 11th House of Goals; unfortunately, it's impossible to tell if your optimism is warranted. You might be so enamored with what you're learning today that you continue to collect all the relevant details that you can find. It's helpful to keep your hopes in check today so you don't set yourself up for disappointment. You may be rather uncertain about your career objectives now that messenger Mercury has stepped backed into your 12th House of Invisibility. You want to be completely objective when considering your alternatives today. You might be feeling a bit disoriented today, challenging you to find your balance. Although the circumstances of the day might not unfold according to your plan, there's no point in obsessing on getting things back on track. Your current career goals may be overwhelmed by your growing desire to stretch beyond your old limits. You might be overly impressed by your own quick wit today, but others may not be so amused with your sharp tongue. Although you long for the comfort of spending time with your friends, you might not let them into your heart today. It's nearly impossible to keep your feelings in check today as you try to catch up to the changes all around you. Your perfect fantasy might be about withdrawing from the outer world since the Moon is still hiding out in your 12th House of Privacy. If you feel slighted by someone's inconsiderate actions today, you might choose to sulk about it rather than getting it off your chest. You could receive opportune assistance at work today, but you must remain open to expanding your horizons. Help arrives in a most unusual manner and might catch you slightly off guard. You are in a rather optimistic frame of mind today as you try to see the spiritual side of every new idea that rises into your awareness. You might spend much of the day lost in your fantasies, conjuring up a perfect vacation retreat. However, if you allow yourself the luxury of daydreaming, there are no limits to the power of your imagination now. Whatever you envision can manifest if you remember to live up to your responsibilities in the real world, too.

You could become uncomfortable today if your feelings are drawn into a deep and magical place. Don't resist taking a contemplative path for a while; this spiritual journey can enrich your life if you just let go and see where it takes you. Your mind is running a mile a minute today, making it tough to focus on one specific task. However, you could fall into the trap of believing feelings are obstacles that prevent you from completing whatever work needs to be done. Although you might have to start the day by tending to unfinished chores, you don't need to feel restrained by your responsibilities. Your weirdest thoughts and desires have the potential of becoming fuel for your creative process if you get out of the way of your imagination.

Relying on your instincts can increase the stability in your life while simultaneously deepening your connection with the future. Intuitively feel  your way down the road, without being concerned with too many facts and figures. Even if you choose to keep your inspirational visions to yourself today, at least make sure to record them for future reference. As William Blake wrote, "What is now proved was once only imagined."

Anything that can go right for you today, will. But you still may have some resistance on your part, for you believe that you shouldn't receive the goodies without putting in the effort. Although you could be coasting and soaking up the recognition, you might feel the need to work like a busy bee now anyway. There's no harm in being ambitious as long as you remember to step back and enjoy the fruits of your labor when you get the chance.

Your desires are irrepressible today and it seems that fulfillment is within easy reach. Common sense is likely playing second fiddle to pleasure now, setting the tone for your current activities. You're like a lucky leprechaun with a charmed day on your hands -- and you don't even need to wave your magic wand to find your pot of gold. Wonderful things might just come your way now without much effort on your part. Postpone non-essential chores until tomorrow so you can make the most of the positive cosmic energy today. Thankfully, others might not even notice your absence, allowing you to get away with your little escape to the end of the rainbow.

Emotional extravagance isn't normally your style, but you might just find yourself stepping beyond your limits today. Your need for adventure is reaching new heights and your confidence soars even if you secretly think you should be more careful. But your current behavior is not solely under the influence of logic. Taking a risk now is an intelligent plan if you simply follow your heart.

It may be an exercise in futility for people to try to contain your energy today, and you're certainly not going to restrain yourself. Your adrenaline is pumping, your heart is racing and you're not going to stop until you get what you want. You can express your current feelings without any inhibition today. This kind of emotional expression doesn't come naturally to you, but you just may feel safe enough now in these protected emotional waters. It doesn't matter how crazy your life is these days; somehow you still can make the sweetest lemon meringue pie out of the sourest lemons around. You are capable of manifesting the beautiful visions in your dreams if you are handed the right ingredients. And, thankfully, your current creation will likely be lauded by your peers. Don't be distracted by the vagaries of the moment; keep your eyes on the prize for the best results.

Your current job situation may come with complications of its own, but your long-term career opportunities look promising anyhow. You should end up on top as long as you do whatever makes your heart happy. If you pursue your dreams, your self-esteem blossoms and the money will follow. Although there are still some hard things to be said, you have more time to say them than you think. Instead of stirring up unnecessary drama today, practice random acts of kindness wherever you go.

You see lucrative opportunities everywhere you look today. You feel loved and lucky now that Venus, the planet of beauty, is harmonizing with benevolent Jupiter, bestowing a cheerful glow onto nearly everything in your life. This is a fantastic planetary combination as long as you don't let the moment pass you by without taking decisive action. Pursuing your highest potential leads you on a journey to success.

You have a wonderful chance to heal a relationship today, but you must proceed gently if you want to make real progress. You may be feeling more optimistic these days -- and although your positive vibes bode well for your future, you can easily overextend your energy. Although your life appears to be on the upswing, things might not be quite as awesome as they seem. If your emotions begin to run away with your logic, trust your common sense to keep you on solid ground.

Friends or coworkers may arrive at your doorstep with an irresistible plan for fun. You immediately know you want in without giving it much thought. It may be too easy to say yes today, even if you need to honor your previous commitments first. Thankfully, you can have your cake and eat it too, if you schedule your time wisely.

Nearly everything has a tendency to smooth itself out today without you having to step in and take over. Even potential conflicts with others that appeared to be heading toward a showdown seem to fade away now. Visualizing the best possible scenario lays the groundwork to your success. Color in all the details to inspire the manifestation of your dreams.

Your behavior is confusing to your coworkers because you act like you know the score, but there is more going on here than meets the eye. You believe you are working with tangible facts, but reality is a bit of a slippery slope now. Someone who is allegedly your friend may be inscrutable now, making it hard to tell who is really on your side.
