You may become so lost that you can't figure out how to return to reality. Take your time and get your bearings before traveling too far from home. It's easier to reach your destination once you know where you are.

You may feel truly inspired today, even if people think you are a bit loony. Your senses are so acutely tuned now that you might hear mermaids singing sea chants in some unknown ancient language. And, the weird thing is that their songs make perfect sense to your ears. The waters of your subconscious are rising like a flood tide. Don't bother foolishly trying to hold back the flow. It doesn't matter what others think; you can swim with the best of them.

A trusted friend may throw you a curve ball today and you won't see it coming unless you are ready. So, keep your defenses on high alert all day as it's too easy to get broadsided by the unexpected. This surprise might seem like a pleasant experience at first, encouraging you to let down your guard. Don't. Staying on your toes empowers you to react swiftly and turn a difficult situation in your favor.

You are being lured out of your comfort zone, beyond the safety that is created by your analytical mind. The practical answers that you usually have at your fingertips are just out of reach today. This lack of clarity is so unlike you that it can cause you to lose your rhythm as you go about the business of your day. However, this intellectual fuzziness does have a purpose. The fact is it's time to set aside your logical mode and rely more on your intuition. Drop the details and let the Force be with you.

Most days you know what you like and you can apply your common sense towards getting it. But today your pragmatism has left the building and you are on your own. All you have to work with now is your next whim or fantasy. Let the powerful creations of your imagination roam freely. However, don't make them bigger than they are by foolishly acting on whatever your dream up. Keeping things in a healthy perspective enables you to avoid unnecessary trouble.

You can scale the depths of your own imagination or be fascinated with someone else's, but in either case you're embarking on a confusing ride today. You're entering your own version of the Twilight Zone where it is impossible to know what is real. You're likely to leave the mundane world behind as you grow quite enamored with the fantasy realm. There is no reason to worry as you'll land back on earth soon enough, forever altered by your memory of something special.

Once you Centaurs decide what you want, it's not easy for anyone else to change your mind. Nevertheless, you can still talk yourself into liking nearly anything today. You are being pulled along by a tide that is greater than you. You may find yourself spellbound by something or someone only to realize within a few days that you were captivated by a figment of your own imagination. Seeing the trap in advance might be all you need to avoid getting hooked.

You could find a voice that you didn't even know you had if you're willing to draw from your own experiences today. You might think you are speaking with clarity of vision and strength of purpose. But even if others believe that you are a force to be reckoned with, you need to exercise caution now. Don't try to mislead anyone; you will gain strong allies if they respect the integrity that you bring to the situation. Maintain your authenticity at all costs.

You are riding a high-frequency buzz now, adding a layer of complexity to an already cosmically confusing day. Your feelings seem like they are bent out of shape and you don't quite know how to manage them. No matter what, don't hold everything inside today or you could explode like a volcano letting off steam. Muster up some old-fashioned charm, soften your hard edges and you'll pass the test without incident.

If there was ever a perfect day for a quick get-away, this might be it. There are countless ways to escape and over the next few days you could discover a few of them. If you don't take time to do something totally eccentric or wildly creative now, you may end up facing more serious consequences while looking for emergency exits later. Swim upstream, Fish, or float away in the tide. It's your choice and only you can make it.

Hiding your feelings is not an option today, even if you think what you share could make someone rather uncomfortable. You're not interested in stirring up any conflict now, yet you probably won't let the possibility of discord get in your way. Say what you must, but remember to think twice before you just blurt out something that you wish you had kept to yourself. Waiting for the right moment is worth the extra effort.

You are impatient with smooth-talkers who don't follow through on what they say. You prefer to demonstrate your feelings rather than just sitting around talking about them. But your actions might be misinterpreted unless you also let others know your thoughts. Thankfully, it doesn't take much effort to avert an unnecessary conflict by explaining your motives first. Backing up your behavior with the right message is an unbeatable combination.

You are swept up in an emotional flow that weaves together separate threads of your life today. Fortunately, you don't have to prepare since the integration should come rather naturally now. Nevertheless, you can still facilitate positive change by bringing your awareness back to the present moment. Pay more attention to your inner process than to what others might think of your actions. You may be happily surprised with the results if you simply speak from your heart.

You have a lot more going on in your emotional world than you care to admit today, even if you give off the impression of being transparent. However, you can't blame anyone else if you don't get what you want unless you let others know what you need. You can choose to increase your dissatisfaction now by keeping your feelings to yourself or you can use the outgoing Leo Moon as a catalyst to share your desires with someone you love.

A hectic day awaits you, yet you're ready to pack as much as you can into your busy schedule. Although you may be pulled one way and then another, it's best to handle each situation as it occurs rather than letting unresolved issues accumulate. You might be tempted to tell everyone how you feel while the evocative Moon is spotlighting your 1st House of Personality, but it's smarter now to say less and let your actions speak for you instead.

If you are looking for the best time to say what's on your mind today, weigh the alternatives and then carefully speak your piece. Although tooting your own horn isn't necessarily your style, reminding people of your accomplishments might be a strategically advantageous thing to do now. Keep in mind that others won't think any less of you if you just stand up and accept the recognition you deserve. In fact, your status may continue to grow as you rise to the occasion.

You might not be clear about where you are going today, but you're still eagerly anticipating what's next. Mental Mercury lines up with the Sun in your artistic sign, shifting you out of your comfort zone as you discover ways to colorfully express your creativity. Give yourself permission to talk about what you want to do without being shy or holding back. You don't need to have all the answers; all that's required now is a clever inspiration and a can-do attitude.

You're wearing your heart on your sleeve today, but you still may feel awkward if you can't easily express yourself in words. Although you were built to withstand emotional pressure, other people might be uncomfortable with your disclosure. Nevertheless, it isn't your job to protect everyone from your intensity. Show others how much you care while still remaining true to yourself.

You can't ignore the wave of desire that continues to grow, but you still might not feel ready to reveal what you want to others. You may attempt to suppress your emotions because even the thought of discussing them makes you anxious. But pretending that everything is copacetic won't bring you happiness, either. Even if you believe your confession could complicate an otherwise uncomplicated day, rest assured that expressing what you want is ultimately better than remaining silent.

Although you must complete your chores today as promised, you're also longing for some personal downtime. Fortunately, you can get away with doing less than usual now, but your desire to impress others with your competence doesn't leave a lot of room for relaxation. Don't hold yourself to an impossibly high standard. Sometimes, it's advisable to ease off on the throttle so you can enjoy the scenery along the way.

Even if you're not humming with romantic energy yet, you still can be incredibly creative today. Sensual Venus is very close to the Sun-Mercury conjunction in relationship-oriented Libra, suggesting that love could be in the air. Nevertheless, it is up to you to make that something special happen. You may be serious about your personal growth but you would also like to collaborate with a playful partner. Your perfect companion is someone who is funny yet can still add meaning to what you are already trying to express.

Finalizing your plans for an upcoming trip might seem like the right thing to do now, but it's more important to focus on the present. You may be gifted with an opportunity to improve a significant relationship if you're willing to reevaluate your current priorities. It's not that you can't do it all; it's just that you are easily distracted. Nevertheless, there's no need to be self-critical if your mind wanders. Just demonstrate your commitment by showing up in the present moment.

You have an enticing opportunity to spend quality time with people you really like today, but you still need to finish your work before you go traipsing off with your friends. Unfortunately, they can distract you from fulfilling your promises. Thus, it is not a good idea to disrupt your regular routine today. Keep your current dissatisfaction to yourself and mind your responsibilities for now.

You know exactly what you want to accomplish at work today, yet you also must find the time to honor your personal needs as well. You could believe that any deviation from your plan indicates a lack of success, but this line of thought is far from the truth. You might be a bit emotionally disoriented now, so don't worry if the day unfolds differently than you imagined. Throw all of your preconceived notions out the window and exercise flexibility for a change.

You might feel unsettled today because your schedule doesn't leave much wiggle room for fun and games. You don't have time to let other people's troubles hijack your day. Luckily, it's entirely possible to enjoy yourself while still being emotionally responsive to those you love. Your mental versatility and quick wit enable you to offer your genuine support with just the right words. Trust your heart to tell you when you can gracefully slip away.

It's time to reconsider your relationships with close friends or business partners, especially if there are money issues involved. Your desire to iron out the details of a financial arrangement can be complicated by a lack of information or a misunderstanding. Even if you want closure today, it's wiser to leave things open-ended for now. In the meantime, discussing the various options you have will lead to finding the clarity you seek.

Your intentions may be admirable today, but others might misunderstand you no matter how positive you are in your approach. The cosmic culprit is trickster Mercury hooking up with friendly Venus in your 3rd House of Communication. Perhaps people don't trust your words because your delivery is overly optimistic. Don't try to convince anyone of your altruistic motives; just maintain your position and your integrity will eventually speak for itself.

The overwhelming uncertainty of your life could undermine your confidence today. Fortunately, you are quite capable of covering your anxiety and hiding your doubts because your key planet Mercury conjuncts gracious Venus in charming Libra. The good news is whatever advantage you may lose to faulty logic now, you gain in charisma and creativity. Fake it till you make it.

Ask precisely for what you want today and you just might receive it as clever Mercury conjuncts your key planet Venus, enabling you to be quite persuasive in your plea. But you may have to risk a little emotional security to be heard, since your attitude is softened by accommodating Venus in your rational sign. Be as specific as possible in your request; the more details you supply now, the better your chances are of success.

You might misread someone's intentions today and turn an otherwise insignificant comment into a major drama. Unfortunately, your perspective is so distorted now that it's challenging to maintain clarity. Blowing things out of proportion only makes things worse. It may be more prudent to wait a day or two before you respond in order to see what happens. Treat every interaction as objectively as possible until you know how it fits into the larger picture.

Too many people requesting too much information from you could give you a colossal headache today. Don't just make up a story on the spot, for your colleagues will immediately catch on. Honesty is the best policy; share the plain and simple facts to the best of your knowledge and leave it at that. As long as you're being truthful, you don't have to know all the answers. Sometimes others just have to figure it out for themselves.

Your work plans could fall apart today as you watch the details begin to unravel. Hopefully, you can see this predicament as a positive experience because you are receiving an advanced warning that your ideas need more development. Don't try to force the issue and glue everything back together. Instead, rethink your strategy before taking corrective action. Believe it or not, facing an obstacle now might be a blessing in disguise.

Someone's overly dramatic story puts you in an awkward position today if you don't know how to respond. You want to help, but you're afraid that if you dig too deeply you might uncover details you wish you didn't know. However, if you don't investigate at all, then you won't have all the facts you need to make a big decision. Prepare for the element of surprise; when the answer finally comes, it may not be what you expect.

Be careful about placing too much trust in your instincts now because a flash of inspiration could steer you in the wrong direction. Although it's useful to recognize the amazing potential of a current situation, your mind may be playing tricks on you today. Even if you believe you're seeing the actual path ahead, check out your assumptions with a close friend or partner before doing something you might regret. Asking for another point of view never hurts, especially if you take the advice you receive to heart.

You are confident that others will live up to your high expectations today and are quite surprised if they fall short. Your willingness to give someone the benefit of the doubt could backfire unless you maintain objectivity when assessing the facts. Just acknowledge the limitations of available time and resources for all parties involved. Nothing is gained by blowing reality out of proportion. Bigger isn't always better; good things often come in small packages.

It's as if you're waking up from a deep sleep today. Opening your eyes empowers you to see all the possibilities in front of you, even though you might not be doing anything differently from yesterday. Although your new found enthusiasm inspires you to shake things up, it's not wise to expect too much change overnight. Give yourself a few more days to explore your options as the fog continues to lift and your clarity of vision improves.

Your environment might appear chaotic today and a variety of interruptions easily distracts you from your original plans.  Everyone may seem incredibly busy and you are eager to be swept up in the frenzy. However, you could already have more on your plate than you can handle. Prioritizing your commitments early in the day allows you to participate in the fun without being overwhelmed.

Your self-confidence is growing today, tempting you to feel invincible. The good news is this upbeat outlook positively impacts your behavior. However, an inflated sense of optimism can lead to trouble. Don't wait until you're in over your head with promises you can't keep. Strategically choosing your commitments sets the tone for success and eliminates obstacles to happiness before they even appear.

You may have a bullet-proof plan for the day that includes some serious rest and relaxation. Your infectious enthusiasm can be almost enough to make everything work in your favor. However, in your haste for fun and frivolity, you might have skipped over a few details. In spite of a minor setback, a practical approach, combined with your unrelenting determination, could have you on your way before you know it.

You can't easily explain your behavior today because your actions come from your heart and not from your head. Your optimism is on the rise even if the current facts don't necessarily support such a positive picture. However, the good news is that your strong desire for change might be enough of a catalyst to get the ball rolling in the right direction. Follow the momentum; the future is much closer than you think.

Ironically, taking the course of least resistance can draw you out into the spotlight today. It might happen so fast that you're caught off guard by the attention you receive. The reflective Moon is traveling through your 11th House of Future Goals, preparing you for what's on the horizon, even if you're not consciously thinking about it. There's no reason to overanalyze everything; just keep your dreams alive now so you have the potential of making them come true.

You have all the right stuff to shine like a bright star today. The unflappable Leo Moon is highlighting your 10th House of Status, but you might not be ready to assume your new responsibilities. Nevertheless, you feel exceedingly hopeful about your future, but it still could take time before you are able to realize your dreams. Your smartest strategy now is to talk less and do more. Positive action lights the way for you and those who follow.

Current social circumstances may be more complicated than you prefer, prompting you to set your sights on the future. The Moon's visit to your 9th House of Big Ideas boosts your confidence and makes you feel as if you can do anything now. Action-hero Mars is journeying through your adventurous sign, motivating you to stretch further to achieve your goals, however unrealistic they appear to others. Nevertheless, if you pace yourself for the long haul, you might be surprised how quickly you reach your destination.

You're tempted to execute a power play in order to gain recognition within your family or community today. Tread lightly, for dramatic tactics can be a dangerous political strategy. Reconsider your motives before doing anything that might detract from your current status or diminish your authority. Once you swing into action, you will need to follow your plan through to the end, so think twice before taking an unnecessary risk.

You aspire to remain objective and emotionally detached, but relationship dynamics get messy now if passion creeps into the picture. Your desire to keep conversations rational might stem from your general distrust of feelings. You prefer to avoid melodramatic meltdowns, but your attempts to sidestep a conflict today only makes matters worse. Muster up the necessary courage to overcome your resistance; facing the truth can set you free.

If you are considering making changes to your daily regimen, the Moon's monthly visit to your 6th House of Habits is a favorable time for self-improvement. Just make sure you are modifying your behavior for the right reasons. For example, if you go on a diet to impress someone with your weight loss, your plan won't likely succeed. The best reason for starting something new is to do it for your own well-being. Transformation requires meaningful motivation, personal commitment and self-discipline.

Untangling a misunderstanding with a close friend or partner could be the right thing to do today. Although your first impulse may be to apologize for your role in the current mess, the planetary emphasis on your 7th House of Relationships indicates that both parties share the blame. The Virgo Moon helps you to keep your feelings to yourself until you are fully aware of all the emotional dynamics at play. Luckily, your patience will be rewarded in a surprising way if you don't push ahead too soon.

You aren't happy about an imbalance of power today. You may feel intimidated by someone who appears to have an agenda that is different than yours. Thankfully, you have the ability to create boundaries, if necessary. It's crucial to stand up for your beliefs, but this strategy can backfire if you become overly stubborn. It's not in your best interest to set off on your own since collaborating with others now is your most effective route to success.

You may instinctively resist an authority figure today because you want to follow your own inspiration. You believe you have a better way to do accomplish goals, and all you want is acknowledgement and respect for your strategy. This can be your chance to demonstrate your cleverness as long as you are also pragmatic in your approach. Don't let anyone talk you out of your intended plans; however, listening to an expert's opinion improves your chances of reaching your goals in record time.

It's less stressful to hide behind your invisibility cloak today, but your emotions may be revealed anyway. If you decide to express what's on your mind now, you could receive assistance from the analytical Virgo Moon moving through your 3rd House of Communication. But people might not be interested in hearing all the details of your inner process. Write down your thoughts instead of sharing them; some ideas are best developed without interference from anyone else.

There's no reason to overextend your resources today simply because you wish to express your generosity to those you respect. The good news is that everyone is on equal terms and any costs for social activities can be graciously shared. You don't have to prove anything, but you still may want to contribute for some aspect of the day. Just remember that others won't be easily impressed by your current display of magnanimity unless it truly comes from your heart.

Your sleep may have been a bit restless last night with the Moon lighting up your 1st House of Self and amplifying the intensity of your dreams. Your vivid fantasies linger today as mischievous Mercury's connection with foggy Neptune makes it tricky to think straight. It's better to feel your way through the emotional haze than to rely on logic now. Make friends with your inner artist rather than your inner scientist for the best results.

Although you may be screaming on the inside, it's to your advantage to maintain your gracious manners on the outside. Thankfully, your natural people skills enable you to interact with others in a personable way, even if you lack your normal patience. The fact is you don't need the distraction of conflict today, especially if it doesn't matter who wins in the long run. Instead of attempting to prove you are right, lead by example and concentrate on improving yourself.

You intuitively know how people will react to your words today, giving you the power to elicit the response you want. It may not be wise to tell everyone what you're thinking now with three planets, including retrograde Mercury, in your 12th House of Secrets. Too much disclosure too fast could sabotage your progress. Slowing down your delivery is one tactic to improve your chances for success, especially if you can find a way to enjoy the process as it unfolds.

There's no need to let your frustration get the best of you if everything seems to be taking forever to manifest. You're on the edge of a significant breakthrough but there's no way to make something momentous happen before its natural time. Nevertheless, you still have your part to play; instead of dreaming about big changes in the distant future, take initiative right now. Some of the greatest journeys are accomplished by putting one foot ahead of the other, one tiny step at a time.

Getting to the bottom of what appears to be even the most trivial of events is more complicated than it appears at first. Although everyone's motives seem close to the surface, you begin to realize how buried the truth really is once you start digging. Instead of wasting your time trying to uncover the source of someone's intentions now, just accept people's actions at face value. You can always return to the scene of the crime and do additional detective work later on if you're still interested.

There's no valid reason to hold onto negative emotions today as they don't serve a purpose for you. Just try letting the feelings wash over you and dissipate on their own accord. Fortunately, you can benefit the most by focusing on your competency, rather than blaming someone else or defending your position. Ultimately, your reactions have their own bias. If you let others freely say what's on their minds you will find that you share common ground.

You may be divinely inspired today, but cultivating an ethereal perspective is challenging when mundane reality is so demanding. Other people may encourage you to tend to the details of your life now that the exacting Virgo Moon is visiting your 7th House of Relationships. However, getting lost in the minutiae could lead to trouble. Thankfully, you can balance the energy by consciously steering toward bigger ideas and focusing on the possibility of more amazing adventures ahead.

You may be drifting on the winds of fate, yet this can still be quite a memorable day if you relinquish control willingly. There might not be any reason to pretend you're in charge if you're not -- and there are no advantages to working extra hard now just to prove a point. Events don't necessarily unfold as expected; graciously accepting whatever happens next can make your journey more enjoyable from the start. Exercising your sense of humor allows you to see life from a more lighthearted perspective.

You might believe you're at a creative standstill today, unable to take a current project to the next level. But there's no need to let frustration sour your day; just find something else to occupy your time for a while. Once you're focusing on a completely different activity, your inspiration could return stronger than ever. Push yourself so you can get the most out of this unexpected burst of energy. Don't underestimate the power of your determination and the depth of your imagination.

Your collaborative skills may be tested today because your patience is running on a rather short fuse. However, losing your temper isn't constructive if you really want to improve the dynamics. Remember, it's wise to keep your emotions in check as long as you're willing to express your feelings later in the day after the urgency passes. Achieving positive results is more likely now if you don't blow things out of proportion. Timing is everything.

If you are hiding your feelings behind a wall of safety today, it may be time to consider what you would do if the emotional dam breaks. Although your anticipation is exhilarating if you can go with the flow, it could also be scary if you maintain resistance. Keep in mind that your justifications for maintaining the status quo won't necessarily prevent change, so you might as well stop fighting the inevitable and embrace the unknown.

Burying your head in the sand when it comes to a current financial crunch is a bad idea right from the start. Although you may be facing a tight cash flow now, you can gain a temporary advantage over a situation that has plagued you for a while if you're willing to simply acknowledge the problem. Work hard will stabilize your current position, but don't expect miracles overnight. Yard by yard, it's hard; inch by inch, it's a cinch.

Since you typically have high expectations for yourself, you can be hard on those around you, too. However, it may be time to practice forgiveness now if you recently judged someone's behavior harshly. Understandably, it's difficult to be nice if you're still harboring resentment. Admitting your own shortcomings increases your vulnerability and softening your delivery clears the path to grow closer to others.

Complete as much unfinished business as possible today while the Moon is moving through hardworking Virgo. Your extra effort may not have the immediate impact you desire, but if you slack off now, you might not see any results at all. Don't give up when you're so close to achieving your goals; it's better to have a delayed payoff than none at all.

If you find yourself pulling your hair out while trying to work with others on a project today, don't just ignore the problem by retreating into your self. Instead of withdrawing completely, it may be sufficient to just step back and give yourself some breathing room. It's not that you are necessarily a loner; it's just that everyone else's goals may not interest you all that much. Don't be afraid to set boundaries and let others know what you need. Opening the channels of communication is the first step to finding common ground.

Your current desire to keep everything on track  enables you to be quite productive today. You expect others to do their part and you don't want any surprises to distract you from your work now. You can increase your efficiency by making a list of the tasks you want to accomplish. Don't focus on what you can't finish; give yourself credit for what you do complete. Shifting your frame of reference helps you see your contributions in a better light.

You can immediately see several reasons why someone's big plan won't work today. However, you shouldn't let your pragmatism prevent you from jumping on the bandwagon and doing your share. Being practical is only one side of the equation; being pessimistic is something else. Just because you know how much effort is required to fulfill a promise, don't turn your common sense into unnecessary negativity. Recognizing the real deal increases your sense of authority but remember, the power of positive thought can move mountains.

Although asserting your individuality comes naturally to your unconventional sign, you might need to take extra steps today to protect your right to march to a different drummer. If someone moves in too close for comfort, you may need to reestablish healthy boundaries to maintain your sense of autonomy. But don't confuse your desire for independence with a fear of intimacy. If you want to live a life of no regrets, it's still wise to say yes to love if it knocks on your door.

Your friends or coworkers may be on your case today, pushing you up against your limits. Your first inclination might be to try your hand at a diplomatic strategy to avoid making waves. However, it could be the wrong time to give up your power by pleasing everyone at the cost of your own happiness. Be honest and share your feelings, even if the consequences of your words are temporarily challenging. Ultimately, you will discover your true allies by seeing who respects your needs.

A radical shift in relationship dynamics might mean that someone finally understands your point of view. But don't assume that your friends will automatically encourage your independent behavior just because they listen to your story. Instead of pushing your luck, be thankful they accept you as you are rather than trying to change you. You won't gain any further advantage if you continue to pull them outside of their current comfort zone. Knowing when to back off is essential to cultivating a harmonious atmosphere for everyone involved.

You Bulls don't like to change your daily routine unless there is a compelling reason; it's just easier to do things the same way as you did last time. However, the Moon's shift into rational Libra and your 6th House of Habits motivates you to review the basics of your everyday behavior. Consider what works and what doesn't before making improvements to your diet, exercise program and other lifestyle choices. It's the littlest changes now that can have the most positive and lasting effect.

You are obsessed about pursuing a creative whim today, yet you can't just abandon your current tasks. Tending to unfinished business sounds boring when compared with chasing your desires. However, ignoring previous obligations invites unnecessary trouble down the road. Nevertheless, you'll feel better in the long run if you work now and save your self-expression for a more appropriate time. Maintaining your integrity at all costs makes you a hero in the eyes of others.

Acknowledge your inner Crab today by establishing a protective shell around you. A more positive way to create this bubble is to surround yourself with the love of special friends who nurture you and stand by you, no matter what. The cosmic energy is perfect now for settling into your cozy nest and appreciating your family. Even if you must head out into the world at some point to run errands or go the office, staying put for a while can be rejuvenating to your spirit. Home is where the heart is.

The energy is rather exciting today, but you can get so caught up in the adrenaline rush that you keep piling more on your schedule. But your attraction to action doesn't mean you have to squeeze everything into one day. Wake up early and get a head start on your chores; make your plans with the intent of establishing a healthy balance rather than creating more noise. Don't go overboard when you finally decide to have some fun; for now, moderation is the key to your success.

You could become so consumed with your desire to acquire something today that your heart becomes intent on buying it. Normally, you're prudent enough in your spending habits that it's easy to pass up a bargain item if you don't really need it. Wait a few days before making a final decision even if you feel very strongly about the purchase. Time works in your favor; gaining a bit of practical perspective now allows you to make a choice that will serve you well into the future.

You may reach a point today when your path becomes clear enough to set a new course of action. You could experience a bit of anxiety once you get started, yet the stress actually acts as a catalyst that encourages you to make a choice. Fortunately, your future begins to make more sense once you eliminate unnecessary noise by fixing on a single direction. Paradoxically, narrowing your focus now actually increases your options over the days ahead.

Your weariness could catch up with you today, especially if you feel as if you're carrying the weight of the world on your shoulders. Thankfully, your fate is not determined by your current actions alone, so don't try to do everything all at once. Instead, find some time for contemplation where you have the privacy needed to refocus on your dreams. Sink into your feelings without trying to change them or bring others into your inner process. You will emerge from your little retreat with renewed vigor, ready to make the most of the challenges ahead.

You have your eyes set on the horizon but still have unfulfilled promises keeping you in the past. This period of renewal that began last month is coming to an end next week as energetic Mars leaves your farsighted sign. Use these last days wisely by imagining what you want to happen next. Make intentional visualization a part of your daily routine to empower you to manifest your dreams. Luckily, you can positively impact your future by changing how you see it.

You may be preoccupied with professional issues today and your current role in the community. Although others naturally look to you for guidance, they don't necessarily want you to take over. You are only needed you to listen, reflect upon what they have said and add your seasoned perspective. You can be an amazingly effective leader now by being part of the team instead of assuming authority and telling everyone what to do. Believe it or not, taking the time to help others also helps you.

You are eagerly anticipating what's around the next corner, but it's not healthy to live so far into the future that you detach from current circumstances. Spending quality time with your friends and family inspires you to refocus your attention on the present moment. Fortunately, you receive cosmic support from action-hero Mars now moving through adventurous Sagittarius. Your path to happiness is one of duality; you can live in the present while still dreaming of the future.

There's no reason to succumb to self-doubt today, even if something reminds you of your personal limitations. Old fears aren't necessarily relevant to your present circumstances anyhow. But don't keep your anxiety buried or it will continue to grow unchecked. Find a trusted friend or colleague and express your feelings. Simply discussing your concerns helps dissipate negativity before it causes any further trouble. No burden is too heavy when it's shared.

You have no easy outlet for your passions today, and could grow uncomfortable with the dynamics of the situation. Perhaps the real problem is that you can't express your negative emotions. If you need to let off steam, it's wise to find a less disruptive way to vent your feelings. You must get to the source, however, to discover a permanent solution to the current tension.

Minor details at work could pull your attention away from the list of things you should be doing. It may seem like you're being drawn into working on unnecessary tasks and there is no way around them. However, approaching the situation from an either/or perspective won't lead to a way out of your dilemma. Roll up your sleeves and willingly jump in to help; honoring your own needs is more rewarding once you've done your good deed for the day.

Dark and brooding feelings might still be lingering, yet you can begin to see the light at the end of the tunnel. Even if you try to experience pleasure, it may take another day or two to be completely free from your current stress. Meanwhile, don't lose touch with your own inner voice or you could also lose your ability to make magic. Take a few deep breaths and slow down; transformation is a gradual process that requires time to unfold.

Staying at home sounds like an enticing idea today, but unfortunately, you probably need to wait until the weekend before you retreat into your shell. Make the most of your day by remaining cognizant of your emotions, even when it's not appropriate to express them. This strategy may not fix the ills of the world, but it can help you be more pleasant to others, which in turn could improve your mood.

The noise level in your hectic life kicks up another notch today. You're in your element now as you're swept up in a buzzing hive of activity, although the comings and goings of your fellow worker bees might be a tad distracting. Just remember that you also have your own obligations to fulfill on time. Sort out your priorities early in the day so you don't miss out on what's most important.

You could be feeling as if you are stuck in a corner with no clear way out. However, circumstances are in flux, and within a few days you may discover a viable escape out of your current dilemma. Try not to let minor annoyances dampen your spirit; negativity can hamper your overall journey in more ways than one. Luckily, positive thinking just might take you as far as you need to go.

These are intense times as you are required to tie up loose ends while simultaneously visualizing the challenges ahead. The future seems to be arriving with great speed and the big question now is whether or not you are ready to put your plan into action. But don't rock the boat by trying so hard to prove yourself. You have a much better chance of succeeding today if you don't move too quickly. A steady hand and a healthy dose of determination will carry you to the next chapter of your life.

Your preparations are coming to fruition and the big event is just around the bend. But your nerves are on edge today, and you aren't sure how anything will work out. To make matters worse, just as you start seeing progress, your plans go into a stall. Don't worry; you won't crash land if you wait for circumstances to catch up with your desires. Impulsively switching your strategy is not a good idea; you're making more headway than you realize now, even if everything is taking longer than you wish.

A whirlwind of social events brightens your day with wonderful people; however, the hectic pace can be too crazy for even you fun-loving Archers. In fact, you may prefer to think about being with your friends rather than actually spending time  with them now. Remember, the key is keeping a sense of balance. You don't need to go into seclusion to maintain your composure. Just give yourself enough time alone to process your feelings so you can focus on the present moment when you're in the company of others.

It's finally time to put your master plan into motion, even if you are currently motivated by the stress of a deadline. You're ready to move from the realms of contemplation into the world of practicality. But don't be afraid to ask for help if you need some. Your associates will most likely support your efforts for they know from experience how responsible and hardworking you can be when pursuing your ambitions. Just keep in mind that others may not jump in until invited. Don't let your pride get in the way of your success.

Something is amiss at work now, and you cannot rest until you put your finger on the source of the problem. The circumstances may be a bit confusing, for on the surface all the pieces fit  together quite nicely. Still, there are strange undercurrents and it is too early to tell which direction they will carry you. Even if you are ready to act today, wait until the tension dissipates and everything feels right. In moments of great uncertainty there is also great opportunity for positive change.

You might not find it easy to get in touch with your own heart today. In fact, you may be left feeling emotionally high and dry now, yet you are still craving the intensity of deep emotions. Fortunately, you Fish can create your own waters to swim in by conjuring up your ideal world in your imagination. However, this is just the first step on your journey to fulfillment. A solid plan and serious dedication are what you really need if you want to manifest your dreams.

Ironically, what you say today might not have as much impact as what you don't say. Although the Scorpio New Moon Eclipse rattles your 8th House of Intimacy, it's difficult to ask for your heart's desire. Your emotions may seem detached from your communication unless you make a conscious choice to include them in your story. Don't wait for a better moment; if you take a chance and tell a loved one what you want, you might just get what you need.

When you wish upon a star today, you might be asking for your life to return to a simpler state. However, relationship dynamics may continue to grow a bit out of control. Your interactions with others contain hidden layers of complexity as the Scorpio Solar Eclipse rocks your 7th House of Partners. You might be willing to put up with temporary logistical problems if you can see your way through the entanglement. Just keep moving toward your destination, one step at a time.

It's not too late to improve your daily routine, even if it's an upgrade you should have made much sooner. Today's Scorpio Solar Eclipse plants the seeds in your 6th House of Habits, indicating sudden changes that can set a series of profound consequences into motion. The potential is greater than you realize, so make every action count as much as possible while you have the planetary magic on your side.

Whether or not you realize it, you are on the edge of a creative breakthrough; however, you must be the one to take the initiative to make it happen. Don't allow discouragement to settle in today, even if it feels like progress has come to an abrupt standstill. This Scorpio Solar Eclipse polarizes your 5th House of Love and Play, opening a door to exciting opportunities on the romantic front. Even if you are eager with anticipation, remember that good things come to those who wait.

Your emotions may be playing a game of tug-of-war with your actions today, and you don't know which one will emerge a winner. However, your current tendency is to withhold deep feelings while you smile and just do whatever is necessary to keep the peace. But the Scorpio Solar Eclipse falls in your 4th House of Security, making this a tough time if you don't acknowledge your desires. Protecting your heart seems like a good idea at first, but you might regret it later on. Following your bliss is now your fastest route to happiness.

It might seem as if you have been quietly planning forever, but now it's time to start sharing your ideas with others. The Scorpio New Moon Eclipse marks a turning point in your 3rd House of Communication. Don't hesitate; get your best thoughts out into the open since they don't do any good running around inside your head. There may not be a better opportunity to initiate passionate discussions about what you want to happen in the next chapter of your life, so seize the moment before it passes. You may be pleasantly surprised by who steps up to support your cause.

You can't share every feeling that's important to you now without rocking the stability of your life. The Scorpio Solar Eclipse is shaking your 2nd House of Self-Esteem and possibly stirring up a cloud of self-doubt. Unfortunately, hiding crucial information creates a ripple effect, and the subtle disturbances can quickly build into destructive waves, sending you on a journey of self-discovery. Don't rush the process; once you better understand your own core values you'll know exactly what you need to say and do to create positive change.

Turn off the regularly scheduled program and walk into the surrealistic world that awaits you. Today's New Moon Eclipse occurs in your sign, symbolizing the initiation process you are about to experience. With nebulous Neptune in the picture, you're probably feeling hopeful about the life-altering possibilities that are right in front of you. But don't let go of the shadows on a whim; analyze what's holding you back and why you're still avoiding change. Once you understand the source of your resistance, transformation is soon to follow.

Your boundaries are not as strong as you'd like today, so you might steer away from emotional involvements to safeguard your heart. You may even feel vulnerable and act upon the need to protect yourself from others. Go ahead and retreat to engage in the deep soul-searching brought about by the Scorpio Solar Eclipse, occurring in your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery. There's no reason to share your feelings with anyone else until you're certain the time is right. This is one journey best traveled alone.

You may be paying rapt attention to what your peers are doing today, as if their current behavior could reveal something crucial about your life. However, the emotionally extreme Scorpio Solar Eclipse agitates your 11th House of Long-Term Goals, making it nearly impossible to know what you might want in a few days. Stop trying to control every aspect of every situation so you come out on top. Focusing on the future is fine as long as you don't miss out on the magic of the present moment.

Your innate ability to cool your emotions contributes to your air of mystery today and increases your magnetic charm. But you have little patience for playing games now that you want to climb the ladder of success. The Scorpio Solar Eclipse lands in your 10th House of Career, motivating you to concentrate on your professional ambitions. Speak straight from the heart when sharing your plans with your colleagues and watch them line up to be on your team.

It's time to take your special brand of logic out of your tool box today and draw a map that shows the path to your dream destination. You might even believe that you can make your amazing fantasies come true now that the Scorpio Solar Eclipse is activating your 9th House of Big Adventure. Start by visualizing whatever you want to do over the upcoming months. Then jot down the critical milestones that you wish to reach along the way. Use this guideline to stay on track as you move toward fulfilling your most creative visions.

You might end up expending precious energy and exhausting yourself for no reason today. Although a friend or lover may seem distant, your current situation ultimately serves you well if you simply learn your lesson. But don't attack someone needlessly just because you're feeling insecure. Admit that you can make mistakes and then proceed with caution the next time around.

You tend to play well with others at work because you're normally not interested in making waves. Nevertheless, you might feel as if you're placed in an awkward position today if someone questions your motives or undermines your efforts. But instead of wasting time defending your behavior, put your energy toward reaching your goals. If necessary, retreat and work on your own until the tension passes. Take the high road and let your integrity be the final word.

It seems as if success is within your grasp but your progress could grind to a screeching halt today if you expect too much all at once. There's no need to be afraid of acting on your desires now, assuming you are sticking with the facts and not looking for an easy way out. However, you can reach farther than ever if you lead with your common sense; seize the moment and seal the deal.

You can't escape the burden of responsibility today, but you should focus on the positive of the current situation rather than where you might fall short. You're less inclined to take yourself too seriously today, even if everyone else is acknowledging your authority. However, you're not going to singlehandedly solve anyone's problems, no matter how much you want to help. Offer whatever assistance you can and then give others sufficient space and time to choose their own paths.

Your patience may seem out of character today, especially in light of your current enthusiasm for getting the most out of life. However, separating your needs from those around you can help you rationalize your deliberate behavior now. But don't bother trying to explain to everyone why you're moving slowly; just trust your instincts and reach for the stars at your own pace. Although it may take a while for others to notice, the cosmic energy is already beginning to shift and your progress will soon be evident.

Although you think you know exactly what you want today, your goals are more confused than you realize. In fact, your unbridled optimism could prompt you to make a faulty assumption. You believe you understand what's lurking just beyond your perceptions, but getting the rest of the story might be an elusive task. Don't force any issues; it's healthier to delay an important decision than to make a choice without having the right information at your disposal. Patience will ultimately pay off with the truth.

Your anticipation grows today since expansive Jupiter boosts your confidence and raises your expectations. Nevertheless, you might feel as if your friends aren't supporting you enough, but blaming others for their lack of enthusiasm doesn't help your cause. Acknowledging your peers for who they are and not for what they can or cannot do on your behalf gives them the freedom to respond without pressure. Just because change is in the air doesn't mean that you should rush it.

Someone you respect might promise you the Moon, yet you still want to see concrete results. Your willingness to give others the benefit of the doubt works in your favor, but only up to a point. Fortunately, you won't likely get lost in such high expectations that you end up being disappointed. You're better off now if you can step back and keep everything in a healthy perspective. Bring your dreams back down to earth if you want them to come true.

You prefer to fly beneath the radar today with the Moon hiding out in your 12th House of Escapism. However, you may have a lot more fun if you purposefully place yourself directly in the middle of the action. Nevertheless, you still might not feel very social now and it's your choice if you decide to bow out of a previous commitment. You're working harder than you like now, yet your heart might not be in your current job. However, you also want to make substantial progress toward your ideal career path. Fortunately, you can have your cake and eat it too if you don't let your disappointment show today; waiting for just a few more days will bring you closer to living the life you want.

Your path to success might not be as direct as you wish today. Although you're willing to take a circuitous route to accomplish your career objectives, it's tricky to make a concrete plan if you can't see where your current course is leading. It may be more advantageous now to temporarily set your long-term goals aside. Destiny is more likely to work its magic if you keep your dreams alive by focusing all your energy on the present moment.

It may be disconcerting to observe how reality doesn't match up to your expectations today. You might be inclined to choose to steer clear of any conversations that could touch on tough topics. Unfortunately, avoiding the shadows gives you a lopsided view now because you're intentionally denying the larger issues at play. There's nothing wrong with being optimistic, but you'll be happier in the long run if you are operating in the real world right from the start.

You say whatever is on the tip of your tongue today; however, you could step into deep water so quickly that you don't have time to get your bearings. Unfortunately, you may be even more impulsive than ever with your words now that mischievous Mercury moves forward in your 7th House of Relationships. Although you might be tempted to stir up some drama, you're still better off approaching a conversation about your feelings with thoughtful deliberation. Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.

You feel like royalty now as you luxuriate in the splendor of your own domain. It's crucial to project a positive attitude now that the Sun is traveling through your 7th House of Partnerships. Setting the bar high encourages your friends and family to step up to the plate and give it their best shots.

Playing to your audience is tricky business if you aren't on stage today. It's tough to be a teacher if you don't have a class. Solidifying routines may still require additional time, yet creating structure reliably leads to greater opportunities down the road.

Your feelings are so tangible that they could overwhelm your plans today. However, avoiding serious emotional commitments now allows you to encourage your imagination to meander without restraint. Keep in mind that even the most impractical thoughts can have practical consequences. Exploration of your inner worlds leads to outer rewards.

Everyone might be relying on you to be the nurturing one of the group with four planets residing in your 4th House of Emotional Security. Tracing your feelings back to their underlying causes can make a real difference, enabling you to make positive changes that last.

You would be quite content these days if people left you alone for a while. You long for seclusion and may greatly benefit by carving out some quiet time for self-reflection. Your self-esteem depends on your ability to establish healthy boundaries while still being vulnerable with those you love.

Sometimes making the simplest changes in a relationship can take longer than you expect. Charming Venus cozies up to the Sun in your 1st House of Personality, you won't likely be short on charisma -- even if others criticize or attack your plan. This is your moment to shine; you're at the top of your game, so eagerly invite in every opportunity that knocks at your door.

You are a natural-born traveler yet responsibilities are stacking up today, prohibiting your free movement. If you do end up taking a trip now, it will likely be for business, not pleasure. Nevertheless, you still may want to go somewhere special, so expand your intellectual sphere by researching a new and different destination. Don't wait for fate to decide your future; stand up and be counted as someone who makes their own opportunities.

You might have to work with a very stubborn person today, someone who seems bent on turning a simple exercise into a totally frustrating experience. Remember that bossing others around won't get you what you want now, but practicing compassion could just do the trick.

You want to step back and take in the whole picture today, so you are quite willing to walk away from the details and leave them to someone else. You can transform the most boring drudgery into an exciting adventure today by simply putting all of your heart into your work. Domestic chores don't feel so tedious today because they shift your attention away from the complexities of relationships. However, a solution is more likely once you take a few steps back and give everyone involved a bit of breathing room. Thankfully, doing mundane projects at home is more than just a distraction; they can be a wonderful way to keep busy and feel good about your accomplishments.

Your resources might be spread too thin today, making this a perfect time to regroup as you consider what to do next. Thankfully, your common sense leads you in the right direction as you consciously direct your energy back to center. But don't avoid hard work as whatever you put off now will require even more effort if you have to do it later. Scaling back your long-term plans empowers you to achieve your more immediate goals one small step at a time.

A serious encounter with someone who means business could pull you out of the clouds and bring you crashing back down to earth. You might not be very happy when you are reminded of your unfinished chores, but there's no one to blame but yourself. The real power of now is most evident when you focus on what is, rather than the possibility of what could be. Instead of risking happiness on the unknown future, place your bet on what you can manifest in the present moment.

Your current commitments might have you so stressed out that you can't find time to pursue more relaxing activities today. But don't let resentment ruin an otherwise productive day because negative emotions are just a waste of precious energy. Instead of seeking to fulfill your immediate desires, a more mature and reserved approach to life now will give way to a deeper satisfaction later on. You will feel a lot better about your future once you can see some progress in the present.

Your optimistic attitude fades into a more realistic outlook today when you realize that your goals will take longer to achieve than you originally thought. However, there's no room for discouragement because it only further impedes your progress. It's more important to stay on course than it is to cross a few more unrelated tasks off your list. Don't rush through your work; slow down and make every little action count. Quality, not quantity, matters more than ever.

The intensity of your feelings begins to cool today, but this isn't a license to shift into a more analytical mode. Instead, use this time to assimilate recent experiences and prepare for another round of engagement by sorting out your priorities. Although gathering useful data can be comforting, you already have gathered enough facts. Instead, get out of your head by practicing spontaneous acts of joyful self-expression. Although you might have been swept up in a recent flurry of social activities, it's time to return to your responsibilities. Managing your complex calendar efficiently now is crucial to juggling all your obligations. You may not be ready to declare the party over yet, even if you understand the consequences of ignoring pressing responsibilities. Instead of pushing your luck by chasing after another opportunity for fun and frivolity, be wise and shift your attention toward stabilizing your finances, replenishing your body and getting back to basics.

You have a real chance to shine now and it would be a big mistake to procrastinate any longer. It's time to establish a pace of work that you can sustain and settle in for the long haul. Although momentum may be pulling you toward your goals, it's in your best interest to encourage the process by applying yourself diligently and staying singularly focused on your destination. The ladder of success is climbed one rung at a time.

Keep your eyes wide open because important lessons are heading your way and you won't want to miss this chance for personal growth. Although you are often more preoccupied with the future than the present moment, your imagination and dreams are now stuck on practical issues of immediate concern. Don't forget that the work you do today will impact your life for many tomorrows.

Escapist behaviors only court trouble today, so it's best to look at your life through the most pragmatic lens you can find. Although you are often easily distracted by your fantasies, you are now able to see beyond the enticing dreams and ephemeral visions. Keep bringing your thoughts back to the hard cold facts. The most practical approach to life is currently the most successful. Put your rose-colored glasses away for another day when the stakes are not so high.

Your revolutionary scheme might be just what the boss ordered today, but you still must take a chance and communicate it to others.
