Unfortunately, you won't know what you can do unless you try. Luckily, your positive attitude and persistent determination are sensible antidotes to the current stagnation.

The boundaries between your fantasies and reality are muddled today, making it tricky to know which is which. Nevertheless, you might believe that you're fully in touch with the truth and eagerly share your perspective with someone who will listen. Unfortunately, you're not doing anyone a favor by raising expectations to an unrealistic level. However, your message could have a great deal of impact on others, so choose your words carefully to give someone a much-needed boost of confidence.

Capturing your brilliant ideas is an act of futility today because they come and go so quickly. You may try to get serious and put your innovative thoughts into action, but even your most ingenious plans might not be very practical now. If you decide to take a chance, don't rush the process. A slow and deliberate approach will take you further than trying to make everything happen all at once. Collaborating with others adds an important layer of reality to your work.

You can spin fantastic stories of romance and intrigue today that actually sound like the gospel truth. Your tales can even weave a sticky web that entangles others in your dreams. Your creative streak is a pleasant distraction to you and utterly fascinating to a not-so-secret admirer. Nevertheless, you can influence reality in a positive manner if you just remember to use caution when dancing on the fine line between fact and fancy.

Your obsession with solving a mystery intensifies today when it becomes obvious that someone isn't being forthcoming. The more that's kept hidden from you, the deeper you dig. You might even become overly possessive with someone and could have difficulty letting go of your jealousy. Putting on a dramatic display won't necessarily produce the results that you want. Express what's in your heart without letting your fears run away with your love.

Openly sharing your feelings today has a direct impact on your future. But don't jump to any conclusions before you lay the groundwork. Making too many assumptions only creates trouble down the road. Your current effectiveness in communication stems from the fact that you genuinely care about others, and this sincerity comes across in your words and actions. Even if you're only sharing facts, you can do it so pleasantly now that people stop to listen to every word you're saying.

You have a real opportunity to experience profound emotional healing today with a member of your family. If there are things that need to be said, express your feelings kindly now without blaming anyone else for your predicament. Adopting a sensitive approach allows you to state a truth that might be hurtful at any other time. Fortunately, it's unlikely that someone will take offense if your intentions are clear from the start. If you reveal your vulnerability first, others are likely to do the same in return.

You may feel waves of contentment sweep over you now that sweet Venus is sitting pretty in your sign. But confusing Neptune is also in the picture, making it nearly impossible to tell if your comfort level is based on unattainable hopes or actual circumstances. Luckily, you're able to quickly banish any unexpressed fears so negativity doesn't come creeping into your day. Let your imagination wander and give your inner child permission to come out to play.

You might have to put on your listening cap today if someone close to you really needs to talk. Thankfully, starting a conversation is easy since others want to tell you positive things rather than what is actually bothering them. Nevertheless, asking direct questions cuts right to the core issue. Cultivating clear communication channels gives others an opportunity to discuss a subject that truly matters.

You're often the one who saves the day, but you won't become a hero by trying to maintain the status quo now. You must push through your fears and take a risk by sharing your truth. You might think it's safer to stick with the facts today, but it may be more productive to let your emotions become transparent. Although you think this personal admission shows weakness, coming clean can actually work in your favor. Speak directly from your heart if you really want to experience breakthroughs in your relationships.

You can skillfully project your most brilliant and lovable side today. You are quite personable now without much effort. However, the danger is your temptation to turn on the charm as part of your agenda to avoid the real issue at hand. If you are looking to gain power or trying to manipulate a situation, your cleverness may backfire and you might wish you didn't say anything at all. Take the high road and channel your good fortune in a positive direction for everyone involved.

Say what you think must be said today, even if you're afraid of how others may react. You are experiencing the intensity of the moment now that the passionate Scorpio Sun is trining surreal Neptune in your sensitive sign. Happily, you're optimistic about the future, even with such powerful emotions swirling around in the atmosphere. Your connection to your heart inspires others to delve deeper to match your honesty and integrity.

Although you start the day with plans of your own, you could end up playing a supporting role in someone else's story today. There are responsibilities that have your name on them -- and you know exactly what's expected of you. Nevertheless, you still may be secretly searching for an escape route. Although you might believe you can get away with a bit of self-declared play time, it's not a good day to test your theory. Apply your creativity to working within the system instead of trying to beat it.

You're not nearly as rational as you think you are today as you firm up your plans for the future. It's as if one of your dreams took control of the wheel before you even realized what happened. Unfortunately, attempts to regain your authority have the opposite effect now. Surrendering to your imagination is currently the most reliable source of inspiration. Sometimes taking the path of least resistance leads to a surprising good turn of fortune.

The pressure to perform your regular duties can be relentless today, but you find mundane reality more monotonous than ever. You're itching to stir up a bit of mischief and your coworkers may even see you as a troublemaker now. You have been known to create an illusion or two in your time and you might just surprise others by pulling a rabbit out of a hat. Luckily, you can make your magic look effortless if you're willing to put in extra work when no one is watching. There are no shortcuts; practice makes perfect.

You could grow frazzled if too many responsibilities are pulling you in too many directions. You take a certain amount of pride when others rely on you for support and encouragement. But no one seems to be watching out for your best interests now, leaving you with the uncomfortable job of safeguarding your boundaries. Keep your dreams alive by sharing them with someone you trust. Ultimately, you're the only one who can restore balance into your life. There's no shame in asking for assistance if you need it.

Harness an electric spark of creativity today and use it to turn frogs into princes and princesses. Although others may not be privy to your inner process now, it's one of those days when you intuitively know that your mind is capable of doing anything. If you can imagine it, you can manifest it. You are as magical now as you believe and have the power to mold reality to conform to your dreams.

You are thriving in your creative element now and are eager to push as hard as you can to get real results. However, your dedication and persistence may not be as visible on the surface today as your apparent optimism. Don't waste time wondering what others think about your behavior. Set priorities, make a plan and stick to your strategy regardless of anyone else's opinion. Exploring your artistic nature can be more productive than you think.

Insecurities over money matters may be enough to send you into a tailspin today. Ironically, others might see you as more lighthearted and charming than you actually feel. You're not sure that current circumstances are unfolding according to your plan and you're not exactly sure how to get your finances back under control. Letting some of the details slide for a little while makes good sense as long as you don't actually believe your cash flow will improve on its own. In the meantime, your positive attitude generates its own special brand of prosperity.

You can see a break in the clouds as your workload begins to lighten today. The sky grows bluer and your pace of accomplishment quickens. Fortunately, the combination of these positive changes frees up some well-deserved leisure time. The good news is that you can work both ends of the spectrum now. You don't have to let go completely; applying your energy to your goals still produces benefits. Nevertheless, be ready to escape for a while when given the chance.

Seeking to balance the right amount of realism and optimism regarding a current situation is quite a challenging task today. On one hand, if you're overly confident, others might think you're just trying to put a positive spin on the events of the day -- and they won't believe your story. However, if you're not sufficiently optimistic, then your coworkers may not join in your parade and your much-needed support will wane. Your success depends on your willingness to make adjustments until you get it right.

You don't have to act so seriously today; you could change the dynamics by simply changing your attitude. At first, it may be uncomfortable to surrender the control you worked so hard to gain -- but perhaps it's time to try a new strategy. Share your most inspirational message so your associates will eagerly pick up the reins as you set them down. Others are more likely to take responsibility if you're ready to give them a chance.

An unexpected interaction with someone at work dramatically changes the course of your day. It's as if invisible chess pieces are being moved around in another dimension. When everything is in exactly the right position, the veil between worlds grows thin and something profound happens. Some surprises are more shocking than others, and today's events can certainly have a magical and fated feeling. Don't resist your destiny; instead, embrace it with an open heart.

It would be a shame if you were to waste today's magical powers on idle daydreaming. Your fantasies hold the key to your success, but you must discover how to unlock the possibilities. Persistence is your unlikely secret weapon now; you have something very special to share with the world so don't give up before you figure out how to access your creative potential.

You may still be surfing slightly ahead of the cosmic wave, but the tidal backwash finally catches up with you today. You must set a sustainable pace at work or you might find yourself in over your head for the next few weeks. Even though this sounds counter-intuitive, your best strategy now is to slow down. Establish your priorities, map out your activities and then execute your plan with confidence.

You're humming a happy little tune now that you're feeling more laid-back. Although you have concrete goals in mind, you're not as concerned with reaching them today. Of course, certain details sometimes fall through the cracks, but the surprises are at a minimum. It's as if you worked through the growing pains of a new project and you can finally settle into a manageable routine. But don't get too comfortable or complacent. It's one thing to appreciate the simplicity of life; it's quite another to quit reaching for the stars.

You tend to thrive on being really busy, but it's not wise to wait for a reality check that tells you to slow down. But you are known to move quickly when you dance the dance of communication. Whether you like it or not, you need to adopt a snail's pace now and commit to following through on those matters which are most important. Nothing is gained by frantically running around in circles. You will end up accomplishing more if you take on less.

You're surrounded by people everywhere you go  today, leaving you little time to pursue your personal agenda. Perhaps connecting with your peers takes on an even more prominent role in your life if you decide not to strike out on your own now. You might even feel pressured by someone to join them in a project, task or even a fun adventure. Surprisingly, exploring your relationship to others can broaden your horizons on many fronts.

It's not that everything needs to come to a complete standstill today, but there are warning signals you should take seriously. Analyze all the possibilities before blindly barreling ahead with your ambitious plans. You can't just rush through your day without personally impacting others -- especially those you love and those who love you. Stick to the tried and true methods to keep everyone happy now and save your creative brilliance for another time.

Sometimes you want to wait for everything to be perfect before allowing yourself to kick up your heels and have fun. In fact, your current circumstances may seem solid and stable enough for you to add some spontaneity and creativity into your life. But don't try to change so much all at once that you jeopardize your new high hopes before they even get off the ground. Believe it or not, you can mix things up without turning your life upside down.

You prefer being the type of friend who always gives a kind word of encouragement, but sometimes tough love is the best thing you can offer. If there's something you've been waiting to tell someone, this is an opportune time to tackle a difficult subject. Just because you have a stern message doesn't mean you can't be compassionate in your delivery. Don't second guess your inner voice when it comes to relationships; speaking from your heart demonstrates how much you care.

You have a plethora of communication tools at your disposal now, enabling you to integrate your feelings into your daily life. Perhaps things really are settling down and you will have some time to think about the chaos you recently experienced. But don't be too hard on yourself while you are weighing and judging your behavior. Being the best you can be is plenty enough for any human -- including you.

It's time to pull back on the reins of expansion and use your enthusiasm to accomplish as much as possible. Instead of planning for the future, plow the field that you are walking upon now. Take care of the business that is on your desk today, not the business plans for next year's growth. Be fully present in the moment, whether you're dealing with home and family issues or professional matters. You won't go wrong as long as you have the courage to show up and be your authentic self.

You may feel as if your emotions are settling down, but social dynamics could still be extremely confusing. There's nothing wrong with exhibiting caution, but your feelings may rise so unexpectedly that they could catch you off guard. If you feel like you're losing your center of gravity, stop and take your bearings. Once you are certain about your current position, you should be able to swing back into motion with no trouble at all.

Unconscious fears and desires may be the source of very real feelings now. Even if you're in denial about what's bubbling up into your awareness, you have time to acclimate to the new emotional landscape. Don't waste your energy trying to figure out why you're encountering so much melodrama. Instead, try to integrate the new information into your point of view. Keeping an open mind gives your imagination a chance to reveal new opportunities.

Something isn't quite right today, but you can't put your finger on it. It might be one of those unknowable and elusive things that you may as well forget about trying to figure out. In the meantime, take a look at how your friends and associates are pushing your buttons. Although you can't shift the dynamics, you can become more aware of the emotional undercurrents. There's no need to make any sudden moves now; there will be plenty of opportunities for change later on.

It's time to face ghosts from your past, because things can become more difficult over the months ahead if you don't. It may be all too tempting to just ignore old memories, but they will continue to haunt you unless you find a way to positively integrate them into your current world. Although you might choose to seek harmony through your relationships with others now, true peace of mind cannot be found until you realize the balance you are searching for is within yourself.

Your stubborn nature might get the best of you today, especially if you're not paying attention to the warning signs. If you notice that you get emotionally worked up  while defending your position or arguing for your point of view, stop for a moment to consider what's really at stake. What are you afraid of? Your own answer can help you decide if it's wise to hold your posture of resistance or if it's time to let it go and move on.

Your own long-held beliefs can crystallize if under attack today. It's not that you are particularly threatened by anyone, but conflict brings up old fears that get in the way of your current interactions. Your memories are a mixed blessing now. You would like to forget the past in order to enjoy yourself in the present moment, but something is holding you back just enough to keep you from going too far. Don't sidestep the tension in favor of pursuing pleasure; creatively resolving your differences is empowering for everyone involved.

You're doing a balancing act today as your feelings undergo radical change. However, your shifting moods are not a sign of instability. On the contrary, they demonstrate your emotional strength which allows your feelings to flow in their naturally fluid manner. Ultimately, establishing equilibrium is important too, since you don't want to get washed away with the tides. Paradoxically, your smartest strategy is to hold onto the present moment while letting go of the past.

Current realizations are opening new doorways in your quest for love and intimacy. But these epiphanies might not make getting along with others any easier because you can suddenly recognize how much you stand in your own way. Thankfully, you have a big heart and have much to give to those you admire. By taking the time now to carefully reassess the part you play in the emotional dynamics, you could make long-lasting improvements to your most significant relationships.

There's an uncharacteristic rigidity to your decisions today. Usually, your mental adaptability enables you to incorporate new information and revise your choices accordingly. However, your solutions may be based upon what you don't know -- and what you don't know now can be problematic down the road. Reserve your final answers until you're completely satisfied that you have all the facts you need. Better safe than sorry.

You may find yourself in a rather uncomfortable position, but your current predicament is not just about today. Even if the stress in your social life has been unfolding for a while, an ongoing disagreement can come to a boiling point now as you realize there might not be an easy way out. However, the real solution isn't about finding a quick fix; a premature resolution will just stop the process. Instead, get in touch with your own sense of vulnerability. You'll come out the other side feeling stronger for what you experienced and wiser for what you learned.

You may be a bit disconnected from your innermost feelings today, but oddly enough, you're not uncomfortable with this emotional displacement. Think of it as a little vacation from your own high-intensity passions. You haven't lost anything; whatever you're not integrating now will cycle around soon enough. There's no need to panic; just sit back, relax and count your blessings. Enjoy the drama-free zone while it lasts.

Although you could be more serious in your overall approach to life now, you still have much to learn from your current feelings. Keep all avenues of communication open to avert your current tendency to remain silent about whatever is bothering you. You don't need to go to a therapist to experience the benefit of talk therapy. Sharing your most significant hopes and dreams with your friends and family helps you more than you can imagine.

Your physical energy is easily depleted today, especially if you aren't taking proper care of yourself. Current stresses are building to a crescendo now as your head argues with your heart. But don't try to force your emotions into submission with logical calculations. Instead of demonstrating your mastery by figuring out your best move, postpone any major decisions until you get some much-needed rest. Once the bounce is back in your step, you will be better equipped to handle any challenge that comes your way.

You might think that hiding your feelings is in your best interest today, but flashing a smile while keeping a stiff upper lip only throws the dynamics further off kilter. It may be inconvenient to share your personal needs on the job, especially if they differ from your professional obligations. Nevertheless, your integrity is at stake so start talking now. Fortunately, you can turn your current stress to your advantage by openly acknowledging your predicament and thanking the other person for listening. Then return to the work at hand with your best foot forward and a lighter heart.

Irrepressible issues from your past are here for one more round of processing prior to fading away for good. This emotional work may not be easy stuff to handle since it's certainly not fun to talk about subjects that make you feel uncomfortable. Nevertheless, face your own shortcomings, look at your own fears and learn from your past mistakes. Things are not nearly as overwhelming as they seem; getting started is the hardest part.

Push your thinking around the corner of convenience and into the neighborhood of excitement. Even if there isn't a significant social component to your day, it's essential to give yourself the time and space to dream. But this isn't about sleeping the day away; it's about manifesting the greatest potential in your life. Hang out with friends who encourage your growth while you explore all the possibilities within your imagination.

Step beyond your own personal needs today by jumping in and helping someone take care of a larger set of concerns. Nevertheless, you still want to discuss your long-term career objectives with like-minded friends. But be careful not to slip into denial because you might try to use global thinking to avoid the weight of the responsibilities on your shoulders. Escape isn't an option, even if it sounds like a good idea at first. Balance your obligations with altruistic behavior for the good of all.

Your nervous system is working overtime today if you're pulled into a situation that is beyond your control. For that matter, the current circumstances might also be beyond your understanding. Don't spin your mental wheels too hard or too fast; logic won't beat a path to happiness now. There's no reason to fight what you cannot change. Accept the situation for what it is and proceed from there. You will never know what adventure is waiting around the bend unless you move on.

You might feel somewhat out of sorts today if you attempt to use analytical tools to untangle a thorny issue. Unfortunately, this rational approach may not serve you very well. It should come as no surprise that the best way to deal with emotional problems is to bring them out into the open. Although a solution could remain elusive now, your attitude will improve once you know that you shared your truth and your message was clearly received.

It may be upsetting if a friend doesn't rush to offer a helping hand today, but don't assume the worst if the support you want isn't forthcoming. Your needs might not be as clear to others as you think. In fact, a simple misunderstanding could escalate into a hotbed of conflict. Instead of  stirring up more trouble, try to let the energy settle down. But avoiding your feelings is only a temporary solution to the current imbalance. You  need to figure things out on your own for a while without expecting anyone to come to your rescue.

You are usually the champion of analyzing situations and discerning what is most important. But not today. Your key planet Mercury crosses paths with nebulous Neptune, making it nearly impossible to see the forest for the trees. You might not even be able to distinguish a single tree through the mists of your own illusions. Practicing patience could be your perfect answer; the fog will lift and clarity will return before you know it.

Your creativity could soar to new heights today, but you must get past your own sense of inadequacy first. Self-imposed restrictions may stem from some previous hurt or painful experience from your ancient past. The most important thing is to understand the difference between then and now. Stop listening to old messages if you want to reach your potential.  Let your inner artist out to play because your self-esteem is now directly linked to your need for self-expression.

Unexpected tension arises today from your own lack of certainty about your feelings. This confusion isn't your usual state of affairs, since you normally don't have any problem holding a distinct point of view. However, your perspective is clouded by your own fears now. There's no time to waste; move past your current ambivalence by sailing straight into the mists of your illusions. Direct confrontation with your inner demons is the fastest way to eliminate them.

It's up to you to ascribe meaning to the variety of images that pop into your imagination today. The best way to work with this stream of information is to simply allow your fantasies to flow into awareness without judgment. There's no reason to hold back; let both the positive and negative thoughts rise to the surface. You can always pick and choose which ones you want to focus on later. For now, surf the energy without making any long-lasting waves.

Memories that hearken back to long-forgotten failures, physical pains or emotional hurts could resurface today. But now your maturity enables you to see these old experiences in a brand new light. And that is exactly what you should be doing. The best reason to revisit the past now is to free yourself from it once and for all. Your future is calling and there is little time to waste.

You may be offered another chance to manifest a dream -- or at least that's how it seems today. The time to hesitate is through. Grab the opportunity that's right in front of your nose; you've earned it. It doesn't matter that everything isn't exactly the way you imagined it; don't give up when you are so close to your goal. Take a leap of faith and see what happens. Nothing ventured, nothing gained.

Whatever certainty you recently experienced has now disappeared into the elusive Neptunian mists. This temporary shift would overwhelm anyone else, but not so for you Fish. These dreamy realms are your native terrain and you are quite comfortable swimming in murky waters. When reality fuzzes out and facts become less clear, you shift into overdrive. Your intuition and imagination are connected with the entire cosmos -- whether you can see it or not.

Hiding from the world sounds like a good idea today, but it's not possible if others are demanding all of your time. You can't ignore your commitments, so the sooner you push through your resistance the better. You are an integral part of a community and your lack of participation could send the wrong message now. Showing up as a team player doesn't mean you have to run the entire show. Luckily, you can still enjoy yourself by hanging back and letting someone else lead the charge.

Your idealistic visions about your future are so compelling now that you may want to share them with others. However, it's advantageous to wait until you have more clarity prior to cluing someone else in on your plans. It's more important to continue cultivating your thoughts on your own than it is to attract attention. Flying beneath the radar is a wise strategy today. Have patience; successful ideas take time to evolve and grow into their full potential.

You have big plans today and won't let anyone's negativity slow you down. However, you might be so stoked about your future that you only see what you want to see. Your positive attitude improves your chances for success, but only if you're not in denial. Don't surround yourself with people who simply agree with you no matter what. It's better to know the truth even if it hurts. Nearly anything is possible as long as you can discern the difference between fact and fiction.

You may be overly confident about an important decision today, but your choices could steer you wrong unless you take all of the facts into consideration. Paying careful attention to what others expect prevents you from taking things too far. In the end, listening to your intuition is the deciding factor; just be sure to create enough peace and quiet in your life so you can get in touch with your inner wisdom.

You're jazzed about stepping outside of your normal routine today and networking with friends who expand your horizons. But you're not focused solely on business now; you're more interested in deepening a special relationship than you are with following a professional lead. Even if you have chores that must be completed, don't pass up a chance to pursue matters of the heart. It's not necessary to have all the answers now; simply revealing your vulnerability can be the primary key that opens the door to the next level of intimacy.

Don't lose touch with your own needs today because the Moon's current visit to your 7th House of Partners can shift your attention from your own personal issues to what's happening with those closest to you. Juggling your personal desires with your familial and social commitments takes extra finesse now. Maintaining a healthy balance is a prerequisite to successfully navigating your way through the tricky terrain of relationships. No one expects perfection as long as your intentions are sincere.

Your enthusiasm continues to inspire you today even if you're feeling overwhelmed by a situation that isn't unfolding according to your plans. Unfortunately, your current tendency to gloss over important details can impede your progress. Nevertheless, it's still tough for changing circumstances to pull you off course if you remain committed to fulfilling your obligations now. As your thoughts drift away from reality and into the realms of possibility, gently guide them back into the present moment for the sake of clarity and peace of mind.

You're eager to fulfill your promises today, and you can even enjoy yourself while still being super-productive. However, you may struggle trying to adhere to an overly rigid schedule as you desire to be free from restrictions. Nevertheless, it's smarter to buckle down and finish your chores before complicating your day with more distractions. Not only will you feel proud of your accomplishments, you will also be available for whatever comes next.

Your good intentions may not be enough to keep you on the straight and narrow path today as you play out your wanderlust in the realm of fantasies. Thankfully, you have the wisdom to hide your imaginative exploits so no one realizes that you have left the building and are traveling somewhere else in your mind. But don't get cocky or you could have to answer to an unforgiving friend, boss or lover. If you maintain appearances, you just might get away with keeping one foot in each world for a little while longer.

You're often a person that everyone confides in because you seem capable of holding space for their problems. But people might not even realize that you're going through your own personal struggles now as you attempt to balance your appearance of competence with your increasing lack of certainty. It's useful to reconsider your assumptions today, but don't let questioning turn into self-doubt. Save the philosophical contemplation for another day when you have more time on your hands.

Your dreams may bring an answer to a stubborn question now, but you must be willing to take sufficient time to explore their symbolism. Even if you're unable to recall specific details, your subconscious mind connects you with what's most relevant. The good news is that your unbridled imagination helps you to co-create the future. Remember, tomorrow's reality begins with today's thought.

You know how critical it is to separate your feelings from the empathic connection you have with others, but this intuitive process requires constant vigilance. The Moon's visit to your compassionate sign increases your sensitivity and makes it easier to respond to what's happening without becoming exhausted or emotionally drained. However, differentiating your thoughts from those around you is tricky business, so it might be a lot more pleasurable to indulge your dreams while you can.

You are motivated to reconnect with your desires and act from the heart today, whatever the social cost. But you might discover you're too close to the edge when you find yourself flirting with the limits of acceptability. It could be frustrating if you can't execute your plan the way you've envisioned it. Don't sacrifice your authenticity, for your integrity is more important in the long run than anything else.

You might eagerly anticipate taking some time off, but you already have too much going on to walk away from your responsibilities. It's more complicated to find peace of mind today as your key planet Venus moves toward a tricky alignment. But quiet contemplation sounds better than it actually is, so stop resisting the inevitable and activate your senses instead of trying to subdue them. Embracing the unknown may be more fun than you expect.

Trying to prevent your mind from playing out every possible scenario may be an act of futility now because your thoughts are wired and your ideas are crackling with anticipation. But anxiety could set in when you realize that your intellectual meanderings won't bring you any closer to happiness. Your best bet is to push past any ambivalence you might be feeling today and pick a course of action without getting too attached to the outcome. Make a choice and let destiny take it from there.

Your ideas for the future may be more like flights of fancy today than concrete plans. However, your optimism is off the charts, inspiring you to share your thoughts with others. You might be unhappily surprised when they don't exude the same enthusiasm, possibly leaving you in an agitated frame of mind. But don't pin all your hopes on anyone else's approval. Stir up some energy on your own. Something as simple as getting outside for a walk can be just the catalyst you need to help you push past your current emotional angst.

At first, you might not like how events are turning out today yet your choices may seem extremely limited. Thankfully, you can still find ways to enjoy yourself, but you must be willing to let go of your fixed expectations. Don't waste your day looking for some mysterious secret ingredient in your recipe for a perfect experience. Instead, accept the magic of the present moment as it exists now; there is joy to be found wherever you look.

You have the power of persuasion on your side today and could rationalize almost anything you desire. You may brag that you can climb any wall placed in front of you, yet caution is heartily advised. It's not that you're mistaken in your judgment; it's just that it might be hard to find a workable balance between your logic and your emotions now. Tread lightly and don't make any promises you can't keep. You are free to imagine what's possible if you don't forget your innate sense of practicality in the process.

Although you might feel like making a quick escape today, your restlessness doesn't have to ruin your day. Even if you want to pull into your shell, pushy Mars won't leave you alone now as he insists you mix and mingle with others. Start a project that requires physical activity to drain off some of your excess frustration. You may be surprised with how much you enjoy social interactions once you feel more grounded.

Managing your emotional energy today is no simple matter as your co-ruling planet Mars shifts into high gear. Unfortunately, it might feel like you're driving uphill on an icy road. Gaining traction is hard work now, even if it's easy to visualize success. Don't struggle; if you aren't making progress, relax and just try again later when the conditions are more suited for reaching your destination. Recharge your batteries while you have the chance.

You might be hooked by a strong emotion that just won't go away. Your thoughts are not completely under your control today and the more you attempt to squelch a desire, the stronger it gets. Don't fight it; even if your head and heart are at odds, the stress will settle down on its own if you stay in touch with your inner process. Take a deep breath and keep reminding yourself that you don't have to act on every passing whim.

Although you may be lost in dreams about your future, events of the day repeatedly pull you back to the present. You could grow annoyed with the inescapable sense of urgency that pervades your life now. You are driven to initiate action right away, but a sensible solution remains just out of reach. Thankfully, you can remove the pressure by delaying major decisions until the time feels right.

Your role outside of the home and family could distract you from personal matters today. However, your problems won't magically disappear until you finally face them once and for all. Your attitude may improve if you focus your attention elsewhere for a while, rather than on your own issues. Fortunately, your heightened creativity can impress others and help them in ways you don't even expect.

You grow excited when you realize your fantasies have a solid chance of manifesting in a very tangible manner. In your perfect world, all dreams would come true on a regular basis. However, you may be over-analyzing everything now to avoid getting swept up in an illusion. Logic can help you stay grounded today, but it won't give you your final answer. You Fish know better than anyone that you can trust your intuition to guide you in the right direction.

Your enthusiasm can burn away the cobwebs and clear the debris from your path today, but that doesn't mean you'll reach your destination easily. The Moon's return to your sign may have you riding waves of self-expression, but social etiquette could prevent you from acting on your desires. There are cosmic forces at work that might complicate your progress. Don't let the uneven pace discourage you; practicing perseverance now will be rewarded in the long run.

Conflicting signals from the cosmos stir up a storm of confusion today as romantic Venus runs into non-conformist Uranus. It appears that doors are opening and you should be able to walk right through them. But something isn't quite right and your intuition is telling you to stay where you are now. Don't be so quick to push for something more; happiness may be closer than you realize if you remain open to the element of surprise.

Flitting about like a social butterfly may be your idea of fun today, but the cost of ignoring your job could be greater than you think. Unfortunately, you might not make the wisest decisions now unless you stop to consider how your behavior might affect others. However, keeping one eye on the horizon enables you to make better choices. The good news is that you can quickly shift gears and change direction once you see the truth. With a bit of conscious intention it's possible to make the most of every moment.

Being the center of attention at work can be nerve-wracking, but there isn't any real danger of getting stuck in the spotlight for long. Instead of trying to slink away unseen today, bask in the accolades that are bestowed on you while you can. This is an excellent opportunity to be appreciated for the nurturing you provide others.

You are singularly focused on planning your next big adventure, and the truth is that your wishes might manifest in ways you don't expect. But success remains elusive unless you're willing to tend to every little detail. Unfortunately, this prerequisite could be problematic today, for you're not in the mood to deal with minor matters. Nevertheless, put those blinders on and do what is necessary so you can make your dreams come true.

You may be yearning for a radical new experience that can teach you something valuable about your feelings. Normally, you prefer to shy away from the very same intensity that is now luring you into deeper emotional waters. Set aside any negativity that could stand in your way today; be courageous, for your willingness to be vulnerable demonstrates your capacity to grow.

You might be afraid to trust others today because they don't seem to share your core values. In fact, your coworkers could distract you from your real work. Nevertheless, you're still intrigued by the possibility of having fun even if you wish the noise would settle down. Trying to control all the variables is a waste of time, since rigid behavior will likely bring frustration instead of productivity. It's possible to engage in meaningful interactions by practicing flexibility without compromising your integrity.

Finding new ways to do the same old thing can bring deep satisfaction today since you have grown weary with your daily routines. You may be nearing the end of a familiar road now, but it's essential that you don't push for change prematurely. Don't let discouragement fester just because progress is taking longer than you wish. Continue to work on your own inner transformation and let the process unfold naturally.

Keeping your desires to yourself seems like a wise choice today if your feelings are drawing you into unconventional territory. However, completely suppressing a craving might actually strengthen it instead of making it go away. Your smartest strategy may be to hold your emotions close to your chest while exploring them in your fantasies. When you are ready, sharing your yearning with a trusted friend might bring you the objective perspective you need to let it go and move on.

It's wise to think twice before acting recklessly. Thankfully, this doesn't mean you have to forego your spark of originality. Consider the consequences first, but if your idea survives your precursory analysis, take a chance and be a bit more daring than usual. You can cover more ground as long as you have honorable intentions and a map to your destination.

Don't waste your precious time or energy by getting bent out of shape if someone disagrees with you today. Taking interpersonal dynamics in stride can magically transform the most challenging situation into a memorable event. Focus specifically on your actions instead of other people's judgments. Adopting an innovative approach to relationships is a safe bet while the planets are smiling favorably on you.

You may have to push past your initial discomfort today, especially if you are stuck in a cloud of self-doubt. Whatever challenges you face could seem overwhelming now, but your best move is to jump right into the thick of it without any hesitation. Remember, the first step is the hardest one. Once you gain the necessary momentum, your confidence will return and your goals will seem closer than ever.

Your emotions may be overwhelming now that the Moon is hooking up with crazy Uranus in your sign. Even if it sounds impossible, you want to experience the intensity of passion while simultaneously keeping your cool. Unfortunately, you can't play it both ways, even if you're afraid of what you must give up if you choose one over the other. Logic only takes you so far today, but trusting your instincts could put you in touch with what matters most.

You have high hopes that a romantic relationship will thrive, even if you must confront a familiar issue you prefer to avoid. You intuitively know you can't bury your head in the sand any longer, although you wish you could take the easy way out. Fortunately, facing your fears today isn't as challenging as you expected. The truth is it's much more complicated to pretend that everything is fine when it's not. Seeing things in their true light is the first step toward creating positive change.

You can sense a shift in the cosmic weather today as the winds of change chase the lingering clouds of illusion from your inner skies. You are ready to get to the bottom of something that continues to bother you, but the answers you receive now won't likely be the ones you expect. Don't be shocked by what you discover. Although persistence doesn't come naturally, your perseverance will be rewarded in the end.

Someone's compelling confession might inspire you to share more than you planned today, even if you know that you should say less. Unfortunately, once you open your mouth and begin talking, closing it becomes much more difficult. It's helpful to remind yourself throughout the day that you don't have to tell your whole life story all at once. A healthy dose of discretion will get you further than speaking too soon. You can still be a compassionate listener without saying a word.

It's time to release painful old memories so you can open your heart to the joy that is now finding its way into your life. However, getting past an emotional block doesn't mean you should just forget about your previous experiences. Denying your feelings is not a sensible strategy because you might end up being irritated without an obvious reason. Thankfully, your flexible attitude could lead to an exciting breakthrough that sends you off in an entirely new direction.

You may try to deepen a business or personal relationship now, but could encounter an unexpected response from the other person. Even if you are open to surprises, it's challenging when things don't fit into a neat and tidy package. Fortunately, this obstacle doesn't have to become a problem unless you choose to make it one. You're at the start of something new, so let the energy flow naturally instead of demanding that the tides should follow your schedule.

You are tempted to withdraw to protect your heart now, but this cautious strategy only increases your sense of isolation. The Moon's current visit to your 7th House of Partnerships raises the level of stress in relationships, especially if someone seems overly pushy today. Instead of shutting others out, take the time to understand their perspectives. Once you can see things through someone else's eyes, you are in a better position to establish common ground and feel more connected with those you love.

You have little interest in escalating a conflict now; you just want to get to the source of your anger so you can process your feelings and move on. However, the combative Aries Moon dynamically squares your key planet Pluto today, agitating emotions that could suddenly erupt. Fortunately, you are motivated to take proactive steps once you realize that clinging to the past will only bring you unhappiness. There's a bright future beckoning just around the bend if you have the courage to let go and follow your heart.

Following someone else's directions is out of the question today. No matter how crazy your idea is, you want the opportunity to give it a spin. Considering all of your different possibilities could be your favorite theme for the day, but the real payoff is not readily apparent. You Mountain Goats have the reputation of being among the most reliable signs in the zodiac. Obtaining your goals is possible today if you stop to consider what resources are required before you even start. You Bulls prefer standing on stable turf and being absolutely sure about your destination, but you're willing to tolerate a bit more uncertainty now. Everything feels less complicated than it actually is today, but you may not notice the emotional subtleties that are hiding beneath the surface. Your friends and colleagues may be annoying you today by persistently coaxing you to step outside of your comfort zone. The hectic pace of your day can wear you out with many demands at work requiring your immediate attention. A conversation about your personal life might not go as smoothly as you prefer today. You love to flit from conversation to conversation, but your eagerness to communicate doesn't mean you are emotionally accessible. A thought continues to gnaw at your attention until you finally acknowledge it and speak your piece. Your fantasies can seem so real today that you actually believe them, even if choose to leave them unfulfilled. Look right past any uncertainty today if self-doubt creeps into your emotional mix. There is a definite shift in relationship dynamics today, even if you believe the energy has grown stagnant. You normally have a no-nonsense approach to relationships and prefer to make your choices based on practical considerations. You prefer to keep your feelings private today, but you may eventually be persuaded into making them known. Expressing your pent-up frustrations adds to your problems at first. You're tempted to stick with your old goals, even if you are beginning to doubt that they still serve you any longer. Strong feelings create an undertow of tension now, setting into motion a sequence of events that pulls you off your desired course. You may claim that you're being flexible but your negotiations could run into trouble today when someone pushes you too far. Your not usually interested in hanging out in the dark corners of your subconscious mind. However, you are now being inexplicably lured into exploring heavier emotions. You may initiate evasive tactics today in an attempt to avoid sinking deeper into your watery world of feelings and your attachments to the past. If you take on too much domestic responsibility now, your obligations can tie you up into tight emotional knots. You have a clearer picture of your future now than you have had in the past, but this clarity doesn't necessarily reveal a quick way out of your present dilemma. You may be struggling with someone who is discouraging you from following your heart. You are growing more self-sufficient in your thinking as you develop a new sense of purpose. So much of your inner process is currently hidden from the view of those around you. You could be going through all the correct motions now, yet you still feel as if your progress is being thwarted. It's as if someone is working against you, yet you're not sure why. You can see all kinds of possibilities developing out on the horizon and you're eager to move from the present into the future. You may be buzzing around on the analytical planes of existence, but the real work now is found in the deeper emotional realms. Social interactions are a source of unavoidable intensity today. Although you learn a lot from conversations with friends, there could be a severe price to pay for the knowledge. You might need to accept your current position in a relationship or on the job, especially if you have set your goals so high now that you have little hope of reaching them. You may be searching for ways to advance at work, but it's difficult to concentrate on your regular duties while imagining all the amazing alternatives ahead. Keeping up with your responsibilities is exhausting work, yet you might not want to slow your pace down yet.
