It's not easy to balance your role as a fearless leader with your current craving for emotional security. Acknowledge your limitations before you receive an unwelcome reality check; adopting a practical approach is better now than aiming for an unrealistic goals.

You're highly susceptible to people's opinions now, even if their statements aren't grounded in truth. You may think your reality filters are working fine as long as your logic is intact. However, it's challenging to separate accurate perceptions from your vivid dreams today, even if you think you're using common sense. Fortunately, seeing the world through rose-colored glasses allows you to entertain a vast array of possibilities that others miss.

You should be proud of yourself for exercising patience today since cooling down your emotions prevents you from doing something you might later regret. However, you aren't willing to just let go of a significant goal now, even if it's riddled with unresolved financial issues. Untangle the intertwined threads before trying to figure out your next step. You can trust your intuition as long as your foundation is built on solid facts.

Reconsidering your spiritual goals makes sense now while metaphysical Neptune collaborates with rational Mercury. Unfortunately, your thoughts don't easily translate into direct action. Everything you do is accompanied by a symphony of hidden emotions, so take your time and consider all your options carefully before picking one to play out loud. Choosing the music is your first step to co-creating your future.

You Archers often enjoy entertaining others just for the fun of it. But your intricate stories and tall tales can act as a smokescreen that allows you to appear forthcoming today while you're actually hiding your true feelings. Don't let anyone coerce you into revealing more than you choose. Doing what someone else expects is less important now than acknowledging your own personal limits and sticking to them. Demonstrating your strength of conviction is key to your success.

You aren't very interested in what anyone has to say about your work. You may bore quickly if people aren't willing to back up their opinions with real assistance. A coworker's good idea can help you, but you could reach a point where you realize that talk isn't enough. Tell those around you exactly what you need, even if you don't expect anything to change. Fortunately, sharing your concerns shifts the dynamics, inspiring others to roll up their sleeves and support your cause.

You might be carried away on the wings of your own feelings today, making them public before taking time to consider the consequences of an emotional disclosure. There's nothing wrong with sharing your inner process in a professional context when appropriate; it's just that you can't retract what you say once it's out on the table. You can travel anywhere you want within your mind's eye. However, saying fewer words now is a better tactic than revealing too much.

You are confident that your current direction is consistent with your larger aspirations, yet others may disagree with your plans anyway. Being criticized isn't anyone's idea of fun, but it's even more challenging now because you believe your intentions are misunderstood. Don't waste your precious energy responding to someone else's negativity today. If you continue to work hard to achieve your goals, your positive results will ultimately justify your choices.

You may need to steady yourself today because maintaining your cool is healthier than dealing with the aftermath of a lack of discipline. Although you might want to congratulate yourself for making it this far, you cannot continue in the same manner forever. It's time to reconsider your impulsive behavior and rein in your extreme actions. You have been getting by lately without imposing too much structure on yourself, but making a commitment to be more responsible now can bring you the emotional stability you need.

Be cautious about negotiating away more than you should in order to enter into a favorable agreement today. Even if you know exactly what you want, you might not appreciate what you must give up until it's gone. Consider your limits before relinquishing something of value or you may end up losing your self-respect. You stand to benefit by seriously thinking about what you're about to do before you make a deal. When all else fails, allow your heart to lead you in the right direction.

There's an analytical observer within you now working overtime, making notes and plotting an ambitious course of action, even if your hectic life is filled with craziness. Thankfully, your inner-strategist isn't deterred by all the external chaos. Cultivate this adaptable aspect of your personality as you successfully navigate your way through the turbulent seas that surround you at this time. Trust your moral compass to guide you safely through the storm.

Your temporary sense of isolation might trigger an impulsive reaction today as you attempt to connect with those you love. Unfortunately, your behavior may be in direct conflict with your feelings. Even if you move beyond words, you can't sink fully into your emotions without being reminded of your dilemma. Give yourself plenty of time to let your head and your heart resolve their differences. Finding a way to honor all your needs greatly improves your chances for happiness.

The pressure to change continues to build until you discover a way to ease the source of the tension. You could choose to play the role of the rebel by stirring up every hornet's nest you find today. Although this brash approach frees you from having to follow the rules, it's not the most practical strategy. Think your plan all the way through before you do something drastic or you might realize that you have crossed the line and you can't go back. A more moderate approach may be the most intelligent one for now.

You seem to have a more profound sense of what commitments you can make and which ones to sidestep today. Oddly enough, you are being quite practical by considering how each option could affect your feelings. Although you might believe that you understand the full consequences of your current decisions now, you probably don't. Wait a few days for the energy to settle down before making your final choice.

You stand up and play your part with admirable style today, even in the face of powerful resistance. In fact, you may perform so well in these tough circumstances now that you can actually change the outcome, snatching success from the closing jaws of defeat. Nevertheless, this is a sobering time as your key planet Venus is held in check by karmic Saturn. Show your true colors by giving your absolute best no matter what happens along the way.

You're ready for a bit of fun today, but work obligations may force you to delay a previously scheduled social event. Unfortunately, resentment might simmer and start to encroach onto other areas of your life. Thankfully, you can nip a problem in the bud if you're aware of it, so watch for signs of negativity before it surfaces. Facing challenging issues now enables you to emerge from a difficult situation like the legendary Phoenix rising out of the ashes.

You could benefit from sage advice from someone you trust today, but you may have a hard time finding anyone who can meet your high expectations. Nevertheless, listen to the voices of experience, even if they don't have all the answers. A simple interaction at work could bring the breakthrough you need as long as you're open to receiving the gifts of wise counsel. When you are a student of life, everyone you meet is a teacher.

Your outlook may be quite conservative today and your cautious approach could influence your emotions, your finances and your personal relationships. You are quick to grasp the instability of the situation, yet you might not want to take an unnecessary risk now. Your methodical plan has its distinct advantages. Following your instincts by stabilizing what you have helps you avoid being swept up in the chaos around you.

The cosmic radio is playing your favorite songs today, but the planets are singing along with conflicting messages. Try not to stress out if you can't decide whether to act on your current desire for long-term emotional security or satisfy an impulse for immediate affection. Hold both sides of the spectrum in your thoughts for as long as possible. Hopefully, you can experience the best of both worlds as reality lands you somewhere in the middle.

You might think that you're not receiving enough emotional support from your closest friends now. You could even grow discouraged, but dwelling on negativity isn't the best use of today's productive planetary energy. Instead, observe your current circumstances and isolate anything that makes you feel unhappy. Share your concerns with someone who won't sugarcoat the truth. Although the conversation may not begin smoothly, a good old-fashioned heart-to-heart chat should catalyze positive change.

You're inspired by your acute awareness of all the potential that is in front of you now. You may even believe you can overcome any obstacle you meet on your path. However, your optimism creates complications, especially if you assume that you have more to offer than you actually do. Don't try to impress others with passionate promises of stellar performance. Focus your intentions on the present moment without worrying about the future; let your actions speak for you and the respect will follow.

You may believe that someone's solution to your problem will cause more trouble than it's worth. But giant Jupiter is big enough to pull the Sun slightly off center today, so it's best to stop resisting the inevitable. Sometimes your unwavering determination can inadvertently stand in the way of progress. Something needs to give; don't get yourself stuck between the proverbial rock and a hard place. Remain open to what others have to say now and demonstrate your willingness to grow from what you learn.

You want nothing more than to be a superhero today, and your enthusiasm makes it all too easy to get involved in something that is bigger than you realize. In fact, current circumstances appear to be more urgent than they actually are now. Your desire to help others motivates you to jump in before considering the consequences. Instead, reevaluate your choices before making commitments that you cannot possibly keep. Ultimately, several minor heartfelt contributions will have more positive impact than trying to do everything all at once.

It's easy to overextend your energy now because you are on the positive side of a cycle of expansion and contraction. Although a flood of emotions could unleash a burst of visionary energy, it may be a bit overwhelming to integrate the intensity. Thankfully, you can moderate the speed at which new ideas flow into awareness. However, if you are overconfident, you might take on too much all at once. It's healthier to sustain the creative stream rather than throwing caution to the wind and riding the rapids.

You may be thrilled that your recent contributions are finally being noticed now that the Sun shines on lucky Jupiter in your cheerful sign. However, the admiration you receive only continues as long as you do your part. You can't rest on your past laurels with the Moon illuminating your 1st House of Self. There are many powerful forces at play that you don't fully understand yet, so it's better not to confront them prematurely. In the meantime, keep up the hard work even if no one is watching.

You could make a choice for all the wrong reasons now if you put your fantasies ahead of the truth. Although you usually consider all the logistics, you're not immune to making a bad decision. Unfortunately, if you blindly follow your dreams, you may have to go back to the beginning and start all over again. Taking extra time to gather your data permits you to work with a new level of objectivity. You have the potential to influence your future more than you realize today if you exercise your powers of discernment.

You are currently motivated to do whatever is necessary when it comes to love or money, even if your chosen path makes your life a lot more complicated. However, you might not have much of a choice now. You must match your deepest convictions with decisive behavior if you want to earn the support of those people who are most important to you. Hold your core values high and let your integrity shine.

Your current drive to restore a sense of balance to your life is unrelenting now. Unfortunately, it's difficult to find equilibrium when you are being seduced by so many tempting opportunities. Thankfully, your career path is favored throughout the next several months, even if your ambitions are causing emotional turmoil. Be patient; don't get discouraged if the harmony you seek seems temporarily elusive. Success is yours if you don't exceed your limits or limit your potential.

An irrepressible wave of desire for adventure urges you to put a plan into motion now that your key planet Jupiter is back in the picture. Your current itch to take action is both a strength and weakness, especially if you're tempted to put your muscle toward an undertaking that is better left undone. If you are unsure of the current opportunity, wait a few days for your exuberance to settle down. Once you have reestablished a healthy perspective, you can decide on your next move without much stress at all.

You may actually believe that you know all the intricate details of what is going on in your social world. The good news is that you tend to look on the bright side of things now. Your creative juices are flowing and you should capitalize on them while you can. The bad news is that you are missing the pragmatic lens you usually use to make decisions, making it challenging to sort out your priorities. Your friends will just encourage you onward without the objectivity you really need, so when in doubt rely on your cautionary nature to save the day.

Relationship dynamics can grow so out of hand today that they become the source of emotional distress. Paradoxically, your interactions with others are not necessarily unpleasant. Your nervous system operates best under stress, shifting into survival mode when it is pushed to the brink. The adrenaline kicks in and you get to ride the tidal rush as long as you are careful not to go too fast or too far. Keep communication channels wide open for the best results.

You could have an unrealistic understanding of a current situation that's based more on your hopes than on the facts. You may attempt to engage in conversations to increase your clarity, but you still might not fully comprehend what's going on. Unfortunately, you're not likely to solve this problem by just working harder today. Mellow out and just see where the whole thing takes you before deciding your next step. Sometimes following the path of least resistance is your best option.

You may actually be enjoying the intensity of your personal relationships because superficial interactions don't seem to fully satisfy you now. You're willing to tenaciously cling to the status quo as you explore the power of deeper feelings, rather than running off to explore a new distraction. But don't try to bury any inconvenient emotions that unexpectedly surface. Acknowledging your changing whims doesn't mean you need to act on them. Being honest isn't always easy yet it's the most reliable way to build a strong foundation and a meaningful connection.

You might assume that it's unnecessary to surround yourself with lots of facts and figures since your friends will probably ride to the rescue at the last moment with the necessary details. Nevertheless, you have an important lesson to learn about relationships now, and expecting others to bail you out can interfere with the process. Do your own analysis and plot out a viable strategy so you don't waste your precious time discussing the logistics that you could handle on your own.

You're eagerly anticipating some creative playtime today because you want to make use of your current ingenuity. But instead of floating off into the clouds of illusion, it's more useful to roll up your sleeves and get down to business. However, the longer you procrastinate, the tougher it is to finish your tasks. Luckily, you can combine your desire for fun with meeting the demands of work by simply changing your attitude. Don't postpone feeling the joy; instead, whistle while you work.

Several different paths lead to the possibility of pleasure, but it's ultimately up to you to choose your direction. But first you must demonstrate that you can set your fears aside and take responsibility for your happiness. Be in the moment if you want to squeeze the most out of it. Your current willingness to take a chance now might be necessary to fulfill your dreams.

There is a great contrast between what you are doing today and how you feel about it. Logically, you know exactly what you want, yet you're still reacting from your gut. Ultimately you may be happier if your heart wins out over your logical rationalizations. Practice the art of compassion by meeting others halfway, even if you think you shouldn't compromise at all.

You may struggle to be upfront about your own desires, yet you still expect everyone else to be straightforward and share their needs with you. Unfortunately, this double standard could land you in trouble, especially if you aren't willing to let down your guard. Save your hard bargaining and poker face for some other time; you are better off today simply placing your cards face up on the table and going from there. Trust is a two-way street.

Although you could be dreaming about your long-term goals, the gathering of planets in your 2nd House of Personal Values shifts your focus back to the present moment. At first, it might seem as if you can't maintain your integrity while working to fulfill your destiny. However, you can stay true to your core beliefs by modifying your course rather than your destination. It's less about where you are going than about how you get there. Taking the high road demonstrates your strength of character.

You might believe that others don't appreciate your efforts today, and anything they do or say could provoke a nasty conflict -- even if there's nothing to fight about at all. Unfortunately, the Moon's square to the Sun in your 1st House of Self fuels difficult dynamics in your personal life. Stepping back and taking several deep breaths calms your nerves in the moment, but the passage of time helps even more. Thankfully, you can boost your confidence by channeling your excess energy into productive tasks. No one will argue with your success.

Manifesting your dreams proves to be difficult today because obsessing on making something happen can actually have the opposite effect and delay the outcome. The boisterous Leo Moon encourages you to keep others informed of your plans, but her square to the Sun in your 12th House of Privacy suggests that it's smarter to downplay your next move. Keep your final destination in sight, but remember that making many adjustments along the way can help you reach your goals faster than you expect.

You're not interested in revealing too much of your plan yet, but your motives are probably more transparent than you think. However, you can inadvertently withhold more information than is wise since it's to your advantage if others know which direction you are heading. Although you might lose a little momentum by disclosing too much too fast, you could miss a very important opportunity for personal growth if you don't take a chance and share your heart's desire.

You might be tempted to put all your hopes into one special relationship, believing that someone else will save you from your own shortcomings. Ironically, you may be hesitant to reveal your needs because you know in your heart that your expectations are unrealistic. Work within the limitations of the current situation instead of setting yourself up for disappointment later on. Fortunately, once you accept the truth you will recognize which steps to take without needing validation from anyone else.

You may be acutely aware of how old habits might prevent you from reaching your ambitious goals. The Leo Moon's presence in your 6th House of Self-Improvement works against your long-term plans by distracting you with too many details. Paradoxically, shifting your focus to the big picture might be more efficient. Working with relevant information is critical, but being buried in endless minutiae won't help your cause. Looking at the forest instead of the trees inspires you to change your ways.

You're itching to do something crazy today that goes against everyone's expectations. Your inner child doesn't want to stop to consider the consequences of your actions. Nevertheless, your sense of responsibility grows stronger throughout the day, motivating you to follow your bliss in such a way that you don't totally turn your life upside down. Thankfully, with a little forethought, you can get away with having your cake and eating it, too.

You can transform challenging work into genuine fun today, because you have enough sense to make the best of nearly any situation. You may be so clever and cunning now that people actually believe you're enjoying yourself and offer to pitch in and help. But unlike Tom Sawyer you have a surprise up your sleeve; you will paint the fence to meet your obligations even if no one else shows up. Satisfaction in a job well done is your sweet reward.

You tend to complicate your life by packing too many activities into one day. Ironically, you could accomplish even more if you stop long enough to make a sensible plan instead of flying by the seat of your pants. Although you thrive on spontaneity, it's a frivolity you can't afford now. Be realistic in your thinking and manage your time prudently until you establish a more sustainable pace.

You may have a brilliant idea that enables you to exceed someone's expectations while earning more independence in the process. You want to escape from overly rigid routines and, thankfully, your good-natured approach to work today might just be the catalyst you need. But wishing for something to change isn't enough; you must be willing to work hard in order to maximize your chance to break free.

You feel quite safe and secure while you're on your own familiar territory at home or at work today, but captivating Venus is tempting you to try something new. Nevertheless, it's not a wise idea to drop everything in search of carefree indulgences until you take care of timely financial chores. The order of things is significant, so set intelligent priorities and stick with them no matter what. Work now, play later.

You could be extremely self-critical now as you consider your recent behavior in a relationship or on the job. Nothing that anyone says to soothe you is enough to let you off your own hook. Fortunately, you don't have to be your own worst enemy; you're free to change your attitude on a moment's notice. Instead of looking back and thinking about what you could have done differently, look forward and visualize a new and improved scenario. Begin creating your future today by painting it as you see it in your imagination.

Hidden obstacles may be more problematic than the obvious ones after the Moon slips into your 12th House of Secrets today. You have a sneaking suspicion that you're missing critical information, but you can't figure out where to look for it or even what it could be. Quit running around in circles chasing after something that might not exist. Simply accept your current limitations without letting them diminish your spirit; your positive attitude makes all the difference in the world now.

You're cruising for social distractions today as the Virgo Moon is in your 11th House of Community. You're not very motivated to work now; instead, you might prefer to step outside of your comfort zone and explore new territory. Luckily, your friends will probably rise to the occasion and support your recreational plans, even if they think your idea of fun is a bit unusual. Be flexible and meet them halfway, if necessary, so you can experience the camaraderie of communing with your tribe.

Instead of accepting anyone else's authority today, take charge of your life the best way you see fit. Although others may be fully capable of contributing their expertise, your applicable knowledge gives you a distinct edge. Luckily, you can surprise everyone now with your superior organizational skills. Don't be afraid to let people know what your plan is prior to your implementation. Adopting a more inclusive approach makes it easier for friends and family to help you reach your goals.

You want to run away from your current responsibilities and escape to somewhere that no one can find you now. But it's not as if you're feeling like your regular down-to-earth self today as the Moon opposes imaginative Neptune in your 9th House of Adventure. Nevertheless, your daydreams can serve a therapeutic purpose; you don't have to travel anywhere exotic in order to feel relief. There's no need to integrate your flights of fancy with the real world as long as you keep track of which is which.

You're yearning to break out of a stagnant relationship pattern, but you have enough common sense now to bide your time and see what develops. Nevertheless, you're not likely to negotiate away your independence and won't be happy unless you express your personal freedom. Others will be more open to compromise if you show up with warmth and honesty. Your self-reliance is admirable, but beware of the emotional cost of striking out on your own.

You may believe you can drift along in a current relationship as it is, yet your friend or lover might want more of a commitment than you prefer to make today. But discussing uncomfortable issues isn't your cup of tea, even if your partner seems to thrive on the conversation. If you acquiesce without expressing your needs, you could set a bad precedence for the future. Don't just give in to someone's demands to avoid an awkward discussion; you have a lot to learn now by exploring your resistance, instead.

Although you may be looking at life through a conceptual lens today, you can be much more effective if you bring everything down to a manageable size. Rather than considering the long-term consequences of your current actions now, limit your thinking to the immediate impact. There is nothing to be gained by attempting to solve all the world's problems; just make small improvements to your own life and let the ramifications of each of your actions ripple outward naturally.

Someone's harsh words could cut deeply today, leaving you feeling hurt or even betrayed. You might even question a friend's motives and wonder about their loyalty. Your natural tendency is to defend your position while also protecting your self-esteem. However, you're being offered an opportunity to step outside of your comfort zone and learn from past mistakes. The choice is yours; seal off your boundaries to criticism or push past your fear of failure. Even one golden nugget of truth can jump start your personal growth.

It's tricky to follow through with consistent action today because your thoughts are bouncing back and forth between the small and the large. You notice every tiny detail now that the discriminating Virgo Moon aligns with superhero Mars. Meanwhile, social Venus enters uplifting Sagittarius, widening your perspective and enticing you to explore distant galaxies. Attempting to make a logical decision may be an exercise in futility; however, following a hunch just might be your best chance for success.

Your attitude determines how much you will actually accomplish today. If you concentrate on the immediate tasks at hand, you could power through your chores more efficiently than anyone might suspect. But if you scatter your energy by dreaming about the far-off future, you may end up annoyed with how much you still have to finish at the end of the day. Scale back your big thinking so you can take care of the little things first.

It's tempting to leave what you're doing if you get the chance to express your excitement competitively or impulsively run with someone else's idea today. However, it's more productive to follow through on whatever you previously started or you could suffer from harsh self-criticism later. One tactic to help you focus now is to consciously limit your activities. Walking away from your work is not a smart strategy, especially when you can channel your creativity into the present moment.

It seems as if your emotions are settling down now that the practical Virgo Moon harmonizes with Pluto and Mars. However, you might be uncharacteristically overconfident as you contemplate your next chapter. Don't trust your logic today, especially if your future looks too good to be true. Balancing your new found sense of adventure with a bit of common sense enables you to take advantage of the current planetary magic.

Finishing up an old project this weekend is a wise plan so you can be free to tackle new problems that show up next week. Unfortunately, it may not be all that simple to take care of business now because your standards are so high that you find it nearly impossible to meet your lofty expectations. Stop procrastinating; you can't delay the inevitable by ignoring what needs to be done today.

It's perfectly acceptable to be as picky as you want about your social commitments because you don't have time to waste today. But even if you have room on your schedule, it's still healthier to be the master of your own destiny than to fall in line with someone else's agenda. Nevertheless, distancing yourself from friends and family isn't useful, either. If you manage your calendar more efficiently you can hang out with others and still follow your bliss.

Broadcasting your optimism allows others to get a sense of the big picture as you see it. But you can become so enamored with your vision of the future now that you might miss what is happening right in front of your nose. Although it's hard to resist throwing yourself into another fantastic pursuit, it's more helpful to be as pragmatic as possible today. Whether you like it or not, exercising self-restraint improves your chances of reaching your goals.

You believe that you have a workable plan in place to fulfill your dreams, but it might not turn out quite as sweet as you wish. No matter how much you try to narrow your focus today, your thinking is still in an inflationary phase. However, your best ideas lose their value if you take them too far. Paradoxically, keeping your expectations in check now could actually enable you to accomplish even more.

Your friends and acquaintances could steer you in the right direction now as amicable Venus moves into your 11th House of Community. But you are still inclined to withdraw and think things through on your own. Aim to find a happy medium between losing yourself in a crowd and avoiding others altogether. Establishing stronger connections with the right people makes your investment of time worthwhile.

You may be rethinking relationship strategies now as the Moon camps out in your 7th House of Companions. No doubt, juggling your domestic responsibilities with social obligations is complicated. But, instead of flitting from one thing to another, pick one task and follow it all the way through to its conclusion. After you finish, shift gears and do something else. Staying on a narrowly defined path could bring the stability you seek so you can apply your efforts more creatively next week.

You might set out to please everyone today, but ironically could end up alienating others if you don't consider your needs, too. The sociable Libra Moon's presence in your 7th House of Companions prompts you to deny your own desires so you can take care of someone else. Unfortunately, codependency doesn't help anyone reach true satisfaction. Avoid the trappings of frustration by expressing what you want as honestly as possible. Friendship and intimacy grow from a foundation of integrity and trust.

Being of service to others isn't only a kind thing to do, it's also productive now that the Moon is in your 6th House of Work. Earning money isn't your primary concern today; helping those who are less fortunate is your top priority. Perhaps you have a personal stake in the matter and are trying to pay back a debt to society to balance old karma. In any case, it's healthy to know your limits by acknowledging what you're willing to sacrifice to achieve your altruistic goals. Making commitments is serious business, so think twice before overextending yourself.

You're searching for little ways to alter the daily routines of your life, but you don't want to upset the status quo. Perhaps you have grown tired of having so many good ideas, only to discover that the big things in your life remain unchanged. Although you may prefer to avoid thinking about uncomfortable issues, you need to make a viable plan to take you to the next level. Continue to unfold your new goals slowly now since the tiniest modifications can have the longest-lasting impact.

Family dynamics are in the spotlight when the Moon returns to your 4th House of Security today. If parenting is your main responsibility, then you could have less free time available for other activities now. Your primary motivation is about being available to those you love, even if doing so keeps you from something else you might enjoy. Fortunately, the quiet satisfaction derived from nurturing a loved one may be the greatest gift you can receive.

You long for some quiet time today so you can think about the recent twists and turns in your life. Unfortunately, the road ahead may not be very easy to navigate, so it's a sensible idea to visualize a more direct route to success. Don't be concerned if there aren't immediate changes in your circumstances; it may take some time for the current resistance to fade away. In the meantime, concentrate on reaching your destination; your unwavering determination carries more influence than you realize.

You may encounter an unexpected speed bump on the road of life today and though it requires you to slow down, there's no need for a detour. Just take unscheduled events in stride and do the best you can to maintain a healthy sense of humor. Don't succumb to discouragement, even if you face a setback now. Consider obstacles as perfect opportunities to keep fine-tuning your plan. Strengthening your body, mind and spirit increases your chances for success.

Your responsibilities aren't as simple as you had wished today, setting the tone for the entire week ahead. Don't waste precious energy trying to put on a happy face for others, just because that's what they expect from you. It isn't your job to make everyone feel comfortable with your emotional process. Nevertheless, it's up to you to ask yourself the tough questions so you can gain clarity about the next chapter of your life.

You have reached an unavoidable fork in the road. Projects that have required your attention throughout the year may be reaching a point of completion. Or you might realize things are not turning out as expected and you must cut your losses and move on. The time for talking about your dilemma is over; the Moon's presence in your 12th House of Secrecy urges you to keep your thoughts to yourself now. There's nothing to be gained from idle chit-chat today; concentrate your efforts on deciding what to hold on to and what to let go.

You don't have a lot of free time available today, but you still want to escape for a little while, anyhow. Meanwhile, your workmates keep reminding you of how many tasks you still have to complete. There are only so many hours in the day, so you may not be able to take time off to play now. Thankfully, you can accomplish much more than you realize, so your extra efforts will be rewarded. Follow the good advice you receive and attack the business at hand with a positive attitude.

An excessive amount of stress could act as a powerful catalyst today, giving you a perfect chance to prove your competence to your boss. The reflective Moon meandering through your 10th House of Career marks the culmination of your recent efforts or the beginning of an exciting new project. In either case, this is no time to relax. Don't worry if no one seems to be acknowledging your contributions yet. Keep up your ongoing commitment to excellence and the recognition will follow.

Even your well thought-out plans could meet unexpected opposition today, but your best ideas can still reach fruition if you're open to making tactical changes along the way. There's no room for false pretenses; acting as if you have all the answers won't help you achieve your goals any faster. Nevertheless, something must shift; fortunately, others are more willing to meet you halfway if you demonstrate humility. There's no need to give up if you're wise enough to modify your strategy before it's too late.

You could face a tricky situation today if you need to deal with someone who holds authority over you while remaining unsupportive of your efforts. Although this difficult climb requires extra determination to reach your destination, the process also makes you stronger. Don't complain about your obligations; just roll up your sleeves and get to work. Putting forth your best effort now eventually brings the rewards and recognition you seek.

Dealing with restrictions placed on you by a close friend or lover may be more difficult than you think today. Although your concerns are based on reality, your fears complicate the situation more than necessary. Although you might want to head for the nearest exit, the problem deepens if you avoid talking about your feelings. Thankfully, pushing past your resistance and initiating a dialogue is the first step toward resolving tension. Starting a conversation about a delicate subject is challenging, but it should get easier once the ball is rolling.

A coworker may be overly critical of your fixed nature today, but your first inclination is to entirely resist the label. In fact, you might claim that your integrity depends on your ability to stick to your values, even in the face of opposition. You could end up sabotaging your best efforts if you are too self-serving, so it's a smarter strategy to work toward a mutually beneficial outcome where everyone emerges a winner. It's less complicated to adjust your behavior preemptively than to deal with the consequences down the road.

Although you may want to share your dreams with friends, you are fully aware of how unrealistic some of your thoughts could sound. But it's not a simple task to set your boundaries if you slip into an argument with someone who responds negatively. Remember, your imagination holds the seeds for your future and there's no need to convince anyone that your fantasies could really come true. Just say what's on your mind and then get down to business. Your success might just surprise everyone, including yourself.

You could end up with more trouble than you bargained for today. Although you often keep your emotions under wrap, they could quickly rise to the surface now that the evocative Moon is in your sign. The slightest provocation might elicit a flood of passion that stems from your defense against someone who makes you feel insecure. Thankfully, your current position isn't as precarious as it seems, so don't overstate your case. Take a few deep breaths and let your unwarranted anxieties dissipate before you respond.

The more someone attempts to convince you to talk today, the less interested you are in revealing your secrets. Fortunately, you're quite capable of holding your ground, even if a very persuasive person is trying to coerce you to spill the beans. No one can force you to share anything that you choose to keep to yourself -- so politely decline to answer and just change the topic of conversation to something that's more in line with your current goals. Switching the focus alleviates the pressure and gently reminds others to back off and give you some space.

Everyone seems to have a distinct set of desires today, complicating your life with contradictory alternatives. You might be overly confident about your ability to navigate through the current emotional maze, but you can't please everyone no matter how hard you try. Nevertheless, you won't be deterred from jumping in to help while the Moon visits your 11th House of Friends and Associates. Don't hide your motives; it's better to be honest, even if it triggers a disagreement in the process. Transparency is your secret to success.

Although you may decide to suppress your desires now, it's only because you realize that sharing them could create more problems. You have a good sense of what is real and you are moved to talk your walk today. You might not be sure how to proceed, but this isn't a valid reason for inaction. You must speak the truth that previously existed only within your imagination. People will be more likely to engage you honestly if you can push past your fears and express what's in your heart.

You wish that all your relationship dreams could come true, but this may not be possible now. Fortunately, you can still be happy with your current lot in life since you prefer knowing the unvarnished truth than wandering around lost in a fantasy. But awareness works in both directions and it's your responsibility to communicate honestly, even if your message is a difficult one. Although you might feel as if you're engaged in an uphill battle, the climb is well worth the effort. A heart-to-heart talk with a close friend or lover sets the stage for future happiness.

You are preoccupied with your thoughts today, but it may be difficult to keep your mind on the sunny side of the street. Your key planet Mercury joins karmic Saturn, making you an intellectual force with which to be reckoned. Instead of falling back on your clever wit, use your considerable communication skills to dig into the mysteries hidden in the shadows. Although you might want to make light of a heavy situation, Saturn expects you to be serious when it comes to maintaining your integrity.

If you find yourself stuck in an emotional funk today, you might believe there's no easy way out. Your current situation could be bothering you enough now that it is apparent to everyone around you. There's no need to pretend when it comes to your inner process. Those who love you don't want you to hide; they want to know the real you. Taking a risk and sharing what's in your heart may seem like a scary thing to do but it's the only way to deepen a meaningful relationship.

An intense wave of self-awareness washes over you today, but the results are uncharacteristically sobering. It's not that you have lost your legendary confidence; it's just that you're not feeling very lighthearted now. Your natural tendency is to downplay negativity, but that could just make things worse. A more radical approach is in order. Invite someone special inside for a peek into your private world. Revealing your vulnerability is not the easiest path, but it could lead to the biggest transformation.

You might not know whether to stand on your soapbox and shout your truth or grit your teeth, swallow hard and keep quiet. Either way, you may wish you took a different route as your key planet Mercury bumps into Saturn's finality. There is no magical solution but you have to decide whether you can run with your ideas now or should acquiesce to someone in control. The answer to this dilemma is not as straightforward as it seems. The wisest strategy is to simply live with this paradox for a while longer. In the meantime, count your blessings; try not to take life so seriously.

You're not willing to bury your feelings today just to keep the peace. You Libras are known for your innate diplomatic skills and your natural propensity for putting the needs of others in front of your own. However, a close friend or family member might push you too far, prompting you to do some serious thinking as you reshuffle your priorities. You are at a tipping point; channel your emotional intensity into clarifying your position and then take a stand. Speak your truth and let the chips fall as they may.

It's all too easy to work yourself into a corner today as heavy Saturn leans on mental Mercury in your sign. Thankfully, you intuitively realize that you have the power to manifest the changes that are needed no matter how much effort it requires. Your self-criticism and self-judgment aren't productive now -- nor are they necessary. You are only restrained by the limitations of your own thoughts rather than by external circumstances. Give yourself new options by simply opening your mind.

You may be secretly struggling against the lessons that taskmaster Saturn is teaching you now. The good news is the hardest work is probably already completed. The time for scheming is over; whatever you do today establishes the direction for your next journey. Although you might erroneously believe that you must show progress toward your goals, forward movement isn't necessarily part of your current curriculum. Instead, accept the temporary restrictions being placed on your plans while sticking to your convictions.

You might be resigned to tear down any walls that are currently standing between you and your goals. You know that you're capable of reaching your destination, but you're tired of being the one who bears the final responsibility. For once, you wish you could just let it all fall apart. Rest assured that common sense will come to your rescue while mental Mercury works in tandem with your key planet Saturn today. Proceed with determination instead of aggression for the best results.

Your out-of-the box strategy for success may not be as effective as you think today. Instead of drawing attention to what makes you different, surprise everyone by demonstrating your ability to collaborate in a conventional manner. Although you might not get away with being eccentric now, you can break the mold of someone's expectations by cheerfully adapting to the current situation. But don't restrain your creativity any more than is necessary or you could lose your edge of brilliance.

If you are shouldering an emotional burden, you have a rare chance to finally release whatever is bothering you now. It's just not worth holding on to all your imagined worries that are based upon painful failures or old hurts. Being unnecessarily fearful is not helpful and only prevents you from feeling the love that is waiting for you just on the other side of a wall. All you have to do is open the door and let it in. Don't limit your future by clinging to your past.

You're lured very close to the edge of an emotional cliff today and you're probably ready to jump, even if you recognize the potential danger of such unorthodox behavior. Fortunately, there's a bit of planetary magic working in your favor now and somehow, gravity might not pull you crashing down to the ground. Share your thoughts or feelings with someone you trust. You may be pleasantly surprised by where the conversation leads if you're willing to take a leap of faith.

You often take a practical approach to love, but today your thoughts are enticing you to explore unconventional possibilities that are thrilling to imagine. Luckily, you're in an experimental mood and are eager to connect with someone in a radically different way. But don't venture too far too fast unless you're sure that you really want to go there. Traveling outside of your social orbit is wonderful as long as you don't get lost in space.

You are attracted to weird ideas and unusual people like a fly to honey today. You might even find yourself somewhere you've never been and wonder how you got there. You don't have the luxury of recycling your same old fantasies now; familiar territory just won't hold your attention. Enjoy playing on a new social playground, but watch for signs along the path or you could have a difficult time navigating your way back home.

Although you have high hopes about accomplishing a lot of work, save the self-judgment for another day if you're distracted by interpersonal intrigue and don't reach your goals. Rather than setting yourself up for disappointment, consider declaring a personal holiday, instead. Define your own routine without trying to fulfill everyone else's expectations. Meeting your basic obligations today doesn't mean you have to give up the special connection you have with your own dreams.

It begins to dawn on you today that your desire for freedom isn't just some passing fancy. Although you might have twinges of nostalgia for a time when your world was less complicated, the future looks brighter now than your past. An unconventional person may be encouraging you to take a chance by embarking on an adventure. But even if there's travel ahead, the real journey comes from opening your heart to the idea of something new and wildly different.

Your emotions may conflict with your logic once the moody Moon shifts into your 6th House of Details. But attempts at resolving the tension won't necessarily bring you satisfaction because you're being pulled in two directions today. Trust your instincts and take a chance on following your gut reaction. You can always reconsider your priorities in a couple of days when your cool-headed analysis kicks back in and your common sense returns.

You wish you could believe what others tell you, but you may realize that someone is stretching the truth today. Ironically, a little white lie doesn't bother you much now as long as you like what you're being told. Anyway, you might try to hide your feelings because you're drawn to things out of the ordinary. Nevertheless, flirty Venus harmonizes with quirky Uranus, so taking the extra step and sharing your fantasy can be fun. Nearly anything is possible as long as you don't get hung up on unnecessary details.

At first glance your escape plan appears to be in order today, but reality may not support your optimistic conclusions. Nevertheless, you can break out of the mold you're stuck in by imagining your life drastically different than it is now. Although you might want to manifest your vision right away, accept the fact that it's going to take time. Instead of feeling frustrated about being caught between two worlds, give yourself permission to enjoy your fantasy in the moment. Practice patience; the next phase of your journey is just around the bend.

Your fantasies become irresistible as they grow more complex and less likely to come true. But your current desires might be leading you down a totally unfamiliar path and the closer you get to the end, the more uncertain you are about your choice. There is a fine line between your unbridled imagination and what's actually possible now. Fortunately, if you're willing to let your thoughts roam and then trust where they take you, you could actually manifest the impossible dream.

You ambitious Mountain Goats are known for your down-to-earth practicality, and normally you competently manage the details of your life as needed. But now you're more interested in dreaming about a quick escape than taking care of the business at hand. Although you're not entirely convinced that abandoning your commitments is wise, you should be able to get away with letting a few things slide today. Thankfully, if you have been responsible all along, you can rest on your laurels, cut loose and have some fun.

This can be a perfect day to fall in love with someone, whether or not you're on the lookout for romance. Magnetic Venus connects with your key planet Uranus, electrifying your nervous system with natural charisma and irrepressible desires. There's no need to worry about losing stability now; it's merely the possible thrill that captures your attention. However, it's still not advisable to act on every impulse. As boring as it sounds, consider the consequences before doing something you might later regret.

If you could casually slip into another dimension now, the sky would be filled with rainbows, unicorns would be frolicking and your favorite music would be playing. Happily, today's imaginative Sun-Neptune square means you don't have to travel to a parallel universe for your maximum pleasure. Everything desirable seems as if it's right around the next corner, even if you never actually get there. Instead of trying to make all your dreams come true in the moment, pick the most amazing one and strive to manifest it over the days ahead.

Putting your calendar in order sounds like a sensible thing to do today, but it may be challenging to follow through with your original plans when so many people seem to want a piece of your day. You wish you could placate all involved, but your good intentions aren't enough to fit everything into place. Managing potential scheduling conflicts requires your undivided attention, yet your vivid imagination can still interfere with your ability to focus. Enjoy the company of others the best you can without trying to please everyone except yourself.

Although your relatives might not understand your unpredictable behavior now, they are willing to put up with it until they determine if your plan is worth supporting. However, your current impatience seems out of place since no one else is in a hurry. Paradoxically, you wouldn't appear so rushed if you were feeling more confident; time is running out and you don't want to be left behind. There's no need to waste words; just work diligently toward reaching satisfaction and let events unfold at their own pace.

Everyone seems to be talking up a storm today, but no one has the time to really listen. You have important things to say, but aren't sure how to work your newly formed ideas into the flow. Don't give up; your smartest strategy now is to let someone prattle on about a personal interest and then politely change the subject when the conversation lulls. Carefully choosing your words encourages others to do the same.

You are lulled into a surreal mental space today, but the emotionally detached Aquarius Moon inspires you to use your intellect to interpret the mysterious symbols of your dreams. However, this logical approach may be a dead-end strategy because rational analysis won't likely uncover any hidden meanings. Instead, set your imagination free and you'll remember what your subconscious mind is trying to tell you when you least expect it.

You don't want to be distracted by anyone now because you're trying to figure out how to navigate the current time crunch. Ultimately, you can create additional stress by concentrating on the future before you respond to a more immediate situation first. Thankfully, the conceptual Aquarius Moon's visit to your 7th House of Partners brings people into your life who believe they have the answers you seek. The good news is that being receptive to the brilliance of others could improve your game without slowing down your progress.

You want to be an integral part of the social activities today but you don't like leaving a project only partially completed. Thankfully, you can be quite methodical, enabling you to finish just in the nick of time. But you may have to let a few details fall to the wayside. Eliminating non-essential tasks frees you up to proactively address a potential problem, rather than waiting for it to turn into a minor disaster. Setting priorities early on and sticking to them is the key to your success.

Living in your dreamworld was fine for a little escape, but it's time to reclaim your power now by telling others what you want. Nevertheless, it's not a good idea to let your personal preferences stand in the way of your enjoyment today. However, you can keep your destination in mind while still relaxing into the flow of the day's events. Recheck your GPS tomorrow and then recalculate your route if necessary.

You won't be satisfied with social pleasantries today unless they connect you with your friends and relatives on a deeper emotional level. However, your manner of expressing your needs can sound overly complex to others, prompting them to make a hasty retreat. Although your desires could be thwarted by someone who has a very different agenda than you, don't try to convince anyone else to adopt your perspective. The more you sell your point of view, the less chance there is for finding compromise. Oddly enough, respecting the opinions of others leads to the intimacy you seek.

You may believe you have a practical strategy to complete your chores before indulging in any holiday festivities today. However, your idealistic solution might fall apart once you start executing your plans. You could underestimate how much time a job will take, or maybe you discover that you're missing an important tool. Either way, working faster isn't the answer. Ironically, you'll finish sooner if you slow down your pace, leaving you with plenty of breathing room before the fun begins.

Social obligations are like the fly in your ointment today. You want to spend quality time with friends and family, but you resent the fact that they expect you to contribute to the day in specific ways. Your personal needs may diverge from those of the group, creating a gulf between you and others. Don't let your unresolved anxieties or unsatisfied desires prevent you from feeling the love. Count your blessings and express your gratitude while you have the chance.

You seem to be attracted to nearly anything that allows you to lose yourself into a crowd today. But you won't be able to run away from your problems since you just keep bumping into the same issues again and again. Rather than trying to sidestep a difficult emotional dynamic, just stay fully present with your feelings. You might be pleasantly surprised by what happens when you're willing to demonstrate your emotional vulnerability.

Reality is giving you permission now to luxuriate in the rich symbolism of your imagination. Of course, you're no stranger to the act of invisibly slipping behind the veil of consciousness. However, putting your dreams to work today is more complicated than it seems. Thankfully, you don't have to make your next move yet;  just let your mind wander without any specific agenda. Instead of pushing to further your personal vision, celebrate the camaraderie you share with those you love.

You're willing to join in the celebration as long as your future is looking bright; just make sure your imagination isn't playing tricks on you now. It's not necessarily a good strategy to focus all your energy on the possibilities ahead while there is still plenty of work to be done in the present moment. The most intelligent course of action is to take care of your current obligations without getting distracted by gambling on things to come. Tomorrow doesn't come with a guarantee, so make the most of today.

A radically new approach looks good on paper because you realize that the same old plan won't help you reach your goals. However, you're still tempted to play it safe since your fear of failure encourages maintaining the status quo. Nevertheless, you accomplish more if you overcome self-doubt and take a calculated risk. Don't let an important opportunity slip through your fingers; seize the moment and run.

You may be feeling quite clever as you tap dance around a decision in order to get out of making a commitment. Like it or not, concentrating on a singular goal could be your best possible move today. Normally, you excel at keeping multiple options open so you can wait until the very last moment before picking one. However, the sooner you choose now, the better your chances of success.

You're so captivated by your fantasies today that your actual experiences may fall short of your expectations. But living in your dreamworld could create emotional distance between you and those you love. You really don't want to isolate yourself; you just need more breathing room now. Temporarily retreating is easier than confronting reality if you are unhappy with a current situation. However, you can learn a significant truth about your heart by leaning into your fears instead of avoiding them.

You may plan on sailing through calm waters today, but there's still an intense storm brewing on the horizon. Fortunately, you can prepare yourself so you won't be caught off guard when the winds whip up and the seas grow rough. Actually, you're almost eager for an opportunity to show off your high level of competency. Ultimately, if you don't become complacent, this unexpected challenge can raise your profile and boost your self-confidence.

Normally, organizing details is the fuel to your fire, helping you achieve your goals in an efficient manner. However, you may be weary of always having to be the practical one and you long for your imagination to lift you out of your current rut. However, it could be quite challenging to bring your grandiose visions down to earth today. Luckily, you can make magic now if you give yourself permission to be creative without worrying about the results.

You're itching to find new avenues of self-expression now with the non-conformist Aquarius Moon hanging out in your 5th House of Creativity. But it's possible to be so driven to tell your story that you appear uncharacteristically inattentive to the needs of others. The stressful Moon-Mercury square makes it difficult for you to say the right thing and your message might be misinterpreted. Sharing your truth is an admirable ambition as long as you balance the give and take. Listen as much as you talk.

Your opinions are highly intuitive today but you can't necessarily back them up with tangible facts. You must be careful how you express your feelings because it's easy to put so much intensity into every word that others mistake your passion for anger. Nevertheless, focusing on the bigger picture frees you from any perceived negativity. Allowing for a variety of personal preferences now connects you with a more spiritual vision that inspires those around you.

You sound so wise to others today that you can amaze them with your philosophical thoughts. But turning your powerful visions into something solid is impossible, especially if you're dashing off to explore the next great idea the moment after you share the previous one. Trying to prove your intelligence could backfire now if you don't take sufficient time to apply some common sense to your thinking. Actions speak louder than words.

You may seem to have a laissez-faire attitude about your obligations today, but you're not nearly as disengaged as you appear. It's just that you are trying to balance your worldly ambitions with more spiritual pursuits. The problem is that you need some quiet time for contemplation; self-reflection inspires you to be more sympathetic to other people's needs. This compassionate spirit magnifies the good feelings between you and your associates, enabling you to accomplish even more in the long run.

You're highly motivated to be productive today, yet you also want to take time and enjoy the camaraderie between you and others. However, traversing this territory can be tricky, since it's harder to maintain a healthy perspective on your goals if you lose your objectivity. It's nearly impossible now to know exactly where to draw the line between work and play. Ask someone you trust for advice, but make sure you heed the feedback you receive to save yourself from regret.

Your vivid imagination often guides you better than the facts, but you need to be very careful about blindly following your intuition today. Take time to corroborate your hunches with someone in authority or you might discover that you missed an important piece of information. Your inner world is still a significant source of inspiration; just remember to perform a reality check before jumping to any erroneous conclusions. Backing up your instincts with irrefutable logic is a winning formula.

You are ready for a change in direction in order to increase your chances of reaching your long-term goals. You might even plan a retreat to contemplate your options, especially if you have been burning the candles at both ends. Making time for solitude now may be challenging but it's a wise move. Oddly enough, the more complicated it is to schedule a bit of downtime, the more you need it. Listen to your inner voice of inspiration to find the answers you seek.

Although you may be quite comfortable working alone, participating in a group activity might be exactly what you need now. You are able to strengthen your conviction in your individual objectives if you share your vision with like-minded people. But it's easy to get swept up in a cause that's larger than your own. Remember, contributing as an integral member of a team is admirable, but it could backfire if you sacrifice your personal goals in the process. Maintain a healthy perspective for the best results.

You could run into resistance today, but it's hard to put your finger on the source of the problem. You might be afraid that you'll lose your sense of identity if you take other people's feelings to heart. But you're able to hold your ground now better than you think. The obstacles to your success will begin to dissipate if you stay on the same track without spending too much time questioning the intelligence of your chosen path. Trust that your inner guide won't steer you wrong.

You are eager to immerse yourself into the refreshing deep sea of emotions, but others might not want to join you in your underwater adventure. Today's watery Pisces Moon is an antidote for your recent emotional detachment. Your parched soul is now able to reconnect with what's important and unexpected rewards are yours if you're willing to dig for sunken treasure on your own. Exploring your feelings may feel lonely at first but it's worth it in the long run.

You take pride in being known as the life of the party, but the Moon's visit to your 8th House of Intimacy reveals a much deeper facet of your personality. You're currently motivated to raise complicated issues that lack quick and easy solutions. However, expressing your heartfelt desires today can lead to profound discussions that intensify an important relationship. Initiating an honest dialogue allows others to get to know the real you.

You may grow annoyed if no one seems to be working as diligently as you. The Moon's visit to your 7th House of Others emphasizes all aspects of your partnerships today, but your obsession with the details might be perceived as unsolicited criticism. It's not helpful to try to solve anyone's problems or attempt to change someone who falls short of your expectations. Instead, make room in your heart for all the imperfections that you see in those around you and allow them to be human. Looking through the eyes of love inspires you to see the best in everyone.

You have several projects to do around the house today, but you're unsure of the best way to get started. You might think that making a list will help you focus, but even that could prove to be a daunting task. Although over-planning your day is tempting, it's wiser to stay flexible and take everything one step at a time. Don't judge yourself harshly if you're not making a lot of visible progress now. Trust the process; sometimes the most important things are the ones you cannot see.

Finding pleasure is a top priority while the Moon travels through your 5th House of Enjoyment, but you experience conflict between your desires and your values. Luckily, your private matters need not interfere with your outer world today if you can effectively manage your emotions. Although you often struggle as you try to separate your head from your heart, staying in touch with your feelings now enables you to process them internally, without others having to know your personal business. Keep the peace by sharing on a need-to-know basis only.

Your cheerful facade successfully hides tears and fears from other people's view today but you still might feel overwhelmed because you can't seem to fully control your emotions. Your first inclination is to avoid conversations that stir hurtful memories rather than trying to process your feelings. However, you may experience welcome relief if you express what's in your heart. Although a quick fix is unlikely, gradual resolution is possible once everyone knows where you stand.

The more you struggle to regain control over your schedule today, the harder it is to keep everything on track. However, all is not lost if satisfaction is elusive. There's no need to fret because you're likely better off than you realize. Nevertheless, it could take a few days yet to appreciate how much progress you have already made. Focus on the big picture now; you are running a marathon, not a sprint.

Financial issues can give you a headache today if there are so many choices to make that you don't know which way to turn. Fiscal matters are further complicated if your top advisers are offering conflicting strategies today. You might need to set aside all the facts, stop the endless analysis and just follow whatever you feel in your gut. Don't bother justifying your decisions now; simply do what your instincts suggest and let the cards fall where they may.

Your behavior could be confusing to others today, especially if they expect you to act in a rational manner. But the Moon's monthly visit to your sign increases your unpredictability because your feelings are in the process of changing. Meanwhile, lunar squares to the Sun and Venus heighten the dynamic conflict between your inner and outer worlds now. However, there's no need to fake objectivity for the sake of everyone else. Swimming in the waters of your imagination makes you one happy Fish.

You might not know what to do with the brilliant ideas that pop into your head today. Ironically, friends and coworkers grow less convinced that your approach is valid the more you try to explain it. They may agree with your position in theory, but they're not sure you can transform your clever strategy into a practical plan. It won't help to ramble on about your vision for the future. Save your long speeches for another day; for now, lead with actions rather than words. Success is the best revenge.

You believe you're standing on solid ground but you probably won't have such a firm grip on reality today. At first you claim that you're in control, but you are more likely to cause confusion when you contradict yourself later on. Although you can cleverly explain a complicated concept now, it's more challenging to just give simple directions. A wise person knows his limitations; let someone else temporarily take the reins until your clarity returns.

You may try to think rationally today, but it's challenging to finish sentences if your ideas drift off into the mists of illusion and fantasy. It's a struggle to stay on track now while trickster Mercury squares irrational Neptune. Your facts are fuzzy and your judgment is warped so wait a couple of days and then reconsider your options before doing anything drastic. Spend time cultivating your daydreams while you can.

It's to your advantage to clam up and remain as silent as possible today. If you practice discretion, you might just come out of a tangled emotional web appearing as if you are a real hero. Although seeing both sides of a conflict is difficult now, you still realize there are no straightforward solutions. In fact, pretending to have the answer will just create disappointment. If you have something crucial to add to the discussion, it will grow more relevant over the days ahead.

It's very reassuring when you can express your creativity through your work duties or domestic chores. However, it's quite disconcerting if you cannot. Your current situation could be complicated by a close friend or coworker who isn't communicating clearly. You prefer to have the support and admiration of those around you, especially when you're trying to finalize a decision. But you don't need an adoring audience; believing in yourself is more than enough.

This is an unusual but exciting day, and you're more inclined to tell a story or write a poem than organize your plans for the holidays. You want everyone to acknowledge your efficiency, but concentrating on details requires a major commitment today. Don't set yourself up for failure by trying to deliver something beyond your current capabilities. There's nothing wrong with losing yourself in a fantasy for a while; you can always return to reality tomorrow.

The Scales symbolize your innate commitment to seeking balance, even when it's nowhere to be found. You might end up spinning your wheels today if you believe you can rely on logic to locate the calm eye of the storm. But you won't reestablish your center of gravity by keeping still now. Your natural grace arises from being one with the flow rather than trying to cling to the status quo.

You're in no mood to argue with someone who seems to have all the answers since you don't feel the need to prove anything today. It's not that you would necessarily lose a fight; it's just that you recognize the wisdom of taking the high road to avoid unnecessary conflict. Communicate your facts clearly without adopting a defensive stance. Everyone can come out a winner if the competition is called off before it even gets under way.

You can transform a rather mundane day into a magical one if you don't attempt to resolve the dualistic way you approach life today. On one hand, you're thinking like an analytical scientist, carefully observing every situation in a cool and detached manner. But on the other hand, you're like an artist, directly engaging your experiences by responding with a wide spectrum of emotions. Each method offers something of value now; tune into your head and your heart at the same time without closing down either one.

You want to believe that your survival instincts won't steer you wrong today. However, you may have temporarily lost your ability to separate threads that are spun in your imagination from those that are woven with reality. Normally, you are the champion of distinguishing fact from fiction, yet the fabric of life contains both. Don't over-analyze your choices; just appreciate the magic of what you can create in the present moment.

You are moved to talk about your recent dreams, but the more you try to describe them, the less others understand. Your thoughts are elusive and don't easily fit into words, unless you have a particular spiritual discipline that inspires you to re-frame your experiences in a more positive manner. Awakening your inner artist, poet or mystic can help you understand the subtleties of your current perspective.

Unfortunately, even the most basic ideas are slippery as banana peels now. Your best bet is to put off any detailed work off until tomorrow when your concentration returns. Meanwhile, cerebral Mercury creates a dynamic square with your ruling planet Neptune, opening your imagination to worlds that exist beyond the realm of language. Instead of limiting your reality to your five senses, it's time to integrate your spiritual experiences into your everyday life.

You're looking forward to starting a new project around the home today, but your efficiency may wane as you grow nearer to your final objective. Don't let delays turn your anticipation into annoyance because they won't stop you for long. Even if everything seems to be moving slowly, progress is occurring faster than you realize. Luckily, you have a rare opportunity now to create stability in the midst of dynamic change.

The emotional imbalance in personal relationships may be unsettling now, prompting you to take direct action to improve your love life. Unexpected changes to your social calendar recently put a damper on your fun. But these surprises aren't necessarily negative ones, since you can use the additional time in a variety of ways. Develop a concrete plan that gives you the opportunity to explore your creative side instead of being distracted by circumstances beyond your control. Channel your passion into your art.

If your achievements are falling short of your expectations now, stop and reconsider your plan of attack. The first step is to make sure that you're heading in the right direction. Now that an emotional storm is subsiding, you must keep your eyes open wide so you can make the most of the recent lessons you learned. If you truly want to improve your relationships, you must trust your common sense now more than ever. You become so fond of an idea today that you can get stuck on it. Unfortunately, your stubbornness just means that reality has to yell even louder to attract your attention. There may be financial issues brewing now that are stirring up internal conflict. Sacrificing a little personal freedom to get what you need might be the right kind of compromise. You are at a critical point as you strive to reach a goal, but you may be irritated if things aren't moving along fast enough. A permanent change of direction won't come easily to you Fish since you intuitively understand that nothing is fixed in the ocean of life. Oftentimes, you can run into a wall, get up and continue in the same direction as if the obstacle has mysteriously vanished. But other times a much-needed reality check stops you in your tracks. You may have high hopes about opening your heart and sharing your feelings today as the Moon harmonizes with romantic Venus and excessive Jupiter. A measured approach brings the best results.

You are so excited by all the possibilities ahead that you could lose touch with the relationship dynamics right in front of your nose. You can work yourself up into a state of agitation today because you fear being rejected, especially if you have something significant to say. A plethora of big ideas are floating around in your head today, yet it might be too soon to let others in on your thought process. Your decisions are complicated by someone else's assumptions or limitations. You may be willing to move forward with a project or deepen a relationship, yet it takes two to tango. You don't know what to expect now because people are acting out of character. You are your own greatest enemy today if you let doubt stop you from jumping in and performing a job that you haven't done before. Achieving success starts with believing in yourself.

It doesn't matter if you are running behind on a job or not; everything still takes longer now than you originally planned. Rather than worrying about what you didn't do yesterday or making empty promises about tomorrow, focus on the present moment to increase your efficiency today. Your resistance to distractions crumbles today as you grow increasingly bored with your current work. No matter how much you analyze the situation, your first hunch is probably your best bet.

Although your friends and workmates are fantastic sources of wisdom now, the financial decisions you must make are yours alone. You may be convinced that you're right and will do nearly anything to prove your point today. Unfortunately, passion is not a viable substitute for logic. People may lose respect for you if you behave as if you're absolutely certain that everyone else is wrong. You may truly believe you're being fair-minded in your interactions with others, but maintaining objectivity is trickier than you think today.
