Although your confidence continues to grow, you might not feel ready to share your plans with anyone else yet. A sudden surge of optimism has you feeling like your old self today, but it still is wise to exercise caution when expressing your feelings. Your highly refined work ethic makes doing the right thing even more difficult today. Your smooth diplomatic charm comes in handy now, especially if others are gravitating toward conflict. You may have to stand firm against an adversary today, but your unflappable commitment to harmonious coexistence can turn a potentially explosive situation into an emotionally healing one. Your current path appears to narrow today, but this constriction doesn't prevent you from focusing on the possibilities, rather than the limitations. Your success doesn't depend on anyone else now; it's the result of your internal fortitude and relentless optimism.

People might attempt to rain on your parade today, but you have enough positive vibes to overcome their negative energy. You are a formidable opponent once you make up your mind, and you will steadfastly defend your decision today. Professional opportunities are promising, even if the background stress doesn't magically disappear. You have everything in place to create a magical day, so take the good times as they come now. However, there's no reason to be overly concerned about what's around the bend. An unusual constellation of events could pull you into an emotional exchange today. Although you may be surfing waves of unexpressed feelings, they're not strong enough to tear you away from the sweeter side of life. There's no use to stress about your inconvenient attractions today; you might as well go ahead and express them. You can feel it in your bones that something quite wonderful is going to happen. Although you don't not know what it is yet, you might anticipate the magic in every cell of your body. The constant rumbling of excitement rattles your nerves today. It's challenging to sit still because you want to physically move in resonance with your hyperactive mind. Whether people expect you to be the event planner or the peacemaker for the group, you aren't interested in playing your regular role of keeping everyone happy today. Navigating a course between your need for a quiet retreat and your desire to partake in the scheduled festivities is a delicate balancing act today. The creative juice you receive from others gives you something magical that solitude doesn't.

Your nerves are dancing to an exhilarating cosmic beat today, challenging you to stay on target if you have specific tasks that need finishing. Everything seems a bit hectic today as your thoughts anxiously run around in circles. Your ideas are bubbling up to the surface and are demanding expression today as the chatty Gemini Full Moon casts its bright light in your 3rd House of Communication. You secretly long for quality one-on-one time with a significant other now instead of getting lost in the noise of a larger group. Sudden waves of wanderlust compel you to dream about going somewhere far away as the flighty Gemini Full Moon buzzes your 9th House of Adventure today. You Archers are aiming your intentions into the distance as you dream and scheme your way into the future. You may have so many little chores to do today that you don't know where to begin. Even if you are tempted to move on to something else, persistence is your secret weapon of success.

Although you might try to maintain your control of the outer world, the thoughtful Gemini Full Moon shines in your 4th House of Security, drawing you into the inner recesses of your private emotional world. It's easier to dream about success than to achieve it today. Your thoughts present an interesting dilemma because they seem so brilliant until you try to turn them into something tangible. Pulling up the drawbridge to protect your castle may sound like a good idea now because you really don't want outsiders to know what you're feeling. A current relationship dilemma may seem larger than it really is today, and avoiding the issue won't make it go away. You might be struggling to get out of a hole you dug yourself but, thankfully, you have more power and determination than you realize. You grow more contemplative as the day wears on and you might worry about your lack of energy or your current disinterest in social activities. You may experience a strong emotional charge today, but sharing your feelings openly is an entirely different matter. Your preoccupation with home and family issues could put you in an awkward situation today, especially if others are expecting you to show up with a smile on your face. You feel the familiar stirrings of deep emotions bubble up into awareness as the mystical Moon returns to fellow water sign Cancer. You're approaching the end of the road, but you are confident that another route will soon appear to take you in a different direction. In fact, you have been eagerly anticipating this change and now that it's almost here, it's quite irritating that you're still dealing with the old stuff rather than pushing off into new territory. Practicing patience helps, but it's going to be hard to finish up your current tasks while you're so busy thinking about the future. Nevertheless, doing everything in the proper order today makes it easier to achieve success tomorrow.

Your uncertain future reflects your lingering fears. Even if you think you know what's best for you and your loved ones, everything seems to be blown out of proportion now and you are having a tough time putting all the pieces back into perspective. You may ask others for their input; however, they are not going to give you the reality factor you need today. Only time and continued soul-searching will answer your questions. Patience, grasshopper; your current worries won't hold you back for long.

Normally, you're attracted to the unconventional and the unexpected, but traveling unfamiliar highways may be slightly unsettling today. Thankfully, there are no immediate dangers -- just your free-floating anxiety to distract you. You might think your bearings are off and you're not sure which way to turn. Paradoxically, fully accepting your temporary loss of direction reduces the stress so you can find your sense of humor and navigate your way back to familiar ground.

The oddest thing about your current situation is that the more you accomplish, the more you realize how much work there is still left to do. Unfortunately, you can't just walk away from your obligations now. You might even have to put extra effort into what seems like an impossible task. Forget about the final goal since you're not going to arrive there today, anyhow. Meanwhile, keep in mind that everything you do along the way can have a positive and lasting influence on the future.

You may have a sinking feeling today as you realize that your actions aren't necessarily supporting your desires. Ironically, you're still tempted to continue on your current path of denial by ignoring your intuition. Remember, your happiness depends on stopping long enough to listen to your heart. Your natural instincts aren't useful if you keep overriding them with rational analysis and empty justifications. Don't leave your intellect in control now; have faith in what the universe is trying to tell you.

You might be stuck behind a wall of worry, holding onto old beliefs that are no longer relevant to your current situation. Nevertheless, you still could create convincing stories to justify your fears today. But self-doubt isn't helpful and only increases your sense of isolation. Rather than clinging to the past, envision the future just as you wish to see it. Focusing on positive affirmations is the most reliable way to improve the odds for your success.

There's no need to stay in constant motion today, even if you enjoy running around. Although you might not accomplish your goals while moving at high speeds, you could be happily surprised with how much you can finish by slowing down just a little. However, you may need to make other changes, too. Instead of trying to demonstrate your cleverness to everyone, listening more attentively will sufficiently impress others.

Finding the right words to accurately describe your feelings isn't always easy. However, the reflective Moon is back in your introspective sign, increasing your emotional sensitivity and making you more aware of your inner process. Unfortunately, being clear about your needs is complicated now since your moods are shifting so quickly. You may be happy one moment and sad the next, so it's crucial to inform others that your disclosures are authentic, even if your thoughts are still in flux.

Your confidence soars now that your goals are in sight, but the cosmic forces remind you that everything still takes longer than you expect. You might end up feeling disappointed if you mistakenly believe that you can push the river faster than it's already flowing. However, you should be able to relax today once you remember that all water reaches the sea exactly on time. Be smart and allow current events to follow their own natural course without any unnecessary pressure on your part.

Performing mental gymnastics might be a clever way to maintain your illusion of control today. However, there's nothing to be gained now by struggling with your analysis of a crucial relationship issue. Sticking to the facts isn't helpful because important information may be revealed to you through the symbols in your imagination. Obstacles are easier to overcome once you acknowledge the significance of your dreams even if they don't make sense yet. Not everything that's important can be measured or described.

You usually don't like playing the role of a mother hen, but the nurturing Cancer Moon's presence in your 10th House of Responsibility encourages you to stick your nose in everyone else's business. Unfortunately, it's nearly impossible to distinguish between your need to be in control and your well-intentioned desire to support others. Still, everyone benefits from your intervention if you're willing to stop to re-examine your motives prior to offering a helping hand.

Unexpected events at work might require so much of your undivided attention today that you forget to check in with your feelings. However, your emotions can explode into consciousness if you try to bury them for too long. Thankfully, reconnecting with your center is one of the smartest things you can do with your time. Once you overcome your initial resistance, fear dissipates and your reluctance morphs into the sweet anticipation of what comes next.

A surprising emotional encounter isn't usually enough to adversely affect your natural optimism, yet you might forget to count your blessings today. Although you can sidestep the oncoming negativity if you have the sense to move quickly, you may feel like a deer as it fearfully stares into the oncoming headlights. Nevertheless, you are the master of your own destiny and a passionate exchange could put you in touch with an important spiritual truth that carries you out of danger.

You may grow annoyed with a close friend who seems overly needy today. Unfortunately, you might even misinterpret someone's emotional behavior as an apparent sign of weakness, especially if you don't want your own feelings to stand in the way of your ambitions. Be careful; suppressing your more vulnerable side creates the wrong impression. Ironically, being open about your discomfort with another person's problems can actually lead to cultivating a deeper and more meaningful relationship.

Don't waste any valuable time brooding over how others perceive you today. Thankfully, you are likely to receive emotional support from your close friends and family, inspiring you to move through your fears pretty quickly now. Shifting your focus away from your inner world and onto external events helps you maintain a positive attitude so you can make the most of the day. Let your freak flag fly; those who know you appreciate the fact that you dance to a different drummer.

An unspoken attraction could suddenly morph into an obsession today, especially if you are trying to ignore strong feelings you have for someone special. But pretending that your desires don't exist is not a healthy strategy because your unexpressed feelings gain power if they remain in the dark. Your secret to happiness is knowing that you can acknowledge what you want without necessarily acting on it now. Sometimes fantasies are best left to the imagination.

Patience is a virtue, but it's not an easy one to master for an impulsive Ram. Fortunately, you are more receptive to learning about the benefits of waiting when the reflective Moon is shining in tenacious Cancer. You can enjoy the present moment even more if you don't push too hard. There is no reason to struggle today; a current idea will reach fruition only when it's ready and not when you think it should.

You have a sneaking suspicion that you can't put off hard work for much longer. Your key planet Venus soars in idealistic Sagittarius but lands in realistic Capricorn tomorrow; you intuitively know that you can hang onto your romantic dreams one more day before coming back down to earth. However, you don't have to wait. Heeding your internal voice of reason today empowers you to act preemptively and prevent an unnecessary setback. The sooner you shift gears, the better.

Relationship dynamics are at the forefront of your thoughts today as the gentle Cancer Moon misaligns with romantic Venus in your 7th House of Others. Unfortunately, nothing is gained by automatically placing someone else's needs ahead of yours. Naturally, altruistic acts of love can be emotionally and spiritually transforming, but not if you are avoiding important issues of your own. Taking care of yourself first allows you to give someone special a more meaningful gift later.

Your current behavior is motivated by your desire to make good feelings last longer now that the Moon is highlighting your nurturing sign. But you might feel as if everything is moving too quickly for your taste, prompting you to seek ways to slow down the pace of events. Thankfully, time is on your side. Be patient and observe what's happening in the present moment rather than trying to manipulate events in order to get what you want. Paradoxically, letting go of your expectations may be the most direct route to achieving satisfaction.

You may feel as if you're in the eye of a hurricane today; even though storms of change are raging around you, you manage to remain centered and unwavering as you continue on your path. But you might have to make several adjustments to your plans now as you respond to the fluctuating circumstances. Even if you get swept up in the intensity of the moment, your positive attitude enables you to stay on track. Keep calm and let your courage be your guide.

Your social life is the source of complications now, motivating you to pull into your shell until the emotional dynamics settle down. Although your assessment of the situation is probably accurate, it's challenging to maintain a balanced perspective while the moody Cancer Moon is transiting through your 11th House of Friends. You might be overly concerned about not fitting in with the group. Follow your instincts; giving everyone a little breathing room may be all that's needed to clear the air and restore harmony.

Sometimes it's not healthy to let your dreams spill over into your waking hours, but now they can be a valuable source of solace and even inspiration. Your ruling planet Venus reminds you of the importance of your hopes today as she spends her last day in visionary Sagittarius. There's no reason to hold back as you explore the possibilities ahead within the privacy of your imagination. However, don't expect all your wishes to come true right away. Seek satisfaction in what's real while also honoring your ideal vision for the future.

Although you could be treading a fine line between passion and anger now, others might not notice you are on edge. This isn't because of anyone else's insensitivity; it's the result of your skillful ability to hide your feelings. Keeping quiet for another day may be long enough to give you the time needed to untangle your complex desires. It's better to make a rational decision than one based on an impulsive reaction. Trees that grow slowly bear the best fruit.

You may have an endless stream of exciting ideas to lead you into the future, but your energy level might not match your dreams. The security-conscious Cancer Moon challenges you to balance your natural wanderlust with your current need for emotional stability. Suddenly, staying home could sound more appealing than running off to some exotic destination. Instead of trying to reconcile your conflicting desires, make enough room in your schedule for both rest and play. Take time to recharge your batteries so you have enough stamina for the adventures ahead.

Your social and career ambitions are extremely important to you, but sometimes it's healthy to set your goals aside for a while. The introspective Cancer Moon harmonizes with your ruling planet Saturn today, enabling you to relax and enjoy yourself instead of worrying about climbing the ladder of success. Your responsibilities aren't going anywhere, but you'll feel rejuvenated and better equipped to tackle your work after you return from a playful excursion. There's no limit to what you can accomplish when you're at your best.

Although others may think you're emotionally aloof or just plain weird, you are comfortable with your logical approach to life. Ironically, you might not be able to avoid your feelings today, even if you prefer to present a cool and carefree exterior. Don't resist the strong emotional currents as your changing moods draw you out of your head and into your heart. Showing your vulnerability could actually strengthen your connection with someone you love.

You're fully in touch with your feelings today, even if you're wary of sharing them with anyone else. Maybe you don't want to burden a friend with your emotional process or, perhaps, you're fearful of being rejected if you share your truth. Either way, inaccurate assumptions could stand between you and your happiness. Don't fall victim to your own negativity now. If you muster up enough courage to ask for what you want, you might be pleasantly surprised with the response.

You're not in the mood to play by anyone else's rules today, but your rebellious attitude can create problems if you just do the opposite of whatever you are told. Striking out on your own may seem like the best course of action, but your efforts won't lead to a positive outcome now unless you also take time to listen to others. Don't lose sight of your dreams, but remember to soften your stance so you don't needlessly alienate your allies. You gain more support if you're willing to be a team player.

At times you seem stubborn for no obvious reason, yet you may have an excellent justification for maintaining the status quo today. Unfortunately, you might find it challenging to explain your motives to others because you are so confident now that you could sound self-righteous. Although you're not likely to change your mind, demonstrating a bit of flexibility in your thinking can help you to get what you want. Accommodating others doesn't mean you have to surrender your convictions.

Your plans to network with others could run into unexpected glitches today because everyone seems to have his or her own agenda. Fortunately, you can have a positive impact on the flow of events by concentrating on long-term goals now instead of short-term frustrations. Simply shifting your perspective alleviates pressures that might otherwise evoke conflict. Tempering your extreme reactions improves your chances for establishing meaningful connections.

Coworkers might be so passionate about their ideas that you feel like retreating to insulate yourself from the intensity. You don't want to be coerced into making a choice before you're ready, so you're tempted to withdraw without fully revealing your feelings. However, your fears can exacerbate a tricky situation. Instead of seeking solitude now, admit your sensitivity and ask your associates to wait until you make up your mind. You don't have to compromise your core beliefs in order to listen with an open mind.

You may enthusiastically respond to someone's social invitation without even checking your calendar now that the reactive Moon is back in your sign. Unfortunately, you might discover that you said yes to one too many offers. If you don't consider what happens next, you could be unhappily surprised that your bravado steered you wrong. On the other hand, you won't have to apologize if you just remember to moderate your natural exuberance with a bit of common sense. Promise less, deliver more.

Burying your head in the sand is not the wisest approach to handling an intense emotional encounter today. You are more transparent than you realize, and others probably won't trust you if they think that you aren't being totally honest. Don't wait until your frustration reaches a boiling point before saying what's on your mind. Avoiding an argument is easy now if you remember to share your feelings calmly before they take on a life of their own.

Your need to please others leads to fun today as long as you don't have selfish motives. But your expectations can get in the way of a wonderful experience if you're only considering what's advantageous for you. Ultimately, you may struggle with control issues now, so try letting go of your attachment to any specific outcome. You might just end up experiencing more pleasure than you thought possible if you allow someone else to take charge.

You might believe that you have to stand strong today, but your worries about being judged harshly could prompt you to overstate your opinion. You may even be so rigid in your presentation that others back off because they think there's not enough room for negotiation. Fortunately, you can soften your message without weakening your conviction. Keep in mind that someone's alternative point of view doesn't necessarily threaten yours. Cultivating collaboration brings out the best in everyone.

Your optimism reaches new heights now, and you might not have the patience to listen to anyone's negativity. If someone expresses dissatisfaction with your agenda today, you could be tempted to just run off and do your own thing. Nevertheless, it's not wise to react so quickly if it means excluding others from your plans. Take a few deep breaths and give your cohorts time to come around because it will be much more fun to play in a group.

It seems as if someone is exerting unnecessary influence over you today and you don't like it one bit. Instead of burying yourself in your work to avoid a confrontation, you could be sufficiently annoyed to face it head-on -- especially if you know that you are right. However, you might inadvertently create a situation where being a winner makes someone else a loser. Rather than taking a competitive stance now, change the framework into a cooperative one where everyone comes out ahead. Adopting an inclusive approach allows your leadership skills to shine.

You prefer others to be transparent about their needs, but you're not too happy with friends or coworkers who act selfishly today. You may try to maintain your positive attitude, but you might respond with anger if someone pushes you too hard. The decision is completely in your hands; you don't have to encourage conflict. You have the power to deflect aggression by quietly holding your position and waiting things out. Taking the high road is the best way to keep the peace.

You may feel the need to put on a show at work today because you want to be appreciated for your contributions. But instead of making an unnecessary scene, just quietly go about your business since completing your chores and fulfilling your obligations will garner more respect than empty shenanigans. Doing your job well brings you more recognition in the long run. Save your song and dance for when your work is done.

You're ready to hit the accelerator and show the world what you can do now, but a more rational voice advises you to be responsible. Although you see new possibilities everywhere, consider the relationships you have already created before running off in search of something else. Even if the grass on the next hill appears greener, remember that unexplored territory often seems more colorful when viewed from a distance. Slowing down for a few weeks is a small price to pay for the potential of finding lasting satisfaction.

It seems as if you are being covered by a warm and cozy security blanket now that your key planet Venus is taking up residence in a fellow earth sign. This gentle transit might not make all your troubles disappear, but it certainly can give you a firm footing on which to improve your finances, career and love life. There's no need to be greedy now; even modest gains in any of these areas can substantially enhance the quality of your life.

Beware of unnecessary detours when it comes to relationships, since you may have a few weeks of complications ahead. You naturally prefer splashing around in the surf, but are now left unsatisfied unless you consciously tread into deeper waters. The problem is that diving into serious emotions can make you uneasy. Even if you're eager to explore your feelings, they might not easily give up the wisdom you seek. Don't wait for a push from reality; get ahead of the curve now, while you can.

You might think romance should be like a walk in the park with charming Venus now strolling through your 7th House of Partnerships. However, it's not sunshine and roses because the Goddess of Love demands more structure while within conservative Capricorn's domain. This cosmic conflict creates a bit of a problem, since you may be offered the emotional security you want, along with too many restrictions. What price are you willing to pay for a relationship? Whether it seems like it or not, the decision is all yours.

It's not that the party is completely over yet, but you might catch glimpses of a more serious future. Although all good things must come to an end, you can stretch the fun for a while with your attention to detail and commitment to work. But lighthearted play won't come easily today unless you make time for something more practical. Paradoxically, you may not be fully satisfied now unless you have a particular goal in mind.

It's not always easy to let someone get to close to you, but resourceful Venus now rides to your rescue as she travels through your 5th House of Love and Romance. This won't remove every stop sign you've carefully erected around your heart, but it can help you to be more emotionally expressive. Let your feelings flow, even if some interactions seem too scripted for your own taste. A few sprinkles of spontaneity are sufficient to spice up the stew.

You're in for a round of self-criticism as you examine the reality of your feelings, your home and those structures that cannot easily be changed. Your emotions become subservient to the everyday responsibilities of your life. Fortunately, you can still be creative and have your share of fun. Nevertheless, you must make your life work within the restrictions that are currently being imposed. Paradoxically, accepting that which cannot be changed bring a new sense of freedom.

Your professional trajectory may not be progressing as you wish. Fortunately, you're quite willing to jump in and deal with the issues. One thing is for sure: denial will not get you anywhere now. Situations that have appeared impossible in the past begin to transform and evolve right in front of your eyes. Communication is the key to your success. Start slowly and proceed with unwavering determination if you want to move mountains.

You may be somewhat unsure of your emotions today, even if you thought you knew how you felt yesterday. You normally lead with your heart, inspiring yourself and others with your passion. But, perhaps you now begin to realize that you created a relationship situation that seems to be growing too restrictive. Take responsibility for your feelings before making any moves you might regret.

In your heart of hearts, you might not believe that money and love should come without a cost. You're accustomed to working hard for what you receive and, luckily, your efforts will be rewarded. As sweet Venus moves through your sign for the next few weeks, you notice that it's easier to get along with others. In fact, it's even easier to get along with yourself. Your newly found optimism is the main theme of the month ahead. Spread joy wherever you go and enjoy others as they enjoy you.

You're more attracted to fantasy than to reality now that Venus is hiding out in your 12th House of Escapism. Nevertheless, your desires are quite real so put up whatever walls are necessary to function in your mundane world. Ultimately, your current tendency is to lock up your needs within the recesses of your subconscious while playing caretaker to someone you love. But avoid falling into the role of martyr. Push your heart into the open and build a stable foundation for your future.

Even your most meaningful encounters now take on an air of casual friendship. Passions are subdued with Venus the Goddess of Love visiting emotionally conservative Capricorn. In fact, this is a wonderful time to schedule a variety of social engagements, but the current planetary signs don't singularly emphasize romance. Whether you are a solo act or part of a duo, make time to enjoy the company of others while the cosmic energy is on your side.

You can see large patterns in complex systems, enabling you to wow everyone with your original thinking. You may be inspired when you arrive at a brilliant solution to a problem at work today, but even the best ideas won't have lasting impact unless you bring them down to earth. Nevertheless, micromanaging your progress only slows you down. Practicing a bit of emotional detachment frees you to accomplish more than you ever dreamed possible. You might be pleasantly surprised by what you can get done when you don't worry so much about the results.

You will have time to enjoy yourself today if you make sure that you keep your goals relatively simple. No matter how straightforward your tasks seem, completing them requires more effort than you think. Instead of leaving an unpleasant task for another day, pace yourself so you don't burn out before the job is finished. Get the hardest chores out of the way first so your day grows easier as it unfolds. Taking pride in your work raises the day's vibrations to a joyful level.

It's not easy for anyone to pin you down today. You aren't likely to share too many details of your inner process because you could be fearful that someone will expect more than you can deliver now. However, your worries are probably unfounded. Rather, it's your tendency to avoid making commitments that motivates your friends to want more information. Nevertheless, it isn't wise to hide your feelings; you're better off saying what's on your mind, even if it's not what others want to hear. The truth will set you free.

You have so much on your plate today that you may jump through hoops to confirm your schedule with others to prevent anything from going wrong. Unfortunately, your advanced planning could end up having the opposite effect. Your attention to detail can't compensate for overbooking your day. A lack of flexibility becomes an open invitation for a missed appointment. Leave enough time between commitments so your calendar won't topple like a fragile house of cards.

You may be tempted to start a new project today, but it's more productive to build on work you already have in progress. Even if you're bored with what you're doing now, don't fall into the trap of believing that you can have more fun if you were only participating in an entirely different game. Changing your current strategy won't necessarily make you any happier; when it comes down to it, you only have to change your attitude. A positive approach makes you a better team player when it counts the most.

It's natural to focus on each individual component of a job today, but you might become so involved with what you're doing that you lose track of your overall goals. Balancing your narrow concentration with global thinking may be a familiar trouble spot, but now you're aware of the problems that can arise when going to either extreme. Keeping both perspectives in your current awareness allows you to accomplish more than you expect.

You might not want to continue on your current path because you're searching for a new adventure. Making changes within the confines of your fantasies is easy, but it's much more difficult to do it in the real world. Dreaming about your ideal future helps you feel better in the present moment, but you have to return to reality sooner or later. Thankfully, a small modification to your daily routine may be all that's needed to alter your direction.

Your friends might believe they are supporting you, but you may not be happy with the way they show it today. You prefer one-hundred-percent honesty, yet you really don't like anyone telling you what to do. If you already have a plan in place, you want others to offer friendly advice now rather than criticize you. Nevertheless, you may be wiser to accept that they mean well and be thankful for their concern. Count yourself lucky to have people in your corner who really care.

You can talk circles around others today but your silver tongue doesn't make executing your plan any less complicated. Although you might believe you know the best route to your destination, you can't tell whether or not you're making progress unless you set measurable milestones along the way. Don't wait until the end to see if you're successful. Instead, break your project down into small manageable tasks and step through them one at a time. Yard by yard it's hard; inch by inch it's a cinch.

It's crucial to balance your personal ambitions with what's already on your calendar for today. However, you might have to cooperate with others, even if they don't possess the same level of clarity that you do. Although you intuitively know what's right, it's challenging to explain your choices to anyone else. Don't waste your energy trying to justify your behavior now; just go ahead and do whatever is necessary. You can always share your logic after the fact if you are so inclined.

You feel driven to convince others to work on a pet project with you today. Even if you don't have to involve anyone else in your decision-making process, you can still gain great benefit from enlisting the approval of your friends or colleagues. Keep your expectations to a minimum or you'll feel discouraged if your goals aren't fully supported by your peers. Share your plans and then listen carefully to the feedback you receive before heading off on your own.

Choosing how much effort to put toward garnering support for your long-term goals is a delicate matter today. You can sound desperate if you're overly insistent, making others less eager to help you. However, it could be just as problematic if you're so cocky that you appear totally self-sufficient. Remember, your positive outlook works in your favor now if you're clear about your intentions right from the start.

You might give the impression that you're invincible today and nothing will prevent you from fulfilling your promises. Nevertheless, there is an inkling of insecurity arising from the dark recesses of your subconscious. You can behave with all the bravado you want, but your actions won't hide your growing suspicion that you don't have it all together. Acknowledge the warnings of your inner voice, but don't waste time doubting your abilities. Seeing things exactly as they are offers you the best chance for success.

You are receiving plenty of encouragement from your friends, family and fans today. This unsolicited support is largely due to how well your emotions are currently integrated with your actions, allowing others to know the true you. Nevertheless, you may still be uncertain about recent choices you made that impact those closest to you. Even if you don't have all the answers now, just be sincere about your intentions and you can't go wrong.

The intensity may be slowly settling down, but it doesn't seem fast enough to you. There are still powerful emotions floating around in the atmosphere and it makes you slightly uncomfortable. But at least you have somewhere to go with your feelings and you no longer feel as trapped as you did. However, don't plan your escape too quickly because there are still lessons to learn from the situation as the energy plays on through to its conclusion.

Whether you are counting the coins in your piggy bank, balancing your checking account or submitting a purchase offer on a million dollar property, it all comes back to basics. If you have unfinished financial business, now would be a propitious time to tie up loose ends. The question is how much effort should you put into the details? Unfortunately, no one has the answer but you; become your own conscientious taskmaster and your efforts will pay off.

Spiritual mysteries may seem more fascinating now as you receive indecipherable signals from the hidden realms. Perhaps your intuition is working overtime and your sixth sense is picking up some new information that will probably get you into trouble if you act on it. Even if you decide to follow your instincts, keeping others informed about your choices enables everyone to be on the same page.

Sometimes it's logical to set rationality aside and trust in your feelings. Oddly enough, irrationality has its own special place in your orderly world, too. Let the cascade of emotions and images flow from your subconscious mind into awareness without your normal filters, pushing past the limitations that have been holding you back for too long. Facts are important, but now it's time to temporarily put them on the back burner. Open your heart and let the magic begin.

Once again, you find yourself playing the role of a diplomat as you attempt to ameliorate the building tension. No matter how persuasive you may be today, there are still things that you just cannot make go away with a positive attitude and a charming smile. Fortunately, your optimism isn't wasted since your well-intended actions can help patch up a difficult situation when others might have walked away. Do what you do best and create common ground.

All the bright colors of the rainbow mysteriously blend together to become invisible. Ironically, this is science at work; however, it may feel like magic as the mixture of positive and negative forces now combine into an even more powerful energy. Fear and shame alchemically transform into love and compassion, enabling you to move your life in the direction that is best for all involved.

There is no stopping you now if your motives are clear, so make certain that you are heading in the right direction before you're too far down the path. It's not that you are so off-track in your thinking these days. It's just that there is an irritating voice in the back of your head yelling out warnings, telling you to proceed with caution. Listen to your intuition and then follow your heart.

Your cool and collected rational brain is working at its peak and optimistically influences your thoughts. Usually, you tend toward conserving energy for when you might need it in the future. However, your intuition tells you that everything can work out for the best if you move forward with your agenda. Remember, you must practically apply your positive feelings for them to have any lasting effect.

Those closest to you are reflecting your most powerful dreams right back at you now. It's as if they already know what is best for you, and are encouraging you to act accordingly. Listen to the advice you are receiving, but also stay aware that everything looks a little better than it is in reality. However, just because you're wearing rose-colored glasses doesn't mean that you should let the current opportunities slip away. While you're deciding what to do, make sure that everyone knows how much you appreciate their support.

It is uncharacteristic of you to make a big deal about your work, but something inside you is itching to get the recognition that you deserve. In your opinion, everyone wastes too much energy on activities just to get noticed. Meanwhile, you prefer playing the invisible martyr, performing your job without too much fuss and fanfare. Nevertheless, letting the spotlight fall on you now won't hurt. In fact, the opposite is true; the attention just might do you a world of good.

You can have an amazing day as long as you remember to take your common sense along with you while dancing in the clouds. If you cannot contain your enthusiasm, you run the risk of flying too high -- and then there could be a heavy price to pay. It's not worth feeling good for a short amount of time, only to realize that you've gone a step too far. Tread lightly to keep your illusions from crashing to the ground.

You have an uncanny ability to recover your energy and reestablish your balance, even if you are feeling a bit off today. In fact, your optimistic outlook inspires you to make the most of pretty much everything that comes your way now. You can visualize potential everywhere you look, and with a bit of effort, you're able to accomplish nearly anything you set out to do. Challenges are just opportunities waiting to happen.

You are totally jazzed about all the possibilities ahead of you today. But even though you love the variety of your options, you still need to make some hard choices. Fortunately, if you're willing to commit to one path, you can set a very powerful cycle into motion. Think about what you need to do to push your plan forward and make your mark. For now, reality is the stuff of dreams.

You are shown a silver lining to a dark cloud that has been following you around. However, this revelation isn't about ignoring the real issues or discovering a quick fix. You can see the best possible outcome in your mind's eye, as if you are coloring in all the missing details. The extraordinary part of this dynamic is that you can magically weave your dreams into the fabric of your life. There's no reason to wait for a better opportunity when the best one is already right in front of your nose.

You feel like a lucky Lion today because you're moving in harmony with an inherently prosperous universe and rewards just seem to manifest. But wonderful things aren't happening to you; you are co-creating positive energy in cahoots with bountiful Jupiter's alignment with the Sun in your 5th House of Self-Expression. All you need to do is let your confidence lead the way, but don't let it turn to arrogance. Fortunately, you can set the stage now for success to blossom if you're intent on following your dreams and willing to keep your ego in check.

You might not have to go anywhere today to receive a positive sign from the cosmos. Good news finds you even if you are hiding out at home. You might misjudge the significance of a social event, especially if you feel as if you are being coerced to attend. Remember, showing up willingly for a loved one can ultimately create sweet memories that last for years to come.

You can make substantial gains today as you appear more optimistic than you actually feel. However, your current progress is about neither fame nor fortune. It's more about the quality of your personal interactions. Remember, good feelings that come from close friendships are, in themselves, great spiritual blessings which are now yours for the asking. There's no need to edit your story to make it sound more enticing; you're perfect just as you are.

Increasing the stability in any part of your life is advantageous now, for even during these times of big change it's nice to know that you can hold it together. You might even be able to amplify this planetary gift today by turning a current challenge into even greater fiscal security. Whether you have been consciously waiting for the right moment to make your move or simply procrastinating, the time is now. Take a deep breath and a giant leap of faith.

Obstacles that have plagued your progress may magically disappear now, leaving you wide-eyed and bushy-tailed as you try to envision the open road ahead. The Sun in your sign is resonating with generous Jupiter, who is now ready to deliver his auspicious goods at your front door. All you need to do is ask, but be careful about making your wish list too long. Requesting more than you need is a trap. Don't be greedy; over-indulgences will not be looked upon favorably by the Karma Police.

Nearly everyone seems to be impressed with your apparent spontaneity and abandon, but you have probably rehearsed your current actions in the safety of your mind more than once. You look as if you are dancing on the edge now, but in reality you are quite secure in your position. Nevertheless, have fun while the spotlight is shining on you and your competence is being applauded by an admiring audience.

For some unknown reason, people seem to enjoy indulging you today and you're eager to let them. Perhaps your good luck is the result of your past behavior, but there's no need to analyze things on a deeper level now. The support of friends and family can make an important difference by bolstering your confidence and opening doors to unexpected opportunities. Embrace the love; make the most of your social life while it is in full bloom.

The high-intensity planetary charge won't go away today, even if your nervous energy diminishes as the day unfolds. You're in a creative groove and exude effortless charm now that the Sun and graceful Venus align with visionary Neptune in your sign. Thankfully, you can immerse yourself in everything you do without suffering from emotional burnout. Even if your love life cools down a bit, your career may be very hot. One way or another, something wonderful is knocking at your door, so hurry up and let it in.

You may be quick to disagree with someone today because you secretly hope to stir up a lively debate, even if you don't want to create lasting conflict. Nevertheless, you could attack the wrong person if you don't watch what you say. Being aware of the intensity of your reactions now can help to minimize drama and alleviate the volatile tension before it erupts. Channel your anger into creating positive change.

Although you prefer taking a down-to-earth approach to conflict at work, it feels as if you're heading out into a sea of complexity now. Powerful emotions rise to the surface today if someone confronts you about your recent behavior. Attempting to defend yourself by justifying your actions could be a waste of time and energy, whether or not the accusation is true. An apology is in order if you are guilty, but just let it go if you're not. Anything you can do to keep the energy calm is helpful. Think long-term solutions rather than quick fixes for the best results.

Even if you wake up on the wrong side of the bed today, life grows brighter and brighter as the day wears on. You may need to deal with an obstacle that has been placed in your path by your boss or some other authority figure. However, you don't have to confront the problem head-on today when you can simply acknowledge it by dancing around its edges. Although everything seems so urgent, even the most intense feelings will require time to transform into actions. But denial is not a viable option; accepting the challenge to change is the first step to improving your life.

Today you could find yourself in the midst of a fierce emotional confrontation that pulls you into deeper waters. However, you inadvertently make matters worse if you try to avoid any unresolved issues. Listen to your intuition, for the shadows won't hide the truth from you now. You might even discover a treasure in the most unlikely places if you have the courage to stick with the process when it gets messy.

You might sense that an unavoidable power struggle is brewing. Intense interactions with a family member or close friend may even open the floodgates of unexpressed emotions today. You could agitate things even further now by revealing a surprise of your own. However, it's wise to think before you speak or you will only complicate the situation even more. Demonstrate your strength of character by smiling and leaving all the drama behind.

You may obsessively seek a simplistic fix to a complex problem today, spinning your all-too-analytical mind into overdrive. Your frustration stems from not being able to separate one situation from another; everything seems to be interrelated now. It's pointless to keep going over the same details again and again. Things will begin to make more sense when you accept that logic won't bring you the solutions you're hoping to find. In the meantime, fire up your right brain and practice a little creative problem solving instead.

You might wish that the current relationship stress would quietly dissipate on its own now, but it won't vanish until you face the issues that are bothering you. You may have to stand up to someone's emotional intensity; fortunately, you can hold your ground today as long as your actions are consistent with your feelings. Push through your anxiety and self-judgments as quickly as possible. You have the power to reestablish harmony if you simply just show up and be true to yourself.

Your psychic radar is picking up a subterranean current of feelings running deeper than any you have recently experienced. On one hand, this is quite a thrill, since you're fascinated by the mystery and believe that you're getting close to discovering something very significant. On the other hand, you are fearful of losing yourself in this powerful energy. Nevertheless, it's safe to let go once you know where you stand in your heart.

Your adrenaline drives you to take care of unfinished business early in the day, but your expectations may be unrealistically high now. Although you wish that you could cross everything off your list, at some point you must accept that you need to leave some tasks incomplete. Ironically, once you relinquish control you might even find enough time to relax for a bit. Skillfully managing the flow between work and play today helps pave the most reliable road to success.

You don't like it one bit if someone pressures you to participate in a group activity when you prefer to be alone. But don't turn your current penchant for privacy into a an emotional showdown or you might just end up exhausting yourself in the process. Save your energy for a more important fight; instead, change your attitude and resign yourself to fulfilling your social obligations without a fuss. Your willingness to be a team player could turn time with others into a treat rather than a chore.

You find yourself at odds with nearly anyone who is wielding authority today, even if he or she has done little to rattle your cage. Someone might attempt to manipulate you, but you could provoke an entirely different set of problems if you fight back. Unfortunately, it's hard to avoid a conflict once a debate is in progress. Stand up for yourself, but keep the focus on the main points so things don't go awry. Listen as much as you speak to maintain the peace.

You might not feel confident about finishing your chores now because it's challenging to keep your thoughts focused on repetitive tasks. However, you could still be very productive if you stretch your mind beyond the present moment. Give yourself permission to dream while you work; visualizing the future creates a more meaningful path for you to follow. Plant seeds in your fertile imagination today and harvest the fruits of your labor tomorrow.

You may be living under the illusion that you can finish all your work or, at least, make solid progress toward your current goals. However, you might end up spinning your wheels in order to spend time with someone who tugs on your heartstrings. Unfortunately, your relationship expectations could be unrealistic now that vulnerable Venus connects with buoyant Jupiter in your 5th House of Love. Forget about chasing the impossible dream because you have a better chance of finding happiness today by pursuing a more responsible path.

You're ready to head off on a wild adventure, but your common sense is telling you to exercise caution as your key planet Venus plods through conservative Capricorn. If you're still involved in serious negotiations, don't rush your response because you could view the current situation in an overly flattering light. Allow a few days to see where your feelings go before saying yes to a proposition that's not really what you want. In the meantime, take a more practical approach by balancing your current desires with what you have to offer in return.

Relationship issues have taken a turn toward the melodramatic now. You're finally willing to let your demands slide today, but the power of your intensity still shines through. You're more likely to be interested in hearing about what others want, especially if you've already taken a risk and put your needs out in the open. Thankfully, the odds are tilted in your favor, so don't give in too quickly. Exploring what you have in common with your partner is healthy as long as you don't compromise your values in the process.

You can't wait to share your radical new ideas about your future, but they may be so outrageous that you're likely to feel let down later when you return to earth. Scale back your expectations before you discover your limitations the hard way. Remain open to taking an entirely different path, but don't try to force change yet. Exercising flexibility can save you from having to face unnecessary discouragement in the days ahead. No hurry, no worry; your secret strength is your natural ability to go with the flow.

Your vulnerability might make you uncomfortable with a current situation at work today. Nevertheless, find a way to express what's in your heart without turning anyone into a scapegoat. In fact, you set up barriers to your happiness as soon as you slip into any kind of blame. Discuss your concerns with a trusted friend when you get a chance, but take full responsibility for your emotions. Ironically, nothing has to change; you will feel better about the whole situation once you know that you have been seen and heard.

All of a sudden, romance seems more of a priority now that affectionate Venus is traveling through your 5th House of Love and Play. Juggling current obligations with your desire for fun could muddy the waters between you and a friend. Although your actions speak loudly, your words also pack a powerful punch. Explaining your intentions as clearly as you can opens the door to more meaningful interactions. Find the sweet spot between being practical and following your heart.

It may be smarter to hold onto your current job for a while longer even if you've been considering ways to break out of the status quo. Unfortunately, your positive outlook alone isn't sufficient to resolve all the underlying problems. This is no time for complacency because making minor adjustments to your daily routine now could create much more impact than you realize. Don't worry; big changes are still on the horizon. In the meantime, take care of your immediate responsibilities while keeping a hopeful eye on the future.

Sometimes you are so disappointed by other people's responses to your heartfelt disclosures that you decide to withhold your true feelings so you don't upset those you love. However, you can confidently share your feelings without self-restraint today because diplomatic Venus' presence in your 3th House of Communication softens the hard edges of your message. Thankfully, expressing your truth with kindness now could get you exactly what you want.

An ongoing disagreement about your core beliefs may be temporarily set aside today as a fair compromise is on the negotiating table. However, the underlying tension is still present and must be handled eventually. Putting your differences of opinion on hold now doesn't mean your conversations have to be superficial. Establishing sufficient common ground allows you to make steady progress on other issues of concern that can also be resolved at this time. As Einstein wrote, "ninety-nine percent of genius is knowing what's important."

You want to take care of everyone's needs at work now that the nurturing Moon is camping out in your 10th House of Career. You might find yourself in over your head, even if your intentions are honorable. Fortunately, others appreciate your efforts and won't judge you unfairly if you fall short of your goals. Set healthy priorities so you don't spread yourself too thin today. Thankfully, the ripple effect works in your favor; you never know how much good one simple deed can manifest.

It's no simple task to keep other people's problems separate from your own because you're hypersensitive to everyone's feelings today. You may believe that you have enough ingenuity to fix all the world's problems now, only to realize that your resources are limited in scope. Instead of trying to be a superhero, just offer your emotional support and a shoulder to lean on. Speak from your heart; the right words have the power to heal in ways you can't imagine.

There's an irresistible sparkle in your eyes and a bounce in your step that make it a pleasure to be in your company today. Luckily, you can parlay your cosmic good fortune into something even better if you're willing to close up shop to build a new one. But instead of just telling others what you want, go out of your way to bring happiness to those you love. Your generosity will be paid back to you many times over if your heart is in the right place.

Keeping your feet on the ground isn't an easy matter today, for you're tempted to set aside the basic facts to chase an unreachable fantasy. Although ignoring the truth may seem like a clever idea, you can't escape your obligations by just slipping off into another dimension. Fortunately, you can still make good use of your imagination without having to fool anyone if you have the courage to take responsibility for your actions. Walk your talk and you will come out on top.

You are pulled in opposite directions today because you truly want to take care of serious issues as they arise. Paradoxically, you simultaneously wish you could put them off for a while longer. Your innate no-nonsense approach prompts you to deal with unfinished business right away, but you may be at the mercy of your ruling planet Venus as she entices you with more pleasurable pursuits. Keeping up appearances at work provides you with enough cover to get away with a bit of mischief without rocking the boat.

Life seems a little less intense today and you may relax your concerns about how to make everything work. You feel a lighter energy blowing in like a tropical breeze, inspiring you to see the upside of almost any situation. Although your positive attitude usually works in your favor, you might overstep your limits now by ignoring your feelings just because they're inconvenient. Focus on the truth instead of the easy way out. The right mix of positivity and practicality is the secret to your success.

Your intuition is operating at a high level of efficiency now that the reflective Moon is traveling through perceptive Scorpio. However, you still might attempt to bury your feelings if you see the possibility of pursuing pleasure, rather than truth. Having solid data on which to build your plans is ideal, but objectivity is elusive today as your daydreams leak into the real world. Remember, facts can only take you so far while your imagination carries you wherever you want to go.

You're suddenly intrigued by the hidden mysteries of the cosmos and you want to know what's going on beneath the surface. However, this metaphysical fascination is at odds with a more primal desire that arises from the pleasure center of your brain. Although detaching from your feelings sounds like a workable strategy, dreams of real intimacy lure you back into your heart. More isn't always better; you can enjoy a rainbow for its inherent beauty without having to dig for a pot of gold, too.

Opportunities abound to cultivate new friendships or even become romantically attracted to someone you meet through your job. However, others might become more emotional than you prefer, motivating you to withdraw into your shell. But the only way to develop enduring relationships built on strong foundations is to stick around even when you feel uncomfortable. Surprisingly, letting go of your resistance to emotional expression can also be the key to unleashing your creativity.

A shift of cosmic energy drives you to seek extra emotional intensity in all interactions now. You might even want to re-energize a current relationship or create sparks in a new one. However, you're not sure if shiny lights and romantic fantasies are distracting you from the real work at hand. The good news is you don't have to choose; walking in both worlds today enables you to enjoy the fun and games while also making connections on a deeper and more meaningful level.

You may have your heart set on an impossible partnership, yet compassion is overtaking passion now as your top priority. The Moon's shift into your sign reminds you to establish new relationship priorities and her trine to spiritual Neptune raises the bar of excellence. Unfortunately, finding satisfaction in the real world is challenging when your dreams are so idealistic. Ironically, reconnecting with your inner self strengthens your bonds with others. Just remember, happiness is more likely to be found if you don't expect perfection from anyone, including yourself.

You're a proponent of professional camaraderie, but are not so interested in pursuing anything beyond a bit of entertaining conversation today if it interferes with accomplishing your goals. However, don't be too self-critical if you can't seem to make much headway on your work. Give yourself permission to kick off your shoes and dance. Luckily, you'll have a chance later in the week to make up for any lack of productivity now.

You might be so deeply entrenched in the status quo that you struggle with an ongoing shift of power in your business world. Even if you think that stirring up the energy at work is necessary now, the uncertainty in the air still makes you nervous. Remove the pressure by taking a few more days to decide your next move. However, you can't stop the wheels of progress for long. Once you make up your mind, you can assume an important leadership role in the transformation. But in the meantime, fly beneath the radar for the best results.

It seems as if you are being granted an unexpected reprieve today because you suddenly have more time to reach your goals. Thankfully, you're quite optimistic about your chances for success, so you can play it cool without worrying about making too many changes. Although there's no need to panic or finish everything right away, there is also no reason to restrain your creativity. Now that assertive Mars is back in your sign, just follow your instincts and let your convictions work their magic. Nature will take its course and pull you along for the ride.

Indulging in your favorite daydreams is addictive, so it's essential to balance your fantasies with reality. However, the Moon's sweet trine to imaginative Neptune in your sign makes it tricky to find the dividing line between fact and fiction now. Instead of struggling to gain clarity today, relax and go with the flow. There is much wisdom to be discovered from your current exploration of the metaphysical realms. Trust the process; you'll be back in the real world before you know it.

The distinction between friendship and courtship might be a subtle one now, but it's crucial to be conscious of the difference. Even if you're not seeking more from a relationship, you still can benefit greatly from being aware of your emotions whether expressed or not. However, you don't need to do anything special in order to attain love. Your current lesson is learned by fully experiencing the desires of your heart without attempting to make anyone else responsible for your happiness.

You could withdraw from an interaction with a friend today because the energy has grown too intense and you believe that it isn't leading in a direction that serves your best interests. However, your urgent need to establish firm boundaries doesn't necessarily mean the relationship isn't a healthy one; it simply clarifies a limitation that is wise to acknowledge. Recognizing the truth frees you from confusion of unexpressed assumptions. Navigating carefully around emotional landmines now might be enough to put things back on track.

You may have a detailed picture of exactly what you want to do today, yet nagging self-doubt stands in your way of explaining your plans to anyone else. You might worry that your words won't clearly express what's in your mind. Instead of taking an extemporaneous approach and making it up as you go, think about your message before opening your mouth. But don't be so rigid that there's no give and take. Once you share your initial thoughts, let the conversation flow back and forth organically, without worrying about where it leads.

You might be afraid that you recently overstepped someone's boundaries and wonder if you should apologize and retreat. However, you could feel even more insecure once you express your regret. Fortunately, you probably weren't as far out of line as you think, so it may not be necessary to say anything about it at all. Still, displaying your vulnerability reveals a hidden part of you and is a constructive way to increase the emotional bond with a significant person in your life. The choice is yours; but you'll never know the truth unless you take a risk and speak your piece.

Suppressing your annoyance is challenging if a friend misunderstands you today. Your frustration might already be obvious because of a recent disagreement between the two of you; however, the apparent gulf probably seems wider than it is in reality. Recalling another time when you resolved a problem by sharing your feelings can guide you through the current situation. Make the first move and express what's on your mind now. Opening communication channels not only helps others understand your point of view but also could bring you closer in the process.

You don't necessarily believe you deserve any extra recognition for your efforts at work, but ironically, you might feel hurt today if you aren't acknowledged by your peers. You know you have been doing more than your fair share, so it's not too much of a stretch to dream about receiving a raise or, at least, a pat on the back. However, it's not productive to dwell on your fantasies now, so quickly process any disappointment you experience and get back to the tasks at hand. True validation of a job well done comes from within.

You rationally know all the reasons why you can't have everything you want now, but intellectual awareness doesn't diminish your desires. However, it's helpful to realize that some of the restraints may be self-imposed and arise from your fear of being vulnerable when you're being so honest. Go ahead and share your feelings but don't push your luck too far. The simple act of initiating a conversation can open the door to emotional fulfillment as long as your expectations aren't set in stone.

You are sometimes attracted to the shady side of Love Street where the Sun doesn't shine. You understand that sweet delights and emotional goodies are possible once you work your way through the darker feelings that hide in the shadows. However, you may be stuck today, unable to push through old negative patterns. There's no need to be overly concerned, but don't slip into denial either. Learn from every experience; the clouds will clear soon enough, leaving you wiser and happier than before your journey began.

You might try to gloss over a persistent relationship dilemma with clever conversation and witty jokes. You may subscribe to the belief that focusing on a problem could actually make it worse. However, avoiding your feelings is more damaging to a lasting partnership now than directly facing the truth -- even if it makes you nervous. Demonstrate your courage by willingly digging into the most intense issues. The formula is simple: if you do your emotional processing today, you should feel like your old self tomorrow.

You can feel the electrical tension in the air now, making your hair stand on end. It's as if you know an emotional storm is brewing on the horizon, even if the current dynamics seem serenely calm. The fact of the matter is it's going to take time for life to return to normal. The good news is that you sense the anticipation of positive changes around the next bend. But don't wait to see what happens next; instead, create a concrete plan for exactly what you envision for your future and then get busy making it happen.

The surreal quality of your life could be disconcerting because you don't understand where the strange energy is coming from. However, it may not be the best use of your time to deconstruct the principles at work. Instead, work hard to manifest your fantasies without trying to explain the deeper meaning of everything. Focus on the mundane rather than the metaphysical. Start by asking for exactly what you want. But remember, it's just as important to be in a receptive frame of mind when the future arrives as you want it.

Your high ideals motivate you and others to do amazing things today. Your strength of conviction originates from your unwavering compassion, yet it's your ability to maintain objectivity now that makes you so effective. Detaching from an emotional situation doesn't mean you care any less; in fact, it gives you the impetus to separate your personal desires from the needs of a larger group. But don't expect miracles to happen overnight; a small amount of progress goes a long way toward reaching your altruistic goals.

You could inadvertently become emotionally hooked by someone else's agenda today. However, participating in an unnecessary melodrama makes it tough to get your own work done. Thankfully, it shouldn't take long to acknowledge that things cannot continue along the same path. You are sensible enough now to change your attitude which can put control of the day back in your hands. Prioritize what you want to accomplish and then reach for your goals with confidence. Combining integrity with persistence is an unbeatable strategy.

Nothing is gained by escalating a disagreement because conflict won't likely lead to a positive resolution today. Nevertheless, there are no valid reasons to be afraid of standing up for your convictions, but only when it feels right. Even if you have already formed your opinions, it's still wise to maintain a low-key profile for a while longer. You can say what's on your mind later without running as much risk of encountering opposition. Timing is everything when it comes to keeping the peace.

You might feel as if you're being ignored today, but making a scene to attract attention is a waste of precious energy. Just let events unfold naturally because your efforts will be taken more seriously later in the afternoon when the Moon conjuncts authoritative Saturn. You may not have to do anything special to get noticed if you simply stay flexible in your approach to work. Maintain a positive attitude and your interactions with friends and coworkers should continue to improve throughout the day.

You may attempt to sidestep a challenging issue today, especially if you and a loved one have conflicting opinions on the subject. But even if you think you can successfully hide your feelings, you won't be able to avoid reality all day long. Nevertheless, it's best to give your emotions time to settle before jumping into a conversation that you might regret. Taking a rational approach enables you to communicate your position in an effective and compassionate manner.

You are taking your responsibilities so seriously today that it's tricky to find time for a bit of well-deserved fun. You might have the urge to cut loose for a while but you could end up returning to a mess. Procrastination is not your friend now, so shift into gear and get to work. But don't fret about finishing every job you start. The first steps are the hardest ones; once you set a consistent pace, the rest will fall into place without so much struggle on your part.

Staying on track at work is nearly impossible today because you are aware of so many exciting possibilities ahead. However, you may scare yourself with such a vast array of choices, prompting you to do nothing at all for fear of failure. Understandably, the big picture could be overwhelming if you can't break it down into smaller and more manageable tasks. Thankfully, proactively scaling back your plans before they get overly complicated saves you from unnecessary headaches later on.

You cannot avoid your domestic responsibilities today, especially if you made promises that you must keep. Thankfully, your commitment to following through with your obligations doesn't have to prevent you from having some fun along the way. You can turn the most mundane tasks into totally fascinating diversions now with a simple change of attitude. Let your creativity shine, even while attending to routine chores. Whistle while you work.

Your fiscal condition may be on the upswing, but don't let this good fortune be an excuse to spend money before it's in your bank account. You still have a fair amount of work to finish now before you reap the tangible rewards you seek, so wait to count your chickens until after they hatch. It's easy to be tempted by good news before it arrives, but remember that there aren't any quick shortcuts to achieving success.

You receive a cosmic boost of energy when the evocative Moon bounces into your fiery sign this afternoon, lifting your spirits and reconnecting you with your heart. Nevertheless, this isn't a smart time to become complacent because you still must be extra-diligent in order to overcome the challenges ahead. Luckily, your growing confidence enhances your ability to handle nearly any situation that arises. Believing in yourself is half the battle.

You're a study in paradox today because you can be wildly optimistic and extremely pessimistic at the very same time. Normally, these opposing viewpoints would cancel each other out, leaving you somewhere in the middle. But now you're able to hold onto a positive perspective, even if you're less certain about specific aspects of your life. Ultimately, it's your more ambitious side that motivates you to create change. Putting in the hard work is still necessary if you want to climb the ladder of success.

You realize how much you can accomplish if you join forces with others who share your beliefs. Fortunately, your spiritual approach to life combines well with your desire to connect with like-minded individuals now that the uplifting Sagittarius Moon is traveling through your 11th House of Groups. No matter how this extroverted social energy plays out, it's time to make the most out of this moment by participating in something that's larger than your individual story.

Maintaining a healthy balance between your professional and personal worlds is less complicated today if you honor the feelings of your friends and family. In fact, it's nearly impossible to keep emotions out of the workplace now that the moody Moon is visiting your 10th House of Public Responsibility. But nurturing those you love isn't just about smothering them with affection. A simple act of unconditional support might be enough to encourage others to step out of their shells and shine.

Risking your emotional security seems like a worthwhile gamble today, but an unsuccessful shortcut might require you to go back over the same territory until you learn your lesson. Unfortunately, you may be so entranced by the current excitement that you can't remember your past mistakes. You can trick yourself into believing there's a quick fix when there's none to be found. There's no way around it; the road to success will take time and hard work. A change in attitude will do you a world of good.

You might start the day assuming it won't be  hard to ignore your unconventional desires today because you don't want to jeopardize your standing within your family or community. However, denying your true feelings doesn't help matters one bit. Sensual Venus squares rebellious Uranus, turning your down-to-earth tastes into more eclectic attractions. Share your feelings with a trusted friend before you do something you regret. Walking on the wild side could be fun, but tempering your actions with common sense keeps you from going over the edge.

You are often more flexible in your attitude than most of your friends, and today you could take your mental gymnastics to an entirely new level. You can get on other people's nerves now because you want to leave so many options open. You may be afraid that making a commitment too soon prevents you from being available for a better opportunity later. However, waiting too long might actually cause you to miss something deeply satisfying that is right in front of your nose. Stop thinking so much and trust your instincts instead.

You are not eager to jeopardize the stability of your relationships for the fleeting possibility of an amazing experience. Nevertheless, you're attracted to engaging in unconventional behavior, even if it places a strain on your social life. Keep in mind that you can still accept your current desires if they are outside of your comfort zone. Acknowledging an irrational urge doesn't mean that you must act on it. Exploring all the alternatives in the safety of your imagination may be enough to satisfy your current curiosity.

You are riding a wave of adrenaline that makes you feel fully alive, but you may grow tired of getting bounced around by your crazy desires today. One minute you're singing the praises of a romance, and the next you're wondering about the wisdom of your heart. These extreme swings of attraction and uncertainty will pass if you don't overreact with emotions on either end of the spectrum. Enjoy the rush, but don't let your relationships suffer in the process.

You might become temporarily tongue-tied today as your desires lead you into uncharted territory. Instead of eagerly exploring your emotions, you're tempted to sidestep what's in your heart, believing it's easier to maintain a detached perspective when you stay in your head. However, you could inadvertently bring on the emotional meltdown you're trying so desperately to avoid unless you're willing to step beyond the limits of your rational thoughts and into the realm of feelings. There's no use in fighting the inevitable; embrace the unknown.

Your serious approach to relationships may not take you where you want to go today because unpredictable Uranus can turn your life inside out as it squares romantic Venus.
