Your current plans aren't as sensible as you think and your irrational behavior creates a series of events that require you to change direction suddenly. Be open to the excitement that comes from trying new things and meeting new people. Maintaining your center of gravity frees you to explore other worlds outside of your regular sphere of experience.

You don't mind spending a little extra cash on something that helps you express your feelings toward a special friend. You won't likely purchase anything that is ordinary because your tastes are more eccentric than usual now. Buying a unique gift can be a joyful experience as long as you keep the other person's needs in mind rather than getting something that you would secretly like for yourself. No matter what you give, it's really the sentiment that matters most.

You are torn between pursuing the thrill of adventure and settling in for a relaxing day at home. You want to do both now and may grow annoyed when others pressure you to make a choice. However, micromanaging your day won't necessarily lead to your satisfaction; ironically, you might be happier today if you let others decide your current fate. You could end up feeling a real sense of exhilaration once you let go of the reins of control. Surprisingly, soaring on the current winds gives you more freedom than you think.

You might feel like you're going to get into trouble for playing outside of the rules when it comes to love and relationships. Normally, Venus' journey through your sign motivates you to follow a conservative path of the heart, but her square to wild Uranus thrusts you into new territory now. Letting go of old patterns expands your horizons in ways you can't imagine. You won't be disappointed if you take a risk today; spread your wings and fly.

You can't help but wonder how far you can stretch reality before something snaps while resourceful Venus squares outrageous Uranus. You want to do something crazy that makes you stand out in a crowd, but you may go overboard with your antics today. Friends could be shocked by your sudden uncharacteristic behavior and might criticize your actions. Remember, being brilliantly creative often leads to being misunderstood. Don't worry about how others judge you; your unique brand of genius is your greatest strength.

You are fascinated by eccentric people today, especially if you have been showing self-restraint in your own personal expression. The more radical your actions are now, the less you need everyone else to play out your suppressed feelings. You have an excellent opportunity to experiment with what you want, within reason, of course, so try something outrageous; you can always return to your old ways tomorrow without any regrets. Seize the moment and run.

Persuading someone to change their feelings through coercion or empty promises is not a viable way to get what you want today. A smarter strategy is to let go of control and surrender to your emotions now. The ambitious New Moon falls in your 10th House of Career, requiring a brand new approach to your responsibilities. Though compromise isn't normally your style, calculated actions alone will only box you in. Take a chance and express what's in your heart.

Your emotions run particularly deep today but you should be able to maintain your sense of balance, nonetheless. People may not even realize that your feelings are in turmoil because you can appear calm, cool and collected as long as you keep your mind on the business at hand. However, the Capricorn New Moon stirs the energy of your 9th House of Future Vision and you cannot suppress your dreams for adventure. Let your passions rise to the surface without fearing the outcome; you'll gain more self-assurance if you don't try to hide your heart from view.

You may be more emotional today than others think because you bury your feelings so well that everything seems normal. Nevertheless, your closest friends can still tell something is brewing beneath the surface as the Capricorn New Moon rattles your 8th House of Intimacy and Transformation. You might be happily surprised if you overcome your own resistance and share your inner process with a trustworthy confidant. What happens next is up to you; you can keep swimming in shallow waters or you can dive in the deep end for maximum impact.

You gain inner strength by exploring options on your path to emotional satisfaction, but it's tricky to do this work on your own. Thankfully, someone special could bring you a much-needed dose of objectivity now that the Capricorn New Moon highlights your 7th House of Relationships. Unfortunately, the feedback you receive might not substantiate your original perspective. Processing your changing feelings quickly enables you to integrate an entirely new way of looking at the current circumstances.

You have a number of loose ends to tie up, yet you may work yourself into an anxious state by trying to beat an arbitrary deadline. Your struggles might indicate there's a more complex set of issues at play now that the Capricorn Moon activates your 6th House of Daily Routine. Although your unrelenting drive could become obsessive, it's perfectly acceptable to leave some chores unfinished today. You don't have to impress anyone with your competence; just do your best and call it a day.

You believe that your decisions are rational and you're willing to debate anyone who has the audacity to question your choices. However, the Capricorn New Moon's presence in your 5th House of Self-Expression suggests your protests are misplaced. Don't waste energy justifying your practical approach; just admit what you want and move on. You have a much better shot at satisfaction if you don't try to convince others that your way is the best. Deciding which path to take is less critical than maintaining your integrity along the way.

It may be rather inconvenient when sudden waves of desire crash onto the shores of your awareness today. Your first impulse is to reinforce your emotional boundaries as the conservative Capricorn New Moon falls in your 4th House of Security. However, your ruling planet Venus is currently in cahoots with dark Pluto, conjuring up a powerful mixture of innocent love and ruthless passion. Don't close down in fear; a soulful interaction can take you to a magical and mysterious place if you remain open to the beauty that's all around you now.

Containing your emotions is no small feat now that the Capricorn New Moon lands in your 3rd House of Communication. Your need to express your desires with incisive clarity and unwavering determination is triggered by passionate Pluto's dance with sensual Venus today, amplifying your feelings of love or lust. Life is especially sweet if you connect with a willing playmate or partner, but unrealistic expectations can blind you to something special that's right in front of your nose.

You could have big plans for a great escape, but you sadly realize that there are more pressing things to do as you get closer to the time to leave. Your fiscal affairs demand your attention now that the Capricorn New Moon focuses on your 2nd House of Finances. But don't get lost in your dreams of the future; make a serious commitment and get to work. Take tangible steps, however little they may be, toward achieving your long-term goals.

Navigating intense emotional territory is second nature for you today as the Capricorn New Moon camps out in your sign. You intuitively know that going deeper helps to create a stronger foundation upon which to build a relationship. However, you don't want to react irrationally because you're afraid that you could lose control of the situation. The journey to love is a complicated one, but facing your own resistance to intimacy might be the hardest part. Open your heart and let the chips fall where they may.

Today you're motivated by a desire to show someone how much you know.  However, the Capricorn New Moon energizes your 12th House of Spiritual Mystery, drawing you into metaphysical realms. You will gain more from this spiritual experience if you can admit that whatever is happening is beyond your current comprehension. It's time to get out of your head and into your heart because that is where the real action is today.

It's easy to tell who your real friends are because they tend to show up with emotional support when you need them the most. But the reserved Capricorn New Moon's presence in your 11th House of Social Networking indicates you may prefer more cerebral interactions now, based on logic not passion. Nevertheless, you're still pleasantly surprised when someone comes through with the goods. Expressing your vulnerability enables you to be open enough to receive the assistance that's kindly offered.

You're often the one who waits until the absolute last minute and then squeaks in under the deadline. But every moment counts now so make a concentrated effort to find your stride early in the day. The sooner you begin a project today, the longer you can sustain a high level of productivity. But starting out of the gate quickly makes sense only if you're willing to set a manageable pace that you can maintain until you reach the finish line.

You're so eager to finalize the planning for an upcoming adventure that you could create problems later on by rushing the process today. Fortunately, there aren't many limits on what is possible if you are methodical in your research prior to initiating action. There's no need to fear thinking large as long as you keep bringing your ideas down to earth. The truth is you won't always feel so disciplined, so make your dreams come true by taking advantage of this energy while it lasts.

You are very determined to get to the source of a feeling that has shaped your desires for a while. But this compulsion is no lighthearted passing whim; you're committed to understanding your psyche no matter how long it takes. Although you could be motivated by irrational drives today, there's no reason to let go of anything that adds meaning to your life. Exploring your shadows may not be your usual cup of tea, but it can impact your closest relationships in a positive manner.

Your boss may be critical of your easygoing attitude at work today. However, you're wise to listen to what you're told, even if you're tempted to ignore the advice. Learning a lesson from someone who is a harsh taskmaster can be challenging because you might want to withdraw and avoid what feels like a personal attack. Nevertheless, staying open to the feedback now teaches you how to improve your game and be even more productive. A wise person knows when to be quiet and listen.

Although you're tempted to escape into a lovely dreamworld now, you need to be more focused than ever when it comes to your work. Your unrestrained fantasies fuel your confidence, but they also act as distractions from the serious tasks at hand. You might not want to pay attention to so many details today, but overcoming your own resistance is the first step toward achieving your goals in the weeks ahead. Finding personal satisfaction in a job well done touches your soul in a way that fleeting pleasure never will.

Establishing a methodical work pace is crucial now, for uneven progress sets you up for failure. Luckily, your perceptions are extremely sharp and you are able to accurately estimate the time and resources required to finish a task. Prioritizing your goals is a good place to start today. Once you have a practical strategy in mind, forge ahead with all the determination you can muster. Fortunately, effective planning allows you to manifest your dreams sooner than you think.

It feels uncommonly good to be so certain about your goals today. You have a strong sense of purpose and you know what needs to be done next. Luckily, encountering a minor setback or two won't prevent you from reaching your destination. Still, you must tread carefully or an emotional melodrama might lure you off your path. Avoiding complex strategies and trusting your intuition will produce positive results.

Your ideas can be so outrageous now that it's impossible to tell if they are grounded in any semblance of reality. Nevertheless, it's essential to distinguish between what is real and what is not. Set aside any unattainable goals so you can accomplish something tangible that has lasting value. There's no need to impress the world with your creative brilliance today; there's more value in making solid progress toward building for the future.

Applying the proper amount of control may be tricky business today, but over-managing a situation could lead to an emotional quagmire. Taking a back seat now motivates others to play a more significant role in the decision-making process. Allowing your coworkers to share leadership responsibilities can make tough obstacles easier to overcome in the days ahead. Proceed with caution until the universe gives you a green light. In the meantime, sit back and enjoy the ride.

Nothing is simple today with five planets crowded into your conscientious sign. You can feel the weight of the world sitting squarely on your shoulders and you're growing weary of supporting everyone around you. The good news is you don't have to accept the authoritative role that's being placed on you now. Demonstrate your wisdom by encouraging others to discover their own paths to success. Even if you can run the show on your own, it's ideal when each person is motivated to contribute to the common goal in his or her own way.

Your most memorable dreams are steering you toward practical solutions today as the pragmatic Capricorn Moon visits your 12th House of Imagination, bringing your fantasies down to earth. But clinging to old assumptions could stand between you and any future success you might envision. Just as the caterpillar cannot look back to imagine its next phase as a butterfly, neither can you know what's ahead by looking over you shoulder to your past. Cut loose from the past and embrace the future.

You long to dream about the distant horizon while the Moon moves through your 11th House of Long-Term Goals. But there's no time now to relax and let your imagination take you on a magic carpet ride. Instead, be proactive and rebuild your life one concrete step at a time. Planning is only useful as long as you are willing to get to work right away. Remember that you're not alone on your journey; enlisting the help of supportive friends empowers you to manage your current business while still reaching for the stars.

You don't want to slow down for anyone today, but you wisely understand that expending too much energy to make insignificant gains isn't such a great idea. You're being challenged to accomplish everything that you set out to do now. However, it's best to act methodically rather than frantically fighting an uphill battle. Instead of attempting to finish what you begin, just lay a solid foundation for what's to follow. Work smarter, not harder.

You might be upset today when you finally realize how much you have sacrificed to get what you want. However, your decision has already been made and there's no turning back now. Although you may wish that you did things differently, you have another important choice to make in the present moment. Don't let your feelings of regret trick you into overreacting. Calculate your chances for long-term success before taking a risk just to prove a point. Trust the process and breathe.

Finding time to socialize with your friends is difficult now that your workweek is underway, but you still want to indulge in a little fun, anyhow. Instead of trying to squeeze everything into your schedule, you can benefit the most from taking a methodical approach today. Establish priorities early in the day and then stick to your plan. Luckily, you're such a natural at multitasking that you could get enough done to justify celebrating your accomplishments later on.

If you recently had to acquiesce to an authority figure, it's time to grab the reins and reassert control of your life today. Finally, it's your turn to play the role of the fearless leader; your failure to claim your power only leaves room for someone less qualified to take charge. Fortunately, you can act with compassion, so there's no need to be critical of anyone just because you're shifting the dynamics. It's crucial to seize the moment and stand up for your beliefs. If you don't do it now, no one else will do it for you.

Your nerves can get the best of you today if you are working hard to put a relationship in order. Even if you made inroads recently, there still may be something that's not exactly right. Although you could feel overwhelmed with all the stress, don't throw in the towel just yet. You have already come through the hardest part, but it will take more time to see how much progress has already occurred. Sometimes the best possible medicine, besides laughter, is the passage of time.

Getting closure on a creative project is a high priority now, even if you prefer it not to end just yet. Reassessing the recent changes you made at home or at work makes practical sense, but reconsider what you can do to improve the quality of your life before you initiate further action. Don't try to tackle the bigger issues now; just concentrate on cherishing the little things that bring you joy right now.

You might have an uneasy feeling left over from a recent emotional entanglement you had with a family member or an intimate partner. Everything seemed to be patched up and on the mend, but now you are realizing that your preferences have been left out of the equation. Unfortunately, this scenario may have a familiar ring to it. Obviously, the conversation isn't quite over. Remember, your needs are just as important as anyone else's; speak up or forever hold your piece.

Your resolute nature sees you through some sticky situations time and time again. Once you've made up your mind, it's relatively simple to do what must be done. Nevertheless, something could happen in your immediate environment today that tests you in a way you weren't expecting. However, you can rise to the occasion if you truly believe in yourself and are willing to go the extra mile now. Don't back down; you are closer to victory than you think.

Your boss isn't in the mood to acknowledge your needs so you might have to overcome his or her resistance if the Moon's alignment with restrictive Saturn puts you in direct conflict with an authority figure. Your smartest strategy is to consciously moderate your own intensity to give others the time and space to recover any lost equilibrium. For now, less is actually better than more when asking for what you want. You can prove your worthiness by simply demonstrating your commitment to the cause.

Your suppressed emotions may stand between you and your happiness today, but unconsciously expressing negativity might also bring you down. However, you can begin to transmute your awkward feelings into positive actions by shifting your perspective into one of empowerment. Your confidence returns when you see that there are more options available than you thought. But don't fall victim to taking an unnecessary risk just for the adrenaline rush; making your choices based on practicality offers the best path to lasting satisfaction.

You feel as if you're in the final stages of preparation, but surprisingly you might not know what you're getting ready for yet. It's probably too late to reconsider your plans for the week, so just go with the flow the best you can. But you have more power at your disposal than you realize. Don't talk yourself out of success; instead, pick a cause, set your priorities and get down to business. If your commitment is authentic, others can't help but recognize you as a force to be reckoned with and will treat you with the respect you deserve.

Your interactions with others seem so stressful today that you may consider making a quick escape before anyone has a chance to stop you. However, working alone or playing solo is not the best use of the emotional Moon's current visit to your 11th House of Teamwork. Your participation in a social group could be quite liberating now if you can just push past your own resistance. The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.

Your ability to get things done quickly tempts you to take on more responsibilities than you can possibly finish. However, your holiday spirit may run into trouble if you overextend your reach today. Instead of thinking that you need to convert every intellectual breakthrough into tangible results, just allow your brilliant ideas to come and go like the tides. Visualize yourself standing on the shores of awareness, but remember that you don't have to capture every individual wave to make your mark.

You're waiting for something big to happen, yet whatever it is remains just out of reach. You may attempt to calm your nerves, but your restlessness lingers until you accept that the resistance comes from your own attitude. Fortunately, the tension disperses when you begin to let go of control. Don't waste energy concentrating on too many specific details of the day; spend time focusing on your long-term goals instead. Ironically, aiming your attention at a point on the distant horizon has a positive impact on the present moment.

Following through on anything that you start now may be a challenge, but you won't likely be bothered about it for too long. You suddenly forget about what you were doing as soon as you are distracted by another amazing idea. Your erratic behavior might be upsetting to others today, yet you'll probably continue scattering your energy until you see the error of your ways. Ultimately, obtaining closure on unfinished business improves your reputation and raises your confidence in the process.

Although you wish relationship dynamics were simpler, it feels as if you built your day on shifting sands. Thankfully, you might be able to change the energy faster than you thought possible by just telling the truth today. Don't hold back; even if your life is turned upside down for a while, it will settle back on the solid foundation that you need. Have the courage to throw caution to the wind when it comes to following your heart.

You think that you know what you want today, but the current circumstances keep changing. Just as you become comfortable with one perspective, everything shifts and you need to readjust your expectations. Your willingness to be flexible could prevent a serious headache. However, too much thinking now can get in the way of your best interests. Observe the current interpersonal dynamics and respond with your heart, not your head.

Assimilating so much information may be a bit overwhelming now, especially if you believe you already have the answers to lingering questions. Your key planet Mercury is buzzing today, yet the more stuck you are in your thinking, the louder the static is from electrical Uranus. Thankfully, your readiness for change empowers you to explore the outer limits of your imagination. Remember that you don't have to push your thought process over the edge; your evolving perspective is all you need to get the most out of your journey.

Your mind is currently operating at an incredibly high speed, yet you wonder if you're capable of keeping it up throughout the entire day. You naturally assume that the flow of information will eventually slow down, but other people continue to introduce more complications. The hectic pace is fun at first, but might become more exhausting as the day goes on. Don't try to do everything all at once. Extending your thinking into the future can help you remain calmer in the present.

You are possessed with self-confidence today, especially if someone you trust expresses approval of your performance. Although unpredictable Uranus can set off a strike of lighting that rattles your current routine, cosmic assistance seems to arrive just in the nick of time. As long as you're willing to shift gears quickly, you should be able to make good use of the new information that arrives at your door now. Letting go of old assumptions clears the way for an exciting new direction.

You're able to accomplish so much today that others might start to think you're a super-hero. However, there's a steep price to pay for your action-packed day. So many events are interrelated now that one unexpected blip can bring down the entire house of cards. But even a crisis or two won't stop you if you're open to starting over again and changing your course as needed. Your sheer determination is a marvel to behold.

You may hope that everything will calm down, but you probably won't have a chance to catch your breath for a couple of days. You are called back into action today and you must show up ready to hold up your end of the deal. Fortunately, mental Mercury's current stay in your ambitious sign indicates that you're up for the task. You don't have time to waste; face the current challenges with a fierce resolve and a can-do attitude. Climbing mountains is what you Mountain Goats do best.

Although your thoughts are integrally tied to your future, today's planetary cluster in your 12th House of Escapism triggers your desire to fly under the radar with minimum impact. Nevertheless, you have no choice but to let go of your isolationist tendencies since electric Uranus zaps you out of your secret fantasy world. Overcome your fears and face the brave new world that's right around the next corner. You might not be able to see what's coming, but if you're willing to take a calculated risk the rewards will follow.

You don't have to convince others that your plan is the best one; you only need to communicate your ideas with honesty and integrity. There are no correct or incorrect points of view now, just differing ones. Even if your opinions are out of the box, others respect you for describing exactly where you stand. Nevertheless, you must demonstrate your sincerity by listening to other people's positions. Keeping an open mind is the key to making the best choices for everyone involved.

Acknowledging your feelings may be a real struggle today because they interfere with your original agenda. Fortunately, your self-esteem is strong enough to handle some very intense self-examination now that can bring your personal objectives into greater focus. But the real lesson today isn't about your emotional growth; it's about balancing your need to meet existing responsibilities with your desire to create more meaningful relationships. Spend time with those you love and leave your worries behind.

You could be so convinced that you're heading in the right direction now that you're surprised if something happens to make you reconsider a recent decision. This isn't the smartest time to exhibit your infamous bullheadedness or you might short circuit your current process of discovery. Reassess relevant information that you previously dismissed as unimportant. This is your chance to see things in a new light; the truth will set you free.

People may believe that you're only interested in clever one-liners and witty repartee, but the truth is that you're determined to get to the bottom of an enigma today. Mischievous Mercury joins up with ruthless Pluto in your 8th House of Deep Sharing, driving you to uncover the facts. You think that knowing the entire story will have a positive effect on your relationships. Although gathering more data usually keeps you happy, you already have enough information to start an important conversation. Sharing your feelings is a small price to pay for the honesty you seek.

You wonder why people are pushing your emotional buttons today, even if you're showering them with love. But you may have unexpressed feelings that are being reflected back at you through the actions of others. If someone seems too demanding, looking in the mirror might reveal your own unfulfilled needs. It's only natural to suppress your negativity in order to get into the holiday spirit; however, burying your true desires adversely impacts the behavior of those close to you. Ultimately, the most supportive path you can take now is one that's based on transparency and love.

Once you become fixated on a particular fantasy today, it's nearly impossible to get it out of your mind. However, this kind of obsessive thinking is problematic only if it distracts you from your promises. But turning into a perfectionist when it comes to family obligations isn't a good idea because you might drive everyone crazy with your uncharacteristic attention to details. Thankfully, you can contribute to the holiday spirit by moderating your extreme emotional reactions. Channeling your energy into creating peace and harmony brings everyone closer together.

You are usually critical in your analysis of a situation yet your mental acuity is focused on recreational endeavors today. However, your key planet Mercury runs into perceptive Pluto in your 5th House of Self-Expression, intensifying relationships and sharpening the edges of your messages. Choose your words carefully because most everything you say now carries the extra weight of passion. Relying on your sense of humor is the perfect antidote for the tricky dynamics of the day.

You're not comfortable letting everyone know how you feel because you don't like to rock the boat. Perhaps you believe that people won't be able to handle your radical honesty today -- and maybe you are right. But you need to examine the emotional price you pay if you keep quiet to protect someone you love from your observations. It's not in anyone's best interest to filter out difficult subjects, but it's wise to consider the impact of your message before you speak. Practicing the art of compassionate discretion allows everyone to enjoy the magic of the moment.

You are usually at home with emotional intensity, but this doesn't mean that anyone else wants to hash out their hidden feelings today. You may act as a catalyst that starts a dramatic reaction today, making others wary of your presence. But ignoring the truth or watering it down to make it more palatable won't work either. Although there's no reason to dwell on the dark side, everyone is counting on you to tell it like it is. Your greatest blessing now is the brilliant clarity of your intentions, but it's only a gift if you have the courage to share it.

Your exuberant nature mixes with today's brooding emotional intensity like oil and water. However, you're not quite ready to relinquish your optimism because you have exciting plans that inspire you to anticipate life's next great adventure. Unfortunately, nothing is as simple and straightforward as you thought. Positive results are stifled as long as you stoically cling to the past. The good news is that once you let go of your previous expectations, there's little that can stand between you and your happiness.

You're not amused by someone's emotional disclosure today; in fact, you are tempted to walk away from an uncomfortable conversation before it gets heated. However, when pushed into a corner, you can connect with your inner resolve and stand up to anyone who is blocking your progress. You're itching to tell the whole truth and nothing but the truth. Take a deep breath and remember the true meaning of the season. Even if it takes more effort to deliver your message with kindness, the results make it worthwhile.

Although you might have strong spiritual beliefs, you aren't necessarily driven to share them today as communicator Mercury aligns with potent Pluto in your 12th House of Privacy. The reality is that your understanding of mysterious concepts such as soul consciousness may be beyond the comprehension of most people. Nevertheless, you're quite practical when it comes to participating in holiday celebrations, especially if fun and fellowship are involved. There's no reason to hold back; it's the season to be jolly.

You are usually quite comfortable navigating your way through the murky waters of family dynamics, but current circumstances may push you to your limit. It doesn't matter that it's a holiday because you're less interested in frivolity and fantasy today than you are in brute honesty. Unfortunately, the facts might not be easy to find during the holiday bustle. Don't fill in the gaps with your fertile imagination; work only with the actual information you have at your disposal. Once you are free of the emotional confusion, you can happily return to the real business of celebrating with those you love.

Responsibilities pull you back into the real world today, even if you go kicking and screaming the whole way. Unfortunately, denial isn't an option now; you can't escape the obligations you have allowed to pile up. Thankfully, taking a mature approach to your commitments enables you to perform your earthly tasks while also pursuing more spiritual interests. Don't aim for an either/or solution to your dilemma; build your current strategy on inclusive thinking. A holistic philosophy empowers you to work simultaneously on multiple levels.

You might believe that your friends will bail you out today, only to discover that their previous commitments prevent them from coming through with the goods. However, your worries may be worse than the situation, itself. Your ship is not sinking and the immediate danger level is lower than you think. Instead of seeking external assistance, consider what you can do to help yourself. Making an attitude adjustment is a smart start; a metaphysical makeover is the fastest way to improve your entire world.

Visualizing yourself as King of the Mountain is not necessarily the most direct route to the summit. Naturally, your frame of mind is a crucial ingredient in any recipe for success, but your positive attitude alone won't do the trick today. Although you might prefer the easiest way to your destination, a shortcut won't save you time. Trying to outsmart reality could burn even more resources in the long run. Following the tried and true path now is your best bet for reaching your dreams.

Your imagination is a significant source of inspiration today and anything you can do to cultivate it helps your cause. Writing down your dreams as soon as you wake up is one way to help keep them in your memory. Making time to meditate or daydream may also put you in touch with important messages from your subconscious. There's no need to worry if you can't understand everything that floats into your awareness now; just continue to explore your feelings and let the symbols unfold their story at their own speed.

You may not be ready to let go of the holiday spirit yet, but avoiding your responsibilities could spin your day out of control. Take all your commitments seriously today, even if you promised more than you can possibly deliver. Thankfully, you can see through complicated cross-currents and cut to the chase. Four hardworking Capricorn planets are taking care of business in your 6th House of Daily Routine, urging you to pace yourself, proceed with determination and be sure to produce tangible results along the way.

Other people may appear to be the source of your confusion now as you try to understand their true motives. On one hand, you could be inspired by the compassionate behavior of someone you admire, only to realize that their actions don't fully support their story. On the other hand, you might feel as if your behavior falls short when compared to the altruistic intentions of a friend. However, getting lost in analysis is just a way to avoid the real issue. It's not a competition; the true measure of your conduct is how you stack up against your own expectations.

You might have such high hopes about what you want to accomplish today that you set yourself up for failure before you do a thing. It's frustrating to believe your diplomatic efforts will resolve a long-lasting feud between two people you care about when they won't even make an effort themselves. But you still can have a positive impact on the lives of those closest to you by radiating your feelings of love and visions of world peace. Global issues are best tackled by acting locally with the best of intentions.

Your  joie de vivre is contagious today as you demonstrate your ability to trust in the flow of the cosmos. Instead of worrying about issues that are out of your control, you prefer to spread good vibes by finding happiness in simple pleasures. Going for a walk with a friend, working on a creative project or just kicking back with a loved one is a definite step in the right direction. Those closest to you will be positively influenced by your inspirational attitude if your actions are in tune with your heart.

Family dynamics are more complicated than they seem today, especially if you are trying to keep things upbeat and lighthearted. You don't want to be the heavy one, yet unexpressed emotions lurk just beneath the surface and only gain in intensity if you continue to ignore them. However, your willingness to forgive others could be a key to resolving the current stress. Talking about your feelings isn't nearly as scary as you think as long as you don't blame anyone else in the process. Ultimately, you can be a hero by shifting the energy and beginning the healing process.

Your practical nature typically prompts you to base your decisions on just the facts. However, you may be better off taking a little vacation today and exploring the realms of poetry, fiction and music. Communication is simple if you don't get too hung up on the details now. Give everyone a bit of wiggle room, and take everything you hear now with a grain of salt. Your imagination can be the source of rich treasures if you're willing to step off the edge and leave the real world behind.

You can't help but realize your values are changing today, leaving you with a bit of an identity crisis. Certain beliefs that have been a cornerstone of your world view might not be as immutable as you once thought. Even if your opinions are fixed in place, you can show your strength of character by remaining open to different ways of thinking. There's no urgency to reach a final conclusion now; just let the new information in and see where it takes you. Evolution doesn't happen overnight.

It's nearly impossible to contain your fantasies today as the evocative Moon lines up with surreal Neptune in your sign. On one hand, your spiritual inclinations are in focus; you can almost hear the heavenly choirs singing your song. On the other hand, you could easily confuse your dreams with reality. Either way, pay attention to what you let ripple through your mind because whatever you imagine might actually come to pass. Believing is seeing.

As you gaze into the future, you realize you need to plan for a change in direction to conserve your resources. You might even consider going on a retreat, especially if you feel as if you're running on empty. Creating space for a bit of solitude can be challenging today, yet time alone is more valuable than you think. Ironically, the more complicated it is to schedule some downtime, the more you need it. Don't make excuses; just make it happen.

Naturally, you appreciate the need for making plans and following through with your commitments. But you may be weary of doing everything according to the book. However, your fantasies could inspire you to pursue your bliss today, rather than playing a supporting role in other people's stories as sweet Venus sparkles in your 9th House of Big Ideas. You have permission from the cosmos to reach for the stars as long as you know where to draw the line. Setting sensible limits gives you the freedom to let your imagination soar and your heart take flight.

You may be harboring resistance to your social obligations today. Nevertheless, you can muster up enough energy to fulfill your obligations once you make up your mind to do so. However, you still might be worried about losing your sense of identity if you become too involved with someone else's plans. Your biggest concern now is about having to justify your actions. But once you acknowledge that your fears are fabricated, you will be able to enjoy jumping into the flow of events without having to be in control.

You Crabs are pleased that the emotional tides are flowing, revitalizing your soul and empowering you to reconnect with your heart. Thankfully, the watery Pisces Moon can be a cosmic antidote for your recent sense of alienation in a significant relationship. You're all too eager to immerse yourself into the refreshing deep sea of feelings today, but others may not want to follow you on your underwater adventure. Nevertheless, spiritual rewards could be yours if you're willing to seek sunken treasure on your own.

You take pride in being famous for creating a party wherever you go, but the Moon's current visit to your 8th House of Intimacy reveals a much darker part of your character. Oddly enough, today you're driven to raise complex issues that are without fast and easy solutions. You don't even mind the absence of a quick fix, since you understand that you're on a metaphysical journey. Expressing your heartfelt desires now can lead to profound discussions that ultimately solidify a meaningful relationship.

You quickly grow annoyed if others aren't as diligent as you are now as the Moon's presence in your 7th House of Companions emphasizes your partnerships. Unfortunately, your helpful assistance might be perceived as unsolicited criticism. Don't try to solve anyone else's problems or change someone who falls short of your expectations. Instead, make adequate room for all the imperfections that you see around you, and allow those you love to be fully human. After all, you would want the same respect in return.

You have many chores to finish around your home today, but you don't exactly know where to start. You might think that making a list will help you focus, but even that could prove to be a daunting task. Although over-planning your day is tempting, it's much wiser to stay flexible without thinking too far ahead. Just jump in without further analysis and pay attention to the subtle signs you see everywhere in your environment. Trust the universe and let your intuition guide you through the day.

Sharing laughter brings healing with the Moon traveling through your 5th House of Enjoyment, but a long-forgotten family memory may distract you from the good times. Thankfully, your private matters don't have to interfere with your fun today if you manage your emotions efficiently. Whereas you often have trouble discerning your head from your heart, staying aware of your feelings now allows you to process them discreetly, without others having to know your internal struggle. Don't let your past get in the way of appreciating the joy of the present moment.

Your unwavering optimism hides fears and tears today but you might feel helpless if you can't control your emotions. Your first inclination is to simply avoid conversations that tread into uncomfortable territory, rather than trying to process your angst. The truth is that you may experience unexpected relief once you express what's in your heart. An immediate resolution could be elusive, but at least everyone will know where you stand. Navigating unknown waters is much easier when you don't do it alone.

The more you attempt to gain mastery over your daily routine now, the harder it is to keep all the pieces in place. Satisfaction may be tough to find today, but all is not lost. Setting your sights on the task at hand is currently more productive than thinking about the larger perspective. Wait for the dust to settle before turning your life upside down; it's amazing how different things will look in just a few days.

You may grow discouraged today if your dreams seem out of reach. However, you might be viewing your present circumstances from a perspective that's too narrow. You will likely come out on the losing end if you compare the hard, cold facts of your life with your idealistic dreams. Instead, accept the differences between your reality and your fantasies as a starting point. Map out the steps you need to take to reach your destination and then embark on your journey with a beginner's mind and an open heart.

The cosmic energy shifts and your network of friends and family may be the primary source of your concerns now. Conflicting emotions make it tricky business to negotiate the ups and downs of social dynamics, whether you have too much or not enough on your plate. Cut yourself some slack while your moods are in flux until the reflective Moon leaves your sign tomorrow. In the meantime, postpone big decisions while doing what you must to keep everything afloat. Keeping your sense of humor close at hand enables you to sail through the day.

Rushing into a situation without any forethought sounds perfectly fine to you, especially since the Moon returns to your impetuous sign early this morning. Unfortunately, your reckless behavior could arouse strong reactions from friends and acquaintances. Although it's wise to wait it out and see how you feel in a couple of days, you might not be able to resist the excitement of embarking on something new. If your sense of urgency gets the best of you, at least temper your actions so you don't create too much chaos.

You're annoyed by your own impatience because you're not sure if beginning a new project now is such a good idea. You might try to talk yourself out of doing anything at all today, but this lazy attitude only adds to your frustration. However, if you blindly forge ahead you're likely to run into strong opposition. Ultimately, listening to logic and tying up loose ends before doing anything else makes more sense than reacting in an extreme manner. Finish the old before you start the new.

You're eager to embrace the future instead of reviewing your recent past once again. Nevertheless, there are emotional obstacles that must be overcome now before you can put your new plans into action. Attempts to avoid the issues are futile; denial only strengthens the resistance, for the problems will resurface later with greater intensity. Slow down and face the music. Learning a valuable lesson prepares you to take your game to the next level.

Relationship issues continue to be a source of stress, making it nearly impossible to fulfill all the demands of your close friends and family. You may feel as if you're caught in the crosscurrents today and that you will let someone down, no matter which path you choose. Thankfully, there's another way around this obstacle course. Balancing the complex social dynamics isn't easy, but creating a friendly and fair environment is your best bet. Show others respect by telling the truth and letting them know your limits before things get out of hand.

You're feeling like you're on top of the world today, especially if you have big ideas about the future. Unfortunately, your plans may be complicated by unstable circumstances and unreliable people who won't support your needs now. Don't place too much value on getting assistance from anyone else. Nevertheless, accept help when it's offered, even if you believe that you can succeed on your own. Learning to receive from others might not feel comfortable at first, but admitting you don't have all the answers opens the door to more authentic communication.

Sharing your feelings may not feel safe now, but the emotional roller coaster isn't as dangerous as you think. Relationships seem messy these days and you might even choose to sidestep interpersonal entanglements as much as possible. You're probably more dependent on others than you're willing to admit, so it's more sensible to acknowledge your desires without making anyone else responsible for your satisfaction. Your radical honesty could be enough to save the day.

It's annoying if people make promises without subsequently delivering the goods. It's not as if you begged anyone to come to your rescue; chances are others just arrive out of the blue and offer to help. However, you don't want to rely on someone's good intentions. Even if you are left in the lurch, just move forward with your original plans without wasting time playing the blame game. Striking out on your own raises your confidence and demonstrates your independence to your peers.

You want to show your competence and loyalty today by shining your light wherever you go. However, you have an eerie feeling that you're being judged by someone who doesn't really appreciate your contribution. Overcoming the disapproval -- yours or someone else's -- is your first order of business. Either way, ignoring the real issues can feel like a personal defeat. However, what other people think now is not your concern; your job is to stand your ground and be true to yourself no matter what.

Today begins with a bang and the energy continues to build right through the evening. You can sense the surge of creativity in the air, but you grow irritated with someone who tries to hijack your day with their personal agenda. You aren't interested in playing it safe just to avoid confrontation; it could feel exhilarating to push back and defend your territory. Just remember, there may be a price to pay for alienating an ally. Practicing the art of compromise might not be easy now, but it gives you the best chance for setting things right.

You're struggling to balance your naturally conservative approach with an urgent desire to throw caution to the wind. You are anticipating an exciting time at a party with an entirely new group of people; however, you don't want to abandon your established network of friends. Ultimately, your choice may not be as significant as you think, as long as you take full responsibility for your decision. Expanding your horizons with a bit of experimentation is a great idea as long as you remain sensitive to those who are already an integral part of your life.

You may try to sneak through the day without causing too much trouble, but you could raise a few eyebrows with your unconventional behavior. You want to experience life to the fullest now, and could attempt to pack so much into each moment that others grow tired just listening to your plans. Riding an adrenaline high is thrilling, but be careful not to take things too far. Even you might not be able to keep up with your crazy schedule. Taking a few deep breaths helps to settle your nerves so you can still be brilliant in your choices.

You have your own creative ideas about how you want to welcome in the New Year, but others may pressure you to change your mind. Unfortunately, there won't be any winners in a power struggle today. Even if you encounter resistance from your friends, continue to gently lobby for your plans. However, fulfilling your fantasies now might not be as important as you think. As long as your intentions are pure, you should be able to balance your individual needs with the desires of those closest to you. When push comes to shove, being with those you love matters most.

You know exactly what you want today with the Aries Moon brightly reflecting your needs. But, unfortunately, sharing your heart's desires might not bring you any closer to satisfaction now if others don't understand what you're saying. Communication is tricky for a couple of days while trickster Mercury is orbiting under the influence of delusional Neptune. You can talk yourself into doing nearly anything, but keeping your feelings to yourself works in your favor. In the meantime, cultivate your future by giving yourself permission to dream.

Talking seems pointless today because you feel so transparent that others must already know what you're feeling. Thankfully, there are many ways to demonstrate your emotional warmth and although verbal communication might be the most obvious, it's not always the most effective. Acts of kindness toward those you admire will get your message across faster than any other method. Generous gestures without expectation of anything in return are the best gifts of all.

Your unrestrained enthusiasm could have significant impact on your partner or lover today. Nevertheless, long and drawn-out speeches are the wrong approach, unless you quickly follow through with tangible actions. Otherwise, people grow tired of your smooth words and empty promises if nothing happens. Remember that fulfilling your obligations doesn't necessarily require a lot of fanfare if your behavior is consistent with your goals. Channel your passion into your work.

It shouldn't be so hard to just let someone know how you feel today. Unfortunately, it's challenging to express yourself clearly now, leading people to think you're not being very sincere at all. This whole scenario may be frustrating, but you can avoid a big misunderstanding by sticking to the facts and simply speaking from your heart. Showing up with integrity trumps all other possible strategies.

The pressure to choose now is unavoidable -- you don't know whether to call it quits or launch a major initiative. You may feel as if you're up against the wall with no way over it. Exploring all your options with your friends and listening to their feedback is the first step to making up your mind. But your words don't tell the whole story while fanciful Neptune tempts you to embellish your tale. However, keeping your message on point makes your version of the truth more believable and easier to support. Sharing your dilemma helps to clear the confusion from your path.

Your social diplomacy is a necessary ingredient to manage the emotional complexity of the day, especially if you are motivated to dig beneath the surface to discover your truth. But before you begin your quest, take time to invite someone to join you on your search. You can do it alone if you must, but everything will flow with greater ease if this is a shared effort. Nevertheless, don't just assume your point of view is the only one; ultimately, there's no right or wrong when it comes to matters of the heart.

Too much dependency on a close friend or partner is a trap, yet it's still tempting to base your responses on how you think someone else will react. Forget about weighing and judging the impact of your words today; simply say them aloud as they enter your awareness. Your open-minded attitude makes all the difference now, so express yourself in a way that also conveys kindness and demonstrates flexibility. Others will be so appreciative of your authenticity that they won't even care if you agree with them or not.

Approaching your work from a new angle today also alters the roles that others play in your life. But choosing your part is not a straightforward affair because your emotions are being pulled in many directions now. Instead of relying on a familiar old response, try gathering more information first. This radical strategy could also bring alternative choices to the table, offering you paths you haven't yet considered. A change will do you good.

Opening your heart may be scary business today because everything seems to be happening so quickly. But taking the easy way out by erecting self-protective walls only increases your loneliness and isn't your style, anyway. Instead, find an inner source of courage and share your feelings with someone you trust. Healing old wounds begins with first acknowledging the truth and then practicing the art of forgiveness, not just for others but also for yourself.

Although you don't want to agitate dormant feelings of uncertainty, you're tired of walking on eggshells. Unfortunately, your self-enforced caution could have exactly the opposite effect from what you want. If your conflicted emotions become the topic of conversation today, don't hold back stating your true desires. Be as honest as you can while still remaining sensitive to all parties involved. Clearing the air allows everyone to have a fresh start.

You're anticipating the prospects of exploring your feelings with an open mind as you move into a new emotional landscape today. However, you tend to be cooler with your words than how you actually feel in your heart. Oddly enough, it's easier to express your needs through bold actions now rather than writing or talking about them. Just walk your talk and you'll come out smelling like a rose.

You might be feeling quite proud about the inspiration you have to offer a close friend or associate today. Or, maybe you're just ready to act on a newly found sense of confidence by sharing your visions for the future. The bad news is that everyone won't likely react with the same level of enthusiasm right off the bat. Tell your story without trying to sell anyone anything if you want to persuade others to listen to your advice or support your dreams. You can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink.

Sticking to a proven method brings better results today than trying a whole new approach. You may grow restless if everything seems too familiar; however, it's much smarter now to manage your anxiety by gradually modifying your attitude instead of randomly messing with your environment. Thankfully, once you settle into a routine, most everything should get easier to handle all around. Surprisingly, slow and steady change will be much more satisfying than you think.

You may grow so concerned with executing your own agenda today that you could end up obsessing over something you want. Problems arise if other people's schedules conflict with yours. But you're not likely to take no for an answer since the Moon's return to your determined sign heightens your attachment to your preferred version of the outcome. Don't increase your frustration level by trying to alter the dynamics that are beyond your control. You can prevent your energy from getting stuck by simply allowing the tides of your emotions to carry you into new territory.

You might not be overly communicative today because you don't trust your ability to know when to stop talking. Thankfully, practicing self-restraint is an intelligent strategy since there are pressing issues that require your attention and it can be problematic if you wear yourself out too early in the game. Although pursuing random social activities is fun, don't let them distract you from the real work at hand. Maintaining your focus is key to your success.

This may be a perfect day to hang out with friends, but don't worry about figuring out too many of the details beforehand. You prefer to know your schedule in advance, but ultimately, it will be more enjoyable if you leave things unstructured for now. Oddly enough, everyone else seems to have specific plans even if you don't. Fortunately, all you need to do today is say yes. Everything else should fall into place without a lot of effort if you keep a flexible attitude.

You have a very specific picture of what you want to accomplish at work today, but you could seriously miscalculate the amount of support you will receive. In fact, you are relying on everyone to stick close to your agenda, as promised. But the universe might have a slightly different notion about what's next and you're better off now if you don't fight the inevitable. Even if you are successful at forcing reality to fit into your plans, you may exhaust yourself in the process. Choosing your battles with care strengthens your chances to win the war.

This could turn out to be a rather mellow day if you don't fill up your schedule with too much unnecessary work. Instead of shifting into automatic gear and plowing through your long list of chores, consider which tasks are non-essential and leave those for another day. Even though you're typically a hard worker, take some well-deserved time off just to relax. Before making your resolutions, review the last year and reflect on the opportunities your future might bring.

Your outlook on life is changing radically now, but you might not be able to set your ideas into motion. This puzzling dilemma isn't just about your efforts being blocked; your current lack of confidence makes you wonder if you will reach your goals if you are opposed to the prevailing currents. Actually, it's smarter to wait for the storm to pass; enjoy yourself today by being creative, instead of productive. Save your strength for another day when you can make real progress.

It's irritating if someone quickly agrees with you in word, yet continues to resist your actions. It's as if there's a split between the mental and physical universe, which can be quite frustrating to you strong-willed Scorpios. Keep in mind that you won't be able to solve this dilemma today. Instead of trying to control all the variables, simply be an objective witness to the current events. Thankfully, making a conscious decision to let go of your need to fix everything can bring you peace of mind.

You might not be able to accomplish all your goals today, but a large part of the problem comes from extending your reach too far. You can visualize the big picture so well that it motivates you to dream beyond your immediate environment. Unfortunately, there isn't a fast way to get to your destination. Nevertheless, concentrating on the most practical things on your plate makes the most sense, even if that means success is delayed another day. Less is more if you really want to get things done.

Your friends think you would benefit from some relaxation today but they might also secretly believe that you don't know how to have fun. However, you're more than willing to let them follow you around so you can prove them wrong. Don't bother defending your actions if someone doesn't like your plans. Do whatever you want without worrying about anyone else's opinion. Follow your bliss and see who comes along for the ride.

The same events that would have rattled your cage previously don't seem to have much of an unsettling effect now; nevertheless, they can sidetrack your current progress. Whether you like it or not, you have some work to do because unaddressed issues won't likely vanish on their own. Make a commitment to yourself to get to the bottom of your emotional dilemma while you have such a positive attitude about life. Once you handle the situation, you can refocus on your  goals. Visualizing the finish line gets you there sooner than you expect.

You are ready to settle into an easy day at work, hoping that you don't have to deal with any major upheavals. However, you may need to climb a few hills that now stand between you and your personal satisfaction. But you won't find any pleasure if you try to force your position onto others. It's currently more effective to step back from potential conflicts until you're able to talk about your emotions in a rational manner. Taking the high road leads to a happy ending.

You may be known for your ability to act spontaneously rather than planning ahead; nevertheless, you can also be quite patient if you want something badly enough. Although your current desires are strong, you're not in too much of a hurry now. In fact, you might even feel lazy enough today to luxuriate in the status quo. But don't get too complacent because a rising tide of enthusiasm is raising the stakes in the game. Your current creative efforts are more important than you think; embrace the future by initiating action in the present moment.

People frequently lean on you because you seem as steady as a rock. You're clear about what you want and most likely have a plan in mind as to how to get it. There's not much that can alter your course today and others seek security in the strength of your convictions. But your current stability depends on you sticking close to the facts, so don't waste brainpower attempting to solve the mysteries of the universe. Keep your life simple now and save the philosophizing and dreaming for another time.

You find an ironic kind of pleasure in being so practical now because you want everyone to acknowledge your emotional stability. You are often the one who pipes up with a witty comeback or a clever answer whether or not it has anything to do with the current conversation. However, you aren't interested in demonstrating your cerebral acrobatics today. Taking a few deep breaths is an effective delaying tactic, giving you the chance to contemplate your answers before you speak. Sometimes the best way to show others you care requires no words at all.

Although working closely with others today sounds like a good idea, participating in group activities is complicated by dynamic emotional entanglements. Your sense of loyalty to your friends and colleagues makes it tough to do anything that adds to the tension. Nevertheless, it's not helpful to anyone if you  try to avoid an uncomfortable subject. Fortunately, you can still be a team player now, even while saying what's on your mind. Breaking the silence in a gentle and compassionate manner clears the way for more constructive dialogue and stronger bonds.

You could be counting your chickens before they hatch, even if you're not receiving much positive feedback today. You have temporarily stepped off the emotional roller-coaster and you're finally getting your bearings. Make use of the current calm by integrating the wild ups and downs you recently experienced rather than stirring up new excitement. Although there is great potential for this to be a day of relaxation, don't forget to buckle up; there will still be more thrills before your ride is actually over.

Your nerves may be on edge if your day doesn't unfold according to your well-conceived plans. Even if there is still time to finish your work, a nagging concern gnaws away in the back of your mind. You could work yourself into an anxious state because you can't solve all your problems at once. However, it's pointless to waste time being overly self-critical. Recognizing that you're a work in progress alleviates the pressure to be perfect. Focusing on your strengths makes all the difference in the world.

You're tempted to let your colleagues know that you're annoyed when they act as if they know everything. Unfortunately, expressing your irritation probably won't improve the situation today. You could unconsciously make matters worse by provoking someone to act even more stubbornly. If a friend or coworker digs in his or her heels, remember that it's not your job to change anyone's mind. It's a smarter strategy now to work on your own issues and let your actions speak for you, instead. Lead by example and see who follows.

Setting a steady pace while doing chores today offers you the best chance of achieving your short-term goals. Hopefully, you understand that you can't force anyone to move any faster than they're already going. Although you might not be able to alter the flow of external events, you can change your attitude. There's no need to panic if a project is taking longer than you expected. Stay cool; your persistence is your secret weapon. No one will fault you for your performance if your efforts are sincere and your intentions honorable.

You might be content with your current accomplishments, but true satisfaction requires that you complete any projects you start. However, you may have to leave some work undone as you approach the holiday celebrations. Take time to reassess your recent progress and formulate a clear strategy for the future. Relying on your common sense takes you further on the road to success in the coming year. Reshuffling your priorities is the first step to making your dreams come true.

Although this could be an auspicious day, it might not seem out of the ordinary as you go about your business. The steadfast Taurus Moon aligns favorably with four planets in your ambitious sign, indicating that you can accomplish nearly anything you put your mind to now. However, Rome wasn't built in a day and the results of your current work may take weeks to manifest. Just give it your best effort moment by moment and the rewards will follow soon enough.

Your peers might see you as brimming with holiday spirit today, especially if you keep the most serious issues buried deep inside. However, you are more practical than sentimental now, empowering you to set your emotions aside and get down to work. Fortunately, applying yourself diligently will be worth it in the long run. Seize this rare opportunity and produce something special with lasting value. Your unwavering determination enables you to wow others with your accomplishments.

The temptation to escape from your obligations is difficult to resist, especially if you are looking forward to this evening's festivities. You know what you should do, but could suddenly be distracted by the celebratory excitement anyhow. However, having a concrete plan in place works in your favor now because you already know your limits. The sequence of events is critical today: meet your responsibilities first and then indulge in your fantasies later on.
